Adis Ababa:
Addis Ababa ( /ˌædɪs ˈæbəbə/ ; Amharic: አዲስ አበባ,
lit.  'fulaawa keesun' ˈabəba ( heitina )), annɗiraɗum 
Finfinne(lit. "Weeɗuu njaaram" nɗer Oromo ), [7 Un lamorde e kapital leydi ethiopiyya.
Ɗen haanobo jooɗorde ɗe hukuma ɗumOromia : Oromia haabo ɗe yaasiiɗum jokkirde hautude diiweDer ɗe lingal 2007, deƙiyastaɗuudirkalarduyimɓegelleɗen baano 2,739,551 joɗiiɓe ɗer [2.

Nairobi:
Nairobi ( /naɪˈroʊbi/ ny-ROH-bee ) un laamorde e kapital ɗem e gelle mawɗe ɗe leydi Kenya . Innde ɗen heeɓaama e ɗe ɓe massiwal gollid. Enkare Nairobi, e de fassire e ndiyam peudam, de nassiji ɗe mayo filtiingo gelle fuu. Galliol (berniiji) ngol engol woodi ɗuɗirka yimɓe ha faadi 4,397,073 eder ɗi 2019 lingal waataagal. Haa ɗen bo jajirka leysdi ɗuuɗiri baano ɗum 9,354,580. Galliol ngol ɗum buri anɗirki kooreeji ɗun ɗe naage.

Abidjan:
Abidjan ( /ˌæbɪˈdʒɑːn/ AB-ih-JAHN , French: [abidʒɑ̃] ; N’ko :
߲߬ߊߖߌߓߊ) un hautirde jaudi e lamorde e kapital leysdi E wii'aago kollinngo limgal 2021 , [Abidjan un duuɗirdum yimɓe haa bano miliyanji 6.3, . Lattiɗum haa bano 21.5% Dun ɗuuɗirka yimmɓe leysdi, e ɗen jowee go'o mauɗe der leyɗe Afrik, Ɓaawo [laagos,[Kinshasa , [Dar es
Salaam] , e Ɗe finnugo jokkol ɗum Hirnaare [Afrik, un ɗe annɗirde mauɗe sana'aji e galluje. Haa ɗemboo wolde ɗe dum leysdi Ivory coast un kamɓe ɓurii wolduuki paransiire eɗe dumngal hirna .

Khartoum:
Khartoum ko Khartum (/kɑːrˈtuːm/ kar-TOOM ; Arabic: ﺍﻟﺨﺮﻃﻮﻡ, romanized: Al-Khurṭūm) un lamorde den kapital leydi Suudan. Hauti e ɗuuɗirka yimɓe koyahri ɗun 5,274,321, ɗun kanje ngooni gelle mawɗe ɓurɗe jajirka leydi ɗer Suudan. Uɗii jooɗorii haade go'o ɗum niluuji daneeji,so'ori wayla weeɗu tana ɗer Ethiopiyya inaare ɗe beelii ɗiɗi kauti Annɗiraaɗi Al-mogran Ko al-muqran 
( ﺍﻟﻤﻘﺮﻥ) ; . Inaare ɗe di hautiɗiiri e wayla yeeso Misra e ɗi juggol Mediterranean .

Cape Town:
Cape Town (Afrikaans:Kaapstad; , Xhosa:iKapa) un go'o eɗer tati ɗi laamorde leydi fombinaare Afrik joddigal e joɗorde siyasa e ngu galluje fombinaare Afrik.

Gumel:
Gumel hukuma pamarun e hautirɗe diiwal ɗer Diiwal Jigawa, Naajeeriya.

Eket:
Eket un gootun eɗer hukumaji 31 ɗi ɗer Diiwal Akwa Ibom, Naajeeriya. Innde Eket ko Ekid eɗe hollina e ɓe usli lasgo kongol ɗunɓe wuttuɗu ɗun ɗen e wolde. Yimɓe Eket e ɓe kuutira e wurtorɗe maɓɓe ɗen e wolde maɓɓe, amma yuroopuen indini e noɗɗiri ɗe inɗe eɗau Eket.
Inaare ɗen e hore maare un ɗe gasol ɓe luuɓe eɗer ton ɗuuɓi caoliɗi lattiɗe jokkiɗirɗe chion kauti inaare go’o. Officewal ɗumɓe kakkilanoɓe ko hauti ɗun diiwal Akwa Ibom ƙiyastake geɓɓal hukuma pamarun Eket rammitinnaɗe 176.005 square kilomitre (km2) ɗen e hisaago 2006 (limgal) ƙiyastake ɗuuɗirka yimɓe kamanoo 172,856. Demma boo ministere ɗe faago jauɗi yesso diiwal Akwa Ibom ɗe 2013 ƙiyastaako ɗuuɗirka ede hukuma pamaarun Eket hokkiri baanoo 218,438 hauti e ɗuuɗirka touki nyolɗe 1,241km2.
Destinorɗe.
Walaa ɗuɗɗun binɗaaɗun eɗau yimɓe Eket ɓaawo ko waaruki ɗunɓe missionary yuroopuen saroɓe haaje e lamɓe. Haa ɗembo Portugiesen charkiti ɗer ɗungal dun hirna Afrik eɗer saaliɗe 1400s ɗen e nastuki leyɗe eko nooni luumo kuuɗe e dawirɗe ɓe Afrik. Ɗun’un ɗun hujjawal hautuki yimɓe Eket eɓe Portugues eɗe e wakkatire e ɗunton.

Enugu:
Enugu (einu;gu/heitinago) ay-noogoo;Igbo (Enugu) ) un hore hautirɗe Diiwal Enugu ɗer Naajeeriya. Eɗe joɗori ɗungal ɗer fombina fuuna Naajeeriya gelle ɗen eɗe ngooɗi ɗuɗirka yimɓe haba 722,664 e limgal (hisaago) Naajeeriya ngal 2006. Inɗe Enugu heɓirama gaɗa inɗee de ɗiɗun ɗun Igbo enu ugwu ma’anu dow nyolɗe ɗe nyolɗe gasol joogaraafiwol.
Tun ƙarniwol 17 joɗorɗe ɗun jonni yalɗe Enugu e joɗori joɗerɗe ɗe Enugwu-ngwo e nike kongal yimɓe Igbo ɗer 1900 ɓe fombinaare Naajeeriya renorɗe ɗe heɓama wakkati arɗugal lamu boɗejo turankoen e arɗugal Biritinkeejum.
Ɗyiita yuulɓe wakkatire de gaɗa turankoen arɗi e faaro heɓiniki e hoɗun tiggiri ɗen anɗira ɗun Enugu wuron yulɓe. Inɗe ɓaawo ɗe haaɗe chiun ɗun Enugu Ngwo les inaare e nyuulɓe keɓiira. Haaɗe gelle ɗe Portharcourt tigga gamma wurtinki nyulɓe ɗen yaasi ko lesɗe yaasi.
Distinorde.
Innuɗe distinorde.
Artuɗe joɗarɗe nyibgal eɗer Enugu un ɗe famarɗe chief Nike ɗun ogui gonɗun haajooni tun ɗe zaman ɗumɓe choggu ɓe atlantic Nike e bolle Igbo ewaaɗi ma’anu ɗarɗigol ko semɓigal. Un ɗun haaɓe choggoɓe ɗunɓe yimɓe Nike tefaata ɓurɗun ɗun leyɗi maɓɓe ɗe ɗun nyiiɓaayi. Ɓe Nike e kuutira korɗo eɗun helanaaki maaje ɗun lattini korɗe eta hakkuɗe helaaki wonnoɓe gamɗun ɗun un bonee ɗun waiwaiɓe nastina enci muuen keɓani en yairi.

Gombe:
Gombe (Fula gelle/wuro Gombe) un gelle mawɗe e hare hautirɗe Diiwal Gombe wayla fuunaa Naajeeriya hauti e ƙiyastago ɗuɗirka yimɓe ɗun 261,536.Gelle ɗen ɗun hore hautirɗe laamu diiwal Gombe. Ɗe diiwal finnaatawa ngal suɗdi ɗuɗdun ɗun diiwal Gombe. Diiwal Gombe e wolwira bolle ɗudde baano hauti e hausare, fulfulde, e tangale e hauti e luttuɗe. Nyaɓɓiɗe faadeyesso diiwal eɗer diiwal haa e maɓɓutuki ɗun bekesun wuro jipporɗe piroje ɗe duniyaru ɗer 2008 e maugu diiwal gelle heɓinki solar nanage.
Ɗuɗirka Yimɓe.
Diiwal Gombe un ɗuɗirɓe ɗe fulɓe yimɓe ɓe ɗuɗiri haabano caaka ɗuɗirka ko koɓuri caaka ɗun ɗuɗirka yimmɓe diiwal ngal luttuɗi lasgi kongi eɗer haaɓe bolankoen, teraen, wajaen, e hausa’en yimɓe.
Hukuma pamarun ɗun eɗun woodi geɓbol ɗun 52km2 e ɗuɗirka yimmɓe ɗun 480,000 eɗun hissago 2006. Boldal biagal post code ngal geɓal ngal un 70.
Siyaasaje (cuɓii).
Chairmanjo mo hukuma pamaarun mo joni kanako wooni Alhaji Ali Ashaka.
Jahaleeji.
Gombe un marɗun eɗun Gombe lawanti jipporɗe piroje duniyaru ɗen eɗe poliisiire fuunaare laagiwol wuttuɗu ɗuɓe sabiswal leydi laawol pirowal les e motaaji Gombe line kaddi ɗer caka gelle, ɗer ɗun febrie arɗiɗo leydi Good Luck Jonathan o anɗiirii toon ɗe Gombe-Kafachan-Kaduna caakare luuma gelleji sabisji haaɗun heɓnaamer. Bial ɓehaaɗe ɗunɓe sabiswal jahooɓe eɗen mauna farah yeeso ɗenɗe Gombe e luttuɗe jokkiɗirɗe diiwe.

Touci Lamu Dukku:
lamu toukocil Dukku eii ɗo Diiwal Gombe Naajeeriya toudin walata touden garee Dukku,cangol Gongola imo toukii gorgal eii woila toucil lamu,emou woudi harton 3,815 km2 andi doudii jama,are 207,190 eii limi 2006, sirree dukku houkaen musilmi, en, doun ewodi kahiri'en. moaudu yaree ein fulbe ɗun hun batatuu fulfulde eii lamu mawdun yaree toe  gundi ingilishi hiiri-weti batuu, Lamba worou yeree 760.
Lawul woyla toe lituggal hardun latitude 14'N toe longitude 14'E oseli eii tokocil lamu Hadde kilomita Joe go,on banye humbina eii litugal toe sirre Dukku.
Laamlamɓe Lamou Dukku.
Lammou Dukku owodi saffo e joweeɗiɗi (17) Lammɓe.

Ibadan:
Ibadan (/ibadan/) unɗe gelle hautirɗe diiwal Oyo e gelle ɓurɗe mauge diiwal ngal, ɗer Naajeeriya. Un gelle tatauje ɓurɗe ɗuɗuki ɗun yimɓe e ɗer Naajeeriya gaɗa Laagos e Kano hauti e ɗuɗirka yimɓe ɗun 3,649,000 un e 2021 e ɗuɗirka yimɓe millianji taati (3) hauti futinɓe gelle ɗai un gelle ɓurɗe jaajirka leydi eɗer lesdi ɗin ɗun eta geografiwal geɓɓal. Eta wakkatire heptugo hore Naajeeriya ɗer 1960 Ibadan un gelle jaiɗe e ɓurɗe ɗuɗirka gelle ɗer Naajeeriya e ɗiiɗaaɓe ɓurɗe ɗuɗirka gelle ɗer Afrik ɓawo Cairo. Ibadan kanje ɓuri yauɗu faaro maunuki ɗun gelle eɗer galliol heɓɓere Afrik ɗen e ɗiɗaure gelle yaunuɗe maugu e geɓɓe Afrik eta bial ɗunɓe un yimɓe ɗaroɓe nyiɓle huwoɓe gollite fuɗɗuɓe ɗau linyital. Ibadan jokki e Unasko (UNESCO) duniyaru sabisji ɗun ekkitaki anɗal gelle ɗer 2016.
Distinorde.
Ibadan waɓɓere gaɗa ɗe wakkatire ‘Eba odan” ma’aanu wuttuɗu ɗuɓe meadow waruɓe eɗer huwirɗe eɗer 1829 hitaɗe waɗuɗe turmoil ton jottoriɓe leydi yorubanko’en e wattatire. Un e ɗenɗen wakkatire ɗun ɗuɗɗe gelle yorubanko’en baano un Oyo kiiɗe (Oyolle), ijaye e owu majjiti.

Olamilekan Adegbite:
Olamilekan Adegbite ministajo ko woni nɗer leydi ɗun jamɗe

Ndị Hausa:
 Hausa kingdom
Hausa may refer to:
Hausa people

Rilwan Akiolu:
Rilwan Akiolu laamiiɗo Laagos mo jooni.

Ernest Afiesimama:
Ernest Afiesimama arɗiiɗo tayaaku waylutugo e Naajeeriya

Kunle Adeyemi:
Kunle Adeyemi mawɗe NLE didowo nyimbe nyimle faslata gelle den bo e sareji Amsterderm.

Ayo Aderinwale:
Ayo Aderinwale jami’ajo dufulomasiyyajo mo Naajeeriya.

Wale Adenuga:
Wale Adenuga wallafotoɗo ɗen bo siryotoɗe filmiji

Oladipupo Olatunde Adebutu:
Oladipupo Olatunde Adebutu un gimɗo shubtule Naajeeriya

Niyi Adebayo:
Niyi Adebayo ngomnajo Diiwal Ekiti artuɗo ɗen bo ministajo luuɓeji e sufuki juude luumture ɗun jooni.

Diiwal Ekiti:
Ekiti (e Nodda e Yoruba "Ìpínlẹ̀ Èkìtì':) ɗum Diiwal e nder diiwe eɗoo leyɗi Naajeeriya, Diiwal ngal e tawe e fombina hirnannge Naajeeriya, Gaɗa e Diiwal Kwara ɓo woyla, Wayla ɓo Funaange Diiwal Kogi, Diiwal Ondo Fombina, e Fombina Hirna, e Hirnaannge Diiwal Osun.

Ede:
Ede un gelle ɗer Diiwal Osun, fombina-hirna, Naajeeriya. E ɗun haaɗe faaro maayo Osun eta haaɗe wuttuɗu laawol girgije ndiiyam gaɗa laago 180km (110mi) fombina-hirna ɗen e kenɗuuɗe ɗun laawi gaɗa Oshogbo, Oshogbo e Ile-ife ɗe hukumaje paamaare geɓɓa ɗer Ede un Ede fombina e Ede woila. Ebo ɗen ewoodi jangirde mawɗi tatii (3) ɗer Ede lattinɗe gelle ɗen jaunuɗe mawgu e inaaje ɗen eta ɗer fombina hirna hauti e yawwalu mawngu kollinuwa janngirde den ɗekauti e hautirɗe jangirɗe Redeemers Ede un julɓe ke ɓurɓe ɗuuɗuki hauti haa baanoo 60% ɓe ɗuuɗirka. Ɗun’un dun sogitaama ɓaawo e ƙarnuji 19 wakkatire waɗugo laamo Timi Abibu langunju eɗau laamiɗo Ede, kanko ɓuri yiɗɗe ɓe artuɓe julɓe ɗer ummatore leydi yorobanko’en kokkuɗo jawabu eɗau mo haa waaɗi e haaɗe feraago eɗer ɗuuɓe seɗɗa haa bano ɗer Colte, 1851 ɓe Baptist Missionary, Will Dark ziyartako Ede. Clarke deppi ɗurun pamaaru tokkuɓe ɗunɓe Annabijo Muhammad (SAW) wakkatire rammuɗe ɗun mo latti gonɗe Ikoji gelle ɗen eɗer inaare e Abbalɗi maako (o ɗuniyi) ɗe jippo ɗen waɗɗimo eɗer officewal eɗau diinah Islamah.

Yaounde:
Yaoundé (UK : /jɑːˈʊndeɪ, - ˈuːn-/ ; US : / ˌjɑːʊnˈdeɪ/ , French Noddira: ​[ja.unde) un kapital leydi kameroun e Hautugo ɗuuɗirka haano ɓuuri ba 2.8 miliyanji, gelle diɗaɓe ɓurɗe mawngu e ɗer leydi gaɗa ɗee huɓɓude douala. Ɗum caka jonɗe leydi ɗem e njaajira kamano ɗun 750 miiteer (2,500ft) edow mawngu.

Casablanca:
Casablanca, no andiira ɗer ababankoore ba Dar Dar al-Bayda (Arabic:
ﺍﻟﺪَّﺍﺭ ﺍﻟْﺒَﻴْﻀَﺎﺀ , romankoore : al-Dār al-Bayḍāʾ , ɫbajdˤaːʔ ;
Berber languages: ⴹⴹⴰⵕⵍⴱⵉⴹⴰ, romanized: ḍḍaṛlbiḍa) un gelle mawde ɗer moracco
wor

Alexandria:
Alexandria (/ ˌælɪɡˈzændriə/ or /- ˈzɑːnd-/ ; Arabic:
ﭐﻟْﺈِﺳْﻜَﻨْﺪَﺭِﻳَّﺔُ al-ʾIskandarīyah biial ɓe naane : Αλεξάνδρεια,
romankoore Alexándria ) un de gelle ɗiiɗawre ɓaawo Cairo ɗer leydi misraa.

Kampala:
Kampala (UK : /kæmˈpɑːlə/ , US : / kɑːmˈ-/ )[3un de kapital e gelle maawnde ɗe [Uganda. Gelle ɗen no haa marii ɗuuɗiirka yimmɓe koyahri haa bano 1,680,000e Un henndii haa no henndii haa bano joowi henndaago siyasa ɗun [Kampala [makindye,[Rubaga.

Giza:
Arabic: ﺟﻴﺰﺓ el-Gīza , misrankoore Arabic noddirte: [el
ˈgiːze] ) un de ɗiiɗawre gallure mawde ɗer leydi Misra ɓaawoo Cairo e nayiire ɗer galluje mawde ɗer Afrik ɓaawo [Cairo . Ɗin ɗe kapital ɗun hukumaare hauti e ɗuuɗirka yimmɓe fittugo haa no ɗun 9.2 miliyanji ede 2021. Eɗum ɗi jottori e ta ɗe [Nile3mi fombina cakare un a ɓannɗu ɗun mauɗum ɗe [Cairo geɓɓal. Giza jottori less ɗe 30km (18.64mi) woyla ɗum memphis(menefer) lattiɗe kapital artungal dun [Egypt diiwe gada nyalɗe ɗun ɗe artuude pharaoh Narmer

Antananarivo:
Antananarivo( French: Tananarive , noddira ),ɗen bo andiraa eno laamu Boɗejo so dammitinaaɗum fomwal Tana un kapital leydi [Madagascar. Ɗebe huutirde geɓɓal gelle ɗen andiraa Antananarivo-Renivohitra
Tana , Antananarivo-Renivohitra
("Antananarivo-hoosere innaare ko"Antananarivo-kapital"), un de kapital ɗe analamanga geɓɓal. Gelle jottori ha 1,280m (4,199ft) e daw mbeeli ɗer caka de Island. Be mawde kapital leydi e no limtaagal haano de lesɗe island. Ɗum mari ko de mawngu ɗuuɗirka lesdi caka tin ɗer ko ƙarniijia18 . Ɗe arduungal rumoawsl leydi ,senata'en e kootuuji ɗon njooɗoori thona eno ɗun diplomacio missionre jooɗoori e hoorehawtirde ɗun ɗumnde ɗer e yaasii luumooji e naa gomnaati NGOs Ɗum mari jangirle ɗuɗɗe ,fijirdenjemma ,inaare diiduugo e n6awnitorde huutirde fuu ko ɗeme gelle ɗe island . Ko yari fijo wuro e ladde fuu e woodi ɗer galluje mawde fuu mari e ɗi jottori.

Kumasi:
Kumasi (taarikuuji winndira Comassie ko coomassie, huutirde winndina der Twi) un gelle der de Ashanti di de ɗer galluje mawde ɗer leydi Gaana. Kumasi un di jottori ɗer innaare tooɓo haade beelel [Bosomtwe ,e un innaare gallure luumooji e yaartaji kapital ɗun de taarikuuji lamorde Ashanti. Kumasi un de dammitinirde baa 509km (300mi) Woyla de 200km (100mi) ɗi gulfwal Gine. Kumasi un altanawal Annɗiraaɗi gelle lambuuji [4 basoo'e dun ɗum duudɓe flawaaji e awraaji ɗer di naane Αλεξάνδρεια. Ɗen boo eɗun noddira di e oseikrom (gelle osei Tutu).

Ali Modu Sharif:
Ali Modu Sharif Un gimɗo cuuɓal (siyasaji) mo Naajeeriya.mo hannko na artuuɗo waɗuuki Gomnaa ha nde ɗiɗi e Borno daga ɗer gimnaa'en Diiwal ngal o gaɗɗo daga der duuɓi (2003-2011). Ngaa'al muƙaalawal ngal dammungal eduum haani buƙaata e ungannaaki ngal On rakkai moo'inki ngal. https://guardian.ng/news/former-borno-governor-ali-modu-sheriff-https://www.vanguardngr.com/2019/02/atiku-did-not-offer-adamawa-rec-1m-bribe-says-inec/amp/meets-obasanjo-behind-closed-doors/

Hiisira jeergol jangirle mawɗe ɗer Diiwal Yobe, Naajeeriya:
Yewteere muƙalawal Diiwal Yobe Un gootal ɗer di 36 diiwe dun Naajeeriya jootiriiɗun deta woyla-fuunare ɓannɗu Naajeeriya hawti Damaturu ede kapital Diiwal ngal. Ɗo'o un hisaago jeergol ɗun jangirle mawɗe ɗer Diiwal Yobe kawtuɗe ɗe hukuma e jioɗiirde Hore kabba univastiije e politeknik e kolechji.

Diiwal Ondo:
Diiwal Ondo e Diiwal e ɗum diiwal e nɗer leysɗi Naajeeriya fonbina hiirnaange Naajeeriya. Ɗin ɗuuɗal daga haa 3, Colite duuɓi 1976 bee beɗiiɗo Diiwal Hiirnaange. Gaɗa e Diiwal Ekiti haa soɓɓirre, Diiwal Kogi woila fuunannge, Diiwal Edo haa fuunannge, Diiwal Delta daga faago fombina fuunannge, Diiwal Ogun fombina hiirnaange, Diiwal Osun daga woila hiirnaange, bee Fombina e Maayo filtiingo Atlantike. Akure kini laamorde diiwal Ondo.

Ahmad Sulaiman Ibrahim:
Ahmad suleiman Ibrahimo onn don moudun bourin andouki eii Alaramma ahmad suleima eii nyalde 26 dubbi 1966, mouwadii hadda Alqur'aana kariimi eii biidoo Naajeeriya. Malami addina Musulunci'en eii mouwadadii Andikoo Alqur'ani mangoo eii donmah lamba mantukuo doodii toe yajikou duniyaru, gan banjoo fanni Aqur'ani'en eii mangoo. Shaikh suleiman andikko qira'a don tagame toe enihi Alqur'aana toe duniyaru, en garal Naajeeriya.

Mustapha Badamasi Naburaska:
Mustapha Badamasi Idris on ɗon moudun bori andekuu Naburaska koh nabaraska biddo fiijun kwaikwayo e keriiɗum banye kannywood. Be ɗanyimou e duuɓi 1984 ɗou Diiwal Kano, Naajeeriya. edon naddamou waraiki makko Amerik don tou muheɓi lamba mantukuo toh wandi enɗee braskem, e mouwadi fim mou ende Naburaska.

Truss Mary Elizabeth:
Mary Elizabeth Truss. Eriminmo (26 July 1975) inmuu siyasar lidi England inmoo huwa a matsayin ardoju jam,iyar Conservative tun daga 6 satumber 2020.Dou wangi yar majalisa (mp) toe hirnaa toh humbinaa Norfolk ⁷daga do wangi 2010.Truss o wadii guggal toh offishi toh majalisa ya,e ministoci arn
eii gyadii fere fere firayam minista David Cameron, Theresa eii Boris Johnson. Truss oyahii kwaleji  Marton Oxford,kuma dowangii toe shugabaju kwaleji Oxford Liberal Democrats.eii 1996, orootake jande kuma onatti jam,iyyar Conservative. Toe ohowii eii shell toe cable.ohh kasantake in mataimaki dun kungiyar owailiti tunani mako.Gada inmake zabe didoo amma ohibaa nasara toh hiba majalisa wakilici,hai insubi mah mangu wakilci loukil hirna eii hunbina Norfolk eii zabe maudoo 2010.Eii mango mako eii warbe jogake iko,oloudi Enmo inaa toh fani siyasa ei famanke sukahoe,ei fani daudike ilimi limgal,ei fani tattali risku.otigii kungiya lomu mowwalitu yan majalisu Conservative kuma ewondi darejii eii littattafai,hae imada gara,hae egada maju coalition (2011) me britannia unchanged 2012).

Diiwal Osun:
Osun e Diiwal nder leysdi Naajeeriya.

Diiwal Aanambaara:
Aanambaara un Diiwal e Leysdi Naajeeriya e littugal to woyla Diiwal Enugu to hirna Diiwal Kogi e fombina Asaba to maako sari hirne. Aanambaara wodii Lamido to laamu handikee gatal horeejo e Diiwal Peter obi. To gooren laamu Naajeeriya to diya, an Aanambaara hanko iwarna'en diiwal.

Abuko:
Abuko un ɗi nɗer hirnaawo kennɗiigo,ɗer wuttudu de ta hirnaare leydi Gammbi.

Yahaya Abubakar:
Yahaya Abubakar Etsu Nupe doon eriminmo yanlde 12 eii Silto , 1952. Eii Bida
Eriminmo onnmah wurtawake woru lamu Bida.
Doon wadii jende kwaleji gwamnati, toon Don Sakkwatoɓe toe onnmah kwaleji lumo,en, Kano (1967-1971) toe onnmah jangirdee lamu eii Naajeeriya Kaduna (1973-1975) a fauree kogal soji Naajeeriya.
Diga kadaa,onn don Ritaya,en eii matsayi Birgediya janar toun ooon lewro Silto, 2003.
Fauree.
Abubakar Joe doon Lamido Nupe eii Warnoo kusodu Nupe,jalde soji toon Don lamorde jorni baldii Abuja,oon doon darakta'en shourii.Yahaya Abubakar kon don Lamido nupe 11 eii jalde satumba 2003.lamu jama,en nupe..
Darɗe.
Abubakar toon wurtawake gatal huree diiwal Edu toe birni,en Bida diiwal Edu eii litugal diiwal Neja toe waila diwal kogi toe humbina diiwal kwara seeni Lamido Lapai eii Lamido Agaie toe Lamido lafiagi eii Lamido Tsaragi eii Lamido t
Tsonga toe ya,e Lamido patigi burtaya,en nupe handal Naajeeriya hoon.

Mu'azu Babangida Aliyu:
Mu'azu Babangida Aliyu ooon ɗon lamourde coori Gomnaatii moi,en Ngwamnajo Diiwal Niger, Naajeeriya eiii Sedto duuɓi 2007. eii ya toon gwamna diiwal niger eii 26 Sedto dungu 2011.

Abdullahi Umar Ganduje:
Abdullahi Umar Ganduje OFR (be danyimo yande 25 lewru Bowte, duuɓi 1949) goɗɗo siyasaji on hanko on Ngomnajo Kano Kadi jonta hooreejo partiwal lamatoongal Lesdi Naajeeriya. Ojaɓi lamu dungu 2015 fahin hanko on ballowo Rabi'u Kwankoso nde ɗiɗi bee dungu 1999 faago 2003 be 2011 faago 2015.

Aminu Ibrahim Daurawa:
Sheikh Aminu Ibrahim Daurawa (o dañaama yalde 1, silo duuɓi 1969) toe doon woru wodii lamba en 39 fawree mazugal feya en laamou Daala toon ɗon Diiwal Kano Naajeeriya. O seeni jangirɗe Diina Silaama e toen diiwal kano ee wurnaaye guggal diiwal Kano daga toon har Toroonto,en Naajeeriya.
Sheikh Aminu Daurawa lamu Hisbah on doun kano e seeni lamou ungogo. ein jabou guggal rediyo on lamb en "TAMBAYA MABUDIN ILIMI" bandirawo Sani Kwangila Yakasai wurnayee doon.

Abubakar Malami:
Abubakar Malami SAN (O ɗaayaama nɗer nyalɗe 17 ngu lewru cholte ɗun nɗumngu 1967), un goɗɗo lawyaajo ɗenbo gimɗo cubtal siyasaji e Naajeeriya lattido tiin ɗe ɗumngu 2015 o jogiiɗo mukaami ministajjo dookajji e lawyaajjo mawɗo. .
Taariku Daygo Maako.
Ɗun danyi Abubakar Malami, pullo jullɗo no nyalɗe 17 ngu lewru cholte ɗun nɗumngu 1967 e der gelle Kebbi]], gelle mawɗe ɗe Diiwal Kebbi. gonnɗum waylare Naajeeriya.
Djannɗe maako artuuɗe mo fuɗɗi firamare maako e Nasarawa gelle Kebbi Diiwal Kebbi ko mo timmina djannɗe maako de sekandere e jangirde gollital e himmari larabankoore. Ɗer ɗumngu 1991 ,mo timmini jannɗe maako e jangirde Usmanu ɓinngel fodi inaare emo janngi lawyanci ɗemmbo ɗun noddimo yaahi mashaya e ɗumngu 1992 O lattake jannguuɗo kiiɗo e janngirde Maiduguri inaare e mo heeɓi digiriwal maako ɗiɗaaɓal edow harkaaji laamu e ɗumngu ta 1994
Ɓaawo timminki maako djannɗe maako O huuwi inaaje fere-fere ɗer haa e lattaaki dokkoowo ɗen e Shari'a e Diiwal Kebbi,Naajeeriya.
Kuugal Siyasaji.
Malami mo lattake dokkoowo shaawori dow harkaaji Shari'a ɗun sarkitiiɗe majalis gam faaki Yeeso saakitaaki mo lattake gonɗo junngo dum-dum faroo tigguki (APC) e ɗumngu ngu 2013 e jonnɗe ginnɗo dokkoowo balle edow yahirki manifesto drafting defting subint committee of joint party comiti commitors hakkude Congress for progressive change (CPC) , Action Congress of Nigeria (ACN) ɗen ebo All Nigerian people party (ANPP). e ɗumngu 2014 Abubakar o wurtoyke tefuuki tikitiwal tefgo jooɗorgal Gomnaa e les cuɓal All progressive Congress (APC) e diiwal Kebbi amma o heɓaayi subteeki e wurtinki teefooɓe jooɗorgal ngal e o do'aake Atiku Bagudu heɓi nasru.
Ministaa Dookaji (Shari'a).
De yalɗe 11 ngu lewru Jolal ɗungu 2015 ɗun lammini Abubakar Malami e jonnɗe ministaajo dookaji ɗemmbo lawyaajo mawɗo hawtude leydi Naajeeriya sabo'e non O latti ministaajo pamaaro nder ministaa'en Muhammadu Buhari.

Abubakar Sani Bello:
Abubakar Sani Bello oon don Lolo bandirawoo lysidi siyasa'en Naajeeriya jornii en gwamnajo Diiwal Niger,Naajeeriya kuma eii don jamm'iya APC makko..

Godwin Obaseki:
Godwin Nogheghase Obaseki (o dañaama e ñalɗe 1st nder lewru morso hutaaɗe 1959 e gelle Bini, Naajeeriya un gimɗo siyasa,en ɗu ɗenbo Kannko wooni Gomnaajo diiwal Edo, Naajeeriya, jogiiɗo arduungal jonnta tu hitaanɗe 12 de lewru Jolal, 2016. O lattake Kannko wooni arduujo hawtuugo jawdi mobgal ɗun diiwal [[Edo[[Godwin Obaseki, tiggaɗun e les wakkitire arduujo kiiɗo Adam oshiomole ɗer lewru MBOY hutaaɗe 2009. Obasaki o janngi haa yeeso digiri biaɗe saalugo timmode noddirde (post graduate) o janngi fannuji ɗiɗi biadi fannu njawdi e limgal ɗun stock Brokers, Naajeeriya. Obasaki o jogaake arduule kamfaniiji mawɗi ɗi firabet, afrinvest.

Nasir Ahmed El'rufai:
Nasir Ahmed El-Rufai(o danƴaama nyalɗe 16 nde lewru Colite ɗun hitaaɗe 1960) O danƴaama ɗer Diiwal Katsina daga lasngol Hausa'en .a Baba maako maayi duuɓi maako jowee tati e duniyaru haano laati danƴoo maako debbo wato dada Kannko eltimo waati jangirde hoosi tadduɗum jannɗe maako tu daga dukaaku maako haa yaari moheeñi ƙoraaki ɓurɗum e Woyla Naajeeriya e naare e emo heeɓi manaago mawngo hawti e nasru timminki jannɗe maako e jonnɗe jannguuɗo mawɗo , Nasir El-rufai O heeɓi halartaaki jangirde Ahmadu Bello gonɗe Zaria inaare emo wati digiri mo dinngiri e fanu laaruki leydi inaare bo emo haaɓi nasru hebgo ɓurɗo kowa ilmu ngarɗo go'o e lambaawal noddiraɗum first class e turankoore El-Rufa’io heeɓi halartaaki jangirde Harvard ɗen'e Georgetown. Ɗemmhai o heeɓi halartaaki jangirde London e hutaaɗe ɗumngu ngu 2008 hawti jangirde john F kennedy joodiide havard e korso 2009. Un gimɗo siyasa de Naajeeriya lattido jonnta Gomnaajo diiwal Kaduna,o nasti ofiswal e hutaaɗe ɗumngu 2015. O medgo lattaki ministaajo birniwal Abuja Hore hawtude leydi Naajeeriya daga 2003 yari 2007;ɗen e darektaajo ofiswal janngirle.[3 emo ɗer daga ɓe tigguɓe partiwal cuɓal biagal All progressive Congress (APC) ardiigal laamu lesdi Naajeeriya jooni. 

Abdulkadir Kure:
Abdulkadir Kure oon doon gwamna 26 fabrailu 1956 toe 1958 eii lysdi Naajeeriya doon hoon gwamna Diiwal Niger, Naajeeriya 29 May 1999 toe 29 may 2007. Kure lidi jamm'iya PDP. eii May 200, kure wurtake shari'a Diina musulunci eii Diiwal niger.
Fauree.
Abdulkadir Kure eii Debo'en Zainab Abdulkadir kure eii lysidi guggal gmnati toe doon dungou 2007. oyah lidi datawa,en Naajeeriya toon Don dungou 2007 toen 2015 
Kure wurtake toe touci lamu lapai fauree Lamorade Rani Lapai. Kure maidee 8 leuro Siilo duuɓi, 2017 e Jamus a dungou 60 eii duniya,en.

Henry Dickson:
Seriake Henry Dickson (ɗun danƴiimo e nyalɗe 28 siilo hutaade 1966). Un gimɗo cuuɓal siyasa Naajeeriya. O lattake Gomnaajo diiwal cubtaaɗo bayelsa fombina lorgal fombinaare Naajeeriya tun daga wakkitire 2012. O lattake wakiliijo dun rumpaaru Naajeeriya tu daga 2007 Haa yari 2012. Yakasance dan'majalisar wakilai tun
daga 2007 had zuwa 2012.

Bello Mohammed Matawalle:
Bello Muhammad Matawalle (O danƴaama de nyalɗe 12 nde lewru cholte hutaaɗe ɗumngu alif 1969), ɗemmbo mo Ngomnaajo diiwal eɗun wannamo laƙabi e dodo wato ɓe ngalaa gonnga e kulaymo kanjum wati o noddirte dodo Gomnaajo diiwal Zamfara Naajeeriya. Ɗemmbo O heɓi nyaama e les cuɓal patiwal "People Democratic party" (PDP)

Abdullahi Sule:
Abdullahi Sule (O danƴaama de hitaade ɗumngu 1959 ɗer chi'on Gudi)) Un ngomnaajo Diiwal Naasaraawa, Naajeeriya Daga ɗunmgu ngu 2019 (ɓawo Umaru Tanko Al-makura). Abdullahi Sule nyalɗe .
Margo maako 
Innde maako kewude un de Abdullahi Sule daygo akwanga,26 Jolal 1959(duuɓi 62).

Kayode Fayemi:
John Olukayode Fayemi , (O danƴaama 16 nde ɗiɗi lewru Yarkuma duuɓi 1965, un ɓiɗɗo hukuma pomarum Oye ɗun Diiwal Ekiti, Naajeeriya Kannko wooni Gomnaajo diiwal Ekiti tun de hitaade ɗumngu 2010 ha yari 2014. O jippi e dow muƙamiwal maako ngal ministaajo kakkilando kowani nder lesdi e faago Yeeso inndanaadum ((solid minerals development)e nyalɗe (30) ɗun lewru Mbooye e duuɓi 2018 e tefuuki njooɗorgal Govnaajo e wakkitire w ɗiɗire,obo heeɓi nasru subteeki o latti NGomnaajo.

Umaru Bago Tafida III:
Umaru Bago Tafida 
Eriminmo nyalde 1954 toon hoon Lamiɗo lapai Jo,e go,en Diiwal Niger kankoo eii morse duuɓi 2002 umaru bago kankoo eii hutaii Allah rainii Lamido Muhammadu kobo maidee eiin dungu 92 oon don 48. Allah reni Lamiɗo Umaru Bago lamourde diiwal Niger. Abdulkadir Kure.
Umaru lamorde Alhaji Atiku Abubakar eii Ibrahim Badamasi Babangida wurtawake lapai to,en makkon.
Darɗe.
Matsa,en eii mamba majalisa lamɓe diiwal Niger ,eii leuro maris toon dungou 2003,ejabee toe jam'iyyar PDP eii zabe,en waraitou,houri mamba majalisa, Lamido Umar ejabee toe PDP hauru,on Lamido Nupe (sanda Ndayako) Lamido suleja Auwal Ibrahim Lamido minna toe Lamido Kagara.
Laamlamɓe.

Umaru Bago Tafida (10 Aug 2002.

Willie obiano:
Willie Obiano(o daƴaama nder lewru cholte hitaade ɗumngu 1955)o gimmɗo Naajeeriya ɗembo neddo o siyasa.
Kuugal
Kiiɗo maikacijo Bankiwal,ɗembo cubtaaɗo Gomnaajo diiwal Anambra, Naajeeriya jogiiɗo arduungal jonnta.
Anambra jooɗiibe laud obiano gorɗo ɗer mbalde 100ɗer ofiswal.habaruuji daga Taskarawal laamu Naajeeriya. bo'ital (2 MBOY 2015.

TAARIHI FULƁE:
Fulɓe koo Fula (gootel: pullo Ko fullo) Un yimmɓe jottori ɓe dunngal hirna faro woylare Afrik tun wakkitiire neeɓude. Ko ɗum ɓuuri annɗirki fulɓe un ndurngol dabbaji maɓɓe ɗemmbo e ɓiiruki kosam e soora ɗam,fulɓe un woɓɓe yimmɓe wooduɓe fahimmta baɗɗum, kanjum wati mbe njoodi e ko ɗime lasngi jam ɗemmbo haa ɓe kakkilani mbanngal e hakkude maɓɓe. Kididdigago hisaago holli e woodi fulɓe haa miliyanji sappoje tati e joowi e Naajeeriya. Owodi Pulaah duunma dow lesdi Najeeriya 6%.
Nayejo fulbe e haa mari tumbude kosam.
Ɗemngal.
Ɗemngal ko Bolle ɗe fulɓe yeewtata e innnde maare Fulfulde. Non mbe noddirte der leyɗe Naajeeriya, Niiser, Sudan e Kamerun, amma e aslu furtu ɗaaɗol inaare e mɓe ngurtoyi waato kamani lesɗe Senegaal, Muritani, e Luttuɗe fof e ɗun noddira ɓe ɗemngal e Pulaar ko Fulah.

Jfk:
Many of you may not know is that JFK didn't die at the first time he got shot the he didn't die he died the second time in the theater.

Kamboodiyya:
Kambodiya Un leydi jottori di ɗe dunnggal fombina yari faro fuuna asiyya ɗembo edi mari ɗuudirka yimmɓe koyahri miliyanji sappo e tati (13). Innnde gelle mawɗe leydi ɗin Phnom Penh. Kamboodiyya ɗi heeɓi asali daga dawlawal hindu e baddha,jogiidi laamu yenkiwal ngal indoneesiyya e China hakkuɗe ƙarniwal sappo e go'o (11) yari ƙarniwal sappo e nayi (14).
Lesdi kamboodiyya
Nƴoole hooseje lesdi kamboodiyya
Ɗuuɗirka yimmɓe Kambodiya eɓe tokki diina buddha, amma e woodi julɓe tokkuɓe dinna islaama ɗuduɓe ɗen e Chanisre,ɓe asali leydi e ɗi asali leydi Vietnam ɗen e sedda lasgi joodiide edow ka'y'ye.
Lesdikamboodiyya e waadi kheerol e lesɗe Thailand ta hirna e ɗembo hirna faro Wayla laos e Wayla faro fuuna. Ta fombina edi suuti maayo Thailand.
Siyaasaaji
Siyaasaaji lesdi kamboodiyya ɗun tiggama edow tafarkiwal kundiwal tsaaraago laamu leydi ɗun 1993, den un tsariwal siryaki wataade laamido e firaministaajo,lattiɓe wakiki'en ummatore de hore maɓɓe . Firaministaajo kanko wooni arduujo gomnaati,caɓɓodiigal partiiji fere-fere, den laamido wooni arduujo leydi ɗin lamido hannko lamminta firaministaajo hawti e caawori majalisu ƙoli'en dun leydi.
Firaministaajo e ministaa'en e woodi iko hoosuki e zartaaki dokaaji.
Hiimoɓe

Jangirdee Diiwal Adamawa:
Jangirɗe Diiwal Adamawa jangirɗee maan dow Les gwamnati je Diiwal Adamawa don haa hukuma pamaren je Mubi,hirna sanata,en adamawa wakkere Woila, Diiwal Adamawa, Naajeeriya.Be woodna haa duuɓi 2002.

Pandogari:
Pandogari e wurooku nder Kagara mangou toci laamu Rafi haa Diiwal Niger, Naajeeriya, ewodi mangou o Noodo'on Kongomaje e fulfulde, haka fahin ewodi fulfulde toe litugal pandogari. goɗɗon ɗon daga Minna toe pandogari e sherre kilomita 156. pandogari wodi hakimi goggal hausa. oon doon hakimi pandogari jonii Alhaji idris Aliyu jibril. Yare'en wurtake pandogari, e Joe go,en hausa, fulfulde, toe Ɓurankwa'en doon.

Jangirɗee Diiwal Adamawa:
Jangirɗe Diiwal Adamawa jangirɗee maan dou Les gwamnati je Diiwal Adamawa don haa hukuma pamaren je Mubi, hirna sanatan Adamawa wakkere Woyla, Diiwal Adamawa, Naajeeriya. Be woodna haa duuɓi 2002.

Fedara Lekkiiji Mooborde, Gusau:
Fedara Lekkiiji Mooborde Gusau, 
Doum Fedara Laamujee Naajeeriya Lekki Mooborde Maan don nder Gusau,
Diiwal Zamfara Naajeeriya 
Mou Wounii Kanndinando anndinando mpabbe jotta kaankou on Bello A. Mohammed.

Janngirɗee Diiwal Adamawa:
Jangirɗe Diiwal Adamawa jangirɗee maan dou Les gwamnati je Diiwal Adamawa don haa Hukuma pamaren je Mubi, hirna sanatan Adamawa wakkere Wayla, Diiwal Adamawa, Naajeeriya. Be woodna haa 2002.

Lapai:
Lapai shiree eii derr Lapai touci lamou Diiwal Niger nderNaajeeriya oon don funaayee Abuja eii mangou lapai toh houn lituggal, A124 eii woila houn eii 90300N.
fawre.
Lapai wodii shiree toon daga 3,05km2 hoon doon jama,are 110,127 eii kidya,en 2006.lapai lamou,en Lamido Umaru Bago Tafida.
Laamlamɓe Lamou lapai.
Tokocil Lapai wodiii Lamido 
Da'udu Maza dan Jaura eii e nalde (1825 - 1832)
Yamuza dan Jaura eii e nalde (1832 - 1835)
Baji dan Jaura eii e nalde (1835 - 1838)
Jantabu dan Jaura eii nalde (1838 - 1874)
`Atiqu dan Jantabu eii nalde (1874 - 1875)
Bawa dan Jantabu eii nalde (1875 - 1893)
`Abd al-Qadiri dan eii nalde (1893 - 1907)
Ibrahim dan Jantabu eii nalde (1907 - 1923)
`Aliyu Gana dan `Abd al-Qadiri eii nalde (1923 - Apr 1937)
`Umaru dan Ibrahim eii nalde (1937 - Nov 1954)
Muhammadu Kobo dan `Aliyu Gana eii nalde (1954 - 13 Jun 2002)
Umaru Bago Tafida eii nalde (10 Aug 2002)

Yola Fombina:
Yola Fombina, Doum Touci Laamujee Wakkere Diiwal Adamawa, Naajeeriya, ae Wadee Biwal Lituggal Mubi toh Fombina Yola.

David adedeji adeleke:
David Adedeji Adeleke e nyalde 
21, leuru Jolal duuɓi 1992 oon doon Davido, eill Naajeeriya wake,en rabutu wake,en toe woodi jorni Africa biwall makko.

Abuja:
Abuja oun ɗon funaayee Birniwol,en Naajeeriya kankoo eii lysidi woyla Diiwal Niger eii litugal Diiwal Benue toe Diiwal Nassarawa

Yola Woila:
Yola Woila, oon doon Toci Laamujee Wakkere Diiwal Adamawa, Naajeeriya. Doum Huubaa Jiimeetaa. Doum dou Nder Fadde Yola (Yola South).Yola Woila Wodii.

Andrew Johnson:
ndrew Johnson (29 ngu Bowtal 1808-31 ngu Jolal 1875) 1875) hannko wooni ballitowo arduujo mo 16 e arduujo mo 17 di leydi Amerika.Hannko wooni arduujo artuuɗo mo ɗun jippini dow laamu amma ɗun jippinayimo dow iko. Jippinki kin waati sabo'en lagguki kimo wanni sakatareejo maako mo koonu ɓaawo majlisu waati dokawal. Du'un eɗun laaraɗum koɗum e leydi ɗin gamma galibu ɗun lutti de arduujo leydi lammina ɗemmbo lagga ko jippina sakatara'en muuɗum. Ɗemmbo majlisu ɓe ngiiɗa mo sabo'e hannko um mo cuɓal partiwal Dimocrat ɗemmbo o yiiɗaa wallitaki.

Zainab Abdulkadir kure:
Zainab Abdulkadir Kure eriminmonaye nyalde lewru 24 Nuwamba 1959 eii firee lamurajje sanata,en lamou niger wayla diiwal Niger, Naajeeriya oon don mulki lysdi 29 leuro 29 mayu 2007 eii jam'iyyar PDP.

Muhammad Bello Yabo:
Muhammad Bello Yabo, Mou be andii beii Bello Yabo ( be danyee mou haa nder nyalawmaare 1, nder lewru janayru nder duubii 1962). O, Mallumjo diinaa Lislaamu haa nder Lysdii Naajeeriya o, doun nder Mawbe Mallum'en Naajeeriya .yabo don gon Diiwal Sakwotobe Woila Naajeeriya.

Kabir Gombe:
Kabiru gombe, oon doon Kabiru Gombe be Danyee Mou Haa Nder Wourou Kuri'a Haa Hukuma Pamaren Yamaltu Deba, doum doun nder Diiwal Gombe, Naajeeriya. Kabiru Gombe O, Mallumjo Dina Lislaamu. Modibbo Kabiru O, janngii Fiiraamaarii haa nder Wourou Gombe, Moodibbo Kabiru Gombe O, janngii funayee Alqur'aana Mounde be nannataa Wo'itinankou janngirde maa kou haa mallam'en banantaa: Moodibbo Zarma Gombe,be Moodibbo Dr.Abdullahi Saleh Pakistan.

Mbarek Bekkay:
Mbarek Bekkay (: ﻣﺒﺎﺭﻙ ﺍﻟﺒﻜﺎﻱ ; aprie 18, 1907 [1 ɗer Barkane, - Aprie 12, 1961) [2 un de attuuɗo firaministaajo dun lesdi [Morocco hakkude Bowtal 7,e aprie 15,1958. [Bekkay jogaake mawngu ɗer laamu boɗejo ɗun ɗer faransi dun jandarmaa'en. Hannko wooni laati artuuɗo firaministaajo lesdi Morocco tun heptuugo hore lesdi ɗin daga hakkilannde ɓe faransi.

Ahmed Balafrej:
Ahmed Balafrej ( Arabi: ﺃﺣﻤﺪ ﺑﻼﻓﺮﻳﺞ;silto 5, 1908, ɗer gelle Rabat- setto 14,1990 un firaministaajo ɗi Morocco hakkuɗe Duujal 12,1958 e Bowtal 2,1958.[2 O go'o ɗer ballital heptuugo hoore lesdi Morocco. 
Hiimobe.

Abdallah Ibrahim:
Abdallah Ibrahim ( Arabi: ﻋﺒﺪ ﺍﻟﻠﻪ ﺇﺑﺮﺍﻫﻴﻢ ; 24 Juko 1918, Tameslouht- 11 Jolal 2005 ɗer Casablanca) un neɗɗo cuɓal e hoodere ɗer lusingo lesdi e keɓdo nasru firaministaajo ɗun Morocco hakkuɗe Bowtal 16 1985,e Duujal 20 1960. Hannko wooni firaministaajo tataɓo di lesdi Morocco e nastuki les laamu Muhammed V ɗemmbo o lattake ministaajo lesɗe yaasi gada 1958 waddi 1960.

Mohammed Bin Yusef:
Mohammed al-Khamis bin Yusef bin Hassan al-Alawi kanoomma anndira bano sidi Mohammed Bin Yusef ( Arabi: ﺳﻴﺪﻱ ﻣﺤﻤﺪ ﺑﻦﻳﻮﺳﻒ ) ko Mohammed Khamis (: ﻣﺤﻤﺪ ﺍﻟﺨﺎﻣﺲ‏) ‏( 10 Juko 1909 – 26 Cholte 1961), un Sultanjo dun Morocco daga 1927 yari 1953; O ɓuuri annditireeki de Sultan haiko non dedow wartugo daga jaddadaki ɗer 1955, e laamido daga de mayde baaba maako, 1957 waddi 1961. Yusef bin Hassan , O ronii ede dokkal. O haa membaajo ɗun ɓe de Alawi ndeesal.

Bashir tofa:
Bashir tofa Eriminmo 20 lewru juni mangou 1947 a lysdi Siyasa,en Naajeeriya. Tofa eii kanuri toe Lislaamu Diiwal kano Naajeeriya, ewodi jamm,iya NRC lamurajje ton hoon Ibrahim Badamasi Babangida.

Agaie:
Agaie eii hukuma pamaru Diiwal Niger, Naajeeriya ewoodi gelle, en Agaie oon saree A124 lamurraje.Ewoodi fekkal 1,903 km toe jama,are 132,907 duubi 2006.
Tarihi,en.
Agaie kanko doon 19th-century diiwal doon Naajeeriya,lamurajje eii Nupe eii tokocil Fulani duubi 1822, hannko wooni lamou Nupe bidil Fulbe , Lamido Agaie joonii Alhaji Yusuf Nuhu..

Ahmed Bahnini:
Ahmed Bahnini ( : ﺃﺣﻤﺪ ﺑﺤﻨﻴﻨﻲ 1909 ; , Fes – 10 Morso
1971, ) un taagu lattiɗo kaaja kuuɗe Siyaasaaji suɓal lesdi [Morocco hanko njoogi firaministaajo nayooɓo ɗun daga 1963 yaari 1965 les laamu lamido Hassan II. [1O Ha ɗen ardaake arduungal mawɗo kootuuji.[3 hitaade Morso 10,1971, yaake e murna daygo Hassan II ɗer laamorde skhirat, Bahnini o sooytaayi wakkati omtuugo hiitee silkie eder ɗe inaare yaake e teetuuki laamu ɗun solji'en waati..

Mohamed Benhima:
Mohamed Benhima ( Arabi: ﻣﺤﻤﺪ ﺑﻨﻬﻴﻤﺔ ; Korso 25, 1924 –
Jolal 23, 1992)Ɗun firaministaajo lysdi Morocco kiiɗo nastudo jogiiɗo arduungal daga 17 morso 1967 waddi 6 Yarkuma 1969. O danƴaama ɗersafi(asfi)yari Taïbi Benhima e Rkia Benhida. O medgo lattaki ministaajo jannɗe e ɗun ɓehakkilannde ɗer lysdi.

Jangirdee diiwal Taraba:
Jangirɗee Diiwal Taraba wonetega nder hukumawa pamara (jalingo) Taraba Naajeeriya. Jangirɗe wonetega hukumawa pamara (jalingo) Gomnatiwa Diiwal Taraba mei, ga nyibi ha nder (ndubu ujune didi a jowetati 2008) ha mautinki jangirde hander jihawa mei, gam andal nowancoro ha nder lesdi mei, ndenbo dabbora economiwa no nafira lesdi Nigeria mofgalmari ndifumari.

Isah Ali Ibrahim Pantami:
Isa Ali Ibrahim Pantami oon doon ee saikhu pantami makko koh mallumjo Pantami e ya'ee Diina Islaamu. Pantami e ɗanyimo 20 leuru Yarkooma, duuɓi 1972 haa Diiwal Gombe, Naajeeriya. Muhammadu Buhari lammini mo haa hitaande 2019 Menyu nge joni e ɗoon minista,en pauro Naajeeriya, boo e beɗiiɗo lamurraje kanndinanɗo touci NITDA.

Abubakar Rimi:
Alhaji Muhammadu Abubakar Rimi be Danyee Mou Haa Nder Duubii 1940 Nder Lewru sedto. O, Laamorinkeejum Naajeeriya oon. O, Laatiinou Ngomna Haa Diiwal Kano Hitaande Jaamhuuriiyaa Je Didabu Haa Naajeeriya. O, Laatiinou Wajiiriiku Fedara Kuukuutiral Haa Hitaande 1993 Haa Yaahiikii 1998 Haa Hitaande Laamu Konuujii Wakkatii Kuubdum General Sani Abacha.

Ahmed Laraki:
Ahmed Moulay Laraki (Arabi: ﺃﺣﻤﺪ ﺍﻟﻌﺮﺍﻗﻲ ; daygo 15 Yorkuma 1931 – 2 Jolal 2020) un gimɗo cuuɓal leydi Morooku e tuufere dun de farude yeeso Morooku e firaministaajo ɗun Morooku hakkuɗe Yorkuma 6,1969 e Cholte 6,1971 O jowee go'o jo firaministaajo di Morooku e jogiiɗo arduungal les arduungal laamido Hassan II. O ɗenbo kadima lattake ministaajo lesɗe yaasi daga 1967 yari 1971.

Mohammed Karim Lamrani:
Mohammed Karim Lamrani (Arabi: ﻣﺤﻤﺪ ﻛﺮﻳﻢ ﺍﻟﻌﻤﺮﺍﻧﻲ ; 1 Duujal
1919 – 20 Jolal 2018) un gimɗo cubtal Siyaasaaji lysdi Morooku gaɗɗo firaministaajo haa nde tati fere-fere. O lattake firaministaajo ardude ɗumngu go'o tan o wadii fuɗɗi daga ɗer hitaade 1961 e timminki 1972,ɗen daga Jolal 1983 yari silto 1986,e sakitiinde fuɗɗi daga Cholte 1992 yari Duujal 1994.

Goodluck Jonathan:
G
Goodluck Ebele Azikwe Jonathan GCFR, GCON (Eriminmo Lewru 20 Jolal Mangou 1957 eii siyasa,en lysidi Naajeeriya toe fawre ardiiɗo Naajeeriya toon eii mangou 2010 eii 2015. hannko doon wadii toy 2015 ardidow joonii lamou Naajeeriya Muhammadu Buhari, Jonathan eii kankoo ardidou Naajeeriya eii tatii tarihi'en Naajeeriya makko wodi'on. Jonathan ewodi bidi,on ardidou Naajeeriya daga mangou 2007 toe mangou 2010 biddi'on gwamnati'en. Umaru Musa Yar'adua eii lamurajje Diiwal Bayelsa Laamlamɓe fetur eii lamurajje Diiwal Bayelsa daga 2007 yari 2010.
Juutal Balde.
En nalde Goodluck Jonathan a lewru 20 Jolal, mangou 1957 eii ogbia ton hoon kafiruju'on banye humbina Ijaw eii Diiwal Bayelsa. Eriminmo, on otuoke, baffah'en Ebele Jonathan lamou kwale-kwale. Inna'en Eunice Ayi Ebele Jonathan eii lagou. Jonathan gugal pamarre toe gugul tokocil kafiruju.
Elto/Guggal.
Goodluck Ebele Azikwe Jonathan e
Ewodi pamarre afoojo Elto na'e pamarre guggal bingou, Elto pamarre jangirde fatakwal. Eii lokaci lamou kwaleji jangirdee Diiwal Rivers toe mangou 1982 -1998.
Tufleeji.
Goodluck Ebele Azikwe Jonathan eii kankoo lysidi siyasa toe mangou 1998, o, hebna lamou jangirde e modibbo jangirde. Lysidi siyasa'en kankoo wakkatii batuu jam'iyya PDP eii mangou 1990.
Aalamji.
Jonathan Woodi Debboo Dame patience Jonathan toe biddo Ariwera eii Aruabia.
Cigaadum.
Eii mangou 2007 Jonathan woodi Dawla sheidee jimilaaje ₦295,304,420 toh hirminayee Amurica US$8,569,662

Ahmed Osman:
Ahmed Osman (Aarabre: ﺃﺣﻤﺪ ﻋﺼﻤﺎﻥ ; ɗaygo 3 Silo 1930) un gimɗo cuuɓal leydi Morooku lattido firaministaajo de hitaade hakkuɗe 2 Jolal 1972 e 22 Cholte 1979. O firaministaajo jowee tato de ɗistinore Taariku laamiɗo hitaade laamu arduujo Hassan II.

Sani Abacha:
Sani Abacha GCFR Jonarjo taadungal o dañyaama 20 eii lewru silto, duuɓi 1943 yaari 8 korse 1998 soojiijo jonarjo lesdi Naajeeriya toe lesdi siyasa,en eii lamurje Ardiiɗo soji'en dega 1993 yahri habra 1998. eii Ardiiɗo 17 silto duuɓi 1993 toe bar,en lamou tarihi,en sojein Naajeeriya. Abacha eii jonarjo soji'en 1990 yari 1993, eii minista,en jonarjo leysɗi Naajeeriya. Abacha aran jonarjo soji'en aran iko ara,en.
Ngeendam.
Eriminmo toe habbidna eii kano. Abacha guggal janngirɗee sojien Naajeeriya eɗon kaduna, eii wodi kuugal aran sojien mangou 1963 kankoo jangirɗee mons ofisa kaadet ("officer cadets")) eii lidi Aldershot, Ingilisa.
Iyaaluuji.
Abacha woodi bididoo Joe,go,en toe bido eh faure bidi,on makko

Umaru Musa Yar'adua:
Umaru Musa Yar'Adua GCFR.16 Juko 1951 Yahri 5 Duujal 2010) eii Leysdi siyasa,en Naajeeriya diga 2007 yahri 2010.yar,adua bidoo cuɓal ,en ardiddo Naajeeriya koon don 21 lewru sedto 2007.eii Huna makko 29 lewru Duujal 2007
Yar'adua oon doon kankoo lamurajje Diiwal Katsina dega 1999 haa yahri 2007 toon lesidi jam,iyya PDP makko.eii mangou 2009 bandirawoo dillo saudiya konkoo asibiti madda,eii wurtake Naajeeriya 29 lewru silto mangou 2010 amma maariya 5 Duujal.

Ahmed Idris:
Ahmed Idris (Eriminmo 25 lewru jolal mangou 1960) Eii lidi Naajeeriya ardiddo Shede,en Makko Naajeeriya.eii funayee ardiddo shede 25 lewru Morso mangou 2015, oon doon bandirawoo Jonah ogunniyi Otunla madda ardiddo muhammadu Buhari faasiki gada shede lamurajje har Bilyan,en 2.5 makko. Bandirawoo. Idris ardiddo shede gada muhammadu Buhari kankoo eii ardiddo Naajeeriya eii Jo,e mangou 2019..
Suddu shede,en.
Eii 16 lewru Duujal,mangou 2022.hukuma,en shede suudu Naajeeriya (EFCC) fasiiki bandirawoo Idris gada kano koo,don biwall Nanta amma eii wurtanayen shede gafal makko Bilyan 80 amma sheree kwangilajou madda.Hukumaju shede suudu Naajeeriya eii yarnaye sheree Idris doon hoon jari,en Abuja toe Kano. Gwanmati saree Idris gada guugal har ilmou madda..
Majja shede,en 106bn.
Majja shedee 106bn Ahmed Idris...
Eii lewru sedto mangou 2021 kungiya,en bandirawoo azikiwe,en eii shedee,en (SERAP)funayee ardiddo shari,a Abubakar Malami koh doon bandirawoo Idris oon don 106bn eii mangou 2018.

Ahmadu Bello:
Mo Allah bagi darajamako Sir Ahmadu Muhammadu Bello (Ahmadu Bello danyetedo nder lewru Korse (1910 Hukumawa pamara wietega Raba nder Leysdi sakkwato) KBE ko Sardauna hanko on Pirimiyajo Kiddo ha lesdi Naajeeriya ndenbo ojogi lamu wietedum Sardaunajo jiha Sokkwato, be ndayi mo Sir Ahmadu Bello Sardaunajo ha wuro Raba, wongo nder larde Sokkwato, ha nder ndubu ujunere gotel be temerre gotel e go'o (1910).

Dulton Adams:
Dulton Keith Adams un gimɗo cuuɓal lesdi Afrik fombinaari. O lattake membaajo dummbe dokkal Gauteng kuutiral tun hutaaɗe 22 Duujal 2019. O ɗenbo membaajo partiwal cuɓal African Christian Democratic party (ACDP) ɗen e wakiliijo ɗer de gurtal dokkal ceriyya. 

Bongani Baloyi:
Bongani Michael Baloyi (daygo nyalɗe 28 lewru cholte hitaade 1987) un gimɗo cuuɓal lesdi Afrik fombinaari. Ɗer hitaade 2013, O subtaama arduujo mawdo de ɓe mawngo dun be famarde gallure midvaal. Kidem duuɓi maako 26 e ñyayri duniyaaru eɗe wakkitire den,e O lattake arduujo pamaaro eder arduu'en ɗer lesdi Afrik fombinaari. Gada 2011 yahri 2013 O mo ɓe MMC wii'aade ɗun faago Yeeso e siryaago ɗer be gelle. Baloyi un membaajo dun ɗe Actionsa tun ɗe Silo 2022.

Henry Barrington:
Henry Frederick Francis Adair Barrington (28 Morso 1808 Beckett Hall ɗe Shrivenham nder Berkshire - 25 Mboy 1882 Knysna ), O lawyaajo mo lesdi Afrik fombinaari, kiiɗo maikacijo e membaajo dummbe boldal. 
So'ooyiido wari England ɗer hitaade 1848 O mbanngi debbo maako Mary Georgiana Knox,e lortori o jippi plettenberg Bay,egal piroowal noddira CARGO haa'e kaayaaji ɓanngal ,yalji heirlooms e ku kataakooje e kaayaaji ndeemal.Ɗe mahol nyibgal Portland Manor' neeɓiiri duuɓi 16,e hawti leecee jowee tati, suudu jannde,e di mawde suudu naforde. O ɗemmbo nyiiɓii go'o eder de mahol nebgol sawmill dun taañyuuki nƴommbe kataakooje mbaleeje,ilmu hawti silkwomre e nñaaki e koorewol aful hawti e hollindi waddi hebriki ciderii. O subti sana'a dun hottollo e baaji ledde e nñamdu ɓiɓɓe ledde ɓurɗum daraja ɗer lesdi Afrik fombinaari winndooɓe Dalene matthee's janngirngol Nobel,moerbeibos('ladde mulberry). Ladde mawde nge hiite cholte 1869, ɗer mburde ɓannɗu wuttudu du be ladde hakkuɗe swellendam e Humansdorp de dun timmini. Wonnuki de haa ɗenbo meeyi'weedu Manor'.De tokkude duubj baawo ɗin subtaama yaari de parli cape.

Japie Basson:
Jacobus "Japie" Basson (25 Morso 1918 – 8 Juko 2012) un gimɗo cuuɓal lesdi Afrik fombinaari puddu do kuugal hawti de partiwal lesdi, Amma ɓaawo o wurrti daga maagal,e latti a sembiddo gabdoowo e gomnaatiwal lesdi edow membaajo, eɗe soo'al, ɗun ɓe kawtal partiwal, progressive federal party,e mo de neebaayi nder kawtal leydi.O hollinaama edow_fierijo" kalaaji lawnuuji e mo raa'ayi e de ɓe"chameleon"ɗun Afrik fombinaari cuuɓe ɗun mo luusini partisan allegiance.[3Jottoriido lattido neddo Siyaasaaji suɓal lesdi Afrik fombinaari.

Hendrietta Bogopane Zulu:
Hendrietta Bogopane-Zulu un ballitowo ministaajo leydi Afrik fombinaari de wuttudu dungal faago Yeeso adunaaru Afrik fombinaari. O membaajo dummbe ginndal huutira tunde hitaade 1999 e jooni. O debbo anndaado laaminiido haa ɗe nayi eder de wakkitire arduujo Jacob Zuma laamu o ballitowo ministaajo ɗun kuuɗe yaasii dun kuugal e rowbe, Bacci e yimmɓe hawti e mbe ngalaa kadaa. Michael masutha o go'o tall lattido didijo tan e ɗer nbe nakas eder hannde arduungal O mo gollitoowo, yewtoowo,Nñaawu zaman bia'adun HIV &AIDS kuwooji sana'aji rowbe e tiggudo huutirde sukaaɓe mɓe rakkata lesdi Afrik fombinaari. juutirdum der henndande jo'inirde ɓe lesdi mobgal UN baawal dun yimmɓe mɓe baawaata dokkal leydi e leydi.

Mohammed Musa Bello:
Mohammed Musa Bello ( O danñƴaama de lewru Silo, hitaande ɗumngu 1959) O goɗɗo Huuwana Bankiwal e Naajeeriya lattiɗo jonnta ministaajo gelle mawɗe Naajeeriya ɗe Abuja eja hitaade ɗumngu 2015.
Finannde Daygo.
Ɗum dannyi Mohammed Musa Bello eder lasgol fulɓe e Yola; dannyoowo maako, Alhaji Musa Bello, hanko wooni manajaajo darektaajo kamfaniiwal maroowal woylare Naajeeriya daga ɗumngu 1970 yaari ɗumngu ngu 1976, kadima sobiraawo arduujo leydi Naajeeriya, Muhammadu Buhari. O fuɗɗi njannɗe firamaare e Yola ko'o timmina jangirde sakandarere nde uwargidanmu gonnde Kaduuna e ɗumngu 1971. O halartake Janngirde Lakol Barewa gonnde Zariiya daga ɗunmgu 1971 yari ɗumngu 1976, inaare O heeɓi shaiduwal ɗereewol timmingo janngirde sakandarere. Daga don O zarci Janngirde Ahmadu Bello Wonnde Zariya daga ɗum ngu 1977 yaari 1980, inaare ɗe O heeɓi shaiduwal digiriwal maako artungal e fannu luumooji, ɗen O wartii e ɗumngu 1985 O faa'i Yeeso jannɗe digiriiwal diɗaaɓal e harkaawal luumooji ɗin.
Kuugal.
Ɗe ɗumngu 1984, Icon limited (lisal Bankiwal Barings e Morgan Guaranty trust) mɓe koo'i mo Kuugal. ɗemmbo lebbi jowee go'o o mo waaɗa fooraaki e Hoi Morgan &e Bankiwal luumooji e hakkilannki ɓe e haadaariji. Daga ɓaawo o so'ake kamfaniiji jooɗooriiɗi ko'e muu'en. O waadi duuɓi sappoje ɗiɗi e fanu kamfaniiji guttuli fere-fere, kadima o kasanntake darektaajo ɗun Habib Bank plc,e luttuɗi kamfaniiji. Bello o huuwi e kamfaniiji Bakabure industrial complex e Yola e jonnɗe manajaajo fof e ndunngu 1992. O huuwi e jonnɗe membaajo dun komitiwal fasahaaji din dokkal (TPC). O bo lattake membaajo chamber Kautal yimmɓe luumo, mɓe sana'aji e ko wooni ɗer leydi e deemal dun Diiwal Adamawa. E ɗumngu 2006, Horeejo leydi Olusegun Obasanjo lamminiimo hukuma arduungal alhaajii'en dun lesdi inaare ɗe o huuwi daga 2007 yari 2015.

Wudil:
Wudil eii doum hukuma pamarum nɗer Diiwal Kano Naajeeriya litugal gelle,en wudil toe A237 titi,en, ewodi 362 km2 kankoo wodii 185,189. jama,aree makko.

Mukhtar Ramalan Yero:
Alhaji Mukhtar Ramalan Yero (be Danyee mou 1 May 1968) O, Laamorinkeejum Naajeeriya oon, O, Laatiinou Commissioner je Finance Hitaande 2007 Yahiinkii May 2010 Saa'inde Patrick Ibrahim Yakowa nyonii Mou Ayyinaado Gomnaa Baawo O, hebii Nasarakou Namadi Sambo O, Laata Luuta ardiidou Lesdii Naajeeriya. Hitaande Bowte 2012, O, Laatiinou Ngomna je Kaduna Baawo Maayde Patrick Ibrahim Yakowa Haa nder Helicopter Diiraango.
Laamorinkeejum Kuugal/Kuude.
Baawo Cuubii Alhaji Namadi Sambo Hitaande 2007, O, Laatii Commissioner je Finance Daga Yahiinkii Duujal 2010. O, Suubiinou haa Ngomna Patrick Ibrahim Yakowa O, hebbii joodorde Ayyinaado Ngomna nder duubii 2010. Nder Lewru Bowte 2012, O, Laatiinou Ngomna je Diiwal Kaduna Baawo Maayde Patrick Ibrahim Yakowa haa nder Helicopter Diiraango nder Diiwal Bayelsa.
Nder Lewru Sedto 2015, O, Wadii Soinde Nasarakou cuuburdii Saklere Luural Nasir Ahmad El-Rufai je "All Progressive Congress".

Mohammed Abba Gana:
Mohammed Abba Gana (Daygo 1943) laatiiɗo dokkoowo mo musamman caawori ballitowo arduujo leydi Naajeeriya Atiku Abubakar ha say hitaade Korso 2006, wakkitire Olusegun Obasanjo ɓiltiimo jippinimo dow jooɗorngal ngal. ɓaawo no O laatake ministaajo hawtude gelle mawɗe Naajeeriya daga 8 cholte 2001 yahri 17 Morso 2003.

Ibrahim Bunu:
Ibrahim Bunu un neddo anɗuuɗo harkaawal mahol nyible e ministaajo gelle mawɗe leydi Naajeeriya Abuja e jamhuuriyaawal nayaaɓal , jogiiɗo ofiswal daga ndede Duujal 1999 haa say Cholte 2001 ɗer hitaade laamu arduujo leydi Naajeeriya Olusegun Obasanjo. Wakkitire Mohammed Abba Gana jaɓaanimo ,nden boo ɗun diiwal Borno, nder ɗe lammgal gurtal ɗer Cholte 2001.

Mamman Kontagora:
Mamman Kontagora (Setto 20, 1944 – Duujal 29, 2013) um daakaare kuugal taaduungal ɗun hawtugo birniwal kapital leydi Naajeeriya Abuja yaake ɗe wakkitire hakkilango arduungal mawɗo Abdulsalami Abubakar,dokkuɗomo hakkilannki yimmɓe ɗer hitaade Duujal 1999.

Jeremiah Tinbut Useni:
Jeremiah Timbut Useni (Daygo 16 Colite 1943)un tagu taaduungal kiiɗo mo solji'en laatiiɗo lieutenant mawɗo janarjo, lattido ministaajo gollitoowo eɗe huutirde ɗun de kapital hawtude gelle mawɗe leydi Naajeeriya Abuja,les arduungal mawɗo Sani Abacha soljiijo junta. O waadi kuugal ɗuuɗungal eder lesdi Naajeeriya hawti e ministaajo jahaleeji e kotaajo mastaajo mawɗo ɗun taaduungal solji'en Naajeeriya. Useni lattake ballitowo partiwal cuɓal ciyaajo ɗun go'o ɗun ɗe lardude partiwal All Nigerian people party (ANPP).O Subtaama sanataajo dun fombinaare Diiwal plateau, ɗer cuɓal ngadaangal hitaade MBOY 2015 cuɓal leydi. Useni O laamake ede partiwal People Democratic party (PDP) Arduujo maagal.

Gado Nasko:
Muhammad Gado Nasko (Daygo 1941) un soljiijo Gomnaajo mo diiwal Sakkwotoɓe, Naajeeriya hakkuɗe 1978 eii 1979.

Hamza Abdullahi:
Hamza Abdullahi (2 MBOY1945 – 3 Silo 2019) un dannyaaɗo lesdi Naajeeriya nden e mawɗo kuuɗo soljiijo lattiɗo de Gomnaajo diiwal Kano daga 1984 yaahi 1985;e ministaajo gelle mawɗe Naajeeriya Abuja daga 1986 yaahi 1989.

Mamman Jiya Vatsa:
Mamman Jiya Vatsa Eriminmo 5 Bowte duubi 1940 eii janarajo toe lysidi siyasa'en Naajeeriya eii kankoo minista,en toe supreme military council.
5 mboode duubi 1986 ell fere janarajo Ibrahim Badamasi Babangida.

Iro Abubakar Dan Musa:
Iro Abubakar Dan Musa Un gimɗo laatiiɗinistaajo hawtude kapital leydi Naajeeriya Abuja nebdo.

Nafisat Abdullahi:
Nafisat Abdulrahman Abdullahi e mo andira e inde Nafisat Abdullahi koh bo Nafisat Sai wata Rana. Mou danyama nyalde 23 siilo duubi 1991...
Bolji.
Nder lewru korse mangou 2013 kungiyaaju Didi wailankwen Naajeeriya e tokka Nafisat Abdullahi dou shagalijuu makko,gada silto yari 2013 toe jorni bi,en kalamu wahid toe Mallam Aminu Saira eii mangou 2014.

Ali Nuhu:
Ali Nuhu mohammed o jannja Ali nuhu mou danñyaɗo nñalde 15 lewru Dujjal duuɓi 1974, lysidi Naajeeriya fim yentike eii fimji don haa daraktaa,ardiiɗo kannywood mada eii fiilm yentike Igbo toe yarba,en (Nollywood)toe Hausare fim yentike (kannywood) bandirawoo dillo yari jama,are hausare fim yentike.
Ngeendam/Ilmu.
Ndu eriminmo Ali mohammed Nuhu Maiduguri Diiwal Borno toe waila eii litugal Naajeeriya. Baffah,en Nuhu poloma gada Diiwal Gombe inna,en Fatima Karderam Digema gada hukuma pamare Bama Diiwal Borno .eii doon Jo's toe Kano ,kankoo jangirdee sakandare eii jangirdee doon Jos ewodi funaree Ibadan Diiwal Oyo gada yari jangirdee California doon wodi ilmu fim yentike.

Alaska:
Alaska un gelle mawɗe ɗer yuroopu

Islander:
Iskandar , Iskander÷ , Askander, Eskinder, koe Scandar (Arabi :
ﺇﺳﻜﻨﺪﺭ ( Persia : ﺍﺳﮑﻨﺪﺭ Eskandar or ﺳﮑﻨﺪﺭ Skandar), un innde dokkal Alexander nder neesuuji kamani Iran (persiyya),arabi e Luttuɗe fuu nder cakawal fuunaare,caucaus e cakkare asiyya. Nder Misra unde roki ɗuduɓe un kiristaa'en (Coptic) burdal.Asaalu Alexander un gadde,ɗum de eggol eta kuugal haa bano iskandarnamah e ɗi be sirr al-Asrar e lattiɗe mawɗe innnde nde dokaaji nder de wakkatiwal. Nde[[ Arabic wuttudu haa nden boo beiduube makaalaaji dokkal,hokkude al- ɗiskandar gelle mawɗe nder lesdi [[Misra[.

Kuwait:
Kuwait (/ kʊˈweɪt/ ( heytina ); Arabi: ﺍﻟﻜﻮﻳﺖ al-Kuwayt ,
Gulfwal Arabi inniraade: ko [lɪkweːt ), annditireeki nde diiwal ɗun ɓe kuwaiti
( Arabi: ﺩﻭﻟﺔ ﺍﻟﻜﻮﻳﺖ Dawlat al-Kuwayt ),un lesdi nder hirnare asiyya.edi joodori nde ta Woyla jokkal de fuunaare larabanko'en honnduko parsiyawal gulfwal, waadi kheerol e Lesdi Iraƙi eta Woyla e Lesdi Saudi Arabia eta fombina. Kuwaiti kadima jokkiri e dakkal Lesdi Iran.kuwaiti ha no mari jaajirka ɗun rannidinaade kamani 500km(311mi).[10 nɗuɗɗum ɗum lesdi nɗin di ɗuuɗirka yimmɓe ɓen ebe jooɗi nder galliol gasii agglomawal di ɓe kapital leydi Lesdi Kuwaiti un gelle Kuwait. Eder hitaade ɗumngu ɗun 2022 Kuwaiti woodi ɗuuɗirka yimmɓe kamani dun ɗum 4.67 miliyanji nden boo miliyanwal 1.45 un dañyaaɓe nder lesdi kuwaiti nden boo Luttuɗe miliyanji 2.8 un nastoybe gada goɗde lesɗe yaasi nɗe duuniiyaaru. Kuwait kammɓe ngooni ɗidiɓe mɓurɓe jawdi nder lesɗe julɓe e duuniiyaaru.

Laamlaamateeri Mali:
Laamlaamateeri Maali a na jeyaa e dawlaaji Afirik hiirnaangeeri mawɗi, feeñunooɗi e jamaanu ngu annduɓe taariika innirta jamaanu hakkundeewu maa yontaaji hakkundeeji. 
Duttorɗe kaalooje ko faati e laamlaamu Maali keewaani, hay goodɗe ɗee laaɓtaani, tee luggiɗaani. Ko ɗum addani yimɓe luurdude heen haa hannde. Kollitgol duttorɗe tuugaaɗe ngam jangtaade daartol laamlaamu Maali. Ko ɓuri teeŋtude heen ko duttorɗe binndaaɗe (El Bakri, Ibn Batuta, Taariik es Sudaan, Taariik al Fatash…), yantude e aadaaji jangtaaɗi (awluɓe…).
Duttorɗe binndaaɗe.
Ko ɗe fannuuji ɗiɗi : duttorɗe binndaaɗe booweeje (kañje tan ngoodnoo haa e teem 16ɓiire) e duttorɗe binndaaɗe nderiije (tuggi teem 16ɓiire) ummiiɗe e yiyooɓe binndi wonɓe worgo maayo Niiser. Ine jeyaa e binndaaɗe gadane ɗee, binndaaɗe ɗanniyankooɓe aarabeeɓe e berbeer en, haa teeŋti noon e El Bakri (teem 12ɓiire), Al Umari, Ibn Batuta e Ibn Khaldum (teem 16ɓiire). Ine jeyaa e binndaaɗe nderiije ɗee, binndaaɗe Taariik es Sudaan e Taarik al Fatash, jubbi daartol/daartol Ɓaleeɓe e jubbi daarti biɗtoowo, peeñɗi caggal nde Maruknaaɓe keɓti laamlaamu Sonngaay, jubbi kaalooji seeɗa ko faati e Mali. Jangtaali ɗanniyankooɓe purtugeecnaaɓe e españoolnaaɓe ina ndokka kabaruuji paatuɗi e laamaandi Mali cakkitiindi, tee leefɗitndi no feewi.
Aadaaji jangtaaɗi.
Nde tawnoo ngawlaagu ina heewnoo faayiida, tee ina lutti haa hannde heewde faayiida e galle laamɗo Mali, aadaaji jangtaaɗi kam enne ine njogii faayiida mawɗo nder wiɗtooji jowitiiɗi e Mali ɓooyɗo. Alaa golle ummonaa ngam renndinde ɗi kañji kala e saaktidde ɗi mbele eɗi mbaawa yerondireede. Ko baaba tottata ɓiɗɗo e sifaa piɓiiɗo, kono eɗi ceerti fawaade e gure e diiwanuuji. Ine teskee ɗi mbayliima so ɗi ƴeewdaama e ko ƴettanoo law gila e fuɗɗoode koloñaal. Ko ɗum tagi ɗi poti yiyreede tan ko no faawru kabaruuji daartol ɗi ceɗtaaki tawo, doondiiɗi nafooje renndo, ɓurɗi waawde feeñninde neesu renndooji ɗo ɗi ummii ɗoo. Aada ɓurɗo anndeede ko aada jangtotooɗo ummannde laamu Suñnjata Keytaa, mo heewɓe caakti e mum binndanɗe, haa arti noon e “Soundita ou l’épopée Manding” (Suñnjata walla Daarol Manndeŋ) nde Jibriil Tamsiir Ñaan. Eɗen mbaawi kadi humpitaade wiɗto Yuusuf Tata Siisee woɗnde e gawlo Wa Kamisoko e Siriman Kuyaate wonande binndi doosgal Manndeŋ, binndangal e ndonu winndereewu Unesco, ngu ɓooygol mum yedditaa.
Wiɗtooji biilleeji keewaani.
Ɓurngo heen faayodinde, hono wiɗooji Filipowiak to Ñaani e kitaale 1965, 1968 e 1973 rokkaani njeñtudi ndallinaandi wonande yonta hakkundeejo (teem XIII – XVI).
Iwdeyaagal.
Iwdeyaagal helmere « Mali » laaɓtaani. Yimɓe laamaandi ndii nganndiri ndi tan ko Manden wonaa Mali. « Man » firti e Bammbara e Malinka ko « liwoogu », e « den » firti ko « cukalel », woni “menden”= ɓiy liwoogu. Ƴoogirɗe aarabeeje ina kaala haala laamlaamu Malel, Malal, Melli, Mali, kono ɗe ndokkaani firo helmere ndee. Fulɓe (leñol eggiyeewol teweteengol e Mali gila e fuɗɗoode laamlaamu nguu) mbiyata yimɓe Maden ko « Malinke », woni « huunde malaande ndee ». Nii woni Madenka en e koye mum en mbiyata leydi mum en ko « Manden », fulɓe mbiyata ndi ko « Mali » (« waɗde maslahaa », « wondude e Malu »), yimɓe ɓee, ɓe mbiyata yimɓe ɓee ko « Malinke ». E Bammbara, Mali ina firta kadi « ngabu » ; hawri kisa ngel kullel ina horsini worgo leydi ndii, ɗo Malinkee en e Bammbara en koɗi ɗoo. Won kadi Fulɓe, teeŋtii non Fulɓe funnaange, wiyooɓe leydi ndii Malle kono e anndaa innde ndee ko holɗum ɓuri heertorde sabu ina waawa kadi tawa ko laamlaamateeri Wagadu (Gana maa Gaana) ɓe faandii heen. Nde tawnoo e maando maɓɓe ko e ɗeen leyɗeele ɓe iwi ɓe pa'i funnaange, bammbaaɓe maɓɓe ana keewi wiyde: Pullo fuu Malle ƴuuwi (iwi). 
Hol to laamorgo Mali wonnoo ?
Ƴoogirɗe keewɗe, ceertuɗe ina kaala haala laamorgo ngoo. Tee ɗe kawraani e haala. (…).
Eɗen njogii firooji e gowlaali keewɗi wonande innde laamorgo ngoo (Malli, Biti, Bini, Bani, Yani, limtidaaka). Ɗum noon mbele ɗee inɗe kala toɗɗii ko nokku gooto walla njoopii ko laamorgo wooto? E tuugnaade e ƴoogirɗe jangtaaɗe e biilleeje nokkuuji keewɗi ina njalti e binndol daartol ngol. Ñaani Madugu, Mani-Kura walla Mali-Tommbo e Ñaani, gurel tokosel sara maayo Sankarani ngel nokku mum wiɗaa e oorle tati 1965, 1968 e 1973. Eɗen njaajnoo e oo nokku e les ɗoo. So en tuugniima e aadaaji jangtaaɗi, rewrude e hinnde Jeli en woodnoonde e laamu Mali, duuminoonde e won ɗeen gure Mali hannde, ɓuri waawde haalde ko haala nokku ina wiyee Keyla. Jeegarafeejo engeleejo gooto ina wiyee Cooley ine sikki laamorgo ngoo wonnoo ko saraaji wuro Samee, sara maayo Joliba. Ofisiyee farayseejo ine wiyee Binger taccunooɗo Sahel, maandinii, e hitaande 1892, nokku Ñandimaadugu oo, sara Yamina. Ɗee cikke ine kawriti e fonngo nano maayo Niiseer. Ɗe ɓamtaaka e binndi daartol ɗii. Ko Maurice Delafosse idii rokkude haala kaa himme. E hitaande 1912, e deftere makko Haut-Sénégal-Niger, ko Binger o idii rokkude goonga, hade makko faytude e cikkal kesal laatingal miijo wonande gagga oo.
Ñaani laamorgo Mali (1923-1958).
E nder binndanɗe keewɗe, laamɓe koloñaal en, tuggi Delafosse e Vidal haa Gaillard, peeñninii jokkondiral hakkunde innde Ñaani wonnde sara nokku Sankarani oo, e innde wonnde e ƴoogirɗe binndaaɗe ɗee. Ko ngoon miijo saabii wiɗooji biilleeji baɗaaɗi e Ñaani ɗii.
Oorle biilleeje to Ñaani (1965-1973).
Poloñnaajo ina wiyee Filipowiak waɗii oorle wiɗooji e nokku hee e ballondiral e Jibriil Tamsiir Ñaan, karallo daartol Mali, e jokkondiral e Raymond Mauny, karallo faraysenaajo wonande Sudaan hakkundeejo, profeseer to Sorbonne. Nde o joofni wiɗooji ɗii, o yaltini, e hitaande 1979, deftere Études archéologiques sur la capitale médiévale du Mali, ɗo o hollitta tonngi golle makko. Omo wiya heen o yiytii laamorgo laamu Mali. Ɗoon e ɗoon ɗiin tonngi Filipowiak njedditaa nde tawnoo ɗi nganndaama gila deftere makko ndee yaltaani. Wiyeteeɓe Meillassoux e Hunwick, nde ƴettiti bolol Ibn Batuta, cakkitii nokkuuji goɗɗi. Hade ɗuum tawi Mauny joofiima luure gonɗe hakkunde binndi Filipowiak ɗii e njaltudi ƴeewndooji kuutoriiɗi karbon 14.
Fawaade e caɗeele jiytugol laamorgo duuɓi soñteende (âge d’or), daartooɓe ɓee paati e laamorgo adanngo ngoo (Conrad, Greenn), mbaɗti huutoraade kelme ɓurɗe wonde jaambureeje, ko wayi no galle Mansaa en, walla galle laamorɗo Mansaa en, ngam lomtinirde ɗum helmere laamorgo ndee, ɓayri cikke cakkitiiɗe ngabbitii ko e jaɓde wonde galle laamorɗo oo ko jirlotonooɗo hakkunde gure keewɗe (miijo senngo daartiyeewo engelenaaɓe (anglo-saxon)). Ɗum noon haa hannde ko yowre woni ɗoon ɓayri nokkuuji biɗtaaɗi ɗii ndokkaani njeñtudi njaɓniindi. Nde tawnoo kattanɗe heristiije (héristique : ñeeñal jiytugol) tuugiiɗe e ƴoogirɗe laataaki, yimɓe mbayi no ruŋtiiɓe gagga oo nii. Ina gasa tawa ine sokli wiɗtooji ɗii mbaɗoyee e nokkuuji goɗɗi.

Muhammad Haji Ibrahim Egal:
Mohammad Haji Ibrahim Egal (Somaali: Maxamed Xaaji Ibrahim agal, Aarabre cholte 15, 1928-mboy 3,2002) un gimɗo cuɓal Somaaliya lattiɗo arɗuujo lesdi Somaaliya nebɗo kiiɗo daga 1992 yari haa mayɗe mako daw artuɗo gaɗdo priministaajo jamhuriyawal Somaaliya ɗun balɗe sappo e go’o ɗer 1960 e haajooni daga 1967 yari 1969.
Margo E Jannɗe.
Egal ɗayaama ɗer 1928, ɗer odwayne eɗe ɓannɗu ɓe British Somaaliya. O jottorake daga ɓe Issa Musse hendide hawte eɗe habar Awal clan ɗun Isaaq. Otimmini jannde primarie e sekandare ɗer hawtuɗe hiiɗe British Somaaliya eɓe sotti lusini yari ɗe united kingdom. 
Egal o mɓanngi Aisha Sa’eed Abby e hawte eɓe ngoodi bacci ngordi ɗiɗi e bacci ɗebbi ɗiɗi.
Kuuɗe.
Ɗe 26 Dujjal 1960 Egal un priministaajo ɗunɗe heeseere kebtal hore diiwal ɗun Somaaliya kawtuɗum eɗer balɗe jowee ɓaawo hawti e artuɗe hutirɗe ɗeɓe kumtal leydi Somaaliya ta tigguɗum jamhuriyawal Somaaliya e morso 1, 1960.
Kuugal ngomnaati.
O jogaake eɗe artugal deenal ministaajo kilantooɗo (Defence) (1960-1962) ministaajo jannɗe (1962-1963) priministaajo (1967-1969) e Ambassoda e Indiya (1976-1978), e ɗenbo o ɗun kakkilanoowo prisiona haaɗe ɗiɗi les Barre huuɗuuɗe.
Priministaajo Jamhuriyawal Somaaliya.
Ɗer 1967, Abdirashid Ali Shermake suɓtaanu arɗuujo ɗen subti hollini Egal dow priministaajo.
O haa enon ɗe priministaajo e ɗer Washinnton D.C ɗen arɗuujo Abdirashid Ali Shermake wallitimo ɗe yorkuma 15, 1969. Rammude gaɗa ɓaawo ɗon, ɓe heesere tiggade sepreme revolutionary council (SRC) arɗungal janarjo mawɗo Siad Barre, Brigadiajo mawɗo Mohammad Ainashe Gule, lieutenanjo Kannal Salaad Gabeyre kediye e mawɗo ɗun dansanndaajo jama korshel kalki mawgu ɗum. De (SRC0 laari winnditi innde leydi Somaaliya e Demokiraatik Jamhuriyawal Somaaliya, naagi memba’en ɓe arɗuugal hukuuma sarkiti partije cuɓal. 
Saakiti ɓe yahirɗe eɓe kotuwal mawngal e ɗarni ɗe constitucion. Egal eɗer ɓe siyasa nanɓe mone ɓe SRC ɗun mo huwanta leydi artuɗum hukuma. O yootaama o inna Ambassadajo lesdi Somaaliya yahi Inndiya (1976-1978) ɓaawo ɗe Barre soitimo prison haa sai ɗe timmini laamu mun ɗer 1985.ref name="Siiwsnm"></ref>
Arɗuujo Lesdi Somaaliya.
Egal mooɓi haute yari wallital di saron e woɓɓe wawɓe rebel kongol, keɓbini ɗe woyla-hirnare dungal e jawdi ɗun Somaaliya haiku kawtal e tiggi bilateral coggu hauti e lesde yassi, gabati ceɗe keese ɗe ɗun hutirta ɓe Somaaliya shilling ɗen a de Somaaliya paspoor e tutawal Somaaliya ɗen tiggukaki hawtirɗe e sembinnɗe de soljie e janndarmu e soljie’en ɗer Somaaliya.
Mayɗe.
Egal mayi ɗer mboy 3,2002 ɗer pretoria Afrik fombinaare (south African) innare emo wallina gam nyawɗuki ɗer asibitiwal nyawdud solji’en. Ɗun wartiri ɓannɗu maako leydi Somaaliya gan uweeki diiwal bacci maako tati arɗi yimɓe fooje uwuuki e do’aati boɗdi. Haaɗe yimmɓe 4,000 kalartake uwuruuɗe maako e genaale ɗer Berbera eɓe ɗungal hollinɓe balɗe jowe ɗiɗi ɗun pinnɗe. Dahir Rayala kahin lattaki mastuɗo ofiswal jonnɗe arɗuujo leydi.

Mohamed Yusuf Abdirahman:
Mohamed Yusuf Abdirahman kaanoobo anndiraaɗo Murad un gimɗo tufleeji (siyaasaji) cuɓal leydi Somaali, e ɓe ɗi mawɗe jogiiɗo laamɗo Burao, ɗi laamorde e de gelle mawɗe ɗe Togdheer lardu ɗun Somaali, jogiiɗo daga 2012 woddi 2021. O wurtoyke daga der yalji ɗiɓe Reer Biniin, Ahmed Farah hawtel lenyol be ɗun Habr Je’lo Isaaq. O jaaɓi laamu ɓaawo timmingo Abdirisaq Ibrahim Abdi hitaande 20 Korso 2021 ɓaawo gaɗa cuɓol balanngal subtude Somaali.

Abdirashid Haji Duale:
Abdirashid Haji Duale Qambi (Somaali: ) un gimɗo cuɓol tufleeji leydi Somaali hannko jooni jogi. Arɗunngal ministaajo kuuɗe yaasi e Guure ɗun Somaali. O neebuɗi e fanu kuudee harkaaji tufleeji wakkatiiji ɗudde ɗen o joogaake arɗuule ɗe daama tun hebtuude hoore leydi Somaali ɗer hitannde 1991.

Abdirisaq Ibrahim Abdi:
Ahmed Aden Ducale seetoore maako "Riwaayo" (Somaali: Ahmed Aden Duale) un gimɗo huude cuɓal lesdi Somaaliya ɗen e joonii mawɗo arɗuujo ɗun Buurawo, ɗe laamorde hawtirde e mawɗe gelle ɗun Togdheer lardu dun Somaali tun Korso 20, 2021. O rooni Mohammed Yusuf Abdirahman ɗe hitaande 20 Korso 2021 ɓaawo ɗe 2021 cubal bataangal lesdi Somaali.

Yahaya Adoza Bello:
Yahaya Adoza Bello mou dayanmo nalde 18 lewru sedto duubi 1975 eii doon lumou lysidi Naajeeriya toe lysidi siyasa'en gwamna Diiwal Kogi gada yari duubi 2016.jamiya,en (APC) bandirawoo Bello eii funaree gwamnajjo Naajeeriya.

Abdiweli Sheikh Abdillah:
"Dr Abdiweli Sheikh Abdillahi Soufi"' (Somaali: abdiweli Shiikh Cabdillaahi Suufi) un gimɗo cuɓal tufleeji leydi Somaali lattiɗo e jooni jonta jogiiɗo arɗuungu ministaajo lilal e kaɓarouji gollital ɗun leydi Somaali.

Abdullahi Abdi Omar:
Abdullahi Abdi Omar Jawaan (Somaali: Cabdullaahi Cabdi Cumar Jawaan, Arabre: عبد الله عبدي عمر; dannyimo 1949) un gimɗo cuɓal tufleeji leydi Somaaliya e hannko wami kollinddo gabatanaaki ɓe Somaaliya ɓi’al leydi kuɓɓal ba’lal noddira "National Emblem" ɗer lookkatire hitaande 1996. Omar haa nobo lattake artuɗo arɗuujo hukuuma cubal ɗer leydi Somaaliya.

Hamse Mohamed Abdi:
Hamse Mohamed Abdi (Somaali: ) un gimɗo cuɓal tufleeji leydi Somaali, latti hannko eɗe jonni jogiiɗo arɗuungal ngomnaajo ɗu lardu Togdheer ɗum Somaali tun Silo (January) 2018.

Aɗan Ahmed Elmi:
Ministaajo kuuɗe ndeemal somali.
Aɗan Ahmed Elmi (somali: Aɗen Axmed Cilli) un nayaaɓo ɗe ministaa’en deemal ɗun lesdi somali. O lattake ministaajo deemal eno ɗe lewru magie nyalɗe 10, 2002 ɓaawo de jippaago ɗe Ali Sheik Yusuf.
Ɗistinorɗe.
Elmi o dannyaama nɗer Hargasa, e maraake jonneɗe margo maako nɗer mogadishu e hargeiso. O wurtoiya daga lennyol Gashanbur Eldagale Garjis ɗer henɗal lenyal-lasgo Isaq.
Komoo holline kuugal ɗer huutirɗe somali un siryotooɗo fiijo jalnuuki ɗer filmji lesdi somali ɗummo fuɗɗi wurtinki tunde hitannde 1990s. Ɗer 2001, o joonaake hawtuuɗe ɗe UDUB partiwal cuɓal siyasa.
Elmi un ɓiɗɗo Ahmed Elmi komannɗaajo solji’en yaake ɗe ɗuuɓi si’ad Barre, jooni ɗustii Daada maako Khadija Mohmoud Marɗo kamfani ɓikkon leɗɗe ɗer fuunare hargeisa.

MUHAMMAD HAJI IBRAHIM EGAL:
Mohammad Haji Ibrahim Egal (somali Maxamed Xaaji Ibrahim agal, Arabankoore cholte 15, 1928-mboy 3,2002) un gimɗo cuɓal somali lattiɗo arɗuujo lesdi somali nebɗo kiiɗo daga 1992 yari haa mayɗe mako daw artuɗo gaɗdo priministaajo jamhuriyawal soomaliya ɗun balɗe sappo e go’o ɗer 1960 e haajooni daga 1967 yari 1969.
Margo E Jannɗe.
Egal ɗayaama ɗer 1928, ɗer odwayne eɗ€ ɓannɗu ɓe British somali. O jottorake daga ɓe Issa Musse hendide hawte eɗe habar Awal clan ɗun Isaaq. Otimmini jannde primarie e sekandare ɗer hawtuɗe hiiɗe British somali eɓe sotti lusini yari ɗe united kingdom. 
Egal o mɓanngi Aisha Sa’eed Abby e hawte eɓe ngoodi bacci ngordi ɗiɗi e bacci ɗebbi ɗiɗi.
Kuuɗe.
Ɗe 26 Dujjal 1960 Egal un priministaajo ɗunɗe heeseere kebtal hore diiwal ɗun somali kawtuɗum eɗer balɗe jowee ɓaawo hawti e artuɗe hutirɗe ɗeɓe kumtal leydi somali ta tigguɗum jamhuriyawal somali e morso 1, 1960.
Kuugal Gomnaati.
O jogaake eɗe artugal deenal ministaajo kilantooɗo (Defence) (1960-1962) ministaajo jannɗe (1962-1963) priministaajo (1967-1969) e Ambassoda e Indiya (1976-1978), e ɗenbo o ɗun kakkilanoowo prisiona haaɗe ɗiɗi les Barre huuɗuuɗe.
Priministaajo Jamhuriyawal Somali.
Ɗer 1967, Abdirashid Ali Shermake suɓtaanu arɗuujo ɗen subti hollini Egal dow priministaajo o haa enon ɗe priministaajo e ɗer Washinton D.C ɗen arɗuujo Abdirashid Ali Shermake wallitimo ɗe yorkuma 15, 1969. Rammude gaɗa ɓaawo ɗon, ɓe heesere tiggade sepreme revolutionary council (SRC) arɗungal janarjo mawɗo siad Barre, Brigadiajo mawɗo Mohammad Ainashe Gule, lieutenanjo conol Salaad Gabeyre kediye e mawɗo ɗun policejo jama korshel kalki mawgu ɗum. De (SRC0 laari winnditi innde leydi somali e democratic jamhuriyawal somali, naagi memba’en ɓe arɗuugal hukuma sarkiti partije cuɓal.
Saakiti ɓe yahirɗe eɓe kotuwal mawngal e ɗarni ɗe constitucion. Egal eɗer ɓe siyasa nanɓe mone ɓe SRC ɗun mo huwanta leydi artuɗum hukuma. O yootaama o inna Ambassadajo leydi somali yahi Indiya (1976-1978) ɓaawo ɗe Barre soitimo prison haa sai ɗe timmini laamu mun ɗer 1985.
Arɗuujo Lesdi Somali.
Egal mooɓi haute yari wallital di saron e woɓɓe wawɓe rebel kongol, keɓbini ɗe woyla-hirnare dungal e jawdi ɗun somali haiku kawtal e tiggi bilateral coggu hauti e lesde yassi, gabati ceɗe keese ɗe ɗun hutirta ɓe somali shilling ɗen a de somali paspoor e tutawal somali ɗen tiggukaki hawtirɗe e sembinnɗe de soljie e janndarmu e soljie’en ɗer somali.
Mayɗe.
Egal mayi ɗer mboy 3,2002 ɗer pretoria Afrik fombinaare (south African) innare emo wallina gam nyawɗuki ɗer asibitiwal nyawdud solji’en. Ɗun wartiri ɓannɗu maako leydi somali gan uweeki diiwal bacci maako tati arɗi yimɓe fooje uwuuki e do’aati boɗdi. Haaɗe yimmɓe 4,000 kalartake uwuruuɗe maako e genaale ɗer Berbera eɓe ɗungal hollinɓe balɗe jowe ɗiɗi ɗun pinnɗe. Dahir Rayala kahin lattaki mastuɗo ofiswal jonnɗe arɗuujo leydi.

Dahir Riyale Kahin:
Arɗuujo lesdi somali tataaɓo 3th (2000-2010)
Dahir Riyale Kahin (somali: Daahir Riyaale Kaahin larabanko’en ɗanyaama 12 mboy 1952) un gimɗo cuɓal siyasa lesdi somali lattiɗo arɗuujo lesdi ɗin daga 2002 yari 2010. Naane no o jogaake mawɗo ofisaajo mo ɗer ɗe renugo lesdikuuɗe ɗer somali bi’al (National Security Service) ɗen e ballitowoo arɗuujo lesdi daga 1977 yari 2002.
Banninkeehum Margo.
Kahin o ɗanyaama ɗer ɗe gelle ɗe Quijeed ɗungal ɗun leydi somali o wurtoike daga ɓe jibreel youn’s henda-dan ɗun ɓe Gadabuursi dan. O janngi ɗer amoud ɗen ɓaawo gaɗa o ekkiti ɗer mogaɗishu.
Kuuɗe.
Kahin ɓaawo lilaama hawti e diplomaccio jonɗe Ambassadajo somali yahi leydi djibouti. Ɗer ɗe noogas caaliɗum ɗer laamu siad Barre yaake ɗe 1980s, Kahin un mawɗo dow manguuji (NSS) ofisaajo ɗer Berbera. O jottarake ɗer las anod ɗer 1981 yari 1982. Daga 1997 yari 2002 Kahin lattake ballitowo arɗujo lesdi somali.
Arɗuujo Lesdi Somali.
E 3 duujal 2002, Kahin lattake arɗujo tatɓo e tarihi lesdi somali ɓaawo mayɗe kinnaɗo arɗujo Muhammad Haji Ibrahim Egal. Kahin ɓawo heɓi nasru subteeki ɗer cuɓal gaɗagal 14 setto 2003, wakilti cubɗe ururka dimuqraaɗiga Umada Bahawday (UDUB) ko united democratic peoples party. O nasti offis ɗe 16 duujal ɓaawo nyalɗe jana’iza Egal.

Abdulrahman Ahmed Ali:
Gimmɗo cuɓal siyasa somali
Abdulrahman Ahmed Ali (somali: cabdurrahman Ahmed calli) un gimɗo cuɓal siyasa lesdi somali hannko wooni un jonni edow arɗungal jonnde gomnaaajo lardu ɗun awɗal ɗi lesdi somali ɗun lewru silo 2018. De hitaanɗe saaliɗe arɗuujo diina larɗuɗun sekimo e huɗugo ɗun diina (Islama) ɗu’un bo ɗun wooɗa (haram) eɗe shari’a tsariwal lesdi ɗembo gomnaajo o jaɓaayi edow o huudi wiigo o wala hujja o huɗu julɓe garu hanko ma o julɗo.

Abdulrahman Mahmoud Aidiid:
Abdulrahman Mahmoud Aidiid (somali: Cabdulrahman Maxmuud Caydiid, Arabe) on woni gimɗo cuɓal siyasaaji lesdi somali. o neddo aslu ɗanyaago mayar ɗun hargeisa ko saali 2013 yari 2021 nder gelle mawɗe e kapital hawtirɗe ɗe somali o lortori ɗeɓe Sa’ad Musa lengol ɓe ɗun Habr Awal Isaaq lasngol.
Kuugal.
Adiid un membaajo ɗunɓe jonnɗe jam, kawtal hore e faago yeeso cuɓal partiwal (kulmiye) cuɓal partiwal arɗiigal lesdi somali. Ɓaawo ko gaɗa ɗe mayɗe ɗun mayor ɓe hargeisa Yusuf worsame Saeed Adiidi subtaama ɗen jottori jooɗergal arɗuujo ɗer setto 14, 2013 eɗe ɓe quorum ɗun gelleji 24 kounsiloo’en. Hannko wooni pamaroo dokkaɗo joɗergal ngal. O hokkai ngal daga Abdikarim Ahmed mooge edow ɗe mayor hargeisa ɓaawo cuɓal bataangal ɗer ɗe 2021 ɗer lesdi somali o heeɓi cuuɓi ɗuɗdi ɓurɗi ɗi koomooge tefoowo ɗer hargeisa.

Ahmed Haji Ali Adami:

Suleiman Mohamoud Adan:
Gimɗo cuɓal somali
Suleiman Mohamoud Adan haanko on woni anɗiraaɗo saleebaaan gaal (somali: Saleebaan Maxamuud Aadan) hanko on woni gimɗo cuɓal siyassaji lesdi somali eɗe hannɗo jonnta sifikajo majalisu dotti’en. Naaneno o medgo waɗuki ministajo nder lesdi ɗun somali hukuma artuɗun les arduungal lesdi Abdirahman Ahmed Ali Tuur.

Zamzam Abdi Adan:
Un cuɓal siyasa lesdi somaliya Zamzam Abdi Adan (somaliya: Zamzam Cabdi Aadan) un gimɗo deɓbo kuwowo haaje siyasa nɗer somali o gaɗɗo ministaajo ɗun jannɗe e tayaaka ɗun lesdi somali daga morso 2010 waddi silto 2015, lattiɗo deɓbo artuɗo jogiiɗo jonnɗe ngaal joɗergal o hollinaama ministaajo cede lattiɗo jogiiɗoɗer haa sai ɗe timmingo laamu ɗun si’lanyo’s. O go’o ɗer ministaa’en nayo fuɗɗuɗaɓe e timmude ɗun silanyo’s laamu daga 2010 yari 2015 luttuɓe hamɗe ke Sa’ad Ali Shire Mohamoud Hashi Abdi e Kalil Abdillahi Ahmed..

Khalil Abdillahi Ahmed:
Gimɗo cuuɓal siyasaaji lesdi somali
Sheik Khalil Abdillahi Ahmed (somali: Shiikh Khalil Abdilloahi Ahmed) hanko on woni gimɗo cuɓal siyasaaji lesdi somali lattiiɗo jonta jooni joogiiɗo arɗuungal ministaajo tiɗɗi naaree e hakkilanki harkaaji diina ɗun lesdi somali ko saali ɗe moorso 2010.

Mustafe Mohamoud Ali:
Gimɗo cuɓal lesdi somali
Mustafe Mohamoud Ali Bile (somali: Mustafe Maxamuud Cali Bile) un gimɗo cuɓal lesdi somali lattido jonni ministaajo shari’a ɗun somali.

Suleiman Ali Yusuf:
Gimɗo cuɓal siyasa lesdi somali
Sulayman Yusuf Ali (Koore) (Somaali: Saleeɓaan Yuusuf Cali Koore) un gimɗo cuɓal e soljii’jo kiiɗo offisaajo lattiɗo jooni ministaajo kabaruuji e hakkilanki leydi. Hitaande arɗuujo lesdi Musa Bihi Abdi lammini koore dow ministaajo harkaaji diiyam ɗun somali ɗer ɗummgu 2017. Koore waati ministaajo deemal les arɗuungal laamu Egal’s e haa ɗembo o waaɗi ɗuuɓi sappo e tati eɗow membaajo ɗun cuɓi somali.

Mohamoud Hashi Abdi:
Mohamoud Hashi Abdi (Somaali: Maxamuud Xaashi Cabdi), ɓurɗo anndireeki eno Ina Xaashi un gimɗo cuɓal tufleeji leydi Somaaliya, lattiɗo jogiiɗo ministaajo ɗum huutirɗe yimɓe e jahaleeji piirooje ɗun Somaali daga Morso 2010 waddi yarkuma 2015. Ɗer yarkuma 2015, ɓaawo o jippaka daga ɗe e kuuɗeji miniista, o hollinaama ministaarjo ɗun arɗuujo leydi eta kollingal arɗuujo Ahmed Mohamed Mahamoud (Siilaanyo).

Abdikarim Adan Haji Diriye:
Abdikarim Adan Haji Diriye (Somaaliya: Cabdikariim Adan Xaaji Diiriye) un gimɗo neɗɗo cuɓal tufleeji leydi Somaaliya e jogiiɗo arɗuugal e jooni ngomnajo ɗun lardu sool ɗun leydi Somaaliya. O lamminaama o hokkama ngomnajo e hokkuɗe arɗuujo leydi Somaaliya e Hemse Bihi Abdi ɗe 2 Jolal 2021. O ngomnajo kiiɗo ɗun Gebiley daga 29 Morso 2020 waddi 2 Jolal 2021.
Dannyorde margo.
O ɗannyaama ɗer Maydh, ɗe taariihawol yebre geɓal saare ɗun Sanaag lardu. O nasabari e ɓe lasgol ɗun ɓe Garhajis Isaaq.

Ahmed Mohamed Mohamoud:
Ahmed Mohamed Mohamoud Silanyo (Somaaliya: ) un gimɗo tufleeji cuɓal Somaaliya ɗannyaaɗo hitaande (1938) lattiɗo hooreejo leydi Somaaliya daga 2010 yaari 2017. O neɓɗo eɗer hukuma membaajo leydi Somaaliya, o wati ministaajo sanaa’aji ɗun jamhuriyawol Somaaliya e goɗɗe arɗule leydi: yaake de 1980s kadima o lattake ciajo ɗun ɓe lusingo leydi Somaaliya noɗɗira, Somaaliya National Movement.
Bannikeejum margo.
Ahmed Mohamed Mahamoud Silanyo o dannyaama hitaande ɗer 1938 eɗer funacaakare gelle de Burco jotteriɗe ɗer wonaa hiide kakkilirde Biritinkeejum Somaaliya.
Jannde.
Hakkude 1946 e 1957, Mohamoud janngi e janngirde ɗer Sheekh e Amud innaare mo timmini matakiwal sakandarere.
Dow o timmini, sai o lusini yari Inngila o janngoyi jannde mawɗe: daga 1958 – yari 1960, Mohamoud janngi ɗer janngirde Lanndon maare o heeɓi General Certificate of Education (GCE). Den bo janngi e janngirde Mannceesta inaare e mo heeɓi digiri ɗiɗaɓun ɓiaɗum Bachelor Degree (1960 - 1963) e fannu jawdi (1963 – 1965).

Abdirahman Ahmed Ali Tuur:
Abdirahman Ahmed Ali Tuur (Somaaliya: Cabdiraxmaan Axmed Cali Tuur, Aarabre: عبد الرحمن أحمد علي الطور) (Tur ko Tour maana “ganco ɓaawo gaɗa”) (Jolal 6, 1931 – Jolal 8, 2003) un mo gimɗo cuɓol siyaasaji hannko latt hooreejo leydi Somaaliya artuɗo daga 1991 yaari 1993. Tuur haa no boo lattake wadgo chiajo ɗun de Somaaliya National Movement daga 1990 yaari 1991.
Mogina.
Bannikeejum margo.
Tuur un ɗannyimo de Jolal 6, 1931 ɗer Burao haaɗe ɗen ɓannɗu ɗun ɓe Biritinkeejum Somaaliya deenal renirde. O nyuuwi daga ɓe lasgol Muse Arreh iyaalu dun ɓe Garhajis.
Hannko wooni pukaraajo jannguɗo mo dow artuuɗo timmindo daga de artuuɗe cakaare janngirde der Biritinkeejum Somaaliya e deenal e dokkaɗo aahaaku yaadu leydi Sudan ɗer 1948 gam ganngoya e ɗe Hantoob, o fotti e sobiraaɓe hawti e woɓɓe yeso’en Sudanko’en arɗuu’en baano Jaafar Nimeiry, Sadiq Al-Mahdi e Hassan Al-Turabi. Abdirahman sakamaako boɗɗum heeɓa ta maako fot ɗer fiijo sakkooma fijo balon e gimol e ko nooni fannu janngirɗe. Ɗen gaɗa o heebi ɓeidaari hebgo aahaaku janngoyki e ɗe janngirde ɗun Exeter
Ɓaawo hebki timmoode wonnde janngirde maako ɗer UK, Abdirahman wuyyiti e fuɗɗuki kuuɗe mun e jannde kuugal amtirgal keerɗinaaɗo ɗer Barama hitaande 1956 e lusinaaki haa jannde ɗun Distinct Commisssioner (DC) duuɓi tati ɓaawo (1959). Ɗer 1961 o lattake ngomnajo ɗe ɓe fuunaare geɓal (Burao) e ɗen ɗer 1964 ɗe ngomnajo ɗun hirnaare geɓal (Hargeisa) ɗer noogasjun gootum o joonaatiri e ɓe ministaare ɗe hakkilango ko noni yaasi o rokkama kollingal kuugal e ɗer ɗe diplomacio liile:
O lattake e ɓaawo Ciajo/laamɗo ɗun ɗe Somaaliya National Movement (SNM) e semmbinnɗe mbaadi yuptooriide les daga mo Isaaq lasgol.
Mayde.
Tuur maayiɗe Jolal 8 2003 duuɓi maako 72 e hitaande ɗen e ɗunuwiimo wataw janaza der Burao, leydi Somaaliya.

Abdillahi Abokor Osman:
Abdillahi Abokor Osman (Somaaliya: Cabdillaahi Abokor Cismaan) un gimɗo neɗɗo tufleeji leydi Somaaliya, un mo jooni jogiiɗo jannde ɗe memba ɗun kuugal leydi huutirde bial National Contracting Authority e ballitowoo ministaajo mo ɗer leydi ministaajo ɗun jahaleeji e kaajal faago yeeso laawii ɗun Somaaliya.

Abdullahi Mohammed Dahir:
Abdullahi Mohammed Dahir (Somaaliya:Cabdillaahi Maxamed Daahir) haanoo anndiraaɗo e ɗe cukuse un o gimɗo cuɓal tufleeji leydi Somaaliya hannko latti wooni ministaajo jawdi e ndeemal ɗun Somaaliya daga Colte 2016 yari Bowtal 2017. Haa ɓaawo o ministaajo ɗun anndinnki lilal e deenal leydi ɗun Somaaliya daga Morso 2013 yaari Colte 2016.

Omar Ali Abdillahi:
Omar Ali Abdillahi (Somaaliya: Cumar Cali Cabdillaahi) un neɗɗo gimɗo tufleeji leydi Somaaliya nyalde Setto 2019, o Rokkaama ministaajo ɗun nyaamu ɗun leydi Somaaliya.
Nassiji

Abdiqani Mohamoud Ateye:
Abdiqani Mohamoud Ateye (Somaaliya: ) un mo gimɗo cuɓal leydi Somaaliya fuunare Afrik hannko wooni ministaajo helaanngo (defence) ɗun leydi Somaaliya tun ko ɗun lamminimo ɗer 2019. Un mo kiiɗo meeɗuɗo wadgo ministaajo Sharia ɗun leydi Somaaliya daga 2007.
Nassiji

Abdirahim Ali Isma’il:
Neɗɗo cuɓol tufleeji Somaaliya
Abdirahim Ali Isma’il seetoore Qasa (Somaaliya: ) un gimɗo tufleeji leydi Somaaliya e ɗe jonni jonntaɗo’o laamɗo ɗun Las Anod ɓe laamorde kawtal e ɗe mawɗe gelle ɗun sool lardu ɗun Somaaliya tunnɗe 20 Morso 2021. O Rooni Abdil’aziz Hussein Hassan no 20 Morso 2021 ɓaawo cuuɓal bataangal leydi Somaaliya 2021.

Nnewi:
Nnewi un ɗe laamorde e sanaa’aji gelle nder Diiwal Aanambaara fombina fuuna Naajeeriya. Ɗum un ɗe ɗiɗire njaajirka e mawgu de ɗuuɗuki gelle ɗer ɗe fombina ɗe ɗun wuttudu fombina lesdi. Nnewi e jaajirka haa no go’o hukuma pamarre geɓɓal no ngal un Nnewi Woyla. Nnewi Wayla hawti kwaataaji nayi: Otola, Uruagu, Umudim e Nnewichi. Ɗe artuɗe asluwal motawal gadaagal gamma Awre nder Naajeeriya un e ɗe jottori nder ɗi gelle ɗen. Ɗembo haa mawgal gataangal ɗer Naajeeriya baburwal ngal kosde ɗiɗi ɗe NASENI mi un ɗen ngal waaɗa ɗer Nnewi. while the first wholly Made-in-Nigeria motorcycle, the 'NASENI M1' was manufactured in Nnewi.
Eɗe nder ɗun 2006 Nnewi haa ƙiyastaama ɗuuɗirka ɗun 391,227 no kollingal ɗun hisaago ɗi Naajeeriya. Ɗe 2019 ɗuuɗirka ƙiyastaago holliniton Nnewi haa e ɗuuɗiri baano dow 909,000. Ɗe gelle ɗen we’itooni haa dow 200km2 nder diiwal Aanambaara.
Taariihawol.
Ɗer Nnnewi bolle taariku e jeeygo, ɓe boojal (ewi) fiji fiijo mawgo ɗer tigguku ɗe tiggude ɗe Nnewi wakkatire konuuji. Efu hollingo taarikuji ɗum Nnewi haa waati huutiri ɗum taadiiɓe (janndarma) kamɓe kakkilaani keeri e sabo’e ɗun ɗu’un ɓe faɗɗooɓe ko nnyaamooɓe ɗum ewi ɗer Nnewi un haramatkeɗun e ɗe hannde. Nnewi habeli eɗe heptugo hoore laamorde daga ɗe ƙarniwal 15th yaari 1904 ɗe ɓe biritinkeejum (boode’en) laamori huutirde teeti de laamorde ɗen.
Nnewi maral un tiggi ngal ɗe nayi kwaataaji (cion njayɗum) innɗe Otolo, Uruagu, Umudim e Nnewichi fof chiun un heendini ɗum haa ɗeɗe nayi yalji kawtudi noddira umunna: fot umunna woodi e artuɗe yalji (iyaalu) anndira e ɗe Obi.

Nsukka:
Nsukka un berniwol e hukuuma pamarun geɓɓal nɗer Diiwal Enugu, Naajeeriya. Nsukka henndi keeri annɗaaɗi e no gallure hawti Edem, Opi carchailogi wutti, Eɗe-oballa e obino. Ɗe postwol lammawol ɗun ɗe geɓɓal ngal un 410,001, 410,002 jamminaangal tokkiral annɗal yaari janngirɗe mawɗe nde Naajeeriya ngonnɗe Nsukka nyibble e berniwol.
Taarihiwol (Distinorɗe).
Nsukka un watannɗe dow ɗun Mkpunano, Nru e Ihe’n Owerri jonntaɗo’o haaɗe un eroowal gollije ɗun lortori yaari fuf ɗe galluji les woylare zonwal senata’en Enugu eɗe Nsukka. Ɗu’un ferɗum eɗum ede sakamako ɗun hore hawtirɗe gure un ɗun ɗe hannde jonnta jeyti Nsukka waɗɗaani lesɓe laamu boɗeejo arɗuungal.
Nsukka un ɗemmbo ɗe hukuuma pamarun geɓɓal e kawtuungal geɓbi gelle ɗuɗɗe hawti nɗer. Nsukka ɗe hoosi yari ɗe artuungal finnugal janngirde nɗer Naajeeriya ɗe Janngirde Naajeeriya Nsukka (UNN).
