Nde yimɓe puɗɗi ɗuuɗugo dow lesdi, ɓe danyi ɓiɓɓe rewɓe. 2 Ɓiɓɓe Allaha ngi'i ɓiɓɓe rewɓe yimɓe no mbooɗiri, ɓe cuɓi woɗɓe maɓɓe, ɓe te'i ɓe. 3 Nden Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Ruuhu am wonataa nder neɗɗo foroy, ngam o maayoowo, balɗe ngeendam maako ɓurataa duuɓi teemerre e noogas (120).” 4 Saa'i maajum, maapinndi'en ɗonno nder duniyaaru. Kamɓe laati maapinndi'en ɓooyma haa lesdi, manaaɓe. Ɓe ɗonno boo yaake ɓiɓɓe Allah kawtino bee ɓiɓɓe rewɓe yimɓe, ndanyidi ɓiɓɓe bee ɓiɓɓe rewɓe ɓe'e. Kamɓe ngoni doolɗooɓe, jam'en tedduŋgal. 5 Jawmiraawo yi'i no halleende yimɓe ɗuuɗiri dow lesdi. Nyalaade fuu anniyaaji e numooji ɓerɗe maɓɓe kuucitani halleende. 6 Numooji Jawmiraawo ngayliti ɓaawo nde o tagi yimɓe dow lesdi. Ɓernde maako naawi. 7 O wi'i: “Mi nattinan yimɓe ɓe tagmi dow lesdi haa yotto dabbaaji e ladooji e colli. Mi tagataano ɗum.” 8 Ammaa Nuuhu heɓi yerduye Jawmiraawo
Allah hoo'i anniya hisnugo Nuuhu.
9 Ndaa habaru danygol Nuuhu: Nuuhu o adiliijo e timmuɗo caka yimɓe nder zamanuuru muuɗum. O tokki laawol Allah. 10 O danyi ɓiɓɓe worɓe tato: Sem e Haamu e Yafet.
11 Lesdi wonni haa yeeso Allah, ndi heewi toonyaare. 12 Allah laari lesdi, ndaa ndi wonnake, ngam marɗum yoŋki fuu wonni yahdu muuɗum dow lesdi. 13 Allah wi'i Nuuhu: “Mi annini timmingo tagle fuu. Lesdi heewi toonyaare ngam daliila yimɓe. Mi nattinan ɓe hawtaade bee lesdi fuu. 14 Waɗanan hoore maaɗa koommbowalb maŋngal, ngal leɗɗe gofir. c A waɗa cuuɗi nder maagal, a sukka burɗe maagal bee taari, nder e yaasi fuu. 15 Ndaa nii mbaɗirta ngal: Njuutirka maagal mara meetir teemerre e cappanɗe jowi (150), njaajirka maagal meetir noogas e jowi (25) e towirka maagal boo meetir sappo e jowi (15). 16 Sey a hippa ngal, a waɗa wurdere haa koommbowal, nde reeta meetir gootel, haa les mbippu maagal. Waɗ dammugal koommbowal haa caka wuttudu maagal. Senndu towirka maagal haa waɗa cuuɗi tati, wooru dow wooru. 17 Mi waddan ilam dow lesdi, ngam halkugo ko yeeɗata les asama, marndum poofɗe ngeendam. Ko woni dow lesdi fuu nattan. 18 Ammaa mi haɓɓan alkawal bee maaɗa. A nastan koommbowal, an e ɓiɓɓe maaɗa e debbo maaɗa e rewɓe ɓiɓɓe maaɗa. 19 Haa geetum, marɗum ɓanndu fuu, hoo'u ɗiɗi ɗiɗi nder koommbowal, gorɗum e debbum, ɗum hisa hawtaade bee maaɗa. 20 Haa colli fodde asli maaji e dabbaaji fodde asli maaji e ladooji lesdi fodde asli maaji. Gorɗum e debbum maaji fuu ngaran gal maaɗa, ngam hisnugo yoŋkiiji maaji. 21 An boo, hoo'u diga ko nyaamete fuu, sigu ɗum haa maaɗa, ɗum laato nyaamdu maaɗa e nyaamdu maaji.” 22 Nuuhu waɗi bana non, o waɗi ko Allah umri mo fuu.

Ilam tuufaana:
Jawmiraawo wi'i Nuuhu: “Nastu koommbowala, an bee yimɓe saare maaɗa fuu. Ngam mi yi'i a adiliijo haa yeeso am nder zamanuuru ndu'u. 2 Haa dabbaaji dagiiɗi fuu hoo'u gorɗi joweeɗiɗi e debbi joweeɗiɗi. Diga dabbaaji ɗi dagaaki boo, hoo'u ɗiɗi ɗiɗi, gorɗum e debbum. 3 Diga colli boo, hoo'u gorɗi joweeɗiɗi e debbi joweeɗiɗi, ngam haa asli maaji lutta dow lesdi. 4 Ngam lutti nyalɗe joweeɗiɗi, mi toɓnan iyeende dow lesdi, nyalawmaaje e jemmaaje cappanɗe nayi. Mi nattinan tagle am fuu dow lesdi.” 5 Nuuhu waɗi ko Jawmiraawo umruno mo fuu.
6 Haa ilam tuufaana waɗa dow lesdi, Nuuhu marino duuɓi teemeɗɗe joweego (600). 7 Nuuhu nasti koommbowal bee ɓiyum'en e debbo muuɗum e rewɓe ɓiyum'en, ngam hisugo ndiyamji tuufaana. 8 Diga dabbaaji dagiiɗi e ɗi ndagaaki, diga colli e ko wuurata dow lesdi fuu, 9 gorɗum e debbum, ɗiɗi ɗiɗi, ngari haa Nuuhu nder koommbowal bana Allah umruno mo.
10 Nde nyalɗe joweeɗiɗi mbaɗi, ndiyam tuufaana moɗi lesdi. 11 Nder nduuɓu Nuuhu teemeɗɗe joweego'oowu (600), lewru ɗiɗaɓru, nyalaade sappo e joweeɗiɗawre maaru, ɓulduɗe ndiyamji lugguɗi les lesdi fuu cukkiti, burɗe asama boo maɓɓiti. 12 Iyeende toɓi dow lesdi nyalawmaaje cappanɗe nayi e jemmaaje cappanɗe nayi. 13 Nyalaade maajum nden Nuuhu e ɓiyum'en: Sem e Haamu e Yafet, non boo debbo maako e rewɓe ɓiɓɓe maako nasti koommbowal, 14 bee dabbaaji ladde fodde asli maaji e dabbaaji saare fodde asli maaji fuu e ladooji duɓanɗi dow lesdi fodde asli maaji e colli fodde asli maaji bee fiiroojum koo ɗume marɗum bileeji fuu. 15 Ɗi ngari haa Nuuhu nder koommbowal, gorɗum e debbum fuu, ɗiɗi ɗiɗi diga ko mari poofɗe ngeendam fuu. 16 Gorɗum e debbum nder tagle fuu nasti, bana Allah umruno mo. Nden Jawmiraawo maɓɓi dammugal.
17 Ilam tuufaana waɗi dow lesdi nyalɗe cappanɗe nayi. Ndiyamji ɓesdi, efti koommbowal, ngal ɓaŋgti dow. 18 Ndiyamji ɓurti ɓesdaago masin dow lesdi, koommbowal weeyi dow ndiyam. 19 Ndiyamji tokki ɗuuɗugo masin. Ɗi moɗi kooseeje towɗe les asama fuu, 20 ɗi towti dow maaje waɗi meetir joweeɗiɗi (7). 21 Marɗum ɓanndu ko waancata dow lesdi fuu waati: Colli e dabbaaji e ko duɓata dow lesdi mbaatidi, non boo yimɓe fuu maaydi. 22 Ko mari poofɗe ngeendam nder kine fuu, ko woni dow lesdi njoorndi fuu, waati. 23 Bana nii Allah nattiniri ko wonno dow lesdi fuu: Yimɓe e dabbaaji e ladooji e colli. Sey Nuuhu luttidi bee ko wondi bee maako nder koommbowal. 24 Ndiyamji ɓesdi nyalɗe teemerre e cappanɗe jowi (150).

Idris Garba:
Manjo Janarajjo Idris Garba O laatake Gomnaajo soja ɗun Diiwal Benue diga hitaade ɗumngu duubi 1987 yahiki ɗumngu ngu duubii 1988 e kadi ma Gomnaajo diiwal Kano dega ɗumngu ngu duubii 1989 yahiki nder 1992.
Taariku Maako.
Idris Garba O danñyaama nder lewru ngawawɓe ɗun ɗumngu 1947 e nɗer gelle Gulu nde hukuma pamarum lapai Diiwal Neja, Naajeeriya. O janngi e jangirde solji'en Naajeeriya, Zariya gada ɗumngu ngu 1963 haa yaari 1967 .
Ekkitaaki Kuugal Solja.
O nasti jangirde ekiitaaki kuugal solja Naajeeriya, Kaduna ɗen ɗun ayyaniimo jonnɗe laftanarjo kanal ɗiɗaaɓo nder hitaade 1968. O halartake kosji ɗuɗɗi kama no o wonntiri e jergol laabi mɓe yaaki kama bano:
Artillery Troop Commanders course USSR,JULY 1971-September
Artillery Troop Commanders Course USSR, July 1970 -
September 1971
Young Officer Course Nowshera Pakistan
Young Officers Course Nowshera, Pakistan, July -December, 1972
Technical Gunnery Course Larkhill, Salisbury, UK, May -
August, 1975.
Field Artillery Officers Advanced Course, Forstill,
Oklahoma, USA June 1977 to February 1978;
Command and Staff College, Jaji August 1978 to September, 1979
Regiment Battalion Commanders Course
Nigerian Army
School of Infantry, Jaji in 1981.
Gomnajo Haa nde Solja.
E ɗumngu ngu 1988, Janarjo Ibrahim Babangida Babangida lamminiimo Gomnaajo solja ɗun diiwal Benue. Dega ɗon dum lammini mo Gomnaajo diiwal Kano e lewru nduwawɓe 1988 O huuwi haa yahi 1992 wakkitire nde O hokkiti laamu e yimɓe lesdi Kabiru Ibrahim Gaya haa ɗun waddi jamhuuriyaawal tataɓal ngal Naajeeriya.Col. Idris Garba o waɗii goɗdum dookawal laatiingal jippinki dokaaji caaliiɗi hawti e hokkuki huutirde fiijo nde diiwal Kano daama hoosuki teddudun mawngu e nɗer harkaaji fiijo e diiwal ngal Idris Garba Jawjawngel, 1988- ndu Haaramru,1992 ← Mohammed Ndatsu Umaru (en) - Kabiru Ibrahim Gaya → 1987 - 1987 ← Ishaya Bakut (en) - Fidelis Makka (en) → Rayuwa.
MARGU.
Dañnorde lapai, hitaade Nduwawɓe,1947 (Duuɓi 75)
Leydi Naajeeriya
Lasngol Hausare
Jannɗe Hausare, EngilisI, Pidgin nde Naajeeriya
Sana'aji Gimɗo Siyaasaaji
Gomnaajo Diiwal kano
Gomnaajo Diiwal Benue.

Jerɓanɗe leydi to Turki e Siiri:
Jerɓanɗe leydi colte 2023 to Turki e Siiri ko jerɓanɗe baɗɗe saraaji keerol hakkunde Turki e Siiri ñalnde 6 colte 2023. Yerɓannde adannde ndee waɗi ko w 1 e hj 17 e lƴ 36 (UTC) sara gure Ganz

Ahmed musa:
Ahmed Musa Eii nalde 14 lewru yarkooma duubi 1992 eiii lysidi Naajeeriya gwani,en kwallo kurben Funbina toe woyla hurde Turkish Super lig club sivasspor toe Naajeriya .

Suleja:
Suleja eii hukuuma pamaru Diiwal Niger Naajeeriya edon jama,are 260,240 Woila Abuja lamurajje Suleja konkal fere Abuja Lamido Sulayman Bal ko,en Tara,en 1876.

Audu Bulama Bukarti:
Audu Bulama Bukarti eii doon lysidi lawyaajo Naajeeriya, doon lawyaajo jama,a Bill,adaama o waree.
Ngeendam/Elto.
Eriminmo Bulama Bukarti wurooku Diiwal Yobe Naajeeriya,ummora jangirdee pamaru ummora Bukarti eii woodi wurooku certificate (NCE) duubi 2005,gada kwalejin jangirdee ummura Gashua Naajeeriya. Eiii lysidi Bayero Kano gada 2006 toe 2011.

Idoma:
Yimɓe Idoma un yimɓe dow e diiwal Benuwe, Naajeeriya.

Pauline Tallen:
Pauline kedem Tallen OFR eriminmo yanlde 8 siilo duuɓi 1959 lysidi siyasa'en Naajeeriya toe jornii ministaajo Debbum, shugabaju muhammadu Buhari kankoo duubi 2019.Diiwal Filato gamti hukuma pamare toe Simon Lalong..
Ngeendam/Elto.
Tallen woore gada hukuma pamare Shendam Diiwal Filato ewoodi digiri gada mawbe jangirdee Jo's duubi 1982..

Ogaminan:
Ogaminan un gelle mawɗe nder Diiwal Kogi, Naajeeriya. Un dum hoore hawtirɗe ɗun ɗe hukuma pamarun geɓɓal adali.

Omu-Aran:
Omu-Aran di hoore gurtal ɗun Igbominanko’en un gelle nɗer Diiwal Kwara, Naajeeriya. Un heeɓi aslu daga Ife e jooni hore kawtal hukuma pamarun ɗun Ire poɗun hukuma pamarun Omu-Aran un kamano kilomitaji jowee tati 8km e nɗer daga Arun-Orin.
Distinorɗe.
Omu-Aran ɗe tiggama e dow nduuɓi 500 caaliɗi. Gelle ɗen tiggama sakamako eggoki yimɓe daga Ile-Ife sabo’e hokkere nɗer Ile-Ife yari annɗira sabaabu ɗun ɗe hokkere, ɓe inaare ɗe nyamaama.

Kaduna:
Kaduna un ɗe kapital hawtirɗe gelle Diiwal Kaduna ɗen e booyma naane tufleeji kapital ɗun woylaare Naajeeriya. E ɗi jottoori nɗer wayla hirna Naajeeriya, haade juggol Kaduna. Ɗum un e laamorde caka e mawɗum finnande jahaaleeji furtu ɗun ɗe maɓɓitirgo laawol haa woylaare Naajeeriya hawti ɗumɗe laawol pirooje e laawol netwokji.
Ɗuuɗirka yimɓe ɗun Kaduna ƙiyasstaamo kam ba 760,084 e ngo hisaago Naajeeriya ɗun 2006. Yawɗu malongu gelleji tun 2005 heeɓi ɗaygo e ɓeiɗaago mawgu ɗuuɗirka, hannde ƙiyastaama ɓaano ko yaari yimɓe ɗer 1.3 milliyanji. 
Ɗe yaarta ngaaɗaaɗum ɗun 2021 gam ɗuudirka yimɓe diiwal Kaduna haa kamano un 8.9 milliyanji yimɓe.
Taarikaaku (Distinoore).
Kaduna un tiggaago ngo laamu boɗejo nɗer 1900. Ɗe ngomnaajo artuuɗo ɗun woyla Naajeeriya, Sir Fredrick Luguard, nastinii ɗe hannɗe inaare noo faago yeeso e ngam laawol pirooje ngol Laagos-Kano. Ɗum lattake ɗe kapital ɗun yaarta woylaare geɓbol Naajeeriya ɗer 1917, e kuutirɗe yahirɗe ɗun’un kuutirɗun haasai 1967. Gelle ɗen haajooni un hoore hawtirɗe ɗun goɗɗe tufleeji solji’en e finnataawa jooɗorɗe musamman nɗer ɗe woylaare Naajeeriya. 
Sigaago.
Sanaa’aaji.
Kaduna un a mawɗe caka sanaa’aaje ɗer woyla Naajeeriya, heɓinorɗe haajeeji, baano tufaaji, madiinji, kuugal njamɗe, dalmaaji e neɓɓan peetur haajeeji e hokkirɗe.

Lekki:
Lekki un a gelle ɗer Diiwal Laagos, Naajeeriya. Ɗum un jottori ɗeta fombina fuuna ɗun berniiji Laagos. Lekki unɗe ɗabi’ankeejum hola fattuɗe penisulaaka, jokkootirɗe yaari ɗumɗe hirna victoria Island e Ikoyi galliol ɗun Laagos, hawti ɓe bellei atlantic yaari ɗum fombina Laagos 'Lagoon' yaari ɗe woyla e Lekki lagoon eɗe ta fuuna; kanon bo gelle fombina fuuna, kenjirgo e wargo ɗe hirna jokkal ɗun fewɗe duunde, jokkotiri ɗe fuuna ɓanndu ɗun Ibeju-lekki hukuma pamarun.

Maamun (Gine):
Maamun ko saare Gine wonunde e nder diiwal ɗimmal ngal ( Moyen Gine) e taariikayankoore e nder Fuuta Jaloo, e hella km 250 ka nano-fuɗnaange laamorde Konaakiri . Ko saare sincaande e hitaande 1908 fii jaɓɓagol gaaru laana leydi chemin de fer de Conakry au Niger, ka tawata hari hino moƴƴineede fewndo on saa'i . Ko tawata laawi e pine heewuɗe no fotti, ko « saare ɗate-cale ». Ka baŋŋe laamateeri, ko ɗon woni laamorde perefektiiru e diiwaan Maamun on.
Taariika.
Gila ka feccere ɗiɗaɓere giral 19ɓal, Telikoo – hannde kartiyee jeyaaɗo e Maamun –, wonuno laawol e ɗate-cele mawɗe wonannde yeeyayɓe. Nokkuure nden jogii darnde luumo mawngo .
Gine ko e 1891 toɗɗaa diiwal jeyaangal e nder dawla Faransi, kono Fuuta dartino haa ka Bokar Biro Barry sahinɗinaa ɗon e hitaande1896. E 1901, Gine wonti tawdaaɓe e Afrique-Occidentale française (AOF).Lamɓe njaggu ngun fuɗɗii moƴƴinngol chemin de fer reliant Conakry au Niger hakkunde1902 e 1915. Timmingol rogere ɗimmere golle ɗen laatori sabu sincugol gaaru woɗɗitorɗo kilomeeterji 4 hoɗo ngon Kuumi. Ɗum woni sommbo sincugol saare nden Maamun. Uddital ngal ko e 27 siilo 1908 waɗi, e tawtoral Martial Merlin, tawi ko o lomtiiɗo gouverneur général AOF on. E nder ɗum , laawi e cuuɗi laamu e jamaa buy moƴƴinaa : nokkuure luumo, labutaani, post, kamp koonunkooɓe, duɗal tokosal. Ñannde go'o siilo 1909, Hooreyaagal diiwal (serkel) Timbo ngal, laamorde hiɗnde Fuuta Jaloo, artiraa Maamun.
E 1912, yamiroore AOF newnani Maamun e koɗooli takkiiɗi ɗum wonugol "saare rinɗunde".Kuugal mawngal ka funtugol ndee saare Maamun. 
Immorde e référendum du 28 septembre 1958, Gine salii eɓɓoore général de Gaulle ko yaadi e gollidal kesal e tawtindiral leyɗe AOF fii renndo nodditiraango "Communauté française", holliti dimaaku mum ñalnde 2 yarkoma e nden hitaande. Maamun saare waɗaa ronndiisiman e ndee hitaande 1958. Saare nden waylii : kuuran, ndiyam, laawi, cuuɗi laamu, ko kala heɓii seeɗa e mbaadi saare . E hitaande 1984 nde wonti suuperefekttiiru.
E 1991, Maamun ƴetti darnde galluure/komin, Sékou Tounkara woni hooreejo arano, sarɗiyankoojo kadi ka Assemblée nationale.
Ɓee meerɓe arayɓe ɗoo wonii: :
Mbaalaandi.
Baanjital (localisation).
Saare Maamun nden ko ka tummbo Gine woni, hattirnde ka senngo nano suuperfektiiruji Bouliwel e Tolo, ka nano-fuɗnaange Dounet, ka ñaamo-fuɗnaange Soyah, ka hirnaange Konkouré.
Lelngo e ndiyam.
Ka fuɗɗorde Fuuta Jaloo, e tooweendi emmbere 746 m, saare nden no darnaa e lowre waɗunde pale ko tawata no sattini seeɗa jinndugol hakkunde kartiyeeji ɗin. Fello seere ngon no ƴellitii saare nden, hingo toowi emmbere 950 m.
Saare nden ko ka gaanin Bafing (maa « maayo ɓaleewo ») ngon woni, tubbungol hakkunde Maamun e Dalaba, ado ngol tawtude Bakoye (maa « caangol danewol ») fii wonugol maayo fleuve Sénégal e nokkuure wi'eteende Bafoulabé e nder Mali.
Nokkuure ɓuuɓunde Ramsa – Bafing-Iwdi – cincaama e 2007, sudduɗum mbertudi 317 200 ektaar.
Yaasi kin.
Maamun no jogii yaasi nodditirteeki climat tropical, noone Aw e wi'aango classification de Köppen, wonndude e wulɓuuɓdi/tamperatiir joltayɗo haa e 24,2 °C e toɓooji yaarayɗi emmbere 1 869 mm e nder hitaande, ɓuruɗi jaasude ka ceeɗu ndii ka ndunngu .
Fuɗateeri.
Wonndiije heewuɗe ko e nder ndii ndee nokkuure woni : Seere, Kuumi, JAarabaka, Tambasa, tentinii Ceewel (maa Caawel), ko tawata ko kilooji hella sappo woɗɗitori saare nden, lamɓe kolon en waɗi ɗum nokkuure reenaande e hitaande 1930, duɗal ngenndiwal toppitiiɓe karalle ndiyam e leɗɗe toppitii golle ɗen e 1991 (ENATEF). Hinde yaaji emmbere ektaarji 470 .
O ñawndayɗo, yiilotooɗo mo Biritaniya John McEwan Dalziel (1872-19 winnduɗo defte heewuɗo ko yaadi e fuɗateeri hirnaange Afrik, moɓtindirno laɗɗe buy e nder Gine e duuɓi 1920, tentinii hella Maamun .
Yimɓe.
Wiɗto weeɓitaango e 1953 holluno wonnde Maamun no jogii hoɗuɓe 17 600 , e mbertudi 2 350 km2, ɗum woni cukkude ndi 7,5 hɓ/km2.
Ko Fulɓe ɓen ɓuri ɗuuɗude Maamun, ko pular kadi woni haala ɓuruka doole. Kono ko nokkuure ka leƴƴi heewuɗi hawtondirii, no jeyaa e ɓen Maninka Sooso, kono kadi Kisi, Tooma , Berse e Libane no tawee ton, winndaaɓe fii wallitagol ka demal e golle raay on. Ka taariika, ko ɓuri kon e ɗee mojobe ɗoo ko julɓe
Needi.
Ado jaaɓi-haɗtirde.
Maamun no jogitii duɗe jannde laamuyankooje,keeriiɗe, diinayankooje , jogiiɗe himme e darnde jannugol sukaaɓe ɓen. E nder ɗen, hiɗen jogii ɓuruɗe ɗen lollude, liisee amikal kabral, liisee garan dikal, liisee dukuree, liisee hafiya, liisee kilomeeteer 4, hindaye, halima, esselansi fuuta, pottal julɓe, daarul qur'aana, daar salaam.
Jannde toownde.
Maamun no jogii yoga e duɗe mawɗe fannuyankeeje wano "Institut supérieur de technologie de Mamou" e "l'ENI de Mamou" wonuɗi Telikoo e duɗal fii cellal wonungal Tambasa.
Faggudu.
Ko demal, ngaynaaku, ngeyngu, taransipoor, mbaylaandi e tuurisyaagal woni golle ɓamtayɗe renndo ɓuruɗe jaalaade e nder saare nden.
Demal ngal no yaltina maaro, kaaba, Fonnye, ngawri, bantara, pompiteer e tiga. No yeeye kadi: banaana, kafe, tamaasi, cooyo maa ɗum nete ("Parkia biglobosa"). Hiɓe huutora kadi naakoo (basalle, leetii, kobo-kobo, taku, karot..) e ɓiɓɓe daƴƴe (mango, piya, leemunne, kaccu, pampula). Ɓaawo dimu ngun, Iisin marirɗo fii waylugol ɓiɓɓe leɗɗe watta ɗum njaram joɗɗinano Maamun. Ɓaawo daragol duuɓi heewuɗi, eɓɓoore waɗano e 2019 fii waylugol pompiteer e nden nokkuure.
Maamun ko gooto e galluuje ka ne'ugol daabeeji jaali fota. No ne'ee ton: na'i, baali, be'i e ɗi gabbati e noone ɓuruɗo yaajude .
Alhaali ngeyngu ngun no newii gila ɓooyii sabu jonnde mbaalaandi Maamun ndin e nder Gine (ko ka ɗate-cele) .
Ɓadondiral ngaluuji Fuuta Jaloo ɗin wano baraasi e weendu ndun ka Baafin wol maa ɗum deemuuji ɗin ka buruure Penselli, no woni sabu yimɓe buy no ara juuragol ɗin nokkeeli..
Waɗɗateeri.
Ko ɗon laawi Gine ɗin 1, 2 e 5 fotti (aranol ngol no taƴiti saare nden sutii ka fuɗnaange, ɗimmol ngol yaari ka ñaamo, 5ɓol ƴawri ka nano).
Maamun ka baŋŋe pinal.
Ceerno Moneembo, wallifotooɗo Ginenaajo - heɓuɗo mbuuña "pri Renodo" e 2008 - waɗii paykun-yaagal e nder Maamun (Pooredaaka). E nder miilol makko, S"inimaa", yaltungol e 1997, o weeɓiti saare nden ka fewndo hettaare Gine . O ɓanngini ko nokkuure reweteende e canngal. O waɗani ɗum haatimere 
Annexes.
E 
ɗeya eɓɓooje wikipediya: 

Diiwal Ikko:
Diiwal Ikko un diiwal dow e lokkere fomnbina e lituggal Naajeeriya e woodi mayyo mawɓe..

Kano:
Kano (ajamiis) un Gallure kadi diiwal nɗer woyla Naajeeriya e ɗe kapital Diiwal Kano hawtirɗe gelle. Ɗum gelle ɗiɗaɓe ɓurɗe mawgu ɗer Naajeeriya ɓaawo Laagos, hawti e ɗuuɗugo ko yaaii milliyanji nay jooɗaɗi 449km2 (173sqmi). Jottora ɗer savanna, fombina ɗun ɗe sahel. Kano un mawɗe huutirɗe ɗun un ɗe jonɗa yimmɓe no millennia. Ɗum un ɗe finna taawa diiwal ɗun ɗe Dabo dynastanire e ƙarnuwal 19th woodi dokawal laamɗo haaɗe berniiji diiwal. Laamorɗe laamu Kano un mo jonnta finna taawa janngirde nɗer ɗe keerol gelle ɗun Kano e lesɗe huutirɗe hukumawol ɗun Diiwal Kano.
Gelle ɗen un ɗe medieval Hawsa’en laamorɗe jowee ɗiɗi e mawɗe jooɗiiɓe ɗun ɓe gelle un yimɓe noɗɗiraaɓe wolɗooɓe hawsare ko ɓe laamu boɗeejo Kano un ɗe cemminɗe kawtal yimɓe hawti e Labaranko’en, Baabare'en, Tuwaareq'en, Kanuri e Fulɓe e luttuɗe hawti ɗe bolle Hawsare bolɗe eno lingua-franca e haano milliyanji 70 bolwirooɓe ɗe ɗer geɓɓal leyde lolaama warɓe jottiɓe ɗer ƙarniwol 11th ɗer gelle ɗen ɓe ɗun anɗiirana finaaɓe haa ɗe haaɗu sahara lamorɗe e sakamakowol warki jawdi e ɗe luumo caka ɗe wayla Naajeeriya, e haa jonntabo hawtuɓe kawto ɗun caka luumo.
Taariihawol.
Nɗer ɗe ƙarniwol 7th, haayre/hoosare dala, a hayre anɗaaɗe nɗer Kano un inaare wanncooɓe gancal e hautuɗe larduuji ɗunɗe hawtuɓe ɗe ironje kuutira (kuugal) (neesawal nok) ɗum un anɗiraaka kooma eɗe Hawsa’en yimɓe ko yewtooɓe ɗun Niger-Congo lasngol. Cappaaki hollinde barbushe, e anɗaɗo konoowo anɗaaɗo mo hayre dala e deɓɓo degnaaɗo mo ɗun yi’aata Tsumburbura, Barburshe un daga ɗe ɗuuɓe ɗe ganncoowo yalji (maparauta) kanko ke wooni artuɗo nyibɗo gelle Kano Elizabeth Isichei windaana ton ɗe hollinki ɗun Barbushe un fottinaɗe baano ɗun ɓe yimɓe sao.

Offa:
Offa un gelle nɗer Diiwal Kwara, Naajeeriya howti e ɗuuɗirka kamano 120,100 jooɗiiɓe ɗer. Gallure nden un annɗiraaɗe ɗun sannya fola luumo, huutiri kaya lambuuji fola gaɗɗun daga pamarun mawnuuɗi indigo e luttuɗe awee. Offa un ɗun annɗiri inaare ndeemal ɗun ƙullu puunaanɗi e masardi kolaati ɗun e naane no ndeesa ɗun nyamdu ke’uɗun ɗun ɗe aslu ɗer geɓal gelle ɗen. Diinaaje annɗaɗe ɗe ɗun huutirta un Islaama e Kiristannkore e finna taawaji dinaaju.
Offa un haaɗe lawal girgije ndiiyam daga Laagos nde artuɗe kapital dun leydi Naajeeriya e Offa nastin eɗe lawol piroje ndiiyam koɗun be nyajjina layiwol daga woyla yaari Kano e Nguru. Offa un ɗiɗire gallure ɓurɗe mawgu ɗer diiwal Kwara jottoride ɗer caka Naajeeriya hawti e geogiraafiwal jokkal ɗun8`9N 4`43E. Offa un tiggago e timmingo ɗer ƙarniwal 14th eta ɗe yoruba’en jogal daga Oyo. Ottateɗo ɗer diiwal Osun, Iyana offaɗer diiwal Oyo. Offa nder Kodduwaar (koɗɗuwa un yimɓe daga Offa).
Finnatawaajun Njanngaaɗun.
Ɓe laamu finaatawaajo kakkilanowo (lamiɗo) ɗun ɗi gelle un olofa kanko un ballitowo eɗe lammɓe mawɓe jowee innde mammɓe Asalofa, Essa, Ojomu, samo e Balogun. Ewoodi yemmtere ɗiɗi ejowi nogasje nguure (wuro) fina-taawa. Tun tigguki ɗun gelle ɗen ɗer ƙarniwal shaalingal 14th lamɓe sappoje ɗiɗi e nayi (olotal njoogi) laamu ɗun. Hisaare jergol innɗe maɓɓe e jaaɓaɓeɓe olalomi olatagangan-tiggudo ɗun Offa kannko wari daga Oyo haaɗer Ile-Ife (1392-1442) annɗiraaɗe no Azad’s lamorɗe tokukkuɗe mannitirɗe ɗeɓe ohinoyi ɗun Ebiranko’en (laamu Ebira’en) Dr Ado Ibrahim Atta.

Katsina:
Katsina (nonbo Katsina e Kachinna, daga masinna (machinna) e teshinna (tachinna), kamano daga tamashek (ma’aana biɗɗo ko ii’am ko mazza (gorko) hawti (inna) (ɗaayoowo) un hukuuma pamaarun e hore hawtirɗe kapital Diiwal Katsina, nɗer woylare Naajeeriya. Katsina un boo jooɗoori baanoo kilomitaaji 260km (160mi) fuunaa berniiji Sokoto e 135km (84mi) woyla hirnaare ɗun Kano kiɓbinɗe ɗunɗe keerol lesdi jammhuuriyari Niiser. Ɗer 2016 Katsina ƙiyastaama ɗuuɗirka yimɓe baa 429,000.
Gelle ɗun un caka ɗun remirɗe ndeemal gurtinoowal baano biriiji, hottollo hideejie muuri e mɓaayeeri den e haa ɗi maari neɓɓan ɗon wurtinki neɓɓan peanut e njamɗe ɗen e caka ɗurorɗe mawɗe ɗe ngeerooɗe e marle naa’ii e bee’ii, baali e ngerogal.
Gelle ɗen un mawɗe ɗe jooɗiiɓe un Fulɓe e Hawsare tokkuɓe Diina Islaama kongol lasgol. Arɗuujo kiido ƙinnaaaɗe arɗiiɗo Umaru Musa Yar’aduwa un ɓiɗdo dayaaɗo nɗer Katsina gomnaaajo mo jooni mo Diiwal Katsina kanko wii’eta Aminu Bello Masari, nastuuɗo ɗoyɗi jonɗe joɗergal ngomnaajo Diiwal Katsina nyalde 29 ɗun dujjal 2015 kannko roonii Baristaajo Ibrahim Shehu Shema.
Laamorɗe Katsina.
Laamorɗe Diiwal katsina inaare anɗiraɗe wuro korau unɗe sarƙotirɗe jooɗooriɗe caaka ɗe ɓe naaneeno finannde gelle. Ɗum un e alaama ɗun funnaatawaru, taariku e yaarta ɗun katsinako’en e wiigo limgal taariku ɗistinorɗe, ɗe nyiiɓaama nyiɓgal ɗer 1348CE ta Muhammadu korau kanko wooni julɗo artuɗo gaɗɗo Imaanu ɗen laamiɗo katsina artuɗo. Ɗu’un kannjun fassiri mooye ɗun finaatawaɗun annɗira baano e (wuro ɗun ɓe korau).

Bida:
Bida eii hukuma pamaru Diiwal Niger, Naajeeriya datal A124 ewoodi mangou,Hukuma pamaru Bida woodi datal 51 km2 toe jama,are 188,181 duubi 2006..
Berniwol.
Bida eii juura Diiwal Niger Naajeeriya edon jama,are 178,840 duubi (2007) toe hirnaa eii Funbina Minna birni,en Diiwal Niger 
Berniwol Bida Bamisu Estate, Ramatu dangana,ECWA, loumou tarmida, Jangirdee Bida.
Lamurajje Bida Katcha, Enagi, Baddegi, Agaie, pategi Lemu, kutigi.
laytogul.
Nupe eiii woodi lamorde Nupe Lamido Yahaya Abubakar lytogul Bida Igbo, Yoruba, Hausare, Igala, Gbagi Ibira.

Lagos:
Lagos un berniiji mawɗe nɗer Naajeeriya ɗen e ɗiɗawre (ɗiɗire) gelle ɓurɗe mawgu nɗer Afirika, hawti e ɗuuɗirka yimɓe ɗun 15.4 milliyanji hawtirɗe nɗer gelle ɗen tan. Lagos unɗe kapital Naajeeriya haa say bowtal 1991 tokkiral bolɗal sottinki ɗunɗe kapital yaari Abuja e ɗer ɗi caka lesdi ɗin. Ɗi Lagos ɗuuɗirka gelleji ɗin haa baano milliyanji 23.5 eno 2018, lattinɗum ɗun galliol mawgol nɗer Afrik. Laagos unɗi mawɗum sanaa’orɗi hebgo cede nɗer caka ɗen e hawtirɗe jawdi ɗun Diiwal Lagos e Naajeeriya ɗe fuu.
Gelle ɗen manɗitira baano ɓiiruki, tuurodoy, jaɓɓorɗe kapital ɗe Afrik ɗen e alamawal luumorɗe gollital, jannɗe, tufleeji, tittorɗe laaɓuki. Lagos e ɗer galluje sappo nɗer duuniyaru ɓurɗe yawdu mawgu e berniiji. Ɗe megancio haa mari ɗe nayi mawɗe GDP ɗer Afrik e guura go’o ɗun ɗe jayɗe e resorɗe deppe ndiiyam weeɗi (belli) e ɗer geɓɓal Afrik. Ɗe gelle Lagos ariyaaji un a mawɗe inaare jannɗe e biiruki caka nɗer sahara Afrik.
Taariku (Distinorɗe).
Laagos un aslu jottoriɗe eɗe awori kongi ƙenndi ɗun yimmɓe yoruba nɗer ɗi ƙarniwal 15th. Ɗi awori luusinii yaari nɗe Island jooni nodda iddo nɗen e yaari ɗi mawɗe jayɗe joonnta Lagos Island. Awori un anɗiraaɓe luumo e gannci noddira ɗum oko.
Sabo’e ɗi ariyayi un jottoriɗi Laamorɗe Anɗaɓe Oyo ɓe noɗɗiri ɗum Eko daga ɗe ƙarnuwal 16th yaari caka ɗun e ƙarniwal 19th innde Eko tokuɗoɗe un mo ɗun hollini artuuɗo mo awari finnaɗo taawa nyiɓɓuuɗo, Oba Ado; Eko nɗe innɗe leddi ɗe Lagos hannɗe.
Laaos (portugisre ɗe beelel) un innɗe dokkol emo nyiiɓol mo Potugal. Ɗumfu nɗer taariku distinorɗe ɗum ɗe innɗe wuro yaari lambaaji ɗun warri lasgol yoruba kongi joɗɗoriɓe joffoma’en ɗi ariyaaji. Tokkiri ɗum artuugal nyiɓgal eɗe awori noɗɗira ɗi artuɗe diiwal gargol ɗunɗe noɗɗirɗe hakkilo portugal eɗer ƙarniwal 15th.
Mo Potugaal gurtinɗo ruy de sequeire ƙoɗoriiɗo ɗe ɗer aryawol ɗer 1472, tokannɗo ɗe geɓal edaw ɗe gelle lagoɗe curamo, ma’ana weeɗu bellel ɗun curamo. Ɗer artugal ƙarniwal 19th ɓe Britainko’en kabɗi ɗi rachaaki ɗe Atlantic gilootoɓe luumo ɗumɗe hirna Afrik squadron ko kelanntoɓe squadron ɗen eɗun annɗira faago geeso yaari banɗire portugies, America, Francio, e Cuuba luumo tooɓe e yaari ɗi ɗer anti luumotooɓe heɓɓinɗe ɗer hawti hirnare Afrik coastawal mawgol hauti e ɗuuɗuɗi ganshooji thon ɗe tigguki e sembenɗe ɗe fottiɗe hannɗe ɗe hirna Afrik coastal daga sierra leone fuu ɗe ɗatal yaari ɗe nijar delta (hannɗe Naajeeriya) ɗen e fottiiɗe fommbina eɗe congo.
Ɗer 1849, Britanko’en kollini John beeroji consul ɗun ɗe bias ɗun benin e biafra e jonnɗe mo jottori (e yuutirɗe gomnaaku maako ɗun fernando po) haa sai mo mayyi soi’ti ɗer 1854.

Mohammad Haji Ibrahim Egal/adlam:
𞤃𞤮𞤸𞤢𞤥𞥆𞤢𞤣 𞤖𞤢𞤶𞤭 𞤋𞤦𞤪𞤢𞤸𞤭𞤥 𞤉𞤺𞤢𞤤 (𞤅𞤮𞤥𞤢𞥄𞤤𞤭 𞤃𞤢𞤯𞤢𞤥𞤫𞤣 𞤎𞤢𞥄𞤶𞤭 𞤋𞤦𞤪𞤢𞤸𞤭𞤥 𞤉𞤺𞤢𞤤⹁ 𞤀𞤪𞤢𞤦𞤢𞤲𞤳𞤮𞥅𞤪𞤫 𞤷𞤸𞤮𞤤𞤼𞤫 𞥑𞥕⹁ 𞥑𞥙𞥒𞥘 - 𞤃𞤦𞤮𞤴 𞥓⹁ 𞥒𞥐𞥐𞥒) 𞤵𞤲 𞤺𞤭𞤥𞤣𞥆𞤮 𞤷𞤵𞥅𞤦𞥆𞤢𞤤 𞤧𞤮𞤥𞤢𞥄𞤤𞤭 𞤤𞤢𞤼𞥆𞤭𞤣𞤮 𞤢𞤪𞤣𞥆𞤵𞥅𞤶𞤮 𞤤𞤫𞤣𞥆𞤭 𞤧𞤮𞤥𞤢𞥄𞤤 𞥑𞥙𞥙𞥒 𞤴𞤢𞥄𞤪𞤭 𞤸𞤢𞥄 𞤥𞤢𞤴𞤣𞥆𞤫 𞤥𞤢𞥄𞤳𞤮 𞤣𞤮𞤱 𞤢𞤪𞤼𞤵𞥅𞤣𞥆𞤮 𞤺𞤢𞤣𞤣𞥆 𞤬𞤭𞤪𞤢𞤴𞤭𞤥 𞤥𞤭𞤲𞥋𞤮 𞤲𞤣𞥆𞤫𞤪 𞥑𞥙𞥖𞥖𞥐 𞤫 𞤸𞤢𞥄𞤶𞤮𞥅𞤲𞤭 𞤣𞤢𞤺𞤢 𞥑𞥙𞥖𞥗 𞤴𞤢𞥄𞤪𞤭 𞥑𞥙𞥖𞥙.
𞤃𞤢𞤪𞤺𞤮 𞤫 𞤔𞤢𞤲𞥆𞤣𞥆𞤫.
𞤪 𞥑𞥙𞥒𞥘⹁ 𞤲𞤣𞥆𞤫𞤪 𞤌𞤣𞤱𞤢𞤴𞤲𞤫 𞤫 𞤫 𞥀𞤢𞤲𞥆𞤵 𞤦𞥆𞤫 𞤦𞤭𞤪𞤭𞤼𞤫𞥅𞤲𞤳𞤫𞥅𞤶𞤵𞤥 𞤧𞤮𞤥𞤢𞥄𞤤𞤭. 𞤌 𞤶𞤮𞤼𞥆𞤮𞤪𞤢𞤳𞤫 𞤣𞤢𞤺𞤢 𞥀𞤫 𞤋𞤧𞥆𞤢 𞤃𞤵𞤧𞥆𞤫 𞤸𞤫𞤲𞤣𞥆𞤭𞤣𞥆𞤫 𞤸𞤢𞤱𞤼𞤫 𞤫𞤣𞥆𞤫 𞤸𞤢𞤦𞤢𞤪 𞤀𞤱𞤢𞤤 𞤷𞤤𞤢𞤲 𞤣𞥆𞤵𞤲 𞤋𞤧𞤢𞤻. 𞤌𞤼𞤭𞤥𞥆𞤭𞤲𞤢 𞤶𞤢𞤲𞥆𞤣𞤫 𞤪𞤭𞤥𞤢𞤪𞤫 𞤲𞤫𞤪 𞤸𞤭𞥅𞤣𞥆𞤫 𞤄𞤪𞤭𞤼𞤭𞤲𞤳𞤫𞥅𞤶𞤵𞤥 𞤧𞤮𞤥𞤢𞥄𞤤𞤭 𞤫 𞤦𞤫𞥅 𞤧𞤮𞤼𞥆𞤭𞤲 𞤤𞤵𞤧𞤭𞤲𞤭 𞤦𞤭𞤭.

Maayo Ngalda:
Maayo Ngalda mayyo’on wonnda dooforde hagure tigaara/sunngulla je ummatoore ngalda ha feetel laamu fika je wuro yobe noodum wooni hawtibee maayo ngalji je daayigo kilometer 40 daaga woyla. Ndiyam mbeebakeejam mo hitaande 2022 daaga maayo o waadi yimbe noo buru 1000 betokkiri habe ronnginta.

Maimala buni gomnajoo yobe:
Mai Mala Buni moo dayaama eii duubi 1967 yaalde 19 eii lewru 11 o lattake sakaatarejjo cuuɓal APC hooreejo leydi e mulki Muhammadu Buhari, e nder Buni Yadi moo daaya e hukuuma pamarun Gujba e Diiwal Yobe. Hanko ngomnajjo Diiwal Yobe.

Government Day Secondaryy School Bajoga:
Government Day Secondary

Yimɓe Yarbanko'en:
Yimɓe Yarbanko'en ɗum yimɓe njodiɓe haa leddi Naajeeriya bo ɓedon haa fombina leddi Naajeeriya.

Yimɓe Babur:
Yimɓe Babur ɗum yimɓe njodiɓe haa Diiwal Yobe ɓe don gelle hukuuma pamarun Gulani ɓe don boɗwa ɗemngal Babur bo ɓedon njanga njande boko ɓe njande Siilama.

Tarihin fuddudo prime minister e naajeeriya:
Jangugo/Andal.

Abubakar Tafawa balewa:
Abubakar Tafawa Balewa 

Sheikh Tahir Usman Banuchi:
Sheikh Dahiru Usman Bauchi.
Sheikh Tahir usman bauchi (be ɗanyiimou e yalɗe 29 lewru 6 duuɓi 1927) e gelle bytede Nafada Diiwal Gombe hanko Sheikhujo o owody 6ibbe 95 dermabbe bo 77 dursy Al,qurAna denbo, 
O jagordo der lawol (Sheikh Ahmad Tijjani). Denbo O mukaddamijo der lawol Tijjaniya bo der faydadha Sheikh Ibrahim Niass.

Diiwal funaakaye:
DIWAAL FUNAAKAYE.
funakaye ndumn ngelle gonde nder hukuumo famaarun gonmdun nder diiwal gombe. 

Funa-kaye:
Funakaye nɗum gelle gonde nder hukuuma pamarun gonmdun nder Diiwal Gombe. Hukumo maajun maaudun eduun nder Bajooga (headquarter) chaaman mabbe moo njoonii indeemako Alhaji Ibrahim cheldu gomndo les jam iyya APC. 
Funaakaye e woodi juggool ndiyam indeemagol Maayo Gongila (Gongila river) haa e woodi beeli Dadin Kowa ndon wondi e'lesdi yobe e' diiwal borno. 
Funaakaye haa don hauti kabiiluji fulbe. fulfulde ndun wolde ndedun dedun wolwata hakika,nder lesdi funaakaye woodi yimbe hausa,sirati'en , e bolewa. 
Yimɓe gelle Funa-kaye e woodi lenyol Masiihinkeejo seɗɗa. Yimɓe Funa-kaye pasenteeji shaffande jewe nayi e'jewe nayi (99%) mbe julbe. E nder wuusawol Funakaye e woodi ma'adaanuji misaaluji; limestone, gold, gemstone uranium, e ko lutti.

Maayo Aba:
Maayo Aba maayo’on e fombinah Naajeeriya wodon tokka heedi berniiwol Aba, Naajeeriya. Hawtango heedi berniiwol Aba, Aba, Naajeeriya. Hawtango ndiyam jey Maayo Imo. Ndiyam mon don nder okpu-umouba haadeer heartland ngwa yahugo nder wuro Aba.

Maayo Akwayafe:
Maayo Akwayafe (jeebe buri andigo be maayo akpakorum) maayo’e afrika je don ela yahugo maayo filihingo Gine. Maayo man taabiti nukkure feere doukeerol lesdi. Hakkunde Kamerun be Naajeeriya.

Maayo Awbana:
Maayo Awbana wanowul bee oheebi, asiili daga ɗooforde mgbidi, na wuro Imo. Ndiyam don eela ildugol hadeer Weendu Oguta.

Maayo Benuwe:
Maayo Benuwe ko benuine ma Binuinair,  o woodi darnde kiilomita 1,400 fuudda omo daga hooseere Adamawa, e ledde Kamerun yahugo maayo man Niiser e berniiwol Lokoja. Feetel man walooji kanjim’on maayoji Faro, Gonngola be boo Maayo Kebbi.
O tokki nder berniiji Garwa (Kamerun), Ƴola (Naajeeriya) be bo Makurɗi

Janngirde Holmark:
Janngirde Hallmark Janngirde mawde jottoriide nder Ijebu- Itele, diiwal Ogun ɗun lesdi Naajeeriya.

Maayo Buraas:
Maayo Buraas gootel nder lishe maayo man nun, den boo liise mo maayo Nja, ha nukkare Nayja Delta e Naajeeriya. Hadeer ƙarnuwal mo 19 maayo man de ɗum waadi laawul boongol je luumo, je arande gam hoorbeboo daaga baalnoje, dibinooje yabbam keechab maayo Buraas innde cekkugo nyabban haa dow maayo man.
Innde.
Innde man Brass (o Yuroopu) noobe bi’e be waadi mo guureji koota/hondiko maayo nembe gaama bedon saaura jaawe boodeje bee neetunes gaam naafuuda mabbe ha’iyuufiigo lamdam. 
“Brass ijo” faat leñol ija’en daaga cape Formosa yahugo maayo man santa Barbara.
Be huutindiri bee innde man feere gaam gure’en twon dow maayo Brass, datal yahugo berniwol mango nember hader. Hader hitaande 1884 be 1886 narral “Brass” bedon wolina dow wuro nembe. Bedon yauna boo maayo Brass rio bento, koo maayo st. john.
Balal.
Maayo Buraas liisal, koo seendigo mo maayo nun, je elaata yahugo hiirnaa. Maayo nun kanko hoore maako yahugo yeesu maayo ne ja’en je seendiri yahugo maayo nun bee forcados baana 32 kiilomita (20 MI) lesde daaga Aboh. Brass don wakkere fuunaa mo nun e yenago boo don’ela yahugo fommbina gaam burtingo yahugo GULE Gine. Fellel elaaginol ndiyam mo maayo inde bee noo woodi ha elaagwol ndiyam bee dardee buuri duudugo e inakkere man je baabalji bee caaka. Bee ittigo ha feere-feere haintungo be boo wooni bee non ndiyam wooni.

Maayo Donnga:
Maayo Donnga maayo’on ha Naajeeriya be Kamerun. Maayo’on o’ummoi diga nukkure Piilato jey Mambilla jey wooni ha fuuna Naajeeriya, noodum wooni nukkure feere je keerol lesde be liddi hakkunde Naajeeriya be Kamerun bo ɗum tokki woyla waaladu hiirnaa hawtube Maayo Benuwe e Naajeeriya. Maayo Donnga o woodi 20,000 sukuya kiilomita (7,700 59 ml) hader felle man. Ha raageere man kombi maayo man. Benuwe maayo o woodi 1800 cubic metres (4,000 cu ft) je ndiyam didbina go’o.
E wuro Taraba, Naajeeriya woodi ladde taati, baissa, Amboi bee maayo Bissaula, e nder maayo Donnga. Be don waali dow dirrtingo bee boo les hairee Mambilla, fombina waaldu hiirnaa be Ladde Gashaka Gumti.

Sheikh Ahmad Tijjani:
Sheikh Ahmad Tijjani (Ra)..
Sheikh Ahmad Tijjani. Un dayiimou e lesdi Algeria🇩🇿 gelle bytede (Ainamadi abu-sangum shallala) Un ɗanyiimou e duuɓi  (1735 - 1815).
Denmbo o dursy Alqur'ana odon dubi juiididi (7) denbo, ko Oyara dubi (21) kala ilmufu dun dereji kam ohauti.
Hanko wonte jagordo lawol (Tijjaniya).
Bo Omodibbo Modibbe.

Maayo Benin:
Maayo Benin maayo’on tokkije fommbina waladuu hiirnaa Naajeeriya.
Maayo man don fuudda be inde "Ethiope" e fommbina bee waaladu fuuna wuuro Diiwal Edo diga baalno don o tokki der guure be guureedi feere-feere bana Umutu, Owah Abbi, Obiaruku, Abraka, Igun watershed, maral idjerhe, Sapele mosogar bee koko. Badidum bee sapele ethopia oyeehi yeesu bee naastugo nder Benin. Diga haa do maayo o yajjini yahugo ha fellel feetelboo don’eelaa yahugo maayo filitingo Guinea.
Maayo Benin nukkure feere je lisal mo Nijarmaayo didi. Don haluti be feere maayo duddum.

Maayo Ekulu:
Maayo Ekulu o woodi 25 kiilometa (16 ml) maayo’on juddum boo ndiyam jeburi mawnugo hader berniiwoll Enugu jey wooni fombina waaladu fuunaa Naajeeriya boodum heebi asiili daaga wuro gootel bo.

Sheik Tahir Usman Bauchi:
Sheikh Dahiru Usman Bauchi.
( o ndayama alarba diidii a lewru almuharram hijriyya 1356 28 June hiitade 1927 e gelle nafada nder Diiwal Gombe). Gelle nafada e duubii 6awo don nder Diiwal Bauchi bako Gombe heba latto Diiwal feere. Owodi dubii 98, Alh Goni Usmanu hanko yiite ndayoomako (Father), Hajiya Maryamu hanko yiite inna mako (mother). o njangi debteree Qur'aanaa hoje Baba mako Alh Usman. O lattake modibbo mawdo andaado e duniyaru dow dursugo Qur'aanaa be tafsiiri Qur'aanaa. Owodi malamjo mako maudo moyiiete Sheik Ibrahim Inyass Kaulah O wodi bacci ko buri 70 dursube Qur'aanaa, taaniraabe (grandchildren) ko buri 200 dursube Qur'aanaa. Odon nder jagorbe sha'ani dariqa sufanko'en (Sufism) e lesdii Naajeeriya. Kuugal mako andaagal dun njangingo debteree njaimiraawo Allah (Qur'aanaa) be hollugow lawol sufanko'en enta bo njanginkii debte babbe. Odon njodi e Bauchi, Diiwal Bauchi odon boh wada tafsiri Qur'aanaa nder lewru donka (Ramadana) e gelle Kaduna, Diiwal Kaduna hiitade faat. Jotta dungu 2023 owadi dubii 73 e fuddugo tafsirii Qur'aanaa
Gelle nafada e duubii 6awo don nder Diiwal Bauchi bako Gombe heba latto Diiwal feere. Owodi dubii 98, Alh Goni Usmanu hanko yiite ndayoomako (Father), Hajiya Maryamu hanko yiite inna mako (mother). o njangi debteree Qur'aanaa hoje Baba mako Alh Usman. O Fullo lattido modibbo mawdo andaado e duniyaru dow dursugo Qur'aanaa be tafsiiri Qur'aanaa. Owodi malamjo mako maudo moyiiete Sheik Ibrahim Inyass Kaulah O wodi bacci ko buri 70 dursube Qur'aanaa, taaniraabe (grandchildren) ko buri 200 dursube Qur'aanaa. Odon nder jagorbe sha'ani dariqa sufanko'en (Sufism) e lesdii Naajeeriya. Kuugal mako andaagal dun njangingo debteree njaimiraawo Allah (Qur'aanaa) be hollugow lawol sufanko'en enta bo njanginkii debte babbe. Odon njodi e Bauchi, Diiwal Bauchi odon boh wada tafsiri Qur'aanaa nder lewru donka (Ramadana) e gelle Kaduna, Diiwal Kaduna hiitade faat. Jotta dungu 2023 owadi dubii 73 e fuddugo tafsirii Qur'aanaa

Maayo Escravos:
Maayo escravos maayo feere wooni ha fommbina Naajeeriya. Escravos “kalimawol je lesdi Portugaal jee numaata hoorbe boo nukkure gootel man diga nder maaude jaaburaje filu hoorbe hakkunde Naajeeriya bee America ha karnuwol je 18. Maayo escravos liisal mo maayo neja don elaa je dared kiilomita 57(35 ml), don diina ha Bight of Benin jegulf of Guinea hadum elaata yahugo maayo filtiingo Atalantika.
Chevron laawaandu mando nyebbam je America o wood, fellel maanga be irtaata nyebbam e Naajeeriya ha hoondiko maayo escravos.
Dum haabe muftata woodon hoosako obibarrel 460,000 barrels yaaloma (73,000 m3/d) yaaloma faat.

Maayo Faaro:
Maayo Faaro maayo’on dared kiilomita 310 (metres 190) je tokki dow keerol Naajeeriya be Kamerun haa Afrika. Dooforde don dow Piilato, Adamawa, je wooni fommbina waladu fuunaa ngaoundere. Feere wolawul je maayo Benuwe be hawti haa dow keerol.

Sheikh Ahmad Aliyu Abulfathi:
Sheikh Ahmad Aliyu Abulfathi (Ra) Omodibbo mawdo der lesdi Naajeeriya🇳🇬 , denbo ojodake ojanginy e Niijeer🇳🇪 , e chad🇹🇩 , e senegal🇸🇳 , Ojangini modibbe dwbbe e Naajeeriya
Denbo ojagordo der lawol (Tijjaniya) un dayiimo e duuɓi (1919 - 2003) = 84.
Oneddo gelle byteɗe Konduga e diiwal Borno Naajeeriya🇳🇬..

Wawa:
Wawa ɗum gelle godde wonte Wawa e nder Diiwal Gombe les les Funakaye hirna waylare Bajoga, to a ɗon nana gelle Wawa, dun gelle marbe ardiibe worbe mawbe, be godi wodi wa, ilbe marbe sirruji, gargajiyaji hanjun waddi be andi sirruji babaji'en enta kakaji'en har dun waddibe be andi lakumji ɗuuɗɗi, har wali weti toni awari awari a irti bundu e gelle Wawa ndu waddata ndiyam ngada ngada, haba haba wallahi ndu waddata ndiyam, no ngattafu ahebata dam hande hundenden wadi ba dubi (150) temerre enta reta gelle Wawa wala ndiyam, sayto be njahi gelle wuttudu ba birin bolewa kobo biri fulbe da bekeba ndiyam, ammanabo dam wala nder gelle mabbe kam, to say Allah hoynu minonkam min bi ata, jaymirawo wadda nabe kaydum Amin.

Muhammad Goje Danjuma:
Muhammed Danjuma Goje (o ndayimo yalde saffo (10) lewru Oktooba hitaande 1952) e gelle Pindiga nder Diiwal Gombe. Hanko latti ngomnaajo shubtado daga hitaande 2003 yaari 2011 e Diiwal Gombe, o jogake ministaajo dow diiwe hitaande 1999 yaari 2003 les ngomnati Olusegun Obasanjo lattido ardiido/horeejo leydi Naajeeriya e 1999 yaarii 2003. Danjuma Goje ɗum juldo Hawsaajo gimɗo cuuɓi Naajeeriya. E mo ɓaga Hajiya Yelwa bi Diiwal Gombe. Nden bow hanko dun senatajoo  shubtado wakiiliijoo Diiwal Gombe ta shaka (Gombe Central) diga ndungu 2011 yaarii 2023. O darake sha'ani siyaasa Naajeeriya e les Jam'iyyaji PDP enta APC. Dubi (years) makoo 70 owon bacci (children). 
O njangi ilmu siyaasa (Political Science) e jamii'awa Ahmadu Bello nga Zaria (Ahmadu Bello University).
o medi lattaki sakatareejoo (secretary) dow njande bincikeeji ilmu likitaa'en duun lesdii Naajeeriya (National institute for medical research) e gelle Yaba Diiwal Legos.  Ejoonii doo hanko won Senataajo shubtado wakiiliijoo Diiwal Gombe ta shaaka (Gombe Central) dun beddi showbtuki mo karoo re nayaure (fourth time).
O njangi ilmu siyaasa (Political Science) e jamii'awa Ahmadu Bello nga Zaria (Ahmadu Bello University).
O medi lattaki sakatareejoo (secretary) dow njande bincikeeji ilmu likitaa'en duun lesdii Naajeeriya (National institute for medical research) e gelle Yaba Diiwal Legos. Ejoonii doo hanko won Senataajo shubtado wakiiliijoo Diiwal Gombe ta shaaka (Gombe Central) dun beddi showbtuki mo karoo re nayaure (fourth time).

Fatuta Djau bade:
Fatutamata Djau baldekanko'on woni ministajo sungullaji yaaci ader leddi Gini-bisaawo saide6e wailitima ha leuru September hitadde 2003.O jangi nder lede duddum ha garmarnama leddi Gini-Bisaawo.

Sheikh Imam Hassan Cisse:
Sheikh Imam Hassan Cisse (Ra).
Sheikh Imam Hassan Cisse (Ra) un dayiimo (4/12/1945 -2008), udon der bolwobe mawbe e der lawol (Tijjaniya). Olattake jagordo der dina islama gurtoyii do daga hirna lesdy Africa. taanu donudo Sheikh Ibrahim Niass (Ra), Sheikh Ibrahim Niass rokkimo (chief imam) e julirde mako gonde Madinatu Koulack e lesdy senegal🇸🇳.
Sheikh Hassan o modibbo kewtudo bo ojagordo (ruhi). den bo ohebii (cikekken horo) e ilmu dina islama de (gargajiya) hawtii e : Alkur'ana e tafsirimare (tafsiri), hadisije de Annabijo Muhammadu s.a.w (hadisi) e tarihi (seerah), fikihu e (fikihu e usul), adabi (adab), e mantoji (gimi)  shi'r), nahawu (nahw), e Sufanci (tasawwuf).  Bawo odursii kur'an ederdubi seddaji e lesdy Mauritaniya, ohebii ilimi duddun e lesdy Senegal🇸🇳  e les hakkilanki Shaihu Ibrahim Niasse, gondo e Diiwal Kaolack lesdy Senegal, wobbe mawbe modibbe ha Senegal, wobbe Mauritania, Nigeria, denbo hauti e ndayoo mako, Sidi Ali Cisse, e fuledebbo mako, Sayyida Fatima Zahra Niasse.  

Sheikh Aliyu Cisse:
Sheikh Aliyu Cisse (Ra).
Sayyid AliCisse (1905 - 1981), osobajo bo odonudo, Sheikh Ibrahim Niass (khalifa), denbo obagi Fatima Zahra Niasse, bii Sheikh Ibrahim Niass mawdo. Undon hammo (zuriiya Cisse ) don der modibbe hibbe, modibbe islama e hiirna Africa. 
Biđđo debbo nbe Shaikhul Islam Ibrahim (Baye) Niass.  Fatimah Zahra, odursuđo Al-Qurana, o6agi (khadimijo, almajirijo mako) Shaykh Sayid Ali Cisse har yaki kerol duuɓi mako di owadi 80.
Kambe wonte danyobe : Shaykh Hassan Cisse, Shaykh Tijani Cisse da Shaykh Muhamadou Mahy Cisse.

Gombe State University:
Janngirde diiwal Gombe (Jaami'awaa Diiwal Gombe).
(Jaami'awaa Diiwal Gombe).
Njangirde jamii'awa Diiwal Gombe ngadon haa fattude tudun wada nder shaamakii eder gelle Gombe, nder Diiwal Gombe e lesdii Naajeeriya. Dun omtiiga hiitaade 2003 les gomnaty Muhammed Danjuma Goje hanko'owoni gomnaajo e wakkaciiree maai. Professor Abdullahi Mahadi hanko'owoni jagordo njangirde den arandeejoo, gada mako wodi membaa'en (members) njangirde den enta modibbe njangino be njandeejii ilmu fannoji duddii (various field). Jaami'awaa ngan wodi fannoji ilmu jaygo'o (6), ilmu fasahaaji zamanow(Science), ilmu maaganijii(pharmacy), ilmu shari'aajii (Law), ilmu likitankow'en (medical), ilmu njandeejii (education) be ilmu social science. Dun omtiiga dow ngawada ga nafuki ummatoree Diiwal Gombe yaarii lesdii Naajeeriya faat hoje ittauki almajiri en njangu beh njande nbonde. Kyla hautudo njande edon faat hebai ilmu beh tarbiyaa njode nder ummatoree downiyaru. 
Professor Abdullahi Mahadi hanko'owoni jagordo arandeejoo e njangirde den bawoo mako Professor Ibrahim Umar Musa hanko ronii mo sai bo Professor Aliyu Umar Elnafaty hanko'owoni jagordo jotta nder dowbii dii (present years). Jaami'awaa ngan wodi baba sowdu'en (Chancellors), ngadon boh njangina dow darsowji fannoji ilmu njandeejii masiin. Lattaki mbaga nga Diiwal Gombe shede nastowky mbaga sedda(low tuition fee) enta boh felle jypporde almaajiri'en gaytide (enough accommodation). Dun don njanga degree, be degree diidajum (masters degree) yaarii degree tatarjum (PhD). 
Njangirde den woodii fellere resowgow debte be njande (library) gaytidum kooshoojum debte ko bowrii ujunaijee 52, 000 nder njangirde den. 
Njangirde den julbee e heeferbeh fow don nasta ndee (Muslim and Christian), kaabila'en, hausanko'en, fulɓe, eko lutti faat.

Boko haram:
boko haram ayobe boko haram bewunny sosay bewary badeamyn bennagy yayaam bedylly bemako betaffymo sosai sedebe nnesy bagomo

Jaami'awa Lesdii Naajeeriya nga gelle Kashere.:
Federal University Of Kashere (Jaami'awaa Lesdii Naajeeriya nga gelle Kashere)..
Njangirde jamii'awa lesdii Naajeeriya ngonga gelle Kashere e pindiga, Akko LGA e Diiwal Gombe wayla ta fowna (Northeast) lesdii Naajeeriya lattake Jaami'awaa ngota tan nga lesdii Naajeeriya ngonga e Diiwal Gombe. Dun omtiiga hiitaade 2010 les gomnaty Goodluck Ebele Jonathan hanko'owoni jagordo lesdii Naajeeriya koden, ]Danjuma Goje] boh hanko'owoni gomnaajo e ]]Diiwal Gombe]] wakkaciiree maai. Professor Mohammed Kabiru Faruk hanko'owoni jagordo arandeejoo e njangirde den, bawo makoo Professor Muhammad Alhassan Gani hankow latti roonowdo Kabiru Faruk, nden boh sai Professor Umar Pate hanko'owoni jagordo e jotta nder dowbii dii (present year). 
Dun omtiiga be anniyya duddingo ilmu enta yaajukiy ilmu nder ummatoree Diiwal Gombe e lesdii Naajeeriya faat, gam ummatoree julbe e heeferbeh/masinko'en fow heba ilmu njandeejii masiin. Ngawon tsangayaji (Faculties) njande jaygo'o (6); tsangayaji ilmowjii (Education), tsangayaji ndeemal (Agriculture), tsangayaji humanities, tsangayaji social science, tsangayaji kiimiyyajii (science), tsangayaji hakkilangow kiimiyyajii (management science). 
Ngawon Fellere resugow debte (library), enta njangirde njandeejii degree diidajum (masters degree) e tatarjum (PhD). 

Buba Yero Gombe:
Buba Yero Gombe.
Abubakar bii Usman Subande indee maako, Duun andiimow be Buba Yero o ndayaama e 1762 yaarii 1841 o sowty (died). Hanko'owoni laamiido arandeejoo e Diiwal Gombe, hanko boh jogy modibbo Gombe. Hanko'owoni ndeddo bii adama fuddudo laamowkii Diiwal Gombe. Hanko fuddi wanginki/waddukii laawol laamowkii Diiwal Gombe hiitaade 1804. Odon nder tokkotoo be jagordo fullo mujaddadiijo Shehu Usman bii Fodio wakkaciiree maai. 

TARIHI YOBE STATE UNIVERSITY:
"TAARIHI JANNGIRDE MAWƊE DIIWAL YOBE 
"Janngirde diiwal yobe, dumn jaangirde mbe woonde nder diiwal Yobe, Naajeeriya. Jaangirde nden nde Nyibama e'les diiwal Laamuuji yobe e' duumngu 2006 e' Les ardungal Alhaji Bukar Abba Ibrahim 

Janngirde Mawɗe Diiwal Yobe:
Janngirde Mawɗe e Diiwal Yobe e ɗe jottori nder Damaturu laamorde Diiwal Yobe, Naajeeriya. Ɗum ɗon tiggi ngal les nde Shari'a nder 2006 heɓeende Alh. Bukar Abba Ibrahim, hooreejo ngomnaajo diiwal Yobe (1999 - 2007.
Programmji.
Janngirde mawde diiwal Yobe maɓɓita ekkita kosji feere-feere fof timminɓe e saaliiɓe darnɗe.Ndi timminɓe mbi'a graduate eɗon maɓɓita kosji haa janngirde nden nden e mbi'a ɓe postgraduate diploma, masters e PHD. 
Maugu jannɗe ɗin hiisaa haa limgal ɗo'o.
Janngirde mawde diiwal Yobe caggal janngooɓe Yeeso.

PhD. Arabic (4 semesters)

PGD Education (2 semesters)

Tijjaniyyah:
Tijjaniyyah.
Tijjaniyyah (Larabci: الطريقة التجانية,romanized: Al-Ṭarīqah al-Tijjaniyyah, lawol Tijjanī') hangol won Tariqa Sufanko en (tsari, tafarki), keboiigol asali daga (Maghreb) (mafi yaɗuwa) e Afirka, musamman e hirna Afirka Gambia🇬🇲, Mauritania🇲🇷, Mali🇲🇱, Guinea🇬🇳, Niger🇳🇪, Chad🇹🇩, Ghana🇬🇭, woiyiila e fombina-hirna Nigeria🇳🇬 e Sudan.  nun wodi Tijjaniyyah denbo wodi e Diiwal Kerala India🇮🇳. 
Kowonte der Tijjaniya dum kanjun wiite : laziimy biinby e laziimy asira denbo e waziifa e zikiri jummare, Kanju wiite Tijjaniyyah. Kowoni der laziimy bo Astagfirullah temerre (100), e Salatu Annabijo s.a.w temerre (100), e La'ilaha illallahu temerre 100. Kanjun wonte der laziimy biiny e asira.
Kowonte der wazifabo : (Astagafirullah-Allalimallazi-lailahaillahuwalhayyul-qaiyum) (30) den salatu Annabijo s.a.w (50) La'ilaha illallah (100) e jauharatul kamali 12.
Den zikiri jummare bo undon wađa (Astagafirullah-Allalimallazi-lailahaillahuwalhayyul-qaiyum) tati (3)
Salatul fatihy (3) den la'ilaha illallahu ha wakkati noddiinky magariiba.

Ardido gelle gombe:
ardydo gelle gombe" muhammadu inuwa yahaya moaardake duby nnay jesaly 2019 mowaddy 2023 allah hukkymo nasara mozarcy Allah wallomo jogade be goga Allah yofu Jude mako hadow alumamako Allah wada yinbe Nana beldon mako bano moardy jesasaly Amin

Abubakar Hashidu Habu Gombe:
Abubakar Habu Hashidu Gombe.
(Un ndayiimoo 10 April, 1944) duun bii Diiwal Gombe gimdo siyasajo Naajeeriya. O medii wadgo gomnaajo Diiwal Gombe diiga 1999 yaarii 2003 les Jam'iyya siyaasa Naajeeriya ka All people's party (APP). 
Wakkaciiree jagordown sooja'en les arrdoogal Gen. Ibrahim Badamasi Babangida, hanko'owoni o jogake ministaajow ndiiyam (water) e ministaajow demal be wo'iingo gureejii (Agriculture and rural development). Hanko'owoni gomnaajo shubtado jagordo Diiwal Gombe arandeejoo diga hiitaade 1999 yaarii 2003 , be walloowomow ardugal mo indee Joshua Lidani. O besdi wangiinki anniya makoo ka daraaki gomnaajo e hiitaade 2003 les Jam'iyya siyaasa Naajeeriya ka APP saini ohebai nasaraaku. Nden boh o besdi wangiinki anniya makoo e 2007 les Jam'iyya siyaasa Naajeeriya ka DPP o beddi do'aakii (failed). 
Duun nnangii mo (arrested) e lewru tatauru (March 2007) dow ownmingo haure/kabee wakkaci o wowrty tebgo ummatoree (campaign) siyaasa maakoo a 2007. Ummatoree wonbee baawo makoo hebbini yolde kootuwa magistrate e nodda ndow duun yoofamo . Hashidu soyty (died) nder woowro makoo nyandeere 27 July, 2018.

Laamorde Gombe:
Laamorde Diiwal Gombe ɗuun tiggi ndii hiitaade 1804 wakkaciiree jagorɗown Abubakar Usman Subande (Buba Yero) lattiɗoo tokkotoo ɗoo fullo mujaddadiijo Shehu Usmanu bii Fodio Buba Yero lattinii Gombe Abba dow hedkootamako gam habdoowkii (fight) e kaabila'en Jakun yiimbee pindiga e Kalam, nɗen boh o tokkooyii har laawol Diiwal Adamawa ngaɗaa maayoo Diiwal Benuwe. Lesdee (lands) lowttowɗee boh mbingel maakoo habdii e maɓɓe hanko boh njogiidee, mo indee Muhammadu Kwairanga hanko'owoni laamiiɗo Diiwal Gombe hiitaade 1844 yaarii 1882. Laamorde Diiwal Gombe wakkaciiree wondee fowɗɗoi diiga Gombe Abba yaarii har jaalingo, amman boh a hiitaade 1833 ɗuun waddii laamoow Muri gam ɗuun tigga Diiwal gam baandoow laamiido on.
Wakkaciiree arɗuugal laamiɗo Zailani hitaande (1882 yaarii 1888) woodii modibbo gonɗaa yiite Jibril Gaini hanko'owoni tiggowɗoo hoore maako laamɗo hankowdee Gombe e Fika gam o haaɓa e Laamorde Gombe e keddo'en, seynii boo a hiitaade 1902 towranko'en (British) farrtiimo ndiga nnokkoree maai. Towranko'en japtii Laamorɗe Gombe e fottal gaɗoowgal e gelle Tongo hiitaade 1902. Nden boh ɓe wuitiinoi Capitaal Gombe gelle Nafada hiitaade 1913, ɓe ɓesdii wuitiingo Capitaal ɗuun gelle Gombe Doma hiitaade 1919. Kaabila'en Waja hendiitaama diiga Gombe hiitaade 1930 ɓe showbi bandow laamiiɗo saaliiɗo Umaru ɓii Muhammadu dowwn hanko laamoto ɓe hamɓɓe kaabila'en Waja. 
Baawo Dilligo Towranko'en (after colonial era).
Towranko'en tiggi laawol ardaakii Laamorɗe (Native Authority System) boh ɗuun tabbiti har ɓaawo hebgo indiipendeence 1960. E hiitaade 1976 les ardoogal sooja'en gomnaty Olusegun Obasanjo o feshshii (broke) laawol ngol towranko'en tiggi, o wartinii laamowgown wuroojii tati (3), Laamorɗe Gombe, Laamorɗe Dukku e Laamorɗe Akko. Hiitaade 2002 les ardoogal Abubakar Hashidu Habu o ɓesdii feshshowkii Laamorɗe nden, ɓaawo don Muhammad Danjuma Goje tiggi Laamiiɓe ɗiiɗo (2) mɓauɓe gam owstooky kaaɓe/haowreeji (reduce conflict). 
Al'aadaajii (Culture).
Laamorɗe Gombe handee yiite hedkoota Laamorɗe Diiwal Gombe faat, Alh Shehu Abubakar bii Usmanu lattiɗoo Laamiiɗo Gombe diga 1984 2014 hanko won laamiido saffoojoo (10th), hanko fuɗɗi mahowgo Laamorɗe nden wartyniide nde jamanuu e maheeje (buildings)bodde masiin foodooje hakkillojii duniyaaru.
Ɗenmgal.
Laamorɗe Diiwal Gombe nde won kaabilaajii ɗuɗɗi amman bo Fulfulde hande woni ɓawɗe (Major). 
Luumo.
Fulɓe ndurooɓe, e remooɓe hamɓe ɓuri ɗuuɗugo. Hiitaade 1930 fulbe waanshowɓe njooɗake a fombbinaa Gombe (Gombe South) eɓe ngaɗa luuɓee eɓe ndema eɓe nduraa dabbaajii. Luumo kareejii ndeemal (Agriculture) e Diiwal Gombe ɗon besdana diiwal ngan shede nastowky. 
Ngabban julde/hawan sallah (Festival).
Laamorɗe Diiwal Gombe ɗon waɗa ngabbal Durbi ngal waɗata foow Laamorɗe diiwal e 19 ɗe lesdi Naajeeriya e wayla (North) e julde soowmayee (end of fasting). 
Ñyamndu.
Laamorɗe nden andaama be wadgo biriiji (groundnuts), liꞌeeje, mowrii, e samarooje (leemu, funkallooji, ñƴebbe).

Habaru adou Fika daga nijeeriiyaa:
Habaru adou laamoorde Fika daga Nijeeriya,be ummoyi gada diwal kautudi aborno hakkude maayuu gongolago fombina kumadugu Ghana ta woila.Laamordeden dewodi inaaje baanoni dejaajiirii duubi 1669 (square miles) joonii bekendiide ha nukkuje juwii(5)indemaji banonihi:-FIKA,NGEJI,GOYA,POTISKUM,MAMODO A NAGERE.Wodi Kobe buri huutirkii akaya demal:faseeji,nbayeerii,a 'yiiri geroori,abedema hottollo ngambekeba sheede.fulbe laamordeden bedon nduraa naii,a baalii,a beii, Gam dumheba kuusel,a koosam, anebban.

Na'a-Na'a:
Na'a-Na'a.
Na’a-na’a ɗun awre wonde de barka wadda ya (shahara) e nahiya Turanko en, Afirka, Asia, Australia, e America ta waiila, e ɗun nafata emaajun e matsayin kaya Urɗun e maganiji gargajiya bo musamman e der shayi. Bafe na’a-na’a ɗun kesshun bo Uruɗum  feunojun ɓerde e kala jarɗofu.
Na’a-na’a wodi sinadarin ‘minti’ (wato ‘menthol’) pewnojun ɓerde e jamun kaitudum ɗun ɓi adama. Unɗon naftiro e na’a-na’a wajen sarrafaki  kayaji ɗisodeten en gaddana wuro irin nebbam lotuki nƴiƴe, sabuluje, nebbam wujaki.

Juulirde:
Juulirde ɗum fellere wadgo ibaada ummatoore juulɓe. (ɗemngal Aarabre ɗon nɗodda nde "Masjid (مسجد)", Hawsare boo "Masallaci", inƴaamuranko'en boo "úlo alakuba" , yarbanko'en boo "Mọ́ṣáláṣí") Ɗum fellere mahaade, ɓaɓɓiide, ƴaajownde, laɓɓiniyde gam julɓe waɗa ibaadaji ɓaɓɓe. Ɗuun ɗon mahaade feeshinde be mihrab kolloojum kiblawol gelle makka, be minbar hoje wadgo khudba julki jummare, won felle wadgo ɲɲagarɗam (ablution), fellere worɓe e rowɓe handiitaama, ɗuun ɗon njanga debte diina islaama nder maaje, ɗuun ɗon waɗa shari'a enta boo habɓugow ɓawle (marriage), be wadgo juulɗe mayɗo (julki janaaza).
Taarihi Juulirde.
Ɗuun fuɗɗi mahowgo julurde e zamanow Annabijo Muhammad SAW e gelle hijaz hankowde makka e madina hiitaade wadgo hijra diiga Makka yaaki madina(662 CE) innde maare masjid qow'bao. Modiɓɓe woɓɓe boh ngii julurde kaa'aba hande won julurde aranndeere mahaade jowngo Annabijo Allah Ibraahim AS lattide ejotta innde julurde haraami (Masjidul Haram Mecca), sai jowlowrde gelle gowdows (jerusalem) hande won ɗiɗaure (second). Annabijo Muhammad SAW maahi julurde ɗiɗaure e gelle madina nde innde masjid An-Nabawy. Ɗuun mahiide ndewon mihrab e minbar banoo ɗown watta julurde zamanow jotta (present years). 
Laaɓe ndongidirkii jowlowrde (Rules of governing ).
Ɗum innai jagordo lattiɗoo andowɗo njangowɗo diina dow ardaaki jowlɗe (Imam), ɗuun nastai julurɗe e kolte (clothes) laɓɗe nden boh ɗuun ɲɲangai(ablution) bakoo ɗuun joowla. Lattaki fellere wadgo ibaada ɗuun ƴiɗa ɗowɗɗingo haala, ɗuun saltaako yeeso jowlowo, ɗuun ɗon haɗa wadgo kolte jayɗe bindi eko ɲandi, wala wadgo photoji (pictures). 

Juulɓe:
Juulɓe yimɓe ɓiɓɓe aadama tokkooɓe diina Njuuldamku (Lislaama) diina Annabijo Allah Ibiraahima (Aalayhissalam) ɗuun hamɓe ƴiite jowlɓe. Neɗɗo goto hanko ƴi'ete jowlɗo, to ɓuri goto hamɓe ƴiite jowlɓe. Jowlɗo hanko tabbitinii arkaanowjii diina jowldanku Islama jooyii (5) kanjii woonii ɗoo: 
1. Sheedakii waala moɗown rewoowta ba Allah njaimiraawo boh Annabijo Allah Muhammadu ɗow jeyaaɗo maako.(أشهد أن لا إله إلا الله وأشهد أن محمداً رسول الله)2.) 
2. Darnuki jowlɗe joƴ (5) e ƴandeere. 
3. Soowmayee lewru ramadaana. 
4. Yahowkii koowgal hijjow sowdow Allah, mo Allah homtany lawol. 
5. Ittuki zakka 
Juulɓe njogii debtere Qur'aanaa (Holy Book) e dow wadgo diina ɓaɓɓe, hande ɓe ngara juulɗe ɓaɓɓe, hande ɓe ngara fuu ibaadaji ɓaɓɓe gamma hande wondii liilal Allah njaimiraawo nder ɓaree ɓe kefta kila kofe tefata faat, hande ɗuun jiffinani lilaɗo Allah njaimiraawo Annabijo Muhammad (SAW). Juulɓe ɗon tokkoo ɓawo/lawol Annabijo ɓaɓɓe (Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam).
Adaadu juulɓe e duniyaaru.
E hiitaade 2020 ɗown ƴi julɓe njaari 1.9b (biliƴon 1.9), ɓe kooshii 24.9% (percentage) e nder ƴimɓe duniyaaru (out of 100%). 
Juulɓe e dunngal Afirika won 45%, Aasiya be oceania 25%, Yuroopu 6%. 
Fellere Aasiya ta foonbina (Pakistan, Inndia be Bangladesh) ɗon hooƴa adadii 31% juulɓe duniyaaru. Indonesia hamɓe ƴiite ɓuri adaadu juulɓe e pasenteej (percentage) (12.7%), Pakistan won (11.0%), Bangladesh won (9.2%), Naajeeriya won (5.3%), Egypt (4.9%). Yaarii 20% juulɓe ɗon lesɗe duniyaaru ta shaka be Afrika ta wayla (Middle East and North Africa) Diina juldanku kanjowm ɓuri diinajii faat ɓawnowkii e downiyaaroow. 
Lesɗe downiyaaroow ɗee ngala julɓe masin hamɓe ƴiite; India, China, Ethopia, the america, australia be felle goɗɗe e eowroopaa (europe). Julɓe Sunni yaarii 70-90%, shia boh yaarii 10-20% se Ahmadiyya en won 1%.

Mu'azu Muhammad Kwayranga:
Wade lamido Funakaye Mu'azu Muh'd Kwayranga tatabo 111, 
Hande lebbi jewego e soytuki lamido Funakaye nyande asawe bawo juluki insha'i husham njamdi jewenayi 09:00jemma 28/8/22.
Sardere lamido Funakaye barkantejou mo yajjitatakou mo jeyi yonki , lamido mo hokkitorowou hanjun waddi ko moyejou nder ummatore yidimo, nda jalanki bacchi enta mowbe, nda ngillaku, hanjun foodanomo yidde yimbe.
Ko ngyande Lamido soytatama mo notake noddandu ndudun gayyimo e nder gelle Gombe hanko enta ministajou hautande professajou Isa Ali Fantami harbe ngecchindiri halaji maudi be kendiri, min ngadanimo do'a Jaymirawo hinnumo faranomo ameen.

Habaru edou modibbo maudo o o barado mo lesdi gombe:
To jama are miyidi hokkuki habaru edou modibbo shehujo barado eh Mulki Jonathan mo wata de balde nde,I Amma,mo jodido lesdi Nigeria jiha gombe,hanjoon gombe duun eduun wada eh jiha yobe iyaka ta woila ta fombina bo gombe duun eduun wada jiha Adamawa Amma ta fombina jama are bari mi daro do o Tau..

Lamido gombe:
Lamido Gombe hanko e lamido funakaye be gady swlhu hakkude Gombe e funakaye'bakonnto Allah maynnamo duby walannarrwgo 'hakkwde gellemann Amma Jonny Allah waddy nnarral hakkwde mabbe Allah bedda hawtego koe lamibe aminn

Goodluck Ebele Azikiwe Jonathan:
Goodluck Ebele Azikiwe Jonathan (o ndannya 20 November hiitaade 1956) O ɓi Diiwal Bayelsa lesdi Naajeeriya gimɗo siyaasajo Naajeeriya. O ɓagi Dame patience Jonathan, e ɓe goodi bacci ɗiɗi Ariwera(gorko) e Aruabai (debbo). Innde ndayooɓe maako Lawrence Ebele (baba maako) gimɗo wadgo jirgwal ndiyam, e Eunice Ayi Ebele Jonathan (inna maako) gimɗo ndemal. O meɗi lattaki jagordo lattiɗoo ardiiɗoo lesdii Naajeeriya diga hiitaade 2010 yaarii 2015. O relli korowal ardaaki lesdi ndiin wakkacire ɗown waɗi shubtal jagordo hiitaade Febuary, 2015 boh hanko'on woni neɗdo siyaasajo Naajeeriya lattiɗoo aranndeejo jaɓowɗo do'aande (Defeat). Nden boh O meɗi wadgo ballitoowo jagordo lesdii Naajeeriya hiitaade 2007 yaarii 2010 les ardotooɗo Umaru Musa Yar'Adua ɓi Diiwal Katsina Naajeeriya. O meɗi boh wadgo ballitoowo jagordo Diiwal Bayelsa hiitaade 2005 yaarii 2007 les ardotooɗo Diepreye Alamieyaseigha innde maako.
Njangde maako.
O njangi e njangirde jaami'awa Port Harcourt lesdii Naajeeriya ɗon o hawti degree maako e ilmi dabbaajii (Zoology), o waɗi degree ɗiɗaajum e fanni hydrobiology be fisheries biology (dow ndiyam e dowrowol liɗɗi), o waɗi degree tatorjowm (PhD) e ilmi dabbaajii (Zoology). 
Ngomnaajo Diiwal Bayelsa.
O lattiɗoo ballitoowo jagordo Diiwal Bayelsa hiitaade 1999 yaarii 2005, diga ɗon assembly Bayelsa innii mow/lattini mow jagordo Diiwal Bayelsa (Gomnaajo) ɓe itti gomnaajo Diiwal gal gam sekowgoo guljol shede. 
Hooreejo-leydi Naajeeriya.
O lattiɗoo ballitoowo jagordo lesdii Naajeeriya les Umaru Musa Yar'Adua diga hiitaade 2007 yaarii 2009, diga nden assembly lesdii Naajeeriya innii mow/lattini mow hanko woni jagordo lesdii Naajeeriya hiitaade May, 2010 gamma ardotoodo goden yamaaki (sick) o wowrtinaama lesdii Saudi Arabia e November, 2009. Nden boh o inni ballitoowo mow koowgal ardogal mo innde Namadi Sambo hanko'on woni jagordo Diiwal Kaduna e wakkacire maai 
Jawdi maako.
Hiitaade 2007 o wanginii dow owon miliyonji temeeje ɗiɗi e shaffanɗe jeynai ( ₦295, 304, 420).
Manngu o heɓi.
Lesdii Naajeeriya innii mow dow hanko woni; Grand Commander of the Orde of Federal Republic (GCFR)
Lesdii Nijar republic innii mow dow hanko woni;
Grand Commander of the Orde of the Niger (GCON)
Lesdii Namibia maa innii mow dow hanko woni; 
First Class of the Orde of the Most Ancient Welwitschia Mirabilis (22 March, 2014).

Maayo Haɗejia:
Maayo Hadejiaa (Hawsare "Kogin Hadejia") maayo’on ha wuro Jigawa ha woyla Naajeeriya ya boo wakkere’on jey Maayo Yobe (komadugu Yobe). Daaga nder guureji bee berniiji deebe don waali koo kombi bee fomowade woodi Hadejia be Nguru. Dumboni maayo bee gaambe nuumi reemu go ceedu gamman danyi sonde ndiyam ha wakkere (Hadejia –Nguru wetlands) maayo man noo wadata be walowa Nguru. Ha jotani maayo hadejia don hales geebe 80% habeta’e ndiyam manje tiga tayta bee Callawa wooni ha wuro Kano.

Mowente DR Umaru Kwayranga LAMIDO Fulbe Gombe:
'Dun moye yite Alaji (DR Umaru Kwayranga (Lamido Fulbe Gombe)?
Ngam famtuki be anda moye yite Lamido fulbe Gombe.
DR, Umaru Kwayranga dun bi jafado Alh Muh'd Kwayranga (Lamido Fulbe Gombe Arandejou).
  Jafado Muh'd Kwayranga mo ardido, gaddo kugal gomnati, mowodi hagalare nder lamorde Gombe.
DR, Umaru Kwayranga Lamido Fulbe Gombe e hande mo jeyi jande digree nde arande Bsc less (Business Admin) nder Jami'are Maiduguri, digree didaure (Msc) mo jangi (Finance and Governance) e jami're (LiverpoolJohn Moores University Limited Kindom), enta digree tataure (Phd) mo jangoyi e (igbinedion University).
  DR, Umaru Kwayranga hauti andal felleji duddi enta shaydaji ba ni,i.
1_mo yara emo wartira ngam tabbitinki kamfaniwa hautande.
2, mo yara mo wartira ngam hakkilanobe kamfaniwa ngan.
3, shaydaki kamfaniwa kimminbe kuugal nder leddi Nigeria.
  DR, Umaru Kwayranga  mo hauti jande dunde ta heje shede e nder leddi Nigeria enta lesde yasi mo jangi ko fa'i shede e lumo e nder (Harvard University New York).
E hande hanko warti ardido heje moftande yimbe kawti :
1, (Finmal Financial) kudeji moftande yimbe hakkilanobe kamfaniwa.
2, Asusuwa (Jaiz Bank Plc)
3, Mo ardido (Axa Mansard pension).
4, Mo ardido (Waila Microfinance Bank Ltd).
5, Hanko ardini (Gombe Microfinance Bank Ltd).
6, Enta (First Bank Of Nigeria Mortgage Bank Ltd).
7,Nda (Kano Electricity Distribution Company).
8, Enta (Council Member Nigeria Stock Exchange).
9, Nda (Present Certified Pension Institute Of Nigeria).
10, Nda (Council Member Institute Of Stockbrokers).
Hanko himmini kude e felleji duuddi nder don fuu kamfaniwa ciminti ngonga (Ashaka Cem Plc ), les Funakaye nder duwal Gombe enta felleji duddi.

Dabinooje:
Dabinooje.
Dabinoje ɗe unnoddata e "Dabino" e ɗemngal hausare, ɗe godi fa’idaji njamu masin denbo ɗikauti hoirinki ɓaawo heɓtuki ɗum duɓi ujunaiji saliɗi. Bo wakkatire anduɓe kakkilanoɓe jamu ɓe tabbitini, ɓikkon leɗɗe belkom nƴiɓɓu kon daga lokaciƴelgel ɓe latti ɗer (jeri)  ba goro.
Inɗe Turanci der dabinoje jo'orɗe e kolutti pat. Ɓikkoy leɗɗe Dabinoje ɗegala. Mawɗum e ɗum  darde e kowari ɓaawo fat. Innde botanical kannjum Phonex dacylifera.
E Nigeria 🇳🇬 e kewayen diiwalji wayla iri Nasarawa, Sokoto, Kano, Kaduna e ko lutti iri diiwalji wayla ta fuuna, warti na diyam jemmaaje Ɓe Ɗuɗɓe don waɗika sorki dabinoje.
Goɗɗo annduɗo nyamnduuji nahooji ɓanndu, "Toyin Fayiga" oyi dabinoje woodi  sinadiraiji Ɗuɗɗi masin ba nebbam, calcium, magnesium ekolluttifu, ɓurɗon hoshii (shukar/sugar) seɗɗa ba glucose, fructose e dextrose wadanda ɗum Ɗon ɓesda semmbiɗina ɓon take.
“Dabiino woodi nafuda e der (magnesium), ɗun woodi magani ɓutuki reedu Ɗum hannde e janngo, ba ƴawuji laral ɓanndu e ko luttifu.

Water:
Ndiiyam (Water)..
Ɗuun kowndere Wonnde nder duniyaaru lattidu nafujum kila ko woni nder faat, nangi diga foofoojowm yaarii har ko foofata. Ɗan won foomula (H2O) kolloojowm element hydrogen ɗiɗi e Oxygen go'o, ɗanɗon boh hooƴaa foow koondeejii nder maajam (solvent), ɗan daneejam, walaa ƴiwre (dark), ɗan jaarayteeɗam walaa belɗum ko kashshowdown maajam, kanjam boh hooƴii ɗuɗɗum felle nder duniyaaru men dow tatawru ndow (Earth) e adadow (71%). Felle/nokkowje/babal maayo, jowggii, sow'ii liɗɗi hoƴii adadow (96.5%) nden boh felle lowttowɗee kanjee hooshiy (1.7% ground water).Ɗanɗon nder ndoolay (cloud), Ɗan ɗon nder kaaƴe (Solid), ndiiyamjii loofe/moddowɗam(Liquid) e hendow (air). Kanjam boh hawti ɓanndu ɓii aadama e adadow 75-80%. 
Nafoojii Ndiyam (Uses of Water).
Ko foofaata faat ɗon yaara ndiyam, ɓii aadama ɗon naftarow ndiyam adadow 70% e gese maɓɓe eɓe nduraa liɗɗi, eɓe ndema ƴandowjii maɓɓe (Agriculture and Fishing). Ɗowmɗon waɗa jahaale be laanawal (boat) eɗun hoƴa kareejii diiga felle goɗɗiɗe eder ndiyam, ɗowmɗon loota kolte, felle, nokkowje, wowroojii e maajam, ɗowmɗon fewna felle e maajam, ɗowmɗon fewna ndiyam e ƴandowjii be Malamalloo( kaaƴa ndiyam), leɗɗe gese ɗon yaara ndiyam ɗon hawta nyamdow be maajam koɗown ƴi'ete Photosynthesis.
Dabbaajii ngaɗooɗi ƴeewowgo maaji nder ndiyam ɗon naftarow e maajam, ɗownɗon faɗɗa hiite e maajam, ɗowmɗon defeera ƴamdowji e maajam. 
Waylitaaki ndiyam ( Change of States).
Ɗandon watta diiga ndiyam ɗan warta hendu (evaporation), diiga hendu ɗan warta ndiyam (absorption), diiga hendu ɗan warta kaaƴa ndiyam/ice block (Condensation), diiga kaaƴa ndiyam ɗan warta hendu (Sublimation), diiga kaaƴa ndiyam ɗan warta ndiyam (melting), diiga ndiyam ɗan warta kaaƴa ndiyam (Freezing).
Teddowgo ndiiyam Density.
Diyam labɗan ɗan walaa tuundi (impurities) Ɗanwon mangow density 1.000 Kg/m3 
Jaɓungol hiite (Electricity conductivity).
Ndiyam labɗan ɗon jaɓa hiite seɗɗa seɗɗa, tuundi to nastoi nder maajam ɗanɗon jaaɓa hiite masin ndenkam. Ɗown howraa hiite eɗun henda hankowde hydrogen e Oxygen kanjam ɓe ngi'ata(Electrolysis), lawol gol yiɗi hiite masin adadow( 285.8 kj/mol kobo 15.9 MJ/Kg). 
Nder Downiyaaroow men tatawru (On Earth).
Diyam ɗanɗum hebta nder downiyaaroow men dow e les maarow kanjowm ƴi'e Hydrosphere. Adadow maajam yaarii 333 million cubic milles (1.358 billion cubic metre). 

Oladipo Ogunlesi:
Theophilus Oladipo Ogunlesi (12 Yuli 1923 – 19 Janewuri 2023) maaɓinaako wurotude ngal heewɓe e ƴellitiiɗo mumuye daaɓe mumuye laamu ngal nguu heewɓe e Naajeeriya. Ɗum maaɓinaako ɗum faamɗino rokkude ngal nguu e taƴar Asibiti e Ibadan kala ga Koliyaaɓe Ilimi eii Naajeeriya.
Njaafiiɗo e Hawɗi.
Ogunlesi ɗo hawdi 12 Yulii 1923 toon mboosɗo nguɗo ko wondiije mboroyaaɗo to Sagamu, Dega Osun. E 1931-35, ɓeydi ko laamɗo St. Paul toon Sagamu e oo wiyete sekondere (secondary) toon CMS Grammar School to Lagos toon 1940. Wiyete cikkitaar to Higher College e Yaba toon 1942. Ogunlesi ɓamii ko oray toon sahaaɗu hee e sante (profession) nii ko Yaba Medical School toon 1947 e o addani ko University of London toon 1953 toon o yaltii na ngo ɓaleeje e Biritaniyaa.
Sante (Profession).
Ogunlesi yaltii ko laamɗo to Arewa (Western) State Civil Service e 1950-56. O daɗɗii na Medical Officer to Arewa Nigeria Civil Service (WNC) toon 1950-56. O naatii University of Ibadan toon 1961 e o ɓamii ko Professor laamɗo jama’a ceɗeɗe e 4 heen sappu. O woɗɓe yaltinool laamɗo na farko cikin jama’a ceɗeɗe na Najeriya. E ɗuumɗoo yaltuɓe o woɗɓe tawi ko Vice Chancellor University of Ibadan, Professor Isaac Folorunso Adewole, tawi ko yaltinool taƴirgol tariiɓe na Pan African Association of Neurological Sciences, Professor Ka ayode Oshuntokun, kadi tawi ko Professor Yombo Awojobi (Alalde beƴɗe) nde faamaako toowo ɗiɗi (surgeon) honoɓi. O taalii heen tawi ko ɗumii 1983 toon daɗii heen sappu.
Fellowship e Membership.
E 1977 o ajiyaɓe na asosiyan Nigerian Academy of Sciences.
Nana (Personal).
Ogunlesi ɗi wooɗii Susan Olorunfemi Peters toon 1950. Nde maaɓo ndeejiɗo 7, ɓeydu ko Adebayo Ogunlesi, kadi ngenndi ndi ko carkuɗɗi Donald Trump’s economic team.
Hakiiki.
Ogunlesi ndaɗii toon 19 Janewuri 2023, ko woni ɓaleeje 99. Sariyar Dapo Abiodun toon Osun taawnoo won heen remark:
"Nde wani hankadi no waɗi so o wonaa sariyar miiji, ko wani hankadi kese ɗum ko leydi maaɓi e kala taƴar Asibiti ndeejiɗi maaɓde ina anndani ɓur."

Namadi Sambo:
Namadi Sambo.
(O ndanyaama ƴandeere 2 lewru Agustus hiitaande 1954) o ndan'yaama e gelle Zariya e Diwal Kaduna lesdii Naajeeriya. Ɗun ɓi lesdii Naajeeriya gimɗo siyaasajo Naajeeriya, o meɗi wadgo gomnaajo Diiwal Kaduna, o ɓeɗi lattiɗoo ballitoowo jagordo lesdii Naajeeriya les Goodluck Ebele Jonathan hiitaade 2010 yaarii 2015.
Njande Maako(Education).
O waɗi njangirde haaɓe (baptist Primary) e gelle kakuri e Diiwal Kaduna, bako o yaahan firamari Kobi e gelle Bauchi, Diiwal Bauchi, nden boh o yeehi town school No.1 e gelle Zariya. Diiga hiitaade 1967 yaarii 1971, o waɗi njangirde (now Alhuda-Huda college) e zariya.
Nden boh o waɗi njangirde famarde (basic school) e jaami'awa Ahmadu Bello e gelle Zariya. Diiga ɗon o saalii o waɗi degree edow njande lawol mahaale (Architecture) o ɓesdi wadgo degree ɗiɗaɗum e dow non e njangirde nden. O waɗi njanganaakii lysdii maako e diiwal Oyo Lesdii Naajeeriya be Ministiri Wowroojii e kuɗe (NYSC) hiitaade 1979. 
Gomnaajo Diiwal Kaduna.
O lattake lattiɗoo jagordo shubtaaɗo waɗoo'wo gomnaajo e Diiwal Kaduna hiitaade 2007 les jam'iyya maako ka PDP siyaasa Naajeeriya. o innii anniyaaji maako dow sembiɗinki rewɓe e sukaaɓe Diiwal Kaduna. 
Ballitoowo jagordo lesdii Naajeeriya.
Oɗon waɗa gomnaajo e Diiwal Kaduna e hiitaade 2007 yaarii 2010, ɗon jagordo Goodluck Ebele Jonathan hanko'on woni ronoowɗo sooy'towɗo(died) ardooɗo lesdii Naajeeriya Umaru Musa Yar'Adua, hooƴimo wanginii anniya Maako dow o waɗa namo ballitoowo jagorɗown lesdii Naajeeriya e lewru (15 May, 2010). O lattake ballitoowo jagordo lesdii Naajeeriya les Goodluck Ebele Jonathan diiga (May, 2010) yaarii (Febuary, 2015).

Kabiru Ibrahim Gaya:
Kabiru Ibrahim Gaya (O danñyaama nder nyalɗe 16 lewru Morse ɗumngu ngu aliif 1952 O Gimɗo Siyaasaaji Naajeeriya nden haa kadi annduuɗo ñyimle moɗɗune subti majalisu 16 ɗotti'en naajeeriya. E dumngu haa 2007 ta : lattiɗo wakiiliijo ( 1952) subtirde siyasa kano fombinaare e diiwal kano caggl less jamm'iyawal ( APP) Ɗun subtii kabiru Gaya ballitoowo jawleeru ɓiɓɓe majalisu nde kawral 7,ɗun Afrik kawral mawngal batangal ɓari jonnɗe nɗe Geneba lesdi swiss nder lewru oktooba 2016 O waɗii jaŋngi firaamare e gaya dega ɗumngu alif 1961 yaahri 1964 e almaajiraaku tsangaya 1964 inaare gaya e o timmini jannɗe firaamare e ɗumngu 1968 banɗiiko maako mawɗo e wakkatiire ɗen hanko woni hooreejo 1968 jangirde nɗen ɗen maa Abdullahi Aliyuin Samaila hanko wooni ballitiotiɗo jangirde nɗen ekkutuɗo ilmul imgal Abdu haa janngirde firamarere nɗen. O halartake janngirɗe sakandare Gomnaati nɗe haa birnin kudu dega ɗumngu 1969 yaahri 1973 inaare nɗe o heeɓ ɗereewol. jannde afrik hirnaare (WAEC) e lakkol Gwamnati Birnin Kudu (WAEC) e ilmu
gollital e tayaaka dega 19 74 - 1975 inaare emo heeɓi JMB. o heeɓii digiriiwalgiri arannɗewal fannu - mahe-maheeji dega janngirde Ahmadu Bello 1977. 
siyaasa.
ƊunKa subti kabiru brahim Gaya e majaliisu ɗotti'en Kano fombinajum
nder 2007. Ɗen k kadi maa o ɓilaalama nada s komitiwalh henɗu a k gasw nɗer gure e lesɗe yaasi ; diiwe e hukumaaje pamare hukumaaje 
e albarkaaji nebban feetir e gollite 
Hiimoɓe.

Kabiru Ibrahim Gaya
11 ga Yuni, 2019 -

GORO TULA E FAMUJI:
GORO Tula E FAMUJI WON NDER.
Goro tula dun don nodda dun (snot apple) nder demngyal nasara, dun bikkon lekki ngokki nanduki e lekki goro ki anduden ammanbo nadun lekkikin, arande goro tula dun boddun, dun borodun, ba hako bokko,dun haccha , dundon kuda emajun nder lesde Africa edo maganiji.
  Nda famuji dun goro tula wadata:
1, dun don wadda yoruki yeso debbo, to rewbe don habda e shiya ndakam ta ndari dun borodun wala seko, dun fodanay rewbe ngarta marbe ndakam e fewdun yeso.
2, Dun don fodana rewbe qoyire daygol (ovolution) be bawata wadduki qoyire, say dun wadaka yarki dun nder yogurt dun lamma.
Dundon fadda ngyawu fewol, ngyangyande yeso rewbe, ngyangyande kobo futte yeso.
4, Dundon fadda tutol ngyawu (Asma) to hude nden ummake dun ngata gotel, dun hoyray.
5, Dun waray ngyawu les redu e fowdun sarde da'ngyuki .
Edun wada urnegol bafe lekki kinngam dingol.
7, Edu foyna bafe den, dun urna bandu ngam buduki bandu e ngyawu ladde (blood cancer).
8, jarobe taba ngata goro tula ngam don walla huhure(lever) ustuki tuurre.
9, Don usta sembe ngyawu kalkowu bandu(HIV-AIDS) dun wada shondi goro dun nder diyam Lipton hauta e njuuri.
10, Gorko giddo ndiyam (sperm) mudun warta boredun waway wadaka waduki nder yogurt e yara.
Nda famuji sedda nder goro tula, bo dun sada, dun wala bone hebuki.
Bo goro tula dun gi,oton du,un wala edun heboto nder laddi Nigeria fat sayta wari GORO Tula E FAMUJI WON NDER.
Goro tula dun don nodda dun (snot apple) nder demngyal nasara, dun bikkon lekki ngokki nanduki e lekki goro ki anduden ammanbo nadun lekkikin, arande goro tula dun boddun, dun borodun, ba hako bokko,dun haccha , dundon kuda emajun nder lesde Africa edo maganiji.
  Nda famuji dun goro tula wadata:
1, dun don wadda yoruki yeso debbo, to rewbe don habda e shiya ndakam ta ndari dun borodun wala seko, dun fodanay rewbe ngarta marbe ndakam e fewdun yeso.
2, Dun don fodana rewbe qoyire daygol (ovolution) be bawata wadduki qoyire, say dun wadaka yarki dun nder yogurt dun lamma.
Dundon fadda ngyawu fewol, ngyangyande yeso rewbe, ngyangyande kobo futte yeso.
4, Dundon fadda tutol ngyawu (Asma) to hude nden ummake dun ngata gotel, dun hoyray.
5, Dun waray ngyawu les redu e fowdun sarde da'ngyuki .
Edun wada urnegol bafe lekki kinngam dingol.
7, Edu foyna bafe den, dun urna bandu ngam buduki bandu e ngyawu ladde (blood cancer).
8, jarobe taba ngata goro tula ngam don walla huhure(lever) ustuki tuurre.
9, Don usta sembe ngyawu kalkowu bandu(HIV-AIDS) dun wada shondi goro dun nder diyam Lipton hauta e njuuri.
10, Gorko giddo ndiyam (sperm) mudun warta boredun waway wadaka waduki nder yogurt e yara.
Nda famuji sedda nder goro tula, bo dun sada, dun wala bone hebuki.
(LGA)  hebeto.GORO Tula E FAMUJI WON NDER.
1, dun don wadda yoruki yeso debbo, to rewbe don habda e shiya ndakam ta ndari dun borodun wala seko, dun fodanay rewbe ngarta marbe ndakam e fewdun yeso.
2, Dun don fodana rewbe qoyire daygol (ovolution) be bawata wadduki qoyire, say dun wadaka yarki dun nder yogurt dun lamma.
Dundon fadda ngyawu fewol, ngyangyande yeso rewbe, ngyangyande kobo futte yeso.
4, Dundon fadda tutol ngyawu (Asma) to hude nden ummake dun ngata gotel, dun hoyray.
5, Dun waray ngyawu les redu e fowdun sarde da'ngyuki .
Edun wada urnegol bafe lekki kinngam dingol.
7, Edu foyna bafe den, dun urna bandu ngam buduki bandu e ngyawu ladde (blood cancer).
8, jarobe taba ngata goro tula ngam don walla huhure(lever) ustuki tuurre.
9, Don usta sembe ngyawu kalkowu bandu(HIV-AIDS) dun wada shondi goro dun nder diyam Lipton hauta e njuuri.
10, Gorko giddo ndiyam (sperm) mudun warta boredun waway wadaka waduki nder yogurt e yara.
Nda famuji sedda nder goro tula, bo dun sada, dun wala bone hebuki.

Umaru Musa Yar'Adua:
Umaru Musa Yar'Adua o waɗi ƴeeɗowki/gordam maako diiga 1951 yaarii 2010. Ɗuun gimɗo siyaasajo Naajeeriya o meɗi wadgo gomnaajo e ardaaki lesdi Naajeeriya hiitaade 2007. 
Tariihi maako.
Ɗuun ndaƴiimo 16 lewru Agustus hiitaade 1951 e gelle Katsina lesdi Naajeeriya. Baba maako ɗuun ministaajo Diiwal Lagos sa'ii maai. O ɓagi koreemako Turai Yar'Adua hitaande 1975, ɓegon bacci jeew'ɗiɗi (7) worɓe ɗiɗo rewɓe njeyo (5) be taaniraaɓe Ɗuɗɓe. O ɓangi Hauwa Umar Radda hiitaade 1992 yaarii 1997 ɓe keɓii bacci ɗiɗi.
Gomnaajo Diiwal Kebbi saaliiɗo Usman Dakingari ɓangi ɓinngel maako Zainab Yar'Adua, nden boh Gomnaajo Diiwal Bauchi saaliiɗo Isah Yuguda haƴown ma ɓangi ɓinngel maako Nafisa, se Gomnaajo Diiwal Katsina roonuɗo mo mo innde Ibrahim Shema hanko ma ɓangi ɓinngel maako Maryam. 
Njande maako.
O fuɗɗi njande e Rafukka Primary School Hiitaade 1958, o saalii njangide Dutsinma e Katsina 1962. O hawti njangirde e gell Keffi hiitaade 1965 yaarii 1969. Hiitaade 1971 o jaɓii ɗerewol manngol e njangirde Barewa College. O waɗi degree maako aranndeeri(1972 yaarii 1975) e ɗiɗawru(1978) e jaami'awa Ahmadu Bello edow ilmu kemistiri (Kimmiyya).
Kuugal Artuungal.
O fuɗɗi huwugo be njangirde Holy Child College e legos (1975-76). O Moodibbo njanginoowo e njangirɗee College of arts, science and Technology Zaria, Diiwal Kaduna (hiitaade 1976) e College Of Arts Science (hiitaade 1979). O waɗi manajaajo (ardiiɗo) ngesa Sambo e gelle Funtua, diiwal Katsina. O waɗi membaajoo edow njandeeji be ndemal e Diiwal Katsina(1978 yaarii 1983). O ardake felle ɗuɗɗe ɗe kuugal masin.
Gomnaajo Diiwal Katsina.
O lattake jagordo shubtaaɗo gaɗoowo Gomnaajo Diiwal Katsina hiitaade 1999 har yaarii 2007. Hanko'on woni jagordo aranndeejoo wanginɗo ko'o mari eder jaowdii (Assets) maako, boh o lattini diiwal Katsina nder ngaɗoɓe shari'a jowldanku wakkaci maako. 
Ardooɗo lesdii Naajeeriya.
O lattake jagordo shubtaaɗo ardotooɗo lesdii Naajeeriya les jam'iyya maako ka PDP hiitaade 2007 ɓawo o wanginii anniya maako dow daraaki tebgo laamowki Naajeeriya. Ɗuun waɗi shubtal gal o do'ii luttuɓe (Muhammadu Buhari of ANPP and Atiku Abubakar of AC). Saini boh kamɓe ɓe njaɓai e shubtal gal.
Diiga nden boh o inni/wanginii ballitoowo mo ardoogal lesdii Naajeeriya, o hooƴii Goodluck Ebele Jonathan dow wallitamo ardooki, hanko'on woni jagordo Diiwal Bayelsa koden. 
Anniyaaji maako jeyɗiɗi.
Ɓawo o lattake jagordo shubtaaɗo o wanginii anniyaaji maako jeyɗiɗi (7) dow mahowgo lesdii Naajeeriya bakoo ɗuun yaara dungu 2020, kanjii woonii ɗoo les; 
1. Mahaale boɗɗe, wod'ingow hiite lesdii
2. Sha'aniijii Ƴamduu lesdii
3. Ɗuɗɗingo jaowdii lesdii
4. Wod'ingow Jahaale lesdii
5. Wod'ingow laaɓee lesdii
6. Tabbitayki njoode njam e lesdii 
7. Wod'ingow sha'aniijii Ilmu lesdii. 
seiny boh o heɓai o hawti anniyaaji maako ɗi'o inni gamma o ƴamɗa/ƴaawi dow ɓooƴee (Kidney disease) diiga ɓawo bow o sooy'ty (died). O waɗi shiya njamow ɗun wurtiinii mo lesɗe yaasi tebgo njamu maako, assembly lesdii Naajeeriya lattini ballitoowo mo ardoogal dow ardoogal lesdii ndin hiitaade 2010. Ɓawo nango habarow sooy'tukiy maako ɗon ɓe tabbitini ballitoowo mo ardoogal mo innde Goodluck Ebele Jonathan dow o latto ardootooɗo lesdii ndin yaarii ƴandeere shubtal yeesowal. 
Jawdi maako.
Wakkacire o wanginii anniya maako dow daraaki tebgo laamowki Naajeeriya o wanginii jawdi maako faat. Owon shede ko yaarii ₦856,452,892. ₦19 million ɗuun koreemako.
Mayde maako.
Ƴandeere 24 Febuary, 2010 ɓe ngartinii mo lesdii Naajeeriya diiga lesdii Saudi Arabia ɗun wurtinai khabaru ngonga dow waalaki maako shiyajamow. Ɗuɓɓe ndaaroimo e Abuja, ɓawo ɗon o sooy'ty ƴandeeree 5 May, 2010 eder wowro gomnaaty Naajeeriya. 

Bauchi Emirates:
Laamorde diiwal Bauchi
Laamorɗe Diiwal Bauchi (Bauchi Emirates).
Laamorɗe Diiwal Bauchi tiggaama hiitaade 19th Centoory les ƴimɓe Fula e gelle Bauchi kaapiital Diiwal Bauchi nden. 
Taarihi Maade (History).
Bakoo wadgo jihaadi pullo mujaddadiijo Shehu Usmanu ɓii Fodio, gelle Bauchi won ɗelɗe ɗuɗɗe boldateeɗe, won Hausaare e kaabiila'en woɓɓe be Jowlɓe masin. 
Hiitaade 1809 yaarii 1818 ƴimɓe Fula (Fulɓe) jabtii ardoogal gelle ɗen les ardoogal Yakubu Gerawa hanko'on woni ɓii goɗɗo laamiiɗo e felle ɗen boh o njangi e njangirde fullo mujaddadiijo Usmanu ɓii Fodio e diiwal Sokoto. 
Laamorɗe nden lattake les ardoogal ƴimɓe Fula yaarii 1902 wakkacire towranko'en (British) jabtii ardoogal walaa hawree, ɓe battitii laaɓe ndongidirkii Laamorɗe Diiwal Bauchi. 
Laamiiɓe Laamorɗe Nden.
(Diiga 1805 yaarii 1845) Yakubu I ɓii Dadi
(Diiga 1845 yaarii 1877) Ibraahima ɓii Yakubu
(Diiga 1877 yaarii 1883) Usmanu ɓii Ibraahima
(Diiga 1883 yaarii 1902) Umaru ɓii Salmaanu
(Diiga 1902 yaarii 1902) Muhammadu Mo'Allah ƴiɗi ɓii Ibraahima
(Diiga 1903 yaarii 1907) Hassan ɓi mamuda
(Diiga 1907 yaarii 1941) Ya'qubu II ɓii Usman
(Diiga 1955 yaarii 1982) Adama jumba ɓii Yakubu
(Diiga 1982 yaarii 2010) Suleiman Adamu 
(Diiga 2010 yaarii jotta, present years) Rilwanu Suleiman Adamu. 

Laamɗo Diiwal Gombe (Emir Of Gombe):
lamido Diiwal Gombe
Lamido Diiwal Gombe( Emir Of Gombe).
Alh Abubakar Shehu Abubakar
Tariihi maako.
Abubakar ɓi Shehu Abubakar ɗuun danƴimoo ƴandeere 17 December hiitaade 1977 e gelle Gombe, nder Diiwal Gombe lesdii Naajeeriya.
Hanko'on woni laamiiɗo Diiwal Gombe saffo e go'oojo (11th Emir). O lattiɗoo laamiiɗo Gombe tin wakkacire babaa maako sooy'ty (died) Alh Shehu Usman lattiɗoo laamiiɗo Gombe saffoojo (10th Emir) e hiitaade 27 May, 2014. O lattake ɓiɗɗo ɗiɗawjo nder ɓiɓɓe laamiiɗo saaliiɗo/sooy'towɗo. Ɗuun ɗon ƴii'amo lamido daba Naajeeriya (Sarkin Daban Nigeria). Ɗuun ɗon nodda mo inndeejii banii; Abba Jikan Abba, Ɗawisu Sarkin Ado e Giwa. 
Njande Maako (Education).
O waɗi njangirde famarde hiitaade 1982 yaarii 1988 e njangirde (Children Primary School) nder gelle Gombe. Ɗon boh e yahii njangirde shakawre ndee (Government Science Secondary School, Gombe) hiitaade 1989 yaarii 1995. O hawti degree maako aranndeere dow ilmu siyaasa (Political Science) e njangirde jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nde gelle Maiduguri (University Of Maiduguri) hiitaade 2001 yaarii 2005. 
Kuugal Artuugal.
O meɗi howky dow ndaarukii hukuumaje Diiwal Gombe hiitaade 2006 yaarii 2007. Diiga 2007 yaarii 2009 o lattake ɲeɗɗo ɓadiiɗo ballitoowo ministaajo dariiɗo dow reenowgo Naajeeriya (Minister of Defence) e Abuja nder Gomnaaty Naajeeriya. O lattiɗoo ardiiɗo felle kuuɗe ɗee kamfaaniiji (Companies) Kliptown Lagoon Nigeria Ltd e Horizon Interlink Global Resources. 
Wakkacire babaa maako sooy'ty dow ƴawkiy Cancer, Gomnaaty Diiwal Gombe les ardoogal gomnaajo Ibrahim Hassan Dankwambo ɓe inni/tabbitanii ɓo laamowki Diiwal Gombe e nder Jowlirde Laamorɗe Diiwal Gombe dow o roona babaa maako e hiitaade 6 June, 2014.
Manngu Lesdii Naajeeriya..
E hiitaade 2022 Gomnaaty Naajeeriya les ardoogal Muhammadu Buhari ɓe inni mo/ ɓe tabbitinanii mo manngu Lesdii dow " Commander of the Order of Federal Republic" (CFR). 

Maayo Jama'are:
Maayo jama’are moobe buri anndigo bee maayo bunga ha heeji oburtayi, waadon fudda daaga kooseeje je wooni ha kombi bee gruel Jos je wuro plateau haa Naajeeriya o tokki waila waladu fuunaaje wuro Bauchi bee wuro Yobe bakko hawta bee maayo Hadejia waarta maayo Yobe. Ha baawo –baawo don be waadi bolle bedon taaska maahugo tayta ndiyam je kafin zaki haadow don maayo’on bee hulling wannaree dow sakittu ndiyam mbee bakeejam bee ndiyam yarrgo bee noon man dannyen.

Maayo Imo:
Maayo imo (Igbo; imo) woodon ha fommbina waladu fuunaa Naajeeriya bo o woodi 150 miles (240 km) nder maayo filitiingo Atalantik. Ha wuro Akwa Ibom, waato inyang imo beye waylita yaahugo maayo njawdi. (Ibibio; inyang, imo woodon nuuma njaindi).nuhhure maako waadon kombi man bee 40 kiilomita (25 ml) yaajirka bo maayo owoodi bee ikigo je duubu-duubu je cubic kilometres (1.0 cu ml) yaajigo fellel man 26,000 je coofnaadum ruumtunde. Maayo imo kambe’on otamiri bee oramirukiwa.
