Be buuyibe hales laamu jaggu/koloninkeejum je Biritisu mo Naajeeriya ha hitaande 1907-1908 be 1911 bee arannde yaahugo Aba boo yaahugo udo kombi bee umuahia. Koobe jagganta koo Alusi je maayo kanko’on debbo Imo kanko’on ummatoore jeetaari be bee maayo be waadi imaanako ha demngal Igbo don nuuma ndiyam koo iyeende. 
Bedon waada banngal je Alusi fuu hitaande hakkunde leinru mayu bee yuli. Maayo imo owoodi bee 830 metres (2,720 ft) katarko ha naasturde hakkunde wuro Rivers bee wuro akwa ibom.

Maayo Komadugu-Gana:
Maayo Komadugu-Gana ko maayo Misaw maayo’on nder basin Caad haa woyla waladu fuunaa Naajeeriya jehawti Maayo Yobe e Damasak haa feetel laamu’on mobbar jey Diiwal Borno. O ummi daaga woyla Bawci.
Biiyugo humpitina je nduubu mo 2011 je international union for conservation of nature ndiyam’on maayo o acci wargo Yobe. 
Be hebti koombowal Dufuna je maari hitaande 1987 feetel laamu Fune.

Maayo Katsina Ala:
Maayo Katsina Ala (koo Katsina-Ala) maayo’on ha caaka Naajeeriya, kanko’on ha caaka fellel maako je caaka. Woodon huuwa ha darn de nasturde mannga maayo Benuwe e Naajeeriya. Dooforde je wooni ha woyla walada hirnaa Cameron.don el a 320 kilomertes (200 ml) wayla waladu hirnaa e Kamerun, o ilna dow keerol Naajeeriya bee Kamerun yaahugo Naajeeriya.
Babal.
Bedon heeba maayo Katsina Ala burna fuuha wuro Benuwe je Naajeeriya, baawo o iyabbiti dow keerol hakkunde Naajeeriya be Kamerun bakko o rufa ko wooni nder reedu mako yahugo maayo benue.
Gureeji.
Katsina Al] berniiwol mango boo gruel manngoje feetel laamu katsina-Ala ha Diiwal Benuwe Naajeeriya. Bedon heeba ha hundukomaayo katsina-Ala bee gruel duddum haadow laawul woodi loomu mannga je nyaamata ha alaamusa yalti.

Maayo Oramiruka:
Maayo Oramiruka waloowul/coofol on ha in Uro Imo, Naajeeriya je baniidum/dared kilomerte 14 (9 ml) laawul ilata nder maayo Otamiri.

Maayo Owala:
Maayo owala maayo on ha ifon Osun, diiwal Osun, haa Naajeeriya, kombi gure bee illie. Maayo maan yaari bana kilomere 72 be waawann samjigo yahugo kersol/tayla bee boo yaarni go ndiyam gaama boddim geedal je luttaano leddi be leddi jey barkaaji taari maayo maan.

Maayo Kalaaba:
Maayo Kalaaba je wooni wuro Cross River haa Naajeeriya otakki woyla daaga cross river baana 8 kilometres (5.0) yahug fommbina.
Maayo Kalaaba Kalaaba o don heeba bee jipporde koombowal tagaali dum luggudum baras bee riftirde hawtigo bee 6 metres (20 ft). maayo Kalaaba deefuu asli mawdo maccube deebe jiffata daaaga nder gam adiigobe yahugo hirrnaa ha coggu maccube je atlantic. Ha hitaande 1860 on be acci jaggugo hoorbe.

Maayo Rima:
Maayo Rima maayo on ha wayla Naajeeriya. Ha wakkerewoyla don hawta bee maayo goulbi de maradi. O tokki fommbina waladun hiirnaa hawtubee maayo sokoto, kombi bee sokoto o yeehi yeeso bee fommbina yahugo maayo niger. Rima je dooridoroongel maayo on je joodannde boo don ila on mere ha yak dunngo. Be taaski Zawro, mannga hokkugo ndiyam, nduubu saalin o hokkan ndiyam 10,572 hectare (26,120 acres) ngeese ha nokkuure rima je wooni hakkunde Argungu be boo berniiwol Kebbi.

Maayo Sakkwatoɓe:
Maayo Sokoto jebee buri anndigo bee gulbi kebbi) maayo on ha woyla waladu hiirnaa Naajeeriya boo waaloowol on jey Maayo Niiser. Dooforde maayo on don kombi Funtua haa fommbina wuro Katsina, baana 275 kilometre (171 mi) don foorti daanyi daaga Sakkwatoɓe. O tokki woyla waldu hirnaa o saali Gusau ha wuro Zamfara, haabe darnni ndiyammaan ha Gusau o heebi woloowol heeydum gruel ndiyam. Ha less maayo maan nassti wuro Sakkwatoɓe nde o saali ha sokoto hawtu bee maayo rima ndaayago o waylitti fommbina o tokki je berniiwol Kebbi haa Diiwal Kebbi. 
Baana 120 120 kilometres (75 ml) fommbina bee berniwal kebbi o yotti hewta maako bee Maayo Niiser. Babalji jetaari maayo maan bedon reema dum maasin boo bedon huutindira bee maayo maan ha darned asli maayo maan bedon nyaarna. Maayo boo kimmidi niidum laalwul adiraaku on. Tayta on bakolori, baana 100 kilometres (62 ml) daaga dow daaga sokoto, waloowol maaga onha maayo sokoto. O waadi, sakittu baras haadow reemu go waalowul jey hales.

Maayo Komadugu Yobe:
Maayo Yobe, moobe buri aandigo be Komaduugou Yobe ko komadougou-yobe ha demngal francias, maayo feere on haa hiirnaa Afrik lee ilata yahugo lake chade laawul Naajeeriya be Niiser. Ha maayo maan dum hawti bee maayo hadejia, bee maayo jama’are bee boo maayo kamadougou gana. Maayo leddi hakkunde Niiser be Naajeeriya. Woodi firtindirgo bee caanjigo kuujeeji maan haadow gam iligo bee ndiyam maayo, bee noo wooni sigaagi bee boo nbuugo fellel maayo, noodum wooni jotta kanjim on tayta. Ontiga ha nder wuro Kano bee hawtal taas kugo carwootital jamaa kafin zaki dam ha nder wuro Bawci.
Berniije mawde je jewooni ha ha kombi maan bee maayo hawyi be Gashuwa, Geidam, be Damasak e Naajeeriya, be Diffa haa Jamhuriyawol Niiser.

Maayo Yewa:
Maayo Yewa maayo feere on seali keerol hakkunde Jamhuriyawol Benen be Naajeeriya dume on ilata haa fuunaa maayo filitingo Benen haa wakkati gootel o’oyebbii keerol lesde dadi. Luttano seendindirgo innde maan kambe on Yeoua, Yewa, Yeoua, be Yewa. Baniidum maako kondim dared maayo filitingo mannga asliijum on yewa kanjim maayo atan bee iloro.yewa dam to oyidow nder badagty creek je maysii, don to kkindiiri, yahugo jieeorde koombawol je lagos.maayo maan don nder wakkati guldum je hiirnaa Afrik boo kimmindiniidum asliijum gawrtigo liddi on gaam joodugo ha nukkure maan. Feere kimmidiniidum gam haala naagugoliddi je saare ngarke on sarwaajum (callinectes amnicola). Baawo noongugo liingu, maayo o wood, kimmidiniidum hunnde maan ha fellel hungo saffogu leddeje bee njaareend. Feere diga nder koofuudidi je joodi ha nder maayo bee fomownde ndiyam kambe on sedges (irin maan cyeerus articulates, cyperus papyrus, bee paspalum vaginatum) bee dibinoohi (iriin maan pandanus candelabrum raphia lookeri, bee phoenix reclinata).
Innde maan burtayi diga lawru on Yoruba yewa gam kamjim on lawru do maayo ,aan caahiidum boo hunnde koobe jagganta wade, woodi, sirri, yeeweende, mbattudi, guddal bee hiilaajo/kiiloowo.

Maayo Okpara:
Maayo Okpara maayo feere jey Benin. Asiili maako ha nder babal man borgou, don ila yahugo fommbina boo warti dold keerol hakkunde Naajeeriya be Benin bakko oloor Onitsha nder Benin dum ila yahugo maayo ouemw, mo reegere je ili yahugo maayo filitingo Atalantik.
Gureji dude jey wooni ha honndiko maayo man bedon nyeddindira hakkun de Benin be Naajeeriya.

Maayo Zamfara:
Maayo Zamfara maayo’on ha banngeere woyla Naajeeriya. Asiili maako daaga wuro zamfara, owoodon yahaa baana 250 kilometres (160 mi) hirrnaa yahugo nder wuro kebbi haa o hawti bee maayo wuro sokoto baana50 kilometres (32 ml) fommbina waladu hirrnaa berniwul kebbi. Ha kooburi manngu darned maako maayo zamfara o tokkiri heedi nukkare jee 188 metres (617 ft) haadow takkindira.
Maayo filitingo. Woodi innde feere-feere je zamfara ha nukkujee feere-feere je zamfara maako maayo zamfara o tokkiri heedi nukkare jee 188 metres (617 ft) haadow takkindira.
Maayo filitingo. Woodi innde feere-feere je zamfara ha nukkujee feere-feere je zamfara ha nukkujee feere-feere bee tokki nder je mabbe. Feere nder mabbe kambe on maanabe hawtube: gulbi gindi, gulbi zamfara, maayo zamfara, bee maayo gindi. Maayo man don e latitude 12.2’2.22 beeboo longitude: 4. 2’22.85

Maayo Ninorie:
Maayo Ninorie maayo on haa Naajeeriya duma seelinder owerri, seeli nder maayo otamiri e nekede. Juutal maayo daaga daaforde yahugo fellel maako kanko on 9.2 km.
Maayo dum bonni waabiliire ha hitaande 2017 feetel laamu obaarri gaam na be naafuude ndiyam daaga maayo on.

Maayo Niiser:
Maayo Niiser en don yaunaamo bee maayo niger je woodi dar nde kilomwtre 4,180. Luggage man yeehi baana kilometer 2,11ha leddi. Feetel jaawal maako 5,589 m3/5 jenaandi ndirayi daaga jaawol 500 m3/5 yahugo 27,600 m3/5. Fuddano maako daaga koseeje gine fommbina waladu fuunaa Gine. Waloodi feetel maako kombe maayo bani, maayo benin o tokki nder malo, niger bee Naajeeriya yahugo maayo Atilantik otakki niger bee Naajeeriya yahuga maayo atlantic otakki niger delta. Di berniiji dum don heeba ha maayo Niiser; tembakounda, Bamako,Timbuktu, Niamey.

Maayo Ngaji:
Maayo Ngaji maayo’on ha woyla Naajeeriya. O heebi asiili’on daaga nukkujee coofnaadum lesdi je gruel gadaka ha wuro yobe, owoodi daayiidum kilometres 40 fommbina yaahugo ngalda boo hawtube bee maayo ngalda daayi gokilometre 22.2 fommbina bee gruel fika.

Maayo Ngadda:
Maayo ngadda maayo feere’on wooni ha nder Naajeeriya je ilaata hader lake Caad bee maayo Caadi. Ndiyam maayo daarnidam Alau jeebe babal ndiyam didgudum coofnaadum je wakkati ha banngeere je Maiduguri.

Maayo Kwa Ibo:
Maayo Kwa Ibo (boo maayo quaibo) maayo’on don imam kombi bee umaahia ha wuro abia e Naajeeriya, boo o tokki fommbina waladu fuunaa je wuro akwa 16 o yaahugo maayo filitigo Atilantik.
Maayo’on odon nyemmna nukkure feereje waalowol’on mangrove je maari ngondal be geelode ndiyam be waaloji jee seendirtabe bee maayo bee njaarindi feetel jee sedda. Ibeno, ha wakkere fuunaa je maayo kwa ibo ponnda kilometres 3 kilomeres (2 ml) daaga honndiko maayo gootel nder fellel gawtugo liddi mannga man ha fuunna maayo filitingo Naajeeriya.

Kawu Peto Dukku:
Kawu Peto Dukku.
O ndanyaama ƴandeere 14 Lewru Aranndeeru dow january dungu 1958 e gelle Dukku, nder Diiwal Gombe. Gimɗo siyaasajo Naajeeriya wadgo senataajo e diiwal Gombe ta woila hiitaade 2007. 
Taarihi Maako.
O waɗi ƴeeɗowki maako diiga 1958 yaarii 2010. Ɗun ndanyii mo 14 Lewru Aranndeeru dow january dungu 1958 o sooy'ty (died) ƴandeere 2 lewrow aprilu 2010. O hawti njande diploma Maako edow ilmu luuɓe. 
Kuugal Artuugal be Siyaasa Maako.
O fuɗɗi kuugal e njanginki, diiga nden o nastiy nden kamfaniwa nebbam ngonga e gelle Maiduguri. O lattiɗoo ɓii majaalisa assembly Gombe shubtaaɗo diiga dungu 1999 yaarii 2007. Ɗuun ɓeddu shubtowki mo dow o ardo o waɗa senatajoo Diiwal Gombe ta wayla (Gombe North) les jam'iyya maako ka PDP. Ɓawo wartuki maako senatajoo ɗun inni moh hanko woni ballitoowo jagordo dow diiwal e hukuumaje pamarɗe pamaareeje e wowro senata'en ardotooɓe lesdii Naajeeriya. Woɓɓe ngii hanko on naa o wolwoo'wo nder wowro senata'en ardotooɓe lesdii Naajeeriya ba. 
Sooy'tukiy maako (Hisa Death).
O sooy'ty e gelle Kaduna gamma o ƴamɗa o ƴaawi ƴandeere 2 lewrow aprilu dungu 2010. O wodi bacci jeygo'o(6), rewɓe tatoo (3) be taana inna maako.

Aliyu Akwe Doma:
Aliyu Akwe Doma.
O waɗi gordam maako diiga 1942 yaarii 2018. Ɗun gimɗo siyaasajo Naajeeriya o meɗi wadgo gomnaajo Diiwal Nassarawa eii les jam'iyya maako kah PDP siyaasa Naajeeriya.
Tariihi maako.
O daƴama ñaldeere aranndeere 1 e lewru september, ɗumngu 1942 e gelle Doma hukuumare pamarde e diiwal Nassarawa diga kaabiila'en Alago. 
Njande Maako.
O djanngii njangirde aranndeere nde Primary e Doma 1951, o kadi ɗiɗawre nde Secondary e lafia dungu 1957. O nden boo kadi njangirɗee mawɗe haa Katsina e Gombe dungu 1963. O waɗi njangirde jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga Ibaadan University Of Ibadan hiitaade 1964 yaarii 1966. O njangi boh e lesdii England (London dungu 1968) oyehi boh lesdii Italy dungu 1973. O yahii njangirde jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga Zaria( Janngirde Ahmadu Bello ɗumngu 1976 e Janngirde Ambrose Alli , Ekpoma ɗumngu 2002 ɗon o heɓoy degree maako ɗiɗarjum edow ilmu ndongidirkii ummatore (Public Administration). 
Kuugal Artuugal.
Eder handowgo maako, o fuɗɗi wadgo sakatareejo Gomnaaty Diiwal Jos hankowdee 1976 yaarii 1983. Diiga ɗon boh o warti lattiɗoo ballitoowo jagordo Diiwal filato. Gomnaaty Naajeeriya lattini mow nder memba'en kawtal kuuɗe ɗuɗɗe. 
Gomnaajo Diiwal Plateau.
O lattake Gomnaajo jagordo shubtaaɗo ardotooɗo diiwal Nassarawa dungu 2007 les jam'iyya maako ka PDP siyaasa Naajeeriya. O ɓeddi tebgo ardoogal diiwal gal e dungu 2011 saini gimɗo siyaasajo Naajeeriya Umaru Tanko Almakura do'ii mo hanko ƴami korowal gal e les jam'iyya maako ka CPC.
Mayde maako.
O sooy'ty ƴandeere 6 March, 2018 ɓawo ƴawky/shiyajamow maako ton lesdii Israel.

Maayo Anambara:
Maayo Anambaara (Igbo: omambala) don ela 210 kiilomitaji (130 MI) yahugo nder Maayo Neeja fahin woɗon haa Anambaara, Naajeeriya. Maayo man boo ɓurduɗo kimmiɗiniiɗum haa yarnigo be maayo Neeja be ndiyamje wooni haa berniiwol Lokoja. Ndiyam bee maayo Omambala ɗer rufa nder maayo filitiingo Atalaantika haa elaagwol ndiyam feere-feere nde ɗum ɓofti kilomitaji 25,000 sukuya kiilomitaje (9,700 sa MI) ɓanngeere Neeja Delta.
Banngeere maayo Anambaara be biiruki Omambala kanjim’on nde kooɓe gendo jaangonta gam maayo man jey dogga be lees lesde mouzo-uwa-ani yahugo algulere, anam, nsugbe be onicha axis, haadum hainti bee maayo nkisi e Niger-kwaro/mgbakili e yaandu mabbe yahugo maayo filitingo atlantika, hawtugobe haabaru asili mabbe wuro. Nonnon boo maayo ezu e exichi bedon dillindiri nder maayo Anambaara ha agbanabo be Oda. Wood. Taali e siiri be duddum je taar be Omambal a je waandi haadi haalaji feere-feere bee kabilaji bee ummatore koburi duduugo, gam non annasaara linyugo je arande kobe arti boolugo omambala haa aderde Anambaara. Hiddeko tageefo guure dude bedon naalra kalmaaji omambala mo booyma inde baangeere mo moisi banngeeji Anambaara mohaande geebe maayo, Enugu be boo Ebonyi, je bibbe asiili nukkure man.
Haala dotta bibbe asiit Aguleria, anam, Nsugbe, Umueri, Anaku, Nteje, umunya, nando, igbariam, nkinelle-ezunanka, nzam, akwkuzu, ogidi, ogbunike, jabbere ayamelum, bee luttube bedon inaada hake biiyugo kanbe’on asiili mobibe omambala mo ndonu.
Yimɓe Omambala be woodi demde feere-feere, gondina. Biiruki, be wooda-derderiijo molaytugol noobe ɗiɗɗi gondina duddum je imraanewol be Esoteric di mawna-dokkeejo darajaaji dow mbeelu dow jaarji-seedamku boo bedon jaagabe hawtugo be paffube je biiruki, ɗemngal, biiruki diina be maayo Omambala do ɗum waadi gaam gondal seem bidum be hawtal hoore je wooni ha hakkkunde mabbe be elto donki jomirawo be Ecosystem kuudukiijum-mobuga jawdi beebiiruki-sigaago, be laamorinkeejum. Be bote banngeeji Omambala oyaari geebe Edo, Delta, Imo, River, Abia, Taraba, Benue, Niger, Nasarawa, Plateau, Akwa-ibom & Cross-river. Naajeeriya haa yahugo Niiser, Caadi, Kamerun, Mali, Central African Republic, etc.

Kashim Shetima Mustafa:
Kashim Shetima Mustafa ɗuun ɓi gelle Mayduguri, Diiwal Borno, lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗuun gimɗo siyaasajo Naajeeriya o meɗi wadgo ngomnaajo e senatajoo Diiwal Borno boo hanko'on woni ballitoowo jagordo shubtaaɗo hooreejo lesdi Naajeeriya ndungu 2023.
Tariihi Maako.
Ɗuun danƴyimo 2 september, 1966 e gelle Maiduguri Diiwal Borno, e wayla lesdii Naajeeriya. Innde laƴol maɓɓe Shetima Mustafa Kuttayibe, o ɓangi Nana Shetima ɓegon bacci taty (3). 
Njande Maako.
O waɗi njangirde famarde e lamisula e gelle Maiduguri hiitaade 1972 yaarii 1978, o waɗi njangirde shaakare nde Secondary e gelle Biu fombina diiwal Borno diiga ɗon o wuiti nde gelle Potiskum (hukuumare pamaru eii diiwal Yobe jotta) ɗon o hawti njande maako e dungu 1983. O waɗi degree maako dow ilmu ndemal e jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga gelle Maiduguri (University Of Maiduguri) hiitaade 1989. O saali lesdii Naajeeriya ta fombina o waɗi jagganaaki lesdii e gelle Calabar, diiwal Cross River diiga 1989 yaarii 1990. O waɗi degree maako ɗiɗarjum edow ilmu ndemal e jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga Ibaadan (University of Ibadan) dungu 1991. 
o warti jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga gelle Maiduguri eɗon o janginta o lattake moodibbo eɗon diiga 1991 yaarii duubi 1993. 
Kuugal Artuugal.
O howdi bankiiji/eɗuun resata shede e gelle Ikeja, diiwal Legos ɗon o dari diiga 1993 yaarii 1997. Diga dungu 1997 o howdi banki lowɓe ɗe lesɗe downiyaaroow yaarii dungu 2001 hanko woni ballitoowo jagordo bankiwa ngan ɓaawo ɗon o latti ardooɗo bankiwa ngam. O lattake jagordo bankiwa Zenith e gelle Maiduguri, ɗon boh o warti ballitoowo jagordo bankiwa ngan e lesdii Naajeeriya fowna-ta-wayla lesdii (Northeast) diiga ɗon ɓe inni mo/lattini mow hanko woni ardotooɗo bankiwa ngan hiitaade 2007. Ɓawo ɗon Gomnaajo Diiwal Borno lattini mow hanko woni ardotooɗo sha'aniijii shede e Gomnaaty diiwal Borno les ardoogal Ali Modu Sherif.
Siyaasa Maako.
Diiga 2007 yaarii 2011 o lattake ardiiɗo wakkerereji/ministiriji joo'y(5). Ɗuun waɗi shubtal aranndewal nder jam'iyya ANPP ɗuun shubty Modu Fannami Gubio seiny ɓawo ɗon ɗuun faɗɗi mo ƴimmɓe bindigaaji, ɗon ɗuun shubty moh hanko woni darotooɗo tebgo Gomnaajo e dungu 2011. O ƴamii Gomnaajo e kuri'aajii Ɗuɗɗi 531,147. Ɗuun hokkomoh ɓanngow masin dow wadgo gomnaajo ɓurɗo kila gomnaa'en faat e lesdii Naajeeriya. 
Dungu 2019 o lattake jagordo shubtaaɗo gaɗoowo senatajoo Diiwal Borno ta shaka ɗon o rooni Babakaka Bashir.
Ballitoowo Hooreejo Lesdii Naajeeriya..
E dungu 2022 shubtaaɗo ardotooɗo lesdii Naajeeriya Ahmad Bola Tinubu inni mo/ lattini mow hanko woni ballitoowo mo ardoogal lesdii Naajeeriya e shubtal gal ɗuun watta e 2023. Jam'iyya maɓɓe ka APC hanka ƴami shubtal gal kamɓe boh ardoto lesdii ndin diiga dungu 2023.

Usman Bayero Nafada:
Ɓii gelle Nafada Diiwal Gombe lesdii Naajeeriya. Ɗun gimɗo siyaasajo Naajeeriya meeɗugo wadgo ballitoowo spiikajoo lesdii Naajeeriya (Deputy Speaker), o meɗi wadgo membaajo gelle Nafada, o waɗi membaajo Gomnaaty ɓawɗum lattiɗoo waakiiliijoo gelle Nafada e Dukku dungu 2015.
Taarihi Maako.
Ɗun danƴiimo lewru aranndeeru January, dungu 1961 e gelle Nafada. O jangi e janngirde Jaami'awa Ahmadu Bello e Zaria Diiwal Kaduna, ɗon o hawti degree maako aranndeejum dow ilmu limngal accounting, o jangi e janngirde Jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga gelle [ (University Of Maiduguri), Diiwal Borno. 
Siyaasa Maako.
O meeɗi wadgo spiikajoo (Speaker) assembly Gomnaaty diiwal Gombe dungu 1999 yaarii 2003, O lattiɗoo shubtaaɗo membaajo waakiiliijoo gelle Nafada e Dukku nder Diiwal Gombe e Gomnaaty mauɗum dungu 2003. Ɓawo jo'iingo kuugal Babangida Ngauroje dow shiya gonga ɗun tawii Patricia Etteh, Friday Itulah gimɗo diiwal Edo lattini Bayero Nafada hanko woni ballitoowo sipiikajo lesdi Naajeeriya. O lattake jagordo Diiwal Gombe ta wayla (Gombe North) hiitaade diiga 2015 yaarii 2019. Hiitaade 2018 hanko be ƴimɓɓe maako 14 wurtake diiga jam'iyya APC ɓe guity PDP gam o inni/wanginii anniya maako ka daraaki tebgo Gomnaajo Diiwal Gombe e dungu 2019, saini o waɗai nasaraaku. 
Manngu Laamorɗe.
Hanko'on woni laamɗo hawree gelle Nafada (Sarkin Yaqin Nafada), Ɓii Rimi gelle Gona, Madawaaki gelle Akko, Hanko ƴi'e durbin tangalee, Maje Keran Funakaye, Enyi ƴimɓe Igbo, Garkuwan Matasan Arewa nden boh hanko woni kepɗo mangu lesdii Nijar ɗuun Commander of the Order of Niger (CON). 

Babatunde Hunpe:
Babatunde Hunpe.
O ndanyaama 2 lewrow Agustus, hiitaade 1963. Ɗun gimɗo siyaasajo Naajeeriya. Hanko'on woni membaajo waakiiliijoo felle Badagry e diiwal Legos lesdii Naajeeriya. Wakkacire ardoogal Babatunde Fashola dungu 2011 hanko'on woni ballitoowo mow dow shaawariiji ndongidirkii Gomnaaty maako. E dungu 2015 bo Gomnaajo jagordo shubtaaɗo ardotooɗo diiwal Lagos Mr Akinwunmi Ambode lattini mow hanko woni ballitoowo mo dow sha'aniijii felle e diiwal ].

Babatunde Samuel Adejare:
Babatunde Samuel Adejare Ɗun likitaajjo boo gimɗo siyaasajjo Naajeeriya, o meɗi wadgo membaajjo gelle Agege eii Diiwal Lagos hankowdee 2011 yaarii duubi 2015.
Tariihi maako e Njande Maako.
O ndaƴaama e 6 Dujjal, 1961. O njangi e njangirde St. Paul's Catholic Primary School e gelle Ebutte Metta e diiwal Lagos hankowdee 1967 yaarii 1973. O yehi njangirde nde Gramar e gelle Esure, Ijebu mushin, e diiwal Ogun lesdii Naajeeriya diiga 1974 yaarii 1980 ɗon o hawti njande o heɓi ɗerewol "West African School Certificate" (WASC). O heɓi ɗerewol manngol gol Higher School Certificate (HSC) e gelle Ibadan jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya (University Of Ibadan). Ɓawo njande maako nde Likitanko'en e jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga Ilorin (University Of Ilorin) o hawti degree maako ɗiɗarjum edow ilmu njamowji ɗi ummatore (Public Health) diiga Jaami'awa diiwal Lagos.
Kuugal Artuugal.
O meɗi howky dow hanko woni ɓaowɗo e asibitiwa gelle Ikeja. O lattake ballitoowo ƴawiiɓee dow tefanki ɓe laaɓe ndongidirkii ƴawtaaki maɓɓe.
Siyaasa Maako.
O waɗi membaajo e siyaasa diiwal Lagos pamara nde ɗiɗi diiga 2003 yaarii 2011. O ardaake kawtal assembly dow njamowji. Dungu 2011 o lattake shubtaaɗo membaajo Gomnaaty lesdii Naajeeriya hanko'on woni membaajo mo felle Agege e diiwal Lagos. Dungu 2015 Gomnaajo Diiwal Lagos inni mo dow hanko woni ardotooɗo sha'aniijii felle nden boh e dungu 2018 o ɓeddi innow ki mo ardoogal njamowji faat e diiwal Legos les ardoogal Gomnaajo Mr Akinwunmi Ambode. 
O ɓeddi tebgo ardoogal felle Agege e diiwal Lagos bo o ƴami korowal gal les jam'iyya maako ka APC dungu 2019.

Abubakar Garbai Borno:
Abubakar Garbai Borno.
Innde maako Abu Bakr ɓi Ibrahim al-Kanemi ɗuun ɗon ƴi'e moh inndeji banni; Bukar Garbai ko Abubakar Garbai). Hanko'on woni Shehuujo Borno (Shehu of Borno II) ɗiɗaɓo, diga dungu 1902 yaarii 1922. Bakoo wadgo Shehuujo Borno o meɗi lattaki Shehujo gelle Dikwa (Shehu Of Dikwa). E dungu 1907 of tiggi Yerwa dow hande woni caapiital maako. Abubakar Garbai hannko woni ɓi Shehu Ibrahim Kura ɓi Borno nden boh ɗuun Bandiraawo Shehu Sanda Kura. Hanko'on Shehu Sanda Kura hanko ronoowɗo bandow maako Bukar Garbai ɓawo sooy'tukiy maako. Ɗuun Jowlɗo ɗuun uwwi moh haa gelle Kukawa.

Bukar Kura Borno:
Bukar Kura of Borno.
Bukar Kura bin Umar al-Kanemi.Ɗuun danƴiimo dungu1830, o waɗi Shehuujo Borno (Shehu of Borno)nder dubii taty (3) diiga hiitaade 1881 yaarii 1884. Hanko ƴi'ete roonoowɗo baba maako Umar ɓi Muhammad Al'amin. O waɗi laaɓe ndongidirkii Laamu maako, oɗon njaɓaa shede haraajii (Tax) wakkacire nden, yimɓe siraati'en (Kanuri) ɗon nodda haraajii ɗuun be Kumoreji.Neɗɗo towrankejoo mo innde Heinrich Barth yottake diiwal Borno hiitaade 1851 o tawii Shehuujo Borno Bukar Kura wakkacire nden duuɓi maako 12, o yi bo hanko woni ɓiɗɗo mawɗo nder ɓiɓɓe Umar al-Kanemi. Ɗuun Jowlɗo boh O sooy'ty (died) 1885 ɗuun ouwiimo e gelle Kukawa.

Umar Dan Muhammad Borno:
Umar Of Borno.
Umar I ɓi Muhammad Al'amin o waɗi Shehuujo kanem Borno (Shehu of Borno). Hanko'on woni roonoowɗo baba maako Muhammad Al'amin al-Kanemi. O lattake laamiiɗo ɓawo baba maako sooy'ty dungu 1837, o wanginii laaɓe ndongidirkii Laamorɗe maako lootiraaɗi ɗi baba maako. Hanko o waddi ballitooɓe mo ardoogal ɓeɗun ƴi'ete waziiri'en(Wazirs) hamɓe ballitata mo e shaawariiji ndongidirkii Laamorɗe. Umar o laamii Kanem Borno diiga dungu 1837 yaarii dungu 1853 diiga nden bandow maako Abd-ar-Rahman ɓi Muhammad Al'amin jabtii ardoogal gal hanko woni Shehuujo Borno yaarii dungu 1854. Umar japtii ardoogal gal 1854 laamii Kanem Borno yaarii 1880. Diiga nden boh ƴimɓe fuɗɗi ustaaki gam shiya ndongidirkii Laamorɗe baɗɗum. E dungu 1894 Rabih az-Zubayr ardake ƴimɓe ɗuɓɓe sooja'en diiga fowna Lesdii Sudan ɓe nasty Bornu ɓe japtii ardoogal gal. 
Umar ɓi Muhammad Al'amin ɗuun Jowlɗo, boh o sooy'ty (died) e dungu 1881 ɗuun ouwiimo (burial)e gelle Kukawa.

NDA HABAR DEBBOJO MARDO DABARE HAJE GORUN MuN:
NDA DABARE DEBBOJO GORUM MUN WARTI KUGAL.
Remowo warti gyami debbo mun? Mo wi to ndi, to ko, to ngal, to dam?, Debbo ba wi, ndandi, ndakko, ndan ngal, ndaddam.
Yar ndi, Yar ko, Yar ngal, yar dam.
Bu'u ndi, bu'u ko, bu'u ngal, bu'u dam.
Nda no hunde nden wontiri, ta nani dun noddi ndi, to dun ngyri,to dun noddi ko bo, dun hako,to dun noddi ngal bo dun shobbal, to dun noddi dam bo dun kosam.
Bolwowo nde fu hefti ka, mo wolwata nde bo dun dacchi mo e bawo.

Aliko Dangote:
Aliko Dangote GCON (un danyiimo ƴande 10-4-1957) O mawɗo der ɓe Luumo e Naajeeriya, wanda hanko latti darnii Mangu, bo Mangu Dangote, (ƙungiya) mauɓum (pelle-kugal) e hirnaa Afirka. E wi'uki Bloomberg Billionaires Index, ɗum kiyastake dongu Dangote e dou, dala Amurka biliyan,en 19.9 e lewru 1/2023, non holli o warti ɓurɗo komoye shede e Afrika e laral ɓalewal bo e duniyaru.
Un danyiimo 10 Afrilu 1957 (duuɓi 65)
O janngirde (Education Government College, Birnin Kudu) e (Al-Azhar University Occupation Industrialist).
Mo shede ɓurɗo ko moye e Afrika, Aliko Dangote, tiggi manngu e kamfani mako Dangote Siminti, gaɓuri kogane e Afirka, woodi koyari kashije 85% Ɗum simintin ko o soranta jama'are e junngo kamfaniho lesɗe (saffo 10) e Afirka.
Ɓaawo duuɓi Ɗuɗɗi e kamfani taki ɗum Dangote e Najeriya o fuɗɗi kuugal e lewru 3-2022.

Kanem Bornu Empire:
Laamorɗe Kanem Bornu.
Kanem Bornu ɗuun fellere laamowki ko hawti felle Naajeeriya, Nijar, Cameroon, Libiya e Chadii. Ɗuun andiraaɓe laarabanko'en (Arabian) ɓe ilmu geography, dungu 8th hiitaale downiyaaroow (8th Century) har yaarii hiitaade 1900s. 
Taarihi Laamorɗe nden.
Kanem Bornu(700-1380) e jotta, Ɗuun felleji hawti Chadii, Naajeeriya be Libiya. Ɗun won keerol e woɗɗaaki diiga lesdii Chadii, fombina lesdii Libiya, fowna Lesdii Nijar, wayla-ta-fowna lesdii Naajeeriya be wayla lesdii Cameroon. Innde "Kanem" waari diiga "anem" (waiy fombina Teda e ɗemngal kaanuuri). 
Hiitaale downiyaaroow (8th Century), Wahb ɓi Munabbih ɗon ƴi'e yimɓe Teda-Tubu edow innde Zaghawa, hanko ma Muhammad ɓi Musa al-Kwarizmi inni innde maɓɓe dow zaghawa bano ɓii al-Nadim yi'i eder debtere maako nde al-Fihriz e 10th Century.
Yimɓe bolwooɓe be ɗemngal Kanembu ɗon warta felleji Kanem, hamɓe balliti ummago yimɓe Kanuri. Yimɓe Kanuri ɓe zaghawa ɓe kauty gowrof (group) innde maɓɓe Magumi. Hennduki lesdii sahaara waddi felle ɗiɗi; wodi ɓe ɗemngal Teda-Daza fowna-ta-wayla maayo Chadii, wodi ɓe ɗemngal Chadic ɓeɗon hirnaa maayo Chadii(Bornu e lesdii hausanko'en/Hausa)
Wakkacire Ardoogal Duguwa (700-1086).
Kanem ɗon hawti ɓe yimɓe luuɓe diiga gelle Bilma eder felle Kawar. Ɗuun ɗon wadda koriiɓe diiga nder Kanem eder laawol luumo gol. Sayf b. Dhi Yazan waɗi ardoogal ɓurgal gal durooɓe ɓe innde Magumi hankowdee 9th e 10th Century. Yimɓe Mais ardake ƴimɓe siraati'en e Ngalaga, Kangu, Kayi, Kuburi, Kaguwa, Tomgra be Tubu. 
Al-Yaqub e hiitaade 1872 ƴi'ii hande Laamorɗe Kanem nde ɗon nder Laamorɗe taty mawɗe. O yii yimɓe Zaghawa hamɓe ƴiite Kanin. Hanko bo Al-Muhallabi yi'i woodi gelle ɗiɗi e Laamorɗe nden. Woodi Manan, laamɗo maɓɓe yi hanko hokkata njamu be ƴawky, hokkata fooflee be mayde. Al-Bakri yi diiga 11th Century ɗuun fuɗɗi noddowgoo Laamorɗe nden Kanem. E 12th Century boh Muhammad Al-Idris ɗon yi'a manan dow gelle famarde ɗe ngala maheele. E 13th Century boh hanko ibn Sa'id Almagribi yi'i Manan kanjee woonii caapiital Kanem hamɓe woodi sembe Laamorɗe Jowldanku. 
Wakkacire Sayfanko'en (1085-1846).
Siraati'en Jowlɓe Sayfanko'en tefii ardooki Kanem, diiga yimɓe fulɓe ndurooɓe ɓe zaghawa edow luuɓe maɓɓe ɗe koriiɓe gelle Bilma e mannda e 9th Century ko nden. 
Kaabiila'en diiga fombina maayo Chadii ɓeɗon ƴi'e Kafirun ɓeɗon sooraɓe dow fuushshi e bindigaaji e gelle zawiila. Adadow koriiɓe ɓen 1,000 e 7th Century yaarii 15th Century boh ɓe ɓeydake yaarii 5,000. Mai Hummai fuɗɗi ardoogal hiitaade 1075 o lattake Jowlɗo boh gam moodibbo maako Muhammad b. mani jowlɗo, o hawti gelleeji kay, Tubu, Dabir be Magumi. Hanko'on woni laamiiɗo jowlɗo aranndeejoo e kanem. 
Wakkacire Mai Dunama.
Hanko'on woni roonoowɗo Hummai hiitaade (1210-1259), hanko omti Laamorɗe Kanem nde yaaji masin, omti laawol woolduki be Sultan ɓe lesɗe wayla Africa, o tefi dow ɓee omtaa njangirde al-Rashiq e Cairo gam kuugal hijjow. O omti hawree be kaabiila'en ɓadiiɓe e sooja'en yaarii 41,000, o yahii hijjow nde taty bako wartuki maako Aidab. O habdi be Bulala eder balɗe jayɗiɗi (7), lewru jayɗiɗi (7), e dungu jayɗiɗi (7). O tiggi Gomnaajo e gelle Traghan. 
E 14th Century, Kanem hendake wurooji gamma hawreji/kaɓe. Hawre be Sao faɗɗi laamiiɓe nayo (4); Selemma, Kure ghana es saghir, Kure Kura alkabir e Muhammad I fuu maɓɓe ɗuun ɓiɓɓe Abdullahi b. Kadai. 
Hawre be Bulala faɗɗi laamiiɓe nayo (4) hankowdee 1377 yaarii 1387, kamɓe woni les; Daud Nigalemi, Uthman b. Dawud, Uthman b Idris be Abu Bakr Liyatu. Dungu 1387 Yimɓe Bulala farti Mai Umar b. hooƴi yimɓe maako yaariɓe Bornu(hirnaa maayo Chadii) diiga Kanembu o ɗali Njimi. Dungu 1460 Ali Gazi habdi bo farti ngaƴƴo maɓɓe, tiggi gelle Ngazargamu(fellere hirnaa maayo Chadii kanjuum ƴi'ete Naajeeriya e jotta). E 16th Century Laamɗo Idris Katakarmabe habdi bo farti Bulala jabti gelle Njimi. Ali Gaji hanko'on woni laamiiɗo aranndeejoo lattiɗo Khaliofajo (Caliph). Bornu yaaji wakkacire laamiiɗo Idris Alooma ɓuri hausanko'en e yimɓe Ahir be Tuareg. 
Hankowdee 1574 yaarii 1583 Sultan Bornu hawti be Ottaman sultan Murad III be sultan morocco. Ɓi Furtu ɗon nodda Idris Alooma innde Aamiiril mu'uminin (ardeeɗo muumini en)gam wadgo shari'a jowldanku. 
Sultan gelle Agadez hamɓe jogii felle ɗuun hooƴata Manda gam luumo ɗe Bilma dungu 1750. Wakkacire 17th e 18th Century,Bornu lattake fellere njande islaama.
Wakkacire Jihaadi Fulɓe.
Fullo Mujaddadijo Shehu Usman ɓi Fodio tefi nastowgo Borno, japti Ngazargamu. Hawre maako nawniɓe masin saini o jabta Laamorɗe nden.
Shehuujo Borno.
Ɓawo hawreji saalake, Umar ɓii Muhammad hanko woni Shehuujo Borno o waddi laaɓe ndongidirkii Laamorɗe nden kesuum, o waddi waziri'en ballitooɓe dow laamuki. Dungu 1893. Rabih az-Zubayr nasty Bornu be yimɓe maako diiga fowna Lesdii Sudan o jabti Laamorɗe nden. O faɗɗi Shehu Ashimi, Shehu Kyari be Shehu Sanda Wuduroma. Towranko'en inni mo hanko woni Shehuujo Borno yaarii hiitaade 1900 wakkaci hawre kousserie ɗon Faransanko'en faɗɗi mo. Faransanko'en tiggi Abubakar hanko woni Shehuujo Dikwa ɓawo ɗon towranko'en fooɗimo o warti Shehuujo Borno. Shehu Garbai hanko tiggi Yerwa hitaande 1907. 
Ɓawo hawre downiyaaroow aranndeere, yimɓe Deutsch-Bornu hamɓe laamooto Bornu. Sanda Kura warti Shehuujo Borno ɓawo mayde baba maako hiitaade 1922, ɓawo ɗon Sanda Kura Shehuujo Dikwa hanko warti Shehuujo Borno 1937. Hiitaade 1961 jogiiɓe Bornu shubty dow nastoky nder laamiiɓe Naajeeriya. Hande woni Laamorɗe Diiwal Borno e jotta (present years). 

Laamorɗe Diiwal Borno:
Borno Emirates (Laamorɗe Diiwal Borno).
Ɗum Laamorɗe mauɗe e lesdii Naajeeriya wonde diiwal Borno, ronaade diiga Laamorɗe Kanem Bornu. Ɗun tiggi nde e 20th Century fuu laamiiɓe Laamorɗe nden e jooni ɗun roonuɓe laamiiɓe Laamorɗe Kanem Bornu duuɓi Ɗuɗɗi saaliiɗi(ko ɓuri 1000). Kila Laamiiɗo Laamorɗe nden fuu ɗun ɗon yi'a ɗun innde Shehuujo Borno Shehu of Borno.
Ɓeɗon ngaɗa fuu kuujeeji ɗi laamiiɓe Kanem Bornu waɗata, ɓeɗon njooɗi e gelle Maiduguri Diiwal Borno ɗon ɓe ɗuuɗi, ɓegon bo bandiraaɓe ɓe ɗemngal kaanuuri yaarii miliyonji 4 e keddo'en.
Muhammad Al'amin al-Kanemi hanko'on woni Shehuujo Bornu aranndeejoo fartuɗo Safwanko'en diiga laamu o jabti Laamorɗe nden e 19th Century. 
Taarihi Laamorɗe nden.
Laamorɗe Bornu wonnataake (collapses) wakkacire Rabih Zubayr ɓi Fadlallah o jabti sembee ndin hooriɗum gelle Dikwa e hitaande 1893. Yimɓe Faransanko'en (French) faɗɗi Rabih Zubayr on ɓe ɓili Sanda Kura warti Shehuujo Dikwa e hiitaade 1900. Ɓawo ɗon banndu maako Umar Abubakar Garbai hanko latti ardooɗo Shehuujo Bornu. Ɓawo ɗon laamorɗe ɗen latti ɗiɗi, Shehuujo Dikwa e Shehuujo Borno.
Laamiiɓe Laamorɗe Nden.
Diiga 1902 yaarii 1922 (Umar Abubakar Garbai ɓi Ibrahim)
Diiga 1922 yaarii 1937 (Sanda Kura)
Diiga 1937 yaarii 1967 ( Umar ɓi Muhammad/Sanda Kyarimi)
Diiga 1968 1974 (Umar ɓi Abubakar Garbai)
Diiga 1974 yaarii 2009 (Mustapha ɓi Umar Kyari El-Kanemi)
Diiga 2009 yaarii jotta/jooni (present years) Abubakar ɓi Umar Garbai. 
Hukumaaje Pamaru Famaareeje saffo e joo'y (15) gonɗe les ardoogal Laamorɗe Diiwal Borno, kanjee woni les ɗoo;.
Abadam
Chibok
Gubio
Guzamala
Jere
Kaga
Konduga
Kukawa
Mafa
Magumeri
Maiduguri
Marte
Mobbar
Monguno
Nganzai 

Muhammad Al'amin al-Kanemi:
Muhammad Al'amin al-Kanemi.
Shehuujo Al-hajj Muhammad Al'amin al-Kanemi lattake jagordo moodibbo boh gimɗo siyaasajo. Hanko'on woni Shehuujo Borno aranndeejoo, Ɗuun danƴiimo hiitaade 1776 yaarii 1837 nder gordam maako. Hanko farti yimɓe Safwanko'en boh o tiggi yimɓe maako e Laamorɗe kanem Borno yaarii handemen. Ɓinngel maako Umar lattiɗo Shehuujo Borno hanko himmiti japtuki ardoogal gal diiga jowɗe Safwanko'en ɓawo ɓe laami Laamorɗe nden duɓi 800 (800years).
Taarihi jabtowgo ardoogal laamuki.
Hanko Muhammad Al'amin al-Kanemi baba maako ɗuun laƴol Kanembu en, inna maako boh ɗuun laƴol Shuwa Arab en diiga gelle Murzuk(kanjee ƴi'e Libya e gotta). Yimɓe Fulɓe Mujaddadiijo Usmanu ɓi Fodio ɓe anniyyi nastowgo Borno ɓe njapta ardoogal gal hiitaade 1808 les laamu Dunama XI Lefiami(Mai borno). Ɓe keɓii felle seɗɗa, ɓe gowly(burnt) caapiital maako gelle Ngazargamu ɓe ɓuuri sembe maako. Ɗon o tefoo'yi ballitooɓe dow yimɓe fulɓe, o noddi Muhammad Al'amin al-Kanemi dow wallitamo hawree, hanko boh o noddoiy laƴol maɓɓe ɓe Kanembu e Shuwa Arab. Ɓe nootaake moh ɓe japtii hawre nden boh. Laamɗo on (Dunama XI Lefiami) mo gelle Borno hokki Muhammad Al'amin al-Kanemi manngu hanko woni Shehuujo Borno, diiga nden o latti hanko woodi tokkoyɓemo ɗuɓɓe, e sembe bolwowo be Laamorɗe Sokoto nde fulɓe mujaddadijo Shehu Usman ɓi Fodio. Kawuu Dunama XI Lefiami ittimo diiga laamuki dungu 1809, saini Muhammad Al'amin al-Kanemi wartini mo dow kujeerawal gal (mai of Borno) 1813. 
Reenuki yimɓe maako diiga Sokkotan ko'en(Yimɓe Sokoto).
Hawre maako be Laamorɗe fulɓe nde diiwal Sokoto foowii masin, oɗon lildanayɓe ɗereeji dow hawre nden ɓawo habduki be bindigaaji. Ɓeɗon ngaɗa non tin laamu Shehu Usman ɓi Fodio har yaarii dow ɓinngel maako Muhammad Bello. Hanko al-Kanemi oɗon tefa hakki yimɓe maako Kedduɓe maako dow nastoiki maɓɓe diiwal Borno lattiɓe Jowlɓe yaarii duuɓi 800. Haalaaji dow noh jihaadi maɓɓe e ardoogal Jowlɓe hanjum latti haalaji ko wolwete e jotta.
Laamu maako e Laamorɗe Bornu.
Ɓawo hawreji maako be yimɓe Fulɓe ɓe Sokoto o japtii ardoogal gal nden boh o sankitay laaɓe ndongidirkii Laamorɗe nden ɗuun Safwanko'en tiggi, o ɓili yimɓe maako e korooje yimɓe Safwanko'en ɓen ɗun (Chima chidibe). Hanko bo mo innde Cohen yeddi dow tigguki ardoogal siyaasa hiitaale 19th(Century) dow bandiraaku ɗuun waɗete, o yeddi dow al-Kanemi tigga dow bandiraaku/emɗuuki bandowm. Hankowdee 1823 yaarii 1918 ɗuun yinndi ɗereeji dow jooɗaaki njam ɓuri temeere (100). Yimɓe jeygo'o (6) daraake e ɓawo maako dow laamuki Borno, kamɓe woni;
Al-Hajj Sudani(soobaajo baccaaku maako)
Al-Hajj Malia (Soobaajo luumo maako)
Mauniraawo kore maako ardooɗo Kanenbu Kuburi e kanem dow hanko woni Shettima Kuburi, 
sai yimɓe tato (3) diiga nder Shuwa Arab en, 
Mallam Muhammad Tirap(ɓi baghirimi)
Malam Ibrahim Wadaima (ɓi wadai)
Malam Ahmad (ɓi gonomi).
Diiga nden ɗuun fuɗɗi sekowgoo dow ko hanko al-Kanemi o ɓuri Dunama sembe e diiwal gal. Taarihi hollii al-Kanemi lattake Shehuujo Borno hiitaade 1810s waala kaaɓay (fight/competition)bako 1820. al-Kanemi lattake ɓurɗo sembee faat har Dunama onma. Yimɓe wonɓe ɓawo Dunama XI Lefiami, ƴii kamɓe yarii hawre (attack) dow al-Kanemi dow ɓe faɗɗamo e hiitaade 1820. 
Dunama be laamɗo Burgomanda ɓi baguirmi ɓe inni fartuki al-Kanemi be kawtal hoore e yimɓe lesdii yaasi, saini ɓe keɓai nasaraaku dow non, ɗuun lattini bamdow Dunama dow hanko wani mai(mai of Borno). Diiga nden boh al-Kanemi lattake Shehuujo Borno mo ardoogal ɓurngal. 
E hiitaade 1814, al-Kanemi mahii caapiital maako e gelle Kukawa ɗon o nootooto innde Shehuujo Borno ɓurnaaɗo. Diiga hiitaade 1819-20 mai Dunama o nastiy hawreji/kaɓe be al-Kanemi ɓawo ɗon o faɗɗama(killed).
E nder hiitaale 1820s al-Kanemi fartii fulɓe ɓe Sokoto diiga nden Bornu, o japtii gelle Deya-Damaturu wonɗe junngo Laamorɗe kotoko ngooduɓe gelleeji; Kusseri, Ngulfai be logone ɓaawo duufuki yimɓe bagirmi e dungu 1824. 
Yimɓe Safwanko'en(sayfawa) warti dow laamu ɓawo maayuki al-Kanemi e dungu 1837. E hiitaade 1846 laamɗo (mai of Borno) omti hawree wondee, ɓi al-Kanemi Umar hanko woni faɗɗuɗo hiite hawre nden. Umar diiga ɗon o latti ardooɗo felle ɗen ɓauɗo faɗɗuɗo kila hawreji/kaɓe dow laamuki faat.
Major Dixon Denham noyii'ri al-Kanemi.
Hiitaade 1823, Dixon Denham be Hugh clappertor njottake diiwal Borno, ɓe ngiidi be al-Kanemi, ɗon hanko Dixon Denham noyii'ri al-Kanemi haalaaji belɗi ɗuɗɗi boh, kannji woni ɗoo les; 
"Hanko al-Kanemi ɗuun riskuɗoo be gikkuuji boɗɗi ɗi ardoogal, ɗun adalɗinɗo bo, o woodi toɗɗinaakiy dow ngonga, o manaaɗo dow salaaki japgo o latto Sultan"
~~ Dixon Denham 
Mayde maako (His Death).
Muhammad Al'amin al-Kanemi (Shehuujo Borno aranndeejoo) o maayi dungu 1837, ɗuun waɗa nii mo yanaade e gelle Kukawa, diiwal Borno e lesdii Naajeeriya. 

Oluseyi Abiodun Makinde:
Oluseyi Abiodun makinde ( Eriminmo 25 lewru Bowte duubi 1967) eii lysidi Naajeeriya loumou toe siyasa'en jornii eii gwamnajjo Diiwal Oyo gada 29 lewru Duujal duubi 2019.

Bajoga:
Bajoga 
Ɗuun gelle hedkota hukuumare pamarde nde Fuunakaƴee e diiwal Gombe ta wayla, lesdii Naajeeriya. Hankowdee gelle ɗen ɗon wodi woɗɗugo yaadu 9km e Ashaka (ɗon kamfaniwa nnamoonga leddi warta siminti ko howrete e maheele downiyaaroow).  Alhaji Ibraahima Cheldu hanko'on woni jagordo shubtaaɗo ardiiɗo hukumaare Pamarde Famaareere nde Funakaye e diiwal Gombe. Hanko boh Alhaji Yakubu Muhammad Kwairanga nnayaɓo (4) e Laamu hanko woni laamiiɗo hukuumare pamarde nde Fuunakaƴee o ronii korowal gal diiga mauniiko (Alhaji Mu'azu Kwairanga) o maayi lewru Agustus hiitaade 2022. Lamɗo gelle Bajooga hanko ƴi'ete Abubakar Garba Muhammad. Ɗuun gelle Fulɓe, fulfulde ɗemngal woni ɓuurnaagal e gelle ɗen, wodi Ɗengaal siraati'en (Kanuri), Bolawa. 
Njangirɗee hukuumare pamarde nde Fuunakaƴee.
Njangirde maude ndee Polytechnics diiwal Gombe
Njangirde Government Secondary School Bajooga South (fombina gelle)
Njangirde Government Secondary School Bajooga
Njangirde Vocational Training Centre Bajooga
Njangirde Federal Government Girls College (njangirde Gomnaaty Naajeeriya ndee Rewɓe)
Njangirde Sangaru gelle Bajooga
Njangirde fukaraaɓe/almaajiri'en qur'anaa 
Njangirde JIBWIS nde Secondary School Bajooga

Yamaltu Deba:
Yamaltu Deba.
Ɗuun gelle ƴi'ete Yaamaltuu Deeba e nder Diiwal Gombe ta shaka, nder lesdii Naajeeriya. Ɗuun Hukuumare pamarde e diiwal Gombe, Deeba ɗon ƴi'e hedkota hukuumare nden. Yimɓe Fulɓe be Kaabiila'en ɗemngal Tera hamɓe ɓowri Ɗuuɗuki e gelle ɗen. Alh Abubakar Ali hanko'owoni jagordo laamiiɗo hukuumare pamarde nde Yaamaltuu Deeba, Q S Usmanu bo hanko woni laamiiɗo gelle Deeba. Hanko boh Alhaji Shuaibu Umaru Galaadiima (Walin Deeba) hanko'on woni jagordo shubtaaɗo ardotooɗo hukuumare pamarde nde Yaamaltuu Deeba. Jowlɓe hamɓe woni ɓuurnaaɓe e gelle ɗen, maayo gelle dadin kowa ɗon waali ta gelle Deeba ɗen e adadow 1,981km2. Ɓegon adadow yimɓe 255,248 e hiitaade 2006 wakkaci ɗuun hawti adadow yimɓe lesdii Naajeeriya. 
Njangirɗe e Yaamaltuu Deeba.
Ɓegon njangirɗe ɗuuɗɗe ɗe fuɗɗuki njande, shaakare e mauɗe fuu, kanje woni les ɗoo;
Njangirde Asas Primary School nde JIBWIS
Njangirde Model Primary Deba
Njangirde Zagaina Primary School
Njangirde Government Secondary School Deba
Njangirde Government Junior Secondary School Deba
GSTC Deba
Amtas Secondary School Deba

Alkaleri:
Alkaleri.
Ɗuun gelle nder Diiwal Bauchi e lesdii Naajeeriya, ɗuun Hukuumare pamarde e diiwal Bauchi ta wayla. Gelle ɗen woodi yimɓe adadow 329,424(e habaru dungu 2006 wakkacire ɗuun waɗi limngal yimɓe lesdii Naajeeriya/census). Gelle ɗen woodi njayri adadow 5,918km2, nden boh ɗe gon nambaaji limngal gelleeji 743(postal code). 
Ɗuun gelle Fulɓe ɓe fulfulde, woodi siraati'en/ Kanuri, woodi Duguraawa, woodi Guruntaawa be kaabiila'en Labur(ƴimɓe jaku) fuu. 
Gelle Alkaleri won gelle e les maare, woodi Pali, Duguri be Gwana. Pali woodi nguron pamaaron ba Fanti, Gar, Gokaru, Guma be Gwaram. Duguri bo won Yankari, Badara, Dagudi, Dan, Gajin Duguri, Mainamaji, Yashi be Yelwan Duguri. Gwana bo ɗon ta fombina gelle Alkaleri.

Kumo:
Kumo.
Gelle Kumo ɗuun mauɗe lattide hedkota hukuumare pamarde nde Akko e diiwal Gombe. Nde lattake gelle ɗiɗawre ɓaawo gelle Gombe e hoje wadgo luumo/luuɓe. Ɗuun ɗon waɗa luumo dabbaajii pamarji e mauɗi, woodi luumo kareejii Ƴamduu fuu(Masardi,muuri, biriiji,ƴebbe fuu). Yimɓe Fulɓe ɓe fulfulde hamɓe ƴiite ɓuri ɗuuɗugo sey boh Tangalee en be Hausanko'en(Hausa people). Ɗuun ɗon waɗa yaadu 40km hankowdee gelle Gombe e gelle Kumo. Ɓegon laawol tokkugol nder gelle Gombe e Billiri.
Yimɓe anndaaɓe mauɓe e gelle Kumo.
Usman Bello Kumo (Waakiiliijoo gelle ɗen e Gomnaaty mauɗum lesdii Naajeeriya)
Aliyu Modibbo Umar (Ministaajo Abuja e duuɓi ɓaawo)
Sa'idu Umar Kumo (Gimɗo siyaasajo Naajeeriya)
Dr Usman Arɗo Kumo
Gidado Bello Kumo 
Dr Babayo Arɗo Kumo
E lewru Agustus hiitaade 2022 jagorɗo lesdii Naajeeriya Muhammadu Buhari omti laaɓe mahaaɗe ɗe adadow 66km kawtuɗe diiwal Gombe, Taraba be Adamawa gam hoygo jahaale e luuɓe fuu. 
Hiimoɓe

Janngirde mawde gollital Abdu Gusau:
Janngirde Abdu Gusau Gusau un janngirde gollital diiwal hukuma jottoriide nɗer Talata marafa, diiwal Zamfara, Naajeeriya.
Ñawnuuɗun tiggi fannuwal,tigguɗo taarihi nde gollital un tiggaangal nɗer 1992 ɓaawo nde Gomnaajo diiwal Sakwotobe kiiɗo, Yahaya Abdulkarim wanni junngo e dow heɓaango janngirde maude gollital diiwal nder Talata marafa. Hukumaare diiwal Sokoto woo'itini innɗe nden haa Abdu Gusau polytechnic'nder lewru ɗiɗiru
laaru Kadi
Academic libraries in Nigeria

Yimɓe Irigwe:
Yimɓe Irigwe (rigwe neIrigwe; Hawsare miyango) bedon heɓabe haa fellel fetel annadi bassa je nukkuure Pilato, middle belt (caaka) Naajeeriya. Bedon bolwa be ɗemngal rigwe (shima nkorigwe), ɗemngal filato’on. Mangaman biro konjim wuro miango, hirna be wuro mango wuro manjos.
Besendindiri.
Irigwe Yimɓe be heɓata haa bassa, jos haa waila be jos fommbina fetel-fetel annaji je nukkuure filato be haa kawru fetel je fommbina nukkuure Kaduna, Naajeeriya.
Al’adaji/Biiruki Maɓɓe
Womugo.
Nobe womurtaje Irigwe, derkr’en remobe Irigwe koburi dudugo bedon diiwa gam sen biddigo napuda demri haa derbarle o hawtibe demri reemugo luttano kawtal maɓɓe kude be koutal andibe bana kiila, pidobe, sebobe ledde kanbe ma belwodi nobe fiyata baude maɓɓe.bodde.
Non non bo pidobe donwawa bonnigo dimbigo dabbaji doulawul al’adaji wodon von’ina dabbaji ladde be asuttini hulgo.
Teegal.
Sangree (1969) obindi:.
“nobe watta teegal man je Irigwe hakobe jaabimo koyidi obangal robe be warɓe roɓe ɗuɗɗum haa wakkere fere-fere haa yake yayi maɓɓe jey mawɓe o hadi sirgal kotai. O hokki habr patrivirilocal obibi denbo onatihi dadirabe bukkwai je debbo danyi be goriko debbe Jodi be goriko hareeji. Gam man robe don wailiti hala ya hango warbe ɗudbe jutal balde maɓɓe senibe danyi beden yaare bone wakkati-wakkati yahugo lewru feere je children dependentan bukkwai maisata be maɓɓe.kawtal tsafa morgo belu, houtibe befat mobbe robeje linyol.
Behakki yenigo Yimɓe kududi Irigwe beden tokka dina jananbe dergebe 620% je dudugo ummatre, 28.0% tokkobe di na kirista’en (bedi be hore maɓɓe 55.0% furotesta 25.0% be roman katolika 20.0% yake tokkobe dina islama bedon mari gebe 10.0% dudugo ummatore.
Laamu.
Haa al’adaji maɓɓe, maɓɓe, Irigwe wakkere mon hore maɓɓe bedon sendindiri mowala jargwardo je siyasa gonde beedorde beburi maanugo dou al’adaji maɓɓe beboyi hokkugo dottien kiristoci mo wakkere’en lenyol man be dudugo konbe don hakkilana al’adaji mabba “Dumburi nibe” be nodum dillindiri gam jon de jam Yimɓe be lenyol.
Diina.
Behokki yenigo Yimɓe kududi Irigwe bedon tokka diina lenyol dergebe 62.0% mo dudugo ummatore, 28.0% tokkobe diina kirista’e (be Jodi be hore maɓɓe 55.0% furostesta 25.0% be roman katolika 20.0%) yake tokkobe dina islama be dergebe 10.0% je dudugo jamaje.

Yimɓe Isoko:
Yimɓe Isoko hawta’en gam golle bedonjodi haa wakkere isoko je nukkuure delta. Be bayelsa gam Naajeeriya.
Yimɓe maɓɓe’on haa nukkuure fanbina Naajeeriya kombi waila waladu hirna niger delta. Nukkuure delta be bayelsa je der nukkuure 36 mo kawtal Naajeeriya.
Demngal.
Yimɓe isoko bedon bolwa be dingal isoko, nadi be dingal man sosaai be dingal urhobo, dingal epie-atissa, dingal/engenni james w.welch otabitini be biyugo dingal isoko mo je dingal urhobo, be Yimɓe dudbe be sendigo ko’onumi.
Al’ada isoko wodon wandi be al’adaji dude haa nukkuure neja-delta je houtibe, urhobo, ijow bw anioma. Urhobo bedon hawtindiri be dingal be al’adaji maɓɓe,nodun fuddi danyigo fitina man halawuindebe kawtal al’adaji maɓɓe urhobo be isoko haa dared sobo. Fat lenyol maɓɓe be saali inde man.

Yimɓe Olukumi:
Yimɓe olukumi tokkere’en je Yoruba je wakkere Aniochaa mo waila haa nukkuure Delta, Naajeeriya. Olukiwumi be mai sibe ummatore jetati hirma mayo neja, be hande be audibe bedon wondi derdi rabe odina haliddi anioma. Hader tarihaa maɓɓe, odianis kambe on bandirabe yarbanke’en haa wakkere al’adaji maɓɓe anioma. Wuro’en ukwu Nzu (ECO EFUN) kanjumo’on hedikwata tarihaje Yimɓe olukwami denbo haa al’adaji obi mo UKWU NZU, Agbogidi kanko’on ardibe haa nowoni jotta obi konko’on HRM obi ogoh 1. Kawyeji olukwumi bedon aradibobe be pondi nobe subata okpala obi, de kanko’on okpala (gerontocracry) je Yoruba.odianias hande bedon larabe igbos hader nukkuure delta, don hawti be ezechime nodun wadi derdi derdi rabe idumuje. Yimɓe aniochaa (enuani be olukwumi, ndokwo (ukwuani), ika, be oshimili je nukkuure delta.
Dume Habar Tesde.
Olukwumi asili maɓɓe haa wakkere hirna puuna mayo nejo haa nyamo. Wakkere’en maɓɓe man be wodi fetel siiga alli be koolin jeberburi andigo be “NZE” haa dingal Yoruba, nowoni be al;adaji Yimɓe wakkere man debe wasatadun bedon kutundira be man gam al’adaji fere-fere.
Biidi.
Bigo olikwumi fere daubiya bedon numa “sabojo’am” nanon “sabajo”am” haa dingal Yoruba.
Taariihawol.
Hawtigo be al’adaji hondiko je olukwumi, olukwumi dum hawti hondiko je olukwumi, olukwumi dum hawti be oran asili ibo be cedol dago owo,akure ko tai akoko haatibe wuro man olukwumi bedon bolwa domon. 
Gam hawtigo yesu be badigo kawye maɓɓe hawtande be bulwobe be Enuani, hande bedon bowa be dingal olukwumi be mo Enuani je bolle igbo. Nonno bo be don sembina du’aji be du’aji hader dingal maɓɓe je asili’en, yake bedon hafda todigo gam bolwugo be dingal man dabukkwai maɓɓe be denbe ummatore maɓɓe fat.
Dergure maɓɓe deiwoni dir lanyol maɓɓe odiani, ugbadu be ukwu-nzu’en kanko’on tan donbolwa be dingal didi be luttube’on bolwa be dingal enuani. Haa biigo yenande naage 24 october hitande 2010, bedon taska jangitiko be hula hondiko be gasa haa olukwumi gam feddigo dingal. Andibe andal demde kambe bedon mofta bolle demde.
Jutugo dubi 40 chief GB nkemnacho, lauya fere daga asili olukwumi obindi tahiri Yimɓe mako banana dotti’en bi’e ha’der kujeni saawi jatal baide be al’adaji hondiko.

Yande Julde:
Yande belbeltigo julbe je dumdum wada jedidi de hitande yalti. Julde gebe didi, wodi julde manga be julde fetel. Kanjim’on julde fetel bedon sikul, bawo tinmingo sumai, haa lewrusumai denbo bulbe don hirsa gertode be bedon yilla bandirabe.
Julde manga bedon sikulinidum bawo balde caffan enayi dag’en tinmingo sumai je le uru sumay Ramadan handiman fottibe lewru saffoi didi je lewu lailaji.
Tariha/Taariihawol.
Kanjim’on dulde fete bedon wada bawo tin mingo sumayhaa lewru sumai Ramadan, tube lari lewru haa jamma nogas ejenai ko caffan etati pina fajiri be jullar sumai kanjim dulde laihaji bede saffo. Wato saffo lewru, baala, beebe, dammiri, nagge, be geloba.
Yande julde sumai wato julde sumay.
Be fajri bawo tolgo ko’e komai yiwan borna limes kesum, yahajulurde gam julugo salli kere. Sebo dadirabe robe bede pan je juldar. Jebe yaamata haa sare sendana derdirabe be wurabe. Yande julde komoi don heba konyamata yaaloma’on je fere julbe allafu.
Julde Mannga.
Yande julde manga/julde lailaji.
Yande julde be fajri komoi don borba boddum, donburi digo lumse dane jum mu Allah hokki amma bo awawan a borna lumse ko’ayide na’ayibe’on amma towodi hirsata beyedi gaddo nanga hondikoma setagwaddo warti haa sallakere bawo liman manga hirsi jaudiri mako todum warti dum warti julurde mumanri jaudiri sai hirsa. Haa liddi haasa’en yande bebilal jaudiri sai pina fajiri behawa kanko’on tekki man bebon’ene dum habesa’adum komai metta.
Piina fajiri be jiffinan jaudiri man jebiti haa beta’e dindira be hokka bukkwai be sendara keddu’en be derdirabe.
Lottano kuselman be depan habeas’al haa besendana Yimɓe saare komo hosa jemun. Hore be koste jaudiri beporna haa beresa bawo balde sedde bedeffa bin yaama.
Fere don jug’ena sai yake takuta haa kanjim’on al’adaji Hawsare’en.

Yande Arfa:
Yande arfa shutare’on je julbe je jiffi yande jenai haa lewru zulhijjah je calander julbe je lewru. Yande haa kalada julbe (the night of power) yaloma didi be hajji. Be yande haa arande daga hader maude julbe shutare je Eid al-Adua be fewul fajri yande man, jijjobe julbe be yahani yadu daga mina beyan hook koseje fere be balbal bedon yaunadum haire arfat be je balbal arfat daga fellel man annabijo MUHAMMAD (S.W.A.) o wa’azi je ragare haa hitande ragare je jutal balde mako. Feere julbe be don joggi be bigo wakkere ayore alkur’an, debeyeni bigo dina islama dum timmi dum bange haa naage dum.
Babal.
Haire arfat haa hairetondire wodi dared bana kilomita 20 (12 ml) punbina waladupuna kakka haa babal arfat. Haire arfat yaari kombi 70 metres (230 ft) haa dared be bee andimo “haire rahama” (jabal ar-rahma). Hawtigobe al’adaji’en dina islama, todire konko’on fellel be annajo dina islama MUHAMMAD (S.W.S) odari oyattini be wa’azibe bejabbotire ga julbe be bedo timo kugal hijju haa yahugo ragare mako.
Al’adaji/Biiruki.
Haa yande lewru al’hjja bakko jura hijjobe beyotti arfat wodi babal bodai jemari 20 kilometres (12 ml) puna makka, habedari be anniya; bedon wada du’aji tubugo be hakkeji kusali, be dabbitigo rahma domirawo, bedon wa’aza konbi haire arfat. Beden wada daga caaka nage haa mutigo naage, kanjin’on be andibe dargo haa yesu jumirawo (wuque), gotel derkude jijju. Haa namrah julurde hijjobe don jula jura (Dhohr) julugo daabe caaka naage bedon laara hijjun man naafaye tobbe yam naayi be arfat be naage.
Du'a Arafat.
Yaake be husayn bn Ali wajangata du’a yake kude hijju haa haire Arafat haa yande 9 je lewru zul-hijja, julbe hyake ku hijju bedon janga du’a’I Arafat daga juli jura yahago mutuga naage. Bedon ‘yauna naage dum, haa naage d’a’I jefere Yimɓe bedon daari haa haire arfat. Haa naage arfat Yimɓe belwawata yahugo makka beyahaw fellel labdum ba julurde gam hangir go julugo arfat.
Sumoy Yande Arafat.
Sumugo yande arfat Yimɓe behai hijju sumungo yande arfat Yimɓe behai hijju sunna’en jebe dauri maari barjari duddum Allah don yaafa hake dubi didi. Bijoboyi daga Abu Qatadah be emi annabi jo MUHAAMAD (S.W.A) hawtande be su mai yande arfat sai onotibe biyogo: “ wodon fadda aje dubi kosali be be wari”. Imam An-nawawi obiyi der dettere mako al-mamajmu’I hawtande be bolde kowadi dou mako, iman As-shafi’I be sahabo mako bebiyi mustahabbi’en be sumugo naaga arfat. Muwala der arfat. Amma hijjowo muwani haa arfat, imam Ashafi’I der deftere mako Al-mukhtasar be tokkobe mo be yacci bigo (mustahabetabe sumai). Hadigo jijjobe sumai der balde dum tahma manga haa maɓɓe, su mai hajjiwo bone. Gam Annabijo MUHAMMAD (S.W.A) WA SUMAI YAKE WODARI HAA YESUJU MIRAWO WADON WADOn wada du’aji arfat. Haa wakkere fere Yimɓe behijjata bewawan sumugo ga hebugo barka woni der naage man.

Yimɓe Nanumba:
Yimɓe nanumba lenyol man be liddi maɓɓe je al’adaji je wani haa punbina waladu puna wakkere waila liddi Ghana. Bedon naana, nanugli (var.nanuni), dingal gur.
Haabaru Liddi.
Yahugo dubi je 200, be pondi dudugo Yimɓe nanunba haa liddi haa 78,812. Kodejin woni nanumaba kawtal gote je al’adaji be dingal gotel, bewodi gondal be dagamba haa waila be puna be mamprusi hawaila, be koburi be mossi je Burkina faso haa al’adaji’en mama’en je aronde maude-maude man laabi naayebe derdir abe tati, be maude mossi bewurtoyi daga lawul mamerusi. Kujeji jebe taffi hawtibe lekki be man jebe bangini jebolwa be be mamerus: ti nmampurisi, yooba, naanumma ni mossi piiligu nye la kyama maa “asilimen mamprusi dagomba, be nanumba depu hader chama”.
Ti zaa nye la yimmu” enfat men gotel. (mamprusi, dagomba, namumba) be bedon daurindira (passim).
Wuro mango je nanumba kanjim bimbilla, wuro fetel muhuwata haa dared bernuwul mango gunduma’en nanumba je waila haa waila Ghana. Haa jotta bo, bernuwul manga nukkuure nanumba’en fellel jojigo lamdo nanumba, bimbilla naa.
Annaji.
Darnde jeburi maunugo haa deryadu lamu je gargajiya jebe bolwata daman hader English hader “paramount chief” koogo yakee fere “lambdo” kanjim’on kotuman beddigo kiita je ragare man gam fitnaji wala lawal feere be jeselihabbre. Hala maubbe hakimaijo saawi lwnyol. Hader doo dared bimbilla naa be korawal ma ko haa bimbilla konko’on maudo hakimi’en lenyol namumba. Haa al’adaji hakimi maudo mampurugu (Na yiri) bewoni maube hakima’en haa mampurugu hader (younger brother and grand dauther’ amma dubi duddube be panni mo be nayiri gam be kujeji kese be nodon pottini bo binya hidayi gam potting man. Nanumba je gondal badidum haa hakkunde maɓɓe be dagomba, amma be maudo kawtan be mai sayibe be gotel.
Haa Ghana jezaman wodi majalisa be lambe haa sungulla gargajiya woni be babl be daurata haa dared liddi.
Diina.
Diina islama kanjim’on diina nanumba be dagambo be jebeburi andigo be tagali wato’on nunumba je yottayi je dagomba be biiga Yimɓe be boi bedon e’yamta larobe kanbena julbe bedon hoka sadaka ke mama’yan be lottide fellel judigo.
Woni kirita’en sedda koburin Yimɓe katolika je roman katolika.
Bangal.
Bawo banlle je islama jebe didi eid al-fitr be eid al-adha, nanumba je bamgal bugum chugu, damba be naa jigli.

Ɗenmgal Ijaw:
Ɗenmgal Ijaw deefu bedon burtina bolde ijo, bolle be Yimɓe ijaw bedon naapira be man haa punbina Naajeeriya.
Dumsendindiri.
Haa al’adaji man bedon hoosa bolliijaw lisal feere’on haa linyol niger congo (betammi oburti haa linyol feere kawtal jebe yaunata ijoid). Be andibe hawtande be didi bolle maɓɓe je bigo-honde-kude kanjim’on sinanon wala fasali kesum haa niger-congo, sendigo tan be irniman lishe haa dared mande be dogon. Bana mande be dogon, ijoid wala nadigo be fuddigo inde jebe lurata gikko je irinje niger-congo. Kanjim’on waadi joseph Greenberg haader ko’o didi je arande je niger-congo obangini be bigo bedendiri lou daga’en linyol ma. Nodum wooni, gam sonde kujejido, ammari andal dingal gerrit dimmen daal, wodon sekka watugobe haader niger congo, gbo wodon hoosa bolle ijoid, haa dared linyol jonde hoore mako.
Bedo sendindirgo je der otiina be jene wari (1989) be Williamson & blench (2000).
Innde Bee Fellel.
Hales woodi tokkindirde inde dingal ijaw, dudugo Yimɓe be fella daga don blench (2019).
Berbice creole dutch, wolde boima be bedon hutindira haa Guyana owodi kamus je otihaa be woldee ijo teema owodi hawtal bekalabari (kouwenberg 1994)andal bee burde haabaruji haa lewru yuni 2013, be tongi be deffere ikkitigo jangogu izonfie be bedu CD hafere bangal debe yehi jam’a gwamnati nukkute bayelsa. Jami’a niger-delta je hafdigo yajingo tokkindirde defte be kobe nebata haa woldee ijo. Famtigo giimal be iyaunigo mayo nunbe Gabriel okora nodum ilata.

Yimɓe Gwandara:
Yimɓe Gwandara']' je gotel der lenyol Naajeeriya. Bedon der feere nukkuure je Abuja, nasarawa, kano, niger bee kaduna.
Asliji.
Lenyol gwandara behebi asilima daga kano, kanbe’on iyaaluuji barbushe be je Yimɓe lari asali maɓɓe bana Yimɓe kano, bakko bagauda. Haa hitaande 1476 be’eggi dagadon kano, hales jagwardo yarima karshi (gwandara) gam doggugo zambugo diina je wartigo juldo. Yarima gwandara minyi rawo lamdo mulamata mu yardi bee nastingo diina islama haa kita haa kano, ohabbi anniya sottingo kala dabi’a maguzawa maɓɓe’en. Fuube non, derdiko wadi anniya wotakko diina le mama’en mako kanjim’on biligo hakkilo, imani je diina mohakkata mangogam dabbaji haa derde marbe daude je belu.
Be de’e hushitini hulnego ko owartijuldo kobou haa beljegganabe, kanko be tokkobe mo be eggi yahugo yeso be satingo daga lamdo lomowo oyaribe jukun haa zaman saffoi jedidi be soffoi jetati haa ragere man habesankiti yahugo wakkereji man be dudbe je Najeeriya.
Yimɓe Gwandara Je Karshi.
Yimɓe gwandara je karshi kanbe’on be buri wawugo be buri komoi andigo lenyol gwandara haa Naajeeriya. Kanko’on wuro onje arande be hawtigo Naajeeriya oyarda ni mo. Wuro’on je arande be hebi lamdo gwandara, Alhaji sani Mohammed-bako.
Der Yimɓe andabe gwandara woodi sara una je gwandara umaru tanko al-makura, senator mo hakkilta man nasarawa je ponbina kadibo gwamna nukkuure nasarawa mu’indemako sardauna gwandara deepu haa yande 27 haa lewru maris, 2021 woodi andado gwandara konko’on Muhammad danladi yakubu, kiddum ballitiwo gwamna je nukkuure filato.
Fiilu.
Ummatore gwandara beburi remugo be pidigo be fiilu be fiiluji amma wargo andal hirna dunya, Yimɓe be dudbe be acci fiilu man gam kugal hipinere danijum.
Demngal.
Yimɓe gwandara bedon bolwa dingal Hawsare gwandara. Dingal donbadi be dingal Hawsarere amma wala nobe yirgindirita be dingal ara bre je bewo-bewo dum.
Durbar.
Ba’ugo durbar koo bandal durbar feere bangal kiddum je al’adaji jebe wadata haa hitaande-hitaande na feere der nukkuje Naajeeriya. Bangal do je hollingo seyo yahugo radere lauru Ramadan be limmingo bangal julde man be julde manga. Bedon pudda balga durbar be julde salli kere hafajri yande mon deenbo sailambo burta be bag’obe fucci be bambe be doffobe beburti bedon tokkindiri beden sammna fucci. Deenbo sai waziri’en be be luttibe Yimɓe fadaman be burti bedon homna lamdo bedon bedon lina dande haa lamurtde maɓɓe.
Asiili bangal durbur ofuddi haa zaman soffoi nayi 14, haa kano wuro mango waila Naajeeriya.
Beburi andigo bangal hagure maude jetta usa’en bana kano, sakkwato, zariya, katsina be bida deenba don dasa hokkilo wancobe. Mabbitabe gite.
Taarihawol Durbar.
Nasarawa lami moral debe waddi bangal durbur haa Naajeeriya. Asili durbur wari’on daga dingal farisa dagadon banle seyobe bawogo bawa maɓɓe gam queen victoria hadarde queen india je indiya bawo nastigo nasara’en je birtaniya liddi je india haa hitaande 1877.
Be fuddi bangal durbar je arande haa Naajeeriyande hitaande 1911, bawo bangat man oyehi yeso haa dubi 1924, 1925,1948,1960, be 1972.
Bangal man yehi yeso liddi har wargo ben jotta deenbu donder koburi jamming bamle haa wailw Naajeeriya.
Bawo Hebigo Hoore.
Betimmini bangal durbur haa kawtal 2nd world block and African festival of arts and culture jebeburi andigo be bangal FESTAC 77. Haa hakkilo nasara’en be nasti nibe yidigo bangal man je durbur gam be beddani soja’en ba’ugo fucci be faunigo julde.

Okon Efreti Abang:
Okon Efreti Abang (duggu 10 Janaayo, 1961) O woni o Oron e o jeyaaɗo to Fedde Fedde Ɓurnde Fedde e Abuja.
Firo.
O jibinaa e 10 lewru lewru lewru jeenuru 1961 e Oduo-Ebughu Mbo LGA. O yahi Central School Ebughu Mbo L.G.A.(Diiwal Akwa Ibom),(January 1968 - June 1973) nden, St.Vincents Secondary School Oti Oron, Oron L.G.A (Diiwal Akwa Ibom)

Ɗemngal Abanyom:
Abanyom, ko Bakor, ko ɗemngal Ekoid nder Niger - Congo. Yimɓe Abanyom e nder leydi Cross River nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Yimɓe Abanyom nder bantoidɓe worgo, Abanyom e ɗemɗe Bantu. Ɗemngal ngal ina woodi tonal e woodi ɗemngal Niger - Congo.
Abanyom woni kadi clan/Ward nder Ikom. Ɗum hawti e ummaatooje ɗe ɗo: Edor, Abangork, Akumabal, Abinti, Nkim, Nkum, Nkarassi 11, Nkarassi 1, Abankang, Etikpe, e Nkonfap. Abankang noddiraa bana inna Abanyom.

Abayi Okoroato:
Abayi Okoroato ɗon jooɗori nder Obingwa, Abia diiwal, lesdi lesdi Naajeeriya.

Adeyemi Abayomi:
Adeyemi Abayomi Isaac (21 Epril 1947 - 2021) ko boxer Naajeeriya. O hawri e nder jaŋde ɓeydaare worɓe e juulde 1972 Summer Olympics.

Emmanuel Abayomi:
Emmanuel Abayomi ko jannginoowo Naajeeriya mo anndini nder suudu fedde, haematology, Biosecurity e biobanking. Abayomi ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo o gollaama dow laamorde Lagos ngam hakkilantaaku. O ɗon jooɗii e fedde Naajeeriya ngam kuɗol bolle nder Lagos nde o laamaama laamorde ngam laamorde Babajide Sanwo-Olu e hitaande 2019.
Hooreejo-leydi Muhammadu Buhari hokki Prof. Akin Abayomi jaajol National Productivity Order of Merit (NPOM) ngam anndugo kuugal maako e ɓeydaaku, musamman nder haɓugo bee COVID-19 nder Diiwal Lagos. 

Muhammad Mustapha Abdallah:
Muhammad Mustapha Abdallah (dugumi 13 Noofambar 1954) ko Kolonel lesdi Naajeeriya mo o mari hayru, o jeyaaɗo hooreejo National Drug Law Enforcement Agency, mo hooreejo lesdi Muhammadu Buhari suɓii dow 11 lewru Janaayo 2016.

Abdulkadir Abdulsalam:
Abdulkadir Abdulsalam ko politikal lesdi Naajeeriya, mo laati hooreejo lesdi Naajeeriya.
Abdulsalam maayi nder Abuja ha 29 Desemba 2020

Ahmed Aboki Abdullahi:
Ahmed Aboki Abdullahi ko Brigadier General mo o yahri to leydi Naajeeriya. Ko o lafti Kolonel, o woni Ministaar haalde Naajeeriya, nokku o heɓii no o lafti gardiiɗo nder gardiiɗo signalji. O wonii haa wakkati gooto gardiiɗo gardiiɗo. O wonii o jeyaa e gollaade gollaade wuro wuro Jeneraal Sani Abacha e hitaande 1993.

Aliyu Sabi Abdullahi:
Aliyu Sabi Abdullahi CON (anndiraa 10 lewru janngo 1967) woni siyaasajo lesdi Naajeeriya, e senatoowo wakiilo senatoore Niger North Senatorial District of Niger State to 8th National Assembly of Nigeria e 9th National Assembly. O woni mawɗo mawɗo whip to 9th National Assembly of Naajeeriya.
Siyasajju.
Aliyu Sabi Abdullahi CON eriminmo 10 Janairu mongou 1967 eii lysidi siyasa,en lysidi Naajeeriya Sabi eii Sannatajjo nder Niger woila toe Dan Majalisajjo gada 2017 toe 2019 jornii eii ministajjo Agriculture.

Nana Aisha Abdullahi:
Nana Aisha Abdullahi (c. 1960 ⁇ 5 mars 2014) ko laamɗo leydi Naajeeriya e jaajotooɗo. E hitaande 2010, Abdullahi laatii laamɗo debbo arandeejo suudu mawndu leydi Jigawa. (Jigawa ko leydi to woyla Naajeeriya.)
Abdullahi waɗi hooreejo laamɗo leydi, laamɗo leydi e laamɗo leydi haa hitaande 2000 haa hitaande 2005.O laamɗo to suudu kiita mawngo e hitaande 2010, o laamɗo debbo arande to suudu kiita mawngo e nder Jigawa.[1 O waɗi golle haa o maayi e hitaande 2014.
Laamiiɗo Nana Abdullahi maayi ngam nyau nder suudu ndun haa Dutse, Jigawa, Naajeeriya, ha 5 Maars 2014, ha duuɓi 54. O maayi e gorko maako, Abubakar, mo jokkondiri e Dutse campus National Open University of Nigeria.

Saminu Abdullahi:
Saminu Kwari Abdullahi (dimaa 3 lewru janngo 2001) ko jokkitoowo leydi Naajeeriya mo o jogii e nder wuro russi FC Veles Moscow.
Kuugal gollal.
O waɗi gollal makko fuɗɗam nder Russian Football National League for FC Veles Moscow on 31 July 2021 nder fijirde e FC Tom Tomsk

Aisha Abubakar Abdulwahab:
Dr. Aisha Abubakar Abdulwahab (dodude c.1971) o polisɗo Nigeria mo heɓii haykaliiru UNESCO ngam janngude tuberculosis.
Ɓiɗɗo e janngirde.
Aisha Abubakar Abdulwahab jibinaa nder c.1971 o hawti e polisol Nigeria nder 1995. O mari digirii nder ilmu dabbaaji e doktoor.

Khairat Gwadabe:
Khairat Abdulrazaq-Gwadabe (d. 1957) ko laamorinkeejum lesdi Naajeeriya. O suɓi senatoore ngam senatoore Abuja Federal Capital Territory, Najeeriya e fuɗɗam leydi Najeeriya, o ɗon jaɓɓa dow fannu yimɓe (PDP). O waɗi laamu diga lewru Duujal 1999 haa lewru Duujal 2003.
Abdulrazaq-Gwadabe woni debbo gomnaajo AbdulRahman AbdulRazaq e debbo Kolonel Lawan Gwadabe, gomnaaru konu Niger. O jibini e Ilorin e lewru Awril 1957. O janngini jaango e jaangirde Buckingham. Caggal nde o jokki jooɗorde mum to Senate o suɓii nder kuɓaaji dow kootoonde, jaŋde, rewɓe (jo hooreejo), laamorde fedde, turturis & aada e laamorde fedde fedde.

Polytechnic Diiwal Abia:
Polytechnic Diiwal Abia ko Polytechnic dowla dowla mo laatii nder hitaande 1992 e nder Aba, Diiwal Abia, Naajeeriya. Polytechnic ina hawta e janngooji feere feere, bana School of Science & Engineering e School of Business Administration.
Lannde ndee ko leɗɗe jaale e leɗɗe ndun. Rector arande onukaogu Abalogun A.

Janngirde Diiwal Abia:
Janngirde Diiwal Abia Uturu (ABSU) ko janngirde lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum wondi go'o janngirde lesdi nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Abubakar Tafawa Balewa Stadium:
Abubarkar Tafawa Balewa Stadium ko nokkuure feere feere nder wuro Bauchi, lesdi Naajeeriya. Ha jooni ɗum naftiraama e nder juulde football e ɗum woni nokkuure nde Wikki Tourists.
Abubarkar Tafawa Balewa Stadium wondi go'o nder nokkuuje 8 huutoreede ngam FIFA World Cup 2009 U-17 ha nder lesdi Naajeeriya, e huutoreeje 3. Firo maako arande nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder hakkunde lesdi Naajeeriya e Argentina nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder nder yimɓe 11,467.

Abubakar Umar Tutare:
Abubakar Umar Tutare ko politikol lesdi Naajeeriya mo ɓe suɓii senatoore ngam senatoore Taraba Central District nder Diiwal Taraba, Naajeeriya nder suɓaaji je'e nder hitaande 2011.

Abbare Yelwa:
Abbare Yelwa ko wonde wuro nder hukuma pamarun Jalingo, laamorgo Diiwal Taraba, Naajeeriya.

Ardo Kola:
Ardo Kola Ardo Kola latake hukuma pamara ha nder Diiwal Taraba. Dum latake headquarter nder nukkore sunkani. Dum wodi pellel lataki yajuki e 2,262km e dudugo himbe KO lati himbe 86,921 ha wakkaty cencus e dubije 2006. Sudu lenguru je nokkore Mai dum woni 660.11

Azare Airstrip:
Azare Airstrip ko dowla dowla 10 km (6 mi) dowla Azare nder Diiwal Bauchi, Naajeeriya.

Bade:
Bade (ko Barde ko Badde) ko nokku ɗo laamu ngu woni nder Diiwal Yobe, lesdi Naajeeriya.

Bama:
Bama ko nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) nder Diiwal Borno, Naajeeriya.

Bayo:
Bayo ko nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) Diiwal Borno, Nigeria.
Ɗum ina woodi nokkuure 956 km2 e yimɓe 78,978 e nder limti yimɓe 2006.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 603.
Ɗum go'o nder laamuje (hukuma pamare) goɗɗe nayi je ɗon jeyaa laamorde Biu, leydi je ɗon haandi nder Diiwal Borno, Naajeeriya.

Belel:
Belel ko wuro nder lesdi Naajeeriya, ɗon haa hirnaange lesdi Naajeeriya e Kameruun. O fuɗɗii e laamu Belel diga lesdi Kismayo nder lesdi Somaliya. nden o laamani diga laamu ɗiɗo. Dinastiya jooni fuɗɗii e hooreejo Marexaan mo o woni nder lesdi mum diga wuro Kismaayo nder lesdi Somaliya. Lardiraaɓe Belel fuɗɗi naftoraade leggal 'Lamdo' diga ɓiyum Belel mawɗo e Umaru.

Bogoro:
Bogoro woni nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) Diiwal Bawci, Nigeria. Hoofde wuro ngoo woni nder wuro Bogoro. Za'ar walla Sayawa yimɓe ɓuri heewde yimɓe.
Ɗum ina woodi nokkuure 894 km2 (345 sq mi) e yimɓe 84,215 e nder limti 2006 .

Bornu Yassa:
Bornu Yassa wondi wuro nder Diiwal Borno, to woyla fuunaaŋgo lesdi Nigeria. Ɗum woni ɓadi Titiwa, ko e 80 km haa worgo hirnaange Niiser. Ɗum woodi yimɓe 5,987 ha nder 2017.

Bursari:
Bursari ko nokkuure laamu nder Diiwal Yobe, Naajeeriya. Hoofde wuro maako ɗon nder gariiri Dapchi nder worgo lesdi ndin haa 12°29′25′′N 11°29′40′′E.
Ɗum woodi nokkuure 3,818 km2 e yimɓe 109,124 e nder limti yimɓe 2006.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 620.
Ɗemngal Bade ɗon wolwi nder Bursari.

Cabbal Waadi:
Cabbal Waadi ko kulu nder lesdi Naajeeriya. O ɗon haadi nder Diiwal Taraba, ɓadi hirnaange e Kameruuna, haa ɓaawo Gashaka Gumti Forest Reserve e Gashaka-Gumti National Park dow Mambilla Plateau.

Cineni:
Cineni ko wuro nder Gwoza, nder Diiwal Borno, Naajeeriya.

Cross Kawwa:
Cross Kawwa (ndooji feere e wi'etee ko Kawwa) wondi wuro nder lesdi Naajeeriya.
Duule ɗo ɗon haade laawol diga Baga haa fuunaaŋge (ko ɗon haa fuunaaŋge maayo Caad) haa Kukawa haa hirnaange. Lodo feere ɗon yahda haa worgo haa Monguno.
Maina Maaji Lawan, ngomnaaru Diiwal Borno, nden ɓaawo ɗon senatoore lesdi, jibini nder gariiri.

Dalori:
Dalori woni gariiri gariiri ɓadi Maiduguri, Borno, hirnaange fuunaaŋge Nigeria. Gila lewru mars 2015, ɗum woni wuro go'oto nder suudu ɓurɗo ɓamtaare IDP je tiggi wakkati huccitaaku Boko Haram.
Kampa Dalori ɗon ha laawol diga Maiduguri haa Konduga, Bama e nder hirsirde hakkunde Nigeria e Kameruun, km 15 worgo fuunaaŋge Maiduguri.
Kampaare ɗon ɗon haani haaki ɗuɗɗi diga Boko Haram, hawti bee haaki maɓɓoɓe. Haaki ɓurɗum haaki waɗii ha 30 lewru Janaaru 2016, nde yimɓe 86 maayi e 62 mooɓɓi.

Damasak:
Damasak woni wuro laamorgo laamu Mobbar, nder Diiwal Borno to woyla fuunaaŋgo lesdi Naajeeriya.
Lodoji ɗiɗi fuɗɗi ɗi ɗon yaha Damasak. Go'oto ɗon yahugo haa worgo haa Gubio e Mayduguri, laamorgo diiwa;Borno, nden go'oto ɗon yahugo haa fuunaaŋge haa Kukawa e Baga.
Nder duuɓi ɓaawo'en, ɓeydaaki ladde nder woyla Naajeeriya ɗon hawta Damasak.

Damban:
Damban woni nokkuure laamu Diiwal Bauchi, Naajeeriya. Hoofde laamu mum woni nder wuro Dambam.
Ɗum woodi nokkuure 1,077 km2 e yimɓe 150,922 ha nder limti yimɓe 2006.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 751.
Firo.
Hukuma pamare Damban ko go'o nder nokkuuje laamu nder Diiwal Bauchi. Ɗum ina jogii hooreejo laamu mum nder wuro Damban. Ɗum woni haa woyla Bauchi e ina feccina e nokkuuje laamu Darazo, Misau, Katagum e Gamawa. Dambam LGA council ina hakkilanta e jaango laamu nder nokkuure laamu e leyɗe laamu nguu ina waɗii sariyaaji laameteeɓe nokkuure laamu nguu.

Dapci:
Dapci ko wuro e hukuuma pamarun Diiwal Yobe, nder lesdi Naajeeriya.
Ɗum woni 75km dow fombina e Niiser.

Darazo:
Darazo woni nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) nder Diiwal Bawci, Naajeeriya, wuro maako woni Darazo.
Ɗum woodi nokkuure 3,015 km2 e yimɓe 251,597 e nder limti yimɓe 2006.
Koode postaal nokku oo ko 750.
Ɗemngal Zumbun ɗon wolwi nder wuro Jimbim nder Darazo LGA.

Deba:
Deba (ko si tawii ko Deba Habe), ko wuro nder Diiwal Gombe to woyla lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum woni wuro wuro laamorgo Yamaltu/Deba, Diiwal Gombe. Ha nder hitaande 1995, yimɓe maare ko 135,400.

Demsa:
Demsa woni nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) Diiwal Adamawa, Naajeeriya, e hooreejo leydi mum woni Demsa.
Ɗum ɗon haandi koonde maayo Benue. 
Ɗum ɗon haandi koonde maayo Benue.☃☃ Yimɓe maako 180,251. Yimɓe maako ɗon jooɗii nder lesdi ndi'e bana Bachama (Bwatiye) Batta, Yandang, Bille, Mbula, Maya, Bare e Fulfulde.

Disina:
Disina wondi wuro nder Shira nder Diiwal Bawci haa woyla fuunaaŋge lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum woni ko 35km haa sahaa worgo hirnaange Azare. Ɗum woni nder Maayo Bunga, hakkunde gariiri Jemma e Foggo. Yimɓe maarooje e hitaande 2007 ko 18,792.

Donga:
Donga latake hukuma pamara ei wonake nder diiwali Taraba Naajeeria. Dum woodake headquarter e nder wuro Donga ha dew mayo Donga. Dum woodake 7°43′00″N 10°03′00″E.

Dorofi:
Dorofi wondi wuro seɗɗa dow Mambilla Plateau nder Diiwal Taraba nder feccere fuɗnaange lesdi Naajeeriya. Dorofi woni 40 km diga Gembu, laamorgo laamu Sardauna. Ɗum ɗon ha nder hirsirde lesdi Naajeeriya e Jammu leydi Kameruun.

Faggo:
Faggo woni gariiri/gelle nder Diiwal Bawci, Naajeeriya.
Joogarafiwol.
Faggo ɗon ha 11°24′25′′N 10°00′52′′E koordinate: 11°24′25′′N 10°00′52′′E, e woodi yimɓe 12,821.

Fika:
Fika ko nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) nder Yobe, Naajeeriya. Hotaare mum woni nder wuro Fika nder worgo nokkuure e 11°17′00′′N 11°18′29′′E.
Ɗum woodi babal 2,852 km2.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 622.

Fufore:
Fufore wonde wuro e nokkuure laamorde e nder Aadamaawa, Naajeeriya.
Ɗemɗe.
Ɗemɗe ɗe faaman nder Fufore LGA ngoni;

Fune:
Fune ko nokkuure laamu nder Diiwal Yobe, Naajeeriya. Hooreejo wuro ngood woni nder wuro Damagum haa sahaa worgo hirnaange lesdi e dow laawol A3 haa 11°40′39′′N 11°20′04′′E. Haandi ndii ina woodi nokkuure 4,948 km2 e yimɓe 300,760 e nder limti 2006 .
Yimɓe.
Yimɓe ɓurɓe jooɗorde nder hukuma pamarun Fune ngoni Karai-Karai, Kanuri, Bura-Pabir, Ngizim, e Fulfulde. Emir Fune woni Alhaji (Dr.) Saleh Idriss Ibn Uthman e wuro maako ɗon ha Damagum, laamorgo Fune.

Gamawa:
Gamawa ko nokkuure laamorde nder Diiwal Bawci, lesdi Naajeeriya, e mari diga hirnaange haa Diiwal Yobe.
Ɗum woodi nokkuure 2,925 km2 e yimɓe 286,388 e nder limti yimɓe 2006.
Yimɓe ɓurɓe ɗuuɗaade nder nokkuure nden ngoni Hawsa'en, Fulfulde e Karai-Karai'en jooɗiiɓe fuunaaŋge.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 752.

Gamboru:
Gamboru (ko Gamburu) woni gariiri marndooji nder Diiwal Borno, to woyla fuunaaŋgo lesdi Naajeeriya, ɓadi hirsirde Kamerun.
Wuro IRIN 2013 holli wonde farmasiji nder Gamboru Ngala ɗon je ɗon haandi ngam hajjugo ngam hajjugoji Islamist Boko Haram, nden ngam maajum "ɗon maaki be tati".

Ganye:
Ganye woni gellei e nokkuure laamu Diiwal Adamawa, Naajeeriya. Jada e Toungo ɓe cakkiti diga hukuma pamarun Ganye woni nder Diiwal Adamawa. Ganye ɗon mari ko'e hukuma pamarun Jada haa woyla e fuunaaŋge, hukuma pamarun Toungo haa worgo, Diiwal Taraba haa hirnaaŋge. Ɗum woni wuro hooreejo yimmɓe Sama (Camba) nder duuniyaaru.

Gassol:
Gassol ko nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) nder Diiwal Taraba, Naajeeriya. Hooreejo mum woni nder wuro Mutum Biyu (ko Mutumbiyu ko Mutum Mbiyu) dow laawol A4 haa 8°38′00′′N 10°46′00′′E.
Ɗum woodi nokkuure 5,548 km2 e yimɓe 244,749 ha nder limti yimɓe 2006.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 672.

Gayuk:
Gayuk ko nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) nder Aadamaawa, Naajeeriya.

Giaɗe:
Giaɗe (ko Giyaɗe) ko nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) nder Diiwal Bawci, Naajeeriya. Daande mum woni nder gariiri Giaɗe.
Ɗum ina woodi nokkuure 668 km2 e yimɓe 156,969 e nder limti yimɓe 2006.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 750.

Gommbi:
Gommbi woni wuro laamorgo laamu (hukuma pamarun) Gommbi nder Diiwal Aadamaawa, Naajeeriya.
Lisol ngol ɗon ɗon haaki diga ɓaawo maajum diga Boko Haram, nden lesdi ndin ɗon ɗon haaki nder lesdi booji diga lewru Mee 2013.
Nder lewru Julaay 2014, go'o mawɗo jaayndeere Jarmal ɓe njogii nder gariiri Gommbi.

Gongola:
Gongola ko diiwal lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum waɗi ko ñalnde 3 feebariyee 1976 diga Aadamaawa e Sardawna nder lesdi Naajeeriya, e Wukari nder diiwal Benue-Plateau; ɗum ɗon haa 27 agoosta 1991, nde ɗum fecciti dow lesdi ɗiɗo - Aadamaawa e Taraba.
Diiwal Gongola ɗon laamii ngam Council Executive.
E ɗum haani wonde leydi ɓurɗo jam nder lesdi fuunaaŋge, bee saɗugo ɓurɗo saɗugo nder lesdi fuunaaŋge nder 1980.

Gobiyo:
Gubio, go Gobiyo, ko nokkuure laamorde nder Diiwal Borno, to woyla fuunaaŋge lesdi Naajeeriya.
Ɗum woodi nokkuure 2,464 km2 e yimɓe 152,778 ha nder limti yimɓe 2006.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 602.
Lodo fuɗɗam nder Gubio ɗon yahda haa woyla haa Damasak e haa worgo haa Mayduguri.
Ɗum go'o nder LGAs sappo e jeegoje je ɗon je ɗon je ɗon jeye laamorde Borno, leydi je ɗon haandi nder Borno, Naajeeriya.

Gujba:
Gujba ko wuro e nokku ɗo laamu nguu ina jogii nder Diiwal Yobe, Naajeeriya. Hoofde wuro ngo woni Buni Yadi to 11°16′08′′N 11°55′49′′E haa worgo leydi ndii; wuro Gujba ina tawaa e woyla leydi ndii. Ina jogii nokkuure 3,239 km2 (1,251 sq mi) e yimɓe 130,088 e nder rewo 2006 . 
Koode postaal nokku oo ko 621.

Gulani:
Gulani koo nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamaro) nder Diiwal Yobe, Naajeeriya. Ɗum woodi nokkuure 2,090 km2 e yimɓe 103,510 e ndee limtinah yimɓe 2006. Koode postaal nokku onn wooni 621.

Guzamala:
Guzamala ko nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) nder Diiwal Borno, Naajeeriya. Hoofde mum woni nder gariiri Gudumbali. O woni ko e 125 km haa hirnaange laamorgo diiwal, Mayduguri. O woodi nokkuure 2.517 km2 e yimɓe 95,648 e nder limgal yimɓe 2006.
Koode postaal nokku oo ko 612.
Ɗo nokkuure laamu ɗo ɗon haade ɓaawo sahaa woyla Diiwal Borno. O ɗon haade bee laamordeje goɗɗe jeego: Mobber, Gubio, Nganzal, Monguno, Kukawa e Abadan.

Gwio Kura:
Gwio Kura ko wuro nder nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) Bade, Diiwal Yobe, Naajeeriya.
Ɗum ɗon haadi 50km haa worgo lesdi Niiser.

Hawul:
Hawul ko nokkuure laamorde (hukuma pamarun) nder Diiwal Borno, Naajeeriya.
Wuro maare maako ɗon nder gariiri Azare.
Ɗum woodi nokkuure 2,098 km2 e yimɓe 120,000 ha nder limti yimɓe 2006.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 603.

Hong:
Hong woni wuro e nokkuure laamorde (hukuma pamarun) nder Aadamaawa, Naajeeriya. Hong woni wuro koleji jaŋde.

Izghe:
Izghe ko wuro nder hukuma pamarun Gwoza, nder Diiwal Borno, Naajeeriya.
Wuroji ɗiɗawre waɗi dow 15 feebariyee 2014 haa yimɓe 106 maayi.

Jada:
Jada wondi wuro e nokku ɗo laamu (hukuma pamarun) nder Aadamaawa ina jogii, nder lesdi Naajeeriya 

Jakusko:
Jakusko ko nokkuure laamorde (hukuma pamarun) nder Yobe, Naajeeriya. Hoofde wuro maako woni nder gariiri Jakusko haa hirnaange laamorde nden haa 12°22′09′′N 10°46′23′′E.
Ɗum woodi nokkuure 3,941 km2 e yimɓe 229,083 ha nder limti yimɓe 2006.
Koode postaal nokku oo ko 631.
Ɗemngal Bade e Karai-Karai ɗon wolwi nder Jakusko LGA

Jemma:
Jemma ko Jama'are woni gariiri nder Diiwal Bawci, Naajeeriya.
Joogaraafiwol.
Jemma ɗon jooɗi 30 km haa hirnaange Azare e 65 km haa fuunaange Dutse, haa hirnaange Maayo Bunga. 20km haa worgo Jemma haa maayo ɗon ɗon ɗon ɗon ɗon gariiri Disina. gariiri ɗon woodi yimɓe 15,352.

Kafin Madaki:
Kafin Madaki woni laamorgo laamu (hukuma pamarun) Ganjuwa nder Diiwal Bawci, Naajeeriya. Ɗum wuro manngal yimɓe 20,000, ɗon haadi no 45 km haa woyla Bawci.
Ɗun nokku ɗon ɗon ɗon holli nder film 2018 Up North.

Kaga:
Kaga ko nokkuure laamorde nder Diiwal Borno, Naajeeriya.
Ɗum woodi nokkuure 2,700 km2 e yimɓe 90,015 ha nder limti yimɓe 2006.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 601.

Kala/Balge:
Kala/Balge ko nokkuure laamu Diiwal Borno, Naajeeriya. Ɗum woni ko ɓuri LGA fuunaange lesdi Naajeeriya. O woodi hooreejo mum nder gariiri Rann.

Kaltungo:
Kaltungo wondi go'o nder 11 nokkuuje laamorde (hukuma pamarun) nder Gombe, Naajeeriya . Hoofde mum woni nder wuro Kaltungo nder hirnaange laamorde laamorde dow laawol A345 haa 9°48′51′′N 11°18′32′′E.
Ɗum woodi nokkuure laatiiɗe 881 km2 e yimɓe 149,805 e nder limti yimɓe e hitaande 2006.

Karasuwa:
Karasuwa ko nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) nder Diiwal Yobe, lesdi Naajeeriya. Hooreejo mum woni nder gariiri Jajimaji dow maayo Hadejia haa 12°53′57′′N 10°48′28′′E.
Ɗum woodi nokkuure 1,162 km2 e yimɓe 106,992 ha nder limti yimɓe 2006.
Luttuɗe leydi.
Karasuwa nokku dowla ɗo hawti e wurooje mawɗe ɗe hawti: Jajimaji, Bukarti, Kasuwa Sidi, e gure ceewɗe bana Tsamiyan Gada.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 630.

Karim Laamiiɗo:
Karim Laamiiɗo ko nokkuure laamu nder Diiwal Taraba, Naajeeriya. Hoofde wuro maako woni nder gariiri Karim Laamiiɗo haa 9°18′00′′N 11°12′00′′E.
Ɗum woodi nokkuure 6,620 km2 e yimɓe 195,844 ha nder limti yimɓe 2006.
Luttugal worgo Karim Laamiiɗo woni maayo Benue nden ɗon jeya nder ndiyamji feere feere.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 662.
Yimɓe.
Karim Laamiiɗo woodi yimɓe feere feere, hawti Karimjo, Wurkun, Jenjo, Bambuka, Munga, kodei, Dadiya, Bandawa e Fulɓe.

Kirfi:
Kirfi ko nokkuure laamorde nder Diiwal Bauchi, lesdi Naajeeriya, ɗo ɗon mari hirnaange nder Diiwal Gombe.
Ɗum woodi nokkuure 2,371 km2 (915 sq mi) e yimɓe 147,618 ha nder limti yimɓe 2006.
Yimɓe ɓurɓe anndude nder nokku oo ngoni Hausa. Ɗemngal Bure ɗon haalaa e nder LGA.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 743.

Kogu:
Kogu ko wuro mawnɗe nder hukuma pamarun Biu, nder worgo hirnaange Borno, nder hirnaange hirnaange lesdi Naajeeriya. Kogu ɗon haade dow kooki maayo Yangari haa yaasi kiloomita 34 (21 miil) haa saŋge hirnaange gariiri Biu.
Mari Watirwa, amiri Biu, waɗi laamorgo maako ko Kogu ha nder hitaande 1795, caggal nde o riiwi Fulani'en diga Biu. Ha 1838, ɓiyum, amiri Mari Biya, o dilli laamorgo maako haa gariiri Biu.

Konduga:
Konduga ko ummatoore nder leydi Borno, Nigeria e nder nokkuure laamu nguu e innde nden ko e dow 25 km haa worgo fuunaaŋge Maiduguri, ɗo woni dow maayo Ngadda. Yimɓe nder nokkuure laamu nguu Konduga ko e 13.400.Ɗum wondi nder LGA sappo e jeegooɓe ɗo laatii laamu Borno, leydi ndii ko nder leydi Borno, Nigeria.[2 Ɗemɗe mawɗe ngoni Shuwa Arabic, Kanuri Maffa e Wandala / Malgwa.
Ɗum woni nokkuure nde Senator Kaka Mallam Yale jibini.

Kwami:
Kwami ko nokkuure laamorde (hukuma pamarun) nder Diiwal Gombe, lesdi Naajeeriya. Ko nokkuure nde woni nder wuro Mallam Sidi. Kwami ina dawaa e fuunaaŋge e Maayo Dadin Kowa, haa woyla e Funakaye e Gombe haa worgo. Koode postaal nokkuure nden ko 760.
Yimɓe.
Yimɓe Kwami nder yimɓe 2006 ko 195,298.

Lamurde:
Lamurde woni gariiri e nokkuure laamorde (hukuma pamarun) nder Aadamaawa, Naajeeriya, yimɓe Bwatiye (Bachama) njooɗi.

Law:
Law ko nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) nder Diiwal Taraba, Naajeeriya. Hooreejo leydi ndii woni nder wuro Law e nokkuure nde yimɓe Hawsare e Fulɓe ɓuri heewde. Lawu ɗo ɗo laami e Ardo Kola, Jalingo, Yorro e Zing. Ɗum ɗon mari bana bana ko'e berniiwol Numan, Aadamaawa.

Lissam:
Lissam ko nokkuure mawɗo hukuma pamarun Ussa nder Taraba nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Macina:
Macina (ngoo anndiraa kadi Matsena) ko nokkuure laamu nder diiwal Yobe, Naajeeriya. Hoofde wuro maako woni nder gariiri Macina haa 13°08′11′′N 10°02′57′′E. O mari sahaa e lesdi Niiser.
Ɗum ina woodi nokkuure 1,213 km2 e yimɓe 61,606 e nder limti yimɓe 2006.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 630.

Mafa:
Mafa ko nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) diiwal Borno, Naajeeriya. Hooreejo mum woni nder wuro Mafa.
Yimɓe.
Ɗum woodi yimɓe 103,518 nder limgal yimɓe 2006.
Koode posta.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 611.

Magumeri:
Magumeri ko nokkuure laamorde nder Diiwal Borno, Naajeeriya. Ɗum woodi nokkuure 4,856 km2 e yimɓe 140,231 e nder limti yimɓe 2006. Koode postaal nokku on woni 602.
Ɗum go'o nder hukuma pamare sappo e jeegoje je ɗon je ɗon jeyaa Laamorde Borno, diiwal je ɗon haandi nder Diiwal Borno, Naajeeriya.
