Woni maako nder nder jaayɗe to kawtal ngal holli jaaynde mawɓe mawɗo polis nde ɓe laarani gardiiɗo maɓɓe nder kuugal malla nder daraja ɗo ɗowtana ngam arda kuol polis. Woniji mawɓe mawɗo mawɗi e mawɗe mawje mawɗum mawji ma'aje maaki mawni maami ɓe ɗon ɓe hawti bee polis ɓaawo Adamu, ɓe mari ɓe jeyaago nde Adamu jeyaa be mawjo mawgo mawdo mawja mawɗa. O jeyi diga polis Nigeria e 28 lewru Jaanaayru 2019.

Endurance Abinuwa:
 
Endurance Abinuwa (danyeeki 31 Yuuli, 1987) ko jaŋde jaɓnde jaɓɓorgo lesdi Naajeeriya. O jokki e juulde 2012 Summer Olympics.

Folashade Abugan:
Folashade Abigeal Abugan (dugumi 17 Desemba 1990) ko dannduɗo lesdi Naajeeriya mo anndini dow 400 mita. O wonnoo koode 400 m koondeeje nder juulde 2007 All-Africa Games e o ɓeydi haa kooreeji nder jeewte Afrik 2008 , nde o waɗi sahaa ɓurɗo ɓooyde e 50.89 sekonde. O heɓii medalji jaŋde e nder juulde juuliyaaru nder hitaande 2008 e juulade afriknaaɓe nder 2009.
O wari nder 2010 Commonwealth Games nder Delhi o heɓii koode silver ɗiɗi ngam Naajeeriya nder 400 m e nder 4x400 m relay. Ammaa, Abugan o jeyaa e ɗum haɓɓii ngam o majjinaaki dow huutoraade lekki e heɓugo test test for testosterone prohormone nder 'A' dow maako. O jeyi hakkki ngam heɓuki B dow muuɗum.

Bukola Abogunloko:
Bukola Dammy Abogunloko (danyeeki 18 Agusta 1994) ko jaŋde Naajeeriya. O wondi nder nder lesdi Naajeeriya 4 × 400 mita relay team to 2012 Olympics, ɓe waɗi ɗum to final. Ammaa ɓe njaɓaayi nder sakitaade (finaal).

Rose Aboaje:
Rose Aboaje (danyeeki 1977) ko danyaako lesdi Naajeeriya mo jogiiɗo nder lesdi Naajeeriya nder gasa'en nder leydi e nder leyɗeele. O heɓii koode go'o e koore nder 100m e 200m nder juulde Afrik nder 1998 nder atletiki.

Anike Agbaje-Williams:
Anike Agbaje-Williams (ko jibinaa Kuforiji) woni go'oto nder ɓe ɗon jaɓɓa habaru nder lesdi Naajeeriya. O woni debbo arandeejo teleeji e hollitɗo teleji nder Leysdi Naajeeriya.
Jooɗa.
Agbaje-Williams jibinaa nder Abeokuta nder 23 Yarkomaa 1936. O debbo tataɓo o danyiraama to Mr e Mrs. Kuforiji, baaba maako o jeyaa nder lesdi Egba. O waɗi duuɓi maako nder jaangirde fuɗnde e nder jannde jungo nder Lagos nder hakkilantaaku maako, Mrs Gbemisola Rosiji, debbo Ayo Rosji e Bishop e Mrs S.C. Philips. O yahi CMS Girls School, Lagos. Nder hitaande 1950, nde CMS Girls School yaaki to Ibadan nden nyiɓɓi St Anne's School, o yahdi e janngirde nden o timmini jannge maako nder Ibadân.
Caggal nde o timmini janngirde nder suudu jaŋde, o heɓii golle e nder nder Nigeria Broadcasting Corporation to Ikoyi, Lagos e hitaande 1955. Abgaje-Williams' career be warugo warngooji fuɗɗi ngam goɗɗo kuugal mo'o warataa haa kuɗol. Nder nyalnde nden, goɗɗo mo o ɗon golla e nder radio o waɗata anndal malla o nanngina ko'e maako, o wurtina mo, nden o noddi mo ngam o hoɗugo. Agbaje-Williams nanngi anndal ngol, nden nde mawɗo nanngini bolle maako, o hawti, sey ɓe noddi mo o jokki nder suudu kuugal bana mawɓe habaru.
Nde teleeji ha Ibadan haɓɓiti, o holliti haalde e o hokki golle e tele. Agbaje-Williams wondi ardiiɗo golle WNTV, wonde teleaji teleoji arannde nder lesdi Naijeriya, kanko kadi woni telejaaku debbo arandeeji. O jeyaa haa o warti producer e darinoowo teleje ha telejo nder hitaande 1986.

Dorcas Ajoke Adesokan:
Dorcas Ajoke Adesokan (danyeeki 5 lewru Yuuli 1998), ko jokkinoowo badminton Naajeeriya.
Kuugal.
E hitaande 2014, o heɓi medalli bronze nder Afriknaaɓe nder nder go'o e nder jokkondiral e jokkitooɓe e gool, e medalle silver nder gollal e gollaade. Nder lewru Juun, o heɓii ko o jaɓi nder Lagos International nder nder ɓeydooji ɗiɗo nder rewɓe.
Nder hitaande 2019, o hawri e juulde Afrik, o heɓii koode goɗɗe e nder juulaaji goɗɗi e ɗiɗo e dow koore nder rewɓe.
E hitaande 2021, o jokki e juulde Olimpiiki 2020.
Ko ɓe waɗi.
Fedde Afrik.
"Fedde rewɓe go'o"
"Firooji rewɓe"
Koɗol Afrik.
"Fedde rewɓe go'o"
"Firooji rewɓe"
"Ɓesngu ɓesndu"

Sekinat Adesanya:
Sekinat Adesanya Akinpelu (danyeeki 25 Yuuli 1987) ko dannduɗo lesdi Naajeeriya mo anndini dow 400 mita.
Sahaa maako ɓurɗo ɓeydaago ko 52,48 sekonde, ɗum heɓii nder jaŋde 2006 World Junior Championships.

Yinka Ajayi:
Yinka Ajayi (danyeeki 11 August 1997) ko jaŋdeere lesdi Naajeeriya mo jaɓɓi dow 400m. O wondi koode bronze to ko'o je'e Afrik 2018 to Asaba. Fuu, o heɓii boo medalle bronze to juulde juulirde Islam'en 2017, ha ɓaawo medalleeji relay feere feere. Walaajo Miami Dolphins Running Back; Jay Ajayi.
O wonnoo ko'e mum nder 400 mita nder juulde Commonwealth 2018, o ɓeydi o haɓɓii 4 × 400 m relay quartet Nigeria (Patience George, Glory Nathaniel, Praise Idamadudu, Ajayi) to medal silver behind Jamaica. fotaade e ]
O waɗi ɗiɗaɓo nder juulde 2017 Naajeeriya nder ɓurɗo ɓooyma e saa'i maajum 51.57 s ɓaawo Patience George. O waɗii halfiniiji nder 400 m nder jaŋde duniyaaru IAAF 2017. Fuu ɓurɗo ɓeydaade nder nder kuugal ngol ko 51.22 seconds nder Abuja nder 2018 Abuja Golden League.

Aminat Adeniyi:
Aminat Oluwafunmilayo Adeniyi (be danyee mou haa nder nyalawmaare 21 Seedto 1993) ko worgoowo nder lesdi Naajeeriya. O hawri e nder fijirde freestyle rewɓe 58 kg nder juulal Commonwealth 2014 to o heɓi medal gold.
O ɗon wondi laamɗo lesdi nder haɓre nder lesdi Naajeeriya diga hitaande 2009 haa jooni, ko ɗum waɗi goɗɗo nder leydi Naajeeriya. E hitaande 2010, o jokki nder juulde Afrik nder Misra, to o heɓii medal gold. O tokki ɗaɓɓol maako ngam teddungal nde o hawti nder Senior mbanuhi do"indirki Championship nder Marokko nder 2012, to o wondi laamɗo laamɓe.
Nder hitaande 2013, Aminat Adeniyi wonnoo boo darnde worgoowo Naajeeriyato Commonwealth Championship nder Senegaal, to o heɓii koode silver. O hawti e nder juulde Afrik mawɗo nder Tunisia, 2014, to o laatii laamɗo Afrik nder kuugal maako. Ko o waɗi nder lesdi lesdi Afrik woni nder dowle Commonwealth nder Glasgow, Scotland, nder hitaande 2014, to o heɓii jaŋde.
O, bana mo jogiiɗo, o jokki nder juulde Afrik mawɗo nder Misra, 2015, to o timmini juumre nden bana labborɗo koode cardi. Nder 2015, nder juulde Afrik fuuje sappo e go'o nder Congo Brazzaville, o wakki lesdi Naijeriya nder nder darnde maako bana worgoowo, nden o heɓii jaŋde. Ɓaawo hitaande, nder hitaande 2016, o waɗi gasa nder jaŋde Afrik mawɗo nder nder lesdi Misra, to o heɓii medalje jaɓnde. Nder hitaande nden, 2016, o heɓii medal silver nder ko'e Olimpiadi ha Aljeeriya, ko waɗi o laato hooreejo fijirde e nder Rio 2016. O jokki nder Grand Prix of Spain nder hitaande 2016, to o heɓii medal bronze.
Nder hitaande 2017, o wondi laamɗo Afrik nder jaŋde mawɗo nder laamorde worgo nder Marok. Nder hitaande 2017, o waɗii nder Fedde Fuuta Fuuɗnaango Furu Fure e Farayse, to o waɗi Numeroy 8 nder duuniyaaru. 
E hitaande 2018, o jokkondiri e nder juulde Afrik mawɗo nder luural, waɗeteeɗo e Port-Harcourt, Diiwal Rivers, Naajeeriya, o heɓi medal gold.
O heɓii teddungal lesdi, Goomu Ordo Niger, MON diga hooreejo lesdi Goodluck Jonathan nder 2014 ngam anndugo kuuɗe maako mawɗe nder nder hawtaade.
O wonnoo feccere nder lesdi Naajeeriya, bana worgoowo freestyle, to juulde Afrik 2019 ha Rabat, Morocco, nde o heɓi Etane Ngollo B. diga Kameruuna, nder dow dow, o heɓii ko o yi'i, haa o warti ko'e nder konu ɓaawoore, ngam o wari laamɗo jaŋde e nder kilo 62 ngam ɗum waɗi o laatii laamiiɗo.
O yahi Adekunle Ajasin University, Akungba Akoko, Diiwal Ondo, Naaeeriya to o heɓii daraaji aranndeeji e nder Political Science, 2012. Nde o ɗon haa jaŋde, o laati arandeejo jaangirde science politik hakkunde 2010 e 2011. O jeyaa kadi e hooreejo jaango nder jaangirde Adekunle Ajasin nder nder safaara e jaŋde e nder jannde 2011-2012, je o waɗi haa o timmini jaangal maako fu nder hitaande 2012.
E hitaande 2020, o heɓi koode silver nder nder jeewte ɓooyma debbo e kilo 62 e nder juurɗe Afrik e juurale juulde 2020. O heɓii ko o jogori e nder 2021 African & Oceania Wrestling Olympic Qualification Tournament ngam darnugo lesdi Naajeeriya nder Olympics Summer 2020 to Tokyo, Japan. O hawri e nder nder jaaynde rewɓe e kilo 62 .

Tosin Adeloye:
Tosin Adeloye (danyeeki 7 Febrayru, 1996) ko jaŋdeejo lesdi Naajeeriya. O hawri e nder 400 mita nder jaŋde duniyaaru nder atletiki e Beijing, Ciina.

Amina Ali (jooji):
Amina Ali Nkeki woni Naajeeriya mo ɓaawo booɓo Boko Haram. O wondi gooto e 276 jannginooɓe rewɓe ɓe bandol ɓe ƴetti diga Chibok nder hitaande 2014. Caggal nde 57 nder sukaaɓe ɓe'e ɗon hiita nder lebbi goɗɗi, 219 ɓe ɗon haani ɓe haɓɓani nder duuɓi ɗuuɗɗi. Daga nder yimmɓe ɓe ɓurɓe mawnugo, Ali woni arandeejo mo ɓe njehi. O heɓii ha 17 Duujal 2016 e Civilian Jokkere rijja dolda bee ɓiɗɗo duuɓi nayi e hooreejo Boko Haram, Mohammed Hayatu, mo wi'i hoore maako ko gorko maako. Ɓe tati fuu ɓe njaraaki.
Caggal ɓaawo ɓiyugo.
Ali yaaki to wuro ardiiɗo civilian Joint Task Force to Chibok, Aboku Gaji. Ɓaawo o anndi mo, bandiraaɗo boo o hawti bee baaba maako. Ali wi'i kadi 6 nder sukaaɓe sukaaji Chi Bok ɓe njogii maayi..
O hawti e hooreejo lesdi Naajeeriya Muhammadu Buhari haa 19 May. Nder lewru Juun 2016, bandiraaɓe Bring Back Our Girls e waalidi Ali fuɗɗiima yiɗi anndugo to o ɗon, ngam ɓe meeɗaa yi'ugo maako diga nde o hawti bee Buhari. Ɓaawo ɗum ɗum annditi o e ɓiyum ɗon ɓe ɗon haɓɓana nder suudu laamu to ɓe ɓe haɓa ɓe. Nder haalde maako bee Reuters nder lewru August 2016, o wi'i o hawtaaki bee no ɓe ɗon dari mo diga gorko maako Hayatu nden o ɗon ɗon hakkiilo dow maako. O hollii kadi o yiɗi yahugo wuro. Nde 21 jannginooɓe Chibok ɓe Boko Haram haɓɓunooɓe fu, ɓe njaɓi yahugo to maɓɓe nder hitaande 2016 ngam julde, Ali e goɗɗo suka debbo, Maryam Ali Maiyanga, ngam ɓe taƴii hakkillo ngam warugo wuro.
Nder hitaande 2017, Ali ɗon janngina e American University nder Naajeeriya, ngam heɓugo jaŋde.

Oyeronke Akindele:
Oyeronke Akindele (danyeeki 8 April, 1946) ko jaŋdeere lesdi Naajeeriya. O hawri e nder 100 mita rewɓe nder juulde Olympics 1968 .

Zainab Damilola Alabi:
Zainab Damilola Alabi (danyeeki 16 Oktooba, 2002) ko jokkinoowo badminton Naajeeriya. O hawti e kuugal badminton mawɗo e nder nokku e duniyaaru. Nde o wonnoo jokkere ɓooyma, o heɓi koode bronze tati nder juulde ɓeynguure Afrik 2018 nder Aljeers, Aljeri. Alabi ɓaawo ɗon o heɓii koode ɓaleere nder ɓalli ɓalleere e nder nder ɓe'e nder Afrik 2019, e boo koore nder team ɓalde nder juulde Afrik e Rabat 2019.
Ko ɓe waɗi.
Koɗol Afrik.
"Fedde rewɓe go'o"
Fedde Ɓooyɓe Afrik.
"Ɗuumɓe rewɓe"
"Ɓesngu ɓesndu"

Ime Akpan:
Ime Akpan (danyeeki 27 April, 1972) ko debbo joginoowo jogorɗo e nder leydi Naajeeriya, mo jogori e dow 100 mita rewɓe nder nder golle mum. O wondi go'o dow dow ko'e Olimpiyanko'en (1996), o heɓii koode goɗɗe nder juulde 1991 All-Africa Games nder Cairo, Misra

Cecelia Akagu:
Cecilia Akagu woni Brigadier Janaarjo nder konu lesdi Naajeeriya. O ɗon jeyaa e jaajorgal jaayndeeji nder konu. O dewta Clifford Wande mo o jeyaaɗo boo e Brigadier General nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɓe ɗon ɓe ardiiɓe ɓe ɗiɗo fuu ɓe njottii daraja Brigadier General nder konu lesdi Naijeriya.
Kuugal e nguurndam saare.
Cecilia Akagu ko tawaaɗo Ankpa nder hukuma pamarun Ankpa nder Diiwal Kogi, Naajeeriya. O woni jaajotooɗo jaaynde Finance Corp nder konu lesdi Nigeria. O woni mawɗo ardiiɗo jaayndeeji. O ɗon waree Mr. Clifford Wanda mo ɗon je ɗon boo jeye Brigadier General nder konu lesdi Naijeriya. Mr. Clifford Wanda diga gariiri Enugo Ngwo nder gariirɗi gariiru Enugo North nder Diiwal Enugu, Naajeeriya. Brigadier General Cecelia Akagu e Brigadeer Gen Clifford Wanda naa'e ardiiɓe ardiɓe ɓe ɓe ngaɗata nder konu lesdi Nigeria. Ammaa, ɓe ɓe'e ɓe ardiiɓe ɓe ɗiɗo fuu ɓe keɓii daraja Brigadier General nder ɓe ɗon kawta. Cecilia Akagu e Clifford Wanda hawti e nder hitaande 1990 nder nder darnde maɓɓe nder lesdi Nigeria. Ngam ɓe ɗiɗo fuu ɓe ɗon ɓe, ɓe fuɗɗi jannde maɓɓe nder Jaji. Ɓe ɗon jokkondira nder nder laawol nder wakkati mo ɓe ɗon ɗon ɓe njokka nder suudu, koo nde Cecilia Akagu ɗon jeyaa nder konu ɗiɗaɓu, Clifford Wanda ɗonjeya nder lesdi. Ɓe woodi ɓiɓɓe ɗiɗo, ɓiɗɗo gorko e ɓiɗiraawo gorka.

Onome Akinbode-James:
Onome Akinbode-James (danyeeki 9 Maayu, 2000) ko jokkondirɗo basketbol Naajeeriya. O wakkilani lesdi Naajeeriya nder FIBA Africa Under-16 Championship for Women. O ɗon jogii basketball dow suudu jaŋde ngam team basketball rewɓe Duke Blue Devils.
Ɓiɗɗo.
Onome (duggi 9 Maayu, 2000) wondi Abeokuta, Diiwal Ogun, Najeeriya. O heɓii jaŋde maako nder Abeokuta. O ɗon nder janngirde maako nder lesdi Naijeriya nde o fuɗɗi ciya baseball haa o duuɓi 14. O jeyaa e Blair Academy nder Blairstown, New Jersey, to o timmini janngirde maako nder suudu.
Jaŋde jaŋngirde.
Onome wondi nder Blair Academy caggal nde FIBA Africa Under-16 Championship for Women. Ha hitaande maako mawɗe o waɗi poondi 13,0, rebounds 11,8, e blocks 2.2 e nder kala ko o yi'i.
Onome waɗi habaru TED ha jaŋde maako nder Blair Academy nder hitaande maako fuɗnde. Wolde nden ɗon wi'a Afrik, lesdi ko leydi: Firooji ɗi ɓe njogii.
Jaŋde jaŋdi.
Onome ɗon jeyaa nder Duke Blue Devils ngam jaajinoowo hooreejo Duke Joanne P. McCallie. Nder sahaa maako fuɗnaande, o waɗi poonuuji 4 e 5.7 rebounds e nder nder ciya.
Kuugal nder team national.
Onome wakili lesdi Nigeria nder FIBA Africa Under-16 Championship for Women to o waɗi poondi 5,7, rebounds 10,3 e assists 0,8 per game nder nder fahin.
Yimɓe lesdi Naijeriya ɓe keɓii medal silver caggal ɓe maayi Mali 57 ⁇ 46 nder final, ngam maajum ɓe njaɓii ɓe to ko'e maɓɓe to Fedde Fuuta Fuuɓe 17 ngam rewɓe. Nigeria na'i hawti nder gasa.

Kudirat Akhigbe:
Kudirat Akhigbe (danyeeki 29 Diisemba, 1981) ko jaŋdeejo lesdi Naajeeriya mo jogiiɗo nder 400m.
O heɓii medalji bronze nder 4 × 400 mita relay e nder juulde Commonwealth 2002 e 2006, nden o jokki boo e hoore mum nder 2002 to o heɓataa final. Nder juulde Afrik 2002 o waɗi ko jowitiiɗe nder 400 mita e o heɓi koode silver nder 4 × 400 meter relay.
Wakkati maako ɓurɗo ɓeydaago fu, o waɗi 51.60 sekonde, nder lewru Yuuni 2001 nder Seville.

Fatima Bashir:
Fatima Bashir (danyeeki 8 janngo 1995), ko juudaaɗo Naajeeriya mo jogori e nder jaaynde rewɓe. O heɓii medal bronze nder juulde 2015 All-Africa Games nder jaŋde 48kg.
Kuugal ɓalli.
Fatima Bashir heɓii medal bronze nder nder jeewte 48 kg nder Yuuli 2015 All-Africa Games ha Brazzaville, Jamhuriyawol Konngo.

Fatima Azeez:
Titilayo Fatima Azeez (danyeeki 31 lewru Diisemba, 1992) ko jokkondirɗo badminton Naajeeriya. E hitaande 2010, o jokki e juulde Summer Olympics to Singapore. Nder hitaande 2011, o heɓii koode ɓaleere nder ɓalleere rewɓe nder juulde Afrik fuu nder Maputo, Mozammbik.
Ko ɓe waɗi.
Fedde Ɓooyde Afrik.
"Firooji rewɓe"
Koɗol Afrik.
"Fedde rewɓe go'o"
"Firooji rewɓe"
BWF International Challenge/Series.
"Fedde rewɓe go'o"
"Firooji rewɓe"

Ayomide Emmanuel Bello:
Ayomide Emmanuel Bello (danyeeki 4 Apriil 2002) ko canooɗo lesdi Naajeeriya. O hawri e nder nder C-1 200m rewɓe nder Olympics Summer 2020 waɗii Tokyo, Japan.
E hitaande 2018, o heɓii medalje ɗiɗi e nder juulde Afrik. Nder hitaande nden, o daranii lesdi Naajeeriya nder juulde juutiije juutde 2018 e nder kuugal nayi: juulirde C1 juulal, juullirɗe C1, juulerre K1 e juuluurɗe K1. O heɓataa medal nder kuugal ɗii.
O hawri e juulde Afrik 2019 nden o heɓi medalji jaŋde nder C-1 200 mita e C-1500 mita. O heɓii kadi medalji jaŋde nder C-2 200 mita e C-2.500 mita. Ngam maajum lesdi man waɗi ɗiɗaɓo nder nder dowla dowle dow canoeing dow dow juulde Afrik 2019 nden o heɓii kooto nder juulirde Tokyo 2020 nder C-1 200 mita.

Ada Benjamin:
Ada Benjamin (danyeeki 18 Maayu, 1994) ko jokkondirɗo Naajeeriya, mo anndini dow jaayɗe.
Jooɗa.
E hitaande 2014, to juulde Commonwealth to Glasgow o heɓi koode silver nder 4 × 400 mita relay bee Patience Okon George, Regina George e Folashade Abugan.
O ɗon janngude haa jaŋde Texas, El Paso (UTEP), o ɗon jaɓɓa nder jaayɗe. Benjamin woni gooduɗo nder UTEP'en nder nder suudu e nder gariiri.

Margaret Bamgbose:
Margaret Bamgbose (danyeeki 19 Oktooba, 1993) ko jaŋdeere lesdi Naajeeriya mo jaɓɓiima nder mita 400. O laati go'o nder 11 nder nder Aameerik nder jaŋde Notre Dame.
Kuugal.
Bamgbose waɗi 400m ha nder 2017 World Championships ha 20th nder wakkati 52.23.
Bamgbose waɗi ko o ɓooydi e nder 4 × 400 m relay ngam Naajeeriya nder 2016 World Indoor Championships. Yimɓe ngam Bamgbose, Regina George, Tameka Jameson e Ada Benjamin ɓe njaɓaani ɓe ɓe njogii dow dow podium haa nokkuure 4. O waɗi tataɓo nder jaŋde Naajeeriya2016 ɓaawo Patience George e Omolara Omotoso, e ɗum waɗi o waɗi nokkuure maako nder juulde juulal Rio
Notre Dame.
Nder 2016, Bamgbose jaɓi jaango nder Notre Dame e jaangirde nder jaŋde nder nder Jaŋnde Mendoza College of Business. O wonnoo ko'e 11, o waɗi ko ɓuri heewde e nder 200 m e 400 m nder hitaande 2016. Nder 2014 e 2015, o waɗi nder nokkuure 6 nder NCAA Outdoor finaals nder wakkatiji ɗiɗo. O waɗi ko e nder finaal e hitaande 2016 o waɗi nder nokkuure 4. O wonnoo boo jaagorɗo ACC Indoor 400 Meter 2015.
Biograafiwol.
Bamgbose jibinaa nder Aameerik to baaba'en Naajeeriya, Sunday e Afusatu Bambbose ɓe ƴiwoyi Abeokuta nder worgo hirnaange lesdi Naajeeriya. O woodi deerɗiraaɓe ɗiɗo, go'oto debbo e gooduɗo debbo. O yahi nder Evanston Township High School, Illinois. Bamgbose fuɗɗi bana mo hawtaaki dow dow nder jannde mawɗe e nder jaŋde arande ngam o ɓeyda nder nder jarje 400 mita.

Leka Mini Baridam:
Leka Mini Baridam ko taekwondo joginoowo Naajeeriya mo ɗon hawta nder jaaynde mawɓe rewɓe. O heɓii medalle bronze nder juulde Afrik e hitaande 2011 nder kilo 73.
Kuugal ɓalli.
Baridam waɗi gasa nder kilo 73 nder juulde Afrik fuɗnaange 2011 nder Maputo, Mozammbik nden o heɓii medal bronze.

Ogonna Chukwudi:
Ogonna Franca Chukwudi (danyeeki 14 Septemba, 1988) ko jokkondirɗo Naajeeriya mo jogori no halfitaade e nder labbol Itali Lazio e e gollude leydi Naajeeriya.
Kuugal nder kuugal.
Chukwudi ɗon jogii ngam Umeå IK.
Kuugal hakkunde leyɗe.
Chukwudi wakki lesdi Naijeriya nder FIFA FIFA Women World Cup 2011.

Umaru Tanko Al-makura:
Umaru Tanko Al-makura eriminmo duubi 1952 eii lysdi lomou toe siyasa,en Naajeeriya nder Diiwal Nassarawa eii Dun gwamajjo toe sanatajjo .

Evelyn Ebhomien:
Evelyn Ebhomien (danyeeki 15 Fabrayru, 1981) ko jaɓɗo ɓannduɗe nder lesdi Naajeeriya. O hawri e nder nder ɓalli ɓaleeji ɓalleeji e dow dow ko'e maɓɓe nder juulde Olimpiiki hitaande 2000.

Grace Ebor:
Grace Ebor (danyeeki 8 Aguusta, 1977) ko jokkondirɗo Naajeeriya mo jaɓɓiima e nder nder jokkude hakkunde. O heɓii medalli jaŋde nder mita 800 nder juulal 2003 All-Africa Games.
O woodi ɓurɗo ɓooyma e 2:02.04 nder mita 800 (2003) e 4:28.17 nder 1500 mita (2005).

Emem Edem:
Emem Edem (danyeeki 15 Oktooba, 1983) ko dannduɗo lesdi Naajeeriya mo jaɓɓiima e nder 100m.
O waɗi ko jowitiiɗo nder mita 100 nder juulde ɓooyma ɓooyaade e nder 1999 World Youth Championships, nden o hawti e mita 200 ton. Nder nokkuure nde o waɗi ko o jeytaama e nder 100 mita e o heɓii koode gold nder 4 × 100 meter relay nder juulal 2003 All-Africa Games.

Charity Ekezie:
Charity Ekezie woni TikToker Naajeeriya e wonde jarida.
Ɓiɗɗo e janngirde.
Ekezie mawnini nder Douala, Kameruun, to o waɗi ɓiyum e o timmini janngirde maako. O dilli Nigeria nder hitaande 2001, nde o marunoo duuɓi 10.
O heɓii digirii nder habaru yimɓe diga Nnamdi Azikiwe University.
Kuugal.
Ekezie huuwani nder radio duuɓi tati e go'o. O mari feere feere nder internet, je ɗon ɗon maaki diga hitaande 2020.
O hawti TikTok nder 2020 ngam ɓeydaare je COVID-19 waɗi. Video maako arande je ɗon ɓooydi haandi ɓornugo limce aada diga lesdi Afrika feere feere. Nde o fuɗɗi heɓugo bolle ɗe o anndi dow vidio'en, o waɗi anniya o jaaboto ɗe bee ko'e. Gila nden wakkati, Ekezie'en ɗon haɓɓo nder habaruji ɗi ɗon ɗon halki haalude ha nder Afrik. E nder bidio go'o Ekezie ɗon wi'a yimɓe ɓe ɗon yi'i afriknaaɓe ɗon njara ndiyam ngam ɓe walaa ndiyam, ngam ɗon ɗon mari ndiyam nder ɓooya; nder feere ɗon holla ɓe ɓe Afrik woni lesdi goɗɗi je Wakanda woni laamorde ma. Ekezie boo ɗon haaki TikTok ngam ɓeydataako program maɓɓe tawonnaaki foondoowo to yimɓe Afrik, ko wayi no TikTokers Afrik'en mbaawataa heɓugo ceede diga fiidiyooji maɓɓe.
Ha nder lewru lewuru 2023, 60% eɓɓe Ekezie ɗon nder lesdi Aameerika. Ha lewro Yuli 2022 Eekezie woodi yimɓe miliyon 1.2; ha nder feebari 2023 ɓe ɓeydi haa ɓe ɓuri miliyaaruuji 2.
Ekezie wi'i o yiɗi warugo nder kubaruuji bana kuugal nder yeeso.
Jaɓɓorgo Kewuuji e jaɓɓorde.
Ha Desemba 2022, NPR haani Ekezie ha nder limgal TikTok duniyaaru.
Nder lewru janvier 2023, Ekezie haɓɓiri ha nder maral tiktok's Top Creator 2022 Sub-Saharan Africa award.
Nolde hoore.
Ekezie ɗon anndira Inngilisjo e Faraysay. O woodi bandiraaɓe ɗiɗo. O ɗon torra bee ɓernde nder yonki maako fuu, e ɗum waɗi o ɗon ɓeyda ɓerɗe ngam ɓaawo maajum.
Ha nder hitaande 2022, o jooɗii e Abuja, Naajeeriya.

Itohan Ebireguesele:
Itohan Ebireguesele (danyeeki 31 Yuuli, 1990) ko jogorɗo darnde darnuki darnaange nder lesdi Naajeeriya. O jeyaa e nder kilo 69 o heɓi medaluuji e dow 2010 e 2014 Commonwealth Games.

Gwarzo:
Gwarzo dum latake hukuma pamarun nder Diiwal Kano nder Naajeeriya eill latake Gwarzo Eii wodi Janbide 393 km2 toe jama,are 183,987 dum 2006 .

Fawziya Abdoulkarim:
 
Fawziya Abdoulkarim (danyeeki 1 Maayu 1989) ko jokkondirɗo kammuunaaɓe. O wondi goomu nder gardiiɗo lesdi Kamerun e nder gollal ɓalli ɓaleere e Bafia Evolution e hitaande 2014. O wondi nder timmude lesdi Kamerun nder Firoore Fedde Fuuta Fuuɗal Fooɗol Feeɗirɗe Falaaɗe 2014 nder Italiya e nder juulal Olympics 2016 nder Rio de Janeiro.

Camila Brait:
Camila de Paula Brait (danyeeki 28 Oktooba, 1988) ko jokkondirɗo ɓalli ɓoli daga Frutal, Barazil, mo jogoriɗo no freeball. O ɗon walli Osasco Volleybol Club nden o ɗon wari nder lesdi Barazil.
O heɓii medalje silver nde o daranii Brazil e nder Olympics Summer 2020.
Kuugal.
O fuɗɗi golle mum nder defte URS/Sacramento. Caggal ɗum; o waɗi nder goɗɗe kawtal, ɗe SESI/Uberlândia, Praia Clube-MG, São Caetano/MonBijou e Osasco, innde Finasa/Osasco wakkati o hawti e kuugal.
Wano o jokki e Osasco, Brait heɓii koode e ɓurɗo heɓugo koore nder FIVB Club World Championship 2012 nder Doha, Qatar.
Brait heɓii koode silver nder FIVB 2014 Club World Championship caggal nde club mum maayi 0 ⁇ 3 to Dinamo Kazan nder match ko'e dow.
Kuugal hakkunde leyɗe.
Camila Brait waɗi ciya maako arande nder lesdi lesdi man e lesdi Venezuela. Camila Brait hawti e FIVB 2010 Volleyball Women's World Championship, waɗii nder Japan, walli leydi mum haa o timmini nder darnde ɗiɗaɓo.
Brait heɓii ko'e ɓurɗo jaɓaade, ɓurnde jaɓɓaare, e ɓurna ɓurduɗo ɓure ɓurde ɓernde nde timmude maako heɓti koode silver e 2015 Pan American Games nde ɓe mballa e nder match jaɓɓorgal 0-3 to Aameerika.
O suɓi nder nder gollal lesdi ngam hawtaade nder juulde ɓalli ɓale ɓalle ɓaleeɓe nder Juulɗe Olimpiyeeje 2020, o heɓi koode ɓele ɓole ɓaawo Brazil ɓadi 0-3 to Aameerik nder njuuldu koore ɓalndu ɓallere ɓoolɗe medalji gold nder juulal volleyball rewɓe.

Hadi Abubakar Sirika:
Hadi Abubakar Sirika nder nylde 2 lewru mayu mongou 1964 hukuma pamarun Dutsi Diiwal Katsina. Jorni ewodi ministajjo Lysidi Naajeeriya dun on Ardiiɗo majalisajju Katsina woila

Chris Nwabueze Ngige:
Chris Nwabueze Ngige dum nylde 8 lewru Augusta 1952. Eii dun ministajjo Lysidi Naajeeriya Joe go,on bididdo gwamnatajjo Muhammadu Buhari eii gada Diiwal Anambra latake Jambiya,en PDP.

Zainab Lawal Gummi:
Zainab Lawal Gummi woni komisaaru elto nder Diiwal Zamfara, Naajeeriya. O laamaama ngam ngomnaaru Bello Matawalle.
Kuugal.
Gummi wi'i o ɗon wallina heɓugo jaango e haandi hakkiilo. O holli kadi dowla maɓɓe ɗon haani halki feere fu fu nder huutore ɓiy bana ɓiijo, bana hawtore e huwtora ɓikkoy. Ɗum heɓay laawol laamiiɓe aada e hawtuki jannginooɓe Islaam ngam wallude jahrugo sari'aaji.

Safiya Hussaini:
Safiya Hussaini Tungar Tudu (danyeeki 1967) ko debbo Naajeeriya mo ɓe waɗi kiita ngam waɗugo njeenu nder hitaande 2002. O danydi ɓiɗɗo debbo go'o nder Sakkwatoɓe, lesdi Naajeeriya nder sari'a. O jeyaa e nder kiita, ammaa o jeyaama e dow dow daliila fuu nder lewru Duujal 2002 caggal nde ɓe ceedi.
Ɓaawoore.
Hussaini waɗi kiita ha mayde ha Oktooba 2001 ngam wi'a o woodi ɓiɗɗo bee ɓurna debbo. O heɓii ɓiɗɗo ɓaawo woɗɗugo maako. Hussaini wi'i o ɗon warugo haani ha nder fuɗugo e gorko, mo mahkam Sharia tawani mo walaa hakke ngam walaa daliila. Nder nder kiita, Hussaini walaa wakkilol habaru e haalude hakkilooji maako. Kot Sokoto taƴi haala maako boo o hokki mo hakke dow 12 Oktooba 2001.
Hakkiilo ɗon ɗon maɓɓa bana ɗuɗɗum, nden haɓɓuki habaruji duniyaaru e petitisiji ngam rimugo maako ɗon hawtake. Halima Abdullahi, mawɗo walligo wallitugo go'o e yidde (HELP), hawruki laamateeri, boo ɗon moftake hakkiilu. Ha nder bolle o wi'i hakkoilu ɗon "ɗum haɗi ɓurna Muslim'en lesdi Naajeriya. Yimɓe ɗon mbi'a kiita ɗon ɗon ko naa' ngam Hussaini ɗon ceede ngam waɗuki njeenu, ammaa ngam o ɗon woodi nde o wooda. Kadi, seedaaɓe nayi ɓe tawreeta Islaam waɗi ɓe ɗon walaa nder kiita. Halima wi'i kiita ɗum waɗi ngam Hussaini wari diga yimɓe ɓe ɓe ɓeydaani. Nde ɓe mbi'i kiita'en bana "teddungal hakkiilo e hakkeere hakko e haandi", ɓe noddi gomnaaru Attahiru Bafarawa ngam o hawta ngam hisna Hussaini.
Hussaini ɓeydi, laamo'en maako ɗon holla bana ko Husaini mari debbo haani woni baaba ɓiɗɗo maako Adama mo duuɓi go'o e debbo gariiri ɗon waɗi haala maako fu nder nder sembe. Ɓe ɗon holli bana non ko ɓe mbi'i waɗugo ko'e ma'aare waɗi ko o waɗi diga ɓe huutoroo sari'ah nder leydi ndin. Sariya fulbe ha Sakkwatoɓe ha nder lewru Juun 2000, lewre caggal nde Adama ɓiyama. O ɗon hawtina hooreejo lesdi Naajeeriya Hauwa Ibrahim.
Hussaini wi'i habaruɗo Okorie Uguru be ɓundu maako waɗi ngam ɓe ɓaŋgti mo.
Hussaini heɓii jaajol maako nder 25 Maars 2002 nden ɓe njaɓaaki haala. Kotol Apelaatol Sokoto tawi kiita mayde, ko kotol Sharia Islam waɗi ha Oktoobar, walaa daliila. Kotol ngal waɗi kiita dow ko haani nder sari'a Sokooto haandi ha haadi haade Hussaini, ngam haasi haaki haaynii ha wodi haati haaduki sari', ha Sokoto haa haayi haalu haama haado haɗi dow daliila.
Hussaini'en haandi ɗum haani ha nder deftere "Safiya Husaini Tungar Tudu": I, Safia (2004).
Ɓaawo duuɓi 18, Hussaini wi'i o yaafani tortooɓe maako.

Kiyawa:
Kiyawa latake hukuma pamarun nder Diiwal Jigawa lysdi Naajeeriya dum wooduke woru Kiyawa nder Naajeeriya

Bali:
BALI
Bali lataake hukuma pamara ei wonake nder Diiwaal Taraba Naajeeriya. Dum woodake headquarter nder wuro Bali. Dum woodake yareeji bananta Tiv jukun fulani/jibau chamba e ko laati woodake.Yareeji bananta Igbo Mumuye e himbe Niger/Delta habama hedi nokkore majum.

Gashaka:
GASHAKA
Gashaka wonake hedi fuuna nder Diiwal Taraba be Adamawa. Laatake dew kerol be kamarun. Dum woodake yajaki pellel kimani 6,402 km2.

Karim Lamido:
KARIM LAMIDO
Karim Lamido latake hukuma pamara eii Diiwal Taraba Naajeeriya. Dum woodake headquarter e nder wuro wuro Karim Lamido eei 9°18′00″N 11°12′00″E.. Dum woodake maunugo pellel ko laataki 6,620 km² be dudugo himbe wakkati census 2006.

Kurmi:
KURMI
Kurmi latake hukuma pamara ei Diiwal Taraba Naajeeriya.noe dum latirki hukuma pamara dum woodake maube ardinabe bananta chairman,en e luttube. Hukuma Kurmi dum sendirki ei nokkore sedda sedda.Dum woodake headquarter nder wuro Ba'Issa.

Lau:
LAU
Lau latake hukuma pamara ei Diiwal Taraba Naajeeriya. Dum woodake headquarter nder wuro Lau. Dum latake ardinama e himbe Hausare/Fulfulde.Lau wonake dew kerol be Ardo Kola Jalingo Yorro e Zing latake hukuma pamara ei diwaali Taraba.Dum hauti dew kerol e Numan be Diiwal Adamawa.

Kazaure:
Kazaure latake lamourade toe hukuma pamarun nder Diiwal Jigawalysdi Naajeeriya ndum headquarter nder nukkore kazaure.

Yankwashi:
Yankwashi Latake hukuma pamara nder Diiwal Jigawa lysdi Naajeeriya ewodi headquarter nder karkana.

Kiri kasama:
Kiri Kasama latake hukuma pamara nder Diiwal Jigawa lysdi Naajeeriya, ewodi headquarter nder kiri Kasama toe bididdo 797km2 toe jama,are 191,523 duubi 2006 census. Lamba,en 731. Naajeeriya jirgi,en Koree 9805 nder Kiri kasama.

Abdul Rahman Al-Sudais:
Abdul Rahman Ibn Abdul Aziz al-Sudais (Arabic: عَبْدُ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ بْنُ عَبْدِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلسُّدَيْسِ, be andirimou be A-Sudais), o neddo gooto nder imams joweenay jei Juulurde, Masjid al-Haram nder Makkah, Saudi Arabia; Ardidou jei Kuubdum Ardabe fiijiji di nde dum didi asaminkeejum Juulurde; innora Qari'( o hadditijo qur'anaa); Kanko on Dubai international asaminkeejum qur'anaa Award's "Lislaamu wela -ii'amjo haa hiitande 2005.

Dikko Umar Radda:
Dikko Umar Radda (Daññama 10 September 1969) un gimɗo lesdi Naajeeriya, mo annɗal jawdi, Siyaasaaji e nden lattiɗo ngomnaajo Diiwal Katsina cubtaaɗo ñalɗe 29th marcie 2023.O Daarectaajo fuu mo ɗum mɓe pamaral, cakaawal e gollal huunde faago Yeeso caggal Naajeeriya (SMEDAN).O subtaama Hooreejo ngomnaajo diiwal Katsina nder nde ɗumngu 2023.[2

Isah Yuguda:
Isah Yuguda.
Ɗuun danyiimo lewru 15 june dungu 1956 e gelle Yuguda, ɗun ɓii fulɓe jowlɓe bo. O meeɗi wadgo gomnaajo diiwal Bauchi, lesdii Naajeeriya diiga dungu 2007 yaarii 2011 ardaaki ndee ɗiɗi. O waɗi ministaajo jahaale lesdii Naajeeriya les ardoogal Olusegun Obasanjo hiitaade 2000. 
O nasty jam'iyyaji siyaasa Naajeeriya ɗuɗɗi, o waɗi ANPP, PDP be APC.
Njangde Maako (Education).
O njangi e njangirde Fowna ta wayla Naajeeriya nde innde Arts and science e gelle Maiduguri dungu (1974-1976), e dungu 1976 yaarii 1979 o yahii njangirde jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga gelle Zaria nga Innde Ahmadu Bello University ɗon o njangi ilmu ndongidirkii leddi (Economics). O hawti degree maako ɗiɗarjum e jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga gelle Jos diiwal Plateau nga Innde University Of Jos e dungu 1998. 
Kuungal Artuugal.
O waɗi kakkilono wo banki ji ɗuɗɗi hanko woni Manajaajo bankii ji ɗin nangi diiga Banki Mortage bank dungu(1981-1984), Savannah bank e dungu(1986-1987), Inland bank e dungu(1991-1992) yaarii NAL merchant bank e dungu(1999-2000). 
Ministaajo e lesdii Naajeeriya.
Jagordo shubtaaɗo ardiiɗo Lesdii Naajeeriya koden Olusegun Obasanjo innimo bo lattinii mo hanko woni ministaajo jahaale lesdii Naajeeriya e hiitaade 2000. Ɓawo ɗob ɓe wattanii mo kujeerawal o wuiti ministaajo jahaale piirooji/jirgiwal dungu 2003. 
Gomnaajo Diiwal Bauchi.
O lattake jagordo shubtaaɗo ardotooɗo diiwal Bauchi e lewru aprilu, dungu 2007 les jam'iyya ANPP ka siyaasa Naajeeriya. O heɓi nasaraaku dow hebgo adadow yimɓe cuɓuɓe mo yaarii 771,503 ɗon o do'ii tefooɓe ardoogal gal ɓe jam'iyya ji CPC be ACN. 
Iyaaluji maako (Family).
O wodi rewɓe nnayo (4 wifes), hajiya Aisha Isah Yuguda, Hajiya Hauwa Abiodun Isah Yuguda, Hajiya Mariya Isah Yuguda be Hajiya Nafisa Isah Yuguda. Hajiya Nafisa hanko woni ɓii ardiiɗo Lesdii Naajeeriya Umaru Musa Yar'Adua. Hajiya Mariya bo ɓii Senatajoo Ahmadu Danyami.
Jam'iyya maako ka Siyaasa.
O waɗi ANPP, ɓawo ɗon o warti PDP nden boh e dungu 2016 o wanginii anniya maako dow o wartai jam'iyya APC ka siyaasa Naajeeriya les ardoogal Muhammadu Buhari kooden. 

Diana Eneje:
Diana Chioma Eneje (duubi daygo 19 juko 2002), anndiraaɗo e nder golle Diana Eneji, ko mooduɗo, vlogger e social media, jibinaaɗo nder Lagos, o ƴiwoyi nder Enugu, diiwal nder leydi Naajeeriya. O anndiraa ngam o golli nder Rema music video Dumebi
Diana Chioma Eneje jibini ha 19 juko 2002 ha Lagos to Kingsley Eneji, e Linda Eneja. Firo maako fuɗɗam nder fashion, wari diga ɓurɓe ɓiyum Jennifer Eneje, e Doris Enege, ɓe mardi mo njamɗinaandi fashion.
Kuugal.
E hitaande 2016, o fuɗɗi golle mum nder modeling bana model mo ɓeydi duuɓi 14, e duuɓi 14. Nder 19 Aguusta 2017, o fuɗɗi haɓɓugo daande maako, ngam wallugo ɓikkoy ɓe ɓe ɗon ɓeya. Eneje fuɗɗii vlog fashion dow YouTube nder Aguusta 2019. O ɗon holla ɓalndu, ɓalli, nyaamdu, e ko o waɗi nder nder yaadu. Nder 19 Aguusta 2019, o waɗi ko o haɓɓii ngam jaɓugo gelle mum ngam ɓalli ɓoli e hawtaade e The Shine Cartel. O wurtini nder Rema music video Dumebi, ɗum wartirtee e Jonzing World, e Mavin Records e 21 May 2019, hono mawɗo nder video.
Eneje waɗi semmbe ngam HP, Cadbury, PayPorte, Mango, Stanbic IBTC, Krispy Kreme, Kellogg Tolaram, Infinix, Bolt, Coca Cola, Octafx e ko ɓuri heewde. Ha 18 lewru Yune 2020, o holli dow golle mum, bana semmbibaajo to Guardian TV, bee Emmanuella jaajotooɗo Popsicles.
Ha 19 August 2021, Swarovski, jaaynde jaayɗe e jaajɗe nder Nigeria, holli Diana, bana gooto nder yimɓe ɓe ɗon mari semmbe dow marki maako.

Oluyemi Fagbamila:
Oluyemi Fagbamila (dugumi 23 feebari 1983) ko jogiiɗo ɓooyma lesdi Naajeeriya, o joginooɗo ko 400m.
E nder nder karallaagal 4 × 400 mita Nigeria o heɓi koode silver e nder 2002 Afirikanaaɓe Campiyoonji e o suɓii ngam 2003 Campiyoonji Duuniyaru, amma timma ngal fuɗɗii fuɗnaaki.
Fuu e nder maɓɓe o waɗi ko eɓɓiima e dow ko'e jowitiiɗe e juulde 2002 World Junior Championships. O waɗii ko o waɗata e nder jaŋde ɓalli ɓalndu e ɓooyma e hitaande 1999 (100 e 200 m) to o heɓii nde.
Sahaaji maako ɓurɗi ɓooyugo ɓooyi wakkati 23.46 nder mita 200, heɓii nder lewru Mee 2002 nder El Paso; e 52.19 nder meta 400, waɗii e lewuru Mee 2002 nder Houston. O ɗon haɓɓa ngam jaŋde Texas nder El Paso.

Bala Mohammed Kauran Bauchi:
Bala Mohammed Abdulkadir (Kauran Bauchi).
Innde maako Bala Abdulkadir Mohammed, (ɗuun ndaƴiimo ƴandeere 5 e lewru October dungu 1958) gimɗo siyaasajo Naajeeriya o meɗi wadgo ministaajo Abuja diiga dungu 2010 yaarii 2015, o waɗi senatajoo Diiwal Bauchi ta fombina diiga dungu 2007 yaarii 2010, hanko woni boh Gomnaajo jagordo shubtaaɗo ardiiɗo diiwal Bauchi diiga 2019 yaarii 2023. Ɗuun ɓeddi suɓugomo hanko'on woni ardotooɗo diiwal Bauchi e duuɓi jotta (present years).
Kuungal Artuungal.
O meeɗi huwuki e ministiriji ɗuɗɗi nanngii diiga ministiri Nder wuro Naajeeriya, ministiri hiite, Ministiri riskow kaaƴe lesdii, o meeɗi wadgo ballitoowo ministaajo jahaale lesdii enta jahaale dow fiirooji nden boh o waɗi directaajo mauɗo e fellere yimɓe ɓe ilmu ndongidirkii leddi ɓe hande meeɗen (meteorological). O ɗacci howky (retired) edow Mangu maako go darectaajo o nasti siyaasa Naajeeriya. 
Njangde Maako.
O fuɗɗi njande maako e njangirde Duguri hiitaade 1965, o waɗi njangirde Gomnaati shaakare nde Secondary e Bauchi ɗon o hawti WAEC. O njangi e njangirde jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga gelle Maiduguri ɗon o hawti degree maako.
Siyaasaji Maako.
O Nasti siyaasa Naajeeriya les baaba sowdow maako Isah Yuguda hiitaade o warti jam'iyya maɓɓe ka PDP wakkacire o ɓaggi ɓi ardotooɗo Naajeeriya Umaru Musa Yar'Adua. Ɓawo mayde maako ɗon o wuiti gaɗaa ballitoowo Yar'Adua on mo indee Goodluck Ebele Jonathan o latti hanko woni gimɗo maako masin.
Senatajoo E Diiwal Bauchi.
O waɗi senatajoo Diiwal Bauchi ta fombina hiitaade 2007 les jam'iyya ANPP ka siyaasa Naajeeriya. O ardake ƴimɓe fombina Diiwal Bauchi diiga dungu 2007 yaarii 2010. O jogake kujeeraaje mauɗe e majaalisa senata'en ardotooɓe lesdii Naajeeriya, doow luuɓe, felle, shede, boldateeɗe, kuuɗe lesdii, e ko nanndi fuu. Ɓawo mayde Ardotooɗo Naajeeriya e wakkaci mo innde Umaru Musa Yar'Adua ɗuun lattini ballitoowo mo ardoogal hanko ardotoo lesdii Naajeeriya e dungu 2010 hanko woni ƴi'e Goodluck Ebele Jonathan. O inni howky be maako o hokkimo kujeerawal maugal koden. 
Ministaajo Abuja.
E lewru Aprilu dungu 2010 ardotooɗo Naajeeriya Goodluck Ebele Jonathan ronoowɗo Umaru Musa Yar'Adua ɓawo mayde maako lattini mo hanko woni ministaajo Abuja hanko hollata kila no gelle Abuja ɗen wooɗirta fuu. O walliti hoje ardaaki wadgo laaɓi boɗɗi e maheele boɗɗi nder Abuja gamma wooɗuki gelle ɗen. 
==Gomnaajo Diiwal Bauchi==.
O lattake jagordo shubtaaɗo ardotooɗo diiwal Bauchi dungu 2019 yaarii 2023 o do'ii gomnajo Abubakar Muhammad e kuri'aajii 515,313. Ƴimɓe diiwal Bauchi ɓesdi shubtowki mo dow ɗiɗawre ardoogal e lewru tatawru ndu Maris, dungu meeɗen jotta 2023.
O heɓi nasaraaji ɗuɗɗi e ardoogal maako Gomnaajo Diiwal Bauchi.
Yimɓe diiwal Bauchi ɓesdi cuɓuki mo ardoogal diiwal Bauchi dow ɗiɗawre ardoogal e lewru Maris, dungu men dow 2023. 
Hiimoɓe

Aisha Falode:
Aisha Falode woni marjoowo fijirde nder lesdi Naajeeriya. O woni boo hooreejo Nigeria Women Football League (NWFL).
Ɓaawo nde Raymond Dokpesi ɗon ɗon waɗa anniya haɓɓuki teleeji mum, anndiraa jooni bana teleji Afrik mawɗi (AIT), o hawti. Ɗu'um waɗi o heɓii jaŋde nder ɗemngal mass communication. Gaɗa ɗum o huuwi kadi wakkati seɗɗa bee NITEL (Nigerian Telecommunication Limited) nden boo bee Graduate Telephone Operators Scheme of the then Nitel.
Ko o heɓii ko o waɗi nder nder golle ɗe o waɗata nder kuugal e nder radio.
Nder lewru Janaare 2017, o haɓɓii hooreejo Nigeria Women Football League, hooreeɗo Aiteo Cup e Nigeria Premier League.

Isa Yuguda Bauchi:
Isa Yuguda.
Ɗuun danyiimo lewru 15 june dungu 1956 e gelle Yuguda, ɗun ɓii fulɓe jowlɓe bo. O meeɗi wadgo gomnaajo diiwal Bauchi, lesdii Naajeeriya diiga dungu 2007 yaarii 2011 ardaaki ndee ɗiɗi. O waɗi ministaajo jahaale lesdii Naajeeriya les ardoogal Olusegun Obasanjo hiitaade 2000. O nasty jam'iyyaji siyaasa Naajeeriya ɗuɗɗi, o waɗi ANPP, PDP be APC.
Njande Maako (Education).
O njangi e njangirde Fowna ta wayla Naajeeriya nde innde Arts and science e gelle Maiduguri dungu (1974-1976), e dungu 1976 yaarii 1979 o yahii njangirde jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga gelle Zaria nga Innde Ahmadu Bello University ɗon o njangi ilmu ndongidirkii leddi (Economics). O hawti degree maako ɗiɗarjum e jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga gelle Jos diiwal Plateau nga Innde University Of Jos e dungu 1998.
Kuugal Artuugal.
O waɗi kakkilono wo banki ji ɗuɗɗi hanko woni Manajaajo bankii ji ɗin nangi diiga Banki Mortage bank dungu(1981-1984), Savannah bank e dungu(1986-1987), Inland bank e dungu(1991-1992) yaarii NAL merchant bank e dungu(1999-2000).
Ministaajo e lesdii Naajeeriya.
Jagordo shubtaaɗo ardiiɗo Lesdii Naajeeriya koden Olusegun Obasanjo innimo bo lattinii mo hanko woni ministaajo jahaale lesdii Naajeeriya e hiitaade 2000. Ɓawo ɗob ɓe wattanii mo kujeerawal o wuiti ministaajo jahaale piirooji/jirgiwal dungu 2003. 
Gomnaajo Diiwal Bauchi.
O lattake jagordo shubtaaɗo ardotooɗo diiwal Bauchi e lewru aprilu, dungu 2007 les jam'iyya ANPP ka siyaasa Naajeeriya. O heɓi nasaraaku dow hebgo adadow yimɓe cuɓuɓe mo yaarii 771,503 ɗon o do'ii tefooɓe ardoogal gal ɓe jam'iyya ji CPC be ACN. 
Iyaaluji maako (Family).
O wodi rewɓe nnayo (4 wifes), hajiya Aisha Isah Yuguda, Hajiya Hauwa Abiodun Isah Yuguda, Hajiya Mariya Isah Yuguda be Hajiya Nafisa Isah Yuguda. Hajiya Nafisa hanko woni ɓii ardiiɗo Lesdii Naajeeriya Umaru Musa Yar'Adua. Hajiya Mariya bo ɓii Senatajoo Ahmadu Danyami.
Jam'iyya maako ka Siyaasa.
O waɗi ANPP, ɓawo ɗon o warti PDP nden boh e dungu 2016 o wanginii anniya maako dow o wartai jam'iyya APC ka siyaasa Naajeeriya les ardoogal Muhammadu Buhari kooden.

Habibah Ruth Garba:
Habibah Ruth Garba woni komodore haaju nder lesdi Naajeeriya. O debbo arandeeji mo ɓe ɓe ɓeydi haa darnde komodore haa lesdi Naajeeriya. O heɓii karis award nder 2013 e women achievers award of the Women in Management, Business and Public Service (WIMBIZ) 2018 conference in Nigeria.
Kuugal.
Habibah Ruth Garba ko Habib Ruth, ko habib habiba ha haibba haaji ha bi'i ha'ibbe ha nder lesdi Naijeriya. O woni debbo arande mo haabibi haabbe haa habibi ha hibbe Haabibah Rut Garpa.
Ɗo ɗum jaabawol ngal ngal Household of God Church nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Jaabawal ngal woni nder kuugal GRACE ngal juulirde ngal fuɗɗorii e hitaande 1990. O jaɓi jaɓaaku Female Achievers Award nder jaaynde Women in Management, Business and Public Service (WIMBIZ) 2018. Jaayndi ndu waɗii ngam waɗugo kuɗol ngam ɓamtirde, hokkude baawɗe e ɓeydaago darnde rewɓe nder nder goomu ummaatoore e gooduɓe.

Christie George:
Christie George (dayngol; 10 Maayu, 1984) ko jokkondirɗo ɓaleere leydi Naajeeriya.
O wonnoo nder ɓalli fuɗnugo lesdi lesdi Naajeeriya nder juulde juulal 2008 Summer Olympics.

Rahma Haruna:
Rahma Haruna (c. 1996 - 1997; 25 Bowte 2016) ko ɓiɗɗo duuɓi 19 nɗer lesdi Naajeeriya, mo laatii annɗuɗe ngam fotooji ɗi fotoowo Sani Maikatanga waɗi.
Laamu.
Haruna jibinaa wakkati feere hakkunde 1996 e 1997, nder lesdi Naajeeriya. To Haruna waɗi lebbi joweego, jungo maako e juuɗe maako ɗon maaki, sey juude maako go'oto. O ɗon wondi nyau nyauɗo mo anndaaɗum waɗi o ɗon mbaawaa waɗugo kuuɗe manjum bana yahugo, jahugol, koo boo huuwugo kuuje ɗuuɗɗe. Ngam ɓernde maako ɗon ɓeyda, o haani jooɗugo nder boondi plastik. Ɓaawo foto'en ɓeydi ɓurugo haandi, goɗɗo mo ɓe anndaa mo hokki mo carel ɓoggi ngam ɓe ɓesda mo. Mawɓe Haruna ɓe hokki ɓe ɓe mari Nayra go'o miliiyonji nɗer njamu (US$2,737.89); amma o warataa. O maayi ngam daliila anndaaɗum dow 25 Diiseemba 2016, to duuɓi 19 nder Kano, Naajeeriya. Haruna ɗon maaya e ɓikkoy maako.

Amina Lawal:
Amina Lawal Kurami (duubi daygo 4 Siilo 1973) woni debbo Naajeeriya mo ɓe njetti e mayde ngam ɓe njaɓɓi ko'e maɓɓe e ngam ɗi marii ɓiɗɗo nder suudu. Lawal waɗi kiita e suudu sharia islaamiyankoore nder Funtua, nder diiwal Katsina, Naajeeriya, ha 22 Duujal 2002. Yimɓe ɓe o anndini bana baaba ɓiɗɗo, Yahayya Muhammad Kurami, ɓe njaɓɓi hakke ngam kawtal anndal. Ko ɗum waɗi ko Kurami yaafani sabu o waɗii alkawal e Quraan, ɗum wonaa laawol Lawal ngam ɓiyum, ko ɗum holli dow janngirde Mālikī.
Lawal'en ɗon njaɓɓa ɗum waɗi feere feere nder lesdi. O jeyi ɗum to suudu sharia, ɓe taƴi ɗum haalooɓe sari'aani, nden o rewi.
Ɓaawoore.
Lawal woni debbo ɗiɗaɓo nder lesdi Naijeriya mo ɓe njokki ngam waɗugo jonde yeeso kawtal. Debbo arande, Safiya Hussaini, waɗi kiita maako boɗɗina nder lewru mars 2002 nder dabare maako aranndeere. Sharia law haɓɓiti nder lesdi Zamfara nder woyla Nigeria nder hitaande 2000 nden diga saa'i maajum haajiri haa lesdi feere sappo e ɗiɗi.
Fedde jaabaade e jaɓɓaade.
Fuude wootere waɗi e 25 Septemba 2003 Lawal'en kiita mayde ngam yiitaaki e mari kaaƴe ɗum jeyaa e juutaaji njowo nder Kotol Sharia lesdi Katsina. Fedde nayi nder laamiiɓe jowi waɗi kiita dow kiiteji Islaam dow daliila feere, hawti e: hakkki ummotoore to jaɓugo kiitaaji hakkiilo, dalillaaji dow ɗaamugo maako naa' ɓe haani, kiitol ummotooɗo naaŋ ɗum haɗi, nden gooto tan haa wakkati kiitoji tati je haajirta ɗon ɗon ha haadi wakkati kiitta.
Baobab for Women's Human Rights, NGO ha Nigeria, haɓɓii haala maako, nde laatii ha hawtoreede e laamiiɓe Nigeria ɓe ɗon janngina nder dille jaajol e sharia. Lakilaaɓe Lawal hawti e Hauwa Ibrahim, laakiyaajo hakkiilo yimɓe mo anndiraa ngam kuugal maako ngam yimɓe ɓe ɓe taƴii ley sari'a. Nder defte maɓɓe maral Amina Lawal, laamooɓe naftiri e "laamu ɓeydi" (laama ɓuydi), ɓe mbi'i e nder sari'a sariya, duuɓi jowi ina waawi hakkunde ɓiydi neɗɗo e danygol; duuɓi ɗiɗi yeeso danygal ɓiɗɗo maako debbo, o ɗon haani e gorko maako.
Jaɓɓorgo Kewuuji.
Kuugal ngal hollitii ɓeydaaki nder ummaatooje e diina hakkunde diiwaanuuji kiristaanaaji e Muslim'en nder lesdi Nigeria.
Fedde nden waɗi ɓeydaaki nder lesdi Yammaaru, nden ɓe waɗi kuugal ngam ɓe kolli laamu Nijeria ngam o wurtina fedde ndee.
Wurooji feere nder nder jarida mawninki Miss World, je ɗon waɗa nder Nigeria nder 2002, ɓe ƴetti nder sarda ngam ɓe ɗon haɓɓa ngam no Amina Lawal waɗata. Miss Norway ɗon kiita kiite nden o noddi ɗum ""ko ɓurɗo ɓeydaago"" o wi'i o ɗon yaha haa Lawan yaafana.
Miss Ivory Coast wi'i,  ⁇ na yahugo to Nigeria, e mi tammi gootol am na walli ngam hisna Amina Lawal."  Miss Togo ɓeydi, "Kafugo debbo on naa' ko haani. Fuuta ummaatoore fu haɗi wurta ngam timmugo kuuɗe ɗe."Rabaaji mawninki feere feere fu ɗon wakiilo lesdi feere boo ɗon numi kiita nden ɓe ɗon tokka. Oprah Winfrey "Show" waɗi haala feere dow Amina Lawal e ɓawti yi'ooɓe ngam ɓe neldi e-mailji protest to Ambasadaaru Naajeeriya to Amerik: ɓurɗe e'e-meila miliyon 1.2 ɓaawo.
Amnesty International waɗi jaabuki be sembe to kiita ngam Naajeeriya woni jaabago to Convention internationale de droits humains ha dow tortion e feere ha nder haandi, ha haani ko haɗi ko huwtata ko'e je ɗon haaki. Goomu boo ɗon toro lesdi Naajeeriya ngam ɓe wurtina sari'a law nder nder lesdi lesdi ndi'e nder hitaande 1999. Ammaa Amnesty anndaa wonde haala nde ɗon woodi nder lesdi Naajeeriya, nder leydi ɗi diina yaawni.
Ardiiɗo lesdi Amerika Bill Clinton noddi ardiijo lesdi NaajeeriyaOlusegun Obasanjo, "Mi tammi e ɗon toro ngam sistemol kiita heɓan laawol ngam yaafugo debbo mo ɓe maayi ngam o haani danyugo ɓiɗɗo nder dewgal". Ngam maajum, Clinton ɗon toro yimɓe ɓe ɗon njaɓɓa ngam hooreejo Obasanjo woni Kiristaano diga worgo lesdi Naajeeriya, nden boo o ɗon haɓana ɗum. Ɓeydi, Musulman'en tan ɗon je ɗon ɗowtana sari'a law, ngam maajum hooreejo Obasanjo walaa ko wi'i nder haala nden, walaa baawɗe dow ko'e.
"save Amina" nder hitaande 2002 hawriti eɓɓoore nde heɓi heewɓe e junngo e'e eɓoori e nder 2003 e ɗemngal " ⁇ Please Stop the International Amine Lawal Protest Letter Campaigns" nde Ayesha Iman e Sindi Medar-Gould je wakili dow yimɓe lesdi Naajeeriya ɗiɗo haɓɓooɓe hakkeeji Aadama wi'i "amina amina", hajjitol "Save Amuna" ɗon woodi feere feere fu, hawti e wiɗugo feere-feere dow ko waɗata ngam waɗugo kiita ɗon ɓadake. Ɓe ɓeydi ɓe'e wi'i "Ɗum ɗon wondi ko haani ha nder tammunde ngam goɗɗe jamirooje hakkiilo yimɓe duniyaaru malla feere ɗon anndira ko ɓuri yimɓe hawtaɓe dow maajum, ngam maajum ɓe waawi waɗugo kuuɗe ɗe ɗon hawti bee ko ɓe yiɗi".
Nder lewru Maayi 2003, jaabuki rasmiji Embassy of Nigeria to Netherlands to kiita sharia dow lesdi Katsina nder Nigeria, ha nder lesdi lesdi Naajeeriya, woni dow walaa suudu kiitaaji hokki kiite dow Lawal. Ɓe mbi'i bolle ɗe "ko'e daliila e kalluɗum" nden "ndolol ko ngam "ngol haɗi nder nder lesdi Nigeria e nder leydi ndi yeeso ummaatoore duniyaaru". Ɓe mbi'i ɓe anndaa haala nde'e.
Ambassador A.A. Agada daga Embassy of Nigeria to Washington D.C., US, ɓeydi ɓurugo anndugo haala Lawal e wi'i e 29 August 2003: "Ambassad yiɗi anndino'on Malama Amina Lawan woodi dowji tati dow kiita'en hawtoreeɓe yeeso kiitaaji maako. Embassy bee ɗo ɗon tabbitin yimɓe fuu hakkilo Malama Lawal ha nanki haadi ha nder Sariya lesdi Naajeeriya ɗon haaki. Ngam maajum, waɗaaji jaɓɓaade ɓe ɗon tokka ngam tabbitinki laamu do lawol".
Nder aada yimɓe.
Bana no ɗum annditi nder Wuroowo Firo e Jaabawol haa fuɗɗam binndi "419" ɗi Will Ferguson waɗi, Amina, debbo debbo mo ɗon ɓeyda e ɓernde mo o ɗon ɗon mbaadi diga lesdi Sharia nder lesdi lesdi Nigeria fuunaaŋge, ɗon haandi dow Amine Lawal.
Alison M. Jaggar, mo anndal filsuf Amerik, winndi wonde nder hitaande 2005 dow haala ngal, "Saving Amina".

Kacha:
Katcha latake hukuma pamara nder Diiwal Niger lysdi Naajeeriya dum headquarter nder wuro Kacha. Woru Badeggi biddi on.

Ahmed Tijjani Mu'azu:
Ahmed Tijjani Mu'azu.
Ɗuun danyiimo nder lewru september dungu 1957 nder gelle Gombe, diiwal Gombe. O meɗi wadgo ardotooɗo hukuumare wadgo shubtal ngal lesdii Naajeeriya (INEC).
Njangde Maako.
O njangi e njangirde gelle Gombe, e diiwal Kaduna be diiwal Borno hankowdee 1964 yaarii 1975. E dungu 1976 o saalii njangirde sooja'en nga NDA(Nigerian Defence Academy). E dungu 2005 o hawti degree maako ɗiɗarjum e jaami'awa lesdii Naajeeriya nga Ibaadan (University Of Ibadan) Ɓawo ɗon ɗuun shubti moo o warti hanko woni mauɗo ardotooɗo hukuumaje goɗɗe nder lesdii Naajeeriya ɗe sooja'en. O lattake membaajo mauɗo e njangirde sooja'en, o jogake joodorde mauɗe ɗe ndongidirkii harka sooja'en. Ɗuub lattini mo hanko woni mauɗo comishinajo e Hukuumare ndongidirkii shubtal ardoogal siyaasa lesdii Naajeeriya e dungu 2016. E dungu 2020 boh ɓe lattini mo hanko woni jagordo hukuumare nden o warti hanko woni ronoowo Mahmud Yakubu. 
Hiimoɓe

Bosso:
Bosso latake hukuma pamara nder Diiwal Niger lysdi Naajeeriya dum headquarter nder maikunkele .

George Akume:
George Akume be ndayimo 27 Bowte 1952 be leddi Naajeeriya on bo bi siyasa, en on mo jotta kanko on Secretary to the Government of the Federation ji Ardido leddi Bola Tinubu supti, wo wodi minister of Special Duties and inter - governmental affairs ha gwamnati Muhammadu Buhari Daga 2019-2023, o wadi senator je benue her wakkere waila - hirnada Daga 2007-2019 bo o jodi korowal minority leader je senate Daga 2011 - 2015 bo o waddi gwamna wuro Diiwal Benue Daga May 1999 - May 2007.

Willeke Alberti:
Willeke Alberti (dugumi 3 feebari 1945) (ndun naamnde goonga: Willy Albertina Verbrugge) ko inaɗo heewnooɗo e gollal holandi, ɓiɗɗo mawɗo jaaynde e mawɓe weltaare Willy Alberdi (1926 - 1985) e Hendrika Geertruida Kuiper (1921 - 2011).
Biogaraafiwol.
Willeke Alberti fuɗɗii golle mum e duuɓi sappo e go'o nder muusikal Duel om Barbara e o waɗi faade mum arande nder 1958 e baaba mum. Nder duuɓi 1960, o wondi mawɗo mawɓe mawɗe e Holandi e wonde ko ɓuri teeŋti e "De winter was lang" ("Jamdu waɗi ko heewi"), si tawii hay hay huunde wootere holandiinde hay wakkati oon. Wileke e baaba mum jogii hollitiiɗi teleediyooji hakkunde 1965 e 1969. Ko o waɗi nder yimbe diga hitaande 1970 haa fuɗɗam, o ɗon ɓeyda, ammaa Alberti ɗon wurtina yimɓe e albumji nder wakkati feere e o waɗa kuuɗe manɗe nder teleeji e filimji.
Daga 1964 haa 1974 o waree e mawɗo muusik Joop Oonk e ɓe mari ɓiɗɗo debbo. O ware John de Mol nder 1976, ɓe mari ɓiɗɗo, Johnny de mol. Ɓe taƴii e hitaande 1980, Alberti feccitii e debbo mo o jokki e nder leydi Søren Lerby. Ɓiɗɗo goɗɗo jibini nder teegal ngal. Søren Lerby e Willeke Alberti taƴii nder hitaande 1996.
E hitaande 1994 o daranii Holandi e nder Eurovision Song Contest e nde "Waar is de zon?" ("To naange woni?"), ko waɗi poondi nayi daga nder ardiiɓe ardi, fuu diga Austria, ko ɗon jeyaa 23e.
Nder duuɓi Alberti waɗi nder Netherlands bana go'o gay, ngam hawtaaki nder nder repertori'en yimbe maako, durugo maako e kuuɗe maako ngam wallugo daliila gay ɗuuɗɗe.

Ingeborg (woowo):
Ingeborg (dayngol Ingegorg Thérèse Marguerite Sergeant, 15 Oktooba 1966, Menen) ko mawɗo mawɓe Belji e jaaynde tele, anndiraaɗo ɓurɗe faayiida e ɓaawo Beljik ngam naatgol mum nder Eurovision Song Contest 1989.
Fuɗɗam golle.
Ingeborg janngini e Studio Herman Teirlinck e Antwerp, janngi jaŋde ngam mawɓe mawɗo e mawɗe. Gooto nder janngooɓe maako ɗon woni mawɗo werlaajo Holland Stef Bos, mo o waɗi e maako no o mari no'o. E nder goɗɗe kuuwɓe, ɓe waɗi bandiraaje biyeteeɗe Zwiep en Brons ɓe keɓii jaɓde jury nder Leids Cabaret Festival 1988 nder wuro Leiden nder Netherlands.
Firo gimol Eurovision.
Nder 1989, yimbe Ingeborg "Door de wind" ("Through the Wind") laato nder yimbi Beljiyam nder nder jaaynde Eurovision 34th Song Contest, je waɗi nder 6 May nder Lausanne, Switzerland. Nder hitaande ɗiɗaɓo nder nder ɗon, yimbe Beljiyam naa' ɗon mari yiɗugo nder yimɓe je ɗon je'a, ngam maajum o waɗi jemma nder nokkuuje 19 nder ɗiɗo.
Ɓaawo golle.
Nder hitaande 1990 Ingeborg fuɗɗi gollude bana daraniɗo tele tele VTM. O holliti holli bana Blind Date, All You Need is Love e Bluff!, nden o annditi bana yeeso program ɓiyum "Schuif Af"! nde o walli diga 1990 haa 2006.
Gila 1999 Ingeborg ɗon huuwa bana jannginoowo yoga e maarooji. Nder hitaande 2007 o fuɗɗi huuwugo bana daraniɗo e hawrugo ngam haalde dijital Vitaliteit .
Nolde hoore.
Ingeborg ɗon te'a marɗo maako, Roland Keyaert. Ɓe mari ɓiɗɗo go'o, jibinaaɗo nder 1994, ɓe njooɗi Bruges.

Elena Gheorghe:
 
Elena Gheorghe (dayngol 30 lewru Yuuli 1985; ko {e le.na ˈɡe̯orɡé}) woni inaɗo yimbeere leydi Romaniya. Nder fuɗɗam hitaande 2000, o hawti e bandol pop Mandinga, nder leydi Romuaniya, o waɗi albumji ɗiɗi. E hitaande 2006, o dilli e bandel o waɗi gollal mum. O waɗi albumuji tati e album go'o. O waɗi top 10 nder top 100 nder leydi Rumunya e "Vocea Ta".
Fuɗɗam nguurndam e fuɗɗamu golle.
Gheorghe jibini nder Bucharest to saare aromaniaaniyankeejo, Gheorge Gheordhe. Wonaaɓe maako ɗuuɗɓe ɓe laamiiɓe Ortodoks. O woodi debbo, Ana, mo wonde jaralinoowo e ɓiy, Costin, ko jokkondirɗo fuɗnugo. Maama maako, Mărioara Gheorghe woni mawɗo yimɓe. Gheorghe fuɗɗiti nder nder yimɓe nder muusikol yimɓe nde o woodi duuɓi tati bee yimbeere Sus în Deal în Poieniţă. To "duuɓi" 11 o jokki suudu ɓikkoy National Palace to o jaŋgi jannguki. Nder hitaande 2000 o heɓi koode jaŋde "Little Bear" (e Baia Mare) e One Moment In Time by Whitney Houston. E hitaande 2001 o jokki nder "Mamaia Festival". foondo ɓeydiinde]
Gheorghe ɗon mari tagdi Romaniya e Aromaniya.
Kuugal.
2002 ⁇ 2005: Kuugal nder Mandinga.
Gheorghe fuɗɗi yimbeeda bee Mandinga, bandol ɓurɗo foonda nder ɗemngal Latino fuɗɗam 2003. Nder lewru Juun hitaande nden, "Mandinga" waɗi album maɓɓe arande ⁇ ."...De Corazón"... Mandinga waɗi darnde 4 nder nder Eurovision National Romanian nder lewru mars 2005 bee yimbe am Sun, ɗum hokki disc gold hitaande go'o ɓaawo. Nder lewru Janaare 2006, o udditii janngirde maako nden innde "Passitos" nden lewuru ɓaawo ɗon o timmi gollaaku maako e Mandinga, o fuɗɗi gollal maako bee wallude janngiɗo muusikal Laurenţiu Duţă. fotaade ]
2006 - 2008: Fuɗɗam golle solo.
Gila 1999 Ingeborg ɗon huuwa bana jannginoowo yoga e maarooji. Nder hitaande 2007 o fuɗɗi huuwugo bana daraniɗo e jaayndiyanke for digital chHa nder lewru Juun 2006, Gheorghe waɗi album maako arande, bi'eteeɗo Your Voice. Ha lewru Maayu 2007 Gheorge heɓi jaajorgal Radio România Actualitaţi ngam huutore ɓurɗe huwtoreede nder hitaande 2006 nden o jeyaa ngam darana ɓurnde yimbe 2006 bee yimbo Your voice. E lewru Aguusta 2007 to Romanian Top Hit Music Awards, Gheorghe heɓi koode ɓurɗe heɓaade nder hitaande 2007 e nder yimbeere Your Brown Eyes. Ɗe yimbooje mum goɗɗe ina werla e ɗemngal Aromanian hono Ma ţi s-adar, Lilicea Vreariei, e woɓɓe.
E hitaande 2007, o wurtini album maako ɗiɗaɓo solo "Te Ador", e ɓernde nde o waɗi boo. fotaade ]
2009: Eurovision gimol Contest.
Nder hitaande 2008, mawɗo limooji Laurenţiu Duţă hokki Gheorghe yimbe ngam jaɓugo nder nder kiita nder leydi Rumaniya ngam Eurovision Song Contest. Ha 31 Diisemba 2008 ɗum annditi wonde Gheorgee gooto e 24 semifinaal. O hawri nder semifaal nden o yahri to National Final haa 31 Janaayo 2009. Nder ton o wari ɗiɗaɓo caggal televoting amma jurya walli mo ngam o heɓta jaɓɓaade ngam wakkilugo Romaniya nder Eurovision Song Contest 2009 bee yimbe "The Balkan Girls". O fuɗɗi yahugo nder nder Europe diga feebari haa may. fotaade]
Gimol ɓeen waɗi ko e nder sahaa ɗiɗaɓu nder seminaal arande e 12 lewru Mee e Moscow, to ɓe njaɓi nokkuuje joweego e 67 poondi. O yahdi to Grand Final nder 16 May. Nder ɗon o waɗi yimbe 22 nder jemma nden Gheorghe hokki hollude dow laral leɗɗe bi'eteeɗo "Iele" nder Romania. O wari 19th nder jemma nden o heɓii poondi 40, hawti e poonzi 12 diga Moldova, jeeɗiɗi diga Spain, e jowi diga Turkey e Macedonia, ekn.
2010 - 2012: anndal Europe e "Disco Romancing".
Caggal Eurovision o ɓeydi anndude nder Orop fuu o wurtini "Disco Romancing" ko o waɗi hit nder Rumunya, e nder top 10 nder Hungary e heɓuki fota nder Czech Republic, Netherlands, Poland e Slovakia. "Midnight Sun" woni ko ɓaawo "Hallo" nder top 10 nder Top 40 nder Netherlands e Top 100 nder Romania. E hitaande 2011 o golli e Dony o waɗi "Hot Girls" ko o fuɗɗii waɗde nder nder Orop. Nder hitaande nden o waɗi jaaynde maako arande nder Orop, o yaha nder Jarmal, Espaañ e Girka. "Disco Romancing" georghe's album waɗi nder hitaande 2012, nder Spain e Japan. Album ngal waɗi 3 ɓeydi yimbe "Your Captain Tonight", "Amar Tu Vida" e "Hypnotic".
2013 - present.
Nder hitaande 2016, Disney Enterprises e Walt Disney Romania suɓi artist to be part of an animated TV Series produced by Disney, e o ɗon seeda haala mawɗo to Elena of Avalor.
Nder 2019, ngam mawnugo Aromanian National Day (ɗun mawnina ko 23 May), Gheorghe waɗi kuugal aromaniya.
Nder lewru mars 2022, o wurtini yimbe keso biyeteeɗo "Brațele".

Festus Egwarewa keyamo:
Festus Keyamo (danyama 21 january 1970) SAN FCIArb latama lawyajo Naajeeriya ei biido biladama. wakkati Dubijee duubi 2018 o hebama mangu nokkore matotiral je dubije 2019 subol biido maudo Muhammadu Buhari.

Muhammed Maigari Dingyadi:
Mohammed Maigari Dingyadi (danyama 1953).o latama Minister je Police ha lsydi Naajeeriya..hokkama mangu nder dubije August 19 2019 diga Muhammadu Buhari.Dingyadi danyama e nokkore Dingyadi, Sokwotobe.O timmini jangirde har Ahmadu Bello University..

Festus Egwarewa Keyamo:
Festus Egwarewa Keyamo
Festus Egwarewa Keyamo (danyama 21 january 1970) SAN FCIArb latama lawyaajjo Naajeeriya ei biido biladama.wakkati Dubijee April (2018) o hebama mangu nokkore matotiral je dubije (2019) subol biido ministajjo Muhammadu Buhari.

Aliyu Magatakarda Wammako:
Aliyu Magatakarda Wammako
Aliyu Magatakarda Wammako danyama lewru 1.1953)o subama maudo Diiwal Sokkwatobe.Naajeeriya nder dubije April 2007.o do ardina Peoples Democratic Party (PDP).

Grace Alele-Williams:
Grace Alele-Williams OON, FMAN, FNAE (16 Bowte 1932 - 25 Duujal 2022) o wonnoo jannginoowo Naajeeriya mo jannginooɓe limngal hiisa, o waɗi taariika nde o woni debbo lesdi Naajeeriya arande heɓugo jaango dowla, e debbo lesdi Naajeeri arandeejo lesdi Naajeeriya arandeejo nder Janngirde Benin.
Ɓiɗɗo e janngirde.
Grace Awani Alele jibini to baaba'en Itsekiri e Warri, Western Region (ko jooni Delta State), Nigeria e 16 Desemba 1932. O yahi Jaŋde laamu, Warri, Queen's College, Lagos e University College of Ibadan (ko jooni woni University of Ibadan). O heɓii digirii maggal nder limte nder nder nder jannde Queen's School, Ede nder Osun State nder hitaande 1957 e digirii PhD nder limte limte nder limte e nder University of Chicago (U.S.) nder hitaande 1963, ngam maajum o laatii debbo lesdi Nayjeriya arano e heɓde doktoor. Grace Alele waree nder hitaande nden, nden o annditi bee innde Grace Alele-Williams. O wartii Nigeria ngam duuɓi ɗiɗi nder golle postdoctoral to University of Ibadan, ko o artii to University of Lagos e 1965.
Kuugal.
Alele-Williams fuɗɗii jannginki jannginki e Queen's School, Ede, Diiwal Osun, to o jeyaa e jannginki limte diga 1954 haa 1957. O dilli to University of Vermont ngam o warde jannginoowo jaagorgal e ɓaawo ɗon o wardi jannginooɗo jannginooɓe. Daga 1963 haa 1965, Alele-Williams laati mo wiɗtoowo wiɗtooɓe dow janngooji, jaango (e jaango) nder janngooje, jaango Ibadan, diga to o laatii janngoowo janngooɓe dow jannge to jaango Lagos e hitaande 1976.
O mari ɓernde feere nder janngirde rewɓe. Nde o waɗi duuɓi sappo o ɗon jaango jaango jaangirde, o waɗi programji jaangirde ɗi walaa jaangirde ngam haani rewɓe mawɓe je ɗon huwdi bana jannginooɓe jaangirde fuɗnde heɓugo jaangirde.
Alele-Williams ɗon holla hulugo ngam heɓugo jannginooɓe afrikɓe rewɓe to anndal e anndal.
Ɓernde maako nder janngirde limtal fuɗɗii ɓamtude e jooɗorde maako nder US, ko ɗon haɓa bee ɓurna Sputnik. Hono o huwtori e nder program African Mathematics to Newton, Massachusetts, e jaango MIT professor Ted Martins, o hawti e kuugal janngooji dow ɗemngal dowla nder nder nder nder gure Afrik feere feere diga 1963 haa 1975. Ɗuum ko haalde binndi e ko haalde e ɗemɗe ko haalde ko haalde no'o haalde e dow dow ɗemɗe limɗe e golle e limɓe limɗe e jannginooɓe. O janngini ha Jaangoore Lagos diga 1965 haa 1985, o waɗi duuɓi sappo o jaango jaango jaangirde, je ɗon haɓɓiiji jaangooji ɗi ɗi ɗi walaa jaango, be ɗuuɗal jaangooji je ɗon jaango rewɓe mawɓe ɓe ɗon kuuwa bana jannginooɓe jaango. Ngam o huuwani nder komiteeji e boards feere-feere, Alele-Williams waɗi daranaaki naftaaki nder ɓamtaare jaango nder lesdi Naajeeriya. O laati hooreejo jaɓde-jaɓde jannde, jaɓde Bendel State 1973-1979. Daga 1979 haa 1985, o waɗi hooreejo jaaynde Diiwal Ikko komiteeji jaɓde-jaɓde jannde e Diiwal Ikko exam boards.
Alele-Williams laatii laamɗo mo'o dow dow dow dow nder jaŋde Benin nder hitaande 1985, o laati laamɗo moolde debbo arande nder jaŋnde Nigeria, o ɗon nuɗɗina laamɗo mo, ko timmi nder hitaande 1992, "o laati "laamuji ngam holla ko debbo mari baawɗe jaɓugo".
Alele-Williams wondi semmbe ngam waylude nder wakkati ɓernde nder jaŋde ɓurɗe janngude nder lesdi Naajeeriya nder duuɓi 1980. Nden, kuugal kulte sirde, jamma e jammaji fuɗɗi ha nder jaŋdeji lesdi Naajeeriya, ɓurna e jaŋde Benin. Ko golle ɗe worɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɓe footi, o waawi waɗugo ko haani.
Caggal nde o waɗi hooreejo jaŋde Benin, o wari nder ardiiɓe jaŋde Chevron-Texaco Nigeria. O ɗon jeya nder jaɓugo darnde HIP asset management company limited, marnde darnde darnde nder Lagos, Nigeria.
Alele-Williams wondi goomu jaɓoore, UNESCO Institute of Education. O ɗon jeyaa e jaɓɓaago UNESCO e Institute of International Education Planning. Nder duuɓi sappo (1963-73), o wondi goomu nder program Afrik Mathematics, ɗo nder Newton, Massachusetts, Amerik. O laati hooreejo jaaynde duuniyaaru ngam janngirde ɓikkoy ɓikkoy fuɗnaaku e ɓaawo ɗon hooreejo jaayɗe lesdi Naajeeriya, e hooreejo arandeejo jaayndi Afrik dow Fedde Fede Fuuta dow Fedde Haal Fuuta e Fedde Fuuɗnaaku. 
O waɗi duuɓi sappo (1993-2004) bana hooreejo lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi Afrika nder Duniyaa Tatto ngam rewɓe nder anndal.
Fedde e maayde.
Alele-Williams waree Babatunde Abraham Williams (1932-2010) nder lewru Desemba 1963, ɓaawo o wurtini lesdi Naajeeriya diga Aameerik.Williams wonnoo mo anndal politik, e wakkati fuɗugo maɓɓe, o jeyaaɗo e jannginoowo mawɗo e jaŋde Ife, Osun State.
Alele-Williams woodi ɓiɓɓe njowo, e, diga 2017, ɓikkoy sappo. O maayi e 25 mars 2022 e duuɓi 89. Nyalnde fuɗnde, University of Benin waɗi bandira suudu ndu haa e nder ɓandu ngam ɓe ɗon wuuro mayde maako.
Jaɓɓorgo Kewuuji.
Alele-Williams heɓii keewɗe keewɗe e teddungal. O heɓii Ordo Niger nder hitaande 1987, o suɓii wonde Fellows of the Mathematical Association of Nigeria e Fellows to Nigerian Academy of Education.
E 28 feebari 2014, o wonnoo gooto e yimɓe 100 heɓi Centenary Award, "temmuki feere-feere ngam darnde tagdi ɗi yimɓe Nigeria waɗi ngam ɓamtaare ummatoore e aada, jawdi e siyasa leydi ndii nder duuɓi 100 ɓaawo".
O hawti e dow dow dow dow karuuji ɗi rewɓe mawɓe anndal limngal ngal Association of Women in Mathematics wurtini.

Ameyo Adadevoh:
 Ameyo Stella Adadevoh (27 Yarkooma 1956 - 19 Juko 2014) ko doktoor lesdi Naajeeriya.
O ɗon haani ngam o halki haɓɓuki nyau nyau Ebola nder duungal Afrika hirnaange nder Naajeeriya ngam haɓuki haɓaaki nyauɗo, Patrick Sawyer, nder quarantine, bana no laamu Liberia hawtori. Nde mawɓe Liberia ɓe yiɗi nyauɗo mo yahugo ngam o yahda to jamma, o haɓɓi e "ji ngam ɓeydaare ummaatoore", o wi'ataa o yahi. O anndiraa ngam haɗugo nyauɗo Naajeeriya fuɗɗugo yahugo haa suudu ndun wakkati nyau ndu, ngam maajum o huwti darnde mawɗo nder halki haajirol nyau nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ha 4 Juko 2014, ɗum haɓɓiti wonde o heɓii nyau Ebola e o ɗon yaajina. Adadevoh maayi nder jayngol 19 Juko 2014. 
O ɓeydi gorko maako Afolabi e ɓiɗɗo maako Bankole hawti e yimɓe feere.
Ɓeynguure e saare.
Ameyo Adadevoh jibinaa e Lagos, Nigeria nder lewru Oktooba 1956. O waɗi ɓurna fu nder nguurndam maako nder Lagos. Baaba maako e baaba maako, Babatunde Kwaku Adadevoh e Herbert Samuel Macaulay, ɗiɗo fuu ɓeen ɓe anndal annd anndirngal. Herbert Macaulay wondi go'oto nder ardiiɓe Naajeeriya hannde. Maama maako wari diga saare Adadevoh nder leydi Volta nder lesdi Gana, to maako o hawti masin, ammaa o jooɗii nder Lagos. Baaba maako Babatunde Kwaku Adadevoh o doktoor e mawɗo jaŋde Lagos. O ɗon boo o jeyaa e hooreejo lesdi lesdi Naajeeriya arande Nnamdi Azikiwe, bana boo jeya e jeye Sara Forbes Bonetta e jeeya bee Ajayi Crowther. Adadevoh huuwani haa suudu ndun arandeejo, to ɗo hayre baaba mum.
Jaŋde.
Adadevoh yahi nder suudu jaŋde nder Mainland Preparatory Primary School nder Yaba, Lagos (1961-1962). O waɗi duuɓi ɗiɗi nder Boston, Massachusetts, ngam o dilli bee saare maako to Lagos. O yahi jaŋde fuɗɗorɗe e Corona School, Yaba e Lagos, Nigeria (1964-1968), nden o yahi Queen's School e Ibadan (1969-1974) Nigeria ngam jaangde jangde mum.
Jaŋde e golle jawdi.
Adadevoh jaɓi jaangirde medicine University of Lagos e jaangirde Medicine / Bachelor of Surgery. O waɗi duuɓi go'o nder suudu jaangirde Lagos nder hitaande 1981. O waɗi jooɗorde maako nder Lagos University Teaching Hospital e o heɓii ko'e maako nder West African College of Physicians and Surgeons nder 1983. Nden o yahi London ngam timmini mo nder endocrinology haa Lopital Hammersmith. O waɗi duuɓi 21 haa First Consultants Medical Center nder Lagos, Nigeria. Nder ɗon, o waɗi ko o ardiiɗo doktoor e endocrinologist (Endokrinoloog).
Kuugal bee nyau Ebola.
Adadevoh heɓii nyau Ebola fuɗɗam nder lesdi Naijeriya e nder suudu ndun ardiiɗo nder Lagos, Naajeriya nder lewru Yuli 2014. Adadvoch waɗi Sawyer nder haaju bana no o wi'i o ɗon mari nyau nyau nduu. Sawyer yiɗi yahugo kawtal jaayɗe nder Calabar, Naajeeriya.
Adadevoh haani taƴuki nyauɓe Liberia'en Patrick Sawyer bana nyau Ebola fuɗnaare nder lesdi Nigeria nder suudu ndun arande nder Lagos, Nigeria, nder lewru Yuli 2014. Adadevoh waɗi Sawyer nder suudu ndun, ko o wi'i o ɗon nyaama nyau nyau nduu. Sawyer yiɗi yahugo ha jaaynde nder Calabar, Nigeria. Adadevoh woni ardiiɗo golluɗo saawir'en. Adadevoh boo o waɗi mo nder suudu ndun, haaje o heɓii ko ardiiɗo lesdi Liberia yiɗi mo. O footi waɗugo nokkuure mo ɓe njokki, haaje ɗon woodi ɓanduji, ngam o ɓaŋgi barikade tagdi yeeso dammugal Sawyer. Kuugal maako waɗi lesdi Nigeria warti nyau man. Nder wakkatiji ɗi'e, dokto'en Nigeria ɗon haani hujja, ko waawata waɗi nyau nyau masin. O hokki yimɓe kuugal habaru ha dow nyau, o soodi kuujeji njogorɗe e o hawti bee mangu ha nder ardiiɓe. Ngam haala maako, laamu Nigeria anndini nyau nyau man ngam nyau ummaatoore lesdi e jaangowo ngam ngam nyawdi ngam Ebola. WHO anndini Nigeria be Ebola ha 20 Oktoobar 2014.
Ameyo Adadevoh waree Afolabi Emmanuel Cardoso e 26 abriil 1986. Ɓe mari ɓiɗɗo gooto, Bankole Cardoso.
Maayi e jawdi.
Adadevoh maayi diga nyau Ebola nder quarantine ha 19 August 2014 nder Lagos, Nigeria. Ɓandu maako ɗon ɗon laato nder leydi ndii. Famee mum heɓii limce maako e waɗi sarru buri hooreejo nder nder ngam ngam hakkiilo haɓɓugo nder mayre boo nder 12 Septemba 2014, nder Lagos. Dr. Ameyo Adadevoh Health Trust (DRASA), goongɗinki hakkillo hakillo, haɗi ha nder teddungal maako. Fim "93" Days ɗon haani Adadevoh e ɗon wi'a dow saawir be Adarevohi be yimɓe feere nder suudu ndun. Film ngal waɗi Steve Gukas. Ha 27 Oktoobar 2018, o heɓii Google Doodle ɓaawo maayde maako ha anniyaare maako 62.
Nder lewru feebariiru 2020, laawol feere haani Adadevoh nder Abuja, laamorgo lesdi Naijeriya. "Njiila Ameyo Adadevo" ɗon hawta bee laawol Ahmadu Bello, go'o nder nder laawol Abuja ɓurɗum mawnugo. Ɗo woni go'o nder kuugal arandeeji ɗi laamu Nigeria waɗi ngam teddina darana maako ma'ana nder lesdi nder sappoji je'e nder nguurndam maako.
Jaŋde jaŋgol jaangirde Babcock e nder suudu jaangoowo jaangal ngal e innde maako.
Jaŋde jaŋgowo jaangirde jaangoowo jaangal ngal Babcock University boo ina inniraa e makko.

Aboh-mbaise:
Aboh-mbaise Latake hukuma pamarun Diiwal imo lysidi Naajeeriya

Hauwa Ibraahiima:
Hauwa Ibrahim (duubi daygo 20 siilo 1968) ko laamɗo lesdi Naajeeriya mo hakkilani yimɓe, o heɓii sariya Sakharov nder Jaŋde Orop.
Jooɗa.
Ibrahim jibinaa nder Gombe nder hitaande 1968. O ɗon jaɓɓa ngam o laamiiɗo, o ɗon haalanki o debbo Musulmana arande nder lesdi Naajeeriya o heɓan nder nder nder nderji.
Ibrahim anndini ngam kuugal pro bono ngam haɓugo yimɓe je ɗon jeyaa e jaayɗe Sharia Islam je ɗon hawtore nder lesdi lesdi Nigeria. O ɗon haɓɓa Amina Lawal, Safiya Hussaini e Hafsatu Abubákar. Nder hitaande 2005 o heɓii sariya Sakharov ngam kuugal ngal.
Hauwa ɗon haani haakoowo nder Saint Louis University School of Law e Stonehill College, haakoowo duniyaaru haa Yale University, haakowo Radcliffe, e haakoowo haa man haakoowo hakkiilo yimɓe e haakowo haakoowo haakoowo Islaam haa Harvard University. Hauwa ɗon ɗon ɗon ɗon wa'ajugo e ɗon wa'a bolle nder Harvard University. O wondi boo gooto e 25 ardiiɓe nder jaaynde jaaynde e demokaraasi je wurtini ha nder jaayndi ndi Reporters Without Borders haɓɓiri.
Nde o wonnoo Radcliffe fellow, Ibrahim waɗi laawol haɓɓuki doosgal ngam jaɓɓude nder kaɓirɗe teoretikol Shariah law e ɗaɓɓita no ɓe mbaltini huutore doosgal ngal, ko waɗi, hawti e hakkeeji yimɓe rewɓe nder Afrik hirnaange. Kuɗol maako waɗi e deftere Practicing Shariah Law: Seven Strategies for Achieving Justice in Shariah Courts, wonande nder lewru Janaayro 2013."

Ahiazu-mbaise:

Hafsat Idris:
Hafsat Ahmad Idris (dayngo 14 Morse 1987) ko puroodusajo filmji leydi Naajeeriya mo o waɗi fijirde film e nder Kannywood. O hawti e film maako arande biyeteeɗo "Barawniya" (2016). O heɓii jaaynde debbo 2019.
Fedde fuɗɗorɗe e golle.
Hafsat woni ko'e yimɓe Diiwal Kano, nder lesdi Naajeeriya. O jibinaa e mawnina nder Shagamu, Diiwal Ogun. O waɗi ko o arani e Kannywood nder film biyeteeɗo "Barauniya", o waɗi e Ali Nuhu, e Jamila Nagudu.
Nder hitaande 2018, Hafsat waɗi jaaynde jaaynde film anndiraa Ramlat Investment. O waɗi filimiji ɗuuɗɗi nder hitaande 2019, hawti e Kawaye nder ɗi o waɗi filimiiɓe bana Ali Nuhu, Sani Musa Danja e hoore maako. O holli haala o walaa e ɓiɗɗo Janaarjo Sani Abacha.
Filmography.
Hafsat ina waɗi nder filmooji ɗuuɗɗi, hawti e ɗi ɗowanɗi: ɓeydaade]

Mbaitoli:
Mbaitoli Latake hukuma pamarun Diiwal imo lysidi Naajeeriya

Ngor:

Njaba:
Njaba Latake hukuma pamarun Diiwal imo lysidi Naajeeriya

Hauwa Maina:
Hauwa Maina wonnooɗo nder Kannywood e jannginoowo mo o waɗi nder film Queen Amina of Zazzau. O maayi ngam nyau je ɓe anndinaama nder suudu ndun Kano ha 2 Duujal 2018.
Kuugal.
O laati mawɗo jaajinoowo hausa ha nokkuure nden. O waɗi yi'annde maako fu nder "Tuba", ɓaawo maajum o waɗi yi'nde dow "bayajida", film taariika huutoreeɗum nder ekkitingo jannginoowo nder suudu janngirde hannde. O mari jaaynde maako mo anndiraa Ma'inta Enterprises Limited, je ɗon waɗi fimji hawti e Gwaska, Sarauniya Amina e woɓɓe.

Jamila Nagudu:
Jamila Umar Nagudu (dayngo; 10 juko 1985) ko Fijo yenmitki Naajeeriya gollaama e Kannywood.
Ɓiɗɗo e janngirde.
Nagudu jibini haa 10 Aguusta 1985 ha Magana Gumau nder hukuma pamarun Toro, Diiwal Bawci, Naajeeriya. O yahi jaŋde fuɗɗam e jaŋde ɗiɗaɓam nder diiwal Bawci. 
Kuugal.
Jamila Umar, anndiraaɗo no Jamila Umar Nagudu, waɗi filmde maako nder nder nder nder Kannywood nder hitaande 2002, arande no tawonnde e ɓaawo no tawonde. O waɗii nder filimji romantik e fimji komedi. Jaayndiyankeejo Aminu Sayra woni arandeejo mo waɗani mo nder fijirde "Jamila da Jamilu" nder fijirnde O wondi mo haɓɓaaɗo nder Bollywood nder Abeokuta.
Koroowo.
Nagudu ɗon mari jaɓɓorgo bee kuuje bana Ajinomoto e Globacom.

Omala:
Omala latake hukuma pamara nder Diiwal Kogi lysdi Naajeeriya.

Yagba East:
Yagba East latake hukuma pamara nder Diiwal Kogi lysdi Naajeeriya.

Yagba West:
Yagba West ko nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) nder Diiwal Kogi, Naajeeriya, haa hirnaange Diiwal Kwara. Wurooji ma'a ɗon nder gariiri Odo Ere. Ɗ
Ɗum woodi nokkuure 1,276 km2 e yimɓe 149,023 ha nder limti yimɓe 2006. Ha 2016, yimɓe ɓe ɓeydi haa 188,900.
Egbe woni gariiri feere mawɗo nder laamu leydi ndii je je je je haandi e kuuɗe missionerji kiristaanaaɓe nder fuɗɗam 1900s.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 262.

Henry Dele Alake:
Henry Dele Alake eriminmo lewru 6 October mongou 1956 eii lysdi jaridajju Naajeeriya shere commissioner Diiwal Lagos lokacii gwamajjo Asiwaju Bola Tinubu.

Muhammed Gudaji Kazaure:
Muhammed Kazaure Gudaji eiii Ardiiɗo majalisajju lysdi Naajeeriya nder Kazaure Roni Gwiwa Yankwashi Diiwal Jigawa.

Ibrahim Hassan Hadejia:
Ibrahim Hassan Hadeija eriminmo 1965 eii lawyajjo toe siyasa,en lysdi Naajeeriya ndum shere gwamajjo toe DCSP jornii duubi 2023 .

Cheif Abdulkareem Adebisi Bamidele Akande:
Cheif Abdulkareem Adebisi Bamidele Akande eriminmo 16 january 1939 eii lysde siyasa en Naajeeriya toe Gwamnajjo Diiwal Osun gada 1999 toe 2003.

Badiyya Hassan Mashi:
Badiya Hassan Mashi ko jannginoowo, sakitirɗo jootiiɗo e komisaaru foroy ha nder hawtaade rewɓe e ɓamtaare ummatoore nder Diiwal Katsina, Naajeeriya.
Ɓiɗɗo e janngirde.
Badiyya Hassan jibinaa e mawnina nder nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) Mashi nder Katsina. O yahi Gidado Elementary School nder berniiwol Katsina, Government Girls Secondary School (GGSS) nder Malumfashi e Bayero University Kano, to o jaɓi jaango bee BSc microbiology e MSc e PhD nder microbiology haandi.
Kuugal.
O laati mo mo mo jaajotooɗo mo ha Hassan Usman Katsina Polytechnic nder jaajorgal science Basic e Applied, diga 1992 haa 2016, e mo jaajinoowo mo jaajorgo ha Umaru Musa Yar'adua University. Bana komisaarjo ha haaluɓe ha haalude e haalude ummatoore, o haaldini haalude dow no haalude huutore huutore. O wi'i "Fuuɓe e maama'en ɗon ma'ana ɓe ɗon waɗa ko haani, ɓurna nder ɗowtanaago wardji maɓɓe ngam ɓe andira bee moye ɓe ɗon hawta e ko ɓe ɗon waɗa nder wakkati maɓɓe. Min ɗon njaha saare bee saare ngam ekkitina deer'en".
O waɗi nairaji miliyonji 196 ngam haɓɓugo ɓikkoy, ɓikkoy e rewɓe nder nokkuuje laamu nguleeki 34 nder lesdi Katsina.

Muhammed Wudil:
Muhammad Wudil eii Siyasa,en lysdi Naajeeriya toe Ardido majalisajju Wudil shere Garko .

Yaro Binus Dauda:
Yaro Binus Dauda eriminmo duubi 1960 eii lysdi Siyasa,en Naajeeriya nder sanatajjo Diiwal Adamawa.

Orji Uzor Kalu:
Orji uzor Kalu eriminmo duubi 1960 eii lysdi Siyasa,en Naajeeriya nder sanatajjo Diiwal Abia.

Abba Patrick Moro:
Abba Patrick Moro eriminmo duubi 1963 eii lysdi Siyasa,en Naajeeriya nder sanatajjo Diiwal Benue.

Caɓɓal Mammbila:
Caɓɓal Mammbila ɗum gootal nder caɓɓe tiimtuɗe lesdi, toowki maggal foti meeta ujineere e teemeɗɗe jowi e noogas e nayi (1524m). Ngal laatike caɓɓal ɓurdungal toowde e nokkuure ɓurdunde ɓuuɓde e leydi Nigeria, kadi ko nokkuure ɓurdunde haande ɓiɓɓe leydi e jananɓe fuu ngilloo. 
Leydi maggal ina moƴƴani ndemri e durngol fuu. Koowoowe, e ɓowɗi e ɓokkaare fantunde e piye dabbaaji fuu tawataake e ƴoole mayre, fahin henndu ɓuuɓndu, welndu ina woodi.
Kooseeje (pelle/baamle) toowɗe ina tawee to dow Caɓɓal Mammbila yeru: hooseere Caɓɓal Waddi kayre ɓuri toowde e kooseeje Najeeriya fuu: toowki mayre ina hewta meeta ujine ɗiɗi e teemeɗɗe nayi e sappo e joweenayi (2419m).
Caɓɓal Mammbila ina tawee nder diiwal Taraba nder yeɓre famarde Sardawna, kanngal woni caɓɓal ɗiɗaɓal e toowde e Afrika-Hiirnaangeeri. Ummaatoore ɓurannde ujine noogas (20.000) ina hoɗi dow mayre, ɓe leƴƴi feere-feere yeru: Mammbila, Fulɓe, Hawsanke, Kaka, Panso, kambu, e leƴƴi goɗɗi ɗi lollaani, nder galluuje feere-feereeje bano Gembu, Ngurooje, Maayo-ndaaga, Maisamaari, Kakara, Mbamga, Warwar, Yerimaaru, Dorofi ekn. Ko leñol Mammbila'en woni leñol ɓurdungol ɗuuɗde e leydi ndin. Ko Fulfulde woni ɗemngal ɓurngal huuwtoreede toon.

Government Secondary School Lianga:
Government primary school Lainga hebama wakkati dubije 1957.hukuma hillago w jangirde on jogi nde.

Ali Ahmed Mullah:
Ali Ahmed Mullah(be danyee mou haa nder nyalawmaare 5 Morse 1945), o laawaandu muazzin ( setiinowo ketaadi) haa juulurde al-Haram ha Mecca, Saudi Arabia Wakkatii badiidum tattabol ko sali.Ali Ahmed Mullah Kanko on lirinde nebiidou muazzin je juulurde al-Haram o tokkinou Lenyol mako geccewol haa nder cimtiraali baawo 1975.

Ben Primary School Gembu:
Ben primary school gembu dum makaranta on je woni ha nder hukuma pamara je Gembu Naajeeriya.Baruwa ko serti ko gashaka. Fuu dum pellel gotel je woni ha nder Diiwal Taraba.. Hebama dubije 1940s.

Danladi Abdullahi Sankara:
Danladi Abdullahi Sankara wonama goddo siyasa Naajeriya je Jigawa ha Diiwal Jigawa . Danladi wonama hedi wakkere All Progressive Congress.

Saidu Ahmed Alkali:
Saidu Ahmad Alkali latama goddo siyasa Naajeriya. O subama senator daga gombe north har Diiwal Gombe Naajeeriya.

Tallinn:
Tallinn - laamorde (kapital) leydi Estoniya. Labe no jogii hannde 453.864 (2023) yimɓe.

Abubakar kyari:
Abubakar Kyari CON lattiinou goddo siyasa Naajeeriya den o lati senator wakkere Borno waila je Diiwal Borno ha 9th National Assembly diga 2015 ha yahi wakkati o jippi nder Sedto 2022.

Charles babbage:
Charles babbage daayaɗow yaldee 26 liiyru Silto hiitadee (1791) London kautal hurre Leydi engiila Charles Babbage fooɗuuɗow taagugo kumfuuta aduniiyaru moosoytii nyade 18 liiyru yarkuma (1871) too smart Lebone kautal hurre leyde ingiila kakkowke fiilosofaajow liingal kautudow andal jaytul kumfuuta own janguwɗo too andal ingeniiyare
beekol.

Ibrahim inyeesi:
ibrahim inyeesi hiitande Alif (1900_1975) sanaagal sufee waalif ibrahim inyaase Beɗɗow abudullahi attijjani alkawawkhi arduujow ɗeena teejaniya aliyde afrik jaagurdo Waleed ales tejjane sufee ɓeddo sanagambeyaa shehu al Islam inyaase ardujuw afrik dayyaɗow hiitande Alif (1900) aliyde yauba hakkude sanagal a kaolack hakkudee leydi gambeyaa allahaji abdullahi nass kee dannyomako a hiitande Alif (1846_1922) hakkude jeytul datal nder deena tajjaniyaa líder ibrahim inyaase own winndeti derejii Kama sabilu sadaam Fi ibkaail maqaam dereewal maaqama ibrahim galmu mi laleeti nɗeen kashiful ibas afaydaatil khashifal abril Abbas ibrahim inyaase musooyte hiitande Alif (1975) asuduw maagani liyde engla kautal hurre Landon

Annabi muhammadu:
Annabejow Muhammadu Liilaadow Allah muhammadu arduujow islamaa muhammadu (c570_8 junee 632ce) mareedu hakkudee dubbe (570ce akuyyaree 8 june (632) muulataake ardujuw down ndeena islama annabi muhammadu ɓeeɗow abdullahi ujiytee adown ndeena yasuen haa too annabi ibrahim musa annabi ida muhammadu arduujow ndeena larabankuen akketuwuo siyasa ajandee duuniyaru tauhidee gotaakuw Allah adown atal yesuan haa too annabi adamu annabi Ibrahim musa isa muɓagge debbow khadija vintage khuwailid

Theodore Ahamefule Orji:
Theodore Ahamefule Orji CON(danyama nder dubije 1950 ha Umuahia diiwali Abia). O latama goddo siyasa Naajeriya. O lami maudo diiwali Abia diga 2007 yahugo 2015.

Adolf Hitler:
Adolf hitler dayyadow 20 

Taarihi Yimmɓe Igbo:
mbe Yimmɓe Igbo (Turankoore): /ˈiːboʊ/ EE-boh, nde kadi/
ˈɪɡboʊ/ IG-boh ; neen haa Kadi mislaaɓe Ibo e arannɗe kadi Iboe,Eboe, Eboans, Heebo; [11 jinnsiiwal un jawleeru lasngol nder Naajeeriya. E ɓe jottori nɗer diiwe
Abia, Anambra , Ebonyi , Enugu , and Imo. Ndi jaajirka Igbo no kadi jottori heɓee nder diiwe Delta e ribas ɗuuɗirka adadu lasngol Igbo un nder kameroun, Gabin,e Ekootoorial Gine,haa haa wuttudu gaari ɓurrdi kamani mbe aslu ɗum mbe Yimmɓe.

Abba Musa Rimi:
Abba Musa Rimi CON( O danñyaama ññalde 28 lewru haaram ɗiɗi 1940) O ginnɗo Siyaasaaji Naajeeriya mo ɗum subti edow jonnɗe korowal Gomnaajo diiwal Kaduna, Naajeeriya nder lebru habbirdu ngu ɗumngu 1979 nde wakkatiire jamhuuriyawal ɗiɗal ngal Naajeeriya, O kattake jogiiɗo tummude laamu e hitaaɗe jippingo Gomnaajo Abdulkadir Balarabe musa nde ñalɗe 23 lewru haaram sakitiiɗu ɗumngu 1981. Ɗun subtiima dow tsaariwal kawtal subtal enntugo Yimmɓe.
Abba Musa Rimi.
6 nde haaram sakitiiɗu,1981 - juldaaɗu 1983
