Federal College of Education, Abeokuta:
Federal College of Education Abeokuta (FCEA), (ko anndiraa ko Federal Advanced Teachers College) ko jaŋde ummaatoore nde marɗo hakke hokkude certificate National in Education (NCE) to jannginooɓe jaŋde. Ɗum haɓɓiti nder hitaande 1976 e Osiele, Diiwal Ogun, worgo hirnaange Naajeeriya. Wuro hooreejo leydi jooni woni Dr. Rafiu Adekola Soyele. Jaŋde ɗon ɗon waɗi kuuje tati: NCE, jaŋde nder jaŋde Ibadan e jaŋde Diiwal Lagos, e PGDE.
Ɓaawoore.
Jaŋde nden woni jaŋde arande nder Diiwal Ogun. Jaango ngoo fuɗɗii huutoraade e hitaande 1976, nder nokkuure nde Abeokuta Grammar School, arande nde ɓe njaara to nokkuure permanent nder hitaande 1978 to Osiele. Nder lewru Julaay 2020, suudu ɗon ɗon maɓɓina ngam sappo ɗiɗi nde go'oto nder maɓɓe maayi ngam nyau COVID-19 nden ɗiɗo feere boo maayi ngam virus.
Jaŋde.
Jaɓɓorgo Fedde Ɓamtaare Fedde Ɓamɓe e Fedde Ɓamtuɓe
Jaɓɓorgo Siisndooji Siisndorgal Siisndorooji Siisndaaji Siisndooji Siisi

Moshood Abiola Polytechnic:
 
Moshood Abiola Polytechnic anndiraa kadi MAPOLY ko jaŋde polyteknik nder Abeokuta, Diiwal Ogun, Naajeeriya.
Ojere campus ɗon ha nder fombina fuunaaŋge Abeokuta, ɗon hawta bee haare haare 960 ha nder lesdi maare haare maayo Ogun.
Ɗum noddiraa e nder Moshood Kashimawo Olawale Abiola, mo laatoore hooreejo lesdi Naajeeriya nder hitaande 1993, ammaa o hawtiima ngam o heɓugo laamu. Caggal maayde Chief MKO Abiola, mo ɓurɗo jaɓɓaade Polytechnic'en nder 1998, Institution'en ɓe mburtini mo Moshood Abiola Polytechnic, Abeokuta.
Polytechnic haɓɓii nder hitaande 1980 bana Ogun State Polytechnic nder wakkati laamu Harris Eghagha. 
Ko wonii miijo Polytechnic fuɗɗii haani diga Brigadier Harris Eghagha, laamu Chief Olabisi Onabanjo waɗi ɗum.
Hannde, polytechnic ina woodi janngooji jowi, kala e hooreejo, e jaayndi 21, kala e dow hooreejo jaayndi. Jaŋdeeji, e jaŋdeeji maɓɓe, ngoni:

Polytechnic, Ibadan:
Polytechnic, Ibadan (ngam anndiraa "Poly Ibadan") ko jaango jaango nder Ibadan nder lesdi Oyo, Naajeeriya. Hunde Poly Ibadan haɓɓii nder 1970, nandi bee polytechnics feere ha Nigeria. Jaangoore nden fuɗɗii haɓɓugo janngirde mawnde feere to jaangirde, ɓurna nder jaangoore anndal. Lindiyaaku jaɓɓugo kuuɗe e anndal anndal haani tabbituki ngam jannginooɓe ɓe mari anndal yeeso ɓe ɗon wurta suudu seniiyaaku nden ɓe ɗon hokkata anndal anndol anndal to ummaatoore jaɓɓugo. Poly Ibadan anndiraa kadi ngam tagdi mum tawayɗi ɗi windi nder ɗemngal Yarobanko'en bana "Ise loogun ise" ko wayi no "Work is the medicine for poverty", tagdi Yarobankeejo kalfinaaɗo nder holla kuuɗe kalfinaaɗe woni laawol yahugo.
Fedde e kuugal maɓɓe.
Fedde Fedde Fuuta
Faculty of Science

Aadun:
Aadun woni ko'e nder laawol nder yimɓe Yarobanko'en nder lesdi Naajeriya. Innde "Aadun" ina maanaa ɓernde nden kadi ina huutoroo nder dewte e nder kuugal darnde.
Fedde nde.
Ɗi ɗiɗawɗum ɗi naftiraama nder waɗugo aadun hawti e fe'uki marsu, chili pepper, leɗɗe palmu e njamu. Ɗe woodi feere ɗiɗi nder ko'e nyaamdu: ko'e ma'aare laaɓɗe e ko'e moƴƴe ɗe ɓeydi e leɗɗe palmi. Yimɓe okun diga Diiwal Kogi ɗon ɓeydana be'e be'e nder kuuje maɓɓe ngam ɓe ɓesda bee leɗɗe banaan ngam ɓe hokkugo ɗum nanki.

Ɗemngal Afade:
 
Afade (Afaɗə) ko ɗemngal Afro-Asiatic ngal wolwi e fuunaange lesdi Naajeeriya e woyla hirnaange lesdi Kamerun.
Fedde nde.
Afade woni goomu nder geec Biu-Mandara nder lenyol ɗemɗe Afro-Asiyaaji. 
Ɗum hawti e ɗemɗe Kameruunaaje Mpade, Maslam, Malgbe, Mser, e Lagwan.
Fonooloji.
Afade ina woodi ko ɗuuɗal konsonanteeji, hawti e ejectives, implosives, e labial-velar stops. Ɗuum ko ko e /i u e ɤ o ɛ ɔ a ɑ/. /a/ ko yeeso, naa ko e nder.

Yimɓe Akassa:
Yimɓe Akassa (Akasa, Akaha) Yimɓe Ijaw ɗon njooɗi bee Maayo Nun e Maayo Atalantika nder Diiwal Bayelsa, lesdi Naajeeriya. Akassa hawti e: Opu-Akassa, Sangana, e Kamatoru.

Ɗemngal Bacama:
 
Bachama (Bachama) ko ɗemngal Afro-Asiatic haalanki nder lesdi Naajeeriya nder Diiwal Aadaamawa, ko ɓuri heewde e nder Numan, Demsa e nokkuure laamorde (hukuma pamarun) Lamurde eYimɓe Bwatiye. Ɗe ɗemɗe ɗe Mulyen, Opalo, e Wa-Duku. Bachama-Yimburu ina wondi ɗemngal ngal hawti e maɓɓe, amma ngal hawti. Bachama huutoroo bana ɗemngal jaaynde. Ɗemngal ngal ina foti anndude e Bata.
Limɗe.
Bachama ina woodi sistem limngal decimal/kinary, bee 5 e 10 bana base:
8 woni 4-4, 6 e 7 ɗon jeyaa dow ɓeydude 5, nden 9 ɗon ma'ana " (10) minus 1".

Ɗemngal Barkul:
 
Barkul (Bo-Rukul) ko ɗemngal Plateau nder wuro Barkul, Bokkos LGA, Diiwal Plateau, Naajeeriya. Ɗi ɗemɗe ɗiɗi, Bo e Rukul, kala e 500-1,000 wolwotooɓe, ɗi feere feere. Fedde Barkul ɗon laaɓɓa, ammaa ɗon ɓadii Fyam e Horom.
"Ethnologue" (22nd ed.) ɗon taƴi nder barkul, Mabo, Mwa, e Richa nder nokkuure laamorde (hukuma pamarun) Bokkos.

Ɗemngal Batu:
Batu ko ɗemngal Tivoid nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗuum ko ko'e mum'en ko'e maɓɓe, kamino. Angwe ɗon haani haani, amma ɗon haani ɗum haani haandi nder Ɗemngal Buru.

Ɗemngal Ɓeele:
 
Ɓeele (ngoo anndiraa kadi e Bele, Àbéélé, Bellawa) ko ɗemngal Afro-Asiatic je ɗon haani heɗugo nder gure goɗɗe nder Diiwal Bawci, Naajeeriya.

Yimɓe Bete:
Yimɓe Bete ɗon ƴiwo nder wuro Bete, Takum, Naajeeriya. Ɓe ɗon mbi'a ɗemngal Bete ɓooyaani. 

Ɗemngal Bile:
Bile (Bille) woni go'oto nder ɗemɗe Bantu goɗɗe nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɓe ɗon wona nder Aadaamawa dow maayo Benuwe yeeso Mbula-Bwazza, ɓe ɗon mbi'a ɗemngal Bantu ngal ɓe ɗonno haandi (A60+40b).

Ɗemngal Boga:
Boga (nganndi boo booka) ko ɗemngal Afro-Asiatic haalanki nder Aadaamawa lesdi Naajeeriya.

Ɗemngal Boghom:
Boghom (ngam anndiraa bo Bogghom, Bohom, Burom, Burum, Burrum; yimɓe Hawsare nodda ɗum Burmawa, Boghorom, Bokiyim) ko ɗemngal Afro-Asiatic ngal yimɓe heewɓe e Kanam e Wase nder Diiwal Plateau, Naajeeriya.
Yimɓe Boghom ɓuri ɗuuɗugo ɓe remooɓe, koo nde woɓɓe maɓɓe ɗon mari kuugal nyamndu. Taariha, duɗal maa ko yimɓe ɓurndi.
Boghom woni go'o e ɗemɗe joweego ɗe nder Barawa "Lexicon" Ronald Cosper: Jimi, Zul, Geji, Polci, Dott, Sayanci, Buli e Boghom. Joshua Project ɗon wi'a yimɓe ɗon ɗon ɗon mbi'a Bogghom ɗon 162,000.

Yimɓe Boki:
Yimɓe Boki (Bokyi) (ngol anndiraa kadi Nki) ngoni lenyol wonande nder Diiwal Cross River, Naajeeriya. Yimɓe Boki ɓuri fuu ɓe ngalaa ɓe ɗon mari bee daande. Ɓe ɗon mbi'a bolle Bokyi, go'oto nder bolle Bendi. Nder hitaande 1979, yimɓe Bokyi ɓurii 190,000. 

Ɗemngal Bole:
Bole (bòo pikkà, anndiraa kadi bana Bolanchi, Ampika, Borpika, Bolewa, Bolawa) ko ɗemngal iyaalu Caad hirnaange, ɗum haalani nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗe ɗemɗe ɗe hawti e Bara e Fika, ɗe ɓe mbi'ata nder Laamorde Fika.

Ɗemngal Bure:
Bure, anndiraa kadi e Bubbure, ko ɗemngal Afro-Asiatic jeyaaɗo to goomu Bole-Tangale nder galle West to wuro Caad. Ɗum ɗon wolwi nder lesdi Naajeeriya woyla nder wuro Bure (10°31"06.16"N, 10°20"03.00"E, hukuma pamarun Kirfi, Diiwal Bawci, Najeeriya) e nder nder nder nder nokkuuje manɗe ɓadiiɗe. Ɗemngal ngal huutoroo ko heewɓe heewɓe, ko e ɓooya mum en. To haasa, ko woni lingua franca nder nokkuure, Bure ɗon hawta e ɗemɗe feere ɗe ɗemɗe Caad bana Gera, Giiwo e Deno (golle Bolé).
Ha tawii e ɗemɗe goɗɗe nder kawtal go'o (e.g. Bole ko Karekare), halkugol Bure woni ko ɓuri haalude.

Yimɓe Buseni:
Yimɓe Biseni (Biseni) ɗon jooɗi nder Bayelsa caka, Naajeeriya.
Ɗum ɓerɗe man ɗe nder go'o go'o nder go'on e go'o e nder go'ol go'o. 
Ɗemɗe Buseni ɗon darana ɗemngal Ijo (Izon) ngal haa fuunaaŋgo.

Ɗemngal Cakfem-Mushere:
Cakfem-Mushere ko ɗemngal Afro-Asiatic ngal wolwi e nder nokkuure laamorde (hukuma pamarun) Bokkos, Diiwal Plateau, Naajeeriya. Ɗe ɗemɗe ɗe Kadim-Kaban e Jajura. Fuuji ɗi ɗi ɗi ɗon fahin bee Mwaghavul ɗon mawndi.
Mushere ɗon ɓadii Mwaghavul.
Cakfem woodi feere ɗiɗi, ko'e Cakfem fuɗɗam e Cakfem ɓaawo. Cakfem fuɗɗam nandi bee Mwaghavul, amma Cakfem ɓaawo ɗon ɗon ɓeyda, ngam haalaaɓe Mwagha vul ɗon mari caɗeele ngam faamugo Cakfem nder. E wiyde Blench nder 2019, yimɓe Cakfem ina woodi gure sappo e tati, e Tim bana wuro mawɗo. Hausa ɗon naftira e ɓiyɓe ɓiyɓe.

Karl Marx frsa:
Karl Marx own beedow leydi jamani dayyadow yalde (5) aleyru dujjal hiitande (1818) akowyaare 14 aleyru mboy adubbe Alif (1883) mulaatake adudow ɗistinoore a andal finnataawa a falsafa Beddo jaamus andudow kawtal riskuje ajudodal duneyaaru ademle kutaaru bendiitol jaareda ajudodal aseyaasa takkuwdo wayletande judodal duneyaaru Karl Marx andudow Falsafa jaamusankeju Karl jangee Digeree makku adubbe hiitande Alif (1841) karl ajenny be dayya beɓɓe (7) muujawdakee akuree maakow dube (40) maudow andal falsafa Karl marx mumayee too leydi landaw

Nuhu Abdullahi:
Nuhu Abdullahi Balarabe (dayngol 3 lewru Janayru 1991) ko filmiijo, jaayndiyanke e politikkoore lesdi Naajeeriya jibinaaɗo e mawninaaɗo nder Diiwal Kano. Nuhu woni gooto e ɓurɓe haɓaade e Kannywood, o ɗon huuwta nder filmaaji Hawsare e Farayse. O heɓii ko o ɓurɗo jokkondirde e Kannywood nder City People Entertainment Awards e hitaande 2015.
Kuugal.
Nuhu Abdullahi hawti e nder nder kamfaniwol filmji Kannywood nder hitaande 2009 bana jannginoowo film, o waɗi fiilmeji ɗuuɗɗi hawti bee Baya da Kura, Mafarin Tafiya, Ana Wata ga Wata, Ta leko ta koma, Mugun Zama, Rana Tara, Fulanin Asali, Kuskurena, Mujarrabi, e feere feere. Nuhu waɗi film maako arande nder film biyeteeɗo Ashabul Kahfi, o heɓii anndal caggal nde o waɗi nder go'o nder filimji ɓurɗi ɓurnde biyeteeɗo Kanin Miji.

Aisha Abimbola:
Aisha Abimbola (19 Bowte 1970 - 15 Duujal 2018) wonnooɗo nder lesdi Naajeeriya e nder lesdi Yarbanko'en.
Ɓiɗɗo e janngirde.
Abimbola jibini nder Epe, Diiwal Lagos nder saare Juulɓe nden ɓaawo ɗon o jeyi Nasaaraꞌen, diina o waɗi haa sahaa mayde maako. Nder haalde "New Telegraph", o wi'i yiɗde maako ngam o warta laamuɗo ɗon halki mo o warta mo'o laamu. O waree Victor Ibrahim Musa, e dewgal ngal barkiɗini e ɓiɓɓe ɗiɗo. Aisha yahdi jaango maako nder Ebute Elefun High School e o laati hooreejo '1994 set". o ɓaawo ɗon o yahdi Lagos State Polytechnic (LASPOTECH) to o jaango HND nder Catering e Hotel Management. o waɗi gollal maako nder ɓaawo duuɓi 2002.

Ahmadu Ahiijo:
Ahmadu Ahiijo o laatake kanko woni aranndeejo hooreejo-lesdi Kamarun. Kanko hoo‘ani Kamarun ndimu lesdi ndiin. Bano noon o hokki ngeendam (nguurndam) maako fuu ngam ɓamtugo daraja lesdi Kamarun ngam yiɗugo ɓiɓɓe lesdi Kamarun ngam yaarugo lesdi Kamarun yeeso. Ahmadu Ahiijo kanko o laatake ɓe ndañi mo ñannde noogas e nayaɓre lewru juko (ut) 1924 e fattude Nasaraawo nder berniwol Garwa. Omo wi‘ee kadi Ahmadu Babba Tura Ahiijo. Ahmadu Ahiijo maaynaa ñannde 30 lewru jolal (nofambar) hitaande 1989 to Dakar lesdi Senegal, tawi omo yahra duuɓi 65.
Ahmadu Ahiijo janngi janngirde makko famarde to berniwol Garwa o naati golle to baŋŋe Poste et Télécommunication, e fulfulde posta e kumpondiral to wakeere fommbinaare lesdi Kamarun, ɓaawo ɗum o warti woylaare lesdi Kamarun. Non non kadi o yahi o huuwi kuuɗe ɗuuɗɗe haa o laatii wakiiliijo majalisa lesdi o naftootiri e Nasaara‘en Faransa haa o laamii lesdi Kamarun. Ahmadu Ahiijo ɓaawo o naasti siyaasa (ɗowoodi, polotik) to berniwol Yawunde o naasti Assemblée Nationale o warti depitee refti ɓe toɗɗii mo premier ministre e maanaa aranndeejo jaagorɓe. Ko e nden ɗon darnde o sosi fedde makko ɗowoodi Union Camerounaise (UC), Dental Ɓiɓɓe Kamarun. Oon saanga on etii gollidude e fedde ɗimmere ɓurnde semmbe nder lesdi ndii, Union des Peuples du Cameroun, Dental Renndooji Kamarun (UPC) ngam haa ɓeen ngoppa haɓre ndimaagu lesdi tuugiinde e fitinaaji e war-hoore kono o ronki fahmondirde e maɓɓe haa ɗum waɗi Faransi addi konu mum Kamarun ngam haɓde UPC. Ko noon ɓe mbardi hooreeɓe UPC fuf gooto gooto, tawi ɓeen ina cuuɗi e nder laddeeji lesdi ndii ina njokki e haɓde laamu nguu. Kamarun heɓti jeytal-hoore mum e mee 1960, Ahiijo laatii hooreejo-lesdi. Feewndo laamu makko faggude Kamaru nduu ɓamtino sanne kono e baŋŋe ɗowoodi, o jogorno lesdi ndii doole e njaggu, o wulnani luundiiɓe laamu makko nguu. O jokki kadi e kuuwondiral maa gollidal kiɓɓungal hakkunde lesdi makko ndii e Faransi. E hitaande 1982, Ahiijo anndini ko juhi yimɓe fuf, wonnde o woppii laamu e sabu ŋakkere aafiya. O totti laamu nguu cukko makko Pol Biya (Paul Biya). Kanko e Pol Biya ɓe puɗɗii luurude law sabu Oon no tuumunoo mo yiɗde wartude e laamu. Caggal ɗum Ahiijo tawi feere alaa ko maa o yalta lesdi ndii, o yahri Dakar, Senegal, o ruttaaki lesdi makko haa o faatii 1989.
Ahmadu Ahiijo ina ɓaŋunoo (resunoo) cuddiiɗo arano maaketeeɗo Adda Garwa, kanko e oon ɓe ndañidi ɓiɗɗo gorko gooto, o seedi e makko e ɓaŋi Germaine (Jermeen e mbinndiin pulaar-fulfulde celluɗo) Ahiijo, o wondi e oon haa maayde makko. Ɓe ndañidi ɓiɓɓe rewɓe tato.

Halima Abubakar:
Halima Abubakar (woowo 12 lewru Juuli 1985) ko actressjo Naajeeriya. Nder hitaande 2011, o heɓii sariya Afro Hollywood Best Actress.
Nolde hoore.
Halima danyimo nder Diiwal Kano amma o jeyi Kogi. O yahi suudu jaŋde mawɗo nder Kano nden o janngini Sociology haa Janngirde Bayero, Kano. Nder lewru Oktoobar 2018, Abubakar holli o ɗon haaje.
Kuugal.
O fuɗɗi gollude nder hitaande 2001 nde o waɗi o waɗi kuugal ɓii-ɓii-ɓooyngal nder film Rejected. Ko o waɗi nder filmji maako fu, o waɗi nder ""Gangster Paradise"". O woni boo hooreejo mawɗo Modhouse Entertainment, marɗo huutoreeje e marɗo huutoraade.

Sandra Achums:
Sandra Achums ko neɗɗo tele Naajeeriya, mo walliɗo yimɓe, e ko ɓuri haani, mo walliiɗo.
Ɓiɗɗo e janngirde.
Sandra Achums jibini nder Diiwal Imo je ɗon ha woyla fuunaaŋgo lesdi Afrik hirnaange; Naajeeriya. O heɓii jaŋde maako fuɗnde, jaŋde e jaŋde haa arannde fuɗnde haa Diiwal Lagos, o jaŋde nder State College Isolo, Lagos.
Kuugal.
Achums nder 1995 waɗi jaayɗe mum nder kamfaniwol filmji lesdi Naajeeriya bee film biyeteeɗo Deadly Affair, to o waɗi e dow dow dow dow ɓeen kolliɓe dow dow dow nder film; Dolly Unachukwu, Jide Kosoko, e Emeka Ike. Fim ngal laatoto ko classic e warde ko o waɗi dow nder nder nder nder ɓooyi. O ɗon nder nder reemaama Glamour Girls.
Nolde hoore.
Achums nder 2006 o dilli diga Nigeria haa lesdi Germany, nden o jooɗi ɗon bee ɓiɓɓe maako e gorko maako bi'eteeɗo Tony.
Sandra Achums, mo ɗon jogiiɗo kuuɗe, hokki ɓiɗɗo gorko nder lesdi Jarmal. Fuu nder sinemaji 90's hawti e hawti. O woodi ɓiɗɗo debbo. O winndi, "Welcome little baby Ryan to the world" nder post ngam mo anniya danygol ɓiɗɗo maako.

Adamu shiroma:
Adamu Chiroma: do Leydi hukuma paamaru pataskum nder Diiwal Yobe Naajeeriya alisde pataskumu aley ardul Yobe keddujo dotteen lisde naajeeriyaajogeedo Jude feere feere mujugakee Hanna adube ɗeede dagadaan muhowtee jugal moybe kautal hurre atadargol lisde ardujo ɗereewal jattenergal alaamu Shehu Shagari jogeedo minestaajow kudee leyi musaytee yalde (10 Jul(2018) Naajeeriya

Suraatul ikhlas 112:
Suraatul Ikhaas 112 (1) geyaa Allah jomeerawo Gato(taak)(2)Allah dardudo a humtoru (3) mudayyii Kuma mudayyaka (4) harhadde herbal yattakee amaku

Pataskumu:
Potiskum hukuma famarun has too ngle maudee alisde Yobe maaribe eider pataskumu awowde leyyal karaikarai (bolewa) ngizim Hausa Fullani jaajerka lesdi Pataskumo kelomiita (559)

Aminu Ado Bayero:
Aminu Ado Bayero ( O danñyaama nde hitaande (1961) hannko wooni laamido kano e mo nder gukara'en (15) fulɓe sulluɓanko'en maggiɗo daw laamu Kano nder ññalɗe (9) lewru marchie (2020) ɓaawo Gomnaajo diiwal Kano Abdullahi Umar Ganduje jippini Muhammad Sunusi IIdega dow korowal laamu Kano hannko wooni mawɗo janngirde kalaba.
Finnde Margo e Ilmu.
Aminu Ado Bayero o wurtoyke dega diiwal Kano,kadi hannko wonii ɗiɗijo e nɗer ɓikkol Ado Bayero,laamiɗo sappo e tati (13) mo Kano. O galartaake janngurde firamare nde ƙofar Kudu nden kadi o saali haa janngirde sakandaree nde Hukumaa Gimnaatiwal, Birnin Kudu. O janngi pattal ɗunngal dega janngirde Bayero Kano, nden kadi ma O dilli lakolwal flying,gongal Oakland. California haa Amerik ko o fuɗda nastuki ofiswal hakkikanngo sukaaɓe ɗun lesdi e hukuma wuuro television ɗun Naajeeriya,makurdi.
Hakkilanngo.
Bayero huwii kuugal e jonnɗe jamii'iji huuduki e yimmɓe nde kamfaniiwal piirooje kabo,ko O latto injiniyaajo piirooje daw. Hitaande ɗumngu (1990) ,daññoowo maako,Ado Bayero ɓili mo daw majen kano kadi haa hioreejo mobgal Dala haa ko'o ɓesda ñebtuuki mo ɗe Dan buran Kano nder lewru habbirdu dun ɗun ɗumngu ngun. E ɗumngu ngu (1992), ɗum inngantakeemo haa turakin Kano nden e lamiɗo Dawaki tsakar gida ɗum Kano e ɗumngu (2000) haa boo o huuwi e jonnɗe hioreejo laamorde diiwal Kano. E ɗumngu (2014), lamiɗo Kano mawdo Muhammadu sunusi 11 besdaniimo darajaa haa yaago wamban Kano, kannjun waɗi o sanji mo dega Dala waddi hukuma pamarum Kano,inaare e mo jottori jonnɗe hioreejo galadiman Kano Tijani Hashim dow jonnɗe arduujo larduwal.
E ɗumngu ngu (2019) , Gomnaajo diiwal Kano Abdullahi Umar GandujeLamminiimo daw lamido Bichi

Suraatul. Nasar 110:
indee Allah jomeerawo Mardi ummaturee 1 tuwallayeree Allah amabbe tadde 2 Deen yeebe a yeebe Anasta Diina allah yeebe a yeebe 3 Sai tourowda Allah a yetturee makku Sai teefa barjaree makku hakku Allah mulaatake jabbuwow tubaade yeebe

Aminu waziri Tambuwal:
Aminu Waziri Tambuwal o daññaana nyalɗe 10 nde lewru haaram ru e ɗumngu aliif teemeeje jowee nayi e cappanɗe jowee go'o 1966) miladiiyaare 
nder gelle Tambuwal joottiiɗe yeɓɓal fombina diiwal Sokoto Naajeeriya lattiiɗo gurtoyɗo dega zuri'aji waziiriijo laamorde Tambuwal.

Abdullahi Bello Bodejo:

Lebanon:
Lebanon no Labanan, un lesdi nder larduwal aasiiya.lebanon e ndi mari jaajirka ññayri kamani kilomiitaaji cappade nayi 10,452. lebanon waafi ɗuuɗirka yimmɓe haa kamani je6,006,668, bisa jimlawal hisaago limgal ndu hitaande ɗumngu . lebanon waadi keerol e siriya e israaila.gelle Mawɗe kannje wi'ete Beirut.

Fulfulde kofngol:
kofngol hommugo jam banduu men ummijam beetii Jammu n Bali jam noise awoni midou jam noise dabbaji Maa dabbaji am dou jam.noi bike koi ma iyyalu bedow jam ma akkuma daa ha atoy ayahata soobajo am midowdilla limo Ko a Yahaya a sou daa midou yaha ayottina am koufn Gol haa iyaluma woudi mallum Jow Haan der sudu jangirde down kooew waddata ow down jangina nas sarakuw ow baudow Naa haa nassaraku Mai non non ownb Baudou haa haa young minyiiko Mada wonni ow down Sarre kooew wadata nganyandi own Ko Wadia non nani am padal am jungo am jeey nawata dou yambita

Annabi Adamu as:
Annabi aadamu hakkuke Adam artuudo haa duniiyaru moo Allah taagi e nɗer aljanna e koree Maako hawwa'u Allah Anndii niimo innɗe kooɗuume fuu adamu Ni waawi bolle fuu kadi o anndi areefu adamu to yeeyannu piiroowal nde hannɗe o wii'ete inndee Maagal e no ɗum moo'inirtaangal tagaal nde Allah taagi Adamu Say wii'imoo mo ññaama o yaraa mo huutiraa ko o yiiɗi fuu Amman to'o ññaama lekki zaa'kum hai ceeridano hawwa'u jeetibe hay mɓe ñyaami lekki Ko joomiraawo haɗiiɓe Dega ɗoon joomiraawo Jaffe nuuyee adamu duniiyaaru hannko e hawwa'u mɓe ɗaññyii ɓekkol artuukol nder duniiyaaru. Haabila ƙaabila dega doon yimmɓe fuɗɗii ɗuuɗuuki darajaa maako taagu artuuɗo Baaba neɗdo e o annɗi koo ɗumee fuu o jooɗakee nɗer aaljanna mo annbijo artuuɗo duniiyaru

Ɗemngal Dass:
 
Dass (nganndi kadi Barawa) ko duɗal ɗemngal Afro-Asiatic haalanki nder Diiwal Bawci e Diiwal Plateau, Nigeria.
Ɗiɗɗe.
Blench (2019) taƴiiji ɗi'e nder ɗemngal Dass:

Ɗemngal Geji:
Geji (Gezawa) ko ɗemngal ɗemngal Caadiyankeewal nder diiwal Bawcii, ko ɗemɗe ɗemngal lesdi Caadiyankaewal nder diiwal Bawci, lesdi Naijeriya. Yimɓe tati ɗon woni Buu, Gyaazi e Mәgang. ɗi ɗiɗo ɗi ɗi ɗi ɗon hawti bana non.
Limɗe.
Limɗe Mәgang ɗe:

Ɗemngal Polci:
Polci (Pəlci, Posə) ko ɗemngal Afro-Asiatic nder diiwal Bawci, Naajeeriya. Ɗum je nder Barawa cluster, je haani je be nder hirnannge ɗemngal iyaalu Caadiyanke'en.
Ɗe ɗemɗe.
Ɗemngal Polci ko go'o nder ɗemɗe jeewte jeewte jeeɗiɗo jeewte ɗe Zaar jeewte Barawa jeewte ɗemɗe Cadi. Ɗemɗe Polci ngoni Zul, Baram (Mbaram), Dir, Buli, Nyamzak/Langas, e Polci hoore mum.

Ɗemngal Saya:
Saya (Sayanci, Zaar) ko ɗemngal iyaalu Caadiyankeewal nder lesdi Naajeriya.
Ɗe ɗemɗe.
Ɗe ɗemɗe e nder Ethnologue:
Blench (2019) hokki innde "Guus",

Ɗemngal Zari:
Zari (Zariwa) ko ɗemngal iyaalu Caadiyankewol nder lesdi Naajeriya. Blench (2019) taƴii ko Zari, Zakshi, e Boto.
Koo nde woodi yimɓe lenyol 20,000, mawɗo habaru ɓaawo ɗon maayi haa hitaande 2000 (Campbell e Belew 2018).

Ɗemɗe Ron:
Ɗemɗe Ron, Ronic ko Ron-Fyer, goomu A.4 nder goomu West Caadiyankeewal nder wuro ɗemɗe Afro-Asiatic, ɓe ɗon bolle nder diiwal Plateau, fombina lesdi Naajeeriya.
Ɗemɗe Ron ɗon mari semmbe masin diga Tarok.
Ɗemɗe.
Ɗemɗe Ron, e ko'e maɓɓe ɗe ɗe ɗon haani, ɗe:

Ɗemngal Gera:
Gera (ngoo anndiraa kadi Gerawa walla Fyandigeri) ko ɗemngal Afro-Asiatic haalanki nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Wanoowo'en ɗon kolli haa Hawsare. Wanoowo'en nodda hoore maɓɓe bana Fyandigeri (Fyandigeri).
Won ko ɓuri 30 wuro. Garaaji ɗuuɗɗi ɗon mbi'a ɗemngal ngal. Fuu nder jaaynde 2018 holli wonde ko nder gure 4 tan ɗemngal ngal ɗon jeyaa to sukaaɓe.

Ɗemngal Geruma:
Geruma (nganndi Gerema, Germa) ko ɗemngal Afro-Asiatic haalanki nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗe ɗemɗe hawti e Duurum e Sum. Wanoowo'en ɗon kolli haa Hawsare.

Ɗemngal Deno:
Deno (nganndi bana Denawa, Denwa, Be) ko ɗemngal Afro-Asiatic haalanki nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Wanoowo'en ɗon kolliti haa Hawsare e Fulfulde.

Ɗemngal Galambu:
Galambu (nganndi kadi Galambi, Galambe, Galembi) ko ɗemngal Afro-Asiatic haalanki nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Yimɓe ɓurɓe fuu ɓe ɗon mbi'a Galambu.

Ɗemngal Giiwo:
Giiwo (nganndi kadi Bu Giiwo, Kirfi, Kirifi, Kirifawa) ko ɗemngal Afro-Asiatikol haalanngal nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Ɗemngal Kubi:
Kubi (nganndi kadi Kuba, Kubawa) ko ɗemngal Afro-Asiatic je ɗon faalaa e nder diiwal Bawci, Naajeeriya. Yimɓe yimɓe ɓe'e ɗon mbi'a Hawsare.
Kubi woni wuro mo anndiraa be yimɓe za'ar nden boo ɗon wolwugo ɗemngal go'o. 

Ɗemngal Maaka:
Maaka (nganndi maa Maha, Maka, Maga, Magha) ko ɗemngal Afro-Asiatic haalanki nder diiwal Yobe, lesdi Naajeeriya. Nder hitaande 1993, yimɓe 10,000 ɗon mbi'a ɗum.

Ɗemngal Dazawa:
Daza (koo e Hawsare Dazawa) ko haalanki e Blench (2006) bana ɗemngal Caadi nder kawral Bole, Ɗum hollitii wonde e nder 2021.

Ɗemngal Karai-Karai:
Karai-Karai (koo Karekare, Kerrikerri, Ajami: كاراي-كاراي) ko ɗemngal ngal wolwi e Afrik hirnaange, ko ɓuri heewde e woyla fuunaange Naajeeriya. Limgal yimɓe ɗon mbi'a Karai-Karai ɗon haani hakkunde 1,500,000 haa 1,800,000 miliyaanji, ɓurna fuu yimɓe Karai-Karai ɗon mbi'i. Ɗemngal Afrik-Asiatik ngal wolwani ko ɓuri heewde nder lesdi Naajeeriya e ummatooje nder diiwal Bawci, diiwal Yobe, diiwal Gombe e nder lesdi Naajeneriya. Ɗeele ɗe Karai-Karai ɗuuɗal e ɗemɗe Semitic ngal ngal ngalle-galle woyla e hebbere e Aaraaɓe. Ɗemngal Karai-Karai ina ɓurdi wondude e ɗemɗe Ngamo e Bole (ɗemɗe e ngallewal fuunaaŋge Nigeria) ɗi ɗi ɗi ɗiɗem ɗiɗem ina njiɗi ko ɗiɗemngal Karai -Karai.
Kooree Karai-Karai.
Winndannde Karai-Karai ɗon mari fuɗɗam nder duuɓi 1950, nde Nordic Region Literary Agency (NORLA) huuwi e deftere Ndar Ma Karatu je ɗum ɓurɗo habaru nder ɗemngal Karai-Karai Gaskiya Corporation haɓɓiri.

Ɗemngal Kwaami:
Ɗemngal Kwaami, anndiraa kadi bana Komawa, Kwam, Kwamanchi, Kwami, ko "Kwom", ko ɗemngal hirnannge Caadiyankeewal bo ɓe ɗon wi'a nder diiwal Bawci, Naajeeriya, ɓadi gariiri Gombe.

Ɗemngal Pero:
Pero, anndiraa kadi Filiya, ko ɗemngal Caadi ngal hirnaange nder lesdi Naajeeriya.
Ɗemɗe Caadi
Ɗemngal Caad ko go'oto nder ɗemɗe ɗe ɓe ɗon wi'a nder fannu Afrik feere. Ɗemɗe Caad ɗon ƴiwo diga ɗemngal Afro-Asiyaatiwol bo inniraa Afro-Chadic. Ɗe ɗemɗe ɗe anndiraa e nder feccere Afrik hawti e; Nigeria woyla (Hawsare e Fulɓe), Kameruun woyla, Niiser woyla, Caad woyla, Afrik feccere, e leyɗe Afrik woɗɓe.

Ɗemngal Piya:
Piya-Kwonci (Piya, Pia, Wurkum) ko ɗemngal Naajeeriya ngalɗam e ko wayi no Piya e Kwonci. Ko yimɓe ɓeen mbi'aama "Ambandi".

Ɗemngal Kulung:
Kulung (Wurkum) ko ɗemngal lesdi hirnannge iyaalu Caadi ngal hukuma pamarun Karim Lamido, Diiwal Taraba, Naajeeriya, ɗum heɓii ɓaawo Roger Blench. Ɗemngal ngal walaa haala nder Ethnologue malla Glottolog. Blench (2019) hokki limgal ɓesngu dow yimɓe 2,000 ɗon wolwata.
Yimɓe ɗon wolwata Kulung ɗon ɗaɓɓa hoore maɓɓe be lenyol maɓɓe nder yimɓe ɗon wolwata ko ɓuri boɗɗum nder yimɓe ɗon ɗon wolwata bana bana bana bana Banabu, ko ngam maajum ɓe ɗon wolwata e ko ɓe mbi'a, bana bana bana ana mbi'a: Ɗemngal ngal ɗon mari semmbe bana Jarawan, ammaa ɗon mari ko ɓe mbii: "Ɗemngal ngal woni bana lesdi".

Ɗemngal Kholok:
 
Kulung (nganndi kadi Kode, Koode, Kwoode, Pia, Pitiko, Widala, Wurkum) ko ɗemngal Afro-Asiatic haalanki nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Ɗemngal Nyam:
Nyam (nganndi kadi Nyambolo) ko ɗemngal Afro-Asiatic haalanki nder wuro go'o nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Ɗemngal Goji:
Goji, ko Kushi maa Chong'e, ko ɗemngal lesdi Caad to hirnaange lesdi Naajerriya.

Ɗemngal Kutto:
Kúttò (Kupto) woni ɗemngal ngal ɓurngal ngal ɗamngal hirnannge iyaalu Caadi nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Ɗemngal Kanakuru:
Dera, ko Kanakuru, ko ɗemngal lesdi Caad to hirnaange lesdi Naajeeriya.

Ɗemngal Ɗuwai:
Ɗuwai (Dó:aí) ko ɗemngal Afro-Asiatic haalanki nder diiwe Jigawa e Kano, Naajeeriya.

Ɗemngal Teshenawa:
Teshenawa ko ɗemngal Afro-Asiatije ɗon maayi, je ɗon haalaa e nder wuro Teshena nder hukuma pamarun Kafin Hausa, Diiwal Jigawa, Naajeeriya.

Zaria Township Stadium:
Zaria Township Stadium (Fedde wuro Zaria) ko stadium huutoreeji ɗuuɗɗi nder Samaru nder Zaria, Naajeeriya. Hannde e huutoree ko ɓuri heewde e nder jokkondiral bolji e ɗum woni wuro toɗɗaaɗo Kaduna United F.C. njayri bolji ina jogii yimɓe 10,000.
8°9′21″N 7°38′28″E﻿ / ﻿8.15583°N 7.64111°E﻿ / 8.15583; 7.64111

Ɗemngal Auyokawa:
Auyokawa ko ɗemngal Afro-Asiatic je ɗon maayi, je ɗon haalaa e hukuma pamarun Auyo, Diiwal Jigawa, Naajeeriya.

Yakubu Gowon Stadium:
Yakubu Gowon Stadium (ko ɓaawo ɗun Liberation Stadium) ko nokkuure feere-feere nder Elekahia suburb of Port Harcourt, Naajeeriya. Hannde ɗum naftira ɓurna fuu ngam juulde bolji e ɗum woni wuro Rivers United F.C., ko Dolphins F.C.
Nder 2015, ɗum darni ɗum ngam teddingo hooreejo lesdi, Janiral Yakubu Gowon.

Yakubu Gowon Airport:
Yakubu Gowon Airport anndiraa kadi bana Jos Airport, hawti dow , laamorgo Diiwa Plateau Naajeeriya. Ɗum noddinaa Yakubu Gowon, hooreejo lesdi Naajeeriya diga 1966 haa 1975.

Gwanki:
Gwanki ɗum wuro ha woyla hirnaange lesdi Kano. Gwanki wonte ha wakkere ngomnati Bagwai ha lesdi Kano.

Kabrije Yaba:
Kabrije Yaba ɗon ha Yaba, ɗo nder fuunaaŋge Lagos, Naajeeriya. Ɗum cembiɗɗo yimɓe anndiraa nder nokkuure nden bana cembiɗɗo Atan.
Cemburu ndu ɗon hawta ɓurɗe haɓɓugo nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Firowol ngol Ƴoola:
Ƴoola Airport nokku ɗo ɗo Ƴoola, laamorgo Diiwal Aadamaawa nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum woni 8 km (5.0 ) haa hirnaange Ƴoola.
Lindiyaaru ndu woodi baawɗe landugo jemma, amma ngam fuɗugo nder nder nder nderleendiyaaruji ɗi naa' nderleeki Fe
dde Fuuɗo Nradaeijeriya ɗon halki kuugal jemma, sey fuɗugo yimɓe nder wakkati haaj (Hajj).
Fedde ngenndi.
Ɗi'e data holli limgal yimɓe jaatiɓe nder gariiri, bana dow fedde dowla lesdi Naajeeriya haa nder jaatiji.

Uyo Township Stadium:
Uyo Township Stadium ko stadium huutoreeji ɗuuɗɗi ɗo woni nder Uyo, laamorgo Diiwal Akwa Ibam, Naajeeriya. Ɗum huutoroo ɓurna fuu ngam juulde bolji e ɗum woni wuro wuro Akwa United F.C. nder Premier League Nigeria. Ɗum woni boo nokkuure ngam kuugal ummaatoore, aada, siyasa, e diina. Ko'e hitaande Akwa Ibom Christmas Carol, ko ngomnatiwol Diiwal Akwa Ibam hawrata, ko'e nder njayri bolji. Njayri bolji ɗon haandi ɓaawo sokol mawɗo nder Birniiji Uyo, biyeteeɗo Akpan Andem Market. Goomu ndun ɗon mari yimɓe 5,000.
Fuu nder wuro Uyo, ko ɓuri heewde juulde e juulde politik ɗo.

Ughelli Township Stadium:
Ughelli Township Stadium ko stadium nder Ughelli, Naajeeriya. Hannde e huutoree ko ɓuri heewde e nder jokkondiral ɓalli e ko ɗum woni wuro wuro toɓoɓe e nder fannu Ocean Boys FC. Stadion ndu woodi yimɓe 5,000 e maɓɓiti nder hitaande 2002. O jaɓɓi juulde ngam Women's African Football Championship nder 2006 e jaɓde WAFU jaɓde 2008 U-20

Masjidji Sultan Bello:
 
Masjid Sultan Bello (Arabic: مسجد صلطن بلو) anndiraa kadi jaamiꞌiire Kaduna, go'o nder masjidji ɓurɗi mawnude e nder Diiwal Kaduna, Naajeeriya, maɓɓinaama e 1962. Ɗum noddiraa e nder Sultana Sakkwatoɓe, Muhammadu Bello ɓii Usman Ɓii Foodiye. Imam mawɗo suudu diina ndu woni Suleiman Muhammad Adam, mo ɗonno mo ɗon jaɓa nder jaango jaangooje Arab e Islam nder jaangooje Diiwal Kaduna.
Taariiha.
Masjid ngal noddinaa Muhammad Bello, mo wonnoo Sultan Sokoto ɓii Usman ɓii Fodio. fotaade]
Galluure.
Masjid Sultan Bello fuɗɗii ɓesdaaki diga nokkuure addude nden ɗon nde 220m2 haa nokkuure addube mawnde 2,300m2.

Stephen Keshi Stadium, Asaba:
 
Stephen Keshi Stadium ko nokkuure feere feere nder Asaba, Naajeeriya.
Luttugo wuro nder suudu ndu woni Goobnore Okowa Main Bowl, njayri bolji e atletiki. O anndiraa ko Asaba township stadium, nden o noddiraa ko e nder football mawɗo, Stephen Keshi. Goomu nder African Championshipa in Athletics nder hitaande 2018, e woodi yimɓe 22,000, fuu ɓe ɗon hawta. Ɗum haɓɓiti nder 2018.

Kuvyon II:
Kuvyon II (Shekarau Angyu Masa-Ibi; 1937 - 10 Oktoobar 2021) woni Aku Uka (laamuɗo mawɗo) 27 e Kwararafa e 13 diga tigilde Wukari Federation, leydi Jukun nder Middle Belt, Naajeeriya. O ɗon jeyaa hooreejo, Diiwal Taraba Council of Traditional Rulers e Chancellor, Federal University Dutse maayi e lewru 10 Oktooba 2021, e duuɓi 84.

Kumbari ɓii Sharefa:
Kumbari ɓii Sharefa (mo laamii 1731-1743) ko laamiiɗo Hawsare ("Sarkin") Kano. O jeyi Mohammed Sharef e o haani ngam limce maako mawnde nder kasu Kurmi.

Feerauna paaraoh:
fiirauna
fiirauna ardidow lamiiɗo leydi miisera awolde copteen peera gurtoyeedo deer wuro mongoo andube going fiirauna laatake bee leyaal giiyagol alluli bebbe Adam arrive bemaarake adube 700000 lesdi miisera diiwoode taytal kautal hurre awaaytago tub zaamanu 5600bc asaireden laamujii maudii afamari kaute hurre adiir laamu fiirauna paaraoh yabbe andube taytal miisera bee keddi daula fiirauna guure 31 saire mumaaye tukkubemu owe joude feerauna Hu aleydi miisera too geenali pyramee too miiseraa

Olayinka Koso-Thomas:
Olayinka Koso-Thomas (duubi daygo; 1937) woni doktooji biyeteeɗo Naajeeriya jooɗiiɗo nder Sierra Leone. O anndiraa nder lesdi ngam kuugal maako ngam halkere ɓanngol ɓanngooji rewɓe. Nder hitaande 1998, o hokki sariya Prince of Asturias ngam kuugal ngal.

Gesila Khan:
Gesila Khan woni ardiiɗo fattude INEC. O waɗi golle ɗe e nder Delta State Branch diga 2012 haa 2014 e nder Diiwal Rivers haa 2014 haa 2016.
Nolde hoore.
Khan ɗon dari diga Diiwal Bayelsa, nder worgo lesdi Naajeeriya. O ɗon ware.

Ahmed Muhammad Ketso:
 
Alhaji Ahmed Muhammad Ketso woni politikol lesdi Naajeeriya mo o jeyaaɗo dow laamorde Diiwal Neeja diga 2015 haa 2023.
Ɓiɗɗo e janngirde.
Ketso jibini ha 27 July 1969 ha wuro Ketso nder Mokwa nder diiwal Neeja. O timmini janngirde maako nder hitaande 1976 nden o maayi nder hitaande 1981, nden o timmini janngi maako nder nder nder hitaande 1991. O heɓii diploma maako nder jaayndeeji ceede nder Federal Polytechnic, Bida diga 1995 haa 1998.
Kuugal.
Nder hitaande 2007 e 2011, o ɗon haɓɓa ngam suudu diiwal Neeja, o ɗon haɓɓi ngam suudu wakiilo nder suudu yimɓe nder partiya All Nigeria Peoples Party (ANPP) ɗon ɗon ɗon ɗon ɓaawo.
E hitaande 2015, o suɓi hooreejo laamɗo leydi e nder jaɓɓiɓol laamu e nder hitaande 2019.
Nder 2023, o maayi tikkere partiya ngam haɓugo ngam darnde gomnati to Mohammed Umar Bago.

Kudirat Kekere-Ekun:
Kudirat Motonmori Olatokunbo CFR (dayngol; 7 Maayu 1958), anndiraa ko Kudirat Kekere-Ekun, ko laamɗo lesdi Naajeeriya e laamɗo leydi Naajeeriya.
Ɓiɗɗo e janngirde.
Kekere Ekun jibini haa 7 Maayu 1958 nder London, United Kingdom. E hitaande 1980, o heɓii jaŋde bachelor nder Law diga University of Lagos e o jaɓɓii to Naajeeriya Bar e 10 lewru Yuuli 1981, o jaɓɓitii to Nigerian Law School haa o yahi to London School of Economics to o heɓii maggal nder Law e lewru Noowamba 1983.

Tijjani Yahaya Kaura:
Tijjani Yahaya Kaura woni politikum lesdi Naajeeriya mo woni ardiiɗo jaangoowo oil e gas nder lesdi Naajeeriya ngam duuɓi tati (OGFZA) ngam duuɓi tati, o boo o laati ministaaru Foreign Affairs ngam jamhuriyawol lesdi Naajeeriya, o boo laati ministaare lesdi Naajeer ngam laamu lesdi Zamfara (SSG), o woni senataaru lesdi Naajeera ngam jamfara lesdi Naajeere nder suudu lesdi Naajeeria. O suɓii senatoore nder hitaande 2015 nden o suɓii nder 23 feebari, nder suɓaaji lesdi Nigeria 2019 nder partiila siyasa laamorde All Progressives Congress (APC). O waɗi hooreejo senate'en dow dow dowla dowla dowle e dowla dowlaaji.

Funke Kasali:
Adefunke Sharon Kasali ko filantropu e diina lesdi Naajeeriya. O laati Executive sakataarjo ngam Petroleum Equalisation Fund Management Board diga 2007 haa 2015. O woni mo tagdi Diamond Lights Women Empowerment Initiative.
Jaŋde e golle.
O timminii jaŋde Bachelor of Business Administration nder Accounting diga Texas Southern University e o heɓii Master of Business Administration in Finance e MIS diga University of Houston Graduate School of Business e hitaande 1991. O wondi boo ardiiɗo nder Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria (ICAN). O waɗi darnde hooreejo jaaynde fedde naftoraaku fuɗɗoraaku nder hitaande 2007 haa 2015.
Nolde hoore.
O ɗon ware Pastor Yomi Kasali e ɓe woodi ɓiɓɓe ɗiɗo.

Alex Usman Kadiri:
Alex Usman Kadiri (laatii) (dayngol; 21 lewru Juun 1942) woni senatoore Naajeeriya mo daraniiɗo senatoore Kogi Fuɗnaange nder Diiwal Kogi. O suɓii nder hitaande 1999
Jaŋde.
Kadiri heɓii digirii PhD diga University of Leeds, Ingiltere. fotaade 

Adetola Juyitan:
Adetola Akinola ko jaajotooɗo ummatoore Naajeeriya, mawɗo jaajotooɓe Glitz Group of companies e hooreejo 2019 Junior Chamber International Naajeeriya.
Laamu.
Adetola, ko fuɗɗam diga Diiwal Ondo amma jibinaa e Lagos bana arande nder ɓiɓɓe njowo. O heɓii jaŋde digiriiwol nder jaŋde Ekiti State University, o heɓii jaɓde jaŋde jaŋnde jaŋde nder Lincoln University, California o yahdi jaŋde Harvard, Cambridge ngam jaŋde ɓamtaare ardiiɓe. Amerik.

Peter Ayodele Curtis Joseph:
Peter Ayodele Curtis Joseph (8 Noofambar 1920 - 15 Diseemba 2006) jibinaa e Ikare, Naajeeriya. O wonnoo leñol leydi ndii e lesdi Naajeriya arandeeji keɓiiɗo sariya jam Lenin nder hitaande 1965.

Kabiru Muhammad Inuwa:
Kabiru Muhammad Inuwa (dayngol; 1965) woni laamiiɗo Rano II caggal maayde Alhaji Tafida Abubakar Ila Auta Bawo. Ka nde o laɓɓinaama laamiiɗo Rano, o huuwani nder Nigerian Immigration Service (NIS) e o ardii hakkilooje aada nde o huuwani bana Kaigaman Rano e hooreejo diiwaan Kibiya.
Laamorde Rano ko go'o nder laamorde ɓesngu ɗi ngomna Abdullahi Umar Ganduje tagi nder Kano, ɗum ardii e Alhaji Tafida Abubakar ILa ii bana emire 1 e Kabiru Mohammad Inuwa.
Laamorde Rano ina woodi laamuje sappo ɗe Rano, Kibiya, Bunkure, Kura, Tudunwada, Doguwa, Sumaila, Takai e Garunmalam e Bebeji.

Katagum:
Katagum woni gariiri, nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) e laamorde nder Diiwal Bawci nder woyla lesdi Naajeeriya. Duule ɗon haadi dow Maayo Jama'are, ko woni ko'e ndiyam Hadejia. Yimɓe ɓurɓe ɗuuɗugo ɓe yimɓe Fulani, Kanuri, Karai-Karai e Hawsare. Ko'e kuuje manndal mawɗe hawti e mbiriiwu, cibal, gawri, maaroori (ko ɓuri ha nder fadamaaje ha maayo, ko "fulooji ndiyam"), cowpeas, liꞌeere, cacaari, e gum arabic. Yimmɓe ɓe'e hawti e ko'e, be'e, go'o, baali, ɓale, e leɗɗe ɗuuɗɗe.
Hukuma pamarun.
Birniiwol Katagum woni laamorde hukuma pamarun Zaki. Hukuma pamarun Katagum woni feere feere fuu haa woyla hukuma pamarun Zaki, diga ɗo ɗum yaasi hukuma pamarun Itas/Gadau; Katagum hawti bana non bee gariiri biyeteeɗo; o woodi babal (1,436 km²) e yimɓe 295,970 ha nder limtal yimɓe 2006, wuro maako je Azare bee yimɓe ɓuri 50% nder yimɓe Katagum fuu. Koode posɗe woni 752.

Iheme:
Chief Iheme Isi-Akpu Nise ɓadi berniiwol Awka o jeyaaɗo e Maazi Izuogu Mgbokpo. O wallitii haɓaaki yimɓe Ikpa Ora e o wondi gooto e ardiiɓe Arondizuogu. Yimɓe maako ɓaawo ɗon ɓe njahi nder laamorde.

Eric Kelechi Igwe:
Eric Kelechi Igwe ko laamɗo lesdi Naajeeriya e ɓii siyaasajo, o jeyaaɗo dow laamɗo Diiwal Ebonyi diga lewru Maayu 2015 haa lewru Maayu 2023. 

Isa Hassan Jama'are:
Isa Hassan Jama'are woni politikal lesdi Naajeeriya, ardiiɗo suudu wakiilo diga Jama'are/Itas-Gadau, Diiwal Bawci. O fuɗɗii wolde ngam karallaagal tataɓo e 28 Maayu 2015.

Hassan Amal:
Amal Hassan ko jaayndiyanke teknoloji Naajeriya e hooreejo jaayndiyaaji to Outsource global ngam hokkude jaayndiyaagal jaayndiyeeji ɗi o fuɗɗii e 2013. Nder hitaande 2018, o wondi gooto e ardiiɓe jaaynde rewɓe 16 ɓe noddi nder 2018 Fortune-US Department of State Global Women's Mentoring Partnership e ɓe ndaara ɗum bana model ngam suka debbo-yallaaji nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Suleiman Othman Hunkuyi:
Suleiman Othman Hunkuyi (dannyamo; 17 Julaay 1959) woni politikal lesdi Naajeeriya mo laati senataajo woyla Diiwal Kaduna haa 2015.
Ɓiɗɗo e janngirde.
Senato Hunkuyi ɗon jaango nder Koleji Barkuɓe Kafanchan ɓaawo ɗon o yahdi to Ahmadu Bello University o jaango nder elto nder hitaande 1986.

Hamman Yaji:
Muhammad Hamman Yaji (1863-1929) ko Laamiiɗo Madagali, Naajeeriya, je tawii nder Laamorde Aadamaawa. O anndiraa ngam deftere maako nder deftere maako dow nguurndam maako e kuuɗe maako diga 1912 haa 1927, o laati camnoowo Fulbe e jaaynde maccuɓe ɓadi hirsirde Aadamaawa, lesdi Naajeeriya, e Mayo-Tsanaga, lesdi woɗɗungo soɓɓiire, lesdi Kamarun. Ko ɗum winndi nder ɗemngal Arab, deftere maako ɗon hokkata hollaago nokku dow nguurndam sub-Saharan dow laamu koloniyaal fuɗɗam karnijum 20.
==Ngendam=
Muhammad Hamman Yaji tokki nder dungu(1863-1929). Hanko woni Lamido Madagali lesdi gondi nder Adamawa nder Nigeria. Muhammad Hamman e mo anda dou winduki ko fari fuu de fini fu ko nangi rayuwaji maakodiga 1912-1927. 
Hanko o Pullo nyewo puccu e soruki jiyabe dou kerol Adamawa e Mayo Tsagana ko heddi ko woddi weyla kamaru.
Hibaruji di ko arti nder larabcire dum windira. Bindi Maako nyalla wallirngo dou di dubi karni sappande Didi.

Rahima Gambo:
Rahima Gambo (dayngol; 1986) ko artist multimediya Naajeeriyarjo, o jooɗiiɗo Abuja, Naajeeriya.
Fedde fuɗɗorɗe e golle.
Gambo jaɓi Jaangirde Manchester nder hitaande 2007 e digiiriwol nder jannde ɓamtaare. Nder hitaande 2008 o heɓii maggal nder Gender e Social Policy diga London School of Economics. E hitaande 2014 o heɓii maggal feere nder journalism diga Columbia Graduate School of Journalism. Ɓaawo e hitaande 2014 o fuɗɗii wonde mo'o wondi e Magnum Foundation

Chef Dammy Pas:
Damilola Adeparusi (duubi daygo 24 korse 1999), anndiraaɗo e ko'e mum ko Chef Dammy Pas, Ko chef Nigeria, blogger nyaamdu, e YouTuber. O heɓii anndal ngam anndal maako e anndal maako nder nyaamugo, o ɓaŋgi yimɓe bee ɓernde maako e kuutorɗe maako.
Ɓeydi e Jaŋde.
Kooffe Dammy Pas jibini e mawnini nder lesdi Nigeria. Gila e duuɓi mum, o holli yiɗde nyaamugo e nyaamugo. Yiɗugo maako dow cukalel ngal waɗi o yiɗi waɗugo kuuɗe nder nokku, to o ɓeydi anndal maako.
Kuugal.
Chef Dammy Pas fuɗɗii yahude mum e cuɗol ngam haɓɓugo yiɗde mum ngam cuɗol nder blog nyaamdu mum e YouTube channel. O heɓii ɓeydi ɓeydi ɗon, o ɓeydi yimɓe bee kuuje maako, e kuuje maako ɗe o nyaama, e ɓernde maako.
Nder ɗaɓɓol maako ngam ɓernde, Chef Dammy Pas waɗi anniya ngam hawta hoore mum bee hawtaago nder Guinness World Record Cook-a-Thon. Wonduki ko'e maɓɓe, ɓe ɗaɓɓiti foondoore coofugo saa'i 100 nde cooftaako Hilda Baci waɗi. Ngam sembe maako e sembe maako ngam ɓeyda ko'e culeeki, o heɓii hakkilantaaku e yiɗde.
Nder huwugo maako e huwugo ko'e cuwugo, Chef Dammy Pas ɗon marki cuwɓe e cuwɓe wuro. Ɓiido maako booɗugo, e baawɗe maako ngam halki kuuje ɗe ɗe ɓurɗe foonda, waɗi mo neɗɗo mo ɓe ngiɗi nder duuniyaaru cucinol.
Ginnessa footi footi footaade.
Chef Dammy, mo ɗon ɓeyda anndal cule, marki duniyaaru bee anndal maako masin nder "test run" diga lewru 11 haa lewru 15 lewru. Nder balɗe nayi, o ɗon cuɓina masin nyaamdu nyaamdu ɓurɗum 100, ngam o ɓeyda yimɓe ɗon njanngina nyaamdu.
Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe mbiyi ko cuffal cuffal ngal cuffal Dammy waɗi ngam ɓeyda record ngal Hilda Baci waɗi, bana Guinness Book of World Records. Ammaa, Chef Dammy hollii nder yidde nde o yiɗi naa' ngam o haɓa ko'e dow, ammaa ngam o ɓeyda annduki maako nder nyaamugo nyaamdu.
Nder haalaaji haaluɗi e maralɓe nder Ado-Ekiti, Ekiti State, Chef Dammy, mo jannginoowo haalde yimɓe ha nder jaŋde fedde, Oye-Ekiti (FUOYE), holli "test run" maako ɗon haalude tan dow ɓeydaago hoore e anndal. O ɓaditi cooking-a-thon saa'i 120 bana fursatugo ɓeydude kuutorgal maako e holla yiɗugo cooking, ɓaduki ɗaɓɓugo anndal Guinness World Records.
Ko coofirɗo Dammy waɗi ngam o ɗon huuwugo e cuffugo e mo yiɗi cuffugo waɗi yimɓe nder ummaatoore cuffugo ɓe mawnina mo. Fuu talanta maako e ɓernde maako ngam ɓeydaago ko'e cule bana ko'e maɓɓe waɗi mo go'o nder duniyaaru cule.
Nolde hoore.
Chef Dammy Pas ɗon waɗa ngeendam maako goɗɗum, ammaa kuugal maako e kuugal maako boo ɗon holla nder kuugal maako. O ɗon tokki anndugo ko'e kulinaare keso, o ɗon ɗaɓɓita e laaɗe, laaɗe, e ɓurnaaji aada ngam waɗugo nyaamduji keso e ɓurugo haɓɓugo.

Abdullahi (sultan):
Abdullahi ko Sultan Kano mo laamani diga 1499-1509.

Abdullahi (laamiiɗo):
Abdullahi ɓii Dabo (ngam innde: Abdullahi Maje Karofi dan Dabo) ko laamɗo Kano mo laamiiɗo gila e hitaande 1855 haa e hitaande 1883.

Fati Abubakar:
Fati Abubakar woni fotowoowo Nigeria e fotowoowo dowla.
Joomi e golle.
Abubakar jibinaa e mawnina nder Maiduguri, Naajeeriya.
Kuugal maako wurtini nder The "New York Times", CNN Africa, BBC e Voice of America. O ɗon huuwa ngam huutoreeji ɓaawoji Diiwal Borno, hawti bee ɓaawoji Boko Haram. O woodi kuugal wi'eteeɗo Bits of Borno.

Muhammad Kwassau:
Muhammad Kwassau woni laamiiɗo hooreejo laamordeZazzau ɓaawo warugo nder laamu Britinkeejum. Caggal nde o heɓii laamu e hitaande 1897 ngam o suɓii, ko e nder nder haɗde warugo e nder konu, o welliti yimɓe Britiyankooɓe e hitaande 1900, o noddi ɓe ɓeydi ɓeydi e hitaande 1901 ngam haɓugo e Kontagora, Ammaa ɓe mburtini mo nder 1902, ngam ɗum waɗi Zazzau heɓii hoore mum.

Danjuma Laah:
Danjuma Tella Laah (dugumi 16 Fabayru 1960) woni politikkoore Naajeeriya e senatoore mo daraniiɗo fombinare Diiwal Kaduna gila 2015 haa 2023.

Kehinde Oluwatoyin Ladipo:
Kehinde Oluwatoyin Ladipo woni Joologire Naajeeriua. O wondi ardiiɗo Academy of Science Nigeria, o suɓii nder Academy's Fellowship ha jaaynde mum ngal waɗii e lewru Janayru 2015.
Biography.
Ladipo waɗi duuɓi sappo e jowi nder Shell Nigeria. Caggal nde Ladipo wari nder Shell, o walliima haɓɓugo jande jaango jaangirde geoscience haa Janngirde Benin.

Adama Lamikanra:
Adama Iye Iyayi Lamikanra woni hooreejo laamiiɓe leydi Diiwal Rivers. O waɗii alkawal dow hooreejo hooreejo leydi e 15 lewru Janayru 2016 ngam o jeyaa Daisy W. Okocha mo o jeyaa e nder nyalaande nden. O waɗi alkawal dow hooreejo laamiiɓe dow 8 Maayu 2016.

Hassan Lemu:
Alhaji Hassan Lemu OON wonnoo sakataarjo hooreejo woyla Naajeeriya, Ahmadu Bello 
Ɓiɗɗo e janngirde.
O jibinaa 1920-21 ha Lemu of Gbako, O fuɗɗi ha Lemu Elementary School 1939-41, nden Niger Middle School, Bida 1942-44, jooni ko College Government, Bida, o yahi Kaduna College 1945-48.

Aminu Maigari:
Aminu Maigari ko laamɗo leydi Naajeeriya mo o jeyaaɗo hooreejo Fedde Bolji Naajeeriya 38 diga 2010 haa 2014 caggal nde o jeyaa e dow "laawdi jawdi, huutoreeji e huutoreeje".

Gerald Mbamalu:
Gerald Mbamalu woni laamiiɗo Ojoto nder hukuma pamarun Idemili-South nder Diiwal Anambra, nder lesdi Naajeeriya.
Ɓiɗɗo.
O ɓiɗɗo joweetati e Aloysius e Philomina Mbamalu. Mbamalu laatoyi dow 1 abriil 2018, be Eze Ojoto III be Ezeoranyelu I be ummaatoore be Igwe-in-Council maako. O jeyaa e Igwe Augustine Obidiwe (Eze Ojoto II).

Janngirde Ñyawɗuki Gollital Ningi:
Janngirde Ñyawɗuki Gollital Ningi un janngirde Hukuma ɗe hoore Mun jottoriiɗe nder Ningi, hukuma pamarum [ yebre, diiwal Bauchi, [[Naajeeriya
Ñawɗuki e Gollital Ningi Un haa ba niihii.
Bills e Melinda Gates janngirde Ñyawɗuki Gollital nastirdee
Hakkilanngo ñjaamu yaasi gollal
Ñjaamu nɗer ummaatoore
faarugo ñjaamu jannɗe Yeeso
nokkure Godorrde
Famtinirde ñamdu e beldaaku
ñawduki ñyii'e 
anndinnki maaganiije
Bayaanu ko nooni ñjaamu

Ishaku Abbo:
Ishaku Elisha Abbo (duggi e Woyla Mubi, Naajeeriya) woni politikkoore Leysdi Naajeeriya. O woni senatoowo daraniiɗo Woyla Adamawa nder Diiwal Aadaamaawa haa Naajeeriya 9th National Assembly. O wondi wonde ardiiɗo All Progressives Congress (APC).
Kuugal politik.
Ha 23 Fabayru 2019, Abbo laɓɓini senatoore ngam daraniiɓe Woyla Adamawa, ngam o waɗi kuri'ajo 79,337 dow senatoore, Binta Masi Garba.
Jaɓɓorgo Kewuuji.
Abbo wondi jaɓɗo 'Beacon of Hope' Award je Adamawa Celebrities & Achievers Awards ha hitaande 2019.

Abd al-Qadir (Sakkwatoɓe):
Abd al-Qadir anndiraa kadi e Abdulkadir, o woni Mawɗo Sakkwatoɓe (1842-1859). O ardii e baaba maako Gidago ɓii Laima (1817-1842) e Ibraahiima Khalilu (1859-c. 1874). Kaŋko o taƴii o taƴi wizir, Abdulkadir hawti e haɓɓooji 25 e laamu Sultan Muhammed Bello e haɓɓooji nayi e kawtal mum, Abu Bakr Atiku. O ɗon moofta e Sultan Ali e ɓiɗɗo Nana Asma'u ɓii Foodiye
Vizier.
Laamu maako bana vizier waɗi hujja, ammaa o woodi ko haani. Abdulkadir hawti e ƴettinki Umar Nagwamatse bana laamiiɗo Katuru, Umar waɗi anndal dow laamiiɗo mo o mari baawɗe, mo hoore mum e mo heɓii heɓuki amma o holli o walaa hakkiilo dow laamiiɓe. Umar ɓaawo ɗon o yahdi haa worgo o waɗi laamu Fulani nder Kontagora. Ammaa, woodi ko waawi waɗugo. Nde Bukhari, Emir Hadejia heɓii laamu bee sembe, Abdulkadir waɗi darnde ngam jaɓugo haala. O yahdi to Katagum o noddi Bukhari, ammaa o haani mo bee askarɗe maako, Bukhari o anndini o jeyaaɗo e maako, Ahmad o laɓɓinaama Emir. Bukhari ɗaɓɓiti wallude to Bornu. Ammaa kuugal ɗiɗo, go'o dow hoore Ahmad, on woni on ɓiy Abdulkadir e ɗiɗma dow hoore Abdulkadir, ɓe mbaawaa fooli, nder wakkatiiji, Bukhari ɓaawo ɗon o maayi on ɓiy Hadejia.
Abdulkadir hawti e darndan laamaana laamiiɓe Sultan.
Nder wakkati maajum, dokke ɗe ɓe hokki vizier e Sultan ɓe ɗon jeyaa bana lekki.

Abdukadir Abdulsalam:
Abdulkadir Abdulsalam ko politikal lesdi Naajeeriya, o jeyaaɗo shubtago Labour Party nder Naajeeriya.
Abdulsalam maayi nder Abuja ha 29 Diiseemba 2020.

Yarima Ibraahiima Abdullahi:
Yarima Ibrahim Abdullahi (daññyama 1 Oktooba 1939) ko laamɗo Naajeeriya, bankooɗo e ministaar galle, e jannginooɓe jannginooji e golle. O jaagorɗo nder Janngirde Manchester, Britaaniya. O waɗi boo bana mawɗo lesdi Naajeeriya to Maleziya e Brunei.
Ɓiɗɗo e janngirde.
Yarima Ibrahim jibini haa 1 Oktooba 1939, nder Diiwal Gombe. O heɓii janngirde maako nder suudu janngirde Hassan Deba. 

Khairat Abdulrazaq-Gwadabe:
Khairat Abdulrazaq-Gwadabe (dunde 1957) woni politikkoore lesdi Naajeeriya. O jeyaa senatoore ngam senatoore Abuja, berniwol mawɓe, Naajeeriya haa fuɗɗam lesdi Naajeeriya, o jeyaa dow PDP. O waɗi kuugal diga lewru Duujal 1999 haa lewru Duujal 2003.

AbdulRahman AbdulRazaq:
AbdulRahman AbdulRazaq (dannyamo 5 Fabayru 1960) ko politikal lesdi Naajeeriya, mo laatii ngomna Diiwal Kwara gila hitaande 2019.
Ɓiɗɗo.
O jibinaa nder hukuma pamarun Ilorin West. Abdulrahman woni ɓiɗɗo Alh. A. G. F. AbdulRazaq SAN., jaɓoowo fuɗnaange fuɗnaande nder lesdi Naajeeriya.
Nolde hoore.
O waree Olufolake Molawa Davies Abdulrazaq e ɓe woodi ɓiɓɓe ɓiɓɓe tato.

Ahmed Rufai Abubakar:
Ahmed Rufai Abubakar CFR woni diplomatu Naajeeriya, e darinoowo mawɗo National Intelligence Agency nder Naajeeriya.
Jaɓɓorgo Kewuuji.
Nder lewru Oktooba 2022, hooreejo lesdi Naajeeriya Muhammadu Buhari hokki mo daraja lesdi Naajeeriya (CFR) ngam ardiiɗo dowru lesdi Naajeeriya.

Aliyu Abubakar:
Aliyu Mai Sango Abubakar III laatii senatoowo ngam Woya Sakkwotoɓe nder Diiwal Sakwatoɓe, Naajeeriya haa fuɗɗam lesdi Naajeeriya (Fourth Republic), je ɗon jeya dow platform All People's Party (APP). O fuɗɗii golle mum e 29 Mee 1999.
Caggal nde o mari jooɗorde maako nder majalisu haa lewru Juuli 1999, o suɓi haa boɗeeji dow ɗemngal, jam e sirlude, kiita (joofta hooreejo), polis Affairs e Drug & Narcotics.

Datti Abubakar:
Kolonel Datti Sadiq Abubakar o woni garnaako konu Diiwal Anambra nder lesdi Naajeeriya diga lewru Yuuli 1978 haa Oktooba 1979 wakkati laamu konu Janaarjo Olusegun Obasanjo.
O mari jaangirde Rumfa, Kano.
Nder lewru Yuuli 1966 Lt. Datti Abubakar, Recce, ɗon nder Abeokuta Garrison nde ɓurɓe nder ardiiɓe Igbo maayi, ɗon jokkondira gollal nder kolli dow majje majje Johnson Aguiyi-Ironsi.

Haruna Abubakar:
Haruna Abubakar jibinaa e Lafia, Diiwal Nasarawa, haa 6 lewru Yuuni 1952.
Haruna maayi baaba maako nder duuɓi maayi, o ɓeydi mo ɓeydaaki ngam o ɗon ɓeyda baaba maako, o ɓiydi o anndi dow baaba maako, ko o ɓeydaama dow maako.
Mayde maako.
O jaɓɓitiiɗo Janngirde Ahmadu Bello Zaria, to o janngini jura. 
Abubakar maayi nder suudu ndun London ɓaawo nyau ɓurngal e 27 feebari 2005. O haɓɓii nder Lafia.

Idris Abubakar:
Idris Abubakar (1955-2002) laatii senatoore ngam Fommbina Gombe nder Diiwal Gombe, Naajeeriya ha fuɗɗam lesdi Naajeeriya, o jeyaa dow All People's Party (APP). O fuɗɗii golle mum e 29 Duujal 1999.
Maayi.
O maayi ko ñalnde 11 lewru Diseemba 2002.

Shiihu ahmadu abulfatahi(rta):
Shehu Ahmadu abulfatahi(rta) modiibo maudo jaggeddo diina islaama a datal sufiiya shiihu murshiidaduw daatal tijjaniyaa mariido alisde niijeriyaa niijar seneegal biahakkude dube 1919_2003 mlaadiya untaguu konduuga jiihar borno niijeriya maula sheehu abulfatahi modebbu makku shehu ibrahim inyess(rta)nuddiiremu be aliyu biin muhammad mukhtar biin adam biin dawud biin abdulganiyu biin zubair biin abbas biin hissain biin sulaiman

Maimunat Adaji:
Hajiya Maimuna Usman Adaji (C.1957 - 2019) wonnoo politikkeejo lesdi Naajeeriya. O fuɗɗii wonde laamɗo haa wuro daraniiɓe nder hitaande 2003. O fuɗɗii wolde e hitaande 2011 ngam shubtal All Nigeria People's Party (APP).

Abdulahi Bala Adamu:
Abdulahi Bala Adamu laɓɓini senatoore ngam ummatoore Woyla Taraba nder Diiwal Taraba, Naajeeriya haa fuɗɗam lesdi Naajeeriya, haa fuɗɗugo lesdi Naajeeriya, nder People's Democratic Party (PDP). O fuɗɗii golle mum e 29 Maayu 1999.

Adamu Adamu:
Mallam Adamu Adamu CON (dannyamo 25 Maayu 1954) ko jaayndiyanke, jardiyanke e politikal lesdi Naajeeriya, o jeyaaɗo e hooreejo jaayndiyaaji.
Ɓiɗɗo e janngirde.
Adamu jibinaa ko ñalnde 25 Maayu 1954, nder Azare. O heɓii jaŋde digiiriwol nder JanngirdeAhmadu Bello nder Zaria. O heɓii jaaynde nder jaaynde Columbia University's School of Journalism. O ɗon anndira ɗemɗe ɗuuɗɗe e o ɗon wi'a Hawsare, Britinkoore, Farisa e Aaraaɓɓe. O diga Diiwal Bawci nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Suleiman Adamu:
Suleiman Adamu (maayi; 30 seedto 2020) woni politikkoore Naajeeriya. O ɗon huuwa bana go'o nder suudu Diiwal Nasarawa, marɗo je'ol Cakkare Nasarawa, wakkati o maayi ngam COVID-19 nder lewru seedto 2020.
Maayi.
Suleiman Adamu maayi diga COVID-19 haa Federal Medical Center (FMC) nder Keffi, Diiwal Nasarawa, Naajeeriya, nder 30 Aprilu 2020. O haɓɓii e 1 Maay nder wuro maako, Nasarawa. Fujji lartol maako, ɗi ɓe timmini bana ɓaawo o maayi, ɗi tabbitini COVID-19.

Zuma Rock:
Zuma Rock ko monolit mawɗo, ko inselberg, ko ɓeydaaki e gabbro e granodiorite, nder Diiwal Neeja, Naajeeriya. Ɗum ɗon nder hirnaange laamorgo lesdi Naajeeriya, Abuja, nder laawol mawɗo diga Abuja haa Kaduna haa Madala, nden wakkati feere ɗum nodda ɗum "Borol Abuja diga Suleja". Zuma Rock ɗon ƴiwo ko ɓuri mita 300 (980 ft) dow ɗo ɗon hawta.
Zuma Rock ɗon holla dow ɗerewol Naira 100. Ɗum huutori ngam ɓeydaago ngam yimɓe Gbagyi ngam haɓugo bee ɓalli ɓooyi nder konu hakkunde ɓalli.
Zuma Rock ɗon mawnugo bana ko woni nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum ɓuri maare nayi ɓurɗe wuro NECOM (go'o ɓurɗo maare nder Lagos, diga 1979) nden boo ɓuri maare Aso e Olumo hawti.

Zugurma Game Reserve:
Zugurma Game Reserve ko go'o nder Kainji National Park, nder nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) Mariga nder Diiwal Neeja, Naajeeriya.
O ɗon mari ko maayo Kontagora haa woyla hirnaange e maayo Manyara haa woyla, o ɗon hawta bee babal haare 138,500.
Ɗum hawti e Borgu Game Reserve nder hitaande 1975 ngam waɗugo Kainji Lake National Park.

Janngirde Anchor:
Taarihi.
Nde jahal tiggeeki Janngirde Anchor faddal ɗum lewru siwtoraanɗu 2012 Amma ciyaa hebki jaɓeeki e hokkeeki daama dega hukumaare hakkilanki janngirle Naajeeriya noddiraaɗum NUC warrnɗe ɗum timmal hammaago e jabgo ɗum mɓe billiyaanji ɗuuɗɗi kuuɗe nder nde heɓeeɗe teppe yanuugo piiroowal dow. Farfeesaajo Celestine onwuliri,gorko ɗum mɓe nastuɗoo laati ministaajo kadi Daarectaajo goonguuɗo hawti. Nden janngirle Naajeeriya NUC hawti haa soytuɓe mawdo nden e luttuɓe 157 nder nde yanoyki piiroowal bataaɗum ñalɗe Alal wayrurdu suumaye 3,2012. Emo nɗer arduu-en ɗum mɓe mobtal ballooɓe tiggeeki Janngirde Anchor. mahol fuɗdaama nɗer 2013. Janngirde Anchor fuɗɗii kuugal nder 2014 les hakkilanngo kiristannko'en mɓe deeper Life. 
Ɗum tabbitiniiɗe haa NUC caggal hoore-en Janngirle Naajeeriya ñalɗe alarba 2, siwtoraanɗu 2016 
Caggal ko Jannginntee.
E nɗe mari caggal fannuuju tati nɗer janngirde nden.
Huurude.
(a) caggal ɗum yimmɓaaku
(b) caggal mɓe annɗal jonnɗe yimmɓe e juppal tayaaka
(c) caggal nɗe duuniyaaru e keeɓal tayaaka
Laaru Kadi.
deppal janngirɗum nder Naajeeriya

Janngirde Al-qalaam:
TAARIIHI.
Ɗun tiggi janngirde Al-qalaamAUKnder hitaande Aliif 2005, kayre wooni wuudu arannɗeere janngirde diina islaama jottoriiɗe hoore mun nɗer Naajeeriya.
GOLLEEJI-GOLLEEJI.
E nde hannɗe janngirde ede huutiraa caggolji haa jowee go'o/lakollji kannje wooni ba niihii:
lakolwal tayaaka e kakkilanoowal tayaaka, lakolwal hebbinki tayaaka lakolwal ilmu, lakolwal hakkilanngo ɓii Aadam, lakolwal himmari digiriiwal e Janngirde himmari jawɗinnki maganiije. Janngirde nden e hokkora digiriiji haa 22 e fannuuji digiriiji ɗiɗiiji (e nder nɗe jannɗe joowi ko rokkata e siryaaki-siryaaki wakkatiije kewɗe haa 11.

Yelwa Doma:
Yelwa Doma ko nokkuure yimɓe nder Diiwal Nasarawa, Naajeeriya. Ɗum ɗon haandi ko haade 16 km (9.9 mi) haa worgo wuro Doma.

Yagba fuunaaŋge:
Yagba East (fuunaaŋge) ko nokkuure laamorde (hukuma pamarun) nder Diiwal Kogi, Naajeeriya. Wuro maako ɗon nder gariiri Isanlu dow laawol A123, nden ɗon yimɓe Okun ɗon njooɗugo.
Ɗum woodi nokkuure 1,396 km2 e yimɓe 140,150 nder nder limti yimɓe 2006. Nder 2016, yimɓe ɓe ɓeydi haa 199,300.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 262.

Wushishi:
Wushishi ko nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) nder Diiwal Neeja, Naajeeriya. Wurooji maare maako ɗon nder gariiri Wushishi.
Wushishi ɗon ha hakkunde longitude 9°43'N e latitude 6°04'E e woodi nokkuure 1,879 km2 e yimɓe 81,783 ha nder limti 2006 .
Koode postaal nokku on woni 922.

Wase Rock:
Wase Rock ko goomu mawndi e koode nder wuro Wase nder hukuma pamarun Wase nder Diiwal Plateau nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Maayo Wase:
Maayo Wase ko maayo nder hukuma pamarun Wase , Diiwal Plateau, Naajeeriya. Ɗum hawti e maayo Benue nder Dampar nder hukuna pamarun Ibbi, gawri, dunnduuje, Manngoroo e feere lambi lambi fuɗnaama nder maayo maako.

Wangibi:
Wangibi anndiraa bana Ikka Wangibi ko wuro nder lesdi Naajeeriya, ɗo yimɓe Eggon ɗon jooɗi. Fedde nden ɗon ha nder Diiwal Nasarawa. Yimɓe Eggon ɗon ɓurna nder gure Nasarawa

Wamba, Naajeeriya:
Wamba woni nokkuure laamu (hukuma pamarun) nder Diiwal Nasarawa, Naajeeriya. Wurooji maare maako ɗon nder gariiri Wamba.
Ɗum woodi nokkuure 1,156 km2 e yimɓe 72,894 e nder limti 2006 .
Koode postaal.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 960.

Kooseeje Gooya:
Gooya, Goya ko Gooya woni nokkuure archaeological, wuro jamanuure e nder dammugal e kooseeje ɗuuɗɗe, e nder fukuje e nder fukaare Fika, nder Diiwal Yobe, lesdi Naajeeriya. 
Ɗum laatii go'o nder nokkuuje hawtaade yimɓe nder Yobe.
Ɗum woni ɓurɗo ɓurugo nder lesdi Nigeria. 
Luttudu ɗo ɗo dabbaaji feere feere bana Pobbi e baaɗi.
Ɗum huutori ngam ɓeydaago ngam yimɓe Karai-Karai ngam haɓugo bee lenyol haɓɓugo nder konu. 
Fuuji do'a holli wonde ɗum leydi arandeeji yimɓe Karai-Karai ngam daliila wonde yimɓe nder nokkuure nden holli bana no ɓesngudi berniwol arandeeji e cuuɗi ɗi laatii laaɓɗi ɗon yi'a haa jooni.
Taariiha.
Taariha bolle ɗon wi'a bana nde caggal laamu Ayam, Dakau e laamiiɓe feere feere, habaruuji ngari haa Mai Idris Alooma (1580 - 1617) dow ardiiɓe maako, ɗum woni yimɓe Karai-karai. Ngam maajum, haala wi'i, Alooma yahdi haa lesdi Karai-karai ha hirnaange Kanem Borno ngam daliila tan yahugo yimɓe Karai-Karai haa nokkuure ɓadi maako. Habaru dow jaayɗe maako e yiɗi maako wari haa yimɓe Karai-Karai. Yimɓe nder feere waɗi anniya yaaki Gooya (goorgal ɓurngal) ngal Karai-karaiɓe ɓurna ɓe ngari nder Gongola poolugo heɓii bana nokkuure ɓurɗum ɓeydaago ngam ɓe ɗonno ɓe ɗonno wakkati haa ɓe ɗonno haani hokki yimɓe maɓɓe e yimɓe maɓɓe ha nder nokkuuje feere feere ha warugo haɗugo.
Mai Gireema woni ardiiɗo mo ardiiɓe Karai-Karai to Gooya.

Laamorde jalingo:
lamurde jalingo Ales demaree leyyii Maude afamarii Ali's[[Alhaji}}Abbas njidda tafida junee alis Iko laamu Muri akuyyare July abaawo Alhaji Umaru Abbas Tukur yiimbe jodiibe leyyi free fere Gilbert hawsa kutet yiimbe diir bejaarijodiibe hakkuke kyayii awolde Lambe maube afamarbe adiir ajalingo awoode jaggelle Tukur primary school mafinda primary shoolnya primary school lamurde primary school central primary school Hassan primary

Chief Gershom Henry Basset:
Chief Gershom Henry Basset latama goddo siyasa Naajeriya nden o lati mardo chede duddum. O senator wakkere Diiwal Cross River south hedie Lesdi Naajeeriya.

Abubakar Tanko Ayuba:
kuuɗe majaliisu ɗotti'en.
ɗun subti e Les cuɓal partiwal people Democratic party (PDP) e lewru haaram sakitiiɗu ɗumngu 2007 . O ɓilaama dow hakkilanngo tayaaka e Gollital harkaaji jandarma'e , solji'en ndiyam e siryaago lesdi,hawtugo e kawtal Hore reenugo e solji'en e fottugo nder lewru haaram ru 2008 , Taskarawal leadership ngal rawaytoyke Ayuba eder sanata'en artuuɓe mɓe ɗun haɗii subtal muu'en Amma wiiki emo teefa caawoori yaahki laamu. E lewru suumaye O hokkora jammingo ɗun Nalson Mandela Gold Award' Sabo'e booɗuuki ardungal e ardaaki ummaatoore

Astoronomy:
Astoronomy jaggube andal yalde a naage andal lewru hiibe ɗatal Daga Abdullahi galileo itaaliya aɗeer lesdi aurop hambeke waɗoobe hasace yalɗe a ndiyam lis duniiyaru ɓekeebe asali too lisde giirka

Pozculular:
2023-2025 arası "Kanal D"de yayınlanan lise çağındaki gençlerin birbiyle yaşadığı olaylar ve mafya,fuhuş,kaçakcılık karşısında verdiği mücadeleyi anlatmaktadır.Kahramanlarımızın karşısındaki çete tüm bu işleri yapan Yenipazarlılardır.Aynı zamanda şehirdeki büyük mafya örgütletleri işin içine girince olaylar baya zorlaşmaktadır..
= Ana Karakterler =
ENES (1-68).
= Pozcular grubun başıdır.Kendisinin sözü hep dinlenir.İlk başlarda Pozcu'da yaşamamısına rağmen yaşanılan olayları görmüş ve sonrasında Pozcu'ya taşınıp bu işlere girmiştir."Normal bir lise öğrencisi iken yaşadığı çevrede çetesi ile beraber mücadeleler vermiştir.Korkusuzdur ve iyi dövüşür.Yenipazarlı Hamit ile ezeli düşmandır.Sağ kolu Feyzi'dir.Evine baskın yapılması sonucuna öldürürmüştür." =
FEYZİ (1-36)
Enes'in sağ koludur.Birlikte hareket ederler çetesi için namını ortaya koymuştur.Şehrin UNDER BOSS'lar ile iletişime geçen tek kişidir.Aynı zamanda okul içinde "YMAL GANG" adında çeteye sahiptir.Enes ile ortak olunca gruba bir sürü adam eklettirmiştir ve güçlendirirmiştir.Sürekli sigara içer ve kız peşinde koşar Yenipazarda yaşayan Elanur'a aşıktır.Sehirde bir sürü torbacı ve illegal işlerle uğraşanları öldürmektir.Finalde ise Mafya Cemil tarafından 5 kere vurup öldürmüştür.Ölümünden sonra Pozculular büyük güç kaybetmeştir. 
Dersleriyle ilgisi olmaktadır.Makara için okula gelmektedir.Kendisini sınıfta bırakan hocayı bıçaklamıştır.Tam adı"Levent"dir.Yağız'ın kuzeni Eda'dan hoşlanmıştır."UNDER BOSS"ların çocukları silah kaçakçılığına başlayınca hepsini öldürmüştür.Fakat daha sonra tüm suçunu itiraf etmiştir ve ömür boyu hapis cezasına çarptırılmıştır..
UYGAR (1-46)
Pek konuşmaz.Kekemedir.Uygar ile ters düşünce kendi ekibi tarafından öldürürmüştür..
NOT: Devam edecek daha iyisi sakın silmeyin.
1-10).
k

Rabah:
Rabah ko hukuma pamarun nder Sakkwatobe, Naajeeriya. Wurooji mawngol maɓɓe ɗon nder gariiri Rabah.
Ɗum woodi nokkuure 2,433 km2 e yimɓe 149,165 ha nder limti yimɓe 2006.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 842.
Rabah woni wuro wuro Sir Ahmadu Bello premier arandeeje lesdi Naajeeriya. O jeyaa baaba maako bana hooreejo Rabah District nder 1934. Ɗum boo innde Arab (Rabah)

Raamaama:
Rahama ko wuro go'oto nder lesdi Kaduna nder lesdi Nigeria.
Naftirki.
Ɗum ɗon haandi ngam wakkati diga Bauchi Light Railway, je hawti Zaria haa woyla haa Jos haa worgo
Haa wakkatiji ɓaawo, laawol ngol fuɗɗii bee laawol ferel ngal footi e nder laawol feere.

Rahama:
Rahama ko wuro go'oto nder Diiwal Kaduna nder lesdi Nigeria.
Naftirki.
Ɗum ɗon haandi ngam wakkati diga Bauchi Light Railway, je hawti Zaria haa woyla haa Jos haa worgo
Haa wakkatiji ɓaawo, laawol ngol fuɗɗii bee laawol ferel ngal footi e nder laawol feere.

Rimi:
Rimi ko hukuma pamarun nder Diiwal Katsina, lesdi Naajeeriya. Wurooji maare maako ɗon nder gariiri Rimi, ɓadi laawol A9.
Ɗum ina woodi nokkuure 452 km2 e yimɓe 153,744 e nder limti yimɓe 2006.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 822.

Rimin Gado:
Rimin Gado (ko Rafin Gado) ko hukuma pamarun nder Diiwal Kano, Naajeeriya. Wurooji ma'aare maako ɗon nder gariiri Rimin Gado, ko ha woyla 20 km haa hirnaange laamorgo Kano.
Ɗum ina woodi nokkuure 225 km2 e yimɓe 104,790 e nder limti yimɓe 2006.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 701.

Roni:
Roni ko hukuma pamarun nder Diiwal Jigawa, Naajeeriya. Wurooji maare maako ɗon nder gariiri Roni.
Ɗum woodi nokkuure 322 km2 e yimɓe 77,819 e nder limti 2006 .
Koode postaal nokku on woni 705.

Sabon Birni:
Sabon Birni ko hukuma pamarun nder Sakkwatoɓe, Naajeeriya. Wurooji mawngu ɗon haa gariiri Sabon Birni.
Sabon Birni ɗon mari saŋge bee lesdi Niger haa woyla. Ɗum woodi nokkuure 2,354 km2 e yimɓe 207,599 e nder limti yimɓe 2006.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 842.

Sabuwa:
Sabuwa (ko Sabua) ko hukuma pamarun nder Diiwal Katsina, Naajeeriya. Haŋki maako ɗon ha gariiri Sabuwa nder worgo lesdi gariiri sabuwa gariiri, ha nder lesdi Kaduna ha11°10′00′′N 7°07′00′′E / 11.16667°N 7.11667°E / 11.16.667; 7.11667.
Ɗum ina woodi nokkuure 642 km2 e yimɓe 136,050 e nder limti yimɓe 2006.
Koode postaal nokku on woni 830.
Wakilɗo to suudu wakiilo ngam fasoore Faskari/Kankara/Sabuwa woni Mai Nauyi.

Safana:
Safana ko hukuma pamarun nder Diiwal Katsina, Naajeeriya. Hoofde mum woni nder wuro Safana haa fuunaaŋge nokkuure12°24′30′′N 7°24′25′′E / 12.40833°N 7.40694°E / 12. 40833; 7.40694. Luttugal lesdi ndin ɗon haandi bee Diiwal Zamfara. E woodi hooreejo diiwaan ɗiɗo Yariman Katsina e Gatarin Katsina
Koode postaal nokkuure nden woni 821.

Sakaba:
Sakaba ko hukuma pamarun nder Diiwal Kebbi, Naajeeriya. Wurooji mawngol ngol ɗon nder gariiri Dirindaji.
Ɗum woodi nokkuure 1,260 km2 e yimɓe 89,937 ha nder limti yimɓe 2006.
Koode postaal nokkuure nden woni 872.

Saminaka:
Saminaka woni gariiri e wuro (kapital) Lere e hooreejo laamorde Saminaka e nder yimɓe Akurmi nder worgo Kaduna nder lesdi Naijeriya. Koode postaal nokku oo woni 811.

Mohammed Bello El- Rufai:
Mohammed Bello El-Rufai(o daññaama nde hitaande Aliif 1990). Hannko wonii wakiilijo Hukumaa pamarum waylaare Kaduna. Eii lattake ɓiɗɗo mawɗo gorko haa Gomnaajo diiwal Kaduna haano Nasir El-Rufai daada maako hannko wooni Hadiza Ismail El-Rufai,binnɗoowo laatiiɗo wallafiiɗo ɗereewol arannɗewol ngol innɗe"Abundance of Scorpions.

Tum, Naajeeriya:
Tum ko wuro nder Kagoro chiefdom, hukuma pamarun Kaura nder worgo Kaduna State nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Fuuta ɗon naftira bee posta haa Kagoro.

Abala-Ibeme:
Abala-Ibeme ko wuro nder hukuma pamarun Obingwa nder Abia, Naajeeria.

Ndee dowre Abeokuta:
Abeokuta flyover ko flyover nder gariiri Abeokuta, laamorgo Ogun diiwal, worgo hirnaange lesdi Najeeriya. Flyover ɗon haaki ha Ibara roundabout, Abeokuta ha dowla Ogun diiwal senator Ibikunle Amosun. Ɗum woni fuliwol fuɗnaaku nder leydi ndin. 
Ɗum waɗi nder nder nder arande 24 Januuwar 2013. Fuuji ngal fuɗɗii fuɗɗugo ɗon haani ha N1.5bn.

Abia, Naajeeriya:
Abia woni go'o nder nokkuuje ɗuuɗɗe nder lesdi Naajeeriya be innde nde. Ɗo woni nder fuunaaŋge Naajeeriya
Naftirki.
Abia ɗon haandi bee karangal dow fuunaaŋge fuunaaŋgi nder nder laawol ferel lesdi.
Abia ɗon haɓɓita hokkugo limanjo.

Abiak Elibi:
Abiak Elibi ko Oron Village nder Urue-Offong/Oruko hukuma pamarun area nder Akwa Ibom leydi Naajeeriya.
Oron folklore ɗon wi'a dow Abiak Elibi (Run e Hide) gariiri waɗi bana nokkuure ɗo yimɓe ɗofi nder Akpakip Oro to ɓe ɗon nana ɓe ɗon haɓɓana.

Achalla:
6°20′11″N 6°59′07″E﻿ / ﻿6.3365°N 6.9853°E﻿ / 6.3365; 6.9853Achalla is the capital of Awka North, a hukuma pamarun Area in Anambra diiwal, south-central Naajeeriya. It comprises eight villages: Umudiani, Amukabia, Odawa, Umuogbe, Umunagu, Umuozede, Udezu and Amadim.

Adaeba:
Adaeba ko wuro Oron nder Mbo hukuma pamarun nder leydi Akwa Ibom nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Adazi-Nnukwu:
Adazi-Nnukwu ko wuro nder Anaocha hukuma pamarun Area, Anambra State, Naajeeriya.

Afafanyi:
Afafanyi ko wuro nder Abi hukuma pamarun nder leydi Cross River, Naajeeriya.

Afaha Akpan Ekpo:
Afaha Akpan Ekpo ko wuro nder nokkuure laamu Etinan hukuma pamarun nder Akwa Ibom diiwal nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Afaha Atai:
Afaha Atai ko wuro nder nokkuure laamu Eket hukuma pamarun nder Akwa Ibom diiwal. Ɗum hawti bee Afaha Ukwa, Ata Idung Afaha Ekid, Atai Ndon-Afaha Ekit, Ebana e Ede Urua.
Yimɓe Afaha Atai ɓurna fuu ɓe ɗon mari kuuje e ɓe ɗon kuli leɗɗe palmi, yams, cassava e leɗɗe palma. Ɓe ɗon mbi'a Ekid.

Afaha Efiat:
Afaha Efiat ko wuro nder nokkuure laamu Etinan hukuma pamarun nder Akwa Ibom diiwal. Naajeeriya.

Afaha Iman:
Afaha Iman ko wuro nder nokkuure laamu Etinan hukuma pamarun nder Akwa Ibom diiwal, Naajeeriya.

Afaha Okpo Town:
Afaha Okpo Town ko Oron town e nder Urue-Offong/Oruko hukuma pamarun area nder Akwa Ibom diiwal nder Naajeeriya.

Afaha Urua Essien:
Afaha Urua Essien ko wuro nder Etinan, nokkuure hukuma pamarun laamu hukuma pamarun leydi Akwa Ibom diiwal nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Afam, Rivers State:
Afam woni gariiri nder Oyigbo hukuma pamarun Area, Rivers diiwal, Naajeeriya. Maandu Oyigbo ɗon haa Afam.
Yimɓe ɗon mari nokkuure naftoraaki semmbe e nokkuure naftoreeki. Won gooduɗo semmbe gaasuuji 450 megawatti biyeteeɗo Afam IV.

Agarabe:
Agarabe ko wuro nder Abi hukuma pamarun nder leydi Cross River diiwal, Naajeeriya.

Agbadi:
Geography.
Duruwol ɗon haadi 15 km haa woyla fuunaaŋge Makurdi, diiwal laamorgo lesdi, e ɗon haadi 6 km diga maayo Benue.

Minndal Agbaja:
Minji Agbaja woni minji ferru mawndi nder lesdi Naajeeriya nder lesdi Kogi diiwal. Agbaja ɗon marɗo go'o nder ko ɓuri ɗuuɗugo nder lesdi Naajeeriya e nder duniyaaru, bee ko haani ha nder ko haani e tonji miliyaaruuji 1.25 nder ko haɗi e 48% fermetal.

Agu Amede:
Agu Amede woni wuro nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum ɗon jooɗorgo yimɓe ummatoore Eha Amufu, nokkuure laamorde Isi-uzo nder Enugu diiwal.

Ahoada East I (koore nden nden nden):
Ahoada East I Assembly constituency ko constituency nder Rivers diiwal House of Assembly, Naajeeriya.
Nder ɓurugo heɓugo laamu maako, gomnaaru Rivers diiwal, Nyesom Wike hokki kasu Edeoha e suudu darnde UBE, Idoke to yimɓe nder gariiri.

Akabo:
Akabo ko wuro wuro nder nokkuure laamorde hukuma pamarun Ikeduru nder leydi Imo diiwal, Naajeeriya, Afrik hirnaange. Fuule nde ɗon woodi innde nden ɗon haa Nnewi e Oguta, fuu nder Igboland.
Geography.
Akabo ɗon ha nder maayo Okitankwo, haa yaasi kiloometre 10 haa yaasi lesdi lesdi Owerri, amma haa yaasi kilomita 20 bee laawol. Ɗum ɗon mari koore bana Mbieri haa woyla, Iho e Uzoagba haa woyla fuunaaŋge, Amatta haa fuunaaŋre, Orji haa worgo, e Ubomiri haa hirnaaŋge. Gariije mawɗe Akabo ngoni Umunnemoche, Amukachi, Amii, Umuiyi, Umuebem, Umuekpere, Amuzu, e Obiudo.
Nootaaji.
05°33′02″N 007°03′59″E﻿ / ﻿5.55056°N 7.06639°E﻿ / 5.55056; 7.06639

Akai-Ikon:
Akai Ikon ko Oron town nder Oron hukuma pamarun area nder Akwa Ibom diiwal nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Akalovo:
Akalovo ko wuro nder leydi Imo diiwal, nder worgo fuunaaŋgo lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum ɗon haade gariiri Owerri.

Ko ngam:
Akanefore ko wuro nder Abi hukuma pamarun nder leydi Cross River diiwal, Naajeeriya.

Akinima:
Akinima ko wuro nder nokkuure Ahoada West hukuma pamarun Area nder leydi Rivers diiwal, Naajeeriya. Akinima woni laamorgo Ahoda West. Akinima ɗon nder fombina fuɗnaange lesdi Rivers diiwal, ha nder fombinnaare senatorial Rivers West ha nder gariiri Port Harcourt. Akinima woni go'o nder nokkuuje je ɗon hawta bee ndiyamji je ɗon wara nder lesdi Rivers diiwal.

Akpa Nkanua:
Akpa Nkanua ko wuro Effiat nder Mbo, hukuma pamarun nder leydi Akwa Ibom diiwal nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Akpap Okoyong:
Akpap ko Akpap-Okoyong wonde wuro nder Okoyong nder Cross River diiwal, Naajeeriya, e nder hukuma pamarun karallaagal laamu Odukpani.
Akpap ɗon jooɗoto nder wuro maryam Slessor. Duuɗe maako ɓaawo ɗon ɓe wayliti nder suudu huwugo e suudu ndun, nden jooni ɗum ɗo yimɓe yahuɓe.

Akparavuni:
Akparavuni ko ummatoore nder hukuma pamarun Area nokkuure laamu Biase nder leydi Cross River diiwal, Naajeeriya.

Akpawfu:
Akpawfu (ko Akpofu) woni wuro nder Nkanu East hukuma pamarun Area nder Enugu diiwal, Naajeeriya.
Ɗum hawti e ummatooje tati: Obodo Uvuru, Isiagu e Ajame-agu.
Laamu mawɗo Obodo Uvuru woni Igwe Dume Nnamoko (Uvuru 1 Obodo Uvuro) nden laamu mawɗo Ajame-agu woni Igwe Christopher O. Nnamani (Amaeze 1 Ajame-Amaeze).
Ɗum woodi kooki ɗiɗi mawɗi: Iyaba e Etavu. Akpawfu ɗon haandi e Amagunze, Akpugo e Oruku.
Ko ɓuri 90% yimɓe ɗon janngina, 95% ummatooje ɗon woni Kirista'en. Ɓurɗo heɓugo ɗum nder kuuje be'e. Ɗum woodi yimɓe 150,000. 
Akpawfu woodi maayo Ovu je je je je ɓuri mawnude nder Enugu diiwal.
Ɗe leyɗe goɗɗe nder Akpawfu hawti: Offia, Ururo-naka e Ururo-ode.

Akpoha, Cross River State:
Akpoha ko wuro nder Abi nder hukuma pamarun leydi Cross River diiwal, Naajeeriya. Ɗum ɗon caka sahaaji lesdi Ebonyi diiwal e lesdi Cross River diiwal.

Akungba Akoko:
Akungba Akoko, ko noddiraa Akungba, ko wuro nder leydi Ondo diiwal, nder worgo hirnaange lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum woni ummaatoore jaɓɓaade to Adekunle Ajasin University.

Akwa Obio Effiat:
Akwa Obio Effiat ko Effiat Town nder Mbo hukuma pamarun area nder Akwa Ibom diiwal leydi Naajeeriya.

Alizaga:
Alizaga is a small town in Eggon hukuma pamarun Area, Naajeeriya. Which is part of small area in Eggon. the Eggon Post Office is also located in Alizaga Its along the A3 highway north of Lafia, the capital of Nasarawa diiwal.

Amakohia:
Amakohia woni innde gure nayi feere feere feere nder worgo fuunaaŋgo lesdi Naajeeriya, fuu ɗon haade gariiri Owerri e nder nokkuure laamorde Ikeduru.
Fedde fuɗɗam.
Amakohia woni go'o nder gariiri nder gariiri Ikeduru hukuma pamarun nder leydi Imo.

Amegbu Ogwa:
Ogwa woni wuro nder worgo fuunaaŋgo lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum ɗon ha nder Mbaitoli nder leydi Imo diiwal.

Amuro, Naajeeriya:
Amuro woni gariiri nder leydi Kogi diiwal, Naajeeriya.

Amuvi:
Amuvi ko wuro nder lesdi Naijeriya nder Arochukwu hukuma pamarun Area nder Abia diiwal.

Anai Okpo:
Anai Okpo ko Oron ummatoore nder Urue-Offong/Oruko hukuma pamarun area leydi Akwa Ibom diiwal nder lesdi Naajeeriya.
Anai Okpo haɓɓiti e Okpo gooto e Ɓiɗɗo "Ekete Okpo" mo heɓii ardaaku e "Okpe" Oruko caggal nde Ubodung ɓalli.

Anakpa:
Anakpa ko wuro nder Uruan nder hukuma pamarun leydi Akwa Ibom diiwal, Naajeeriya. Yimɓe Ibibio ɗon jooɗii nder wuro Anakpa.

Anyam Efa:
Anyam Efa ko wuro nder hukuma pamarun nokkuure laamu Etinan nder Akwa Ibom diiwal.

Anona, Cross River State:
Anona ko wuro nder Abi hukuma pamarun nder leydi Cross River, Naajeeriya.

Fedde Ara:
Ara Town wondi gariiri nder Nasarawa hukuma pamarun Area nder Nasarawa diiwal nder lesdi Naajeeriya.
Luttudu ɗon ha nder fombina Nasarawa diiwal bee fombina lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi Nigeria (FCT) ɗon haadi bee fombana fombina. Duule ɗon haa km 220 diga laamorgo lesdi, Lafia.
Ara Town ɗon jeyaa e Ara Rock, je ɗon dari yeeso gariiri, e ɗon jeyaa nder yimɓe.

Ariam Ala-Ala:
Ariam Ala-Ala ko ummatoore nder Ikwuano hukuma pamarun Area nder Abia diiwal, Naajeeriya. Ɗum go'o nder nokkuuje 15 nder aryam/Usaka. Ɗum ɗon haandi dow laawol Umuahia-Ikot Ekpene nden ɗon haadi ha km 27 diga laamorgo lesdi, Umuahia.

Aro Ngwa:
Aro Ngwa ko ummatoore Igbo nder Osisioma Ngwa hukuma pamarun Area, nder Abia diiwal nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum woni suburb of Aba, nokkuure jaaynde nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Luttuɗo wuro mawɗo woni Aba nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Asiok Obufa:
Asiok Obufa ko wuro Effiat nder Mbo, nder hukuma pamarun leydi Akwa Ibom diiwal nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Ata Efa:
Ata Efa ko wuro nder nokkuure laamu Etinan hukuma pamarun nder Akwa Ibom diiwal nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Atte Oro:
Atte ko wuro Oron nder Urue-Offong/Oruko nder hukuma pamarun lesdi Akwa Ibom diiwal nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Auta Balefi:
Auta Balefi woni gariiri ɓeydi ɓeydi yeeso nder caka lesdi Naajeeriya. Duule man ɗon ha nder gariiri gariiri Karu nder hukuma pamarun lesdi Nasarawa diiwal Ɗum ɗon haade Abuja, laamorgo lesdi Nigeria nder laamorgo leydi lesdi Nigeria.
Dentalji ɗi ɗon haandi nder gariiri ndu hawti bee, Birgham University Campus (ECWA); Living Faith Church, Goshen City; The Redeemed Christian Church of God, Redemption Camp, Auta gurgu; e feere feere nder ɓamtaare. Distrik ɗo ɗon ɓeyda bee saffugo ngam ɓadi maako to lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi, Abuja.

Aviara:
Aviara woni gariiri Isoko nder Delta diiwal, nder fombina lesdi Naajeeriya.

Awa Ntong:
Awa Ntong woni wuro nder nokkuure laamu Etinan hukuma pamarun nder Akwa Ibom diiwal nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Fulde dictionare:
