Bakana:
Bakana woni gariiri nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum wondi go'o nder gariiri ɓurɗi mawnude nder yimɓe Kalabari, nder Degema hukuma pamarun areander lesdi Rivers diiwal.

Bakara, Nigeria:
Bakara ko nokkuure yimɓe nder hukuma leydi Nasarawa, Naajeeriya. Ɗum ɗon haandi ko ha woyla 24 km (15 ) haa saŋge hirnaange Nasarawa.

Bara, Nigeria:
Bara woni gariiri nder Oyo diiwal nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum ɗon ha hukuma woyla yaasi laawol Oko-Iressa-Aadu. Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɗon jeyaaɓe nder lenyol Yoruba. Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɗon kuugal nder kiila, bee kiila, e ko'e man, e koɗol.

Bariga:
Bariga ko nokkuure e nder leydi Lagos diiwal, Naajeeriya. O ɗon jeyaa nder nokkuure laamu Somolu hukuma pamarun nder lesdi Lagos diiwal, ammaa nder diiwal hukuma pamarun hitaande 2013 ɗum jeyaa nder laamu leydi bana nokkuure ɓamtaare nder lesdi area. Wuro hukuma pamarun mawɗo laamu ɗo hukuma ha 19 Bawala, Bariga. Ko ɗum waɗi ɗum ɗon ɓeyda bee no ɗum ɓeyda. Hannde e hooreejo mum Alabi Kolade David. Ɗum woni nokkuure jaŋde jaŋde ɓurɗe mawnude nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Bethel, Delta:
Bethel woni gariiri Isoko nder Delta diiwal, nder worgo lesdi Naajeeriya.

Bin Yauri:
Bin Yawri woni gariiri nder Diiwal Kebbi, lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum woni ko 8 km haa fuunaaŋge diga maayo Niger, je ɗon hokkata ndiyam nder nder ka'inji e 270 km haa baŋnge worgo Diiwal Sakkwatoɓe.
10°46′56″N 4°48′41″E﻿ / ﻿10.7823°N 4.8113°E﻿ / 10.7823; 4.8113

Borgu Game Reserve:
Borgu Game Reserve ko go'o nder Kainji National Park, nder Borgu hukuma pamarun Area of Niger diiwal e Baruten hukuma
O ɗon haadi dow fuunaaŋge bee maayo Kainji e ɗon ɓadake haa haadi bee Benin haa hirnaange, ɗon hawta bee haadi 397,002 (981,010 ektaare). Ɗum hawti e Zugurma Game Reserve nder hitaande 1975 ngam waɗugo Kainji Lake National Park.

Koolol Pulaar:
Brass Island ko saare nder Niger Delta nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum woni nokku Twon-Brass, hooreejo Brass, lesdi Naajeeriya dow lesdi Bayelsa diiwal.
Ɗum anndiraa ngam ɓorɗe aada yimɓe ma'aɓe ma'a, ɗi ɓorɗe jamanu Edwardiyanko'en koloniyaal Britaniyanko'e. Ferbe ɗon hawta gariiri bee Port Harcourt e Yenagoa.4°19′01″N 6°14′34″E﻿ / ﻿4.3169444°N 6.2427778°E﻿ / 4.3169444; 6.2427778

Buari:
Buari woni gariiri nder leydi Kwara diiwal nder worgo hirnaange lesdi Naajeeriya, yimɓe Yoruba njooɗi. Duule ɗon mari keerol bee Okeya, Egi, Ilala e Esie.

Chokocho:
Chokocho ko ummatoore nder Etche hukuma pamarun Area nder Rivers diiwal, Naajeeriya ɓadi maayo Otamiri. Ɗum woodi yimɓe 18000 jooɗiiɓe.
Chokocho bridge dow Otamiri, je je je je ɗon je ɗon je je ɗon ɓooya wakkati konu lesdi lesdi Naajeeriya, je je ɗon maɓɓina wakkati gomnati Peter Odili.
Mburdi dow laawol Igwuruta - Okehi - Okpalla ina 60m x 11m (4 spans of 15m kala), maaki diga Setraco Naajeeriya Ltd e timmini nder lewru Desemba 2002.
Nder lewru mars 2008, Ephraim Nwuzi diga nokkuure laamu Etche hukuma pamarun area wi'i o ɗon haani timmina "jiɓuɗe ɗe ɓe acci" bana suudu calla nder Chokocho.
Memorandum of Understanding duniyaaru je fuɗɗoretee nder 2005 diga Shell Producing Company hokki ceede ɓamtaare, je ɗon jeji Foundation Etche One Cluster Development. Nder hitaande 2007, yimɓe Chokocho suɓii ngam ɓe halki ndiyam maɓɓe e ɓe haɓɓita semmbe ngam ummaatoore fuu.
Nder lewru August 2009, juulde hokki suuduje je je je je ɗon je ɗon jeje nder ummatoore Chokocho.
Sand sampooje daga cembal maayo Otamiri hakkunde Chokocho e Umuanyaga, Etche hukuma pamarun Area, Rivers diiwal holli wonde 86% sand particles ɗon nder range ideal ngam waɗugo glasi.

Dowla Deghele:
Deghele Community wonde ummatoore nder wuro Itekiri nder laamu Warri. Princess Iye Akengbuwa haɓɓiti Deghele Community ngam ɓiɗɗo maako, Governor Chanomi. Nde Nde Iiri laatii laamiiɗo, o laatii laamu maako Olu Akengbuwa, o laamiiɗo Warri ɓaawo wakkati laamu laamu nder laamu Warri hakkunde 1888 e 1936. Ɗum ɗon haadi nder gariiri laamu Warri South-West hukuma pamarun area nder lesdi Delta diiwal, Naajeeriya.

Daande Senatoore Central Delta:
Delta Centajjo Sannatajjo nder Diiwal Delta, Naajeeriya hawti e 8 hukuma pamarun laamorde je hawti e Ethiope East, Ethiope West, Sapele, Okpe, Ughelli North, Ugheli South, Udu e Uvwie. Maare (laamaade koolaation) nder diiwaan senatorial Delta Central woni Udu. Wakil hooreejo senate 9th, Ovie Omo - Agege o wondi diga senate Delta Central District. O wondi goomu All Progressives Congress.

Daande Senatoore Delta North:
Daarti senatorial Delta North nder Delta diiwal, Naajeeriya, hawti e 9 hukuma pamarun laamorde jeyaaɗe: Aniocha North, Aniocha South, Ika North East, Ika South, Nndokwa East, Nndoka West, Oshimili South, Oshimilli North e Ukwuani. Wakilol ngal Delta North woni Peter Nwaoboshi daga People's Democratic Party, PDP.

Daande Senatoore Delta South:
Delta South Senatorial District nder Delta diiwal, Naajeeriya, hawti e 8 hukuma pamarun laamorde je ɗon hawta e Bomadi, Burutu, Isoko North, Isoko South, Patani, Warri North, Warri South e Warri South West.  Maare (maare collation) Delta South woni Isoko South hukuma pamarun. Wakilɗo jooni nder senatorial Delta South District woni James Manager diga People's Democratic Party, PDP.

Ebana (ko wuro):
Ebana woni wuro nder nokkuure laamu Eket hukuma pamarun area nder Akwa Ibom. Ɗum go'o nder gure ɗe ɗon jeyaa e Afaha Clan nder Eket.
Ɗemngal maɓɓe woni ɗemngal Ekid.

Ebijakara:
Ebijakara ko komin e nder Abi hukuma pamarun area nder leydi Cross River diiwal,Naajeeriya.
Taariiha.
Ebijakara woni go'o nder gariiri jeeɗiɗi fuɗɗiiɗi ɗi ɗi ɗi ɗon jeyaa ummaatoore Bahumono nden ɓe ƴetti diga Hotumusa bee ummaatooreeji Bahumono goɗɗi.
Wardi ummaatooje.
Woni ha nder nokkuure nden, ha nder konu e ha nder ummaatoore Ebom.

Ede-Oballa:
Ede-Oballa woni nokkuure nder wuro Nsukka hukuma ɗo woni worgo wuro mawɗo. 
Ede-Oballa ɗon hawta e ummaatooje goɗɗe tati, Ede-Ukwu, Ede-Enu e Owerre Ede-Obala e laamiiɓe maɓɓe je ɗon mari aada. Kala nder ummaatooje woodi gure nden nder buri gariire ɗon laamugo hooreejo gariire biyeteeɗo Onyishi. Ede-Oballa ɗon ha nder gariiri lesdi Nsukka hukuma pamarun area. Duule ɗon haɓɓii e Opi (ndaare archaeological site), Eha-alumona, Lejja e Nru Nsukka.

Edebuk:
Edebuk ko wuro nder nokkuure laamu Eket hukuma pamarun area nder Akwa Ibom diiwal. Ɗum wondi go'o nder gure ɗe "Afaha "Clan"" nder Eket.
Ɗemngal maɓɓe woni ɗemngal Ekid.

Edem Ekpat:
Edem Ekpat ko wuro nder nokkuure laamu Etinan hukuma pamarun area nder Akwa Ibom diiwal nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Edikor Eyiba:
Edikor Eyiba ko Oron Village nder Udung Uko hukuma pamarun nder leydi Akwa Ibom diiwal nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Edikorbiosio:
Edikorbiosio ko Oron Village nder Udung Uko hukuma pamarun area nokkuure laamu leydi Akwa Ibom diiwal nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Edikor Eyokpu:
Edikor Eyokpu ko wuro Oron nder udung Uko hukuma pamarun area nder leydi Akwa Ibom diiwal nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Edok:
Edok ko wuro Oron nder Urue-Offong/Oruko hukuma pamarun area nder lesdi Akwa Ibom diiwal nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Effiat Mbioto:
Effiat Mbioto ko wuro nder nokkuure laamu Etinan hukuma pamarun area nder Akwa Ibom diiwal.

Egbizum:
Egbizum ko wuro nder Abi hukuma pamarun area nder leydi Cross River, Naajeeriya.

Egini:
Egini woni gariiri nder Udu hukuma pamarun area LGA nder lesdi Delta diiwal, Naajeeriya ɓadi gariiri Warri.

Ejule:
Ejule woni gariiri nder leydi Kogi diiwal nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Ekiebong:
Ekiebong ko wuro Oron hukuma nder mbo hukuma pamarun area nder leydi Akwa Ibom diiwal nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Ekim:
Ekim woni Oron Community nder udung Uko hukuma pamarun area nder Akwa Ibom diiwal nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Ekim-Enen:
Ekim-Enen ko wuro nder Uruan hukuma pamarun area nder leydi Akwa Ibom diiwal Naajeeriya. Yimɓe Ibibio ɗon jooɗii nder gariiri Ekim-Enen.

Ekom, Etinan:
Ekom woni wuro nder nokkuure laamu Etinan hukuma pamarun area nder Akwa Ibom diiwal.

Ekpene Ibia:
Ekpene Ibia ko wuro nder Uruan hukuma pamarun area nder leydi Akwa Ibom diiwal, Naajeeriya. Yimɓe Ibibio'en ɗon jooɗoto nder gariiri Ekpene Ibia.

Ekpene Obom:
Ekpene Obom woni wuro nder Etinan hukuma pamarun area nder Akwa Ibom diiwal.

Ekpene Ukim:
Ekpene Ukim ko wuro nder Uruan nder leydi Akwa Ibom diiwal, Naajeeriya. Yimɓe Ibibio ɗon jooɗoto nder gariiri Ekpene Ukim.

Ekpene Ukpa:
Ekpene Ukpa ko wuro nder nokkuure laamu Eket hukuma pamarun area nder Akwa Ibom diiwal.
Yimɓe Ekpene Ukpa bana yimɓe Ikot Ebiyan ɗon hawta bee lamndugo e lamndugo palmi, yams, kassava e palmi. Ɓe ɗon mbi'a Ekid.

Elei:
Elei ko wuro Oron nder Urue-Offong/Oruko hukuma pamarun area nder lesdi Akwa Ibom diiwal nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Eman Ikot Ebo:
Eman Ikot Ebo ko wuro nder Uruan hukuma pamarun area nder leydi Akwa Ibom diiwal, Naajeeriya. Yimɓe Ibibio ɗon jooɗoto nder wuro Eman Ukpa.

Eman Ukpa:
Eman Ukpa ko wuro nder Uruan hukuma pamarun area nder leydi Akwa Ibom diiwal, Naajeeriya, yimɓe Ibibio njooɗi.

Eman, Akwa Ibom:
Eman ko wuro nder Uruan nder leydi Akwa Ibom diiwal, Naajeeriya. Yimɓe Ibibio ɗon jooɗii nder wuro Eman.

Enino:
Enino woni wuro Oron nder udung Uko hukuma pamarun area nder leydi Akwa Ibom diiwal nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Eniongo:
Eniongo ko ummatoore Oron nder udung Uko hukuma pamarun area nder leydi Akwa Ibom diiwal nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Eno-Evong:
Eno-Evong woni wuro nder Abi hukuma pamarun area nder leydi Cross River diiwal, Naajeeriya.

Ensuokwe:
Ensuokwe ko wuro nder Abi hukuma pamarun area nder leydi Cross River diiwal, Naajeeriya.

Enugwema:
Enugwema ko wuro nder Abi hukuma pamarun area nder leydi Cross River diiwal, Naajeeriya.

Enwang:
Enwaang woni Oron Town e laamorgo Mbo hukuuma pamara ka diiwal Akwa Ibom nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Enwetiti:
Enwetiti woni wuro nder Abi hukuma pamarun area nder leydi Cross River diiwal, Naajeeriya.

Epenti:
Epenti ko wuro nder Abi hukuma pamarun area nder leydi Cross River diiwal, Naajeeriya.

Ko e nder:
Ere Ijesa wooni gariiri nder hukuma pamaro Oride nder Diiwal Osun, lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum ɗon haadi e mayre 286 (461km) haa sahaa hiirnaange Abuja, laamorgo leddi Naajeeriya.
Won laabi 17 nder nokkuure Ere Ijesa. Akure Airport (IATA: AKR) ɗon haa yaasi maayo maayo, e nder gariiri man.

Julde jummare:
Julɗe Jummare unjulɗe keywuɗe adow juuldow huu too deena julowwohu deyduun juulataa seetiree zuhr ayalde jummaree haa too rakaa jeeɗiɗi harhadde awowde khutbah imameejow koɗuun huɗɗa kabbara artuwɗun

Shehu Muhammad gibrima:
MUHAMMAD GIBRIMA zulmaarife dayyadow yaldee 19 aleyru bowtal hiitande Alif (1902) too nder nguru hukumafamarun too aleydi Yobe wayla huunaNaajeeriya
laayal.
kanuri badagireejow nder deena musuluci

Lamɗam:

Jukun:
Jukun Jawleeru lasngol haa nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Jukun un yimmɓe laatiiɓe Jottorii haa nder diiwe kamani ba taraba,benuwe filaato [[Aadamaawa e gonnde fuu.

Saidu Ahmad Alkali:
Saidu Ahmad Alkali latama goddo siyasa,en lysdi Diiwal Naajeriya. O subama senator gada gombe waila har diiwali Gombe Naajeeriya.

Ibrahim talba:
Alhaji Ibrahim talba oun dayyama hiitadde silo (11_1946) beɗɗo siyasa,en lysidi Naajeeriya owmaudo kuwuuɗo gwanatii too dimma maudow balliituwo gwamnatii taaraya,en a fadaa ardujoo lysde Naajeeriya mootefi joodorgal gwaana deetati alisde Diiwal Yobe hiitadde gada duubi 2007'2015_2019 Alis jagurgol people sulbe jama,are part(PDP)

Janngirde Caleb:
Janngirde Calebun janngirde jottoriiɗe hoore mu'un alkanoo haa nder Imota, diiwal lagos, Naajeeriya. Ɗum tiggiiɗe nder hitaande Aliif 2007.

Murtala Nyako:

Janngirde Gollital akawe Torkula:
Janngirde Gollital akawe Torkula un janngirde (ATP) Gollital nder makurdi kapital diiwal Benue ,caka hawtirde Naajeeriya. Ɗum warri iga haa nde janngirde dun anndal e bawgal jannde,ATCAPS,nde ɓesdanaa mawngu haa janngirde Gollital les ardungal jamunnde tabbitiniiɗe diiwal Benue nder haaram ru 2020.
Nder siwtoraanɗu 2021, Hukumaa diiwal Benue ekkitaaki fuu jannginooɓe e na jannginooɓe dum mbe janngirde nden.

lesde bagdad iran diina muslince dareeka qaderiya== HIIMOƁE==

Aliko dongote:

E wiiki haa nde hooreejo janngirde nden simon Nwakacha, janngirde nden timminii siryaaki hawti e fuɗdirii haa fannuuji ɗiɗii inɗee maaji;; nde fannu yimmɓe e kuudal tayaaka nden kadi e fannu Gollital e tayaaka."

Janngirde Gregory:
Janngirde Gregory (GUU) Um jottoriiɗe nder Uturu, Diiwal Abia nder Naajeeriya. Ɗum un a janngirde jottoriiɗe hoore Mun haa wii'aa private innɗe ɓaawo Rope Gregory I.ballitoowo ɗun mɓe janngirde nden un farfeesaajo Augustine A Uwakwe Lakol (koleejiwal) janngirde Gregory (GUU) woodi kamani janngule fannuuji jowee tati kannje ngadda baa niihii:

Usman Bello Kumo:
Usmaanu Belloo Kuumo woni Jamɗiyarewoɓe koofo House of Representatives tawi ɗiiwaakoo Akko cikin guddu Gombe. Ƴe a ɗeeje kalaɓugol ngol Law to banaandi Bayero, Kano. Ƴe maa masanɗaaji ngol Maajiraama Boƴƴe to baɗɗo Poliis ngol, tee jogiiɗo ko caɗeele maa masanɗaaji mum to ngon-ayɗo Akko. A mbaɗtaaki ko e Kumo, nooltuuro ngon-ayɗo Akko. Yamirɗo ngon-ayɗo APC laawol ngol Maajiraama Boƴƴe, mum sabbu ndeeɓinde 2023 to ngon-ayɗo. Bello Kumo nde maa kamori mum to nasanɗaaji 10ndu.
Wonande Party.
Usman Bello Kumo nde maa kohoraaɗo ngon-ayɗo All Progressives Congress, tawi ɗuum ngon-ayɗo sabbu am nder ndeeɓinde kominotaaji ngon-ayɗo APC to naasɗo Maajiraama Boƴƴe e ngon-ayɗo Gombe, o haalii woni kohorataaki mum e sabbu ndeeɓinde 2023.

Abubakar imam:
Alhaji Abubakar imam (1911_1981) too wuuro kagara (o.b.e c.o.n.i.l.d) moodebbo gooniijjo wiiduugo hawsaree haa to lyside wooyla Naajeeriya oo wiindee ɗiirewol ɓiiyagal Magana jare too ndyam bagajja moolatake gooniijjo wiiɗogo haa too duniiyaru wiindoɓe ɗemle hawsare lyside afrik.

Rabat:
Rabat un Laamorɗe Lysdi marookko caggal woyla Afrik gelle ngonnɗe haa lardu Rabat-sale`-ke`nitra,e lesdi marookko kadi nden kapital leydi marookko les lardu sale`-ke`nitra. nde daw caggal hisaago jimlawal ɗumngu 2014,e woodi yimmɓe kamani adadu miliyannji nayi e teemeeje ujuneeji cappanɗe diɗi e teemeeje jowee ɗiɗi e cappanɗe jowi a(577827) nɗer rabat. Ɗum ñyiiɓii mahol gelle Rabat e ƙarniwal ngal jowee go'o ɓaawo dañnyeeki annabiijo Allah isah (A.S).

Malaika jibrilu:
Mala,ika jibrilu a wowdi Malaika jibrilu annaboween Allahu huu e,andeemu beemeɗi yegwomow aseega taaguw hakwoke malaikaju gaddowwo leelan jowmeerawo too annaboween

Ibn taymiyyah:
Ibn taymiyyah taqiad din ahmad ɓeɗɗo taymiyyah oo larabankeju mariiɗo hiitade duubi 1263 akooyare 1328 andiiraɗo indee beɗɗo taymiyyah owwodi jiytol adow takkube sunnah theologian jurisconsalt logician arduuju doow maube doon hanbaliya too jurisprudence haa too imam ahmad lbn hanbal taymiyyah laatiike takkudow datal qadiriyya sufi order haa to ɗatal abdul qadir Jelani.

Plato:
Plato lateeɗo moodibbo anduɗow falsafa leydi girka owmaarake hiitande(427bc) kuwyaree (348bc) plato adiskuɗow marɗow wiirbe(50)mutage jangirde academy plato moodibow socrates modibbo aristotle taguuɗow jangirde lyceum plato ouwiiɗe jeeyte ɗuuɗi adow falsafa ko andube bulwaata haa hadde to duneeyaru huu too falsafa girka

Banja Arannɗe:
Banja Arannɗe

Muhammadu Abali Ibn Muhammadu Idrissa:
muhammadu Abali Ibn Muhammadu Idrissa Alhaji Muhammadu Abali Ibn Muhammadu Idrissa ( O daññaama 14 lewru suumaye mawɓe 1956) ɗun Lamminiimo lamido sappo e tatiijo ko Kadi lamiɗi finnataawa,nde Laamorde aFika nder ñalde 16 nde lewru haaram sakitiiɗu 2009. Hoore Laamorde nde Gelle potiskum,diiwal Yobe,Naajeeriya. Lamido (ko moi nder wolde ɗemngal wuro) hannko wonii hooreejo yimmɓe [Bole.
Quick Facts finnde, Arannɗe ...
Finnde Duuɓi.
Ɗun daññyi Muhammad Abali eii Gelle potiskum nde ñalde 14 lewru suumaye mawɓe 1956,Ɓiɗɗo mawɗo mo Alhaji Abali Ibn Muhammad, Lamido sappo e ɗidijo 12. O halartaake janngirde Kaduna Capital school (1963-1969), Barewa College, Zariya(1970-1974) e Kadi Dowel Tutors college haa Lesdi England (1975-1977). O dillii North Staffordshire polytechnic (1977-1770) o heebii digiriiwal aranndewal e nder himmari jamanu. Diga ɗon O halartaake janngirde City University London inaare e O heeɓi digiriiwal ɗiɗiiwal haa fannu himmari jonnde hakkude yimmɓe nder (1983). Nde O wartii Naajeeriya, Muhammadu Abali o huuwi ɗum wakkatii seɗɗa e bankiwal Owena Kano,e jonnɗe timminnɗo jannɗe mun nde digirii. Dega ɗoon sai O nastii hukuma taadungal ngal Naajeeriya, inaare e O huuwi Guttulii feere- feere haa kawtuuɗe banoo operations and counter Espionage units,jaamiiji deenal e ñyurnotooɗe assirii e hoore Laamorde haa Lagos. O jippakee dega Hukumaa taadungal ngal diiwal nder lewru siwtoraanɗu (1991) , O tiggi kamfaniiwal kebanoowal kayaaji kuugal gaddi nasabuu e ko nooni deenal dun hakkilanngo lesdi. O laatake mawɗo jaami'iijo taadungal ngal Hukumaa piirooje Les ndun Naajeeriya dega lahiyaaru 1998 haa yahrii siwtoraanɗu 2007, nɗen kadi ko'odineetaajo kawral deenal total/Elf denntal Abuja.
Lamido.
Ɗum hokkorii Muhammad Abali jonnde yeriima moo Fika eii ɗumngu 2002,kadi e ñalde 28 iga lewru haaram ɗiɗaabru 2009 ɗum Lamminiimo ajiyaajo(hakimin) potiskum. Abali laatake lamido ronii Baaba mun nder lewru haaram sakitiiɗu ndu 2009 ɓaawo Gomnaajo diiwal Yobe,Ibrahim Geidam suɓoy innɗe maako degal hisaare tefooɓe tatoo mbe Laamorde fika kollinii ngiiɗii

Lamido:

Yimmɓe:

Teheran:
Tehran eii capital leydi Iran.

Muhammad Idris Malagi:
Muhammad Idris Malagi o janja Malagi eriminmo nylde 2 lewru maris mongou 1966 eii Lysidi siyasa,en Naajeeriya, jornii nder ministajjo shugabajjo Bola Ahmed Tinubu edon diidii jaridajjo Blueprint toe king Broadcasting doon Abuja Naajeeriya, Malagi eii ardiido kungiyajjo bidi,on jarida gelle Naajeeriya.

Dauda Kahutu Rarara:
Dauda Kahutu Rarara andeeraɗow rarara dayyaɗow leydi katsina bawɗow winndetande yeemugow siyasa haa too Naajeeriya dauda kahutu owndeskaaɗow masanaatar Kanwood gonneejow too yeemugow jama,iyyajee (APC) All Progressive Congress dow shuwbol maahgal haa too Naajeeriya a hiitande (2015) haa too giimol jagarɗow muhammadu Buhari agwamnan Diiwal kastina Aminu Bello Masari awowde yiimtugol maakow doggobe dogga buhari wartee jahatace balde daree dallatu kano ta gandujace ubban abba zama daram.

Mashhad:
Mashhad ko sare e der ledi Iran. ko sare nimere ɓurde mawnude e der ledi Iran. ko sere dinayankore. ko ɗon Imam Reza e Harun Rashid surra.

Tabriiz:
Tabriiz kosare e der Iran.

Ghom:
Ghom ko sare e nder Iran. nden sare ko sare dinayankore mawnde.

Diiwol Nukiliya:
Nukiliya bowle adow nukiliya un jiennayeere too arduuen duuniyaru 
a hayiimbe tookubehu adeer duuɓe(100)shalidi nukiliya wadde reluugo futgo adow lisde duuniiyaru haa too lisde duuniiyaru ashalu heeggo nukiliya gamma kuulow adiiwol nukiliya awaada sabbe atom alisde injiniyajo lio szilard anduuɗow kimiyya liimgal ɓee lisde hungery ooyehi landan ayalde 12 lewru satumba (1933) asaere deen moyuumi hiitago taagugo nukiliya.

Diiwol dragon:
Dragon un alkuwjiije gwuɗun duun joumeerawo taagge aɓawwo liyde too duɓe dubu 19 jowtiide haa too duuneeyaru own taggwe naadmɗow artuuɗow adam too dube dubu (10000) jowtiide abowwo Leydi

Diiwol Mahatma gandhi:
Mahatma Gandhi dayyaɗow yaldee ɗiɗi lewruu oktoba (1869) ɗeemma mahandas karamchand gandhi aporbadar haa too jiihar gujarat taagujo mooɗuwwaɗatta deerɗe yaako lisde india dayyube maako gaaɗanimuu wooro lis duube 13 too biirajoo giiyaduw kasturba ɓeedayii biikoy nayuwl oo jaagi kuugal lawya a landon haakuude duuɓe (1888) haa too 1915 a hiitaade 1922 mowlataaki mawɗuu jigo jamiyyar (ncp) oo nowdee salagoo takkuki mulki birtaniya laamutobee india adeer jeytuugo kowwaɗee birtaniya naggemuu a hiitaade (1930) oo ardaake zangazanga gaaɗuujow lakabi too salt march too ahmedabad kowwaɗe oo nagga a hiitadee (1942) onuude salaahgu kuugal too lisde india huu gaammalahguke nasara,an birtaniya too lisde india kowwaɗee beenah giimu hiitadee (1944) india heebeeti bawde a hiitadee (1947) sae duun faɗɗee mahatma ghandi faɗɗuw ke toosku yaldee (30) too leewru janairu hiitadee (1948) yimɓee miliyan didi jeehitoo janaiza mawkoo

Ceerno nguurndam lesdi Nigeria:
Ceerno nguurndam lesdi Nigeria ɗon laaɓɓa diga ɓeydaaki temperatuure, feerootiral ndiyam (ɗam ɓeydaago nder nokkuuje coorde e ɓeydaare nder nokkuuje nder lesdi). Ɗum ɗon holla e ɗam e ɗam, fuɗɗugo ladde, ɓeydagol ndiyamji, ɓeydaaki, ɓeydi, ɓeydiiji, yiite, ɓeydaaji leydi, ɓeydugo leydi, haalaaji sahaaji ɓurɗi ɓeydaago e majjugo biodiversity. Ɗu'um fuu ɗon ɗon ɗon walli bee halleende yimɓe e dabbaaji e dun dun dun dunji nder lesdi Nigeria. Ngam, dow nokkuure, nokkuuje ɗon mari waylaaki nguleeki nguleeki bee ɓeydagol masin nder wakkatiji je ɗon mari ndiyam, nden ngam saa'iji je ɗon ɗon mari ndiyam ɗon walli ngam hokki ɗum ha nder wakkatiji ɗi mari ndiyam. Kuugal baylaaku nguuri duniyaaru waɗi Dowlaaku Meteoroloji duniyaaru, nder jaɓde 40th Executive Council 1988, ngam tiggude jaɓde baylaaku anndal ngal wi'etee International Panel on Climate Change (IPCC). IPCC 2007 Report Assessment Report (AR4) yi'i wonde woodi hallude mawnde fuɗɗuki nguleeki nguleeki duuniyaaru haani hakkilantaaki. Wuroore nden hawti e warming duniyaaru hannde to kuuɗe manjum. Luttudu ɗon ɓadii haa dabare ngam o ɗon hawta bee haɗiiji babal babal babal babal hawtaare e ndiyam, ɓiiɓuki duniyaaru, ɓeydaago ozone, haɗiiji ɓeydaaki ngam naawdi e ko feere feere feere feere, e halki dabbaaji ladde feere feere feere. 
Ɓeydaaki ha nder lesdi Nigeria haandi ha nder nguurndam nguurndama ha nder lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi ndi, waɗi haandi haandi ha haandi ha lesdi, haandi haadi haandi haɗi haandi haade haandi ha leydi. Bana go'o nder lesdi sappo ɓurɗe ɓurna ɓurna ɓurɗe haandi ngam nyau nyau nyau nyau, lesdi Nigeria ɗon maaro ɓesngu nyau nyau nyau ndu. Ha 2009, ko ɓuri 6,000 doolaaji ɓenni, waɗi halkere nder nder nder nderle nderle nder lesdi. 
Won be warugoji ɗuuɗɗi ɗi ɗon hokkata daliila naftaaki dow hawtaade fuɗɗaaji baylitol nguleeki nguleeki nder lesdi Nigeria haa jooni. Fuu ɗuuɗal defte ɗon holla dow waylaago nyau nyau ndu fuu, nden ɗu'um ɗon wallata ngam hokki foonduki ngam hujjaaji ɗi ɗon woodi. Ammaa, ko ɓuri haani, ɗum haani hokki jaŋde to jaŋde, ɓurna fuu to jaŋdi nder nokkuuje feere feere, to jaŋdaare mawnde ɗon waɗaako. Wonde ɓurɗe haani tawtoreede dow laaɓtingo e jaɓugo nder defte nder defte, ɗe ɗon jeyaa nder kuugal habaru, haa naa dow misaaluji ko ɗum waɗii. 
Ɗu'um haala ɓurɗo ɓeydaade ngam haani waɗugo kuuɗe ɓurɗe ɓeydaago ngam huwtore Nigeria ha haako nyaamdu ha nder hitaande fuu ngam nyaamdu yimɓe ɓe ɓeyda. Ha haani, ha haani haani ha haani dow haani haɗi ha haaki ha haaki dow haaki haaki ha nyau ha haaki, ha haaki e haaki ha haa haaki ha, ha ha haani haa haaki haa haaki, haa haaki e haa haaki hakki ha haaki haa haa haaki. 
Caluɗe ɗe nyau nyau nyau nyau ndu hawti e lesdi ndi fuu footi footi. Ɗu'um waɗi ngam laabi ndiyamji ɗi: ndiyamji ɗuuɗi nder fageeje nder worgo fuunaaŋge e worgo hirnaŋge e lowre nder fageere fuunaaŋgo. Ɗee laabi ina waawi waddugo ɓesngu, ladde e ɗam e woyla e woyla; ɓesngu e ndiyam nder worgo e nder nokkuuje goɗɗe, jaayɗe haɓɓuki nguleeki nguleeki nafoore woni haala warugo PET bottles musamman nder nokkuure. naftora polyethylene terephthalate anndiraa kadi PET ko PETE (a kareeji resin plastiiki huutore ngam waɗugo kareeji pakki bana boɗɗi e boɗɗi nyaamdu) ɗon ɓeyda ɓeyda fahin nder mawɓe, ngam ɓe naftora bee boɗɗi PET ngam pakki limɗe maɓɓe ngam ɗum (PET) je kareji maral haani be sembe, thermostability e transparentness. Nigeria ɗon woodi siyaasaji je ɗon haandi ngam jejjitugo ɓandu pulastik; kuuɗe feere feere hawti bee jejeji e kirseteeji je je je je ɗon hokki ngam jejjitaago dabareji je jeji pulastik nder lesdi fuu ɗon je ɗon jeje ngam jejeje e jejejejeji siyasa diga laamu. 
Fedde gasji greenhouse.
Nder hitaande 2018, haɓɓol lesdi Nigeria haɓɓol gasji greenhouse fuutaama haɓɓol ko tonniji metric 336 ton carbon dioxide equivalent (MtCO2e), ko ɓuri 1 nder 100 haɓɓol duniyaaru.: 1 Ɗu holli ɗum haɓɓol yimɓe haɓɓol hitaande haɓɓol 2 ton, ha haɓɓol haɓɓol duuniyaaru haɓɓol 6 ton. Ɗee gaasji greenhouse, ɓurna fuu carbon dioxide e methane ɗon ɓurna fu diga naftoraaki e gaas, waylude naftoraaki leydi, woodani, lamɓe e fijirde fuɗɗiiji. Jaŋde ɗon jeyaa e naftoraaku, ngam maajum ɗum footi footi waɗugo footi footaago fuɗugo fuɗugo to 2060. 
Kuɗol dow nokkuure natural.
Ɓuurnde e wakkati.
Ceerno to nokkuure
Nigeria ina woodi clima tropical bee sahaaji ɗiɗi: (moƴƴe e mbaɗte). Duniyaaji nder lesdi, ɓurɗum nder lesdi fuunaaŋge, ɗon huutoroo ɓurɗe ɓeydaago nder temperatuuje bana yeeso fuɗɗam ndiyam, temperatuuje ɗon ɓeyda haa 44 °C haa ɗon maaki haa 6 °C hakkunde lewru deemaare e lewru feebari. Ha Maiduguri, temperatuure ɓurɗe fuu yaawde ɓeydaade haa 38 °C nder lewru Aprilu e Maayi, nden nder wakkati feere ɗon, je ɗon wara jemma.
Misaalu, Lagos, ko ɓuri heewde ko 31 °C e lowre ko 23 °C nder lewru Janaare e 28 °C e 23 °C ha lewru Juun. Fuule fuunaaŋge fuunaaŋgo ɓurɗe haade koonde maayo bana Bonny Island (go fune haa Port Harcourt), fuunaaŋgi Calabar ɗon heɓugo ɗuuɗal ɓurɗe saɗugo caka caka caka e nder millimitaare 4,000.
Ceerno to nokkuure.
Ceerno nguurndam lesdi Nigeria ɗon wayla nokkuuje nyau. Daande steppe nder woyla ɗon ɓeyda haa worgo, nden daande tropical monsoon nder worgo ɗon ɓeydi haa woyla, ɗon jeyta woyla tropical rainforest.
Ɓeydaaki to humondiral.
Kuugal ɓeydaaki temperatuure ɗon ɓeyda ngam yimɓe, ɓurɓe wonugo nder ummaatooje je ɗon mari dabareji gas flare. Ɓeydaaki masin ɗon waɗi ɓalli ɓalli, e feere feere, e ɗon walli ɓesngu nyaamdu. Footiji nyaamdu, ɓesngu e ɓandu, e ɓesngu seeduuji fuu ɗon hawta bee temperatuure leydi. Ɓuuruji ɓurɗi ɓeydaaki ɓesngu, fotosynthesis, e ɓesngu ngam ɗi ɓeydaayi ɓesngu.
Ecosystems.
ecosystem ko hawti e hawti e tageefooji ngu, hawti maɓɓe e hawti maɓɓe. Ɗum hawti e ɗiɗo fuu biotiki (jo ɗon woodi) e abiotiki (ji ɗon walaa) ɗi ɗon woodi, ɗi ɗon huutora bana sistemji ɗi ɗi ɗi ɗije feere feere ɗon hawta bee maɓɓe e nder nokkuuje maɓɓe. Ecosystems waawaa waylitde e laabi, diga microhabitats to biomes mawɗe bana woodɗe, maayooji, e geese.
Konngol ɗemɗe nguurndam nguurndama ko ardiiɗo anndal ɗemɗe ɓaleeje leydi Britaniya Arthur Tansley nder hitaande 1935, mo holli ɗum "ngare fuu. hawti naa' tan ko tageefooji ɓaleeje, ammaa kadi ko ɓaleeje ɓaleeje fuu ɗe njogii ko nodda en nokkuure". Ɗuum holli ko nafata jaɓɓude tageefooji nguumiiɗi e nokkuuje maɓɓe nder jannguki ɗemɗe nguumiiɗe.
Ecosystems ɗon holla laawol semmbe e nder nder nder nder ko nafata. Nguurndam naato nder ɗemngal nguurndam nder laawol tagdi, bana leɗɗe malla alge, ɗi naatoyi yiite naange e waylita ɗum nder semmbe kemikal nder fotosinteesi. Ɗuum semmbe ɗon jeya haa ɓurɗe ɓeydaago nder trophic nder wakkati tageefooji nyaamda bee maɓɓe, e taƴugo kuuje nyaamdu e kuuje nyaamu.
Ecosystems ɗon ɗon ɓeyda ngam ɓeydaago tagdi. Fooli, bana carbon, nitrogen, e phosphorus, ko nafata ngam ɓesngu e halki tageefooji. Ɗee elementi'en ɗon recycle nder ɗemngal nguurndam nder laawol laabi feere feere bana hallude, jaɓugo tagdi e leɗɗe, e nyaamugo dabbaaji. Ɗuum recycle tagdi hokki tagdi fuɗuki tagdi ngam tageefooji nder ecosystem.
Ecosystems ɗon hokkata kuugalji njamuji ɗuuɗɗi ɗi nafata ngam ɓeydaaki duniyaaru e ummaatoore yimɓe. Misaal, woodje ɗon huutora no carbon sinks, ɗon ɗaɓɓita e ɗon hoola ɗuuɗal carbon dioxide, gaasji ɓesnguɗi ɗi ɗon wallita waylaaki. Lindiji mari nguurndam mawndi nder laaɓugo ndiyam e halla ndiyam. Coral reefs ɗon hokkata goɗɗum nder goɗɗe dabareeji nder maayo e ɗon huutora bana ko'e cembiɗɗi ngam haɓugo bee duufe.
Ecosystems ɗon hawta be haɗiiji ɗuuɗɗi ngam kuuɗe yimɓe, bana habbugo leɗɗe, halleende, jeje baylaade, e halleende habitat (Millennium Ecosystem Assessment, 2005). Ɗee halluɓe ina waawi hallude dabareeji ɓeydi-ɓeydi ɗi ɗimuuji ɗimuuji, ngam waɗugo ɗi ɗi ɗi ɗi maayi, ɗi ɗi ɗi njokki ɗuuɗal bayoloji, ɗi ɗi njogki kuuɗe ɗimuuji.
Ngam faamugo e jaɓugo ɗemɗe nguurndam, anndal anndal naftira laabi feere feere, hawti e modelol ɗemɗe, hakkilantaaku nokku, e foondooji. Ɗi'e kuuje mbinnditaaki anndinooɓe anndal hawtuki hakkunde tageefooji, anndinki kuuje ɓurɗe huutoreeɗe e kiɗol, e jaɓugo no kuugal yimɓe huutore dow kuuje. Fuuɗugo kuugal jaɓɓugo ɗemɗe nguurndam nguurndama ngam semmbinaade kuuɗe je ɗon mari nguurndame ngam wallugo ko woni e huutoreeji nguurndamu nguurndem.

Baabaawooji:
Ababene ko wuro wuro nɗer wuro Obubra nɗer leydi Kuros Riba, Naajeeriya.

Kolori dam:
Kolori Dam ɗon nder Sokoto State nder lesdi Nigeria. Ɗum timmini nder 1978 nden nder hitaande 1981 nden, ndiyam ndiyam maako boo heewi. Ɗum woni ko'e ndiyam mawɗo dow maayo Sokoto, ko'e nder maayo Rima, ko'o hokkata ndiyam Niger. ndiyam diga dam ɗon hokkata kolori irrigation project. 
Dam ina woodi limgal 450 liyaar mita kubik, e daande ndiyam ɓesngu huutoraaki haare 8,000 ha, ɓesngu 19 km ( mi) dow maayo. 
Garnude dam waɗi remooɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɓe ɓe ɓe mbaɗata hay leydi feere malla ceede jawdi. Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe maayi nder ngam ɓe maayi ko ɓe nguurndam. Landu ndu waɗi anndude bana misaalu kulol ɓamtaare.
Fiko.
Sokoto River ɗon ƴiwo nder lesdi Sudan Savannah nder lesdi Nigeria. Wurooji ɗi anndaa ko anndaa, diga 500 mm haa 1,300 mm hitaande nder wakkati June haa Septemba. Ka yeeso haɓɓugo dam, yimɓe 50,000 nder nder ndiyam Sokoto fuɗɗiima haɓɓugo, ɓe ɗon mari kuugal fuɗnaaki, ɓe ɗon ɓeya arsaa e sorghum nder sahaa fuɗnaaku, e ɓe ɗon ɓeyi ko'e leɗɗe bana so'a, gargoor e tamata nder sahaa huutore. Lamuɓe ɗuuɗɓe naftiri e kuuɗe Shadoof ngam ɓe ummi ndiyam diga maayo ngam ɓe mburtina nder nder nder nder ndiyamji. Debbo'en nder purdah ɗon mbaɗata kuuɗe nder fannu, ammaa ɓe ɗon mari hakkiloji jaɓugo e wallude nder kuugal. Debbo'en ɓe ɓe ɗonno nder yaasi ɗon kuuwa nder lamndol. Fuu leydi ndii ɗon mari yimɓe ɓe mbaɗata ɗum'en, walaa goɗɗum ko ɓe mbaɗataa. 
Limooɓe nder nokkuure nden, ɓe ɗon njooɗugo nder nder nder nderji, ɓe ɓurdi ɓeydaago ngam foofugo risku diga ɓe ɓeyda ɓeydaaki. Fannu ndu ɗon haani ha nder sahaaji sahaaji, e yiɗde ndiyam je ɗon haani ɗum gooto e daliila haɓɓugo dam. 
Fuuɗuki.
Nder 1969, Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO) waɗi habaru dow darnde ngam darnde dam e darnde darnde darnuki nder Talata Mafara, bee darnde darnduki dow ndiyam ngam darnde. Fedde FAO nder warugo haala nde hollitii muhimminki laabi laabi ɗi ngaɗata hujja ɓurɗum ha hujja dow laabi huutoreeji leydi, nder fannu ngam walaa anndal nder kuuje ha nder nokkuure. Nder hitaande 1971 laamu lesdi Nigeria noddi suɓaaji ngam suɓaaje e hakkilantaaku nder nder nder nder hitaande 1972, hokki golle to Impressit Bakolori Nigeria, maral ngal 60% ha laamu lesdi Nigeria e 40% ha maral Fiat. Nder wakkati jannguki 1972 haa 1974, laabi maral ngal ɓeydi haa hawti e damma mawɗo go'o e laabi mawɗi nder sistemji naange masin. Lardooɓe gariiri naa' ɓe haajinaama nder nder nder nder kuugal jaaynde nden, nden walaa kuugal jaayngal ngal waɗata dow ɓaawo. 
Maaki.
Maaki damma fuɗɗii nder hitaande 1974 nden timmi nder hitaande 1978, caggal ɗum waɗi duuɓi tati ngam limgal damma. Dam woni dow dow dow dow leydi, e daande leydi, e nder suudu ɓernde e nder njamndi, e daare e nder njanngirde e nder njanndi, e nder daande e nder daare e daande e daande 48 m, e nder nder daande daande ndiyam e nder dabare daande 3 MW. Luttuɗe e canalji ji'am naa' ɓe timmini haa 1983 e ɓe ɗon hawta bee haaki 23,000 tan ha haaki 30,000 ha haaki diga fuɗɗam. ndiyam ɗon wurtina haa haaktorji 15,000 bee haaktorje 8,000 bee haaktarji gravity. Fuuɗe njamndi ɗon mari ceede, ammaa ɓe naftira ndiyam ɓurɗum to ɓe njamndiɗum. Caggal ɓeydaago ceede, kuugal naange waɗi nder kuugal ɓurɗo boɗeeji e haaktere nder duuniyaaru. 
Maɓɓugo dam, bee landing, clearing e canal construction halki laamuuji be leɗɗe. Yimɓe gariiri ɓe laati ɓeen laamiiɓe ɓe walaa leydi. Yimɓe ɓurɓe fuu ɓe keɓataa ceede, koo ɓe hokki leydi ɗe ɓe mbaawaa. Yimɓe jooɗiiɓe ɓe ɓe mbaɗi ɓe nganndi ko ɓe anndaa bana buroodi. Nder maɓɓugo maɓɓugo, remooɓe nokku ɗon ɓe mbaawaa ko ɓe mbaadi ngam ɓe njooɗugo duuɓi ɗuuɗɗi. Nde ɓe kawti e yimɓe ɓe ɗon holla nder lewru Noofambar 1979, gomnaaku Sokoto, Shehu Kangiwa, waɗi alkawal ngam haɓɓugo ko ɓe ɗon haɓɓana fuu. Ammaa, nder 28 abriil 1980 polis ɓe ɗon hawta dow yimɓe ɓe ɓe ngalaa jawdi ɓe mbari yimɓe 380 diga maɓɓe. Dowla ɗon maaki nyau ndu, ɗon wi'a 25 tan maayi. 
Fuuɗuki dow ndiyam.
Yimɓe ɓe ɗon mari ndiyam nder lesdi ɓe ɗon mari maayo ɓe ɗon mari nguleeki ndiyam ɓaawo wakkati ɓesngu, ngam ɓe ɗon ɓeyda ɓaawo wakkati ɓe ɗon mari lesdi. Yimɓe huutoraade dam naa' ɓe ɗon hakkiilo ngam ngam ngam ɓe ɗon hokkata ndiyam haa wakkatiji naa' haani. Dam ngal ɓeydiima ɓeydaaki ɓeydaani e ɓeydaandi, wakkati e ɓeydagol ndiyam nder wakkati sahaaji ndiyam. Ɗum ɓeydi ɗuuɗal ndiyam je ɗon haandi ngam lamnduki, ngam ndiyam ɗuuɗal nder nokkuure je ɗon mari masin e je ɗon mari mari mari mari ɓeydaaki ngam ɓeydaago. Nder nokkuuje dow ndiyam, nder nder leydi haaki 19,000 ha, damma waɗi haaki 7,000 ha haaki dabareeji e 5,000 ha haaki 5,000 haaki haaki. Ɗu'um majjum fuɗɗii ɓesdaaki ngam ɓeydaaki nder ɓeydaago nder ɓeydagol maaki e sorghum, ammaa yimɓe 12,000 ɓe ɗon ɓootira. Lottaji ɗi laamu nder laamu fuɗnaama e US$7 million hitaande fuu. 
Fedde jaɓɓorgo e jaɓɓorgal.
Dammugal ngal ina woodi nokkuure cukalel to bannge maayo, ɗum waɗi ko haɗi ha ɓesngu nokkuure ɓesngu e ɓesngu nder leƴƴi ɗuuɗɗi. ndiyam ɗam ɗon ɓeyda, ɗon woodi ɓiyɗe leydi ɗon ɗon ɓeydi bana maɓɓugo jayngol e halki ɓeydaaki leɗɗe ndiyam ɗi ndiyam ɗam ɗam ɗon mari nyaamdu. Ɗuum ɗon sakkinta potal nder nder nder nder ndiyam ngam nyaamugo leƴƴi. Dammugal ngal ɗon ɓeyda ɓeydaago diga maayo e nder maayoji e nder nder ndiyamji. Nder nokkuure je je jeji, ndiyamji jeji jejiji jeji e jeji jejeji jeji ɗon jeji waɗi jeji, je je je jeɗɗi jeji, ɗe jeji feerootiri feerootiral. Ɗe woodi nyauɓe ɓurɓe ɓeydaade nder ndiyam. Caggal ngam huutoreeji haɓɓuki feere feere feere feere be cukale, sorghum e groundnuts fuɗnaaki bana non ngam saɗugo cukale cukale nden be sarɗi cukale je'e. 
Ha 2003, sistemji sprinkler ɗon ɗon ɗon ɗon maaki, be haaki 7,500 tan ɗon ɗon maami, ɓurna fuu ngam rice, bee huutugo ndiyamji je ɗon haaki gravity. Luttuɗum ɗon haa ɓaawo. Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɓe njogii nder gure. Kolori dam waɗi ɓeydaaki 53% nder nokkuure je'e je'e. 
Mawɓe jaabawol dow huutoreeji njanngooji ɗi UNESCO wurtini nder hitaande 1988 ɓe mbi'i "ngam jaabawol jaayɗe ɓurɗe fuu dow kuugal Kolori footi ɓeydaaki ɓeydaago dow kalkal ngal ɓe jaɓa". 

Priscilla Achapka:
Priscilla Mbarumun Achakpa ko haaniyanke lesdi Naijeriya. O woni mo tagdi e hooreejo duniyaaru nder program women environment programme (WEP) je hokkata rewɓe ha laabi ha nder caɗeele fuɗnaange. Ko ɗum waɗi, o laati ardiiɗo WEP. 
Nder Kawtal Wuroji e Wuroji, Achakpa ɗon haɓɓo darnde darnde daranaaku lesdi lesdi lesdi Nigeria. O woni hooreejo jaayɗe Abaagu Foundation for youth empowerment. Nder United Nations Environmental Programme, o suɓi bana co-facilitator. 
Ɓiɗɗo e jaŋde.
Achakpa waree to o duuɓi 16, o warti e ɓiɓɓe tati, nden boo gorko maako maayi, o acci debbo maako boo. Fuude gorko mum ɓeydi mo, o jaɓɓii nder jaagorgal ngam heɓugo jaagorɗe nder jaagoraaji ɓamtaare, jaagorɗum jaagorɗo e jaagorɗingo, ɓaawo maajum jaagorɓe jaagorɗi nder jaagortaaji e jaagoraaku jaagorgo, e jaagortaaku ɓamtaare. O waɗi PhD diga University of Business Engineering and Management, Banja Luka e Certificate Professional diga Harvard University Business School. 
Kuugal.
Daga 1989 haa 2001, Achakpa huuwani haa Savannah Bank nden fuɗɗi waɗugo ko'e nder temmeeji babal babal babal babal ngam o haɓɓita hoore maako nder kuuɗe ummaatooje bana mo ɗon huuwa ngam babal babal babal. Ɗuum golle mum ɓurna fuɗnaaki haani hawtuki haalaji je ɗon hawta e jinsi nder nder jaaynde e jaaynde ndiyam. O huwti bana wakiilu Nigeria ngam Caucus Women bana boo ha nder Women and Gender Constituency bee UN Climate Summit. O suɓii bana mo hawtaaki dow "Women's Major Group" nder United Nations Environmental Programme. Nder kuugal ngal, o haani e networkji rewɓe lesdi dow siyaasaaji UN e kujeji e kujejeji jaayɗe, bana non o huuwi bana jaayɗo ceede ngam kawtal mawɗo rewɓe. O woni hooreejo jaayɗe Abaagu Foundation for youth empowerment and social reintegration. 
O woni mo ɗon haɓɓita e hooreejo duniyaaru (ko o ɗon wondi ardiiɗo jaaynde) nder NGO Women Environment Programme (WEP) je ɗon hawta rewɓe ngam hokkiji haɓɓuki haɓɓuki ngam hawtuki ha nder nyawdi. WEP ɓurɗo haani ha haɓɓugo baylaaku. Ɓe ɗon woodi ofisji nder lesdi Nigeria, Burkina Faso, Togo, United States. Nder hitaande 2012 o hawti e haalude ha haalude dow Haalude Haaruuki Haaruuki ha UN ha ha haaludi ha haaluda haaludi (Rio+20); darnde mum mawɗe haalude nder haalude ko haalude e haaludi bana ko haaludi e haaluda nder hujjaaji haaludi. O haalani ha jamiroore UN ha Nairobi dow nafuki hakkiilo yimɓe rewɓe nder haalde e hujjaaji babal babal babal babal. 
Achakpa ɗon haɓɓo darnde ko'o haɓɓoowo lesdi lesdi lesdi Nigeria nder Council Collaborative Council for Water Supply and Sanitation (WSSCC), go'o haɗi to United Nations Office for Project Services (UNOPS). 
Nder 2015, magazine "Vogue" holli mo nder go'o dow 2015 United Nations Climate Change Conference, wonde o anndini mo bana go'o nder "kooreeje 13 "je ɗon marɓe laawol". 
Ceerno e ceerno.
Achakpa ɗon wondi gooduɗo Ashoka diga 2013. O laatii "Eco Hero" ngam Deutsche Welle lesdi Germany e ngam Nigeria Channel Television. O heɓii jaaynde foondoonde hawtiinde diga Deutsche Welle. Achakpa waɗi nder nder nder nder Nobel Women's Initiative bana mo ɗon ɓeyda. 

Hussaini Abdu:
 
Hussaini Abdu.
Hussaini Abdu woni jaŋde politik e janngooji defte nder Nigerian Defence Academy nder Kaduna. Kuugal maako hawti e kuuɗe ɗuuɗɗe, hawti bee jaɓɓorgo jaɓɓorɗe e jaɓɓorle jaɓɓorɗum, jaɓɓorgol jaɓɓorlooji, e jaɓɓolji jaɓɓorɗi nder lesdi Afirka e Amerik Ladin. O winndi defte ɗiɗi e defte jannginooɗe, e ɓurugo ɓesdaade dow lesdi Naajeeriya e ummatoore yimɓe Afrik, jamirooje, laamorde demokaraasi, e ɓamtaare. "Clash of Identity: State, Society, and Ethno-Religious Conflicts in Northern Nigeria", wurtunde e hitaande 2010, e "Partitioned Borgu: State, Politics, and Society in a West African Border Region", wurtinde e hitaande 2019.
Dr. Hussaini Abdu waɗi darnde darnde lesdi marɗo nder Plan International Nigeria, darnde o waɗi haa o dilli nder lewru feebari 2021, bana ha bolle daga hawrugo. Laddol maako bee Plan International fuɗɗi nder lewru abriil 2015 nde o hawti diga darnde maako ɓaawo nde o jeyaa bana darnde lesdi nder ActionAid Nigeria, to o huuwi duuɓi joweego. Dr. Abdu fuɗɗii haaki keso ngam haɓɓuki caɗeele keso caggal nde o walli Plano International nder Nigeria haa o heɓii darnde mawɗo nder haaki duniyaaru non dowla ngam haaki hakkilooji ɓiyɗe e ɓiyɗe.
Dr. Fatoumata Haidara, Mawɗo Sahel Region haa Plan International, hokki Dr. Abdu faamugo ngam ardiijo maako be kuuɗe maako ɗe ɓeydi ɓeydi e ɓeydi ha ɓeydiingo ko'e ardiiji ardiiji. O holli no, ha jahrol maako, kuugal jamirooje ngal ɓeydi ɓeydi bana non nder duuɓi joweego ɓaawo, o waɗi hoore maako bana gooto nder mawɓe ɓurɓe faade nder nokkuure nden, o waɗi ko haani nder kuugal yimɓe ha nder nder nder ladde Chad. Ɗuum hawti e hawtaade e leyɗe ɓooyiɗe bana Niger e Kameruun.
Maike Roettger, Mawɗo lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi Germany, boo holli haani maako ngam kuuɗe Dr. Abdu. O ɗon haalaa e ɓernde maako booɗɗum nde o ɗon yahu nder lesdi Naijeriya, to o ɗon mari mangu o ɗon huwdi bee maako e o ɗon ekkitina bee maako, o ɗon wi'a ɗum haaniɗum. Laddol Dr. Abdu waɗi darnde mawɗo nder heɓugo Ɗuumol Ɗuumal Lake Chad, je ɗon wayla beɗol nder nguurndam yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe, ɓurna yimɓe sukaaɓe e sukaaɓe, ngam ɗum holli darnde maako.

Adamawa State Polytechnic:
Adamawa State Polytechnic ko jaangooji jaangooji nder Yola, Adamawa State, Nigeria. Ɗum haɓɓiti nder 1991 nder hawtuki College of Preliminary Studies Yola e Institute for Staff Development, Numan. Polyteknik kesum hokkata jaangooji diploma lesdi e nder ilmu komiɗinooje, limtal, jaangooji, jaangooje jaangooje e jaangooje. Polytechnic, je ɗon laamorde lesdi, ɗon je ɗon jeye nder National Board for Technical Education. Jaangoore nden laati marɗo nder jaangoore Maiduguri ngam huutoreeji jaangoore. 
Tariha.
Nder 2007, polytechnic hirsake 200 yimɓe be hakkiilo e nder ummaatooje e diina. Caggal nde ɓe huwtake ɓe ngalaa hakkiilo duuɓi ɗiɗi, ɓe njaara laamu leydi ndi ngam ɓe ɗaɓɓita ɓe ɓe ngarta ɓe ɓe ɓe ngartata ɓe ɓe ɓe ngalaa hayru e ɓe ngartana ɓe. Nder lewru Desemba 2009, mawɗo laamiiɓe mo ɗon jaɓɓa haala ɗon wi'i yimɓe ɓe ɗon waɗa torra e huwtore dow janngooɓe ɗon mari hakkiilo. Nder lewru Nowambar 2008, bandol je ɗon ɗaɓɓa polytechnic waɗi haala je ɗon haani boo ɗon nodda goovɛrneer Murtala Nyako ngam o waɗugo kuuɗe ngam o wurtina jaŋde nder jaŋde maako. Kawtal ngal holli wonde polytechnic ina woodi ɗiɗo tan nder kuugal 33 ngal o hokkata, o holli "teddol, ɓeydaaki" nder yimɓe e "teddungal e lenyol e ɓeydaaku". Nder lewru Desemba 2009, laamu leydi hokki laamu N20.1 miliyaar be ɓe nafota dow suudu deftere e suudu darinooɓe e nder suudu darnde, be nder suudu darngal, je ɗon haani diga hitaande 2001. 
Nder lewru mars 2021, nder nder nder nder juulde ɓaawo limce maɓɓe je'eteende, ardiiɓe ɗon halki cuuɗi nder suudu mawndu nder suudu. Ɗuum waɗi lekki'en ɗon maɓɓina nder 25 mars. Jaɓɓorgo lesdi Naajeeriya Ɗaaɗooɓe ɓeydooɓe ɓeydani ɓe ceede ngam ɓe taƴa, be tan ɓe ceede ceede ɓe ceede haa jaŋde ngam ɓe timmina limce maɓɓe malla ɓe ɗaɓɓita ko ɓe heɓata. 
Kooruuji ɗi mbaɗetee.
Ɗuum woni ko'e ko'e ɗi jaaynde'en hokkata; 
Campus.
Jaŋde ɗon haadi nder campus tati. Luttugo suudu duɗal ɗon haa Jimeta - Yola, laamorgo lesdi Adamawa. Jambutu campus ɗon haa Jimeta nden campus Numan ɗon ha nder Numan Local Government Area of the State. 
Fedde.
Jaangoore nden ɗon mari jokkondiral bee Ahmadu Bello University, Zaria e Federal University Dutse, Jigawa State. 
Ndaare kadi.
List of polytechnics in Nigeria

Federal Capital Territory (Nigeria):
Fedde Laamorgo leydi ndii (FCT) woni leydi leydi ndi haa caka lesdi Naajeeriya. Abuja, laamorgo lesdi Najje, ɗon ha nder lesdi man. FCT tawii nder 1976 diga beje dowle dowle Kaduna, Kwara, Niger, e dowle Plateau, be ɓurna lesdi lesdi daɓɓi diga lesdi Niger. Fedde lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi ɗo nder lesdi lesdi lesdi. Bana dowla feere nder lesdi Naijeriya, je ɗon laamo ngam gomnati laato, ɗum ɗon laamo diga dowla lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi, je ɗon hawtore ngam minista, je ɗon suɓɓa ngam hooreejo lesdi.
Tariha'en.
Fedde leydi leydi fuɗɗam fuɗɗii ha nder nder julde 6 nder hitaande 1976. Ɗum fuɗɗii wonde ngam ngam heɓugo nokkuure laamorgo Lagos, ɗo laamorgo ɓeydi e woodi nokkuure ɗuuɗugo. Daande nde ɓe suɓi ngam laamorgo keso nden ko leydi Gwari (nde yimɓe Gbagyi'en ɗon jooɗori, e ɗemngal maɓɓe ɗon wi'a Gwari) bee yimɓe Muslim'en e Kiristan'en ɓe ɗuuɗata e ɓe ɗon mari ɓernde fuɗɗam e yimɓe ɓe ɓe ɗon mari hakkiilo. 
Decree 6 nder 1976, hokki laamu federal hakkilo dow leydi nder leydi. Yimɓe ɓurɓe ɗuuɗugo yeeso laamu ngu ɓe ɗon njaɓɓa ɓe ɗon ɓilla, yimɓe 120,000 ɗon jooɗi nder gure 840 e ɓurna fu ɓe ɗon jeyaa Gwari. Yimɓe ɓe ɗon jooɗorugo nder gure ɓadiiɗe bana Suleja nder lesdi Niger, e New Karshi nder lesdi Nasarawa nder ɓaawo lesdi.
Joogaraafiwol.
Laamu ndu ɗon ha woyla fu fuɗugo maayo Niger e maayo Benue. Ɗum haani e leydi Niger to hirnaange e woyla, Kaduna to woyla fuunaange, Nasarawa to fuunaange e worgo, e Kogi to worgo hirnaange.
Woni hakkunde latitude 8.25 e 9.20 haa woyla fuɗnaange equator e longitude 6.45 e 7.39 haa fuɗnaande Greenwich Meridian, Fedde leydi leydi ndii ina tawaa e geography nder nder lesdi.
Fedde lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi ndi woodi lesdi haaki 7,315 km2, nden ɗon haaki nder lesdi savannah bee haala nyau.
Kuugal jaaynde.
Mineralji ɗi tawii nder FCT hawti marmor, tin, candi, mica, e tantalite. 
Yimɓe e leyɗe.
Fuule FCT ɗon hokkata wuro to duuker ɗuuɗal, duuker Black forest, duukere bush, duukeri e duuker fuɗnde. E nder woodland FCT e woodi leopard, buffalo, roan antelope, Western hartebeest, elephant, warthog, grey duiker, dog-faced baboon, patas monkey e green monkey. 
Ceeɗol.
Bana dowla woyla dowla nder lesdi Nigeria, lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi Federal Capital Territory ɗon laaɓta. Fedde lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi fu ɗon mari mari ɓuwaaɗum caka lewru janowe haa lewru abriil. Ɓurna fuɗɗam ngal ngal ngal ngaltaama nder wuro ngal ɓuri 30 , ko ɗum woni lewru Maars. Sahaa ndiyam nder leydi ndin ɗon ɗon ɗon ɗon hawta caka lewru Yuli haa lewru Oktoobar hitaande fuu, ammaa lewru ɓurɗum boɗeeɗum ɗon ɗon ɗon haa lewru Disemba, nder sahaa harmatana. Nder harmattan, woodi humidity mawnde, hawta bee hawo e humidity.
Ceeɓol.
Nde minista lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo laamoto lesdi lesdi lesdi fuu, lesdi lesdi lesdi ndi ɗo laamato lesdi (FCDA) ɗo laamataa nder maare e nder maare nder lesdi. 
Luttudu ndu hawti e nokkuuje laamu jeego, ko ɗum woni: 
Abaji
Abuja Municipa
Bwari
Gwagwalada
Kuje
Kwali
Cuuɓi.
Council'en ɓe suɓii nder suɓaaji leydi lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi Federal Capital Territory 2022. 

Ministajjo nder Asiwaju Bola Ahmed Adekumle Tinubu:
Hisaare Jeerrgol minisstaa'en. Bola Tinubu

David Umahi:
David Umahi Eriminmo lewru 25 duubi 1963 eiii lysidi siyasaju nder Naajeeriya jornii eii ministajjo shugabajjo Bola Ahmed Tinubu.noe doon Sannatajjo Diiwal Ebonyi gada August duubi 2023, toe gwamnajjo 2015 eii 2023.

Betta Edu:
Betta Edu Eriminmo lewru 25 mongou 1986 eii lysidi siyasaju nder Naajeeriya jornii eii ministajjo shugabajjo Bola Ahmed Tinubu oon doon shugabajjo Debbum (APC) toh Commissioner kalau,en Diiwal River's nder Naajeeriya.

Abubakar Atiku Bagudu:
Abubakar Atiku Bagudu Eriminmo lewru 26 mongou 1961 eii lysidi siyasaju nder Naajeeriya jornii eii ministajjo shugabajjo Bola Ahmed Tinubu oon doon gwamnajjo Diiwal Kebbi gada dubbi 2015 toe 2023. Atiku eii don Sannatajjo nder Kebbi gada duubi 2009 to 2015.

Muhammad Ali Pate:
Muhammad Ali Pate Eriminmo lewru 6 mongou 1968 eiii Naajeeriya likitajjo toe siyasaju eii ministajjo jornii nder Ardiido Bola Ahmed Tinubu.pate Janngirde oon doon Harvard University.

Aliyu Idris Funtua:
Dr Aliyu Idris Funtua ko jannginoowo Naajeeriya e hooreejo Jaŋde Feddeeji Ekkitinoore, Katsina. O laati ardiiɗo 13th College on 19 August 2016, ɓaawo hooreejo Muhammadu Buhari haɓɓii darnde maako. Ka tawii ɗum taƴii, o laati on taƴoɗo e hooreejo jaŋde. O mari doktoor ha haasa ha Janngirde Bayero, Kano e hitaande 2016.
Funtua ɗon wari diga hukuma pamaro Funtua nder Diiwal Katsina. O heɓii laamorde Koroowo Malaman Katsina "Wakkilɗo Mallum'en Diiwal Katsina" ngam "Majji maako, Laamiiɗo Katsina, Abdulmumini Kabir Usman".
Dr. Funtua jibinaa nder Dandume nder hitaande 1962, o janngini Aya Primary School nder Funtua e Government Secondary School nder Malumfashi nder laamu. O yahi to Fedde Fedde Faddinooɓe (ko jooni woni Fedde Faddaango, Katsina) to o heɓii NCE nder hitaande 1984. O heɓii digirii maako arande, ɗiɗaɓo e tataɓo diga Janngirde Bayero diiwal kano.
Nder 1985, Funtua fuɗɗi huutoreede bana jannginoowo darnde nder lesdi Kaduna. O laati mo moolinoowo nder Fedde Fedde Fanditaare, Katsina nder hitaande 1997 o waɗi kuugal feere feere.
O dewta e ɓiɓɓe haani

Danchuwa:
Danchuwaun gellle nder hukuma pamarum potiskum haa diiwal Yobe lysidiNaajeeriya o hebe Afrik

Yusuf Maitama Tuggar:
Yusuf Maitama Tuggar Eriminmo 12 Colte moungou 1967 gada Diiwal Bauchi eii lysidi siyasaju nder Naajeeriya jornii eii ministajjo shugabajjo Bola Ahmed Tinubu oon doon ambassador Naajeeriya chabal Germany gada 2017 toe 2023.

Mariya Mahmoud Bunkure:
Mariya Mahmoud Bunkure on wanii ministajjo Federal Capital Abuja oon doon Ardiido Commissioner Janngirde Diiwal Kano lysidi Naajeeriya hissare Abdullahi Umar Ganduje.

Ezenwo Nyesom Wike:
Ezenwo Nyesom Wike CON eriminmo nylde 13 moungou 1967 eii lysidi siyasajju toe lawyaajjo jornii eiii ministajjo FCT Abuja oon doon gwamnajjo Diiwal Rivers gada duubi 2015 toe 2023.

Chief Adebayo Olawale Edun:
Chief Adebayo Olawale Edun o janja Wale Edun eii Naajeeriya banki,en toe siyyasa,en jornii eiii ministajjo nder gwamnati,en Ardiido Bola Ahmed Tinubu gada August 2023.

Laawol A1 (Naajeeriya):
Laawol A1 woni ɗatal mawɗo nder lesdi Naajeeriya, ɗon hawta Lagos nder worgo haa haŋki bee Niger nder woyla haa Birnin Konni.
Baylitgol laawol.
Laawol A1, anndiraa bana ɗatal 1, ɗon ɓadita yaasi lesdi Naajeeriya, ɗon yaasi nder gariiri mawɗi bana Lagos, Ibadan, Minna, e Birnin Konni ha nder hirna bee Niger.
Wondirde.
Laawol A1 ɗon walli feccere, jaayɗe, e hawtaade hakkunde laamorgo Aljeriya, Algiers e lesdi Niiser. Ɗum gooto e laawol mawɗo nayi nder lesdi Naijeriya, ko A1 haa A4.
Nder nokkuuji feere feere nder laawol, laawol mawɗo 1 (E1) maaki ngam ɓeyduki nder nder nder nderji haɓɓuki.
13°47′08″N 5°15′28″E﻿ / ﻿13.785445°N 5.257666°E﻿ / 13.785445; 5.257666

Laawol A9 (Naajeeriya):
Laawol A9 nder ɗatal ngol woni nder nder lesdi Naajeeriya, nder woyla banngeere lesdi. O ɗon huwti bana laawol jaɓɓorgo nafatoore, hawtaago berniwol mawɗi ɗuuɗal e footi waɗugo jaɓɓorgal nder lesdi e nder lesdi.
Tariha.
Taariiha laawol A9 ɗon hawta bee ɓamtaare lesdi Naajeeriya. Fuu fuɗɗam ɗum haani bana laawol laawol go'o, ɗum waɗi laabi feere-feere nder ɓesngu duuɓi e ɓeydaade. Dowla Naajeeriya ɗon haaki nder ɓeydaago laawol haɓɓuki haɓɓuki nder nder nder nder, bana non haɓɓuki ɓeydaaki to haɓɓuki laawol haɓɓugo ɗiɗawol.
Baylitgol laawol.
Lodo A9 fuɗɗii nder nder lesdi Nigeria e Niger Republic nder gariiri Jibiya. Daga ɗon, o ɓeydi haa fuunaaŋge, o ɗon ƴiwo nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Go'o nder gure mawɗe ɗe mari ma'ana nder laawol ngol woni Katsina, nokkuure mawnde nder aada e jawdi nder nokkuure. Lodo laawol ɗon tokki laawol maako, haa sakkitii nder laawol Trunk A2, ɗon haadi kiloomitaare 14.4 haa woyla Kano, go'oto nder nder gariiri ɓurɗi ɓurɓe ɗuuɗugo yimɓe nder lesdi Naajeeriya.
Luttugal fuunaaŋge laawol ngal haa Jibiya ɗon huwti bana nokkuure ɓaawo lesdi nder lesdi Niger, ɗon hawta lesdi Nigeria bee laawol lesdi man. Nder Niger, o hawti bee laawol N9, je ɗon yahda haa gariiri Maradi. Ɗuɓɓugo hawtiwol duniyaaru ndu jogii sagal ngal ngal haani ɓamtude jaaynde hakkunde lesdi Naajeeriya e lesdi Niiser.
Ɓamtaare e ɓamtaare.
Nder hitaande 2019, laawol A9 waɗi ɓeydaaki ɓeydaani ngam ɓeydaago dabareeji e jammu. Ɗi ɓeydaaki ɗi hawti e ɓeydaago laawol mawɗo ngam woodi lamɓe ɗiɗi nder kooɗume, ngam hokkata laawol nder laawol bee laaɓɗum bee saɗugo. Ɓeydaakiji ɗi ngam huutoree haajirgal haajirgol nder nokkuure nden e ɓeydaaki hawtaade nder firo lesdi Naajeeriya.
Koore mawɗe.
A9 laawol mawngol ɗon hawta bee laawol mawɗum feere feere nder nder laawol mawngal maako, ɗon halki hawtaago to nokkuuje feere feere. Ɗuum ko haɗi e laawol A9 hawti e laawol Trunk Road A2 haa woyla Kano, ɗum hokkata laawol haa nder gariiri. Ɓeydi, laawol mawɗo ɗon hawta Miltara, ɗon wallata heɓugo nokkuure nden.
Linjiila gure.
Lodo A9 ɗon haandi bo laawol yahugo nder berniwolji ɗuuɗɗi nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Duuɗe mawɗe dow laawol maako hawti:
Maŋgol A9 ngal woodi maana strategic e darnde nder ɓesdaaki ɓamtaare jawdi waɗi ɗum haandiɗum nder nder nder nderol lesdi Nigeria.

Laawol A10 (Naajeeriya):
Laawol A10 nder ɗatal ngol woni laawol mawɗo nder lesdi Naajeeriya, ɗon hawta lesdi lesdi man nder hirnaange e fuunaange. Ɗu laawol ngol ɗon ɓadake ko km 452 bana non, ɗon jogii sagal ngal nafata nder ɓeydaago haɓɓuki e jaaynde.
Baylitgol laawol.
Laawol A10 fuɗɗii nder daande bee laawol A1 nder Ibadan, nder worgo hirnaange lesdi Naajeeriya. O yahdi fuunaaŋge, o yahdi nder gure mawɗe e nder gure mawde, hawti Ogbomoso, Ilorin, Jebba, Mokwa, e nder wakkere o yotti to Tegina, nder fombina fuunaaŋgo lesdi Naijeriya, to o hawti bee laawol A125.
Luttugo laawol ngal hirnaange nder Ibadan ɗon huwti haandi mawɗi ha nder hiirnaange lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum hawti e laawol mawɗo, waɗi ɗum laawol jaɓɓorgo haandi ngam jaɓɓorgal banngeeji e lesdi.
Tariha.
Haɓɓaa nder 1976, laawol A10 haɓɓaa ha ɓaawo duuɓi haɓɓaaji e ɓeydaaki ngam hawtaaki ha ɓeydaago haɓɓugo nder nder nder nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ministri Federal for Works and Housing ɗon haani ngam haɓɓuki e ɓamtaare nder nderji ɗi.
Koore mawɗe.
A10 nder laawol ɗon hawta bee nder nder nder nder laawolji mawɗi feere, ɗon walli laawol nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗuum ko dow ko ɓuri haandi dow laawol:
Laawol A10 mawngol ɗon yaasi nder gariiriji mawɗi e gariiriji, ɗon hokkata ɓamtaare jawdi maɓɓe e hawtaade. Ɗuum hawti e:Woni laawol nder nder nderji nderji nder wuro ɗon jogii darnde mawɗe nder haɓɓuki, jaayndi, e hawtuki nder lesdi.

Laawol A11 (Naajeeriya):
Laawol A11 woni ɗatal mawɗo nder lesdi Naajeeriya. O ɗon huwdi bana laawol jaɓɓorgo mawɗo hawtaago gariiriji e nokkuuje feere feere nder lesdi.
Baylitgol laawol.
A11 laawol ɗon ƴiwo diga fuunaaŋge haa fuunaaŋre nder lesdi Naajeeriya, ɗon huuwa bana laawol nafata fuunaaŋgi haa fuunaangare ngam jonde e yimɓe.
Terminus A.
Luttugo fuunaaŋge laawol A11 ɗon haade gariiri Rigacikun. Ɗum hawti e laawol A2 haa nokkuure nde, e ɗum waɗi ko taƴol mawnde nder nokkuure nde.
Luttudu B.
Luttugo hirnaange laawol A11 ɗon ha Pambeguwa. Ɗoon ɗo laawol A11 hawta bee laawol A236, hokki laawol mawɗo to lesdi Najeeriya.
Koore mawɗe.
A11 nder laawol ɗon hawta bee ko ɓuri mawnugo nder laawol, bana no ɓeydori hawtaade e hawtaade nder gariiriji e nder diiwaanji feere feere. Ɗuum ko hawti e:
Lidooje ɗe kuuwetee.
Ladda A11 ɗon huwdi gariiriji be gariiriji ɗuuɗɗi nder laawol maako, ɗon hokki bana bana bana bana non ngam ɓamtaare lesdi e kuuɗe jawdi. Ɗije e gure ɗe hawti e:

Laawol A12 (Naajeeriya):
Laawol A12 woni ɗatal nder lesdi Naajeeriya, ɗon hawta wuro Katsina Ala nder fuunaaŋge haa gariiri Jalingo nder hirnaaŋge. O ɗon haɓɓii ko 350 km e ɗon huwti bana ɓandu mawndu nder banngeere laawol.
Baylitgol laawol.
A12 laawol fuɗɗii e junction bee A4 e A344 nder Katsina Ala, ha fuunaaŋge lesdi Naajeeriya. O ɗon yahda fuunaaŋge, o ɗon ƴiwo nder gariiriji e nder gure ɗuuɗɗe, hawti e Sabon Gida e Beli, ngam o heɓugo to yaasi fuunaaŋgi maako e Jalingo haa yaasi bee A4.
Koore mawɗe.
A12 nder laawol ina woodi ko ɓuri mawnugo nder laawol, ngam ɗum waawata hawtuki nder nder nder nder laawolji mawɗi feere nder laamorgo. Ɗee kootol hawti:
Linjiila gure.
Laawol A12 ɗon ƴiwo nder ko ɓuri ɗuuɗugo nder gariiriji e nder gariirije, hawti e:

Laawol A13 (Naajeeriya):
Laawol A13 woni ɗatal mawɗo nder lesdi Naajeeriya, ko dabare maare 615 km. O hawti gariiri Jimeta nder Adamawa dow lesdi dow lesdi haa worgo haa fuɗɗam maako haa gariiri Bama nder Diiwal Borno. Laddaandi ndu jogii darnde mawnde nder nder nder nderle nder nderle.
Baylitgol laawol.
A13 laawol ɗon tokki laawol haa woyla diga Jimeta, ɗon ƴiwoyi maayo Benue, ɗon ƴuwoyi nder gariiriji e nder gariirije feere feere.
Koore mawɗe.
A13 nder laawol ɗon hawta bee nder nder nder nder lesdi Nigeria, ngam ɗum hokka laawol hawtoreeki. Ɗuum ko dow ko ɓuri haandi dow laawol:
Lidooje ɗe kuuwetee.
laawol A13 ɗon yahda nder ko ɓuri haade e nder gariiriji e nder gariireji, hawti e:
A13 highway nafataaki ngam hawtaade nder lesdi Nigeria, ngam hakkilana huwtoreeje yimɓe e kareeji.
10°59′13″N 13°40′16″E﻿ / ﻿10.987072°N 13.671065°E﻿ / 10.987072; 13.671065

Laawol A14 (Naajeeriya):
Laawol A14 nder laawol ngol woni ɗatal mawɗo nder lesdi Naajeeriya, ɗon hawta gariiri Ilorin haa fuunaaŋge haa Bode Sadu haa hirnaaŋge. O ɗon haɓɓii yaaki kiloomitaaruuji 80 e ɗon jogii darnde mawɗe nder nder nder nderji nder nderji.
Baylitgol laawol.
Laawol A14 fuɗɗii nder daande A1 ɓadi Ilorin, gariiri nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Nden o ɗon yahda hirnaange, o ɗon yahra nder gariiri Oloru haa o yotti hirnaange nder Bode Sadu.
Koore mawɗe.
Laawol A14 ɗon haɓa bee waylaji mawɗi dow laawol maako, ɗon halki hawtaade bee laawol mawɗum feere nder nokkuure. Ko ɓuri heewde e dow:
Linjiila gure.
Laawol A14 ɗon ƴiwo nder ko ɓuri beje e gariiriji ɗuuɗɗi, hawti bee:

Laawol A121 (Naajeeriya):
Laawol A121 ɗon ha lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum wondi nder laawol fuunaaŋgo-ɓaŋgo hawtaago laawol fuunaandu fuunaaŋge fuunaaŋgi. Ɗum noddinaa diga laawolji ɗiɗo ɗi o hawta.
A1 nder Shagamu, nder Diiwal Ogun ɗon hawta bee A2 nder Benin City, Diiwal Edo. Lindi Ijebu Ode ɗon haa laawol ngol.
Kootol.
6°51′31″N 3°38′05″E﻿ / ﻿6.858607°N 3.634691°E﻿ / 6.858607; 3.634691

Laawol A123 (Naajeeriya):
Laawol A123 woni laawol nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum wondi nder laawol fuunaaŋgo-ɓaŋgo hawtaago laawol fuunaandu "fuunaaŋge fuunaaŋgi".(O noddinaa diga laawol ɗiɗi ngal o hawta).
O ɗon ƴiwo diga laawol A1 nder Ilorin, laamorgo Diiwal Kwara haa laawol A2 haa woyla Okene, Diiwal Kogi. Luttugal mawɗo dow laawol ngol woni Kabba.
Kootol.
8°26′09″N 4°35′37″E﻿ / ﻿8.435946°N 4.593658°E﻿ / 8.435946; 4.593658

Laawol A124 (Naajeeriya):
Laawol A124 nder ɗatal ngol woni nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum wondi nder laawol fuunaaŋgo-ɓaŋgo hawtaago laawol fuunaandu "fuunaaŋge fuunaaŋgi". (O noddinaa diga laawol ɗiɗi ngal o hawta).
O ɗon ƴiwo diga laawol A1 haa woyla Mokwa, Diiwal Niger haa laawol A2 haa Madalla ɓadi Abuja.
Kootol.
9°01′53″N 6°24′43″E﻿ / ﻿9.031493°N 6.412067°E﻿ / 9.031493; 6.412067

Laawol A125 (Naajeeriya):
Laawol A125 woni ɗatal nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum wondi nder laawol fuunaaŋgo-ɓaŋgo hawtaago laawol fuunaandu "fuunaaŋge fuunaaŋgi". (O noddinaa diga laawol ɗiɗi ngal o hawta).
O ɗon ƴiwo diga laawol A1 nder Kontagora, Diiwal Niger haa laawol A2 haa woyla Kaduna.
Kootol.
10°23′57″N 6°23′14″E﻿ / ﻿10.399045°N 6.387219°E﻿ / 10.399045; 6.387219

Laawol A126 (Naajeeriya):
Laawol A126 nder ɗatal woni nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum wondi nder laawol fuunaaŋgo-ɓaŋgo hawtaago laawol fuunaandu "fuunaaŋge fuunaaŋgi". (O noddinaa diga laawol ɗiɗi ngal o hawta).
O ɗon ƴiwo diga laawol A1 ha Gusau, laamorgo Diiwal Zamfara haa laawol A2 ha Zaria, Diiwal Kaduna nder laawol ana fuuna fuunaaŋgo.
Kootol.
12°38′26″N 5°39′03″E﻿ / ﻿12.640613°N 5.650827°E﻿ / 12.640613; 5.650827

Laawol A231 (Naajeeriya):
Laawol A231 nder ɗatal ngol nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum wondi nder laawol fuunaaŋgo-ɓaŋgo hawtaago laawol fuunaandu "fuunaaŋge fuunaaŋgi". (O noddinaa diga laawol ɗiɗi ngal o hawta).
O ɗon ƴiwo diga laawol A2 haa Elele, nder Diiwal Rivers, haa fuɗɗam ngal haa fombina laawol A3 haa Port Harcourt.
Kootol.
5°00′37″N 6°52′21″E﻿ / ﻿5.01032°N 6.872463°E﻿ / 5.01032; 6.872463

Laawol A232 (Naajeeriya):
Laawol A232 nder ɗatal ngol nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum wondi go'o nder laawol fuunaaŋgo-ɓaŋgo hawtaago hakkunde laawol fuunaŋgo-laamorde.
Ɗum noddinaa diga laawol ɗiɗi ngal hawtaade, laawol A2 e laawol A3.
Luttudu.
Lodo A232 ɗon ƴiwo diga A2 nder Benin City haa A3 nder nder ɓaawo Enugu, laamorgo Diiwal Enugu.
Dowji mawɗi e gariiri dow laawol ɗon ngoni Agbor, Asaba, Onitsha e Awka.
Kootol.
6°15′49″N 7°10′47″E﻿ / ﻿6.263577°N 7.179844°E﻿ / 6.263577; 7.179844

Laawol A233 (Naajeeriya):
Laawol A233 woni ɗital nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum wondi nder laawol fuunaaŋgo-ɓaŋgo hawtaago laawol fuunaandu "fuunaaŋge fuunaaŋgi". (O noddinaa diga laawol ɗiɗi ngal o hawta).
O ɗon ƴiwo diga laawol A2 ɓadii Lokoja, Diiwal Kogi haa laawol A3 ha Otukpa, Diiwal Benue.

Laawol A234 (Naajeeriya):
Laawol A234 woni laawol mawɗo nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum wondi nder laawol fuunaaŋgo-ɓaŋgo hawtaago laawol fuunaandu "fuunaaŋge fuunaaŋgi". (O noddinaa diga laawol ɗiɗi ngal o hawta).
O ɗon ƴiwo diga laawol A2 ɓadi Abuja, laamorgo lesdi, haa laawol A3 haa Akwanga, Diiwal Nasarawa haa lesdi Naajeeriya.
8°50′46″N 8°05′02″E﻿ / ﻿8.846119°N 8.083759°E﻿ / 8.846119; 8.083759

Laawol A235 (Naajeeriya):
Laawol A235 nder ɗital ngol woni nder lesdi Naijeriya. Ɗum wondi nder laawol fuunaaŋgo-ɓaŋgo hawtaago laawol fuunaandu "fuunaaŋge fuunaaŋgi". (O noddinaa diga laawol ɗiɗi ngal o hawta). O ɗon ƴiwo diga laawol A2 nder Kaduna haa laawol A3 haa worgo Jos, laamorgo Diiwal Plateau.
Kootol.
9°45′52″N 8°19′54″E﻿ / ﻿9.764382°N 8.331671°E﻿ / 9.764382; 8.331671

Laawol A236 (Naajeeriya):
Laawol A236 nder ɗatal ngol woni nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum wondi nder laawol fuunaaŋgo-ɓaŋgo hawtaago laawol fuunaandu "fuunaaŋge fuunaaŋgi". (O noddinaa diga laawol ɗiɗi ngal o hawta).
O ɗon ƴiwo diga laawol A2 nder Zaria, Diiwal Kaduna haa laawol A3 nder Jos, laamorgo Diiwal Plateau.

Laawol A237 (Naajeeriya):
Laawol A237 laawol ngol woni ɗital nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum wondi nder laawol fuunaaŋge-ɓaŋge hawtaago laawol fuunaŋge fuunaaŋgo-laamde. (O noddinaa diga laawol ɗiɗi ngal o hawta).
Ɗum ƴiwoyi diga laawol A2 haa Kano haa laawol A3 haa Kari, Borno leydi haa woyla Darazo, Bauchi leydi. goɗɗe gure mawɗe laawol ngoni Kari (Diiwal Borno), Darazo (Diiwal Bawci), Gwaram, Birnin Kudu (Diiwal Jigawa), Takai, Wudil, Ladin makole e Mariri (Diiwal Kano).
Kootol.
11°32′31″N 9°16′10″E﻿ / ﻿11.54182°N 9.26949°E﻿ / 11.54182; 9.26949

Laawol A342 (Naajeeriya):
Laawol A342 nder ɗatal ngol nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum wondi nder laawol fuunaaŋgo-ɓaŋgo hawtaago laawol fuunaandu "fuunaaŋge fuunaaŋgi". Ɗum noddinaa diga laawol ɗiɗi je ɗon hawta, laawol A3 e laawol A4.
O ɗon hawta hakkunde A3 haa Aba, Diiwal Abia - e fuɗɗoode A4 haa fombina Diiwal Cross River, to Oron nder Diiwal Akwa Ibom.
Lodo ɗon yahda nder Ikot Ekpene e Uyo.
Kootol.
5°03′22″N 7°52′38″E﻿ / ﻿5.055982°N 7.877246°E﻿ / 5.055982; 7.877246

Laawol A343 (Naajeeriya):
Laawol A343 nder ɗital ngol nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum wondi nder laawol fuunaaŋgo-laawdi ɗon hawta bee laawol fuunaandu fuunaaŋge fuunaaŋgi. (O noddinaa ngam laawol ɗiɗi ngal o hawta).
Luttudu.
A343 nder laawol ɗon ƴiwo diga nder laawol A3 nder Enugu, laamorgo Diiwal Enugu - haa nder laawol A4 nder Emandak, Diiwal Cross River.
O ɗon yaasi Abakaliki, laamorgo Diiwal Ebonyi.

Laawol A344 (Naajeeriya):
Laawol A344 nder ɗatal ngol nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum wondi nder laawol fuunaaŋgo-ɓaŋgo hawtaago laawol fuunaandu "fuunaaŋge fuunaaŋgi". (O noddinaa diga laawol ɗiɗi ngal o hawta).
O ɗon ƴiwo diga laawol A3 haa Aliade, Benue State haa laawol A4 haa worgo Katsina-Ala. Luttugal mawɗo dow laawol ngol woni Gboko.

Laawol A345 (Naajeeriya):
Laawol A345 nder ɗatal ngol nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum wondi nder laawol fuunaaŋgo-ɓaŋgo hawtaago laawol fuunaandu "fuunaaŋge fuunaaŋgi". (O noddinaa diga laawol ɗiɗi ngal o hawta).
O ɗon ƴiwo diga laawol A3 nder Bawci haa laawol A4 nder Biu, Diiwal Borno. Duule Gombe, laamorgo Diiwal Gombe ɗon nder laawol.
Duule Kumo, wuro hooreejo nokkuure laamu Akko, boo ɗon nder laawol.

Bacita Fuuɗugo:
Bacita Fuuɗugo ko nokkuure nde baɗotoo Bacita nder Diiwal Kwara nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum woni km 5 (3 miil) haa saŋge hirnaange gariiri.

Bajoga Northeast Airport:
Bajoga Woyla fuunaaŋge Fuuɗugo woni fuuɗugo ɗo Bajoga e Ashaka Cement Plant nder Naajeeriya. Ɗum ɗon haa km 10 (6 ) haa woyla fuunaaŋge Bajoga, e hawti bee laawol gootol haa suudu cement.
Lungo laawol ngol hawtaaki ko daande 300 mita (980 ft) ha nder laawol ngol 23.

Bayelsa International Airport:
Bayelsa International Airport (nganndi kadi BIA) ko dow hawti dow Wilberforce Island, Amassama, Yenagoa, Diiwal Bayelsa, ɗo GPS coordinates: 4°57′46′′N 6°12′20′′E.
Tariha.
Nde suudu duɗal ngal waɗi nder hitaande 2012 ngam maɓɓugo dowla Bayelsa dowla Henry Seriake Dickson. Fuuɗorde nde'e waɗi fuɗnde mum fuɗnde 14 feebari 2019.
Fuuɗungo lesdi Bayelsa Sen waɗi dowla ngam huutugo nder lewru arande, 10 Febraayo 2020. Henry Seriake Dickson, hitaande caggal nde o fuɗɗii fuɗugo.
Bayelsa International Airport ha 17 abriil 2021 hokki haɓɓuki huutoreeje fuɗugo ngam huutoreeji fuɗugo lesdi Nigeria (NCAA).
Kootol.
04°57′30″N 006°12′17″E﻿ / ﻿4.95833°N 6.20472°E﻿ / 4.95833; 6.20472

Bebi Fuuɗugo:
Bebi Fuuɗugo dowla dowlaaji nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum ɗon huuwana bana dowla dowla dow Obudu Mountain Resort. Lodo ɗon haa yaasi gariiri Obudu.
Bebi VOR-DME (Ident: BEB) ɗon haadi milji maayo 0.72 (1.33 ) diga maral laawol 10.
Distinoore.
Lindiyaaru ɗon ha dowla Cross River, nder Obudu Town. Luttugol ngol hawrata nder wakkati gomnaaru Donald Duke hawrata ngam ɓeydaago e heɓugo ɓeydaade ceede dowla, nder laawol hawtaade yimɓe. Nder kuudi dow laawol fuɗugo maɓɓugo maɓɓuki maaji, nder feere ngam hokki boo waɗugo moofta haa o heɓta laawol e moofta to maɓɓuki marɓe maɓɓuki, je ɗon ɓadii to nokkuure.
Nder 2017 gomnaaru Ben Ayade noddi dowla dowla dowlo Donald duke dowla dowle dowla dowlaaji dowla dowlu dowla dowlugo dowla dowol dowla dowli dowla dow ɓamtaare Cross River.

Mamman Tahir:
Tahir Mamman SAN OON (eriminmo lewru 7 moungou 1954) eiii lysidi Naajeeriya lawyaajjo toe professor, jornii eii ministajjo Janngirde Naajeeriya toe Ardiido befe,en Janngirde Baze University, Abuja eii Ardiido (NDDC).

Firoyaadi Benin:
Firoyaadi Benin woni firoyaadi nder Benin, laamorgo Diiwal Edo nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Laddaare nder gariiri.

Luttugol Bida:
Luttugol Bida woni luttugol ɗo Bida nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Bida VOR/DME (identi: BDA) e Bida Non-directional beacon (identi: BD) ɗon ha nder firo.
Baylitgol ɓeydiindi.
Luttugol ngol ɗon ha Bida nder Diiwal Niger Naajeeriya, go'o nder gariiri ɓurɗo mawnugo e nokkuure je yimɓe ɗuuɗi nder Diiwal Niger.

Shuaibu Abubakar Audu:
Shuaibu Abubakar Audu eii nylde lewru 11 moungou 1980 eii lysidi Naajeeriya bankijjo toe siyasaju jornii eii ministajjo diga August duubi 2023.

Broad Street, Lagos:
Broad Street dow Lagos Island, Lagos, Naajeeriya, woni ko hubugo jaaynde nder go'o nder nder gariiri man. Nder yimɓe ɓe ɗon jooɗoto: suudu nyaamdu Bagatelle, suudu jaŋde Koolol Cattedral Christ, Methodist Boys High School, Newswatch (Naajeeriya), e St. Mary's Private School. "Secretariat" suudu maaki nder 1906..

Dasab Airlines:
Dasab Airlines wondi dabare dow Abuja, Naajeeriya.
Tariha.
Dowla Naajeeriya taƴi sahaa haɓɓugo dabareeji jaayndiyankooje nder lesdi ngam ɓe ummora jawdi maɓɓe haa 30 abriil 2007. Dasab Airlines, be feere je ɗon, ɓe mbaawaa waɗugo sahaa, nden ngam maajum ɓe njaɓaayi ɓe ƴiwo nder lesdi Naajeeriya.
Kuugal jaaynde.
Wuro mawɗo nder suudu duɗal ngol ɗon nder Abuja. Jaɓɓorgo Lagos ɗon ha Agege, Diiwal Lagos.
Fuuɗal.
Ha August 2006 fuɗnde Dasab Airlines hawti:

Dutse International Airport:
Dutse International Airport ko daranii dow Muhammad Nuhu Sanusi International airport, dowla dowla dowlaaji Dutse nder Diiwal Jigawa, nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Luttugol ngol woni km 10 (6.2 ) haa hirnaange woyla, nden ɗum haɓɓiti nder 2014 diga hooreejo lesdi Naajeeriya Goodluck Jonathan.

Earth Airlines:
Earth Airlines wondi haade nder Lagos, Naajeeriya.
Kammuuji duɗal ngal ɗon huwtina kuugal charter diga Lagos. Ɗum haɓɓiti e fuɗɗii huutoreeɓe nder hitaande 2002.
Dowla Nigeria waɗi sahaa 30 abriil 2007 ngam jaayndi dabareeji dabareeji fuu je ɗon huutora nder lesdi ngam ɓe ceede ko'e maɓɓe ko ɓe jeyi leydi, ngam ɓe tabbitina kuugal be jamji booji. Nde'e jaayndi'en ɗon haɓa dabareeji naftirki jaayndi lesdi Nigeria (NCAA) ha dow warugo be'e be'e nder nder nder nderji, nden ɓe ɗon hawtake jaayndi ngam huutoreeje nden ɗon ɗon huuwa bana boo.
Fuuɗal.
Fuuɗol lesdi Airlines hawti e naatooje ɗe ɗo'o (e lewru August 2006):
1 Boeing 737-200

EAS Airlines:
EAS (Executive Airlines Services) Airlines wondi haade nder Lagos, Naajeeriya. Haŋki maako fuɗɗi nder Murtala Mohammed International Airport, Lagos.
Nder lewru Yuli 2006, jaaynde fuɗnaaki bee Fleet Air Nigeria Limited, ngam tagdi Nicon Airways.
Tariha.
Ndeen jaayndiyankoojo fuɗɗii wonde e 23 lewru Diisaamba 1983.
Destinations.
EAS Airlines waɗi kuugal to nokkuuje nder lesdi ɗi ɗon ɗon ɗon haani (e lewru Janaare 2005): Abuja, Enugu, Jos, Lagos e Port Harcourt.
Fuuɗal.
Fuuɗal EAS Airlines hawti e ɗeen ɗereeji ɗi'i:

Easy Link Aviation:
Easy Link Aviation Services wondi haaki lesdi Naajeeriya.
Tariha.
Dowla Nigeria waɗi sahaa 30 abriil 2007 ngam jaayndi dabareeji dabareeji fuu je ɗon huwti nder lesdi ngam ɓe ceede ko'e maɓɓe ko ɓe jeyi leydi, ngam ɓe tabbitina kuugal be jam. Nde'e jaayndiyanke'en ɗon mari capitaali diga nden wakkati, nden jooni ɗon mari lasisi ngam huutore ngam Naijeriya Civil Aviation Authority (NCAA) e haani fodde ko'e criteriya fuu nder haala re-capitalization.
Fuuɗal.
Ha August 2006 fuɗnaange Easy Link hawti e:

Doris Nkiruka Uzoka-Anite:
Doris Nkiruka Uzoka-Anite latama Naajeeriya siyasaju, likitajjo,shiree sheddee jornii eii ministajjo shugabajjo Bola Ahmed Tinubu diga August 2023.

Nworie River:
Nworie River ko maayo nder lesdi Nigeria je ɗon yahda nder Owerri be ɗon yahda to maayo Otamiri nder Nekede. Lungo maayo diga fuɗɗam to fuɗɗam maako ɗon haa 9,2 km. Fuuji ɗon mari halleende; nder 2017 laamu leydi ɗon hokki habaru ngam huutugo ndiyam diga maayo. Ngam ɓeyda hokkugo semmbe nder lesdi, hooreejo lesdi Nigeria, Muhammadu Buhari, mari jaɓɓorgal ngam jaɓɓorgo semmbe ɓadiiɗe maayo Nworie nder Owerri, laamorgo Imo.
Lollol.
Farasoore Biology Alexander Nwaozuzu Acholonu, mo Awaka, ummbaawo dowla ummbaawo Owerri North e mo ummbaawo Imo State, holli ɗum nder habaru o hokki ha Imo Diaspora Lectures and Awards, ha hawritaama e Concept Masters nder leydi ndin. O holli wonde kuudi dow njaram njaram Nworie fuɗɗi hokki yimɓe Imo haani yahugo bee maako, o holli wondi maral ngam nyawdi ngam ɗum je ɗon je ɗon jeye.

Owala:
 
Owala Stream ko maayo nder Ifon Osun, lesdi Osun, Nigeria, ɓadi gariiri Ilie. Fuuji ɗi ɗon hawta dow km2 7 e naftira nder nyiɓugo dam e haɓɓugo ngam leydi ɗi ɗon haɓɓooji ɗi.

Laku Oguta:
Luttugol.
Laku ɗon ha Oguta haa maare 50 km (30 mi) diga ndoni e Orashi. Ɗum ɗon haa juutugo haa fuunaaŋge haa hirnaaŋge haa duuɓi ujune ujune ujine ujine ujune ujane ujine ujane ujune ujene ujine ujene ujune ujne ujine ujne ujune ujje ujine ujje ujune ujunaaŋge ujine ujunaaŋke ujine ujone ujine ujere ujine uj ujine ujinaaŋge ujune ujone ujune ujere ujune ujinaaŋke ujune uj ujine ajine ujine ajinde ujine ujeke ujine ujinde ujineeje ujineeje ajineeje ujuneeje ujineere ujineeje. Luttugal diga Njaba woni ko ɓurna ɓalli haa Oguta Lake. Ɗe tati kooki ɗi'i ngoni Awbana, Utu e Orashi. Fuule Orashi ɗon ƴiwoyi ɓaawo maayo Oguta nder fombina maako to sahaa worgo hirnaange

Koololol Kaydi Okeluse:
Kuugal kuuɗe yimɓe dow leɗɗe.
Ɓeydi kuuɗe anthropogenic je ɗon nasta diga ɓeydi ɗuuɗuki yimɓe ɗon waɗa haajugo masin to ladde e jawdi maako ngam halki, ɗi ɗon waddana ɓesngu, ɓesngu e je jeɗugo ladde to kuuɗe leydi feere 

Oyan (koore):
Oyan 
Oyan woni gariiri feewde nder Odo Otin North Local Council Development Authority nder Osun State, Nigeria. Laamiiɗo laamiiɗo laatii laamiiɗo Oyan (HRM) Oloyan, woodi cuuɗi laamiiɓe 4 mawɗi e oyan, ɗi hawti; suudu Elemo, suudu Lajojo, suudu Daodu e suudu olomooba..

Rijiyar Nagwamatse:
Rijiyar Nagwamatse (maaki fuunaaki Nagwamatese ko fuunaaki nagwamatse) ko nokkuure taariike e taariiha duuɓi 150 nder km 20 to Kontogora, Naajeeriya.
Tariha.
Tawiisiyanke ɗon woodi ndiyam je ɗon fuɗɗii ha taginoowo dowla laamorde Kontogora, Umaru Nagwamatse, nokkuure nde maare ɗon ɗon ɗon ɗon nokkuure nde Nagwamatese waɗi kuuje ngam o jeyi cembal maako jeye e ndiyam ɗon ɓilla diga lesdi, nder warugo diga yimɓe emirate wi'i o ɗon waɗa haɓɓuki ngam du'aare caka nyalawma anndiraa Salaat Asri e dow haalaji jooɗiiɓe nder emirate wi 'Daily Trust Newspaper' ngam ndiyam ɗon ɓura fuɗugo mitaji jeye.

Tunji Alausa:
Tunji Alausa eii lysidi Naajeeriya likitajjo jornii oon doon ministajjo lafiya.
Janngirde.
Tunji Alausa eii ministajjo diga Janngirde hebe Lagos oon doon duubi 1993 eii woru cook county Chicago.

Fuuɗol Otamiri:
El río Otamiri es uno de los principales ríos del estado de Imo, Nigeria. El río toma su nombre de Ota Miri, una deidad que posee todas las aguas que llevan su nombre, y que a menudo es el dios dominante de las casas Mbari. El río corre al sur desde Egbu pasando por Owerri y a través de Nekede, Ihiagwa, Eziobodo, Olokwu Umuisi, Mgbirichi y Umuagwo hasta Ozuzu en Etche, en el Estado de Rivers, desde donde fluye al Océano Atlántico. La longitud del río desde su fuente hasta su confluencia en Emeabiam con el río Uramiriukwa es de 30 kilómetros (19 millas).￼

Lodo Okpara:
El río Okpara es un río de Benin. Originaria del departamento de Borgou, fluye hacia el sur y se convierte en la frontera entre Nigeria y Benin antes de volver a entrar en Benin y fluye en el río Ouémé, que finalmente drena en el Océano Atlántico. Varios pueblos a lo largo del río son disputados entre Benin y Nigeria

Naadi Nun:
Lollol.
El río. También hubo cambios notables en el fitoplancton, el zooplanctón y la diversidad microbiana debido a la contaminación por petróleo en las zonas de muestreo.

Wuro woyla fuunaaŋge:

Naafuru (Nigeria):
El noroeste (a menudo abreviado con el noroeste) es una de las seis zonas geopolíticas de Nigeria que representan tanto una región geográfica como política del noroeste del país. Se compone de siete estados: Jigawa, Kaduna, Kano, Katsina, Kebbi, Sokoto y Zamfara

Naafre (Nigeria):
Kaŋko fuunaaŋge (ngam fuunaaŋgo fuunaaŋgi fuunaaŋgal) woni go'o nder nokkuuje je'e geopolitikɗe je'e nder lesdi Naijeriya, je'e je'e lesdi fuunaaŋga fuunaaŋgu lesdi. Ɗum hawti e dowla je je je jejeego - Adamawa, Bauchi, Borno, Gombe, Taraba, e Yobe.

North Central (Nigeriya):
North Central (ngam ɓurna fu ɗum nodditaama North-Central) woni go'o nder nokkuuje je'e je'e geopolitikɗe je'e nder lesdi Naijeriya je'e ɓurna lesdi lesdi lesdi. Ɗum hawti e leyɗe je je je je njoweego - Benue, Kogi, Kwara, Nasarawa, Niger, e Plateau - e lesdi lesdi lesdi Nigeria.

Nkwelle-Ezunaka:
Nkwelle-Ezunaka es una de las cinco ciudades del Gobierno Local de Oyi del estado de Anambra en Nigeria.

Nguurnga Ngaji:
Ngaji River ko ndiyam nder lesdi Nigeria. Ko fuɗɗori nder nokkuuje ladde gadaka nder lesdi Yobe, ɗon ɗon yahda haa worgo haa Ngalda, ɗon hawta bee maayo Ngalda, haa worgo Fika, haa woyla kiloomita 22.2

Ngadda River:
Nguda Ngadda ko nguurndam nder lesdi Nigeria, ɗo yaasi nder maayo Chad e nder lesdi Chad. Dam Alau je haaki dow maayo ɗon hawta bee ndiyamji je ɗon mari bana saa'i nder diiwaan Maiduguri.

Omoba, Abia:
Nguda Ngadda ko nguurndam nder lesdi Nigeria, ɗo yaasi nder maayo Chad e nder lesdi Chad. Dam Alau je haaki dow maayo ɗon hawta bee ndiyamji je ɗon mari bana saa'i nder diiwaan Maiduguri..

Lodo Oramiriukwa:
Oramiriukwa River ko ko ndiyam nder Imo State, Nigeria, ɗo ɗon yahda e laawol kilomita 14 ngam yahugo nder Otamiri Rive

Sakpenwa:
Sakpenwa ko ummatoore nder Daande Dowlaaji Tai, nder leydi Rivers, Nigeria. Sakpenwa woni laamorde laamu Tai, Rivers .

Shasha Forest Reserve:
Shasha Forest Reserve ko woodani nder lesdi Nigeria ha sud e dow mawngu mawngu e 146 mita. (7° 4' 60 N 4° 30' 0 E). .

Naadi fuunaaŋge (Nigeria):
South East (ngam fuɗnaama bana South-East) woni go'o nder nokkuuje je'e geopolitik je'e nder lesdi Nigeria, je'e je'e e je'e politik nder lesdi lesdi nder worgo fuɗnaange. Ɗum hawti e dowla jowi - Abia, Anambra, Ebonyi, Enugu, e Imo.

Naadiyanka:
Funaanu (ngam fuɗnaama dow funaanu) woni go'o nder funeeji je'e je'e politik ɗi Naijeriya waɗi e nder funeeje je'e e je'e siyaasa nder fuɗnaange fuɗnaango lesdi. Ɗum hawti e dowla je je je jejeje jejejeje je jejeyeje jejeye - Akwa Ibom, Bayelsa, Cross River, Delta, Edo, e Rivers.

Najeeriya (Nigeria):
South West (ngam fuɗnaama dow South-West) woni go'o nder geopolitikal je je je je geopolitikol je je je wakkilanta e je je je jaaji e je politik je je sud-west lesdi. Ɗum hawti e leydiji joweego - Ekiti, Lagos, Ogun, Ondo, Osun, e Oyo .

Sumu Wildlife Park:
 
Sumu Wildlife Park ko nokkuure jeewtiinde nder lesdi Sumu, nder lesdi Ganjuwa, nder lesdi Bauchi, lesdi Nigeria. Ɗum fuɗɗii huutoree e hitaande 2006. Dentuɗo duɗal Sumu ɗon ha woyla diga Bauchi

Udi Hills:
Udi Hills, ko Ugwueme e Udi hills, ɗon ha nder North Local Government Area of Enugu State, Nigeria. Ɗee hooseeje ɗon ɓadake mitaji ɗii dow maayo.

Ugwuele:
Ugwuele ko ummatoore Igbo nder Uturu, Isuikwuato Local Government Area, Abia State nder Nigeria je ɗon mari nokkuure wakkati Stone Age je ɗon hokkata daliila dow yimɓe ɗon jooɗii nder nokkuure nde duuɓi 250,000. Ɗum woni suudu huutoreeji ɓurɗi mawnugo nder lesdi Nigeria, e nder duuniyaaru .

Uruagu:
Uruagu woni gariiri nder Nnewi North, Anambra State, Nigeria. Uruagu woni laamorgo ɗiɗaɓo nder laamorgo nayi nder wuro Nnewi. Woɓɓe ngoni Otolo, Umudim e Nnewichi.

Dam Waatari:
Watari Dam ko dam nder Bagwai Local Government area to woyla hirnaange Kano nder lesdi Nigeria. Ɗum haaki caka 1977 e 1980 ha cost of Nigerian Naira ⁇ 7,108,000.00

Fuuje Yobe:
Yobe, anndiraa kadi Komadougou Yobe maa ko Komadugu Yobe ko Komadou Gou-Yobe (French: Komadoucou Yobé), ko ndiyam nder Afrik hirnaange ɗo yaasi nder ladde Chad nder lesdi Naajeeriya e Niger. Ɗuum ko ko nder kooki maako Hadejia, Jama'are, e Komadugu Gana. Fuuji ɗi ɗi ɗi ɗi je je je jejejejeje nder lesdi Niger e lesdi Nigeria, ɗi jejejeji 95 miili (150 km) e jejeje fuuji 200 miili (320 km)

Zuba, Nigeria:
1]Zuba wondi ummatoore nder Gwagwalada Local Government Area of the Federal Capital Territory (FCT), Nigeria. O woni nder hirnaange Abuja e nder hirnaango Abuja e o fecciri e nder hirnaaje Madalla e leydi Niger

Hannatu Musawa:
Hannatu Musawa eii hebe diga Diiwal Katsina nder wolya lysidi Naajeeriya Sheree Baffa,en Alhaji Musa Musawa. Hannatu moudoun lawyaajjo toe siyasaju lysidi Naajeeriya.

Simong Bako Lalong:
Simon Bako Lalong CON (eriminmo lewru 5 mongou 1963) eii hebe diga Diiwal Plateau, Jos will lawyaajjo toe siyasaju lysidi Naajeeriya jornii eiii ministajjo nder gwamnati,en Bola Ahmed Tinubu. Eii moube gwamnajjo Diiwal Plateau diga duubi 2015-2023.

Afrijet Airlines:
Afrijet Airlines wondi haade haade ha nder suudu NAHCO ha nder nokkuure Murtala Muhammed International Airport ha Ikeja, Nigeria. Ɗum haɓɓiti e fuɗɗii huutoreeji cargoji nder leydi e hitaande 1999. Haŋki maako fuɗɗi nder Murtala Mohammed International Airport.
Tariha.
Bana no huwtoreeji cargoji diga Nigeria, jaayndiwol ngol huwtori e huwtoreeji huwtoreeki nder Democratic Republic of Congo. Nde ɗon ɗon ɗon ɗon, haade ɗon ɗon ɗon ƴiwo diga ofisji mum ha Murtala Mohammed International Airport haa haadeji maɓɓe ha Opebi, Lagos. 
Ngomnatiwol Naajeeriya waɗi sahaa 30 abriil 2007 ngam jaayndi dabareeji dabareeji fuu je ɗon huwti nder lesdi ngam ɓe ceede ko'e maɓɓe ko ɓe jeyi leydi, ngam ɓe tabbitina kuugal be jam. Ndeen jaayndiyanke fuɗɗii fulɓe e dow ko'e nder lesdi Naajeeriya ngam ɓe mbaɗata ko'e maɓɓe. Haa e hitaande 2009, Afrijet Airlines ɗon maɓɓina.

Ajaokuta Airport:
Ajaokuta Airstrip ko Ajaokuta Airfield ko fuuɗugo 22 km (14 ) haa saŋge hirnaange Ajaokuta, gariiri nder Diiwal Kogi nder lesdi Naajeeriya.
Nootiral.
Ndeya haandi nder leydi kogi ha adogo nder gariiri ajaokuta, go'oto nder nokkuure jaandi nder leydi koogi, bana ko heɓii, dowya haandi ina woodi latitude (7° 27' 15.59" N) e longitude (6° 27' 23.99" E).Fuuɗorde nde walaa kuugal jaayɗe. E woodi feere feere ɓurɗe ɓadugo haa nokkuure nde. Bana nokkuure lokoja haa daande 40 km, haa daande Akure haa daande 130 km.

Akure Airport:
Akure Airport nokku ɗo Akure, laamorgo Diiwal Ondo, Naajeeriya. Akure non-directional beacon (Ident: AK) ɗon haandi nder fannu.
Siftorgal e dow.
Akure Airport haandi ngam huwtore hawtaade e dowla, e, ha ɓurna fuu, ngam ɓeyda haɓɓugo lesdi Ondo bee tammunde warugo ɗum ha nder nokkuure jaayndeere be taariika semmbe duniyaaru.Lindiyaaru, je ɗon huwdi lesdi Ondo, ɓaawo ɗon ɗon ɗon je ɗon je ɗon haandi ngam je ɗon haani ha haandiji je ɗon haanda nder duniyaaru. Ɗum haɓɓooji dowla ɗi ɗon haɓɓooje km be gariiri. Ha ɓeydude, ɗum haani haandi bana nokkuure jaayɗe je ɗon ɓale e je ɗon ɓalle ngam huutore kuuɗe jaayɗe jaayɗe lesdi nden ngam hokki remooɓe e jaayɓe jaayɗe heɓugo kasu duniyaaru. Wurooɓe, kuugal jaayɗe e mawɓe jaayɗe nguu ɗon yaha e nder garooji.
Lindiya e nokkuuje jaaynde.
Fedde Fuuɗugo Fuuɗungo lesdi Naajeeriya (FAAN) e jaayɗe feere feere ɓe saini alkawal dow 9 Maayi 2023, ngam ɓe ɗaɓɓa yimɓe 14,000 ɓe ɓe mari anndal ngam ɓe wayli fuuɗugo fuuɗungo fuuɗingo Akure haa Aerotropoli City nder lesdi.Bana habaru, kuugal ngal, je naptata naira biliyon 56, je nawtata nder lesdi Afrika ha baŋnge Sahara.

Al-Dawood Air:
 
Al-Dawood Air wondi haaki jaayndiyankeji je ɗon ɗon haaki Lagos, Naajeeriya, ɗon huwtoroo jaayndiyaaji je ɗon haaki duniyaaru fuu diga Ostend-Bruges International Airport, Belgium, e Murtala Mohammed International Airport, Lagos.
Al-Dawood Air fuɗɗii nder hitaande 2002 bana jaayɗe Al-Dawod Group, nden o jooɗoti kuuɗe nder hitaande 2005 waɗi?.
Fuuɗal.
Al-Dawood Air fleet hawti nder go'o tan Douglas DC-8 Series 63F piirowal.

Albarka Air:
Albarka Air wondi haaki dow Abuja, Naajeeriya. O huwtori kuuɗe kalkal e charter nder leydi Naajeeriya e charters to lesdi feere nder lesdi Afrika caka e hirnaange. Haŋki maako fuɗɗi ɗon nder gariiri Nnamdi Azikiwe, Abuja.
Destinations.
