Albarka Air waɗi kuugal haa nokkuuje nder lesdi ɗi ɗon ɗon ɗon ɗon haandi (e lewru Janaare 2005): Abuja, Lagos, Maiduguri e Yola.

Adebayo Adelabu:
Adebayo Adelabu eriminmo lewru 28 moungou 1970 eii bididdo shugabajjo (CBN) jornii eii ministajjo (power) nder gwamnati Bola Ahmed Tinubu.

Luttuɗe Mandara:
Las Montañas Mandara son una gama volcánica que se extiende a lo largo de aproximadamente 190 km (alrededor de 120 millas) a lo largo del norte de la frontera entre Camerún y Nigeria, desde el río Benue en el sur (9°18′N 12°48′E / 9.3°N 12.8°E) hasta el noroeste de Maroua en el norte (11°00′N 13°54′E / 11.0°N 13.9°E). La elevación más alta es la cumbre del monte Oupay, a 1.494 m (4.900 pies) sobre el nivel del mar (10°53′N 13°47′E / 10.883°N 13.783°E) .

Cheif Lateef Olasunkanmi Fagbemi:
Chief Lateef Olasunkanmi Fagbemi SAN (eriminmo lewru 16 morso moungou 1959) eii lysidi Naajeeriya lawyaajjo toe siyasaju jornii eiii ministajjo Shari,a Ardiido lawyaajjo bididdo Naajeeriya diga lewru 21 duubi 2023.
Janngirde.
Lateef Fagbemi eriminmo lewru 16 morso moungou 1959 nder ijabo hukuma pamara oyun Diiwal Kwara lysidi Naajeeriya eii moube Jami,are Jos duubi 1984 fiberee Shari,a o janja wara,en Nigerian Bar duubi 1985 Yar,en Jami,are Obafemi Awolowo duubi 1987. Eii woodi Ardiido lawyaajjo bididdo Naajeeriya (SAN) dubbi 1998.
Lewru 16 duubi 2023 eii hebe ministajjo Shari,a nder gwamnati Bola Ahmed Tinubu.

Luttugol Azare:
Azare Airstrip ko dowla dowla aji 10 km (6 ) dowla Azare nder Diiwal Bawci, Naajeeriya.
Azare airport anndiraa kadi bana Bauchi Airport, ɗon ha Azare go'o nder laamu gariiri nder Diiwal Bawci, ɓadi Misaw road, ngam lesdi maare, Azare woni gariiri ɗiɗawre ɓurɗo mawnugo nder lesdi. Fulani, Barberi, e Hausaji ɗon mari semmbe dow nokkuure nden.
Loftaade ɗon haani 198.2km yani (2h 16m) diga Bawci, amma to on ɗon yahda diga yeeso madiki-kafin liman-gubi laawol, ɗum haani 3hrs (245.5km) Azare airstrip woodi laawol go'oto ngam halki cuka, dow laawol fuɗugo ɗon haani diga asfalti, koo nde ɗum ɗon haani laawol fuɗuki ɗon haani

Anambra International Cargo Airport:
Anambra International Cargo Airport Umuleri woni dowla dowla nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum ɗon ha Ivite-Umueri nder Umuleri, Anambra State.
Tariha.
Landu ngam haɓɓugo garowol ngol fuɗɗii haɓɓugo dowla lesdi Anambra ha 11 abriil 2017, e haɓɓugo haɓɓugo duuɓi tati ɓaawo. Nde dowla fuɗɗii haɓɓugo dowla lesdi Anambra Willie Obiano nder lewru Oktooba 30, 2017.
Ha lewru 2 Desemba 2021, Dowlaaji Naijeriya ngam jaɓɓugo jaaynde lesdi Anambra haɓɓugo jaayɗe ngam kuuɗe jaaynde, caggal nde jaayɗe fuɗɗii kuuɗe jaayndi dow 7 Desemba 2021. Nder lewru arandeeji mum fu, o waɗi fuɗnaaki 142 je ɗon hawta yimɓe 3,865.
Ha Maars 2022, gariiri huɓɓugo huɓɓugo Ziegler hokki haa dow dow dow dow.
Lindiya e nokkuuje jaaynde.
Lindiindiindiindiinde nder Umueri, nder Anambra East LGA nder Anambra state, ɗon ɗoofta ɓurɗe ɓooyiinde ngam ɗum ɗon ɗon ɗooftiindiindiindi. Watooje ɗe njaara haa haa dowla dowla ɗon jeyaa. Yimɓe ɗiɗo ɗon huutore ɗo: Air Peace e United Nigeria Airlines.

Capital Airlines (Naajeeriya):
Capital Airlines Limited wondi haaki haaki haadi ha Lagos, Naajeeriya, ɗon huwtori yaaki haaki nder lesdi e haaki ha haaki haandi ha Murtala Muhammed International Airport e Ilorin International Airport.
Tariha.
Capital Airlines haɓɓii nder 2003. Ha caka 2005, jaayndiwol ngol fuɗnaaki e Synergy Group ngam huutoree dowle jaayndiwal lesdi Nigeria e haɓɓugo feere feere feere, haa jooni ɗum yi'ata ɗum footi.
Dowla Nigeria waɗi sahaa 30 abriil 2007 ngam jaayndi dabareeji dabareeji fuu je ɗon huwti nder lesdi ngam ɓe ceede ko'e maɓɓe ko ɓe jeyi leydi, ngam ɓe tabbitina kuugal be jam. Capital Airlines haani ko haani e dow re-capitalisation nden nden haani haani nder nder nder huutore.
Nder 2009, Capital Airlines footii haakiigo dowla lesdi Nigeria dow dowla fuɗnaaki lesdi lesdi ngam heɓugo ɓurɗe go'o nder ndiyam, faamuki ɓurɗum ngam ɗum waawi wartuki fuuji fuɗnaaku nder lewru Oktoobar 2009. Kammu'en ɗonno ɓe taƴi nder 2010.
Destinations.
Nder lewru Julaay 2007, Capital Airlines hokki fuɗnaaki fuɗnaaku to birniji ɗi ɗon ɗo:
Fuuɗal.
Capital Airlines hawti e fuɗnde 5 Embraer EMB 120 Brasilia turboprops.

Escravos Airport:
Escravos Airport nokku dowla ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo naftoraaki nder Diiwal Delta, leydi Naajeeriya.
Osubi non-directional beacon (Ident: ESC) ɗon haandi nder fannu. Escravos NDB (Ident: ES) ɗon ha 1.2 nautical miles (2.2 km) sahaa fuuna fuuna fuundi. Lungo nder laawol hawti e dabareeji 300 mita (980 ft) nder laawol 31.
Nootiral.
Lindiyaaru ɗon ha Diiwal Delta nder fuuna lesdi Naajeeriya.Ɗum laawol go'o nder go'o je'eteeɗo Chevron. Ɗum naftira ɓurna fuu nder naati e wurtaago nder suudu tanki Escravos, dabareji gas, e EGTL. Ɗum ɗon huwti bana nokkuure fuɗɗam ngam kuuwol Chevron ɗon yahda to marsh fields e nokkuuje nder maayo.. ɗon woodi laawol go'oto tan 1770m.E wi'i hujjaaji dow laawol yahugo ɗon woodi latitude 5.62532222 e longitude 5.1923833333.

Gombe Lawanti International Airport:
Sani Abacha International Airport (IATA: GMO, ICAO: DNGO) woni airport nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Gombe Lawanti International Airport heɓi innde maako ngam ɓadiɗol to Lawanti, gariiri man nder Gombe State, Nigeria. Ɗum haaki nder laawol Bawci to Gombe nder hukuma pamarun Akko, Gombe. Dowla federe fuɗɗii Planning e 2005 nden fuɗɗii ha nder hitaande 2008, ɗum ɓamtaama ngam yimɓe ngam kuugal nder lesdi e nder jaaynde. Luttugol lesdi fu fu ɗon nder laawol Jeddah, Saudi Arabia. diga saa'i maajum haa dow dow dow dow nder gariiri lesdi Gombe Lawanti, haandi yimɓe ɗon ɗon ɗon ɓuwa. Lindiyaaru Gombe International ina woodi firoyaaru fuɗnaaku dow asfalti, ngam hokki huwugo jaaynde nder jemma. Koo lammunde fannu ɗon haɓɓaa, ɗon woodi haaje 1590 feet (484.63m). Gombe International Airport Lawanti ina woodi km 3.5 e ina waawi hawtaade hawtaade fuɗnaaku.
Kuugal.
Luttugol lesdi Gombe lawanti woni nokkuure kuuɗe Arik Air, Azman Air, e Air Peace ha jooni haaje nder lesdi Abuja nder lesdi Naijeriya.

Linen Gombe:
Gombe Line woni kuugal fuɗɗam fuɗɗam huutore 
Goomu e nder laamu Diiwal Gombe, Naajeeriya. Laddaare mum ɓurɗo mawnugo ɗon nder gariiri Gombe.

Ibom Air:
Ibom Air ko haandi lesdi Nigeria je je je je haandi e laamu Akwa Ibom.
Tariha.
Nde darnde fuɗɗii huutoreeɓe dow 7 lewru Juun 2019 nde dowla Bombardier CRJ900 je marki e innde Ibom Air je ƴetti diga dowla Victor Attah International Airport (IATA: QUO), Uyo, be mawɓe laamu dowla, nder laawol to Muritala Muhammed International Airport nder Lagos. Akwa Ibom woni lesdi arande nder lesdi ngam mari jaaynde.
Nder lewru Maayi 2021, jaayndiwol ngol maɓɓini haɓɓuki koode lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi Nigeria arandeeji bee Dana Air. Dana Air COO Obi Mbanuzuo wi'i alkawal ngal "ko arande nder feere maako ngam jaayndi dabareeje nder lesdi Nigeria". Mr Mbanuzuo ɓeydi: "En ɗon tammunde ngam tokkugo nanondiral... hokkoto bana non ngam ɓeydaago ɓeydaaki nder nder nder nder kuugal".
Fuuɗal.
Ha May 2021, Ibom Air ina woodi fleetji ɗi'i:

Luttugol busji Ikeja:
Ikeja Bus Terminal ɗon ha Ikeja, laamorgo lesdi Lagos. Terminal bus ɗon ha laawol haa haa suudu ndun haa ɓaawo laawol njamndi nder gariiri, e hawtaago suudu jaajol lesdi, ikeja general post office, fuu nder gariiri Computer Village.
Fedde ɗon ɗon ɗon ɗon ha babal lesdi mita mita 10,000 je ɗon haandi bee sistemam Transport Intelligent (ITS), terminal je ɗon mari cembiɗam, suudu nyaamdu, dooje, gallery ATM, WiFi je ɗon mari bana bana bana bana non, be cembiɗirɗe je ɗon je ɗon haani e nder feere feere. Bana ha warugo, Terminal Bus Ikeja ɗon woodi leydi ɗuuɗal ngam busji ngam darugo e darugo, laawol mawɗo ngam yimɓe, lambi cotto, cuuɗi yahugo, towerji ngam laɓɓina kuuɗe e greening bee ƴellitaaki.
Terminal bus ngal haɓɓii ngam hooreejo leydi Muhammad Buhari GCFR haa 29 Maars, 2018. Yimɓe feere ɗuuɗɓe ɗon ɗon ɗon ɗon haa gomnaaru dowla Ambode, gomnaaru dawla Bola Ahmed Tinubu.
Luttugol busji Ikeja ɗon huwti bana ko'e ɓooyaaku nder kuuɗe jaɓɓorgo nder nokkuure Ikeja, ɗon huwta yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe nder nder nder nder nyalnde nden, e ɗon hokkata laawol haa nokkuuje ɗuuɗɗe bana Oshodi, Ojota, Iyana-Ipaja, Maryland, Lekki, Ogba, CMS nder nokkuuje ɗuɗɗe.
Goomu leydi Lagos ɗon yiɗi waɗugo sistemal jaayɗe wuro maare nder wuro maare e yimɓe haani ha yimɓe miliyonji noogas be ɓe ɗon haani ha ha ha ha hujja.

Ilorin International Airort:
Ilorin International Airport ((IATA: ILR, ICAO: DNIL)) nokkuure nder leydi Naajeeriya.Ilorin International Airport Sabo e huutoreeɗo Federal Airports Authority of Nigeria (FAAN) ɗon haadi e dow 1.8 km diga nder gariiri Ilorin. Airport woodi laawol go'o, je ɗon 3,100M X 60M, yahugo 121.2MHz
Tariha.
Ilorin International Airport ɗon huwta bana dow dow dow dow ley ley ley ley nder Lagos Airport, nden ɗon haadi hawtaade saa'i go'o diga Lokoja, laamorgo Kogi State. Wakkati ɓaawo, suudu terminal nder Ilorin International Airport ɗon je ɗon je ɗon hawtake ngam je ɗon jeya ha nder yimɓe 500. Fuuɗugo suudu duɗal ngal waɗi hooreejo Olusegun Obasanjo, mo waɗi kadi duɗal fuɗugo suudu cargo nder suudu duɗol ngol, ɗum haani timminaama nder lewru mars 2007. Ndeya fuɗɗii haɓɓugo nder 16 feebari 1978, nden ɗon haandi nder nokkuure Fili nder Ilorin, ha woɗɗi 9km ha worgo hirnaange gariiri Ilorin. Ilorin International Airport ko nokkuure fuɗɗorde nder lesdi Naajeeriya, nder diiwal Kwara.
Yimɓe hawtaɓe ko ɓuri annduki dow dow dow dow nder ilorin International Airport ngoni Air Peace, Azman Air, e Arik Air. Luttuɓe ɓurɓe anndude diga Ilorin International Airport ngoni Abuja, Lagos, Warri, Port Harcourt, e Kano. Ndeerirde nde'e ɗon ɗowol e lugge ɗiɗi, Air Peace e Azman Air. Ɓe ɗon kuuwa yaaki Lagos, Abuja, e Port Harcourt. Ndeer haaje ɗon waɗa laaɓinki feere, hawti e haɓɓugo suudu terminal keso e ɓeydagol laawol. Ɗee ɓeydaaki ɗon haani waɗugo dow suudu nduu haa ɓeydoo huutoraade yimɓe ɓe ɓuri ɗuuɗugo, ɗum ɓeydi ɓurugo 20% diga hitaande ɓaawo.
Kaweje.
Nder lewru Maayi 2019, daamaandi DA42 Twin Star, numuru limgal 5N-BNH, ɓooyi dow laawol Ilorin. Yimɓe ɗiɗo ɓe ɗon ɗon ɗon ɓe ɗon njokki.

Ahmed Musa Dangiwa:
Ahmed Musa Dangiwa (eriminmo lewru 12 Bowte moungou 1967) eii lysidi Architecture toe siyasaju, jornii eii ministajjo woruu oon don shugabajjo FMB diga duubi 2015 toe 2022.

Jamu jeyi julanafa sey a wodi jamu dun julata harma dun nafa tawala jamukam wala hala julde hakku bo nafa:
Nana sosa Jamu jeyi julanafa sey a wodi jamu dun julata harma dun nafa tawala jamukam wala hala julde hakku bo nafa

Adegboyega Oyetola:
Adegboyega Oyetola (eriminmo lewru 29 Siilto moungou 1954) eii lysidi Naajeeriya toe siyasaju toh bididdo Gwamnajjo Diiwal Osun jam,iyajju (APC) duubi 22 September 2018 eii Ardiido kuugal gwamnajjo Rauf Aregbesola.

Bunmi Tunji-Ojo:
Olubunmi Tunji-Ojo eii nylde ngu lewru 1 Duujal moungou 1982 eii Naajeeriya lawyajjo, lomuujo, toe siyasajju jornii eii ministajjo nder handee woruu Naajeeriya. Eii hebe majalisajjo ngu Akoko woila litugal toe Akoko woila hirna Diiwal Ondo diga duubi (2019) toe 2023.
Taariku Daygo Makko.
Bunmi Tunji-Ojo o janja BTO julldo no naylde ngu lewru 1 Duujal moungou 1982 nder Oyin Akoko, Diiwal Ondo lysidi Naajeeriya, Djannde maako artuude mo fuddi firamare Oyin Akoko diga 1987 toe 1990 e maako artuude sikandare Hakda international nder e Kaduna diga (1999) toe (1992) oon doon mawbe jangirde Jami,are Obafemi Awolowo Ile-Ife binngel fodi innare emo janngi Enginineer mawbe. E makko tor jornii artuude mo fuddi Jami,are Woila London biingel fodi innare Enginineer hebe,en takadajji America naylde o danyama 24.
Kuugal Siyassaji.
Bunmi mo lattake dokkowo majalisajjo nder Akoko woila/lituagal toe Akoko Woyla Hirna ngu Diiwal Ondo hebe,en All progressive Congress (APC).
Ngendam.
Bunmi woodi Debbom Abimbola Tunji-Ojo oon mah e wortake diga Diga Diiwal Ondo lysidi Naajeeriya joonde woodi sheree.

Mbe Mountains Community Forest:
Mbe Mountains Community Forest ɗon ha nder fombina Nigeria, e ɗon hawta km 86.
Wato dow maare dow mita 900 Mbe Mountains ɗon mari muhimmaare ngam gorilla Cross River gorilla gorilla diehli, bana non boo feere feere feere feere bana lesdi Nigeria-Cameroon chimpany Pan troglodytes ellioti, mandrillus leucophaeus, e Picathartes oreas. Mbe Mountains ɗon hawta bee ummaatooje joweeɗiɗi e yimɓe 10,000..

Mgbidi:
Mgbidi woni laamorde Oru West, nokkuure laamu leydi Imo nder worgo fuuna fuuna fuun Nigeria. O ɗon haade e latitude 5.37° N e longitude 6.57° E. O laati laamorde nokkuure laamu Oru haa ɓaawo ɗum haade nder nokkuure laamu ɗiɗi, Oru West e Oru East, nder hitaande 1996 nder hooreejo leydi Sani Abacha.

Mowo, Badagry:
Mowo woni gariiri nder Badagry, Lagos State, worgo hirnaange Naijeriya. Duule ɗon haade km be Seme Border bee yimɓe 78,897. Yimɓe gariiri ɗon ɓurna ɓe ceernoɓe ɓe ɗon huuwa kuuɗe nder Seme. Nder lewru Desemba 2013, ɗum haalanama wonde 600 cuuɗi ɗi ɓe haɓɓii dow haaktere 65 nder leydi ndii ɓe mbari ngam polis lesdi Nigerian .

Koolol Ka:
Ka River (ngam anndiraa kadi Gulbin Ka River) woni maayo nder fombina lesdi Nigeria. Ko fuɗɗii e nder Zamfara State, ɗum waɗi ko e 250 km (160 mi) hirnaange haa dow lesdi Kebbi to ɗum hawti e maayo Sokoto ko e 100 km (62 mi) haa worgo Birnin Kebbi, ɓaawo ɓaawo ɓeydaaki nder maayo Niger.

Kool Kaduna:
Kaduna ko ko ndiyam Niger, ɗo yaasi nder lesdi Nigeria. O heɓii innde maako diga crocodiles je ɗon jooɗi nder maayo e nokkuuje je ɗon. Kaduna nder ɗemngal ngal, Hausa, woni wolde "crocodile". O fuɗɗii nder Plateau State dow Plateau Jos 29 km (18 mi) saŋge hirnaange wuro Jos, o ɓaditoo nder lesdi Kaduna e nder laamorgo maako Kaduna, o hawti bee maayo Niger nder lesdi Niger. Fuu nder laawol ma'a ɗon yaaki nder ladde savanna, amma fottirde ma'a ɓaawo ma'a waɗii ko'e cukalel dow ma'a haa nder ladde Niger. Fuuji huutoroo ngam haɓɓugo ndiyam e jaɓɓugo ɗi'e.

Katabu:
Geography.
Katabu ɗon ha nder nokkuure laamorde Igabi nder lesdi Kaduna, Nigeria, nder fannu woyla lesdi.

Kpopie:
Kpopie wonde go'o nder gariiri Gokana nder leydi Rivers, Nigeria. Duule ɗon haandi bee Bonny haa fuunaaŋge e Bodo haa hirnaaŋge nder Gokana Local Government Area nder leydi ndin.

Koore Kukuruku:
Ko Kukuruku Hills woni nokkuure mawnde nder lesdi Nigeria. Ɗum hawti (e nder terminology haɓɓii) Afenmai Division, anndiraa haa 1957 bana Kukuruku Division, bana dow dow Owo e Ekiti Division, e Western Kabba Province..

Waadi Kwa Ibo:
Fuule Kwa Ibo (ko maa Fuule Quaibo) ko fuule ɓadotooɗo to Umuahia nder Abia, Nigeria, e ina ƴiiƴa nder fombinaare worgo fuunaaŋgo nder Akwa Ibom to Atalantik.

Jengre:
Jengre woni gariiri nder Pengana Chiefdom, Jere District, Bassa LGA, Plateau State, Nigeria. Ɗum go'o nder nder nokkuuje Jere. Ɗum ɗon ha nder fannu ngal fombina nder Bassa LGA, haandi dow lesdi Kaduna diga fuuna haa Kan'iyaka. Jengre woni wuro wuro hooreejo Pengana Chiefdom e wuro laamiiɗo mawɗo dowla, Ogomo Pengana. Ogoomo palaas ha jere town of Jengre ha nder hitaande 1952 ha nder wakkatiire nden, o laati wuro jooɗorde laamu.

Igbariam:
Igbariam ko wuro wuro, nder Anambra East LGA, Anambra State. Ɗum noddiraa kadi ko Laamu Okalakwu.
Jaŋde e Igbariam.
University, Igbariam Campus

Gadar Tamburawa maayo:
Fedde ndiyam.
Haandi ha ɓaawo Gadar Tamburawa River, woni suudu mawnde ngam warugo ndiyam je ɗon maaki e maaki diga laamu Kano. Ɗum nder fuɗɗam ndiyam mawɗum nder lesdi Kano ngam waɗugo ndiyam je ɗon je ɗon jeyi diga piipol yahugo ha yahugo yimɓe fuu e ummaatoore ɓurɗe ɓadi. Lamarji ndiyam ɗon mari baawɗe waɗugo ndiyam 150 ml nder nyalnde.

Gelegele:
Gelegele Seaport.
Luttugal maayo Gelegele ina jogii nokkuure mawnde nder jaaynde Europeeji nder lesdi Nigeria. Nder laamu Oba Eware Mawɗo, Portugal'en laati ardiiɓe ardiiɓe yurup'en ɓe booɗɗini Benin nder maayo Gelegele nder hitaande 1472 AD. Ɗu'um tokki haade diplomati e jaaynde hakkunde Portugal e laamorde Benin mawnde diga 1504 haa 1550 AD. Nder hitaande 1963, Gelegele Seaport laatii anndal ngam naftoraade mum e naftoraade Philip's Oil Company Limited, maral Philip 66 nder Texas nder United States of America.

Fuuɗol Gongola:
Lollol.
Najeeriya National Petroleum Corporation (NNPC), je anndini, heɓuki naftira e gaas nder Gongola Basin, raki Nigeria, anndini wonde jaaynde fuɗugo heɓuki daga ɓolngo nder maare 13,701 ft yeeso huutugo naftira e gasa nder dowji feere ɗon haa jooni. Dental ngal ɗon njogii..

Goulbi de Maradi maayo:
Fuule woyla lesdi Naijeriya ɗon hawta bee maayo Rima. Fuule Goulbi de Maradi hawti e maako nder fombina maako. Nde ɗon yahda haa saŋge hirnaange, ɗon hawta bee maayo Sokoto ɓadi Sokoto ngam yaaki haa saŋgo haa maayo Niger. Ko nder sahaa leɗɗe tan ko maayo Rima ɓaawo ɗon ɗon ɓuwa. Proyektol ndiyam mawnde biyeteeɗo Zauro polder project ɗon nder kuuɗe diga duuɓi ɗuuɗɗi. Nder leelooji Rima hakkunde Argungu e Birnin Kebbi, ɗum taƴan haakiere 10,572 (26,120 ektaare) leydi lamɓe.

Fuude Forçados:
Lammbe.
Lumi Forçados ɗon waɗi hallude nder nokkuure nde ɗon, ɗon waɗa yimɓe ɗon njaɓɓa nder lesdi, ngam ndiyam ɗon ɗon hallude kayyaaji maɓɓe e jawdi maɓɓe, ɗon waɗi boo ɓe ɗon ɓeyda nder fannuuji ceede, to man'en ɓe ɗon marra ngam ɓe ɗon haɓɓugo ɗi.

Lodo Escravos:
Lollol ndiyam.
To ndiyamji ndiyam ɗon laato masin, ndiyamji ɗon laatoto ngam njaru, nyaamugo, limugo, hoolaago, e kuuɗe goɗɗe. Chemicals, waste, microorganisms, e parasites ɗon misaaluji halkere. Fuu ko'e ko'e halluɓe fuu ɗon ɓaawo ɗon ɗon wurtina nder ndiyam. Nder ladde e nder maayo, hawra je ɗon ɓeyda. Fuu ndiyam nder lesdi, ndiyam, e nder sahaaji fuu, ndiyam fuu waawaa wonde nder leydi. Ngam maajum, boɗɗi ɗi ɓe taƴi nder nokkuure majji ɗi mbaawata haɓɓugo ndiyam.

Bosun Tijani:
Bosun Tijani eriminmo lewru 20 July eii lysidi Naajeeriya-London dukkal lomou jornii eiii ministajjo pauro Naajeeriya bo e bididdo nder gwamnati Bola Tinubu diga August 16 duubi 2023.

Cross River (Nigeria):
Cross River (ndun suɓaaɗo: Oyono) ko maayo mawɗo nder worgo fuunaaŋgo lesdi Nigeria, nden ɗon hokkata ko woni innde maako to lesdi Cross River. O fuɗɗii nder Kameruun, to o jaɓi innde maayo Manyu. Ko ɗum ɓeydi ɓaawo e nder nder Afrik, ko ɗum waɗi ko ndiyam ɓeydi ɗuuɗugo e ɗum ɓeyda ɗuuɗugo. Nder km 80 ɓaawo mum (50 mi) to maayo o ɗon ƴiwo nder ladde ladde ladda bee kooki ɗuuɗɗi e ɗon ɓamta delta nder lesdi ɓadi naange maako bee maayo Calabar, ko uddugo km 20 (12 mi) e nder duuɓi 50 km (31 mi) hakkunde berniwol Oron haa hirnaange hirnaange e Calabar haa hirnaango hirnaange, ko ɓuri km 30 (19 mi) diga maayo. Delta ɗon ɓuwa nder ndiyam ɓurɗum ɓooyugo nder ndiyam, nder ndiyam ɓooyɗum nder ndiyam. Nder daande mum nder Atlantik, daande nde ɗon haaje 24 km. Fuɗnaange fuɗnaange nder fuɗnaande nder leydi Kamerun.

Chanomi Creek:
Kuje nder e ɓadi Chanomi Creek.
Ha 12 Julaay 2006, worgo doolaaɓe, ɓe gardiiɓe e gardiiɓe lesdi Naijeriya, ɓe ɗon haɓa ɓe ɗon nder doolaaje ɗiɗo. Sooji'en ndiyamji nayjeeriya nayi maayi, e gollooɓe Chevron ɗuuɗɓe boo ɓe naŋgi; ɓe rimini ɓe nder lewru 14 lewru 7..

Bonny River:

Bogomer Archipelago:
Ngam ndiyamji nder ladde ɗon ɓuwa, ardiiɗo Bogomerom archipelago ɗon ɓuwa nder lesdi

Bodo River, Gokana:
Bodo River ɗon nder nder nder nder maayo nder Gokana Kingdom. Ɗum laati laawol foroyugo yimɓe Gokana. Ruwɓe e rewɓe njahi ɓe njaha haa ndiyam Bodo ngam ɓe njooɗoto..

Fuuɗol Benin:
Ceeɗal/Jol.
Fuule Benin ina woodi sahaaji ɗiɗi haa tati nder sahaaji je'e e je'e, diga lewru janare haa lewru abriil ɗum ɗon je'e masin e je'ee, nden nder lewru Maayi haa lewru Yuli e lewru Septemba ɗon ɗon wara sahaaji. Fuu fuunaaŋge maayo ɗon mari temperatuure mawnde, ɗon mari masin masin e ɗon mari yotti diga fuunaaŋgi maayo.

Asia:
Azia ko wuro nder diiwaan Ihiala nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗum nodditii e nder Azia Alamatugiugele mo o fuɗɗii nokkuure nden nder hitaande 500 AD.

Fuuɗol Anambra:
Anambra River Region e Culture.
Omambala woni innde allaaje jamanuure nde maayo mum ɗon ƴiwo diga Uzo-uwa-ani to Aguleri, Anam, Nsugbe e Onicha, to o hawta bee Nguleeki Nkisi e Niger-kwora/Mgbakili nder yahugo maɓɓe to Ocean Atlantik, bana yimɓe lesdi ndi.

Amaryawa:
Amaryawa ko wuro nder leydi Jigawa nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Amaryawa ɗon ha nder Roni gariiri laamorde..

Alkalawa:
Tariha.
Alkalawa fuɗɗam ko ko e nder ko'e je'e alkali (ko'e laamiiɗo e hausa) nder laamu Zamafara, diga maajum innde Alkalawa. Ha fuɗɗoode karni 19th, Fulani jihadist Usman dan Fodio haɓɓii Yunfa (laamu laamu Gobir) ha Alkalawa. Duule man ɓooyi nder lewru Oktoobar 1808, ɗum waɗi ko ɗum timmini haɓre Fulani nder leydi ndi..

Alau Dam:
Fedde.
Alau dam ɗon mawngu mita 9 bee babal babal babal babal ndiyam ngal limngal 50 km. Ɓurɗo jaɓɓorgo haandi ko 112 million cubic meter. Alau dam heɓii ndiyam diga maayo Yedzram e maayo Gombole je ɗon hawta e ko'e Sambisa e ɗon ɓadake bana maayo Ngadda nder Alau dam. Alau Dam heɓii feere feere feere daga leydi lamɓe. Laku ndu naftiraama boo ngam haɓɓugo ndiyam ngam haɓɓuki. Alau Dam jaɓa feere feere feere nder kuuɗe lamɓe nder nokkuure nde. Alau be yimɓe 6895 be 1174 saare be yimɓe (Konduga LGA Secretariat). 

Akure Ofosu Forest Reserve:
Tariha.
Hokkaama nder hitaande 1936 e hawtaaki e ko ɓuri 400 km2 (154 km2), Akure-Ofosu Forest Reserve ɗon haani e Ala, Owo, e Ohosu ngam ɗum haani haandi e go'o nder nokkuuje je ɓuri ɗuuɗugo nder lesdi Naijeriya. Duniyaaji nder nder nder, ɗon woodi feere feere feere, hawti bee duumiyaji nder nder ɓoggi. Mangabeys be red-capped (Cercocebus torquatus), nigerian white-throated guenons (Cercopithecus erythrogaster pococki), putty-noseed monkeys (Cerkopithecus nictitans), mona monkeys, e woɓɓe fuu ina waawi wonde nder ko haani nder lekki Akure-Ofosu..

Akpotoro:
Fedde.
Akpotoro ina hawta e sub-communities ɗiɗi

Akata fuɗɗorde:
Akata Formation je je je je partiji nder tertiary Niger Delta (Akata-Agbada) naftoraade je je je ɗon ha nder Niger Delta Province, Nigeria ha Bayre Guinea, Atlantik.

Afi Mountain Wildlife Sanctuary:
Ngam hakkilanaaki nyawudi dabbaaji dow hooseere, ɓe ɗon waɗugo jammaji ngam hakkilanaago yimɓe, ɓe ɗon sembiɗina huutoreeɓe to nokku ngam ɓe ɗon ɓeyda huutoreego e haɓɓugo dabbaaji. Kadi, jaŋde e jaŋde nder gure 16 haandije dow hooseere nden, waɗi haade yimɓe ummatooje nder wakkati arande nder ummaatooje. Nder wakkati man je ɗon haani hawtuki nder ummaatooje je ɗon haandi ngam haani, Afi Mountain Wildlife Sanctuary ɗon haani bandugo bee yimɓe ngam hokkugo hakkilantaaku ngam hakkilantaaki je ɗon haaki e je ɗon haako.

Abuloma, lesdi Rivers:
Abuloma wondi nokku nder nokkuure laamu Port Harcourt nder lesdi Rivers nder lesdi Nigeria, o laati nokkuure nder hitaande 1956, nden boo o laati nokkuuje goɗɗe diga 1983 haa 1986. Laamiiɗo Abuloma diga arande haa Port Harcourt woni Bright Ateke Fiboinumama, Obeomomu-Odu, nden o laamiiɗo daraja ɗiɗmere. Yimɓe Abuloma ɗon mbi'a ɗemngal ngal ɓe nodda Obulom￼￼.

Hissare 10th maube Majalisajjo Naajeeriya:
Hisaare jerrogal 10th Sinatajjo nder Naajeeriya.

Hajiya Fatima Lolo:
Hajiya Fatima Lolo(MON) eriminmo Worou Fatima Muhammad Kolo nder Pategi, lewru Colte 1891 eii lysidi Naajeeriya Sheree.

Aliyu Makama:
Aliyu makama o janja (Aliyu makama Bida) nder naija I dubi 1905 baffajo mako okasancike maudo malamijo qur'ana modaraja I kotu daukaka kara natuki ki owadi jargirde firamare ijungo baffajo mako.
Ngendam.
Yawanci I waje fonbina, Aliyu ofuddi jande mako de arande I jangirde qur'ana de bida, kafin owada rigista I jargirde furamare de hebe,en bididdo de gariri bida. Kadan, oshe yita jande mako I du'un mataki dunba. Oyafdike kwalejin Katsina, tonto ohauti di mafi duduki be hirna. dun kama tike bedungo ho iki nauyi dawainiya hebuki yamuki yeso siyasa, tattali risku ijonde kunbina ikadi jagoranci waje gin yamuki gasa hore maube.

Abubakar Imam:
Abubakar Imam (1911-1981) on doon nylde lysidi jaridajju gada hukuma pamara Kagara Diiwal Niger eii woodi worou Gaskiya cooperation, eii hebe nasaraku tokocil woyla Naajeeriya. O dubbi 1952 o janja Jam,iyya Nothern people Congress (NPC) go,on modibo umaru Agaie toe Nuhu Bamalli.
Ngendam.
Eii dubbi 1939 toe Robert East toe bididdo worou jaridajjo Gaskiya corporation, o janja nasaraku kanko Ardiido woyla Naajeeriya.

Muhammad Ali Ndume:
Muhammad Ali Ndume (o danyama 20 e leuru nuwamba 1959). O latake goddo siyasajju leysdi Naajeriya. Hanko on woni maudo manga ha majalisa ndotti'en je sappo. O lataake sanata hakkilowo nukkore Borno gada dubije 2011. O laatake bi majalisa je lesdi Naajeeriya daga dubije 2003 yahugo 2011. Joni o do wakkere All Progressive Congress (APC).
Ngendam.
Muhammad Ali Ndume dayanma a wuro Gwoza je nukkore Borno. O wadi jangirde Firamare ha Gadamayo je woni ha Gwoza. O timmini ha dubije 1972. O nasti jangirde Sakandare je Mubi wakkati Gongola. Jonta Diiwal Adamawa daga 1973 yahugo 1978. O hebi saidaku timmingo Sakandare be WASC. Be ta'ini mo mangu daga odo pamarel ha be hokki mo mangu jogugo bikkoi je sudu mabbe. Be beddin mo mangu wakkati dubije karshe je Sakandare.Danyaki mako lati odo buri luttube ha sudu jangirde ha Comprehension Secondary School Mubi. Nde o timmini Sakandare o dilli Kaduna Polytechnic ha o jangi Marketing ha dubije 1978. O timmini Diploma je leysdi fuu ha (OND) ha 1980 be (HND) ha Marketing be Upper Credit Level. O dilli Federal Polytechnic Ilaro ha nukkore Ogun hakkunde 1982 be 1983 ngam o rewa leesdi je dole (NYSC). O nasty makaranta Ramat Polytechnic Maiduguri be matsayi mallumjo ha dubi 1983 ha o warty mallumjo manga. Ha dubi 1988 be hokkimo lambar yabo je beddugo ko lati kare risku je lesdi Duniya fuu. Bawo o timmini jangirde digiri je didabre ngam o janga ko lati filu be andal kwamfuta na jami'a Toledo, Ohio, Amurka. Kuma o timmini jangirde B.ED be M.ED ha dubi 1990.Be hokki mo Magna Cum Laude sahu je andal. Be nastinmo kungiya Phi Kappa Phi ngam kude boddum je o wadi. Bawo o timmini jangirde mako o warty Naajeriya o jokki jangungo ha Ramat Polytechnic Maiduguri nukkore Borno yahugo dubi 2003. Daga Bawo o nasti nder siyasajju.

Godswill Obot Akpabio:
Godswill Obot Akpabio CON (danyama 9 Bowte 1962) o lawyaajjo Naajeeriya den o goddo siyasa modo lami je 15th maudo Naajeriya hedi wakkere.
MANGU E NASARAKU MAKO.
Godswill Akpabio latake Bingel chief Obot Akpabio be madam Lucy Obot Akpabio (neè inyangetor) je ukana, ikot Ntuen ha Essien hukuma pamara je Udim. O danyama 9 Bowte 1962.Baba mako mayi wakkati odo pamarel. Dada mako maunin mo.
JANNGIRDE.
Akpabio jangnama ha Methodist primary school ukana Essien Udim LGA Akwa Ibom. The federal government college Port Harcourt Diiwal Rivers be university je calabar cross river ha o hebi degree mako hedi wakkere law
IYALU E NGENDAM MAKU.
Kaka Akpabio, okuku udo Akpabio o warrant chief ha nukkore ikot ekpene.. Kawu mako Dr I U Akpabio dum minister je jangirde hedi wakkere Naajeriya. Justice Nsima Akpabio njadu mako lati senator didabre ha republic je Naajeriya. 
Akpabio o kado je catholic faith. Akpabio bangi ekaette unoma Akpabio mo wangini family life enhancement initiative (FLEI)

Zanna Bukar Dipcharima:
Zanna Bukar Suloma Dipchirma (1917-1969) eiii lysidi siyasajju nder Naajeeriya Sheree dibi,en lokaci bididdo Naajeeriya diga Majalisajjo gwamnati Abubakar Tafawa Balewa. Eii Boutee lomou toh Shede.
Ngendam.
Eriminmo Dipchirma mongou 1917 luso Dipchirma Diiwal Borno. E saude Janngirde midil Maiduguri e boube mallami kwaleji nder Katsina.

Jaangirde Gobarau:
 
Gobarau University (var. Gobirau, Goborau) ko minaret mita 15 (50 nder nder wuro Katsina, woyla lesdi Nigeria. Ɗum haaki caka karnijum 15. ɗum ɗon huwti bana juulde bana Jaŋde. Woɓɓe nder ɓe njanngini nder suudu senioru ndu laatake ɓe laati jannginooɓe, anndal e diina ɓe laatiiɓe nder lesdi. Ɗe jannginooɓe ɓeen hawti e jannginoowo limte e karnijum 17, Muhammad Ibn Muhammad Al-Fulani Al-Kishwani, winndiyanke, Wali Danmasani, e Muhammad Al-Sabbagh (Wali Danmarina) [https://search.emarefa.net/en/detail/BIM-526048-the-gobarau-mosque-and-its-role-as-a-center-of-islamic-learn] . Dental jaŋde ngal nandi e jaŋde je'eteeɗo jaŋde jee'eteeɗo nder duniyaaru, Sankore Madrasah nder Timbuktu. Sabo Sankor e Gobarau ɗiɗo fuu ɗiɗo ɗiɗo ɗi ɗiɗo ɗiɗeeji ɗiɗeeje e ɗiɗeeɗe ɗiɗeeɗi ɗiɗeejo ɗiɗee. laati nokkuure mawnde ngam janngugo, ɗo ɗo yaajotooɓe e janngooɓe diga naange e naange, ɓaawo maajum o laati bana janngirde.
Bana misaalu aranndeeji mummi'en nder wuro anndiraaɗo nder suudu diina, tower ngal laati maral wuro.
Taariiha.
Gobarau minaret (e Hausa, Hasumiyya) ko suudu fotde 50 nder nder wuro Katsina, laamorgo lesdi Katsina.Minaret ngal ko gootel juulde nde mahama nder karnijum jowi e jowi nder laamu Sarkin (Kabara) Katsina, Muhammadu Korau (1348 - 1398 AD) mo woni laamiiɗo Muslim arandeejo leydi Katsina. Fuɗɗam juulde nden ɗon haani ngam kuugal jannginoowo diina Islaam gooduɗo semmbe Sheikh Muhammad Abdulkarim Almaghili. Almaghili, mo jibinaa e Tlemcen nder Aljeeriya hannde, o janngini wakkatiire nder Katsina nde o wattii wuro nder wakkati laamu Muhammadu Korau. Masjid Gobarau haani haaki ngam huutoree nder kuuɗe ruuhu e hakkillo. Ɗum waɗi e juuldeeji ɗi wonnoo nder wuro Timbuktu saa'i ɗon.
Masjid ngal ɓaawo ɗon naftiraama boo bana janngirde. Ha fuɗɗoode karnijum 16, Katsina laatiima nokkuure mawnde nder jaaynde e jaaynde haa Hausaland, nden juulde Gobarau ɓeydiima nokkuure jaayndeeji Islaam. Gobarau fuɗɗii wonde juulde Katsina fuɗɗam karni 19 AD nde Sarkin Katsina Ummarun Dallaje (1805-1835) maaki juulde keso, nde ɓaawo ɗun Muhammadu Dikko (1906-1944), mo maaki Masallacin Dutsi (Jamde mawnde Katina/Masallacin Juma'a na Kofar Soro), ko ɗon naftira haa hande.
Masjid e tower makko ɓe ɓe haɓɓii Sarkin Katsina Muhammadu Kabir Usman (1981-2008).
Fedde anndal.
Fuu ko yimɓe heɓa dow fuɗɗam Gobarau wi'i nde Muhammadu Korau waɗi Jibda-Yaki Sanau, laamiiɗo paganol keso Katsina, o yiɗi nyiɓugo juulde. Caggal nde nokkuure nden suɓii, hawti haala dow laawol kibila to juulde nden fota. Muhammadu Korau hawti e jannginooɓe Muslim'en wakkati oon, ɓe fuu ɓe njaɓii laawol go'o, sey Mallam Jodoma, neɗɗo Fulani mo o anndi. Woni ko haani, e jannginooɓe goɗɗi ɓe ɗon ɗon haani Jodoma ngam o woni mo ɓe anndaa mo o yiɗi wurtina mo. Mallam Jodoma ɗon ɗon ɓeyda, o holli maral maako to laawol feere, nden ɗon ɗon Ka'aba ɗon waŋgina. Tower'en naftiraama boo ngam yi'ugo konu'en ɗon ɗon haɓɓa.
Muhammadu Korau hayɗini, o waɗi Mallam Jodoma Imam mawɗo mum, ngam ɓeydaago anndalɓe goɗɗi, ɓe waɗi Muhammadu Koraw hoolaaki Jodoma, o ɓeydi anndude, o yiɗi jooɗorde maako. Jodoma ɗon wurtina diga Katsina, o ɗon jooɗi Guga, gariiri nder laamu Bakori ha nder lesdi Katsina, to o maayi.
Jaɓɓorgo Kewuuji.
Muhammad Ibn Muhammad Al-Fulani Al-Kishwani, Fedde Fedde Fuuta, Astroloog, Mystik
Wali Danmasani
Wali Danmarina
Firoore.
Hannde Gobarau woni nokku ɗo yimɓe ɓe njiɗata tooro, e koode Kusugu nder Daura.
Firooji.
<templatestyles src="Module:Coordinates/styles.css"></templatestyles>12°59′53′′N 7°35′44′′E/Koɗol12.9980°N 7.5955°E﻿ / 12.9980; 7.5955

Diina Lislamu nder Haiti:
Diina Lislamu ha Haiti hawti e yimɓe musulmaaɓe ɓe ɓe ɓurɗi 1% nder yimɓe fuu, ɓe hawti e ɓe njaara. Musulɓe Haiti Limgal juulɓe e pelle Islaam'en ɗon ɗon ha nder lesdi.
Diina Lislamu ƴetti diga Afrik wakkati jaaynde maccuɓe (maaki karnijum 16), amma goonɗinki diina Otodoks ɓeydi ha Haiti nder duuɓi ɓaawo ɗon. fuɗɗam karni 16 Nden ɓe ummanii ɗum nder hitaande 1992 diga yimɓe Marokko ɓe njaaraama, diga saa'i maajum haa jooni. 1992 Musulmanaaɓe waawi waɗugo diina maɓɓe nder laaɓal e jaŋde Islaam ɗon haani.
Demmografi.
Yimɓe Musulɓe haiti ɗuuɗal ɓe'e sunni'en.

Ibrahim Dasuki:
Ibrahim Dasuki (1923-2016) en tuflejo Naajeeriya wakkatu arandejun jamhuriya dun Najeriya o wadii Sheree, o jogiike joodorgal waliiku, bawonon o lamni wajiiri wakkatu laamu Tafawa Balewa. Kadin o kiido wajiirijo Shoggu e sanaa'aaji e adiiraku.
ndayee deer hitaade 1917 deer gurel deer lesdi Borno. O jangii e jangiirde Midil de Maiduguri, o jingii modibbaaku e maude jangirde eekkutuki modibbe de Katsina.
Ngendam.
Dipcharima fuuddi kuugal moodibbaaku, o huwii e jangiirde duudde deer hitaade 1938 koyaari 1946 wakkatu dun o fuddii tufleku. O artirii nastuki eggol National Council of Nigeria and the Cameroon (NCNC). eggol gol Dr. Nnamdi Azikwe ardii, yo mo deer ardii be eggol gol yaki Birtaniya deer hitaade 1947. Dipcharima dali NCNC o lattike ardiido mo John Holt. O bedii naastugo tufle deer hitaade 1954 O nastii eggol woyla gol woyla (NPC), dow dandamol maako en subimo o laasti ngomna lesdi Borno. Yidde yimbee foodii latti ardiido eggol NPC lisal lesdi Borno kadiin ardiido lesdi yerwa deer hitaade 1956, O hebii innde geccawol "Zanna". O hebii joodorgal waliiku ngal leidi e Legas deer hitaade 1954 ndeen kadiin o lastikee bindowoo e sudu huwiirde adiraaku. O lastikee wajiirijo lesdi walaa fayil deer hitaade 1957 o lattikee wajiirijo shoggu e Sanaa'aji mo lesdi, o diilli Amurka ndeer "yaamde hitaade 1963 gan tefukii yidde Amurka ndeer gaagustaare sanaa'aji e Najeriya, to duun tabbitii duun uustay sembe huwiirde sanaa'aji Birtaniya ndeer tattali njawdi. Wakkatu duun o wooni e bigeyel geel o tindinii huwirde sanaa'aji kooccube alkawal bee kollataa shiya yidde ngan senndirigu larall e kadin shiya hokkuki hakke lesdi. Ndee hitaade 1964, jabi joodorgal wajiirijo adiraaku, emo jogii gal soja jabii lesdi nyeendere 5 lewru Janairu 1966. Baawo soja jabi lesdi nhanko ardii wajiri'en tambinbe lamu to soja'en kooshube fiddiirle wala firaminista Abubakar Tafawa Balewa mo.

Abibatu Mogaji:
Cheif Abibatu Mogaji OON MFR (16 Colte - 15 June duubi 2013) eii lysidi lomou toh Iya'oja nder Lagos, eii Inna shugabajjo Bola Tinubu.
Ngendam.
Abibatu Mogaji eriminmo lewru 16 Colte Diiwal Lagos Naajeeriya.
Zuri,a maku.
Chief Mogaji Inna Bola Tinubu hebe jornii eii Shugabajjo lysidi Naajeeriya, Tinubu oon doon Folashde bore,en Iyal'oja Diiwal Lagos.

Abdulmaliki CBE:
Abdul Malik CBE (1914-1969) Jami'ijo diflomasiya Naajeeriya kadin tuflejo kadin hanko woni maudoo kwaamishinajo Najeriya mo arandee e Birtaniya.
Maliki fuuddi jande e jangirde Elementary Okene ndeer hitaade 1923 kafin o dilla jangirde firamary de Bida ndeer hitaade 1927, o nasti jangirde ekkutuki modibbaku nde Katsina ndeer hitaade 1929. Ndeer hitaade 1950 o dilli Ingila gan eltugo famarde laamorde.
Sanaa'aji.
Malik fuddi kuugal modibbaku e jangirde Middle Okene ndeer hitaade 1935. Gadanon e deer hitaade 1936 en taadimo sulonowo kuude e Okene, O jogike gal har 1939. O lattike magatakarda mo lesdi Katsina ndeer hitaade 1939 ko yari 1940, baawonon o jogikee lamu famaarde lamorde Igbira/Okene bawo o dilla England deer hitaade 1950. Bawo o wattoyi daga Ingila, O nasti eggol NPC gol woyla, kadin ndeer hitaade 1952 O hebii joodorgal waliiku baarol woyla. Kadin danma e joodorgal waliiku gal lesdi ngal woyla, O jogikede har koyari 1958. Ndeer hitaade 1960 en hokkimo joodorgal maudo kwamishinajo mo arande e Birtaniya kofin en hooramo Paris dow joodorgal koroowo Naajeeriya e Faransa.
Gada yoonki e waade.
Maliki maayi e hitaade 1969 wakkatudun o hocci suutere e Okene, leysdi Kogi.
Hokkuki mango.
Nhokkimo lamba useki dun kwamanda siryeki lamu Birtaniya (CBE) e deer hitaade 1960. Footooji Maliki kanji didii di Rex Coleman dun Baron Studios e dun wangina dii e deer hebe jootiide dun National Portrait Gallery, London.

Muhammed Bello:
Muhammad Bello woni Sultan mo Sokoto didabo . O jogage lamu diga 1817 yarinki 1837. 
O bindowo habaruji, gime e ilmu diina.
O biddo Usumanu bin Fodiyo artudo wadduki Kalifare Sokoto bo arti jogaki lamu Kalifare den. Muhammad Bello mo bolweten dou maako, hanko woni burdo badaki baffa maako ngam raruki njamu Maako.
Usumanu Bi Fodiyo hanko arti daraki dou Dina islama, o famtini lenyol dou Dina e ilmu jamaan dum Rewbe e worbe ko nangi wojjeji funa ko heddi waila.
Haa Joni hanko arti waddugo haala shari'a dina islama o tabbitini dun hebi kotiji di shari'a islama. 
Muhammad Bello mayi nder lewru sappo e balde sappande Didi e jowi nder dungu 1837. Minyiko Abubakar Atiku bo biko a Aliyu babba Roni mo mawo o mayi.
Dubi Arendeji.
Muhammad Bello danyaama nyalbe alarba nder dungu 1817 sa'i dum baffa maako Usumanu bi Fodiyo e wodi dubi sappande Didi e jowe tati.
E mo noddire "Bello" ko dum hollata yo ballowo nder Fulfulde. No e holla basdaki Maako e baffa maako ngam diga e mo suka to baffa maako fuu woni emo don, diga bawo o wartani baffa maako on wazirijo Maako.
Ngendam.
Muhammad Bello yo wurti diga Fulbe bi'e'tebe Torodbe kautube i'am e larabankwen. Sakirawo Maako Abdullahi bi Fodiyo hanko wi sumpo maabbe e hauti e Fulbe e larabankwen. Ko o wi'ata sumpo maabbe yo fuddu diga larabankwen diga betedo Uqba. To haalaka Muhammad Bello besdi e wi'iki o Wala tabbas dou haala moi nder Uqba on. O Ando ko Uqba ibn Nafi ko Uqba ibn Yasir ko bo Uqba Ibn Amir? To tariha Kan Uqba on te'i Debbie Pullo noddetedo e inde Bajjumangbu burtido diga usulol Usumanu bi Fodiyo hanko biyetebe Torodbe.
Kalifa Muhammad Bello nder deriyol Maako Infaq Al-Mansur o bedi winduki dou hambe diga zurriya annabijo men Muhammad ta dadol kaka mabbe biyetedo Hawwa (madujoUsumanu bi Fodiyo) Alhaji Muhammad Junaidu wazirijo Sokoto njangowo ilmu tariha Fulbe bedi tabbinki haala Shaykh Abdullahi bi Fodiyo dou haala usulol Iyalu Bi Fodiyoyo fuddir diga larabankwen e Fulbe.
Ahmadu Bello nder bindi Maako dou tariha Maako bayodum hebi enci ko'e kadin bawo o Roni Muhammad Bello hanko ma o wi ebe kauti e larabankwen ben diga madujo Usumanu bi Fodiyo. Usulol Usumanu bi Fodiyo on e hauti hakkude jinsiji Fulbe e larabankwen.
Tariha ni holli Fulbe Ben diga bawo e hauti e hausen hanjum Wadi ebe noddeHausa-Fulani Arabs.
Ko fuddi nder dungu 1804 sa'i dum jihadi fuddaka Fulbe andiraka e Torankawa (Torodbe) Amman bindi mabbe Holli tariha no be hauti e larabankwen ben. Be bolwi Fulfulde bo e be kutira e maire ko de dum Andi be burtake diga jinsi ferefere.
Lesdi Torankwen Ben e hauti e lenyol Sudani musanmatan be gala jaudi. Bindainobe sa'i dum hauti e Fula, Wolof,Mande, Hausa and Berber. Bawo non e be wolwa Fula bo be te'i te'i ni nder Fulbe Ben bo be garti Iyalu Fulbe be ilmu.
Muhammad Bello hanko woni biddo Debbo nayabo mo Usumanu bi Fodiyo biyetedo Hauwa ko bo Inna Garka. Sakirabe Maako hambe maa fuu e be nder harkaji njangirde baffa mabbe to lesdi Degel bo diga bawo be sankiti nder dungu 1804.
Nder dungu 1809 Bello hanko warti neddo Dari do hebuki daulare Sokoto dou dalila non dum walli baffa maako dou hebki nasaraku dou nyamuki lesdi Hausa'en to konu Fulbe Joni be nder dungu (1804-1810)
Sakirabe Maako wattiti hakkillo mabbe dou njangirde non walli be anda. Nder burbe andaki ben hambe woni Nana Asama'u, bindowo gimi e modibbaku. Abubakar Atiku kam Roni mo.

Sambo Dasuki:
Sambo Dasuki danyama nyalande (2 Bowte 1954 bo o mayi 14 November 2016) haanko woni Sultan mo Sokoto mo dum jippini nder dungu 1996 sa'i lamu Goodluck Jonathan. Ko o wartata Sultan on o jogake lamu Baraden Sakkwatoɓe. Hanko woni Sultan arandejo nder wuro Bi Fodiyo badido Ahmadu Bello Sardauna mo Sokoto ginyiro Abubakar Guumi kadin haanko mabbiti Jama'tu Nasril Islam

Mohammed Tukur:
Mohammed Tukur eii Lamido Kano woyla Naajeeriya Tukur hebe,en laamorde Kano nder Bassasa hanko civil war.

Rabi'atu Dahiru Nyako:
Rabi'atu Dahiru Nyako Un moo haa daññaaɗo asal diiwal Adamawa, laatiiɗo kebɗo caydaa jannɗe firamareere mun jeya hukuma pamarum Ganye, Kadi yeesoore jeya sakandariire ɓaade geɓbal haa Hukumaa pamarum Mayo-Belwa, nɗen ɓaawo O faari Yeeso haa jannde Maako nde BA (ed) & PGDPPA janngirde Bayero Kano. Nde jonnta emoo huuwa haa jonnɗe kuutoro kuugal hawti jeya Hakkilanngo kuugal hijjoyki nɗum Naajeeriya.

Laamlamɓe Hawsaree:
Laamlamɓe nder Sultan

Lisi Janngirde mawɓe haa Diiwal Jigawa:
Diiwal Jigawa (Hausa: Jihar Jigawa; Fula: Leydi Jigawa) ko go'o e dowla 36 nder lesdi Naajeeriya, ɗo woni nder lesdi Naajeriya. Diiwal Jigawa Hausa Jihar Jigawa Fula Leydi Jigawa 36 diiwe nder lesdi Nigeria lesdi man woyla Hino tagi ha 27 Anngusta 1991, ha jaaynde Ibrahim Babangida mo hollitii haɓɓugo dowlaaji goɗɗi joweeɗiɗi e nder leydi ndi, hokki limgal dowlaaji haa tati. Jaɓɓorgo Kewuuji pinal ngal holli ko e nder sariya leydi ndii, ko e nder laamu leydi ndii e nder laamu nguu, ko e dow laamu leydi ndiin. Diiwal Jigawa je nder Kano State je je ha woyla fuunaaŋgo Kano State, be je je je ha nder lesdi Nigeria be Niger. Diiwal Kano, Niiser Laamorgo leydi nden nden nden woni wuro mawnde Dutse. Dutse Jigawa woodi laamorde hawrie 27.

Mahavvy maayo:
Mahavhi-Nord ko maayo to woyla Madagaskar nder diiwaan Diana.Mahavavy Mahavavy-Nord River Madagascar Diana O woodi fuɗɗam maako haa maromokotra dow maaki nder maaki Tsaratanana e o ɗon ɓadito haa woyla haa maayo Indiyan.Maromokotra Tsaratanana Massif Indian Ocean Luttuɗo wuro dow maayo woni Ambilobe. Ambiilobe
O ɗon ƴiwo nder laabi je ɗon mari ɓesngu, nden ndiyamji ɗon naftira ngam huɓɓugo ha 5500, nder ɗuuɗal,je ɗon jeya bee cotton. cotton Delta maako ɗon hawta km2.2

Maino (Angola):
Maino woni koode je ɗon ɓooyta nder Angola. Maino Ɗum ɗon ha nder lardi Bengo, nder fombina lesdi,180 km fuuna fuuna fuun Luanda. Bengo Luanda.

Fedde Makombé:
Maakombe woni maayo nder Kamerun.Makombé maayo Kamerun O hawti e maayo Nkam ɓadi Yabassi ngam warugo maayo Wouri.Nkam maayo Yabassi wouri maayo.
Tariha.
Maakombé River haɓaama nder karnijum 17th ngam lenyol Bamileke, ɓe je ɗon jeyi to ladde diga haɓɓuki Fulani yimɓe.Yimɓe Fulaniɓe yimɓe Bamileke Fuujo ɗon hawta bee nokkuure nde'e nder karnijum 20, e ɗon tiggi nokkuure nde 'Réserve Forestière de Manya-Makombé'.

Manambaho maayo:
Manambaho ko maayo nder Melaky,hirnaange Madagascar. Manambaho Melaky Madagascar.
O ɗon ƴiwo diga caka Madagascar haa nder Mozambique Channel e Indian Ocean.Channel Indian Ocean Mozambique
Fuuɗol maako ɗon ha ɓaawo Tsiroanomandidy, o ɗon yaaki ha ɓaawo Morafenobe,o ɗon dilli haa worgo Tambohorano e haa woyla Maintirano.Tsiroanomandidy Morafenobe Tambohorano Maintirano.

Manampatrana maayo:
Manampatrana ko maayo nder diiwaan Atsimo-Atsinanana nder worgo fuunaaŋge Madagascar.Manampatrana Atsimo-Atsinanana Madagascar O ɗon ɓuwa nder maayo Indiya ɓadi Farafangana.Indiyan maayo Farafangana.

Mananantanana:
 
Mananantanana ko maayo nder Haute Matsiatra, ɗon ha fuunaange Madagascar.Mananantanana Haute Matsiatra Madagascar O ɗon ɓuwa nder maayo Mangoky.Fuule Mangoky.
O woodi fuɗɗam mum nder Andringitra Massif.Andringitra Massif Nder maare Matsiatra o ɗon tawaa maayo Mangoky. Maatsiyaatira Mangoky River.

Kool mananjary:
Mananjary River ɗon ha woyla Madagascar,nder laamorgo Vatovavy. Mananjary maayo Madagascar Vatovavy.
O ɗon ɓuwa haa maayo fuunaaŋge, haa maayo Indiyan. Lindiyanka Ɗum ɗon huuwana bana fombina lesdi ɗi anndiraa Betsimisaraka. Betsimisaraka
Ɗuum ɓooyi nder wuro Mananjary.

Femi Adesina:
Femi Adesina OON eii lysidi Naajeeriya jaridajjo toe bididdo worou Shugabajjo Muhammadu Buhari nder gwamnati Muhammadu Buhari.
Ilmu.
Adesina benhirde Janngirde Obafemi Awolowo Diiwal Osun toe Lagos Janngirde nder lomou makko.

Ahmed Umar Bolori:
Ahmed Umar Bolori eii lysidi jakadanci jomou diga Borno jornii mangul shawarajii nder gwamnati Diiwal Kogi to bididdo worou Kogi State investment promotion Agency (KSIPA).
Ilmu.
Ahmed Bolori oon doon Degree eii fani biwal bil Adama daga Janngirde Benin toe moube Janngirde bill Adama toh hakko diga Janngirde Ahmadu Bello Zariya.

Adamu Suleiman:
Adamu Suleiman eriminmo lewru 14 Duujal mongou 1929 bore walla eii lysidi Naajeeriya dan Sanda oon doon Ardiido eii hebe,en Muhammadu Dikko Yusufu toe hebenayee Sunday Adewusi dubbi 1986
Ilmu.
Suleiman bidil Janngirde Jimeta diga 1940 yahri 1944 toe Janngirde Yola dubbi 1950 eii bidi Janngirde Barewa nder Zariya diga 1947 yahri 1950 haulu,en dai Janngirde Technology nder Zariya diga 1954 yahri 1956. Banddirawo Suleiman shere Janngirde mawbe Ibadan you kanko bidi,ondubbi1960

Fuuɗol Mitong (Equatorial Guinea):
Mitong woni maayo nder lesdi Equatorial Guinea.Mitong Equatorial Guinea Ɗum je taƴii nder Muni estuary bee maayo Congue,Mandyani, Mitimele,Utamboni e Mven.Municipal Estuary Congue River Mandyani River Mitimele River Utamboni River Mven.

Fuude Mkulumuzi:
Mkulumuzi ko maayo nder leydi Tanga,Tanzania.Mkulumuzi River Tanga Region Tanzania Fuule ɗon ɓuwa nder Tanga Bay nder Pemba Channel.Tanga Bay Pemba ChannelƊum je je je je nder poolugo maayo Pangani. Lodo Pangani.

Fuude Mkuzu:
Mkuzu ko maayo nder lesdi Tanzaniya.Mkuzu Mkusu Tanzania Magamba Forest Reserve je je je je taƴii nder nokkuure nden e woodi ndiyamji je je je ɗon wi'etee Soni Falls,to Mkuzu je hawta e Bangala River. Magamba Forest Reserve Soni Falls Bangala River. Nguun maayo boo ɗon ƴiwo nder wuro Kifungilo.

Fuuɗol Mo:
Mo woni maayo Ghana e Togo,o fuɗɗii nder Togo o ɓeydi hirnaange,o waɗi ko feccere hakkunde lesdi Ghana e Togo. Mo River Ghana Togo daande doore doore. O ɗon ɓuwa nder maayo Volta nder Gana.

Lodo Mocubúri:
Moocuburi (ngam anndiraa ko Rio Mukumburi, Rio Mocuburi, Rio Mecuburi, Rio Mekubuuri, Rio mocuburi,rio Mocuburi walla Rio Mukumbur) ko maayo nder lesdi Mozambique.Nokku Mocubúri Mozambique O ɗon ɓuwa haa worgo maayo Ruvuma,nden ɗon hujja bee ɓuwaaje je ɗon ɗon ɗon ɓuwaa e marɗe.

Fuuɗol Moukalaba:
Fuule Moukalaba woni fuule nder Gabon.Moukalaba River Gabon Ɗum go'o nder kooki ndiyam Nyanga.

Fuuɗol Megaruma:
Megaruma ko maayo nder fombina fuuna fuuna fuun Mozambique, je ɗon ƴiwo nder diiwaan Ancuabe.Megaruma Mozambique Ancuabe District O woodi fuɗɗam to woyla fuunaaŋge nder hooseere Mecumba.Luttugo Mecumba.
Nder maayo boo, nder hitaande 1954 ɓe nyiɓi laami.

Lodo Montepuez:
Montepuez ko maayo nder Mozambique. Montepuez maayo Mozambique O ɗon ɓuwa haa worgo maayo Ruvuma,nden ɗon hujja bee ɓuwaaje je ɗon ɗon ɗon ɓuwaa e marɗe.

Fuuɗol Mucheke:
Njool Mucheke ko ndiyam tan nder wuro Masvingo, Zimbabwe. Mucheke River Masvingo Zimbabwe O fuɗɗii nder hirnaange wuro Masvingo e o hawti e maayo Mushagashe ɓadi Eastvale.Mushagashe River Eastvale Mucheke bridge hawta laawol Harare-Beitbridge bee laawol Mutare-Beatbridge.Harare Beitbridge Mutare

Fuule Mukungwa:
Mukungwa woni maayo nder Ruwanda.Mukungwa Rwanda Ɗum woni ko woodi nder maayo Nyawarongo, ɗo yaasi nder maayo Victoria,maayo Nile e maayo Mediterane.Nyawarongo River Lake Victoria Nile River Mediteraniya

Naawdi Namorona:
Namorona woni kooduɗum nder Vatovavy,fuunaaŋge Madagascar.Namorona Vatovavy Madagaskar O ɗon ƴiwo diga lesdi caka,o ɗon ƴiwi nder Ranomafana National Park,o ɗon ɓooyta Andriamamovoka Falls, o ɗon ɗon ɓooda nder maayo Indiyan.Ranomafana National Park Andriamamovoka Falls Indian Ocean Ɗum ɗon dillaago to Namorona.Namorona

Nana Barya maayo:
Nana Barya ko maayo nder Afrik feccere.Nana Barya maayo Afrik feccere O ɓooydi haa hirnaange Fedde Afrik Fedde nder fannu Ouham-Pendé e o ɓoydi haa fuunaaŋge,o jeyaa nder fannu hakkunde lesdi Fedde Afrik feccere e lesdi Chad.Central African Republic Ouham-Pendé Chad Nder lesdi Chad o ɗon ɓuwa nder maayo Ouham.Fuule Ouham Nana Barya Faunal Reserve ina noddita diga maayo ndu.Nana Barya Faunal Reserve

Naro Moru maayo:
Naro Moru fuɗɗii dow lesdi Kenya,e ɗon ɓilla dow hirnaange,nder lesdi Nyeri,Kenya,haa maayo Ewaso Ng'iro.Naro Moru River Mount Kenya Nyeri County Kenya Ewaso Ng'iro Nuru Naro Moru e maayo Senegaal ɗon ɗon ɗon ɗon haandi bee Teleki Tarn,Lewis Glacier,Tyndall Tarn e Glacier,Hut Tarn e Darwin Glacier haa ko'e dow lesdi Kenya. Ɓe hawti e 2,810 m (9,200 ft) dow maayo.Naro Moru River ɗon ɓuwa haa ko 50 km (31 miili), nder wuro Naro Morhu, haa o yotti maayo Ewaso Ngiro.50 km (31 mi) Naro Moru Daande ndiyam Naro Moru woni ko 83 km2.2

Ndjim River:
Ndjim River woni maayo nder Kameruun.Ndjim maayo Kameruun. Ɗum woni ko'e ndiyam Mbam, nden ɗum je je je nder ndiyam Sanaga.Mbam River Sanaga River. Nguurndam ɗon ƴiwo nder Goura.

Ngalamu maayo:
Nguleedi Ngalamu woni nguleedi nder fombina Mozambique e Malawi,nder hirnaange maayo Amaramba.Ngalamu Moozambiik Malawi Lake Amaramba Ɗum ɗon ha 14°24′0″S 35°41′0″E﻿ / ﻿14.40000°S 35.68333°E﻿ / -14.40000; 35.68333.

Ngezi (Masvingo):
Ngezi (ko'o woni Ingezi) woni maayo nder worgo fuunaaŋge Zimbabwe.Ngezi maayo Ingezi maayo Zimbabwe Ɗum woni ko'e ndiyam ndiyam Runde.Runde River O woodi maare 973m.

Fuuɗol Ngolo:
Nguurndam Ngolo woni nguurndam Gabon.Ngolo maayo Gabon Ɗo woni go'oto nder kookiji Ogooué.

Niandan:
Njool Niandan woni ko wootere nder njol Niger.

Njoro maayo:
Njoro woni koode tati nder nder nder maayo Nakuru,Kenya.Njoro Lake Nakuru Kenya Fuude maako ɗon nder leɗɗe Mau.Fuuta Mau Ɗum anndiraa kadi bana maayo Ndarugu.Ndarugu maayo
Caggal nde ɓe ɗon ɗaɓɓita ngam ɓe mbaɗɓa haalaji ɓurna (fecal) ɗi ndiyamji nder maayo,ɓurna nder nder ɓesngu.hawtaade ndiyam fecal
Ɗe feere nder ɗi ɗon hawta e no manjoowo heɓata e laabi.manndoowo

Nokkugo Nokkugo:
Nokku Ngo woni nokku Gabon.Nokkugo Gaboon Ɗo woni go'oto nder kookiji Ogooué.Ogooué

Naadi Naadi (Morocco):
Naadi Noun (Arabic: وا نون) ko naadi nder Marok e ko naadi ɓurɗo yaawde nder leydi ndi.Noun River Wad Noun Arabic:واد نون Marokkal ndiyam Ɗum ɗon tawaa 70 km haa woyla Draa maayo e ɗon ɓilla haa yoŋgo hirnaange fuɗɗi diga Anti-Atlas,ɗon ɓilla to worgo Guelmim e hawtago e maayo Atlantic haa Foum Asaca nder leydi Sbouya.Draa River Anti-Atlas Guelmim Atlantic Ocean Foum Asaca Sbouya

Ambrose Folorunsho Alli:
Ambrose Folorunsho Alli (22 Siilto 1929 - 22 Siilto 1989) ko jannginoowo jaaynde Naajeeriya mo o golli hooreejo leydi Naajeeriya nder leydi Bendel (ko jooni woni leydi Edo e Delta) hakkunde 1979 e 1983. Ambrose Folorunsho Alli - Naajeeriya Diiwal Bendel Diiwal Edo e DiiwalDelta.

Astana:
Astana anndiraaɗo e Akmolinsk, Tselinograd, Akmola, e ɓaawo nde Nur-Sultan, woni laamorgo leydi Kazakhstan. Astana Akmolinsk Tselinograd Akmola Nur-Sultan laamorgo Kazakhstan
Duule ɗon haadi dow maayo Ishim nder fombinaare lesdi Kazakhstan, nder lesdi Akmola, koo nde ɗum laamoto bana gariiri bee daraja feere feere feere bee lesdi fu. Luttugal Akmola Fuu taƴre laamu 2022 holli yimɓe 1,350,228 nder nder nder nderji, waɗi ɗum gariiri ɗiɗmere ɓurɗum mawnugo nder leydi, caggal Almaty, je laati laamorgo haa hitaande 1997. gariiri ɗiɗawru nder lesdi Almaty Duule nden laati laamorgo Kazakhstan nder hitaande 1997; diga saa'i ɗon o ɓeydi e ɓeydi ha nder jawdi haa o wardi nder nder nder nder dowle Asiya cakaaji. Asia Mawbe Nder 2021, laamu Allah suɓi Astana bana go'o nder nokkuuje 10 ɓurɗe ɓamtaare booɗeeji.
Astana hannde woni wuro nder nder nder nder, e nder nder nder dowla dowla dowle. wuro je ɗon haadeje feere je ɗon haadije Ɓaawo o laati laamorgo Kazakhstan, gariiri man waylitii dow laabi maako bee laabi maako ɗi marɗoKisho Kurokawa waɗi. Kisho Kurokawa Bana nokkuure laamu Kazakhstan, Astana woni nokkuure wuro, suudu arande, Lamorade e dawlaji laamu ɗuuɗɗi e kuugal. laamu Kazahstan Hooreejo leydi Koore mawnde Ak Orda Hooreejo laamu Ɗum ɗon woodi cuuɗi feere feere, hawti bee cuuɗi mawɗi. fuɗnaaki fuɗnaaku.

Adegoke Olubummo:
Adegoke Olubummo eii lysidi Naajeeriya mallami toe Ifaki. Eii fauree Naajeeriya Sheree maube Janngirde.
Ngendam.
Adegoke yahi nder janngirde Methodist to Ifaki, o timmini nder 1937. Nder hitaande 1938, o tokki jaŋde Wesley College nder Ibadan. Koleji Wesley O heɓii jaaynde maako nder Fourah Bay College nder Sierra Leone. Fourah Bay College Sierra Leone.Nder hitaande 1938, o tokki jaŋde Wesley koleji nder Ibadan.O laati Ardiido Science of Ondo State University caggal nde o jeyi to Jami,are nder Ibadan e hitaande 1985. Jaangoore Leysdi Ondo.
Nolde hoore.
Adegoke woodi ɓiɓɓe tati ɓe ɓe ɓe ɓe limto. O baaba limtaako Yewande Olubummo.

Arigidi Akoko:
Arigidi woni wuro nder Akoko North West, Diiwal Ondo, Naajeeriya. Arigidi Akoko North-West Ondo State Naajeeriya
Juulde.
Won juulde nder teddungal Okota, Allah mawɗo maayo diga diina Yoruba. Diine Yoruba Ɗum ɗon jeyaa e Oodua People's Congress ha jaango Otunba Gani Adams mo ƴiwoyi nder gariiri. Congreere Yimɓe Oodua Okota boo ko juulde aada Yoruba. Yoruba aada Yimɓe feere ɗon ɗon waɗa ko Areso.
Fedde politik.
Arigidi woodi ɗiɗo nder jejejiji siyasa sappo nder hukuma pamarun Akoko North West, ko ɗum; Arigidi Iye ward 1 e Agbaluku Imo ward 2.  Ward 1 ina woodi goɗɗe 24 goɗɗe siyasa e ward 2 ina woodi goɗɗi 11, ko waɗi goɗɗi 34 fuu.

Solomon Babalola:
Professor Solomon Adeboye Oladele Babalola jibini nder 17 Bowte 1926, nder saare Babalola nder Ile-Ajo. Baaba maako, Joseph Olawuni Omowunmi Babalola (Ajala) laati mawɗo marɗo, mo anndiraa ngam maɓɓugo cuuɗi nder Ipetumodu ɓaawo ɓeydaaki ɓurna nder nguleeki ɓurna nder fuɗɗam karnijum 20th; diga maajum suɓugo saare "Alatunse of Ipetumudu saare ɗon ɓeyda hawtaade maɓɓe. Baaffah maako boo o kiristankeejo mo ɗon mawnina.
Ngendam.
Babalola waɗi batisma nder Church O woodi renndol kiristaanaaku mawɗo e o yahdi C.M.S. Christ Janngirde firamare, Wasimi, Ipetumodu. Jaŋde jaŋde O ɗon wondi gooduɗo nder jamirooje haa suudu diina nden, nden o ɗon werra nder suudu ducha nder yonki maako fuu. Babalola jaɓɓi Almasiihu bana Jawmiraawo maako e Kisnoowo maako nder wakkati o ɗon nder Igbobi College, nden o haɓɓiti ngam Bishop Lagos, Rt. Rev. Gordon Vining nder 24 Noofambar 1943. Bisopu Lagos.
Jaŋde.
Nder hitaande 1936, to Babalola woodi duuɓi 10, o suɓi mo mo jannginoowo maako, Mr. S.T. Fakoya, ngam o jooɗoto ngam jaɓugo jaɓugo nder jaŋde dowla nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Ɗuum jaayndeere waɗii nder Ibadan, nden nder wakkati mo o ɗon jeyaa e ɓiyɓe mawɓe nder jeyaaji jeyaaji joweego e joweego. Ɗum waɗi ko ɗum waɗi; nder 1937 o waɗi jaɓɓaade jaɓɓaare to Igbobi College, Lagos, o jaɓaama nder Form One nder lewru Janaare 1938. Ɗo'o fuɗɗii ko o mari anndal.
Kuugal.
Solomon Adeboye Babalola yahi Achimota College nder Ghana. Achimota College Ghana Caggal nde o heɓii jaŋde bachelor e hitaande 1946, o janngini e Igbobi College. Koleji Igbobi Nder hitaande 1948, o heɓi jaŋde ɗiɗmere ngam jaŋde maako nder jaŋde Queens' College, Cambridge, o heɓii jaŋde nder hitaande 1952. Koleji Queens, Cambridge O wartii to Igbobi koleje ngam tokkude jannginki e o jeyaa haa o warti ardiiɗo ardiiɗo Afrik nder janngirde, haaje o woni ardiiɗo darnde. O heɓii doktoor nder defte Yoruba. 1e 1962, o laamaama mo darinoowo nder Obafemi Awolowo University. Obafemi Awolowo University  O heɓii kadi jaango doktoor to Yunivarsitii London. [ ko haani] University of London E hitaande 1963, o jeyaa e jannginoowo ɗemɗe Afrik e jaŋde Lagos.
O yotti Cambridge nder lewru Oktoobar 1948 o hawti o waɗi kadi hooreejo The Afrik. Nder Cambridge o jaabini dow dow dow dow ko BBC West Africa Service waɗi ngam hokkude baylitol ɗemngal Farayse nder ɗemngal yimɓe maɓɓe.

Nyagak maayo:
Nyagak woni maayo West Nile,woyla Uganda.
Luttugol.
Nyagak maayo ɗon ƴiwo nder diiwaan Zombo e diiwaan Arua.Ɗum woni ko'e ndiyam nder maayo Ora,nde o hawti fuunaaŋge wuro Okollo.
Ɓuuruji ndiyam.
Ɓurna ɓesnguji ndiyamji ɗon haandi dow maayo Nyagak: 

Nzi maayo:
Nzi ko maayo nder Ivory Coast.Ɗum woni ko'e ndiyam ndiyam ndiyam Bandama.
Ha 6 Septemba 2016,laamorde laawol dow maayo ndu ɓadi Dimbokro ɓadake.

Koolol Karanga:
Karanga River ko maayo ɗo yaasi nder Karanga Ward nder leydi Kilimanjaro nder lesdi Tanzania.Fuuɗol ngol ɗon haa hooseere Kilimanjaro,diga ɗon ɗon ɗon ɗon ɓuwa haa worgo haa Nyumba ya Mungu.

Kool Kafufu:
Kafufu ko Kavu woni maayo nder worgo hirnaange Tanzania O ɗon ƴiwo nder Rukwa Valley,ɗon ƴiwi caka maayo Chada e ɗon ɓuwa nder maayo Rukwa.Nguurndam ɗon ɓesda,ɗon ɓeyda bee maare.Kafufu valley ɗon woodi ko'e njamndi e ɓanndu.

Kool Kalambo:
Fuule Kalambo je je je je taƴii nder sahaa hakkunde Zambia e Songwe Region,Tanzania.Ɗum woni ko ndiyam ɓii-ɓii-ɓooyma je ɗon ƴeewa dow Ufipa Plateau haa woyla fuuna fuuna fuun Mbala haa dabare 1800 m e ɗon ɓuwa nder Albertine Rift,ɗon naati nder fombina fuuna fuunna fuuna fuungol Tanganyika haa dabare 770 m, nder dabare dabare daare 50 km. Ɗuum waɗi ko ɓuri heewde anndude,ko ndiyamji,Kalambo Falls,woni ndiyamji ɗiɗaɓo ɓurɗi mawnude nder Afrik (ɗaawo Tugela Falls nder lesdi Afrika Fuuɗun).["citation needed"]Ha dow ndiyamji, maayo ɗon ɗon maaro nder ɓolde.   
Luttugol maayo ɗon hawta bee nokkuuje archaeological mawɗe.

Koolol Kalungwishi:
Fuule Kalungwishi ɗon ɓuwa hirnaange nder lesdi Zambia haa nder maayo Mweru. Ɗum anndiraa ngam ndiyamji mum,hawti e Lumangwe Falls,Kabweluma Falls,Kundabwika Falls e Mumbuluma Falls. ["citation needed"]
Won laabi haɓɓugo dabareji ndiyam ɗiɗo ha dow Kundabwika e kabwelume.Ɗuum naa' manɗinii yimɓe fuu ngam woɓɓe ɗon numi laamorde ndiyamji ɗon ɓeyda.["citation needed"]
Kalungwishi pontoon dow laawol Kawambwa-Mporokoso dow Lumangwe Falls haɓɓii bee laami kesum nder hitaande 2004.["citation needed"]

Koololol Kangen:
Nguurndam Kangen woni nguurndam nder Sudan worgo,to hirnaange lesdi Boma.O hawti e maayo Pibor ɓadi Pibor.

Carolyne Adalla:
Carolyne Adalla ko winndiiɗo Kenya, o winndi defte Confessions of an AIDS (1993).
Carolyne Adalla jibinaa nɗer Kenya. Goomu mo SIDA wallituɗo on o wi'i ɗum ko haala gootol. Catherine Njeri, mo laatiiɗo nɗer lesdi ndin, heɓii nyau ndu AIDS, o waawi ɓeydaaɗe janngude nder lesdi Amurkaa.

Lateef Kayode Jakande:
Lateef Kayode Jakande 23 July 1929 - 11 morso 2021) ko wonɗo nder lesdi Naajeeriya mo woni laamɗo leydi Lagos diga 1979 haa 1983, nden boo o laatii Minista kuugal nder laamu laamu Sani Abacha.
Firo.
Lateef Kayode Jakande jibini nder nokkuure Epetedo nder Lagos Island, Lagos State nder lewru 29 Layewol 1929. Mawɓe ɗiɗo fuu ɓe ɗon dari Omu-Aran, Diiwal Kwara .O janngini nder janngirde Lagos nder Enu-Owa, Lagos Island, nden e Bunham Memorial Methodist School, Port Harcourt (1934-43). O janngini e King's koleji, Lagos e hitaande 1943, nden o jokka e Ilesha Grammar School e hitaande 1945, to o wurtini defte ɗemɗe ɗe wi'etee The Quarterly Mirorr.
Nder hitaande 1949, Jakande fuɗɗiima golle nder jarnama fuɗɗam e Daily Service nden nden nder 1953 o hawti e Nigerian Tribune. Nder hitaande 1956 o laatii hooreejo jaaynde Tribune e hooreejo hooreejo Obafemi Awolowo.
Caggal nde o wurtini Tribune nder hitaande 1975, Jakande waɗi John West Publications o fuɗɗi wurtinki.O waɗi hooreejo arandeejo kawtal joornaaɓe leydi Nigeria (NPAN).
Goobnore leydi Lagos.
ɓesdi limce e limce leydi nder nokkuuje je ɗon mari jawdi nder Victoria Island e Lekki Peninsula e limce ngam jaɓugo limce, poolji e lisensji je je je ɗon jeya. O timmini mahol suudu ndun ha Gbagada e Ikorodu e haaki haaki ha nder leydi on haaki ha haaki haɗi 20 suudu ndun. Nde o jeyaa e hooreejo leydi, o waɗi jaayɗe laamu 23 ɗe konu leydi ndii haɓɓii.O fuɗɗii boo kuugal metrool ngam huwtoree laawol yimɓe. Luttugol ngal fuɗɗii, e laamu maako nde gomnati timmi nde konu njaɓɓi laamu e 31 Bowte 1983.
Ɓaawo golle.
Caggal nde konu jaɓɓi laamu nder 1983, Jakande ɗon jeyaa, ɗon jeyaa e ɗon jeyaa ngam ɓeydaago, ammaa ɓaawo ɗon o jeyaa.Caggal nde o rimɗinaama, o jaɓi darnde Ministaal Fuuɗugo nder laamu laamu Sani Abacha, ɗum waɗi o haani. O holli o jaɓiima kuugal ngol nder saɗugo M. K. O. Abiola e ardiiɓe feere fuɗɗooɓe.Nder haalde nde o waɗi, o wi'i o ɗon njettina ngam o waɗi anniya ngam huuwugo. Ammaa, hawtuki maako bee Abacha waɗi mo marɗo kuuɗe maako nder siyasa ɓaawo nastirde demokaraasi nder hitaande 1999.
Alhaji Lateef Kayode Jakande laati ardiiɗo nder All Nigeria Peoples Party (ANPP) nde UNPP e All People's Party (APP) hawti. Nder lewru Juun 2002, o "waawiri" diga ha nder partijo ANPP je ɗon jeyaa e hooreejo Lanre Razaq.Jakande woni hooreejo arandeejo jamiroore jamiroore Naajeeriya (APN) nde ɗum haɓɓii nder lewru Noofambar 2006. Nder lewru Mee 2009, o haani wonde o hawti e haɓre ngam hakkilo dow partiya bee mo'o wari wari haaki, Dr.Adegbola Dominic.Yimɓe mawɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɗon ɗon haa juulde juulde maako duuɓi 75. Nder haala ngol, Goobnoreejo lesdi Lagos, Bola Tinubu wi'i Jakande yaaki mo mo mo mo marani ngam nguurndam maako nder kuugal ummaatoore. Goobninoowo lesdi Imo, Achike Udenwa wi'i nguurndam Jakande e wakkatiji maako ɗon holla "ji'am, be sembe, be sembe e be'am, e be'ol ngam ɓernde".
Ɓaawo ɗon nguurndam e maayde.
Jakande maayi nder Lagos nder 11 feebari 2021. Ɓandu maako ɗon haandi nder Vaults and Gardens Cemetery, Ikoyi, Lagos State ha Friday 12 morso duubi 2021 ha jaɓugo dokkal COVID-19.

Zoe Leonard:
Zoe Leonard (duggi 1961) ko artist Ameriknaajo, o golliima e fotde e jaŋde. O hollitii diga ɓaawo 1980s e golle maako hawti e dow dow dow dow Dokumenta IX e Dokumenta XII, e dow dow dokumenteeji ɗiɗi ɗi Whitney ha hitaande 1993, 1997 e 2014. O heɓii Guggenheim Fellowship nder hitaande 2020.
Ɓiɗɗo.
Leonard jibinaa nder 1961 nder Liberty, New York. Maama Leonard ɗon woni mo'o Polanko'en ɓe jibini nder Warsaw, ɓe njahi Amerik haa ɓe marɓe duuɓi 9 wakkati konu duuniyaaru ɗiɗawru. Maama maako ɗon haandi yimɓe marɓe aristocracy Polish ɓe ɗon hawta nder jamma ngam heɓugo hoore Polish e Polish Resistance. Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe nder dammugal Leonard maayi nder konu. Koo nde ɓe naa' Yahuudiyankooɓe, yimɓe saare maako ɓe Nazi'en ɗon torra ngam ɓe ɗon haɓana Nazism e lesdi Polonje. Leonard wi'i maama maako "o ɗon yiɗi anndugo en ɗon ɓeen", koo nde saare maako ɗon njooɗda nder risku nder Harlem. To o duuɓi 16, o fiyi janngirde o fuɗɗi fotooɓe. O waɗi ɓurna fu nder nguurndam maako nder New York, nokkuuje ɗe o waɗi nder nder nder nder suudu maako (e.g. nder nder suudu, nder suudu, e nder suudu suudu, e dow suudu, e ley suudu, e haa nder suudu maako). Leonard waɗi anndal dow lesdi fuu ɓaawo o waɗi ɗum nder Dokumenta IX nder hitaande 1992.
Kuugal.
Daga fotooji maako ɓurɗi yahugo haa dow fotooji maako dow dow dow dow nder suudu museum, dow dow dow laabi ɓalli, e dow dow dow kuuɗe ɓalli, kuuɗe Leonard ɗuuɗɗe ɗon holla dow no ɗum waɗi, e dow no ɗum waɗirta, e dow ko ɗum waɗi ngam ɓe ndaara bana booɗɗum. O holliti nder habaru: "Haa dow dow dow dow huunde go'o koo genre (laawol, foto, maayde, ekn), mi ɗon yiɗi, e ɗon yiɗi, hawtaade bee dow dow dow haala e faayiida, hakkilantaaku hakkunde ummatoowo e duniyaaru - nder nder fuɗɗam, subjectivity e no ɗum hokkata anndal men nder duniyaaru".
Leonard ɗon ɗon ɗon ɗon haaki ha haaki SIDA e siyasa gays nder New York nder 1980s e 1990s. Nder hitaande 1992 o winndi "Mi yiɗi hooreejo leydi", ko poemol ngol hawti e dow Eileen Myles's run for president.
Nder hitaande 1995 o waɗi hollude nder studio maako nder Lower East Side of Manhattan, nder maajum o holli kuuɗe ɗe Strange Fruit, ɗum ɗum haɓɓii e ɓalli ɗi ɗi ɗi ɗi mballitiri (oranges, bananas, grapefruits, limone) ɗi Leonard soornii e ɓe ɓooydi e juuɗe e wiru e ɓuɓɓu. Ɗu'um ɗon haani bana ko'e maɓɓe, ko'e ɓe ɗon haani ɓe ɗon haaki. Ɗum ɓeydi diga jaabuki hoore mum to nyau AIDS nden bana ɗon ɗon ɗon ɗon haani haanu, o laati kuuɗe ɓurɗe ɓeydaago nder duuɓi 1990. Ɗu'um ɓanndu ɗon mari ɓanndu nder nder suudu seniiɓe nder Filadelfia nder hitaande 1998, ɗo ɗon ɗon ɗon jooɗi.

Lela Lee:
Lela Lee ko laamɗo Aameerik e jaayndiyanke, jaayndiyaaɗo tele, e jaaynde jaayndiyeeje Angry Little Asian Girl e jaayndiije jokkondirɗe Angry Little Girls.
Kuugal.
Jaɓɓorgo Ganndal.
O wondi film e telebiis, o waɗi fijirde nder 1998 film Yellow e 2002 film Better Luck Tomorrow. O ɗon wondi nder seriji Sci Fi Channel ɗi ɗon ɗon ɗon ɗon ɓuwaa wakkati fu Tremors, nden o ɗon jogii nder nder NBC's Scrubs. Lee waɗi limgal nder nder episode arandeeji nayi nder HBO's Curb Your Enthusiasm, o waɗi debbo Asiyankeejo mo ɗon haani, mo ɗon haɓɓita habbuki ɓandu e haala dow Larry David, ɓaawo o wi'i Tang ko innde Caynaare. Lee ɗon boo nder "Animal Pragmatism" nder charmed bana Tessa, mo jannginoowo jaŋde.

Erna Lendvai-Dircksen:
Erna Lendvai-Dircksen (woowo Erna Katherina Wilhelmine Dircksen, 31 meeji 1883 - 8 meeji 1962) wondi fotoowo Jarmal mo anndiraa ngam kubaruuji fotooji yimɓe nder lesdi Germany. Nder Reich Tatto, o fotti kadi ngam kubaruuji eugenicist nden o waɗi darnde ngam huutore laawol masin e golluɓe ɓe ngaɗiri ngol.
Kuugal.
Ɓoodi nder Wetterburg, jooni je je je Bad Arolsen, Erna Dircksen janngini taƴre e Kunsthochschule Kassel diga 1903 haa 1905, e jaŋde foto e Lette-Verein diga 1910 haa 1911. O waawata o haɓɓii studio fotooji nder Hellerau, ɓadi Dresden, nder 1913. Daga 1916 haa 1943, o mari studio foto nder Berlin. Nder 1918 o woodi anndal ɓeydi ɓeydi, musamman ngam fotooji maako ɓeydi e ɓeydi huutoreeɗum. Nder hitaande 1911, o fuɗɗii yiɗugo holla yimɓe lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi Germany, ɓaawo o fotti tawii o ɗon yi'a e' manjo nder wakkati mum nder yahugo. Nder binndi maako o holli miijo maako dow nguurndam nder lesdi e nder nder gariiri. Fuɗɗugo nder 1917, o waɗi foto-portrettiji Jarmaaɓe nder nokkuuje feere feere, feere nder maɓɓe o heɓii jaajorgal arande nder holli Frankfurt nder 1926. Ngam daliila maajum o heɓii laawol wurtina woɓɓe maɓɓe nder jardi "Berliner Illustrirte Zeitung" nder 1930.
"Das deutsche Volksgesicht".
Lendvai-Dircksen waɗi fotooji maako dow yimɓe lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi Germany nder hitaande 1932 nder deftere "Das deutsche Volk" (Jamma lesdi lesdi lesdi German). Ɗum fuɗɗii nder ɗemɗe ɗuuɗɗe ɗe holli nokkuuje feere feere nder laamu Reich fuɗɗugo nder 1942, ɗi ɗi fuu nder nder inde nden e nder "Das germanische Volksgesicht" (Jamɗe Germanic Volk), jooni hawti e ɗemɗe dow, misaalu, Flanders e Norway.
"Daande mawɗe".
Ha laamu Reich tataɓo o heɓi dowla, ɓurna fuu Fritz Todt ngam fotooji mawɓe mawɓe mawɗo mawɗo mawɓe, ɗum fuɗɗam waɗii ngam holla Schaffendes Volk nder hitaande 1937 nder kuugal Todt ngam waɗugo suɓaaɓe suɓaaji mawɓe mawɗi nder laamu mawɗo ɓe ngaɗata laawol mawɗo. Todt yiɗi mo "ngam fotooɓe kuugal dow laawol mawɗo nder lesdi maako diga nder lesdi maako". Deftere nden wurtini nder 1937 e nder nder nder nder hitaande 1942. Toot suɓii mo dow kuuɗe maako nder Das deutsche Volksgesicht, nden deftere autobahn ɗon tokki laawol nanondiral, ɗon tokki laawol nyiɓugo diga lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi Germany haa worgo haa Alps, e nder nder nder nder lesdi fuu ɗon tokki misaaluji lesdi e autobahn, ɓurna fuu ko cembal, bee misaalu yimɓe gariiri ɗon huuwugo nder nder kuugal. Firooji maako dow cukalel kesal ɗon holla kuuɗe kaaƴe e ɓernde cukalel, nder feere feere ɗon naftira e laabi ɗi ɗon haani New Objectivity, nder feere ɗon holla cukalel mawɗi nder tabiya e nder aada, ɗon holla wonki maɓɓe ɓaawo wakkati fu. Yimɓe golluɓe, ɓe ɗon mari laamu nder deftere, ɓe ɗon faami ɓe ngam ɓe ɗon holla ɓe feere feere, nder ɓernde ɓernde e nder ɓaawo; o ɗon naftora "laɓal ɓandu booɗugo" bana nder Olympia Leni Riefenstahl. So tawii tan o holli ɓe ɗon ndaara kamera, o holli masin masinji maɓɓe, nden tan o holla bana hollaago semmbe malla daliila nder sammu; o holli kadi kuugal juuɗe, o hokki tammunde autobahn nden haani e masinji mawɗi ɗuuɗɗi. "Bey duuɓi ɓaawo kuuɗe, mi ɗon heɓugo nyaamdu gooduɗum ngam ɓiɓɓe mawɓe njoweeɗiɗo e suka debbo", ɗi ɗon holla nafuki otobahn bana laawol ngam halki kuuɗe, e ɓe ɗon yi'a goonga kuuɗe kolla e haalaji kalluɗi nder cuuɗi kuuɗe ɗi seedaaɓe ngam hujjaaji ngam habaru propaganda.

Violette Lecoq:
Violette Lecoq (1912 - 2003) wonnoo moolinoowo, moolinooɗo e nder leydi Farayse, e moolinooɓe nder konu duuniyaaru ɗiɗaɓo. O anndiraa ngam kuuje maako diga suudu haɓɓugo Ravensbrück, ɗe naftiraama bana dowla nder Ravensbrücken Trials arandeeji nder hitaande 1946.

Kate Lechmere:
Kate Elizabeth Lechmere (13 Oktoobar 1887 - Feebari 1976) wonnooɗoɗoɗoɗo e leydi Britaniya, o wonnooɗo e Wyndham Lewis, o woniɗo ardiiɗo renndo renndo renndooɓe nder hitaande 1914. To ɗum anndiraa, walaa go'o nder kuuje Lechmere ɗon maaki. O waɗi gollude nder lesdi England nder konu duuniyaaru arande nden o mari haade duuɓi tati bee mawɗo e moftotooɗo T.E. Hulme gaɗa o maayi. Caggal konu o laati mo'o mo'o footi.
Ɓiɗɗo.
Lechmere jibini nder Fownhope, Herefordshire. Baaba maako Arthur Lechmere, mo remoowo, nden inna maako Alice Lechmere. Kate woodi deeriraaɓe ɗiɗo, Arthur e Herbert. Maamiila ndu jooɗii e Bowens, Highland Place, Fownhope, wakkati limgal yimɓe nder leydi Britaniya nder hitaande 1891 nden ɓe mari jawdi ngam ɓe huutoraako moolinoowo e cuwɗo ɓe njooɗata nder wuro. Kate Lechmere jaɓi jaŋde e jaŋde Clifton. O janngini e Atelier La Palette, Paris, nden ɓaawo ɗon e Walter Sickert e Westminster School of Art. O ɓadii Lawrence Atkinson mo o janngini piano nder Normandy.

Blanche Lazzell:
Blanche Lazzell (October 10, 1878 - June 1, 1956) wonnooɗo taƴoowo, taƴowo e taƴoɗo. O anndiraa ko ɓuri heewde ngam kuutorɗe mum ɗe laatii e laabi laaɓɗi, o wonnooɗoɗoɗoɗo mawɗo Aameerika ɓaawo jamanu, o waddani yimɓe ko'e Cubism e abstraction nder kuuɗe mum.
Lazzell jibinaa nder gariiri manndooji nder West Virginia, o yahi Orop ɗiɗi, o janngini nder Paris bee artistji Farayse Albert Gleizes, Fernand Léger, e André Lhote. Nder hitaande 1915, o fuɗɗi waɗugo summer maako nder nokkuure Cape Cod nder Provincetown, Massachusetts, nden o jooɗi ton haa foroy. O wondi go'oto nder ardiiɓe Provincetown Printers, bandol mawɓe ɓe huwti e laabi woodcut ha laabi laabi laabu ɗi ɓe waɗi dow takkereeji ukiyo-e ha Japon.

Adelaide Lawson:
Adelaide Lawson (9 juune 1889 - 28 oktoobar 1986) wonnooɗoɗoɗoɗo Amerik, anndiraaɗo e ɗemɗe mum ɗe o waɗi dow laamɓe e geɗe.   O wi'i o mari baawɗe waɗugo habaru dow duniyaaru bee huutoreeji laaɓɗi, ɗi walaa ɗowɗe e laaɓɗum e huutoreeki e laaɓndi ngam hokkude ummotooɓe hakkillo e nder ɓernde.
Fedde anndal.
Nder duuɓi sappo ɗiɗaɓo nder karnijum noogas Lawson janngini e Art Students League of New York e Kenneth Hayes Miller. Ha darnde e janngooɓe Miller feere ɓe janngii e Hamilton Easter Field e Ogunquit School of Painting and Sculpture e Ogunqit, Maine.

Fuuɗol Oua:
Fuule Oua woni fuule Gabon.Ɗum go'o nder kooki Ivinde.

Oued Rkel:
Oued Rkel ko wadi wonande Fès-Meknès, MarokkoƊum woni ko'e ndiyam ndiyam Baht.

Oued Sebt:
Oued Sebt (واد السبت) ko maayo cembiɗɗo nder Aljeeriya hakkunde wuro Gouraya,Tipaza e meselmoun.Koode posta for nokkuure nden ko 19542.

Polinjane River:
Polinjane River ko maayo Eswatini.Fedde Mbabane,ɗon ƴiwo nder hooseere Mdzimba.Woniino be nder nder ndiyamji ɗi naftira bee ndiyamji ɗon ɗon ɗon huwi nder maayo.

Rumakali:
Fuuɗol Rumakali woni ko ndiyam nder Tansaaniya.Lodo nder maayo Nyasa,maayo ndu woodi babal babal km square 693.
Ɓuuruji ndiyam.
Damji ndiyamji ɗi 222MW ɗon jeya dow maayo Rumakali.

Ruvyironza maayo:
 
Ruvyironza (ko Luvironza) maayo woni maayo nder Afrik,ko woɓɓe ɗon laami nder maayo Nile,ko woni maayo ɓurɗum ɓure nder duniyaaru.O ɗon ƴiwo dow hooseere Kikizi nder Burundi, o ɗon ƴiwi dow maayo Rurubu haa maayo Kagera nder Tanzania,diga ɗon haa maayo Victoria.E nder nder nder 182.4 km (113.3.)["clarification needed"]

Lodo Okano:
Fuuɗol Okano woni fuɗol nder Gabon.Ɗum go'o nder kookiji maayo Ogooué.
Kootol.
<templatestyles src="Module:Coordinates/styles.css"></templatestyles>0°17′50′′N 11°09′22′′E/0.29734°N 11.15609°E﻿ / 0.29734;11.15609

Sahamaitso:
Sahamaitso ko maayo nder diiwaan Alaotra-Mangoro nder fuunaaŋge Madagascar.
Eii hebe,en kankoo o wukati nder,Tanifotsy e Ampangabe.

Yusuf Adamu Gagdi:
Yusuf Adamu Gagdi (dugumi 5 Noofambar 1980) woni politikkoore e nder All Progressives Congress diga Leysdi Diiwal Plateau, Naajeeriya. O wondi ardiiɗo suudu darinooɓe lesdi Naajeeriya diga karallaagal Pankshin/Kanam/Kanke nder lesdi Plateau nder jamiroore lesdi 9. O suɓii nder suudu nder hitaande 2019.

Naange Sahel:
Sahel woni maayo nder lesdi Aljeeriya ɗo yaaki nder maayo Soummam haa Akbou.Bayyinaare maayo Sahel (wilaya Bouira) ina woodi km 3,7502.

Fuude Sakaleona:
Sakaleona ko maayo nder diiwaan Amoron'i Mania e Vatovavy nder fuunaaŋge Madagascar.O ɗon ƴiwo diga dow lesdi caka lesdi haa o ɗon ɓuwa haa maayo Lindiya ɓadi Nasy Varika.
Ndaare kadi.
Sakaleona Falls

Talabi Braithwaite:
Talabi Adebayo Braithwaite (2 morso 1928 - 2 Colte 2011) ko jaayndiyanke jamfaare lesdi Naajeeriya, e gooto e ardiiɓe jaayndiyaaku jamfaare nder Leysdi Naajeeriya. O laati hooreejo arandeejo arandeeji arandeeji nder lesdi Naajeeriya (IIN), jooni arandeeji amaruji nder lesdi Naajeeriya.
Laamu.
Talabi Braithwaite jibinaa ko ñalnde 2 lewru Yuli 1928 to Lagos. O yahi CMS Grammar School, Lagos e nder hitaande 1946 o heɓii darnde arandeere Cambridge Certificate e ƴettude London Matriculation.Nder hitaande 1949 o yahi London to o heɓii anndal nder nder jaaynde nder Royal Exchange, London.O laati Afrik arandeejo mo heɓii jaɓɓaade nder jaɓɓaande nder suudu darnde darnde daranaaku, London nder hitaande 1951.
Kuugal.
Braithwaite warti Naajeeriya nder lewru Oktoobar 1952 ngam fuɗɗugo jaaynde mawɗo (Law Union & Rock Insurance Company).Nder duuɓi 1950 o waɗi suudu dow Hawley Street bee Sonny Odogwu, mo warata boo ardiiɗo nder Leysdi Naajeeriya, e Michael Kubenje.Nder 1958 o fuɗɗii T.A. Braithwaite Insurance Brokers & Co. Kammu maako ɗon haani nder fannuuji kesi, ngam Nigeria, nder (Marine Insurance e Life Assurance)l .Nder 1959 Braithwaite waɗi hooreejo kawtal Kawtal Fedde Fedde Fadduki Darnde Naajeeriya, ɓe waɗi anniya ngam tiggi Darnde Darnde Darnuki Darnde lesdi Nigeria, e o wondi nder kawtal darnde darnde darnuki darnde darndaangal darnde darnduki darnde.Nder 1960 Braithwaite e feere-feere Naajeeriya tawtori Life Underwriting Company of African Alliance Insurance Company nder jokkondiral bee Munich Reinsurance Company.
Braithwaite hokki gomnati lesdi lesdi Leysdi Naajeeriya fuunaaŋge nder hitaande 1960 bana marɗo habaru risku nde o waɗi Great Nigeria Insurance Company.O wallitii ha haɓɓugo jaayndeeji feere ha nder jaayndeji jaayndeje ha nder Afrik hirnaange e jaaynde je haɓɓugo je haɓɓuɓe.Hakkunde 1963 e 1966 Braithwaite laati ardiiɗo lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi ardiiɗo nder Insurance Institute of Nigeria (IIN), bandol jaayndiyanko'en nder jaayndiya.O laati hooreejo arandeejo lesdi Naijeriya ngam jaɓugo jaɓugo jamma nder duuɓi sappo e jeego, fuɗɗugo nder hitaande 1963.E hitaande 1969 o laati ardiiɗo Lloyd's of London, nden daga 1 lewru 1 hitaande 1970 o fuɗɗi ardiiɗo nder Merrett Syndicate.Nder 16 lewru Noofambar 2000, hooreejo leydi Olusegun Obasanjo waɗi mo hooreejo dowla Niger (CON).
Ɓiɗɗo ɓaŋgel Braithwaite e ɓiɗɗo debbo, Derin Braithwait Disu, laati hooreejo Gomnaango Fedde Lagos, marɗo jaaynde Lagos, Babatunde Fashola, e mo anndiraaɗo.Talabi Braithwaite maayi ha 2 May 2011 nder suudu suudu ndun London, e duuɓi 82.O acci jawdi ɗuuɗŋgal.

Saliu Adetunji:
Saliu Akanmu Adetunji ( Joku 1928 - 2 Janaayo 2022) ko laamɗo Leysdi Naajeeriya mo o woni Olubadan 41 e Ibadan gila nde o laɓɓini laamu e hitaande 2016 haa o maayi e hitaande 2022.

Khadi fall:
Khadidjatou Fall, biyeteeɗo Khadi fall (doduude 1948), woni winndaako Senegal e ministaare laamu arande.   
O wari nder saare mo janngini ɗon mbi'a bolle Wolof.   Ngam daliila ɓernde maɓɓe o yahi dow nder jaŋdeji ɓurɗi nder Senegaal, ɗi ɓe cuɓii mo ngam jaŋde nder Europe. ]O heɓii PhD maako diga janngirde Strasbourg e o jooɗii nder lesdi Germany nder duuɓi 1990. O'o jannginoowo jammaaji haa Jaŋngirde Dakar.   
O winndi defte tati e nder hitaande 2000 o laati ministaare nder laamu Senegaal.   [

Teslim Balogun:
Tesilimi Olawale Ayinde "Teslim" Balogun (1927 - 30 lewru Yuli 1972) wonnoo jokkondirɗo e jannginoowo leydi Naajeeriya.
Balogun waɗi ko e nder nder nder nder golle e nder nder leyɗe goɗɗe bana moofta, haa o warti ardiiɗo football fuɗnaaku Afrik.

Afe Babalola:
Afe Babalola CON OFR SAN (dunde 30 Yarkooma 1929) ko laamɗo Nigeria e jaŋde Afe Babalola.

Wahab Iyanda Folawiyo:
Chief Abdulwahab Iyanda Wahab Folawiyo, CON (16 Jowre 1928 - 6 Jowre 2008) wonnoo jaaynoowo e jaaynooɗo lesdi Naajeeriya.Nder hitaande 1957, o haɗi Yinka Folawiyo & Sons, je laati jaɓnde jaɓnde Yinka Fulawiyo Group of Companies O jibinaa nder Lagos to Pa Tijani, mo jaaynoowo Leysdi ndin, nder wakkati koloniyaal British.O yahi to Janngirde North London nder 1951, to o janngini jaango, o jaango nder jaango O wartii ngam fuɗɗugo Yinka Folawiyo & Sons, jaaynde import e export.

Lodo Khwai:
Fuule Khwai woni maayo nder lesdi Botswana.O ɗon ɓadake diga maayo Okavango e ɗon jeyaa nder fure woyla nder Muritani Muritani.Ɗoɗɗun diga maayo,dow dammugal ngalle Moremi,woni gariiri BaBugkakhwe nder Khwai.
Fedde nden ɗon ɗowol haa suudu nduu haadi maayo Khwai.

Fuuɗol Kibish:
 
Kibis woni maayo nder worgo Etiopya, ɗo woni fannu nder hirnaange leydi ndin e Sudan worgo e Kenya.O ɗon ɓuwa haa maayo Turkana,koo nde duuɓi feere o walaa ɗuuɗal ngal o heɓata,bana C.W. Gwynn heɓii nder 1908.

Fuude Kidepo:
Kidepo River ko ndiyam je ɗon ɗon ɗon ɗon nder Kidepo Valley nder Karamoja nder Uganda,e nder Equatoria fuunaaŋge nder Sudan Fuuta.
Ndaare kadi.
Lumiji je ɗon haadi nder Uganda hawti e maayo Agago,maayo Lumansi,e maayo Kidepo

Koolol Kool:
The Koigab River is an ephemeral river on Namibia Skeleton Coast.Its source is in the Grootberg Mountains near Bergsig,where its two inflows, the Gui-Tsawisib and the Springbok are located.Koigab's catchment area (including its tributaries) is estimated to be between 2320 and .

Igbodo:
Igbodo to wuro nder leydi Delta, Nigeria.

Fedde Zadié:
Naange Zadié (Faranse:"Rivière Zadie") ko naange Ivinde to dowla fuunaaŋge Gabon.

Iko Ekwa:
Iko Ekwa to wuro nder nokkuure laamu Eket nder Akwa Ibom.

Fuule Yabus:
Fuule Yabus (ko Khor Yabus) ɗon ƴiwo nder hirnaange lesdi Ethiopia,nder Asosa Zone,ɗon ɓuwa hirnaange nder Sudan,ɓaawo gariiri Yabus, nden ɗon naato nder Sudan.Nder gariiri Bunj o jeyi haa yoŋgo hirnaange o nastina Machar Marshes,to o majjina hoore mum.
Wuroowo ɗon ɗon hawta bee maayo Dabus, ko ɗon ɓuwaa nder maayo Blue Nile,anndiraa boo bana maayo Yabus. Fuule maayoji ɗiɗo ɗon ɓadii.

Wajo Wokiro:
Wokiro River woni ndiyam ndiyam nder leydi Eritrea.O timmi haa woyla Massawa,haa maayo Semmbi.Kaŋko nde wootiri,Wokiro hawti e maayo Wadi Laba.

White Volta:
 
White Volta ko Nakambé woni ko ɓaawo maayo Volta, laawol ndiyam ɓurngal nder GhanaWhite Volta ɓenni nder lesdi Burkina Faso,ɗon ƴiwo nder lesdi Ghana,ɗon ɓilla nder maayo Volta nder lesdi Ghana.Ɓurɗe ɓaleeɓe ɓaleeɓe e Volta ɓaleeɓe ngoni Black Volta e Red Volta.
Kuugal.
White Volta woni ko ndiyam njarugo ngam ummaatooje ɗuuɗɗe nder maayoji maako e feere feere.Ɗum ɗon waɗi boo ndiyamji sahaaji haa ummaatooje ɗuuɗɗe nder maayo.

Ikot Afaha:
Ikot Afaha to wuro nder nokkuure laamu Eket nder Akwa Ibom.

Wau maayo:
Wau River,ko Wau Nahr (ko'e woɓɓe boo ɓe mbinndi Waw ko Wow),ko ndiyam nder Sudan worgo.Ɗum nodditaama Wau,laamorgo lesdi Bahr el Ghazal,to maayo ɗon ɗon yaasi fuunaaŋge dabare duniyaaru bee Central African Republic.

Ikot Akan:
Ikot Akan to wuro nder Uruan nder lesdi Akwa Ibom nder lesdi Naijeriya.   ["self-published source"]

Ikot Akata to wuro nder nokkuure laamu Etinan nder Akwa Ibom.

Ikot Akpa Esa:
Ikot Akpa Esa to wuro nder Etinan, nokku ɗo laamu ngu ɗo nder Akwa Ibom.

Ikot Akpa Nkuk:
Ikot Akpa Nkuk to wuro e dowla laamorgo Ukanafun nder Akwa Ibom, Nigeria.Ɗum to woni boo go'o nder gariiri mawɗi nder Ukanafun South District/Clan.

Ikot Ikpuho to wuro nder nokkuure laamu Etinan nder Akwa Ibom.

Ikot Inyang Osom:
Ikot Inyang Osom toni wuro nder nokkuure laamu Etinan nder Akwa Ibom.

Ikot otoinye tondi wuro nder Uruan nder leydi Akwa Ibom nder lesdi Naijeriya.

Ikpe:
