Ikwita:
Iquita to Oron_people" id="mwBg" rel="mw:WikiLink" title="Oron people">Oron ummatoore nder Oron nokkuure laamu nder Akwa Ibom nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Illewi:
Ilewi toni wuro manngal nder Imiekuri"Okpella, Nigeria nder Estako fuunaaŋgo laamu leydi, wuro man anndiraa ngam leɗɗe palmu, leɗɗe bambu e jaaynde, nden woni nokkuure yurmeende Unhokhasor Olowu laamiiɗo Imiekuri mawɗo.

Ilushi:
Ilushi to ummatoore nder Esan South East Local Government Area nder Edo State, Najeeriya. Wuro mawɗo ɗon walli kuuɗe jawdi nder nokkuure nden.

Ine Inua Abasi:
Ine Inua Abasi to wuro Effiat nder Mbo, nder Akwa Ibom nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Inua Abasi:
Inua Abasi to Effiat Community nder Mbo local government area nder Akwa Ibom leydi Nigeria.

Ire Ekiti:
Ire Ekiti, nder leydi Ekiti, ha worgo hirnaange Nigeria, to wuro je Yoruba goddi Ogun.

Irefi:
Irefi toni go'o nder gure nayi nder Oraifite nder Ekwusigo Local Government Area nder Anambra State nder lesdi Naajeeriya. Woɓɓe ngoni Unodu, Ezumeri, e Ifite. Ndun ndun woni firo Nkwo-Edo.

Ishiet Erong:
Ishiet Erong woni wuronder nokkuure laamu Etinannder Akwa Ibom.

Isieke:
Isieke (ko 'Isiaka) woni gariiri mawndi nderleydi Ebonyi, Nigeria.Ɗum woni laamorde leydi Ivo.

Isoniin:
Isoniin to wuro manndal nɗer diiwal ogun, Naajeeriya ɗo woni to e 10 km diga Ijebu Ode. Ha nder jaŋde, ɗum je je je je nder Ijebu North-East Local Government Area.

Issiet Ekim:
Issiet Ekim toni wuro nder Uruan nder lesdi Akwa Ibom nder lesdi Naijeriya.

Itogo-Ekingo:
Itogo-Ekingo toni wuro nder Obi LGA nder Benue State, Naijeeriya. Yimɓe asli ɗon hawta ɓurna fuu nder kuuje nder nokkuuje . 

Ituk Mbang:
Ituk Mbang to wuro nder Uruan nder lesdi Akwa Ibom nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Iyana-Iba, Lagos State:
Iyana-Iba to nokku nder nokkuure laamu Ojo, Lagos, Nigeria.

Jabo (Nigeria):
Jabo toni gariiri nder nder nder lesdi Naijeriya nder nder laawol A124. Ɗum woodi juulde. Duule ɓadake ɗe Paiko a Gida. Limanji ɗiɗi haa woyla ɗon Minna, ɗon haa caka waktuuji ɗiɗi. Jabo ɗon ɓadi ko Kwanti e Pinai Nature Reserves e Federal University of Technology Minna.

James Town Mbo:
James Town to Effiat Town nder Mbo local government area nder Akwa Ibom nder lesdi Nigeria.

Kudaru:
Kudaru toni gariiri nder Lere Local Government Area nder worgo Kaduna nder lesdi Naijeriya. Koode postaal nokku on woni 811.

Kurgwi:
Kurgwi toni gariiri nder lesdi Naajeeriya.Ɗum ɗon tawaa nder Qua'an pan Local Government Area of Plateau State. Duule ɗon ɗon ɗon haade laawol Shendam-Lafia nder fombina lesdi plateau.

Eso (ko wuro):
Eso toni gariiri yimɓe e nder Orhionmwon Local Government Area nder Edo State, Nigeria.

Eyo Ufuo:
Eyo Ufuo to wuro Oron nder ummatoore Eyulor nder Urue-Offong/Oruko nder lesdi Akwa Ibom nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Eyo Eyekip:

Eyo Ukpe:
Eyo Ukpe ko Oron Village nder Udung Uko nder leydi Akwa Ibom nder lesdi Naijeeriya.

Eyo Ukut:
Eyo Ukut ko wuro Oron nder Mbo nder leydi Akwa Ibom nder lesdi Naijeeriya.

Mustapha Adamu Animashaun:
Mustapha Adamu Animashaun (1885-1968) wonnoo ardiiɗo Islaam Lagos mawɗo nder fuɗɗiiji teemerre noogas. O laati boo mawɗo, moofta, moofti e hooreejo siyasa. O hawti e ɓaawoji feere-feere ɓamtaare e dowji feere- feere nder ummaatoore Islaam nder Lagos nder fuɗɗiiji fuɗɗiiɗi nder karnijum 20, nde Musulɓe ɗon waɗi fuɗɗiije fuɗɗiiɗe yimɓe Lagos. Ɓurɗo semmbe maako boo woni mawɗo maako, Musulmana Lagos mawɗo, Idris Animashaun.Bana ardiiɗo diina, o ɓamtii jaajol jaajol hirnaange nder muslimi'en e ɗaɓɓiti waɗugo leydi ngam juulde Lagos Central e ummaatoore muslimi'e Lagos. Ammaa, ɓeydaaki ngam ɗiɗma waɗi haɓaaki bee yimɓe maɓɓe nder Lagos.
Ɓiɗɗo.
Animashaun jibinaa be laamiiɗo nder gariiri Kano. Baaba maako noddiraa Usman, nden baaba maako o debbo Imam Mawɗo Kano, Mallam Ibrahim. Nder duuɓi joweego, o maayi darnde maako bana mo wolwanɗo nde o jeyi nder maccuɗo, nder wakkati kalluɗum nder Kano. Nden o jaayndi haa suudu Lamorade Zazzau nden o jannginaama diga ɓiɗɗo amiri. Bana moofta nder suudu amir, o heɓii laawol yahugo nder berniwolji woyla Naajeeriya, o jooɗii nder Cairo duuɓi jowi. Ammaa, ɗaɓɓol maako ngam heɓugo hakke ɗon ɓaawo ɗon ɓadake; wakkati o wurtina Misra, o laɓɓinaama boo o feere ngam o laato maccuɗo to Waziri Sokoto. O dilli wuro Islamaaku Sokoto haa Ilorin bee goɗɗo Sokoto, Mallam Madugu. Nder Ilorin, o jaayndi to Alfa (cleric) Bello nder wuro Agbaji, nokkuure Islamji nder anndal anndal. Nde o wonnoo nder Ilorin, o jeyaa e anndinaama nder laawol Islaam; o suɓi innde Adamu, innde je ɗon ɓurna wakkati oon e ɗon ɓurna e nder yimɓe maako. O jeyaa haa sakkinta to barkinɗo maako, Idris Animashaun, mawɗo jaŋde jaŋde Muslim nder Lagos. O jottini nder jaŋde Muslim nder hitaande 1896, to o waawi waɗugo anndal Arab e anndal astrology o janngunoo nder Misra e Ilorin. Kinnaaji maako nder jaangool ngol laati footi, o waɗi duuɓi ɗiɗi tan nder jaangowol ngol ngam o ɗon o neɗɗo mo mari hakkillo e jaangowol e anndal Islaam ngal woni ko ɓuri anndal jaangool nder Jaangool Islaamu.
Mawɗo suudu.
Caggal nde o timmini janngude maako, o jeyaa e jannginoowo maako, Idris Animashaun bana walliɗo jaaynoowo. O laati mawɗo doofal ngal nder hitaande 1912. Nder hitaande go'o, o hokki maako ceedewol ngam o heɓan hakke. O tokki ko o jaɓaama e nder hitaande 1913, o udditiri feere nder nder nder nder feere defte Arabji nder nder nder gariiri Shitta, Lagos. Nder wakkati maajum, o fuɗɗi hawtaago nder ummaatoore Muslimji mawɓe Lagos, ngam daliila semmbe Idris Animashaun. O ware, ɓiɗɗo Imam mawɗo Lagos, diina Ibrahim.
Wurɗo e winndannde.
Ngam ɓeydaade kuugal ngal o waɗi nder suudu mum, o udditiri kuugal feere nder 1914. Jaaynde nden ɗon hawta bee taƴuki boɗeeji e kubaruuji dow diina Islaam. O naftiri e kuugal ngam taƴugo ko o waɗi nder deftere almanac Nigeria. O huwti maako ngam anndugo kuuje ngam yimɓe feere feere ɓe ngari to suudu maako, nden o heɓii anndal bana mo'o anndal dowru ɗemngal Arab e astrology, ɗum ɗon mawnugo nder yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe nder Lagos. Ammaa, ɗemngal maako annduki haala ɓurna fuu naftiraama e ƴettude daga haalaaji duuniyaaru e nokkuuje e dow haalaaji ummaatooje.Nder 1918, o heɓi Lagos Central Times diga Mr Davies. Time'en haɓɓii duuɓi tati e go'o ɓaawo. O soodi wardi ndin caggal ko habaru bonngal waɗi sabu wardi nder juulde Lagos Central. Wuro warngo ɓaawo ɗon ummaatoore Muslim'en mari ceede haa 1924. Ko caɗeele Lagos waɗi hakkunde Imam Mawɗo, mo o jeyaa e dow alkawal ngal o waɗi ngam saini leydi ngam ummaatoore Muslim Lagos, wakkati yimɓe juulɓe juulɓe, ardiiɓe Animashaun ɓe ngaɗani faandaare ngam waɗugo kuuje e kuuje ngam juulde juulde. Caggal nde'e waɗi yimɓe ɓe'e ummaatoore Muslim'en ɓe'e nder nder nder nder leydi ndi. Ngam huutugo ko o nani ɗum haani ha habaruji ɗi ɓurna nder Lagos dow ummaatoore Muslim. O soodi nden o laati wakkati seɗɗa, marɗo bolle. O heɓii ko heewde, ngam kubaruuji ɗi ɓeydi ɓeydi ko ɓeydi e duuɓi maɓɓe fuɗɗiiɗi. Bana publisher jarida, o fuɗɗi naftoraade ha huutore ngam hollaago miijooji mum dow haalaji ɗuɗɗi, hawti e goomu Islam je ɗon hawta dow maɓɓe, ummaatoore Ahmadiyya. Firo maako nder ummaatoore fuɗɗi ɓeydaade, bana non boo hawtaago maako, hawti bee hawtaago Ahmadi'en.
Ɓamtaare jaŋde.
Animashaun ɗon janngina boo o yiɗi ɓeydaago jaangooji jaangooji haa yimɓe Musulmaaɓe nder Lagos. Daga dow daliila ɗuuɗal o ɗon mari defte, e mo ɗon anndina nder ilmu jaŋde, siyaasa Leysdi Naajeeriya e jaŋde Islaam e o ɗon haɓɓii janngirde jaŋde Muslim nder Lagos. jaŋde ndee fuɗɗii e janngude, ko ɗemngal Arab e Farayse. Ɗuum laawol haɓɓuki janngirde ɓaawo ɗon haɓɓii e nder ummaatoore Ahmadiyya e ummaatoore Ansaruddeen. Ko o yiɗi waɗi ko o janngina sukaaɓe Musulmana'en ngam ɓe mbaawa gollude nder koloniyaal.
Ɓaawo nduum.
Animashaun yaaki ɓernde Lagos haa Mushin, gariiri nder Leysdi Lagos ɓurɗum mawnugo nder duuɓi 1930. O ɓaawo o laati Seriki Mushin, (ko ardiiɗo Mushin Muslmaaɓe) e o wondi ardiiɗo jamiroore United Muslim Party nder hitaande 1953.

Akungba:
Akungba to wuro nder lesdi Ondo nder worgo hirnaange lesdi Najeriya. Duule ɗon haandi ɓadi Ikare-Akoko. Bimɓe Akungba ɗon jooɗi nder nokkuure maɓɓe nde ɓe njooɗata jooni duuɓi 100 ɓaawo, ɓe ɗon ɗon ɗon nder laamu Owo ngam lesdi Akoko fuu nder lesdi Ondo ɗon hawta. Duule man ɗon ɓurugo yimɓe boo ɗon ɓurɗum yimɓe haa Adekunle Ajasin University, to anndiraa Ondo State University nder hitaande 1999.

Akiyi:
Akiyi to ummatoore hooreejo nder Umulokpa, Uzo-Uwani Local Government Area (LGA), Enugu State, Nigeria. Ɗum woodi gariilooji jeeɗiɗi (7)Enugwu, Enugwu-Uwani, Imama, Nkwelle, Ukpali, Uwani e Uwenu.

Ekpoma:
Ekpoma to wuro nder Edo State, Nigeria. Ɗum woni laamorde laamorde nder gariiri Esan West. Ekpoma ɗon la koodude jeografiji latitude 6°45′N 6°08′E / 6.750°N 6.133°E / 6.750, 6.133.Duule ɗon woodi postaji, nden ɗon ɗon mari Ambrose Alli University. Ha jooni gariiri Ekpoma ɗon ɓamta bee laabi ɓurɗi, suudu nduna, jaangooje, cuuɗi nyaamugo masin a laawol. Lindiya boo ɗon mardi.

Malagum:
Malagum (to maa ) toni wuro nder Agworok chiefdom, Kaura Local Government Area nder worgo Kaduna leydi nder lesdi Naijeriya. Duruwol ngol naftiri bee posta nder gariiri Gworok ɓadi.

Est Urua:
Est Urua to wuronder nokkuure laamu Eket nder Akwa Ibom.
Yimɓe Esit Urua bana yimɓe Ekpene Ukpa ɗon mari ɓurna nder kiita e kiita diga palma, yams, Cassava e palma inabo. Ɓe ɗon mbi'a Ekid.

Esuk Inwang:
Esuk Inwang woni wuronder Uruan nder lesdi Akwa Ibom nder lesdi Naijeriya.

Manjook:
Manjook (Tyap: ) toni wuro nder Kaura Local Government Area e Asholyio (Moroa) Chiefdom headquarters, nder worgo Kaduna leydi nder lesdi Naijeriya. Bimɓe gariiri ɗon mbi'a Sholyio, go'oto nder ɗemɗe ɗe Tyap ɗon fahin. Duule ɗon woodi posta.

Ndon Utim:
Ndon Utim to wuro nder nokkuure laamu Etinan nder Akwa Ibom, Nigeria.

Ndon Uruan:
Ndon Uruan toni wuro nder Uruan nder lesdi Akwa Ibom nder lesdi Naijeriya.

Bussa kesum:
New Bussa to wuro nder lesdi Nigeria lesdi Naajeriya. Ɗum woni nokkuure kesum Bussa caggal nde damma Kainji Lake waɗi nokkuure nde fuɗɗii nder ndiyam. La nder hitaande 2007 New Bussa woodi yimɓe 24,449.New Bussa woni laamorde laamu Borgu e nokkuure laamu Borgu.

Nkpa:
Nkpa to wuro seɗɗa nder Bende Local Government Area nder Abia leydi Nigeria. Ɗum laati ummatoore hooreejo nder 1983. Ɗum hawti a wurooji ɗuuɗɗi.

Eyo Uliong:
Eyo Uliong toni wuro Oron nder Udung Uko nder leydi Akwa Ibom nder lesdi Naajeeriya.

Eyo Ulung:
Eyo Ulung to wuro Oron nder Udung Uko nder leydi Akwa Ibom nder lesdi Naijeriya.

Eyo Uwe:
Eyo Uwe to wuro Oron nder Udung Uko nder leydi Akwa Ibom nder lesdi Naijeriya.

Bena, Nigeria:
Bena woni wuronder lesdi Nigeria.Bena ina woodi ko'e baylaaki ko'e ko'e wo'o ko'e e ko'e maɓɓe ko ko'e 3.92 km2, ko'ender ɗum ina hawta e kasu mawɗo, suudu jaŋde, suudu bakery e suupermarket.

Andoni Island:
Andoni Island haani nder leydi Nigeria.  Nder fuɗnaange fuɗnaande Niger Delta, nder lesdi Rivers,ɗum ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo laral ngal laral,ɗo ɗo ɗo cukalel ngal laral ngal waɗiender laaɓal nder no nandi bee ɓandu duɗal. Landenden ɗon koode ko 124 km2 (48 nden ɗon anndina ngam ɗo nder nder nder leyɗe nder lesdi Afrika ("Loxodonta cyclotis"),bee bee bee bee nder bee bee bee leyɗe feere feere.Andon,ko waawataa tan nder lesdi Nigeria ɗo ɓe keɓa leyɗe ladde,ɗum boo nokkuure nde leɗɗe ladde feere feere ɗon nyaamo. Bana nder Andoni Island, woodi goɗɗe leyɗe nder Andoni Local Government Area of Rivers State.Kadi, leɗɗe dolphin jeɗon njaha nder leydi ndii ɗon yaha nder maayo Atlantik nder wakkati summer.Bana no go'owo babal babal babal babal nder saare, Gogo Abel Ujile, wi'i, saare nden woni nokkuure ɓurɗe haandi ngam haɓɓugo Andoni Elephant Sanctuary e marine national park ngam wallitugo babal babal babal.

Asanga, Nigeria:
Asanga anndiraa kadi Nung Ikot Asanga ko wuro wonande nder Nung Ikot Clan Oruk Anam nokkuure laamuleydi Akwa Ibom, nderleydi Nigeria.
Nung Ikot Asanga noddiraa kadi Asanga Town woninder yimɓe Annang nder Akwa Ibom.Duule ndenɗon feccina nder gariiri jowi: Ataessien, Ikot Enuah, Ikot Akpanang, Ikot Oboho e Ikot Eweh.

Bonny Estuary:
Bonny Estuary ko bonny Bay of Bonny estuary dow maayo Rivers State, Nigeria ɓadiPort Harcourt.Ɗum je tawaander maayo Campo delta. Fannu ngal ɗon jeyaae mangrove swamp, je ɗon haaninder leɗɗe bana nder ladde estuary Niger Delta.
Ɗuum ɓandu ndiyam ɓernde nderleydi ɗon haadi ɓaawo gariiriPort Harcourt nder gariiri Amadi-Ama.Ɗuum woni Amadi Creek,ko ɗo ɗo ɗoɗo ɓuwaa ko ɓuwaa dow ɓule Benin haa maayo Bonny.Ha ɓaawo naftoraaki nafataaku, laawol ndiyam ɗonhaɓɓa e kuugal ɓaleeji ɓaleeji, ɗon haɗana feere. [https://www.premiumtimesng.com/features-and-interviews/432954-how-plastic-waste-disrupts-aquatic-life-in-rivers-waters.html?tztc=1]

Ado, Nasarawa:
Ado woni gariirinder Nasarawa, nderlesdi Nigeria.Ɗum wonigariiri ndergariiri Nasarawa State">Karu, Nasarawa Stateender gariiriji ɗi je je jejetawaa gariiriKalu, gariiriji jejeje haɗi to lesdi lesdi Nigeria.

Agule ndiyam Agbokim:
AgulEɗe ndiyam Agbokim ɗon hander nokkuure laamu Etungnder Cross River State nderlesdi Naijeriya nderlesdi Najeeriya, ɓadihirnaaki elesdi Kameruun. Waroojindiyam ɗon haa yaasi 25digalkome 240 mi) diga Calabar.
Agule Agbokim ɗon hawta bee kookiji joweeɗiɗi endiyamndiyamɓii-ɓiiɗon ɓadakender kaɓirɗe mawɗe nder laddetropical rainforest. Ɗum boo ɗo ɗoyimɓe ɓeen ɓeen ɓenjiɗi nderleydi CrossRiver.

Kuɓol Kaydi Akure:
Akure Forest Reserve is a protected areainsouthwest Nigeria, covering .
Nder duuɓi sappo ɓaawo'en, woodi je'aare mawɗe nder nokkuure nde, ɗon mari nyau masin dow babal babal babal. Akure Forest reserve ko nokkuure je woodani ngam haɓɓugo ngam huutore walla huutore e ɗon haade e Ile Oluji/Okeigbo, Ondo State, Nigeria, e latitude 7°17′ 39′′N e longitude 5° 2′3′′ E.

D-line, Port Harcourt:
D-line is a major business andurban residential area of Port Harcourt, Rivers State. Its geographical coordinates are4°48'8" North,7°0'10" East.The neighborhood is sometimes spelled"D/Line"and has a zipcode of 500261.

Duule Centenary:
Centenary City kowuro nderlesdi Nigeria. Centenary City woni ɓamtaare jeɗon haɓɓii e Centenary city FZE,bana nderlaabi lesdi Nigeria ngam haɓɓugo gariiri "gariiri mari hakkiilo" yeeso ndernder laabiɗi Dubai, Monaco e Singapore. Duule ɗon nyiɓɓa diga fuɗɗamdow haakka1,260 nder leydi ɓandu ɗon haaki kiloometreji ɗuɗɗi haa worgo hirnaange lesdi Naajeeriya, Abuja e kiloometreje njowe diga garowol lesdi.

Edidi:
Edidi woni wuronder Isin Local Government Areander Kwara State, Nigeria. Duule Edidi hawtie gure tati: Edidi Oja, Edidi Oke-Ona e Edidi Idera. Edidi ɗon haandi ko 400 haa woyla fuunaaŋge Lagos e ko 53 mi) haa worgo Ilorin.

Ediene:
Ediene woni gariirie go'onderɓooyi jowinder Abak. Yimɓe ton ɗon mbi'a Ɗemngal annang.

Fada, Nigeria:
Fada woni gariiri nder lesdi Nigeria, edow fuunaaŋge Abuja.Ɗum woni ko waɗi nder deftere Joyce Cary nder1939 Mister Johnson. Luttugol maako ɗon haa latitude 7° 15'00" N e longitude 4° 04' 00" E.

Eyokponung:
Eyokponung koummatoore Oron nder Udung Uko nder leydi Akwa Ibom nderlesdi Naijeriya.

Lugo Central Senatorial District:
Laawol senatorial Lagos Central nderleydi Lagos,Nigeria hawti enokkuuje laamu Apapa, Eti-Osa, Lagos Island, Lagos Mainland,esurulere. Senatoowo ɗo wakkila ka diiwaan woni Wasiu Sanni daga All Progressives Congress,mo suɓaander 2023.

Laminga:
Laminga woni gariirinder Nasarawa State">Nasarawa LocalGovernet Areander Nasarawa State nder lesdi Nigeria.Duule ɗon ɗon haade laawol KeffiNasarawa, ko haade kiloomitaare 20haade laawol mawndu nder fombina Nasarawa.

Etekwuru:
Etekwuru wonde go'onder gure ɗeɗon haandinder nokkuure laamorde Ohaji/Egbema nder leydi Imo, Nigeria. Etekwuru ko ummatoorener Niger Delta nderlesdi Naajeeriya.
Etekwuru, be haandi haandi naftore, ɗon haandi ha haandi nafturee gas haandi ha lesdi Nigeria, ɗon haandu haandiha Adapalm Nigeria Limited, ɗon haani haandi haanduki haandi haandu haandu ha haandi Niger Delta Development Commission (NDDC) e Imo State Oil Producing Areas Commission (ISOPADEC).

Eti-Osa fuunaaŋge:
Eti-Osa East woni nokku ɓamtaare wuro nderlesdi Nigeria. Ɗumtaƴii diga leydi Eti-Osander 2003.

Ijurin:
Ijurin Ekiti ko wuro ndernokkuure laamu Ijeronder leydi Ekiti, Nigeria.   Ɗum wondi go'onder gariirinder laamorde Ijeroo nden nden, diga IleIfe ɓe ɗon jooɗoto nder nokkuuje feere feere, ngamɓe ɗon jooɗa nder nokkuure nde'e.["citation needed"]

Ijar:
Ijar woni gariiri nder leydi Ifedore nder lesdi Ondo, ￼￼Nigeria￼￼.Ɗumɗon haandi haaujune 20 kmhaa woyla fuunaaŋge gariiri Akure.  Fuu nokkuurende yimɓe Yoruba ɗon mbi'a, wuro ndu ɗon mari laamiiɗo dowla diga wakkati koloniyaal, "Olujare of Ijare". Duule woodi jannginooji ɗiɗo:Anglican Grammar School (ngirtee e1972)e C.A.C. Comprehensive High School. Ɗum woodi posta (ngamnder 1969),banki ummatoore, cuuɗi jaŋde tatiender ɗum haɓɓii sistemji ndiyam ummaatoore (ngam e 1970) nder ɗumhawtake hawtoreeki ha sakkinki hitaande 2006.

Erinmope Ekiti:
Erinmope Ekiti woni gariiri jamanu nder leydi Ekiti, Nigeria. Ɗum ɗon hander nokkuure laamu Moba. Taariiha genealogical Erinmopewaawi haadeede e dinastiya Oraufe e Ile-Ife, e laawol jibinol Ayetise, ɓaawo Lajamisan e ɓaawo Obaleo e dinastiyaa Lajamisan. Kuugal Ifa oracle nder hoolugo yimɓe diga Ile-Ife haa nokkuure ndeɗon jooni waawataa ɓeydaade. ERINMOPE wari diga miijo taariha hawti e haala - ERIN NI MOPE maanaa "mi ekkitini ɗum wonde elefant".

Dowla woyla hirnaange:
North-Western State ko leydi Nigeria. Ɗum waɗiha 27mee 1967 diga bejeeje lesdi lesdi lesdilesdi fuunaaŋge,nden ɗon haa 3 feebari 1976, nde ɗum taƴi nder lesdi ɗiɗo - Niger e Sokoto. Sokoto woni laamorgo lesdi North-West.

Godogodo:
Godogodo ko nokkuure eywuro nder Jema'a Local Government Area nder worgo Kaduna nderylesdi Naijeriya. Ɗum woni boo hooreejo Godogodo Chiefdom (koyyimɓe Nindem). Duule woodi posta, e code posta 81.6 Ɗum ɗon hawta kadi nokkuure taƴre nder tin.

Gujba Forest Reserve:
Gujba Forest Reserve ko nokkuure ɗoɗoɗoɗo yimɓeɗowtaninder Yobe State,Nigeria. 
Out Wuro maare mumɗon hawuro Buni Yadi haaworgo lesdi;wuro Gujba ɗon hawoyla lesdi.

Gwagwarwa:
Gwagwarwa woni wuro ɓooyɗender lesdi Naijeriya. Ɗum woni gariiri Kano nder lesdi Kano, Nigeria. Ɗumwoni fuunaaŋge wuroKano. Ɗum ɗon hawta bee lenyol. Haa fuɗɗam 1960's Sabon Gariwaɗi ko fuɗɗam. Nderduuɓi 1960's, o ɓurii yimɓe10,000. Haa wakkati maajum, ɗum ɗon maridaraja laaɓɗum. Haussa e Ibo njooɗani ɗum.Inndende'e firti "brigade".

Idon woni gariirinder lesdi Nigeria.
Won nokkuuje feere feere feerebe suuduji ɗi.

Ihioma:
Ihioma ko ummatoore nder Orlunder Imo State nder lesdi Naijeriya.
Firo woodi jaŋde.Ɗuum nokkuure ɗon waɗi kuugal lesdi.Fedde nden ɗon ɗon yi'a haɓre daga yimɓe Biafra. Ɗuum nokkuɗon haɓɓii ngam ɓikkoy ɓe ɓe njaɓaama.

Ikot Ebiyan:
Ikot Ebiyan ko wuronder nokkuure laamu Eketnder Akwa Ibom.
Yimɓe Ikot Ebiyan bana yimɓe Afaha Atai ɗon hawta nder kiita e kiita ngam kiita, Yams, Cassavae Wine lPalm. Ɓe ɗon mbi'a Ekid.

Imiekuri:
Imiekuri woni gariirinder Okpella Etsako Fuɗnaange, Edo,Nigeria, ɗum gariirinder okpellaɓurɗo mawnugo.
Imiekuri ko ummatoore laamu, jeanndi ngam haɓɓugo ɗuuɗal leɗɗe ɗeɗe mari ceede bana kakao, bambu, e leɗɗe palmi. Ɗum anndiraa kadi ngam ɗum je ɗon saɗugo yams, garri,mango,e feere feere.O woodi jaɓol sementol go'onder lesdi - Edo Cement Company Limited.

Iyamho:
Iyamho ko wuro seɗɗander Etsako West nder Edo State, Nigeria..Edo University, Iyamho ɗon haandi ɗo. Iyamho woni go'onder gariiri 21/kooreeji ɗi je ɗon jeyaa e ummaatoore Uzairue nder Etsako West, Edo State. Diineji mawɗi hawtie diina Kiristan,diina Islaam e diina aada.

Iva Valley:
Iva Valley ko nokku ɗo nder lesdi Najeeriya nder Enugu. Iva Valley ina noddita diga nder nokkuure nde ina nodditii e innde nden. Fuu nokku ɗo ɗoɗoɗo laami Iva Valley coal mine.Iva Valley ɗonanndira nder Enugu ngam ko waɗi nder 18 Noofambar 1949, nde polisɓe maɓɓi yimɓe 21 nder ɓe ɗon maɓɓa.

Kamuru:
Kamuru (also Kamuru, Kamuru, Kamuru Ikulu) is a town in Zangon KatafLocal Government Area in southern Kaduna state in the Middle Beltregion of Nigeria. It is the headquarters of the Akulu chiefdom.The postal code of the area is 802.

New Nyanya:
New Nyanya woni gariirinderlesdi Nasarawa. Ɗumjejeje jejejejeje nder Nasarawa State">Karu Local Government Area, Nasarawa State,e je jejeejejejeje je je jejijejeje Karu Urban Area, jejeje jejejeejeje je jejejijeje je ɗon jejeje nder Federal Capital Territory (FCT). New Nyanya ɗonhaani bana go'onder gariiri Abuja.

Ngwo pine wood:
Ngwo Pine Forest pine wood near the center of Enugu. Duniyaa ɗon woodi cembiɗol limceere ɗon haɓa bee ndiyam ndiyam ɓiiɓal ɗon waɗa poolol ɓiiɓol haa dammugal cembiɗal.Ngwo PineForest huutoroo bana nokkuure huutore ngam huutore.Ɗum laati laawol ɓamtaare ummatooree jawdi lesdi ɗuuɗal, ɓurna lesdi ɓeydi ɓamtaare.

Nkalagu:
Nkalagu ko wuro nder nokkuure laamu Ishielu nder leydi Ebonyi, Nigeria. Ɗum ɗon mari ɓandu ɗuuɗal limtinol ngam hokkiɗum kare ngam suudu simintol mawnde nder Kamaru cement Nigeria (Nigercem).Nkalagu woni gariiri arande nde a naati, to a naati nder lesdi Ebonyi nder laawol Enugu-Abakaliki. Ɗum woni hooreejo lesdi fuɗɗam fuɗɗam ɓamtaare fuɗnaange Ishielu e woodi gariiloji mawɗi jowi: Ishiagu, Uwule, Imeoha, Amanvu eAkiyi. Mawɗogariii nder Nkalagu anndiraa kadi e Onyishi.Kala wuro woodi Onyishi maako, mowoni ɓiy mawɗo nder gariiri. Lamardi mawɗi woni Nkwo Nkalagu je ɗon haandi nder laawolEnugu-Abakaliki Express.

New GRA, Port Harcourt:
News Government Reserved Area (New GRA) ko nokkuureɓurɗo huutoreedendr nder ndernder Port Harcourt, laamorgo e wuro ɓurɗo mawnude nder Rivers State.

New Haven, Enugu:
New Haven wondi go'onder nokkuuje nder Enugu State jeɗon haɓɓii nder duuɓi 1960's nden ɓe ɓeydi diga suburbjo nder wuro haa ɓeɓeyda nokkuure feere feere feere, musammanner Chime Avenue, laawol mawɗo. Enugu ɗon woodi feere nder worɓe Igbo ɓurɓe risku nder taariha lesdi Naijeriya.

Ndubuisi Kanu Park:
Kanu Ndubuisi Park woninokkuure ummaatoore e nokkuure nder Ikeja, LagosƊum nokku green diga digaelaamorde Lagos State ParksandGarn Agency. Duniyaa ɗon woodi suudu tennis, suudu basketball, suudu ciya ngam sukaaɓe, jooɗorɗe e benji, suudu e cuuɗi e kuuje. O woodi nokkuure mawnde ngam yimɓe ummatoore ngamɓe mbaɗata piiknik e ɓe huwtore. Ɗum ɗonhaade e park Johnson Jakande Tinubu.

Ita Egbe:
Ita Egbe kowuro nder Ipokia Local Government Area of Ogun State eyimɓe 1776 ender 1963 ender Nigeria Population Census, ɗum anndiraa ngam kuuɗe maakoɗe mawndender leydi ndie ngam ɗum gooto emawɓe mawɓe ɓe ɓe ɓe ɓe ngurtina naftoraaki palmi haa Ipokia local government of Ogun state.

Iwaraja:
Iwaraja (ko ɓooyre Iwaraja-Ijesa) woniwuro ko e 2 km haa woyla Ileshander Osun State, Nigeria.  Ɗum gariiri mawɗo ndernder gariiri Ibadan - Akure. Duule ndu woodi taariika ɗuuɗugo nder Ijesaland e lenyol Yoruba fuu. Duule ɗon nder laamu leydi Oriade.
Laamu wuro ngo'o Awaraja Iwaraja eo ɗon walli hooreejo maako, woɓɓe maɓɓe ngoni Odofin, Ejemo, Yeye Semure, Saba, Iyalaje e woɓɓe.

Hildi:
Hildi district ɗonha Adamawa nder lesdi lesdi Nigeria. Mararaba Mubi ɗon haandinder diiwaan Hildi. Fedde nden anndiraa ngam ko'e mawngu. Yimɓe Hildiɗon mbi'a Ɗemngal Margi. Margi Hildi wondi go'onder yimɓe ɓurɓe haalaaji Margi haadeeje.

Ibule-Soro:

Gidan Waya:
Gidan Waya is a small town andHeadquarters of Godogodo chiefdom about 18 km from Kafanchan in Jema'a Local Government Area of southern Kaduna state in the Middle Beltregion of Nigeria. The town has a post office.
Gidan Waya is a small town and Headquarters of Godogodo chiefdom about 18 km from Kafanchan in Jema'a Local Government Area of southern Kaduna state in the Middle Belt region of Nigeria. The town has a post office.

Imagbon:
Imagbon ko wuronder leydi Ogun,Nigeria. Ɗumɗon haandi ha les hirnaange Ijebu-Ode, ha maayo yaaki to Lagoon Lagos. Imagbon woni wurowuro to Nigerian Businessman, politikol mo mari hakkillo. Damilola Adedoyin Adebajo,o woniboo mawɗo tagdi toWNBOY LLC

Suudu Tariihawol Kaduna:
Kaduna museum ko suudu tariihawol nder Kaduna, Naajeeriya. Wuro museum haɓɓiti nder 1975 ɓaawo hokkigo Northern People's Congress (NPC) diga lesdi man. Kaduna Museum ɗon woodi collection mawɗo archaeological, ethnolographic e artisanal expositions e woodi nokkuure artisanal ɗon woodi nder ɗo ɓe ɗon yi'a artisanalji e rewɓe ɗo ɓe ɗon waɗa artisanal.

Suudu Tariihawol Jos:
Jos museum ko museum nder Jos, Nigeria. Wuro museum ngal haɓɓii nder 1952 diga Bernard Fagg. Wuro museum ɗon jaɓɓa suudu suudu senioru lesdi Naijeriya.
Taariiha.
Woni museum fuɗɗii nder 1952 diga Bernard E. B. Fagg, mo waɗi darnde darnde ardiiɓe dow laamu koloniyaal saa'i maajum. Kanjum woni suudu museum ummatoore arande nder Afrik hirnaange.
Nder hitaande 1963, UNESCO waɗi nokkuure darnde nder Jos. Jaŋde nden ɗon haalaaji ɗiɗi e Farayse e Faraysi haa ɓe ɗon haɓɓita nokkuure feere e Farayseeji nder Niamey. Caggal UNESCO timmini jaɓugo ceede mum, nokku ɗon ɗon maayi ceede e jawdi.
Wuro museum ɗon ɓuwa, ngam walaa jawdi laamu, ɗon ɓaŋgi hulɓuki dow majjugo haandi aada. Nder 2019, suudu seniijo ɗon hokki tan ⁇ 158,197,120.

Badagry Heritage Museum:
 
Badagry Heritage Museum ko suudu tariiha nder Badagry, Naajeeriya, nder suudu mawɗo nder diiwaan, ɗum haani nder hitaande 1863 diga laamu Biritinko'en.
Wurooji wurooji.
Wurooji hawtiɓe eMuziyum Baadiji Baadijidow Wikimedia Commons

National Museum of Benin City:
The Benin City National Museum is a national museum in Benin City, Naajeeriya. located in the city centre on King's Square. The museum has a significant number of artifacts related to the Laamlamateeri Benin such as terracotta, bronze figures and cast iron pieces. It also has ancient art related to the early times.
National Museum, Benin City haɓɓii yimɓe nder 1973. Ɗum ɗon jaɓɓa ngam National Commission for Museums and Monuments (NCMM), goomu laamu federal Nigeria ɗon jaɓɓi ngam hakkilantaago, ɓeydaago e ɓamtaago jawdi aadaaji lesdi Naajeeriya. 
Luttugol.
Benin City National Museum ɗon ha nokkuure biyeteeɗo Ring road, ko yimɓe Benin noddaama King's Square, amma ɗum wayliti to Oba Ovonramwen Square diga Comrade Adams Oshiomhole nder wakkati maako nder laamu maako bana gomnati lesdi.

Dauda Lawal:
Dauda Lawal (dunde 2 siilto 1965) ko bankooɗo e politikkeejo Naajeeriya mo woni gomnaango Leysdi Zamfara.O suɓii e nder fannu Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) nder suɓaaji gomnati Leysdi Naajeeriya 2023 ngam o heɓi laamu ngam ngam ngam o heɓa gomnati Bello Mohammed Matawalle diga APC.
O woni ardiiɗo mo'o nder nder nder nder suudu banki lesdi Naijeriya, o anndiraa o gooto e mawɓe mawɓe nder suudu jawdi nder lesdi Naajeeriya, ngam o huuwi bana mawɗo mawɗo, Sector Public North, nder First Bank of Nigeria Plc.

Mary Nzimiro:
Mary Nzimiro innde ɓurnde Mary Nwametu Onumonu, MBE (1898-1993) wonnoo debbo jaaynoowo, politikkeejo e debbo mo'o.Nder 1948, o laatii wakiilu mawɗo United Africa Company (UAC) ngam Leysdi Naajeeriya fuunaaŋge, e nder wakkati o ɗon haɓɓii ɗemɗe jaayndeeji e ɓamɗe e nder Port Harcourt, Aba e Owerri.
Ha fuɗɗoode duuɓi 1950, o wondi e yimɓe ɓurɓe heɓaade e Afrik hirnaange, o laati jooɗorɗo nder wuro Bernard Carr Street nder Port Harcourt.Nder fannu siyasa, o wondi ardiiɗo nder kawtal lesdi Naajeeriya e Kameruuna, o laati ardiiɗo jaɓnde mawɗo nder hitaande 1957 e hooreejo lesdi lesdi lesdi Naajeeri Leysdi fu Fuuta fu Fuuta e nder hitaande 1962.Nder fannu siyasa, o wondi ardiiɗo nder kawtal lesdi Naajeeriya e Kameruuna, o laati ardiiɗo jaɓnde mawɗo nder hitaande 1957 e hooreejo lesdi lesdi lesdi Naajeeri lesdi fu Fuuta fu Fuuta e nder hitaande 1962 Nder konu lesdi Naijeriya (1967-1970), o haɓɓii rewɓe Igbo ngam wallugo Biafrans Ngam maajum o maayi ɓurna jawdi maako haa PortHarcourt o warti to Oguta, to o maayi nder 1993.

Esuk Oro:
Esuk Oro toni Oron_people" id="mwBg" rel="mw:WikiLink" title="Oron people">Oron ummatoore nder Oron nokku dowla leydi Akwa Ibom nder lesdi Naijeriya, to Academy Maritime of Najeeriya e Methodist Boys' High School, Oron ɗon haandi.

Alimotu Pelewura:
Chief Alimotu Pelewura (1865-1951) wonnoo jaayndeere Naajeeriya mo o ardiiɓe kawtal rewɓe Lagos lomou, goomu jaaynde rewɓe Lagos.O laati boo mooftaaku siyaasaji mawɗo Herbert Macaulay.
Kawtal rewɓe Lagos Market be nder kawtal rewɓe ɓurɓe mawnude nder Lagos nder wakkati koloniya.

Humuani Alaga:
Humuani Amoke Alaga anndiraaɗo Mama Humuani Alaga (ko 1900 - 1993) wonnoo mooliiɗo Naajeeriya e jaayndiyanke leydi ndii nder golle jaayndi.O anndiraa boo bana Muminat mo ɗon wallina e semmbe rewɓe ngam ɓe mbaadi yimɓe.Nder 1938, o waɗi yimɓe ngam ɓe ɗaɓɓita ceede e ɓe ɓeyda hujja ngam rewɓe.Nder 1958, o haɓɓii ummaatoore Isabatudeen Women Society bee rewɓe 11 feere.Nder 1959, o haɓɓii hooreejo National Council of Women's Societies.

Ogbadibo:
Ogbadibo ko nokkuure laamu leydi Benue, lesdi Najeeriya. Ɗum woodi diiwaanuuji tati: Orokam, Owukpa, e Otukpa. Wuro laamu Leysdi ndii ɗon haandi nder gariiri Otukpa.Ɗum woodi nokkuure 598 km e yimɓe 128,707 ha nder limti yimɓe 2006. 2
Yimɓe lesdi Naijeriya mawɓe diga Ogbadibo.
Ministaargalgalgal e ɓamtaare wuro wuro remooɓe Dramaturga politik Audu Ogbeh Audu Ogbeh Audu Ogbe.Chief Steven Lawani Steven Lawani Wonɗo Vice Governor Benue State Politician Industrialist Steven Lawani.Maajor Jeneraal Chris Abutu Garuba Chris Abutu Garuba Sojaare Goobnaaku Dowlaaji Bauchi e hooreejo ardiiɓe konu UN Angola Verification Mission II Chris AbutuGaruba. Hooreejo leydi fuɗnaange e jannginoowo defte Jerry Agada 
Dunamis International Gospel Centre">Dr. Paul Enenche, Pastor mawɗo Dunamis International Gospel Centre. 
code postaal nokku on woni 973.

Koore Onive:
Njowol Onive woni ko ndiyam nder fuunaaŋge Madagascar.O ɗon ƴiwo diga maasifu Ankaratra,o woni ko ɓurɗo ɓuwaaɓe nder maayo Mangoro.
Warooji ndiyamji mawɗi,be dammuji 30m,ɗon ha woyla hirnaange lesdi Tsinjoarivo.

Awa Kawa (Togo):
Awa Kawa ko maayo e kookiji nder leydi Kara nder Togo.Nguun maayo ɗon ƴiwo diga maayo Kara ɓadi Agbande,ɗon hawta bee maayo Katassou ɓadi Binako.Sandji maayo Kawa ɗon haajina ngam kuugal njamndi,koo nde maayo ndu walaa laawol.

Kooko (Rusizi District):
Kooko ko maayo nder Rusizi District nder worgo hirnaange Ruwanda, ko ɗum woni ko woni ko woni ɓaawo Ruhwa,ko woni ko daande hakkunde lesdi Ruwanda e Burundi.Nder ɓurna fuɗde maako ɗon ɗon yaasi nder Nyungwe National Park.

Koolenté maayo:
Koolenté (ngam anndiraa kadi ko Great Scarcies River) ko maayo nder Guinea e Sierra Leone.Nguun maayo ɗon jeyaa nder sahaaji duniyaaru hakkunde lesdi ɗiɗo.O ɗon ɓuwa nder maayo Atlantic haa Barlo Point, Sierra Leone.Nder Gine,ɗum anndiraa ko Kolenté e nder Sierra Leone,ɗum anndiraama ko Great Scarcies.
Fuule Fuule Scarcies ɗon ɓuwa nder fukule Atlantik go'o, haa worgo maayo Great Scarcies.Fedde nde'e ɗon jooɗorgo Yimɓe Temne ɓe ƴiwoyii diga Futa Jalon haa woyla.

Koolinbiné:
Koolinbiné (French:"Rivière Kolinbiné") ko maayo nder Afrik hirnaange.O fuɗɗii nder worgo Mauritania e o ɓeydi dow lesdi,o jeyaa nder sahaa hakkunde leydi Mauritania e Mali.Ha Mali,o hawti e maayo Sénégal km 5 dow maayo diga wuro Kayes. 
Fuule ɗon ƴiwo nder nder ɓesngu ɓesngu ɗi ɗon heewa bee ndiyam nder sahaaji ndiyam ɓiiɗi (Juli haa Septemba).Ɓurɗo mawnugo nder ɗi ɗon woni maayo Magui, ɗon ɓadake haa km 30 nder ngalle-galle.   Laku ɗon haadi 55 km haa woyla fuunaaŋge Kayes haa 14°47′N 11°5′W / 14.783°N 11.083°W / 14. 783; -11.083. Fuuɗol ngal kadi keewi maayo Doro, wonande 34 km fuunaaŋge-laafare fuunaaŋgo Kayes, haa hirnaange laawol RN1 haa 14°30′45′′N 11°7′20′′W / 14.51250°N 11.12222°W / 14.511250; -11.12222. 

Fuule Komo:
Komo (Faransi:"Rivière Komo",Espaañ: "Río Komo") ko maayo nder Equatorial Guinea e Gabon.O ɗon ɓilla haa 230 km (140 miili).
O ɓooydi nder Equatorial Guinea nder fombina woyla woyla woya e Woleu-Ntem.Amma ɗuuɗal ndiyamji maako ɗon nder lesdi Gabon. Ɓurɗo ɓuwaaɓe kooki Komo woni Mbeya.Laddol maako ɗon hawta bee geoloji ɗi ɗon waɗi ndiyamji bana ɗi Tchimbélé e Kinguélé.Ɓe ɗon mari baawɗe ndiyam ngam naftiraaki nder Libreville.

Koolol Kongkong:
Fuule Kongkong, ko maa ko Kong Kong,ko ɓaleere nder leydi South Sudan,Jonglei,hirnaange Boma National Park ɓadi hirnaange Ethiopia.Nder wuro Bongak,o hawti bee maayo Abara ngam o waɗa Agwei,ko ɗum woni ko'e maayo Pibor.Ɗum ɗon nder nder nder ndiyam ɓalewol Nile White.

Koulountou:
Kooluntou (French:Rivière Koulountou)ko maayo nder Senegal e Guinea Ɗum woni ko'e ndiyam ndiyam nder maayo Gambia.
Fedde maayo ɗon woni fuɗɗam fuɗɗam Fouta Djallon nder lesdi Guinea.Nder ɓurna fuɗɗam mum, maayo ɗon ɗon ɗon ƴiwo nder worgo Senegal.
Lillaaji dow maayo hawti e Nadjaf Al Ashraf nder Vélingara Department,Senegal.

Kool Kwe Kwe:
Kwe Kwe River (nganndi no Que Que River haa 1983) ko ndiyam ɓii-ɓii ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo Kwekwe nder Zimbabwe.Ɗum woni kooki ɓii Sebakwe e o hawti e Sebakwe to woyla wuro.ndiyam diga maayo huutoroo nder nder nder nder suudu naftoraaku,ɗum je ɗon jeyaa nder gariiri Kwekwe.Fuuji Sebakwe hawti e Fuuji Sanyati je ɗon ɓadake haa woyla e ɗon ɓadike nder Fuuji Zambezi.

Lumiya:
Lumiya ko maayo nder hirnaange Uganda nder diiwaan Bundibugyo.O ɗon ɓadito ɓadi lesdi Semuliki.

Lasoo:
Njo Lasoo woni ko ndiyam nder Gabon.Ɗum wondi go'o nder kookiji Ogooué.

Njo Lawa (Afrika):
Lawa ko maayo nder Afrik hirnaange e 7°48′58′′N 9°59′08′′W / 7.81623°N 9.98556°W / 7. 81623; -9.98556. Fuule,je ɗon haaji kiloomita 100 (62 miili),ɗon ƴiwo nder lesdi Guinea fuunaaŋge haa worgo Macenta.Fuule ɗon ɓuwa haa saŋge hirnaange haa Liberia,to ɗon ɗon nastina nder maayo Lofa nder Lofa County.

Fuule Lebombi:
Fuule Lebombi woni kooduɗe nder Gabon.Ɗum wondi go'o nder kookiji Ogooué.

Lodo Lefini:
Lefini River ko maayo nder Republic of Congo e ko woni ko wootere nder maayo Congo.Henry Morton Stanley yotti ko'e maɓɓe dow 9 mars 1877.:Vol.Two, 251 

Fuuɗol Lekabi:
Fuule Lekabi woni ko ndiyam Gabon.Ɗum wondi go'o nder kookiji Ogooué.

Lekedi maayo:
Lekedi ko maayo nder Gabon.Ɗum wondi go'o nder kookiji Ogooué.

Lélé maayo:
Lélé ko maayo Kameruun,nder worgo leydi ndin.

Ɓaawo maayo:
Fuuji Lepashe woni ndiyam ndiyam nder Botswana. Ɗum noddaama e wuro Lepashe,nder nder ndiyam.Fuule Lepashe ɗon ɓuwa haa Sua PanWon geɗe mari mari geɗe nder nder nder ndiyam maayo Lepashe.

Ladi Lattili:
Ladi Lattili woni ladde Gabon.Ɗum wondi go'o nder kookiji Ogooué.

Lodo Leyou:
Lodo Leyou woni maayo Gabon.Ɗum wondi go'o nder kookiji Ogooué.

Lily River:
Lily River ko maayo nder Madagascar.Ɗum woni ɓaawo ɓaawo ɓandu Itasy,e ɗon ɓuwa haa hirnaange hirnaange haa hawta bee maayo Sakay,ko ɗon jeyi nder maayo Tsiribihina.
Luttugo maayo ɗon nder leydi Itasy.Ɓaawo maayo ngal woni ko fannu hakkunde leydi Itasy to woyla e leydi Bongolava to worgo.

Linta River:
Linta ko maayo nder diiwaan Atsimo-Andrefana nder worgo Madagascar.O ƴiwoyi laawol leydi 10 ɓadi Ejeda e o ɓeydi nder maayo Indiya nder Bayu Langarano,fuuna fuuna fuun Androka.
Fuuji ɗi ɓurɗi ɓeydaade ko Manakaralahy e Manakaravavy,ɗi ɗon mari ɓeydaare nder sahaa maɓɓere diga lewru Yuli haa lewru Noofambar.Wuro maako ngal ngal ngalleeki ɗon ɓesda,ɓesda.1-2 L/s/km.2

Lungo maayo Loange:
Loange (ko Luangué,Luange) woni ko laami ko Kasai.Fuu fuɗɗii nder Angola,maayo ɗon ɓadito haa woyla nder lesdi Kongo,nder fuunaaŋge Kwango.Nden maayo ɗon tokki dow lesdi lesdi lesdi Kwilu e lesdi Kasai haa yaasi maako dow lesdi Kasai.

Lodo Lokoho:
Lodo Lokoho ɗon ha woyla Madagascar.O ɗon ɓuwa haa maayo maayo ngal haa fuunaaŋge,haa maayo Indiyan.O ɗon wurtina feccere feccere nder Marojejy Massif.Ɗuum ɗemngal ngal woni 25 km haa worgo Sambava,ɓadi Farahalana. Won be feereji ngam haɓɓugo nguurndam nguurndameeji ndiyam diga Jirama nder duuɓi 1970,ammaa ɓe timmiay.Nder hitaande 2002,go'o go'o,ngam dabareeji 6 kW diga Jirama ha haɓɓuki bee EDF Farayse,RWE Jarmal,GTZ e Canadian Hydro-Québec,fuɗɗii.  Ɗum halki nder 2009 ngam nyau politik Malagasy.

Lugo Lucala:
Lucala River ko maayo nder Angola,ko jawdi je ɗon yahugo maayo ɓurɗo mawnugo nder Angola,Cuanza.
Lucala ɗon mari fuɗɗam nder lardi Uíge,ɗon yahda nder lardi Malanje,ɗo ɗon hokkata Kalandula Falls, nden ɓaawo ɗon ɗon ɓuwa nder maayo Cuanza ɓadi Massangano nder lardi Cuanza Norte, kilomitaji feere dow Dondo.

Luena River, Angola:
Luena River nder fuunaange Angola ɗon ɓuwa hirnaange Luena,LuenaAngola e ɗon ɓuwa dow fuunaange Zambezi.LuenaInnde nden naftiraama e nder yimɓe nder nokkuure nden,Yimɓe Luena.

Igwe Okafo:
Igwe Okafo (dugumi 1830-1891) woni Obi 16th of Otolo e Igwe of Nnewi O laati laamiiɗo mawɗo e ardiiɗo ruuhu nder Nnewi, gariiri Igbo nder lesdi Naajeeriya.O wondi gooduɗo Nnofo Royal lineage e mo woni ardiiɗo baaba maako Eze Ukwu Bana ɓurɗe laamu Igbo, woodi laamiiɓe Nnewi yeesso warugo Europe'en.

Fuuɗol Gwayi:
 
Gwayi ko maayo nder lesdi Zimbabwe. Ɗum ɗon ha Matabeleland. Ɗum waɗi dammugal hakkunde diiwaanuuji Tsholotlos e Lupane, nder diiwaan Matebeleland North nder Zimbabwe

Boushaki:
Boushaki:

Josiah Ransome-Kuti:
Josiah Jesse "J.J." Ransome-Kuti: (1 lewru 1855 - 4 Korse 1930) wonnoo diina e jaayndiyanke Naajeeriya.O anndiraa ngam waɗugo yimbeere kiristaane to muusikol Leysdi ndiin, e ngam windi yimbeere Kiristaane nder Yoruba.

Salami Agbaje:
Chief Salami Agbaje (1880-1953) o wonnoo gooto e ardiiɓe jaayndiyankooɓe Leysdi Naajeeriya wakkati jamanu koloniyaal Leysdi ndi.wonnoo jaayndeejo lesdi ndiiɗo heewɗo heewɓe heewɓe, o heɓii laawol haɓɓugo e waylitugo yiɗde mum haa laatoto goonga nder Leysdi ndii.O ɗon boo o wondi mo ɓeydooɓe Ibadan nder wakkati maako, o naftiri jawdi maako ngam o wurtina dammugal keso ɗi ɓe ngalaa nder gariiri.

Mayo-Belwa:
mayo-belwa hukumaa pamarum nder diiwal Adamawa, Naajeeriya

Muriaé:
Muriaé O woni nder Daande Mata Minera, e yimɓe mum ko e hitaande 2019 ina jogii 108 763 neɗɗo.
Etimolji.
Innde wuro ngoo ko ko firti ko e maayo Muriaé. Innde maayo naa' nder tupi.

Mayde:

Muhammadu Bangana:
Mallam Muhammadu Bangana (ngam anndiraa kadi Mallam Dendo ko Manko) wondi goomu taariika mawɗo nder karnijum 19 nder ko jooni woni Naajeeriya.ƴetti diga Fulbe ha Diiwal Kebbi, ha woyla Leysdi Naajeeriya.

Lodo Pager:
Nguurndam Pager ko nguurndam Uganda nder Afrik fuunaaŋge.O ɗon maaro nder lesdi man haa woyla,o ɗon hawta bee maayo Achwa.

Fedde Pako:
Fuuɗol Pako ko maayo nder Alibori,Benin.Ɗum woni ko'e ndiyam ndiyam ko'e maayo Alibori.

Mawɗo Ribeira:
Ribeira Principal ko ko ɓandu nder fombinaare saare Cape Verde">Santiago,Cape Verde.O ɗon ɓuwa nder wuro São Miguel.Fuuɗol ngol ɗon nder hooseeje Serra Malagueta.O ɗon ɓuwa dow woyla,nder lesdi Principal,o ɗon hawta e Mawɗo Atlantic ɓadi Achada Monte. 

Ribeira do Rabil:
Ribeira do Rabil ko ndiyam je ɗon ɗon wara nder fannu caka e hirnaange nder saare Cape Verde">Boa Vista nder Cape Verde.Ɗum ko ,ɓooyɗo e nokkuure nde laami ɗum ko 199 km2.  Fuuji mum ɗon haa fombina fuunaaŋge leydi ndin,haa woyla dow dow dow dow ɓurɗum ɓurɗum nder leydi ndin, Monte Estância.O ɗon ɓuwa bana fuunaaŋge,o ɗon ɓuwa fuunaaŋgo gariiri Rabil,o ɗon ɗon ɓuwa haa maayo Atlantic ɓadi haa nokkuure Aristides Pereira International Airport., Lagoa do Rabil,woni nokkuure mawnde nder leydi.

Rarico River:
Rarico River ko maayo nder Mozambique.Fuujo on woni ko'e ndiyam Lugoenda,ko'e mum woni ko'o ndiyam Ruvuma.Nder wakkati koloniyaal Portugal,jaaynde Orop-huwtoree nder darnde Nyassa Company-heɓii ɓaleeɓe nder maayo Rarico.

Ravine du Chaudron:
Ravine du Chaudron woni maayo nder Réunion. woni 14.8 nder ndun.O ɗon ɓuwa nder maayo Indiya ɓadi Saint-Denis.

Ribeira de Alto Mira:
Ribeira de Alto Mira ko ko ɓule nder fombinaare woyla hirnaange saare Cape Verde">Santo Antão nder Cape Verde.Fuude maako ɗon haa hirnaange hooseere Gudo de Cavaleiro.O ɗon ɓuwa haa woyla hirnaange,nder parish of Santo André,Porto Novo municipality.O ɗon ɓadita nokkuuje Alto Mira e Chã de Branquinho ngam o ɗon ɓadito nder Atalantik. 

Rio de Canjambari:
Rio de Canjambari ko maayo je ɗon ƴiwo nder lesdi Oio nder lesdi Guinea-Bissau.Ɗum woni ko'e ndiyam ndiyam ndiyam Farim.

Rubiiro:
Rubiiro ko maayo nder worgo hirnaange Ruwanda,ko wootere wootere Ruzizi.O hawti e Ruzizi,ɗun woni ko fannu hakkunde Ruwanda e Democratical Republic of Congo,ko e 2 km (1.2 dow nokkuure nde Fuule Ruhwa, ɗun woni fannu hakkunde Rwanda e Burundi,liyahugo Ruzizi.
Firooji.
Ɗeɗol

Kool Selian:
Selian ko maayo go'o je ɗon ƴiwo diga dowle dowle dowla Meru nder lesdi Arusha nder Tanzania,Afrik fuunaaŋge.Duule Arusha ɗon jooɗorgo haa fuunaaŋge maayo Selian.

Fuuji Semu:
Fuuji Semu woni ko ndiyam nder lesdi Tanzania,ko ndiyamji Sibiti,hakkunde maayo Eyasi e maayo Kitangiri.

Fuuɗol Shangani:
Shangani woni maayo nder Zimbabwe je fuɗɗii ha ɓadi Gweru,Gweru River je je je je haɗi nder ko ɓuri haɗi e nder lesdi Midlands e Matabeleland North.O ɗon ɓuwa nder maayo Gwayi.
Fuule Shangani woni nokku ɗo konu 4 Desemba 1893 Shangani Patrol waɗi nder konu nde Major Allan Wilson e 31 worɓe nder British South Africa Company maayi ngam konu Matabele.Yimɓe Amerika ɗiɗo tan,Frederick Russell Burnham e Pete Ingram,e wootere Austraaliyanko'en, W.L.Gooding, njooɗini nyau man.

Sig River:
Fuuɗol Sig,anndiraa kadi e Mekerra,ko fuɗol Aljeeriya.
Fuule Sig woni ko'e ndiyam nder Fuule Chelif e ɗon ƴiwo nder wuro Sig.Ngam ɓurna fuɗugo maako Sig ɗon haa mawngu mita 50 (160 e ɗon timmi haa mawngo kiloometre 30 (19 diga maayo Mediteraneere bana haaru ɗon wulla,nden ɗon ƴiwo nder lesdi mawngu haa yaasi kooseeje Daïa. Fuude nden wadi wadi.
Fannu ngal hujjaama e sahaaji sahaaji e nder Aljeeriya,e sahaaje sahaaji.Wurooji ɗon wara naa ɓuri milimita 400 nder hitaande.

Naadi Sine:
Fuule Sine walla Fuule Siin (Siin e Ɗemngal Serer;"La Rivière Sine" e ɗemɗe Farayse) woni maayo nder Senegal.O ɗon ɓuwa haa maayo Atlantik bee maayo Saloum nder delta Sine-Saloum.

Nguurndam Sinoe:
 
Nguurndam Sinoe ko nguurndam Liberia nder diiwaan Sinoe.O dilli haa maayo Atlantika fuunaaŋge Greenville haa 4°59′37′′N 9°02′12′′W / 4.99361°N 9.03667°W / 4.9361;-9.03667. Fuuɗol ngol woni ko fannu hirnaange nder Sapo National Park.

Fuuɗol Sirba:
Fuuji Sirba ko fukuji Niger nder hirnaange Afrik.Sirba fuɗɗii nder Burkina Faso e ɗon ɓadito fuunaaŋge,ɗon ƴiwo nder Niger nden ɗon ɓadita feccere nder lesdi ɗiɗo.O hawti e maayo Niger nder caka hakkunde Gotèye e Karma nder Niger,ko e 50 km dow Niamey.

Sisaony:
Sisaony woni maayo ɓurɗo ɓeydaade nder Analamanga,Madagascar.O ɗon dilli diiwaan Antananarivo Atsimondrano e Andramasina,nder lesdi Madagascar nder lesdi lesdi Maadagascar haa maayo Ikopa.Nder maayo Betsiboka ndiyamji ma'a ɗon haaji maayo Indiyan.
Wuroji ndiyam.
Ha nder Andramasina ɗon woodi fahinugo mita 30-1.

Lodo Siwaze:
Siwaze River ko maayo nder a.

Lodo Slay:
Fuule Sly woni maayo nder lesdi Aljeeriya,Afrik. Fuuji Sly je ɗon jeya ko ndiyam Chelif e ɗon jeya e Chelif to fuunaaŋge gariiri Sidi ben Thiour.

Fedde Tapoa:
Njo Tapoa woni ko wootere nder Njo Niger.O ɗon ƴiwo nder lesdi Tapoa nder Burkina Faso,o ɗon ɓooyta nder fure lesdi hakkunde Burkina Faso e Niger,ɓaawo maajum ɗon ɓooda nder maayo Niger nder worgo hirnaange Niger.

Nicholas Said:
Nicholas Said (dimaa Mohammed Ali ben Sa'id, 1836-1882) wonnoo moofto, mooftoowo, sooja, e mawɗo

Daular Gana:
Daular Gana wanda kuma aka fi sani da Ghana, Ghanata, Wagadou, ko Awkar, daular Afirka ta Yamma ce da ke kudu maso gabashin Mauritania da yammacin Mali ta zamani wacce ta wanzu daga Marni 1 zuwa karni 10. Mutanen Soninke ne suka kafa daular, kuma an kafa shi a birnin Koumbi Saleh.

Guosa:
Guosa eii doon biddido yare,en mawbe bandirawo Alex Igbineweka duubi 1965. O janja yare,en Naajeeriya Sheree fransajjo to woyla Afri.
Ndu mari kujeji je ɗon ɗo'o:

Lekki jammi:
Jambee Lekki kii lisde Afirik andubbe andal leddee jawtee too baaduu maaki huumari boote lekki jammi kidon too Leydi African

Kofn gol:
Kofngol hommugo jam banduu men ummijam beettii jamm n bali jam noi a wonderful mi doujam noi dabbaji maa Dabbaji am doubtful jam

Fijjirede kosde:
Fijjirede kosdee haa nder pel lel rufus dow nyam bey dow houta saarre ow dow defa kolche jey houre nbewa mi lauta kaare am mi yaha fijjirede kosdee

Usmaani Ɓii Fooduyee:
Usmaani bii fooduyee Sokoto moodibbo Diina Lislamu nder Haiti musulunce too lisde Afirik

National Association of Persons with Disabilities:

Hairee malka:
Hairee malka waande too fuuna geelwe fataskumo too lesdi jihar Yobe awaayla Naajeeriya jottoriide fuuna too daatal maiduguri jaajirka hairee malka yaare km/5 haa too yaare km/6

Laamorde Adamawa:
Laamorde Aadamawa fula artuude too fombina huuna lesde Naajeeriya howtoode Aadamawa a taraba too woyla fombina naajeeriya baawow haade fombina Laamorde Gombe Aadamawa too baawow fombina woode lesde Comeroon too huuna baawow wan lisde chad modibo adama hakkoke kommandajow shehu usman dan fodio jaagardow Fulɓe doow jihad too Afirik (1809)

Deebinowje:
Deebinowje unn biikol Lekki too baalijee gondee haa too lisde Aljeri a Mali lisde Afirik

Barbara Adams (Misiyaajo):
Barbara Georgina Adams, FRSA (19 lewru Feebari 1945 - 26 lewru Juun 2002) wonnoo Egyptologist, archaeologist, e jannginoowo Britinkeejum, mo woni mo anndinoowo Egypt Prehistoric. O huuwani duuɓi ɗuuɗɗi haa Hierakonpolis, to o ɗon woni mo ɗon jaɓɓa dow laawol. O huuwani e Petrie Museum of Egyptian Archaeology nder London, ɓaawo ɗun o huuwani e hooreejo (1984-2001), nden o huuwani kadi e nder nder nder leydi Britaaniya.
Fuɗɗam golle e musiyaaku Petrie.
Barbara Bishop jibini haa Hammersmith Hospital nder London to Charles e Ellaline Bishop. Baaba maako ɗon mari kuugal mo ɓe mbaawaa anndugo, ammaa o heɓii jaŋde to Godolphin e Latymer School amma jawdi maako ɗon maaki haa o jaŋde ɓaawo sappo e jowi. Caggal nde o wurtini janngirde o tokki janngirde e janngirde jemma. To duuɓi sappo e jeeɗiɗi, o laati jannginoowo nder suudu taariiha tagdi. duuɓi sappo e joweeɗiɗi, o laati jannginoowo nder suudu taariha tagdi.

Solange Ashby:
Solange Ashby ko afrikaniyanke e archaeologist mo anndal mum haani haalde e ɗemngal, diina e darnde rewɓe nder Misra e Nubia. O woni jannginoowo jannginooɗo e nder jaango ɗemɗe e aadaji fuɗnaange fuɗnaande e jaango California, Los Angeles.
Kuugal.
Ashby janngini ngam BA nder Intercultural Studies e Bard College e Simon's Rock. O heɓii jaango e doctoral nder Egyptology diga jaango Chicago. Kuɗol maako dow doktoor waɗi nder suudu haalude Philae nder Misra, bana boo haalude nder cembiɗol Kushite nder El-Kurru nder Sudan. Kuɗol maako ɗon ɗaɓɓita binndi, hawti e graffiti, ɗi yimɓe Kushite ɓe njahi to cuuɗi Misra nder Lower Nubia.
Nder lewru Janaare 2021 o waɗi darnde nder Daartol Classics e Ancient Studies to Barnard College, New York, bana jannginoowo jannginooɗo. hitaande 2023 o waɗi o wartii jannginoowo jannginooɗo e nder jaango ɗemɗe e aadaji fuɗɗorde fuɗnaange fuɗnaande e jaango California, Los Angeles. waɗi bolle e nder jaŋde Catholic University's Institute of Christian Oriental Research e American Research Centre nder Misra e o janngini e American University nder Washington.
O wondi boo mo fuɗɗiiɗo jammu William Leo Hansberry, mo yiɗi anndingo yimɓe Afrik dow jamanu Afrik.

Guillemette Andreu:
Guillemette Andreu-Lanoë (dunngu 3 Ogosta 1948, Paris), ko Egyptologist e archaeologist Farayse. O wonnoo ardiiɗo Furuuki Farayseeji Archaeology of Oriental of Cairo, o woni mo curatore e darinoowo Dental Ancient Egypt of the Luvre Museum gila May 2007.

Elise Jenny Baumgartel:
Elise Jenny Baumgartel (woowo Goldschmidt, 5 Oktoobar 1892 - 28 Oktoobar 1975) wonnoo Egyptologist e prehistorian Jarmal mo fuɗɗii janngude archaeology Egypt predynastic.
Fuɗɗam golle.
Elise Jenny Goldschmidt jibini haa Berlin haa Oktoobar 1892, baaba maako Rudolf Goldschmidt. O jaaraama e Jaŋde Berlin ngam o janngina ɗum, ammaa o ɓeydi yiɗi anndal Misra, o janngini ɗum e dow Adolf Erman e Kurt Heinrich Sethe. Baumgartel hawti e laawol jaaynde nder Egyptology wakkatiire nden, ngam o hawti bee jaaynde dow dow dow dow archaeology nder janngude dow dow dow janngude e dow dow dow jaaynde Königsberg. O holli wonde keyri faamugo wakkati Misra fuɗɗiiɗo yaajugo ɗum haɓɓugo nder haala leydi ndii. Ngam maajum, deftere maako ɗon ɗaɓɓita kuuɗe nder nder lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi Afrika, ngam o wi'a dow ɓandu dolmen nder lesdi lesdi Afrika fuɗɗiima diga mastabas Misra, e dow pyramidaji. Ɗu'um ɗon haɓɓa hakkilloji hyper-diffusionist je ɗon je ɗon jeye nder Grafton Elliot Smith, mo ɗon wi'a ɓurɗe fuu ɓesngu aada neɗɗo fuɗɗii nder Misra e haajiri bana fu.

Nathalie Beaux-Grimal:
Nathalie Beaux-Grimal (dugum 1960) woni Egyptologist Farayse, mo anndal dow Kolleje de France e Farayse Institute of Oriental Archaeology e Cairo (IFAO).
O janngini haa Jaŋde Yale o heɓii PhD nder Egyptology e Jean-Claude Goyon nder Lumière University Lyon 2 e deftere dow Botanical Garden of the Precinct of Amun-Re at Karnak (1989). Daga 1997 haa 2005, o jeyaaɗo mo'o mo'o ko mo'o hooreejo leydi Farayse nder Egyptology nder Faculty of Archaeology to Cairo University e Giza. Nder nde haɓɓuki IFAO, o hawti e nder jaaynde to Deir el-Bahari, ha hawti e Janusz Karkowski daga Polish Centre of Mediterranean Archaeology of the University of Warsaw (PCMA UW). O ɗon haalana mo anndugo dow Thutmose III.

Margaret Benson:
Margaret Benson (16 Jowre 1865 - 13 May 1916) wonnooɗoɗoɗoɗo e goomu leydi Engelese e Egyptologist anndiraaɗo ngam heɓugo nokkuure Mut.
Ɓeynguure e saare.
Margaret jibinaa nder hitaande 1865 to Reading, Ingiltere, nder ɓiɓɓe joweego Edward White Benson, jannginoowo Anglican e diina (sare arbishop Canterbury), e debbo maako Mary Sidgwick Benson, ɓiraawo anndal anndal anndirngal anndal anndungal anndal anndugal anndal anndaldal anndal Henry Sidgwick mo o waɗi Newnham College. Margaret yahi nder Truro Girls High School, ɗum woni nder suudu mo baaba maako waɗi nder wakkati maako nder kuugal maako bana bishop arande nder Truro. Nder duuɓi 18, Margaret laati go'oto nder rewɓe arandeeji ngam jaɓa nder Oxford University, to o yahdi nder Lady Margaret Hall, ɗum haɗi ɓaawo. Ɓernde maako e kuuɗe maako ɗe ɓurɗe faamugo, bana ko jannginooɓe maako anndini, John Ruskin boo teddini anndal maako nder limce e ndiyam, o noddi mo haa o janngina nder suudu maako. Margaret ɗon haani ko ɓuri heɓugo nder jaŋde nder jaŋnde nder jaŋgol ɓurɓe anndude, nden nder hitaande 1886, o ɗon haani nokku arande nder Ingiltere nder jaŋgal jaŋde rewɓe.

Svetlana Berzina:
Svetlana Yakovlevna Berzina (Rusiya: Светлана Яковлевна Берзина; 7 mars 1932, to Mosku - 24 abriil 2012, to Mosku) wonnooɗo Misiyaajo mawɗo leydi Risi. Doktaru nauk dow taariika (1977), o wonnoo ardiiɗo jaaynde SSSR-ARE Society (1987), o heɓii medal "Haa no ɗum siftortoo duuɓi 850 Moscow" (1997), Worker honooɗo leydi Russia (1999), ardiiɗo wiɗtoowo dow jaaynde taariika aada e arti arti arti fuunaaŋge to Dowlaaku Muusaa Fuunaaŋge, Moscow.
Kuugal.
O janngini taariika nder jaango archaeology nder Taras Shevchenko National University of Kyiv (1949-1954). Gila 1954, o huuwani bana kuugal wiɗtooɓe e nder Kerch Archaeological Museum. Daga 1960 haa 1981 o huuwani e nder jaaynde Asiya e Afrik nder Central Library of the scholarly foundation AN USSR (ФБОН-ИНИОН АН СССР) e nder Moscow. Nder wakkati oon o janngini wakkati fuu e nder suudu jaangooje ɗemɗe fuɗnaange nder jaangoore Moscow State University (nde jooni woni MSU Institute of Asian and African Studies) nder suudu jaangirde afrikani. Daga 1965 haa 1970, o huuwi nder suudu ndu. Nder 1970, o holli defte maako, ko wi'etee Predсылки образования Древней Ганы (Daaje nder janngirde nder Ghana jamanu). Nder hitaande 1977, o fuɗɗi gollaade dow darnde doctora nauk e taariika nder jaaynde fuɗɗorgal fuɗɗorɗe fuɗɗorngal fuɗnaange nder Institute of Oriental Studies of the USSR Academy of Sciences nden o heɓii ɗum e nder hitaande 1979 bee kuugal biyeteeɗo Мероэ и окружающий мир. I - VIII c. (Meroe e Dunyaaji ɗo'o. Karnuuji 1 - 8 AD). Gila 1981 o huutoraama nder State Museum of the East, Moscow.

Susanne Bickel:
Susanne Bickel (danyeeki 1960, Roma) woni Egyptologist Swiss. O janngini Egyptology nder Geneva nden o huuwi e Farayse Institute of Oriental Archaeology nder Cairo e Swiss Institute of Egyptian Antiquity. O huwti bana archaeologist dow nokkuuje ɗuuɗɗe nder Misra caka e dow. Gila hitaande 2000 o ɗon jeyaa e jannginoowo e jaŋde Freiburg e gila hitaande 2006, o ɗon jeya e janngoowo Egyptology e jaŋnde Basel to o ɗon jeyan dow allahji Misra'en e jinnaaji. Susanne Bickel's kuudi ɗon hawta dow diina e archaeology Misra, musamman dow hujjituki haaruuji Misra. Bickel woni darinoowo jaŋde Bayreeki Baasel Kings' Valley e o wondi nder golluɗo mo haɓɓii haandi KV64, nder nder nder nder hitaande 2011.

Danielle Bonneau:
Danielle Bonneau (dannyamo 1912 - 26 oktoobar 1992) woni papiroloog Farayse nder karnijum 20. Kuugal maako hawti e ndiyamji Maayo Niil e hakkillaaji maako diga jaayɗe Greec e Romanji nder Misra. Bana bee defte tati dow haala ngol, o wurtini defte anndal anndal ɓurɗe 70.

Charlotte Booth:
Charlotte Booth (dugumi 6 abriil 1975) woni archaeologist e winndiyanke dow Misra.
Booth heɓii ko'e mum bachelor e master nder Egypt archaeology e University College London. Caggal nde Booth jaɓi jaangirde, o fuɗɗi janngugo nder Birkbeck, University of London. Ko o janngini dow janngirde woni wakkati Hyksos nder Misra. Nder hitaande 2018, o heɓii darnde Doctor of Philosophy (PhD) diga jaŋde Birmingham: darnde makko nden no wi'etee "Haaɓugo karallaaji: anndingo ko woni nafugo karallaagal karallaaji Misra jamanuɗi e fuɗɗam karallaaji karallaaji 19 e 20", nder kuɓirɗe ardiiɗi ɗiɗo nder ardiiji leydi UK.
O ɗon hokkata darja ha onlinet dow kuuje feere feere dow taariha Misra, bana hieroglyphics, nyalnde nder Misra, ekn., ha site jaŋde maako ha onlinete, CharlotteEgypt. O winndi defte feere feere dow kuuɗe Misra.

Fedde Dilo:
Fuuɗol Dilo woni maayo Gabon. Ɗum windi go'oto nder kookiji Ogooué.

Njoodi Chitake:
Fuule Chitake ina ƴellita nder ladde Mana Pools nder lesdi Zimbabwe, ina jogii leɗɗe mum en nder Zambezi Escarpment.Ko ndiyam ɗam woni ko ndiyam ɓeydaama hitaande kala nder koosejo ko ina waɗi kiloomita dado nder maayo.Waadiwol ngol ina ɓilla nder maayo Rukomechi.
Haaa maayo Chitake, woodi nokkure ɓurɗe ɓaleede, to ɗum heɓii ɓaleede Syntarsus rhodesiensis.

Käthe Bosse-Griffiths:
Käthe Bosse-Griffiths (16 lewru Julaay 1910 - 4 lewru Awril 1998) wonnoo mo Egyptologist mawɗo. O jibinaa nder lesdi Jarmal, o yahdi to lesdi Britaaniya bana ɗowoowo siyasa, o ware goɗɗo lesdi Wales. O laati mawɗo nder Ɗemngal Welsh, o waɗi darnde feere-feere to ɗemngal Wales.
Fedde fuɗɗam.
Käthe Bosse jibini ha Wittenberg nder lesdi Germany nder 1910, ɓii ɗiɗaɓo nder ɓiɓɓe nayi. Baaba maako, Paul Bosse (1881-1947), o wonnoo goomu goomu gooduɗo goomu e hooreejo suudu ndun wuro Wittenberg. Maama maako Käthe Bosse (woowo Levin, 1886-1944) o haani Yahuudiyankeeɓe, ammaa Bosse ɓeydi nder diina Luteran. Caggal nde o timmini janngirde nder wuro maako, o jaɓaama nder Jaŋde Munich, to o heɓii doktoor nder Classics e Egyptology nder 1935. Fedde maako ɗon haɓɓii dow ɓandu neɗɗo nder taƴre Misra. ɗon, o fuɗɗi gollaago nder jaango Egyptology e Archaeology nder Berlin State Museums, amma o e baaba maako ɓe njaɓɓi diga kuugal maɓɓe nde ɗum anndini maama maako Yahuudiyanke. 
Bosse ɗon maayi daga torra Nazi'en, o ɗon moofana lesdi Germany haa Britaniya nder hitaande 1936. O huwtunoo bana wallitoowo to zoologu e jannginoowo D'Arcy Wentworth Thompson. O heɓii kuugal wiɗtooji e Petrie Museum to University College London nden ɓaawo ɗon to Ashmolean Museum to Oxford. Nder hitaande 1938, wakkati o ɗon Oxford be o ɗon wondi ardiiɗo Somerville College, o hawti bee Egyptologist be janngoowo wiɗto, J. Gwyn Griffiths. Griffiths, mo welsh e Classics mo anndini nder Rhondda o jaati e University College Cardiff (ko jooni Cardiff University) to maako nder Misra jamanu Kathleen Freeman waɗi.

Edda Bresciani:
Edda Bresciani (23 Septemba 1930 - 29 Noofambar 2020) wonnoo Egyptologist Italiyanko'en.
Laamu.
Bresciani jibinaa e Lucca, o jaɓi jaŋde e nder hitaande 1955 e Jaŋde Pisa. O waɗi jaɓɓorgo nder nokkuuje ɗuuɗɗe nder Misra, o anndiraa ngam kuuɗe maako dow nokkuuje ɗuuɗɗi nder Faiyum, ɓurna fuu suudu maadi Medinet. heɓii e heɓaade ko nder laamorgo laamorgo Laamu Fuuta to Khelua.
Nder 1974 University of Pisa suɓi Bresciani ha hooreejo jaaynde jaayndeere to Saqqara; ɗo o janngini haandi lesdi lesdi lesdi 26th dynasty to vizier Bakenrenef. Nder hitaande 1978 o waɗi "Egitto e Vicino Oriente", nder nder nder nder jaŋde Egyptological. O waɗi boo yiɗde nder "Tembere Miliyonji" to Thutmose IV to Thebes.
Bresciani, mo ɗon anndina yimɓe, wurtini defte ɗuuɗɗe dow kuuɗe maako. O heɓii medal for meritory science and culture e lewru Mee 1996, o wondi doofol do Academia dei Lincei. Caggal nde o jeyi, Bresciani laati ardiiɗo ardiiɗo e jaŋde Pisa.

Sara Christian:
Sara Williams Christian (joku 25, 1918 - silto 7, 1980) woni debbo arandeejo nder taariika NASCAR. 
Carreere jaaynde.
Christian waɗi gasa e Looper Speedway, nokkuure fuɗɗiiɗo nder nder nder nder ndiyam Lanier. O heɓii ko ɓuri heewde nder nder nder nder nden carel nder gariiri maral maral Max Looper. Looper, ɓiy Max, e gollooɗo maako arande o wi'i dow jaalorgal Christian "wurtini worɓe fuu boo, o debbo bee fuu, o heɓii ko o yi'i".
1949.
Christian waɗi gasa nder NASCAR fuɗɗam nder 19 lewru Juun 1949, nder Charlotte Speedway. O heɓii 13th nder Ford #71 je mari gorko maako Frank Christian. Nder nder nder nder nder fuɗnaaki, Bob Flock jaɓɓi carel maako ɓaawo motor maako maaki nder nder nder ɓaawo 38. O ɗon hoola masin haa o ɓeyda, o waɗi ko 14th.
1950.
Christian hawti nder go'o nder hitaande 1950, o timmini 14th nder nder nder 12th race ha Hamburg Speedway ko o yahdi har o wurtini.
Fedde careluuji motorsports.
NASCAR.
(key) (Bold - Pole position awarded by qualifying time. Italics - Pole position earned by points rankings or practice time. * - Ko ɓuri heewde e nder geɗe ɗe ardii.) 

Arlene Hiss:
Arlene Hiss (woowo 1954 e nder Mortorsport Database walla woowo 19411) ko ardiiɗo jaayndeere e jannginoowo. Hiss ina woodi teddungal nde o woni debbo arandeejo fuɗɗiiɗo jaaynde Indy, waɗugo ɗum nder hitaande 1976. O debbo maako fu nder Indianapolis 500 nder hitaande 1972, Mike Hiss.
waɗi gollal jannginoowo dansa Fullerton High School e Fullerson, California, e o waree e Mike Hiss, 1972 Indianapolis 500 Rookie of the Year, ko adii nde o jokki nder USC, ɓe njaaraake.
Carreere nder jaaynde.
Hiss fuɗɗii golle mum nder nder nder hitaande 1964, o hawti e nder Sports Car Club of America's sanctioned Showroom Stock racing, o heɓii ko'e ɗiɗi nder California club championships. Nder 1974, o laatii "Wownoowo debbo ɓurɗo ɓeydaago" ngam Sports Car Racing Enterprises for Women.
Koɗol jaaynde.
NASCAR.
(key) (Bold - Fedde bold - pole hokki diga wakkati hawtoreeki. Italics - Pooli position gaɗa diga poondi rankings ko wakkati huutore. * - Ko ɓuri heewde e nder geɗe ɗe ardii.) 
Firooji.
Ɗeɗol

Lella Lombardi:
Maria Grazia "Lella" Lombardi (26 mars 1941 - 3 mars 1992) wonnoo jaaynde Italiyankoore jokkondiri e nder jeewte 17 nder Formula One World Championship Grand Prix. Lombardi woni go'o nder rewɓe ɗiɗo ɓe ɓe ɓe ɓe njaɓa ɓe ɓe ɓe njogii Formula 1 nden woni rewɓe ɗiɗaɓo ɓe ɓe njogi poondi nder Formula 1. Lombardi mawni nder Itali, o ɓeydi yiɗi jaaynde ngam o jaayndi carel jaaynde foroy. Fuu fuɗɗugo nder karting e yahde to Formula Monza e Formula tati, Lombardi ɓeydi yeeso nder jaaynde haa o heɓii Formula 1. O debbo tan je heɓii poondi nder Formula 1, o heɓii poonde e nder Grand Prix Espaani. Lombardi wondi debbo arandeejo mo heɓii ko'e mo'o e mo'o nder nder nder nder marɓe nder marɓe e nder nder nder carɗe ɓooyɗe. O heɓii 6 Saa'i Pergusa e 6 Saa'ii Vallelunga. Haala Lombardi ɗon hawta diga ɓaawo ɓaawo ɓooyi. Kinnaaji maako ɗon haandi hawtuki rewɓe nder nder nder nderje e no yimɓe ɗon ɗaɓɓa rewɓe nder suudu nderje.
Nolde hoore.
Lombardi jibini nder Frugarolo, gariiri matin nder Piedmont nder Itali. Baaba maako o maccuɗo, o hokki Lella golle maako arande nde o ɗon jaɓɓa ngam jaaynde saare maako. Fuɗɗoode, baaba Lombardi tawi ko o yiɗi jaaynde ɗum ɓurɗi jaaynde, ammaa o jaayndi ɗum nde o timmini nder jaaynde 1968. Lella Lombardi wondi boo gooto e rewɓe arandeeji nder jokkondiral yimɓe e maɓɓe. Lombardi maayi ngam nyau nyau nyau nyau nder Milan nder 3 Maars 1992. O woodi duuɓi 50 e nder nder Frugarolo. O ɗon maaya bee maako, Fiorenza. Lombardi ɗon haalde bee laamorde nder nokkuure maako, Frugarolo.
Kuugal.
Firooɓe.
Nder hitaande 1974, Lombardi laati debbo arandeejo fuɗnaaku ngam heɓugo ko'e nder Race of Champions nder Brands Hatch. O ɗon moofta nder Lola-Chevrolet o waɗi ko 14th. Nder nder nder hitaande 1975, o heɓii laawol ngam o heɓta ko o yiɗi e Maars-Ford. O hootiima caggal 20 darnde.

Tamar Tumanyan:
 
Tamar Hovhannesi Tumanyan (1907-1989;Armenian: Թամար Թումանյան) ko arkitekto Arminiyankoore Soovite.O heɓii koode,Worker of Culture of the Armenian SSR (1977). Baaba maako o mawɗo bo mawɗo bo Hovhannes Tumanyan.
Biography.
Tamar Tumanyan jibini nder 1907 nder hey]="./Tbilisi" id="mwFQ" rel="mw:WikiLink" title="Tbilisi">Tbilisi, Laamu Russiya,to baaba'en Olga Tumanyan e mawɗo mawɗo mawɓe Hovhannes Tumanyan. woni ɓurɗo sukaaɓe 10 nder saare maako. maako hawti e Musegh (1889-1938),Ashkhen (1891-1968),Nvard (1892-1957),Artavazd (1894-1918), Hamlik (1896-1937),Anush (1898-1927),Arpik (1899-1981),Areg (1900-1939), e Seda (1905-1988). Tamar heɓii janngirde maako nder suudu jannginooɓe ɓikkoy Gaane nder Tbilisi.
O yahi Yerevan Polytechnic Institute (ko jooni National Polytechnic University of Armenia); ɓaawo ɗun o janngini e National University of Architecture and Construction of Armenia.
Gila 1933,o huuwani bana marɗo marɗo nder studio Alexander Tamanian nder Yerevan. Ɗum wonnoo e studio Tamanian nde o jokki nder taƴuki suudu Opera Yerevan (1939),e wuro laamu,Yerevan (1941). huuwani ɓaawo ɗun o golli hooreejo Mark Grigorian.
Daga 1945 haa 1949 o woni hooreejo ardiiɓe ardiiɓe Arminiya. Daga 1947 haa 1951 o woni hooreejo jaayɗe arminiyankoore arkitektural.Daga 1966 haa 1989,o huuwani hooreejo Hovhannes Tumanyan Museum nder Yerevan.

Jokkidira ummatooje kawtal yimmɓe mbe naaƙasu:
Mɓe jokkidira ummatooje kawtal yimmɓe mbe naaƙasu haa englisiire noddiraa (JONAPWD) Ɗum laymaaru konngol (oganaasioon) tiggaaɗim nde 1992 gam hawtaa fof mbe mbaawata jannde nder Naajeeriya. Hawtirɗe nde jottori nder Abuja e jonnta hoorejo maajum woni Abdullahi Aliyu Usman.duuniyaaku boo jawleeru ndun un memmbaajun kongol lesɗe less laamu England noddiraa Commonwealth yimmɓe rakkuɓee nden haa Afrik mobgal.
Quick Facts Founded, Focus ...
Yimmɓe mbe naaƙasu
kuuɗe gatteeɗe nde hoosay yaasi haa nastinaa holluki e waytinaa yimmɓe mbe naaƙasu nɗer fuu lesdi ndin,wallitooɓe ɓesdanaɓe yennci maɓɓe hawti e maruki Shari'a e dookaaji edow ko mbe ngiiɗi fuu gam semmɓiɗinnki mbe nastuki adunaaru haa nder jonnde margo nder duuniyaaru nden boo Kadi wallitoo mɓe làruki kalaa ko daamotooɓe fuu e matsalaaji ndi mbe gonndi nder duuniyaaru,fuu ɗu'un gamma inganntaaki margu yimmɓe mbe naaƙasuuji.
ponndindira.
Eder mbe golleji keeditaaɗi mbe haa hoosay yaasi mawɗe kawtal nder Naajeeriya gan un wannginaa ko metti yimmɓe mben fuu hawti e kala feerejum ki naawi ɗun mbe mbaawata. Banoo mislii,mbe mari huudoɓe hoisooɓe paasinjaa haa jipoorɗe piirooje, haa banoo jipoorde piirooje nde (Nnamdi Azikiwe international Airport), innarre mbe ngoodi wadki jayriiɗun ki mɓe ngiiɗi gam yimmɓe ɗustaa hawti anndinki e nanuki wurtaaago yidde piirooje dow.
Ɗi nder njayri ɗun fannu siyaasaji,mbe hoore'en haa nɗum mɓe kongii don mari gurtal tefuugo haa nder nde taskaramjii (media) gan wannginaa ɗun meema nden toon haa ɗun du'u adunaaru wakkati ndun mbe mɓurdal ndi gurtal haa joɓal gam yimmɓe wallitoo yimmɓe mbe naaƙasu.

Nigerian Americans:
Naajeeriya Americans eii lysidi doon Naajeeriya. O janja Jamou toe hebe lysidi America duubi 1980 ewodi jama,are 25,000 hittande American Community Survey (ACS) bilde 712,294 kohee 85% eriminmo lysidi Naajeeriya.
O janja Jamou jama,are Afrik, Naajeeriya lysidi Afrik Naajeeriya joumou toe America duubi 2013, eii Janngirde firamare DNA jama,are 50,281.

Kay A. Orr:
Kay Avonne Orr (woowoo Stark; 2 lewru Janaayo 1939) woni politikko Amerik mo golliima hooreejo leydi Nebraska 36 diga 1987 haa 1991. O wonnoo hooreejo leydi Republican, o woni hooreejo leydi arande e haa jooni debbo tan.
Orr jibinaa Kay Avonne Stark nder Burlington, Iowa. Maama maako Sadie ɗon ɗon ɗon ɗon mari kuugal siyasa nder nokkuure, ammaa baaba maako Ralph ɗon ɗon ɗon wondi goomu wuro Burlington e jaayndi kuugal. O yahi to Yunivasiti Iowa diga 1956 haa 1957.
Nder hitaande 1963, ɓaawo o dilli Lincoln, Nebraska, Orr fuɗɗi gollaade ngam jamiroore Republican. O wallitii yimɓe politik bano ardiiɗo lesdi Richard Nixon e senatoorɓe Carl Curtis e Roman Hruska, o annditiino debbo mo'o mo'o jeyaaɗo nder leydi Nebraska nder hitaande 1969.
Orr waɗi hooreejo laamorde Nebraska ɓaawo Frank Marsh yaasi laamu nder hitaande 1981. O jeyaa e nder ndeen golle e hitaande 1982, o jeyaa e debbo arande to nder leydi Nebraska. O waɗi kuugal ngal haa hitaande 1987.
Goobernator Nebraska.
Nder suɓaaji 1986 Orr heɓii suɓaaje Republican ngam gomnaare Nebraska caggal nde o heɓii suɓaare e nder suɓaaɗe joweego, o waɗi 81 nder suɓeeji 93 Nebraska hawti e Douglas e Lancaster, Kermit Brashear waɗi suɓaaɓe 9, e Nancy Hoch waɗi suɓeeje 2.
Nder nder nder nder nder hitaande 1986, o heɓi heɓiɗo hooreejo wuro Lincoln Helen Boosalis nder nder nder leydi US nder nder nder suɓaaji gomnati ɗiɗawɗi ɗi ɗi ɗiɗo mawɓe partiyaaji ɗi ɗi ɗi ɗi rewɓe, o heɓi ngam 53% haa 47%. Orr woni debbo arandeejo leydi Republican ɓe cuɓii hooreejo leydi Amerik, e debbo arandeeji Republican mo woni hooreejo leydi leydi Amerika caggal Vesta M. Roy, mo o golli hooreejo leydi New Hampshire gila e lewru Desemba 1982 haa e lewru Jenere 1983.
Nder suɓaaji gomnati 1990 Orr ɓeydi ɓeydi hakkiilo dow Ben Nelson. Ɗe ɗiɗi ɓurɗe Nelson haɓɓugo dow dowla mum je je je je ɗon haɓɓii ko o jaɓii dow dowla dowla mum e dowla mum haɓɓii dowla mum, e ɓeydaaki lekki je ɗon haɓa dowla maako.
Siyaasaji.
Bana gomnaaru, Orr ɗon haɓɓa bee ɓeydaago kiisa, bee haɓugo bee hakkiilo hakkiilo, e haɓugo bee ɓeydagol nder daliila fuu.
Ɓaawo golle.
Orr ɗon hooreejo go'o dow dow dow koolaaɗo ngam haɗugo dewgal gay nder leydi dow laawol Initiative 416. Caggal nde o waɗi ɗum, o waɗi ko haani waɗugo dewgal yimɓe goɗɗi e maɓɓe nder hitaande 2000. Nder 2015, Obergefell vs. Hodges kiita kiita kiite mawnde waɗi banni'en ɓe mbaawataa waɗugo.
Orr waɗi ko ɗiɗi nder hooreejo leydi Nebraska, o waɗi go'o nder suɓaaji suɓaaɗi njowo nder leydi ndi. Nder suɓaaji hooreejo leydi 2004, o suɓii George W. Bush, e nder suɓaaje 2012, o suɓaa Mitt Romney.
Nolde hoore.
O waree Bill Orr e 26 Septemba 1957, ɓe mari ɓiɓɓe ɗiɗo, John William e Suzanne. Bill maayi ngam nyau COPD nder 5 Maay 2013.

Linda Lingle:
Linda Lingle (woowo Cutter; 4 Juun 1953) ko politikko Amerik, mo woni gomnaajo jowto Hawaii gila 2002 haa 2010. O woni gomnati leydi Hawaii arandeejo Republican gila 1962. Lingle boo o woni debbo arandeejo lesdi nden nden boo o woni gomnati Yahuudiyankeejo arandeejo. Kaŋko o waɗi hooreejo leydi, Lingle waɗi hooreejo Maui, ardiiɗo kawral, e hooreejo jamiroore Republican Party Hawaii.
Nder kawtal lesdi Republican nder 2004 nder New York City, Lingle waɗi hooreejo kawtal nder wakkati Dennis Hastert mo ɗon jooɗoto dow kawtal. E hitaande 2012, o wonnoo mo gollotooɓe Republican'en ngam Senate Amerik, o haɓɓiima ngam jooɗorde feere nde senator Amerika Daniel Akaka mo o yahri to leydi ndii. 
Nder lewru Janaare 2015, Lingle nodditi bo laamuwo mawɗo to gomnaaru Illinois Bruce Rauner, o dilli dow kuugal ngal nder lewru Yuli 2016. O ɗon jeya nder Council of Governors of the Bipartisan Policy Center in Washington, DC Lingle ɗon jeya haa Hawaii nder karndol ɗiɗaɓu 2017 o laati ardiiɗo nder kalfinaaji Hawaii Pacific University nder lewru Juun 2017.
Lingle woni debbo go'o ɓurɗo waɗugo hooreejo leydi Hawaii.
Ɓeydiima, janngirde, e fuɗɗam golle.
Lingle jibinaa Linda Cutter to saare Yahuudiyankeeɓe to St. Louis, Missouri nder 1953, ɓiɗɗo Mildred e Richard Cutter. Lingle yahdi bee baaba'en maako to Southern California nde o woodi duuɓi 12. O heɓii jaangirde Birmingham High School nder Lake Balboa, California (jo wakkati ɗon, go'o Van Nuys), nden o heɓii jaango maako nder jaangirde californiyanko'en, Northridge, nder hitaande 1975.
Ɓaawo maajum, o tokki baaba maako haa Hawaayi, o huuwi arande nder Honolulu bana darnde jaaynde ngam Teamsters e Hotel Worker Union. Ɓaawo, o dilli haa Molokai, to o fuɗɗii Molokai Free Press, ko wondi nder nder nder nder leydi. 
Nolde hoore.
Lingle ɗon ware nden ɗon woɗɗina nde ɗiɗi. O ware gorko maako arande, Charles Lingle, wakkati o ɗon jaŋde, nder 1972. Nde o dilli California haa Hawaii, o dilli bee maako nder hitaande 1975 amma o haani innde Lingle. Nder sahaa maako nde o laamiiɗo Maui County, Lingle woɗɗii gorko maako ɗiɗaɓo, wakiliila Maui William Crockett, mo o dewti diga 1986 haa 1997. Lingle ɗon ɗon haalde e walaa ɓiɓɓe.
Maama maako waɗi carol carol Cutter Ford nder Hawaiʻi.
Lingle woni jaŋde California State University, Northridge 2004 mo jaŋde mum. 

Paul Biya:
Paul Biya (wundu Paul Barthélemy Biya'a bi Mvondo; 13 feebariyee 1933) ko politikko Kameruuna mo woni hooreejo leysdi Kamerun gila 6 Noofambar 1982, o jeyaaɗo ardiiɗo leysdi Kamerun gila 1975 haa 1982.
O woni hooreejo ɗiɗaɓo ɓurɗo laamu nder Afrik, hooreejo leydi ɓurɗo jooɗorde e laamu nder duuniyaaru e hooreejo leydi mawɗo nder duuniyaaru.
Biya, mo wonnoo ko to baŋnge Cameroon, ɓeydi ɓeydi ko ɓeydi no o ɓeydi hooreejo leydi Ahmadou Ahidjo nder duuɓi 1960, o laati ardiiɗo hooreejo leydi diga 1968 haa 1975 nden o laati ardi ardi heɓii Ahidjo hooreejo leydi to o jaɓii laamu nder hitaande 1982 e o ɓeydi laamu nder nder gollaade laamu 1983-1984, nde o halki mawɓe mo.Biya waɗi laabi siyasa nder nder nder ɗemngal partiya go'o nder duuɓi 1980s, ɓaawo ɗun o jaɓii haɓɓugo siyasa ɓurɗe ɓurtiinde nder duuɓi 1990s nder nder ɓernde mawnde.O heɓii suɓaaji hooreejo leydi 1992 e 40% nder suɓaaje goɗɗe, e suɓaaɗe goɗɗe, o jeyaa e suɓeeji mawɗi e hitaande 1997, 2004, 2011, e 2018.
Ngendam.
Siyasatooɓe mooliiɓe e laamuji Yammaaru ɗon wi'a ko ɓe ɗon jeyaa e jeyaa e nder nder nder nder kuuje ɗe.Fuuje ɗuuɗ ɗe ɗe nganndi ɗon hokki daliila dow o heɓay yiila nder hitaande (1992) nden yiila ɓaawo ɗon ɗon ɗon ɓaawo boo ɗon ɓaawo.

Albert Roger Miller:
Albert Roger Miller (dugumi 20 mee 1952), anndiraaɗo Roger Milla, koɗo kameruun aaniyankoore jokkondirɗo fotbal mawɗo.O wonnoo gooto e ardiiɓe Afrik naaɓe ɓeen ɓeen ɓe ɓeen ɓe laati mawɓe mawɓe dow dow dow laabi duniyaaru.
O waɗi ko e dow ko'e tati nder ko'e duniyaaru ngam timmude leydi Kameruun.
heɓii anndal hakkunde leyɗe e duuɓi 38, duuɓi jeewte ɓurɗe ɓaleeɓe ɓeen njogii, ngam o waɗi golleeji nayi e nder FIFA World Cup 1990 e ɗum waɗi o laati golloowo ɓurɗo duuɓi e nder taariha FIFA.O walli Kameruun warugo timmude Afrik arande nde heɓti kootoye nder kootoye kootoye duniyaaru.
Ngendam.
nder ko'a ɓaawo ko'e maako, ngam o golli dow ko'e makko dow ko'o waɗi ko'e muuɗum dow ko'a nder ko'ol ko'e nder ko'u ko'e duniyaaru nder ko'i ko'e mon nder ko'al FIFA nder ko'en hitaande 1994.Milla ɗon mawnina golleeji bee wurtaago to fannu ɓaawo e waɗugo nandi bee lambada.
Hukuma FIFA.
hitaande 2004 Pelé noddi mo nder FIFA 100 nder nder nder ardiiɓe ɓurɓe jooɗorde e nder duuniyaaru.hitaande 2007,
Nder wakkati o jeyi, o laatii ko ɓurɗo go'o nder lesdi Afrika nder nder nder nder ko'e FIFA World Cup e go'oje jowi.

Thomas peters:
Thomas peters dayyaɗow hiitadee (1738_25 june 1791) arduujow mauɗoo haa too suwdo taaɓee tandee nasariya Amerka todow laawal hownobe a suwdo deerewal famarol too liilaɗow dow nova scotia own lattakee mouɗoo jattiinɓe himɓande baba bowɗee lisde Sierra leone too hiirna Afirik peters hakkuke kautuɗow horre suwdo canadians

Muhammad ibn Muhammad al fulani kishnawti:
Muhammad ibn Muhammad Al fullani kishnawti daayyaɗow hiitande alif 18 century anɗow own andi jaytul leengal astoronologies Arabic grammarian beeɗow too lisde katsena jutturde wayla Naajeeriya al kitsinawi janguwɗo too gobarau minaret haa too katsina yautiina jannde a Cairo Egypt alif 1732 benɗouwo too arabic

Nomad:
Nomad woni gooduɗo ummatoore nde walaa nokkuure jooɗorde nde ɗon yahda e nokkuuje.Yimɓe ɓeen hawɓe e jaajotooɓe, ɓeen ɓeen ɓe ɓeen ɓe'e ɓeen ɓe nganndi (ko ɓeen ɓe jogii ɓeen ɓe ngaɗi e leyɗe), ɓeen ɓe ɗon nganndi e ɓeen ɓe njiɗi e nder ɓeen ɓe mbaɗi e nder maɓɓe.karnijum noogas, yimɓe lenyol ladde ladde ladda ɓeydi ɓeydi, haa ɓe ɓeydi limti e 30-40 miliyaar nomad e nder duuniyaaru haa hitaande 1995.karnijum noogas, yimɓe lenyol ladde ladde ladda ɓeydi ɓeydi, haa ɓe ɓeydi limti e 30-40 miliyaar nomad e nder duuniyaaru haa hitaande 1995.Wuroo ɓeen ɓeen ɓe ɓeen ɓe ngurtini ɓeen, ɓe njogii ɓeen ko ɓe njogori ngam ɓe mbaawaa ɓesdaade ɓeen.
Nomadism.
Nomadism boo wondi laawol nguurndam je ɗon haani nder nokkuuje ɗe ɓe mbaɗata bana steppe, tundra, malla ice e sand, to mooliti woni laawol ɓurngal huutore ngam huutoreeji ɗi ɓe mbaɗataa.Misaal, yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe jooɗiiɓe nder tundra'en ɓe laamiiɓe reene e ɓe ɗon ɓeen, ɓe ɗon ɓeya e ɓe ɗon ɗaɓɓita nyamndu ngam dabbaaji maɓɓe.
Wakkati feere boo ɗum anndina "nomad" woni yimɓe feere feere ɓe ɗon yaasi nder nokkuuje je ɗon ɗuuɗugo yimɓe ngam hokkata kuugal feere (ko'e kuuɗe maa kuugal) to yimɓe maɓɓe marɓe kuugal feere, misaalu.Ɗi'e yimɓe anndiraa "nodeeji peripatetic.

Fula Christians:
Fula'en ko Fulani'en, ko Fulaniɓe ko Fulani yimɓe:, ɓe ɗon anndina diina Kiristan'en nder diina maɓɓe fuu. Ngam taariika Muslim habaru ɗu'um, diina ɗon ɓeyda. Ɗum haani wonde 1-2% nder yimɓe Fulani fuu ɓe jeyaa e diina feccere to diina Islam walla to diina feere to diina diina Islaamu.
Fuuɗugo habaru ha Fulani.
Caggal ko fuɗɗii e nder taariika, fuɗnaaki fuɗnaade yimɓe Fula, ngam e nder caɗeele keewɗe ɓe ɗon hawta e maɓɓe e diina Islaam. Nder woɓɓe haala, fuɗugo bee neɗɗo 
kiristaanaaku mo wonaa nder lenyol Fula hokki laawol jaɓugo diina Fula Muslim, naa' bana ko hawti e feere feere e jaɓugo yimɓe maɓɓe.
Cantaaki Fula'en.
Fula'en ɗon nyaama feere feere feere daga yimɓe ɓooyi e ɓooyiji Islaami'en nder nokkuuje taariike nde yimɓe Fula ɗon njooɗi. Haala ɗon ɓeyda ɓurugo ɓeydaago to ɓe ɗon anndina dow haɓɓuki Fulanis Musulman'en (ko ɓuri fuu Fulani'en mawɓe lamɓe) dow Fulani e Kirista'en ɓe ɗon ɗaana ɓe bana ɓe ɗon haɓɓuki ɓe e waɗugo haɓɓuki haɓɓuki haaje e ummaatooje fuu, ɗi hawti e haɓɓuki yimɓe haɓɓuki e nder yimɓe haɓɓugo e nder yimɓe. Ɗe kaalis ɗe'e waɗi nder lesdi Nigeria fuunaaŋge nder karnijum 21.

Fulani bana:
Fulani bana (nganndi bana Fulani style,Fulani hairstyle) ko feere fuɗɗam ɓalli ɓalli ɓoli nder rewɓe Senegalees je waawi yi'e hannde nder leyɗe Afrik feere feere.
Ngendam.
Bana rewbe jongou tilde rou,e Al,adu Senegalese.kaugal, re,o toe Yar,e. O janja bana sowbe oon.
Fulani bana gada Senegalese bana,on go,on e tati. O hana Bo Derek, Alicia e Tyson jabou Fulani bana.

Muhammad bello:
Muhammad Bello laamiɗow sokoto deeɗabow too hiitadee alif 1817 akowyare alif 1837 own binndetowo destiinore jottatde datal deena islama own ɓeeɗow usmanu dan fodio jaytudo laamu sokoto

Eze ukwu:
Eze Ukwu dayyaɗow hiitande 1799_1862 ardeeɗow obi haa too otolo ɓee Igwe too laamurde Nnewi ardeeɗow laawal bedeena too duuw fatal beelu arduujow Nnewi a Igbo haa too Leydi Naajeeriya jawtuuɗow too nnofo rayal lineage own roniitee baba maako Eze Chukwu own bee leeyal Igbo too low nasarakuyan jaaba laamu lisde Naajeeriya.

Fulani Hatuki:
Fulani hatuki ko hatirol fibre conical be huutoreeji je ɗon wari diga Fulani yimɓe nder Afrik hirnaange,Fulani hat ko hatirol fibre conical be huutoreeji je ɗon wari diga Fulani yimɓe nder Afrik hirnaange.
Ɗuum ko'e ɓooyde dow turban.Nder fuɗɗam, ko hatuki Fulani woni hatuki kosɗe waɗaaɗe nder fibre leɗɗe.Ɗum ɓooydi e lebbal fuu nder ɓaawo e dow, nden wakkati feere e lebbol lebbal nder caka.
Haa dow ɓernde hattu ɗon woodi ɓorɗe ɗe ɓorɗe nder leƴƴi Ha dow hatira ɗon woodi ɓandu ɓandu bee ɓandu ha dow maako.Ko'e cappuɗe ɗe'e ɗon haɓa dow dansaɓe nder fimmuɗe (2018) (All the Stars diga artist Kendrick) Lamar Won goɗɗe nanondiral hakkunde fulani hat e juudiyankeejo medieval hat, koo nde walaa anndal hakkunde ɗiɗo.

George Ada costa:
George ada casta (1853-1929) own ɓeeɗow Naajeeriya mawɗo jaytol hooyuugo hooto jee own huwii too hiitande (19th) haa too hiitande (20th) ƙarnuuji too les laamu gonnatee lesde Naajeeriya

Oba eshugbayi eleko:
Oba eshugbayi eleko (mayiiɗow hiitande 1932 too eleko haa too Eko saayre leydi Lagos a hiitande Alif 1932) hakkooke baba Oba dosunmu eleko own jaaɓe takkukwe laamu nasarakowyee too ɓeyaadow Colonial rule too lisde Naajeeriya ɓee jaytee indee eleko haa too Oba oyo enjowne enhaakowde Alif (1925 -1931) nɗistinoore ɗewdow nowdeerta Oba abikunle akitoye hiitande Alif (1928-1931) haa kowyareOba sunusi olusi too hiitande Alif (1928-1931)

Josiah Sowande:
Josiah sowande ( can 1858-1936) kadi anndiraaɗo haa sobo Arobiodu un yurubannkeejo binnɗoowo diga Abeokuta, diiwal Ogun,laatiiɗo baawuɗo binndol ɗun Awi, wolde yoruba lawnuuwal binnɗooɓe. 
Golle kuuɗe maako un heɓeende mako Egba ñyebtaaɗum daw,nde golleji dun mɓe ummatooje kiristanko'en misiinaary nder lardu Egba nden anndaaɗum ceeral (ciifol) Egba, kuuɗe maako cemmɓiɗirii mawngu nde juppal kiristare edow arannde keytinniɓe
finnannde maako.
Sobowale o dañaama nder Abeokuta,ca 1858. O ekkitake haa winnduki fedde nde CMS hollitiindu jannginirde amma o timminaayi jannɗe Maako o heeɓii kuugal haa deenal mbe maɓɓaɓe pursinaa nder ndi hukumaa Egba. O wicci ngal deenal o nanngi demal e binndol. Hakkuɗe 1905 e 1934, kuuɗe maako sappo e ɗiɗi mɓannginaama Ngoɗɗe nder Hukumaa Egba lollini haa ballal banndiku
Sowande huuwi nder mobgal Orin Arungbe,ngal bolwal kuutiral heɓeede nde Oro cult.
Life

Samuel Herbert pearse:
Quick Facts daygo, Jannɗe ...
Margo e Jannɗe.
O dañaama nde lewru nuwammba 20,1865, haa nde iyaalu ndum nbe ummatoore churchwal misiinaary. O halartake janngirde sekandareere C.M.S Grammar school, Lagos nde jannɗe Yeeso o fuɗɗi kuugal dow dun pamaro nder 1883.
Nder 1888, o sembiɗii dow hawti e neɗdo luumo saaliyo, I. Thampson e mɓe ɗiɗo puɗɗi harkaaji coggu luumo nder Lagos e London. Haa kadi nden fof kawtinɗirii worɓe ɗatal nder 1894. pearse neeɓaayi fuɗɗi luumo muum ngo hoore mun nder kalaba e Lagos nden e kadi o lattake wakiliijo ɗun zinaaru kamfaniwal luumo.
O waɗii gurtal jawdii luumo nder heɓannki manjaa diga nde hiiɗe kalaba edow jagirɗo gurtinoowo huuɗeeji. O heɓii shopɗum sembe haa kunuu duuniyaaru I,e nasru nder nde semɓidinnki Luumo nastii koo toyee fuu heɓeede nde kamfaniwal Elder Dempster. Ɓaawo O fuɗɗi nastinnki nde hottollo e rooba nder Leydi Benen e semɓidinnki nastinnki haaje diga lesɗe yaasi
Joggol.
limngal nder kawtuɗii Mr. pearse's Jogorgal un nde Jammingo. Jammineki Nollywood fijoowo Joke Silver,taaniraawo maako debbo.

Çalifonia:

Alice Minchin:
Alice Ethel Minchin (5 Nuwamba 1889 - 26 Julie 1966) wonnoo jannginoowo e jannginooɗo defte nder leydi New Zealand. O jibinaa e Waihou, ɓadi Panguru, New Zealand, ñalnde 5 Nuwamba 1889. E hitaande 1917 o laatii ardiiɗo deftere e nder deftere Auckland janngirde maude, ko o waɗi haa 1945.

Alice Prochaska:
Alice Prochaska FRHistS (dugumi 12 lewru Yulie 1947) ko ardiiɗo ardiije e defte, o waɗi ko o laamɗo-woofere to Jaangoore Oxford e hooreejo Somerville janngirde Oxford, diga 2010 haa 2017.
Kuugal.
Alice Prochaska janngini dow Somerville janngirde nder janngirde Oxford nden o heɓii BA e DPhil nder taariika jamanu.
Prochaska fuɗɗiiɗo wonde mo'o mawɗo museum, nden o laati arkifugo nder Ofisa Deftere Yimɓe, jooni e leydi Archives. Daga 1984 haa 1992 o jeyaaɗo e jaagorɗo dow janngirde taariki Research, janngirde London. Daga 1992 haa 2001 o woni Mawɗo ko'e goɗɗe e British Library. O waɗi hooreejo deftere e Jaŋde Yale, Amerik, diga 2001 haa 2010. O laati ardiiɗo Somerville janngirde diga 1 Satumba 2010. anndinaama e 'Ali P' nder ardiiɓe. dillii nde o timmini duuɓi jeeɗiɗi nder lewru August 2017. 

Matilda mccrear:
Matilda mccrear (1857 lewru silo 1940) jooɗiido too lysdi kutal hurre lisde amirika own waada soorugo lumo trade hakkudee clotilda own yarubaajow kuuwudow too mobile county Alabama lattiiɗow shuurowo too maako haa too mauniiko a miiyeko.

Ogbi Okojie:
