Ogbidi okojier onojie (laameeɗo) uromi (1857_3 leyru February)1944) jaydeeɗow haa too deer kwayee Leydi Edo State Naajeeriya too baawo Wargo nasarakuyeen leydi heerna jaabeta laamujee leydi Naajeeriya

Vitoria Davies Randle Davies:
Victoria Davies Randle Davies (1863_1920) own guutojow tooder yiimbe kaital hurre maube Victorian lagos too let colony

Ibkunle akitoye:
Abikunle akitoye (1871_1928) own baba ummatuure too leyde Lagos too hiitadee 1925_1928 baawo heemgo desteenore jaabiital a hiitande Oba eshugbayi eleko Ibikunle akitoye own artuudow heemgo andal Deena keerista a too Lagos akitoye own jaabe takkukwe kautal hurre too lagos aley daatal arambee

Aina onabolu:
Aina onabolu OBE (1882_1963) own haakgo heebitande datal taagugo modern arts too leyde Naajeeriya own moodibbo naafuwaw too jaytal baudee windetobe finnataawa down daatal janguube a Leydi own hiitande makaranta Saka deere winndetangow juutturde yeembe saree too kuwgaal maakow gwal finnataawa

Kofoworola Adekunle kofoworola Abayomi:
Kofoworola Adekunle kofo Abayomi (10 July 1896_1 January 1979) own beedow naajeeriya jaytudo andal opthalmologist own gootujow taagudow jabeetul kaital hurre faamarbee leyde naajeeriya hiitande alif (1934) own heebitande chairman development board a hiitadee alif (1934_1966 haa too finnataawa leyde Lagos

Oyekan I:
Quick Facts Oba Oyekan I, Oba of Lagos ...
Yariima oyekan vs. larude mawɗo Apena Ajasa.
Nder 1883, oba Dosunmu, Baaba Oyekan noddi jonnɗe haa monnere hakkuɗe mawɗo Apena Ajasa you e mawɗo Taiwo Olowo nonkadi mawɗo Ajasa waddi keerol oba e woɓɓe lamɓe luttuɓe. Hollude nasru wadduki keerol Yariima Oyekan woppi mawɗo Ajasa hello mawɗo Ajasa ɓeddi wi'uki o huɗaayi mɓe oba jeya Iga Idunganran Laamorde mbe oba
Liiriba nder nastal ɗum mbe Oba yaake ardungal Oyekan.
mbe liiribaku mawɗe Obanko fuu ceede e nder kuugal nɗum nastal yaake ardungal Oyekan. Oyekan jaɓii a jahiral nastidum jawdii heɓeende lamu bodejo no ardii H
ukumaa diga€1,000 haa yahri€200 ( Yeeso haa ummorii ba €400 nder 2898). Oyekan Kadi relli tokkuɓe gaɗa laamu muuɗum edow jonnɗe mawɗo Apena Ajasa laatiiɗo kawruɗo hawti nder 1883. Keerol daay o relli yideeki dega mawngu kuugal laamu mawɗo kamani ba laamu halal gadduɗum Ina Dosunmu nder ndi 1861 timmal ndi ceeson.
Mayde.
Oba oyekan maahi ñalde salasa suumaye 30,1900 ɓaawo ñaawu keɓɗummo nde wonnɗe wakkatiire. O laamake haa duuɓi 15 dow oba moo Lagos.

Ama Ata Aidoo:
Ama Ata Aidoo (23 mars 1942 - 31 Maay 2023) wonnooɗo winndaako Gana, mawɗo, mawɗo ɗemngal, politik, e jannginoowo. O laati ardiiɗo jaŋde nder Gana diga 1982 haa 1983 nder laamu PNDC Jerry Rawlings. o waɗi nder hitaande 1965, Aidoo woni debbo arandeejo nder Afrik. Bana mawɗo defte, o heɓi ko Commonwealth Writers' Prize e hitaande 1992 e defte maako Changes. hitaande 2000, o waɗi Mbaasem Foundation to Accra ngam haɓagol e wallitol golle rewɓe rewnooɓe Afrik.
Ɓiɗɗo.
Christina Ama Ata Aidoo jibinaa ko ñalnde 23 Mars 1942 e Abeadzi Kyiakor, ɓadi Saltpond, nder diiwaan Cakkare Gana. Fedde feere (haaki Megan Behrent, Brown University, e Africa Who's Who) holli wonde o jibinaa e 31 mars. O woodi ɓikkoy ɗiɗo, Kwame Ata.
Aidoo ummorii nder wuro laamiiɗo Fante, ɓiɗɗo Nana Yaw Fama, hooreejo Abeadzi Kyiakor, e Maame Abasema. Maako maako ɗon maayi diga yimɓe neocolonialists, ɗum waɗi baaba maako ɗon anndina bana ko nafata janngugo sukaaɓe e saare saare nder gariiri dow taariika e haala wakkati. Ɗuum waɗi udditii janngirde arande nder wuro maɓɓe nden o walli Aidoo haa o yahdi janngirde Wesley Girls' High School, to o ardii o yiɗi o wardiɗo.
Jaŋde.
Gila 1957, Aidoo yahi Wesley Girls' Senior High School ha Cape Coast. Caggal nde jaŋgi, o jaŋgitii e nder 1961 to Yunivasiti Gana, Legon, to o heɓii jaŋde Bachelor of Arts e nder Ɗemngal Farayse o winndiino golle makko arande, The Dilemma of a Ghost, e hitaande 1964. nder lesdi ndi Aidoo, ɓe ɗonno ɓe ɗonno.
Maayi.
Aidoo maayi ha 31 May 2023 ha Accra. "Naaɗo mo'o mawɗo mawɗo, mo'o wallitoo ngam rewɓe, yimɓe Afrik e yimɓe ɓamtaare nder duuniyaaru", hooreejo lesdi Nana Akufo-Addo anndini wonde o heɓay haandi lesdi, bee kuugal haandi diga 13 lewru Yuli haa 16 lewru Yuli, Ha 13 lewru Juli, haandi maako waɗi nder suudu suudu lesdi, ɓaawo ɗon o ɗon maaro nder lesdi nder wuro maako Abeadze Kyiakor ha 15 lewru Yuli e haandi haandi nder misaalu e haandi nder diina haande, ha Nyalnde 16 lewru Juli.

Joao Grimaldo:
Joao Alberto Grimaldo Ubidia (o dañaama yalde 20 Colte 2003) koɗo Peru, jogiiɗo fotballe e nder leydi Peru.

Fadwa Taha:
Quick Facts farfeesaajow hoorejow ɗum ndi jaami'wal ɗum Khartoum...
Finnannde Arannde e Jannɗe.
fadwa Abdul al- Rahman Ali Taha dañaaɗo nder Arbaji, diiwal Gezira ñalde 23 oktoobaa hiitande (1955),e maunii dow ɗaa'e. O un jannguɗo taarihaaji laatiiɗo kebɗo Bacalowal tidal diigugo nder 1979,kadi mastaas dun diiduki nder 1982, haa Kadi PHD nder (1987) fof diga nde janngirde 
Kuuɗe.
Fadwa joonake nde Janngirde Jaami'wal Khartoum edow ballite jannginnki nder 1979, lattake lacturaajo nder (1987),nden ballitoowo farfeesaajo nder (1992)kadi ass farfeesaajo nɗer 2000 e Tabbutuɗo farfeesaajo nder 2012. Nder 2010, debbo on O lattake nde editaajo nɗum mɓe jariida ndun fannu janngirdu diidal a nde janngirde Khartoum,nden o hokkaama hooreejo ndun nde fannuu taariiku. Nder 2007 debbo'on lattake ballitoowo jahinoowo (Dean) ɗum fannuu heññoɓe jannɗe. Nden ɓaawo o fa'i Yeeso haa Saudi Arabia e heeɓeede 2010 yahri lattaaki kewɗoo mo linñital e tayaakaku jannɗe e Janngirde Golle nder Hafr Al-batin.o hokkaama hooreejo janngirde Jaami'wal Khartoum nder oktoibaaru 2019.
Fadwa halartake nder nde walitaaki Hukumaa sundan nder 2019, ɗaa'e gaddu dun jippaaki nde Usman Al'Basir. Nden kadi o habdii foje nastuki hakkuɗe mbe soljien e sanji nɗe kuuɗe taadungal kuudal,
O waɗii ritaaya nder lewru nuwammba 2021 nɗer habre haaɗe nde boldal jam yahri ɗaluki Abdalla Hamdok edow jonnɗe firaa ministtajo ɓaawo teetuki laamu sudan dun soljien batiicoup d'état.
margu Maako.
fadwa O ɓangii haa Al-miqdad Ahmed Ali e mɓe haa mari bikkon ɗiɗon; Hatem,lattido jannguɗo eder janngirde kuudal tayaaka, ɗum jamiawal Khartoum e Ezzat jannguɗo haa fannu ɗum boo'ite hiite lantarkii eder janngirde Jaami'wal Khartoum ngal.

Sophia Akuffo:
Sophia Abena Boafoa Akuffo JSC (dunde 20 Desemba 1949) woni hooreejo leydi Ghana gila 19 Juun 2017 haa 20 Desemba 2019. O laati laamiiɗo nder suudu kiita mawɗo lesdi Gana diga 1995.
Jaŋde.
Ɓiɗɗo debbo mo'o laamiiɗo Presbyterian, o heɓii janngirde maako nder suudu Jaŋde Parliament Hill, Hampstead, London e Wesley Girls' High School, Cape Coast, o heɓi jaŋde maako nder jaŋde lesdi Ghana. O ɓeydi janngude maako nder Jaango Lawol Ghana to o heɓii ko o laamiiɗo. janngini bana laamiiɗo nder Nana Akufo-Addo. O jogii jaŋde magistrature nder Law diga Harvard University nder USA.
Kuugal.
Sophia Akuffo ɗon huuwa nder suudu suudu amada, e Jerry Rawlings noddi mo haa suudu mawndu nder lewru Noofambar 1995. O laati ardiiɗo kawtal laamorde dowla dowla dowle Commonwealth Judicial Education Institute, e hooreejo darnde darnde darngal darnde daranaaki dowla ngam duuɓi ɗuuɗɗi. Nder lewru Janaare 2006, o suɓii haa o go'o nder ardiiɓe laamiiɓe suudu Afrika dow hakkeeji yimɓe e yimɓe: o suɓaa ngam duuɓi ɗiɗi, nden o suɓake haa hitaande 2014 o waɗi hooreejo laamiiɓe e hooreejo suudu.
Akuffo winndi The Application of Information & Communication Technology in the Judicial Process - the Ghanaian Experience, hollaaki to Afrik Network Judicial Ghana (2002).
Iyaalu.
O woodi ɓiɗɗo debbo biyeteeɗo Violet Padi e ɓiɓɓe ɗiɗo mawɓe Samuel Osei e Cara Nyame. woodi saare mawnde, hawti e deerɗi njooɗiɗi, ammaa o ɓadiiɓe tati ɓe mbi'i dow.

Alice Annum:
Alice Annum (dimaa 20 Oktoobar 1948 e Accra) ko jaayndiyanke Ghanaan mo jaayndi. Sahaa maako ɓurɗo ɓooyugo nder mita 200 waɗi 22.89 sekonde, ko heɓii e juulde Olimpiiki 1972 nder Munich. woni debbo arandeejo nder lesdi Ghana nder Olympics. ndeen, Alice jokki e juulde 1964 nder Tokyo, 1968 nder Mexico e juulɗe 1972 nder Munich.
Annum ha nder yimɓe ɓe ɓe ɓe ɓe ɗon jokkondira nder juulde National Sports Festival je ɗon hawrata nder Ghana. O heɓii jaɓal dow jaɓde jaɓde ganaaɓe diga Amerik e o jokki ngam jaŋde Tennessee. O hawri e juulde Olimpiiki 1964 amma o ɓeydii ko o ɓeydi e nder fuɗɗam fuɗɗam, o waɗi 28th bee fuɗɗam ɓurɗum fuɗɗam mita 5.45.
O heɓii teddungal e hitaande 2010 ngam kuuɗe maako nder hawtaade nder nder nder nder hawtaare nder lesdi Ghana. hitaande 1970, o heɓi jabude e nder dowle dowle dowla dowle dow 100 m e 200 m.
Nolde hoore.
Alice woodi ɓiɓɓe 3.

Ayesha Harruna Attah:
Ayesha Harruna Attah (dimaa Desemba 1983) ko winndiyanke mawɗo nder lesdi Gana. jooɗii nder Senegal.
Ɓeynguure e janngirde.
Ayesha Harruna Attah jibinaa e Accra, Ghana, nder duuɓi 1980, nder laamu konu, to inna mo wonnooɗo habaruɗo e baaba mo wonnoo mo wonnoo taƴowo. Attah wi'i: "Baaba'en am ɓe laati ardiiɓe am mawɓe. Ɓe ɗon mari bolle ɗemngal ɗemngal ngal ɓe mbi'i 'Imagine', ɗon mari haala dow Akra; artiiki dow art, science, film, defte; cartoons - ɗi mi yiɗi masin. Ɓe laati (e ɓe ɗonno boo) ɓe'e am. Mi heɓii Toni Morrison nde mi woodi duuɓi sappo e tati, mi ɗon maaro. Mi ɗon maaro fuu ko o "Cenndi". Mi ɗon moodi fuu ko o windani. Mi ɗon seeda mi ɗon nanki jannata, nden kam ma'ana ma'ana maajum ɗon ɓeyda am, mi ɗon moodi bana non bo defte ɓurɗe mawnugo ɗum windaama, nden mi yiɗi winda duuniyaaru heewuɗo yimɓe rewɓe mawɓe, bana no Misi Morrison waɗi".
nde mawnini e Accra, o yahri Massachusetts o janngini biyokimiya e Mount Holyoke College, nden o heɓii jaagorgal makko nder journalism nder Columbia University, o heɓii MFA nder binndi jaagorɗe nder New York University.
Wonduki.
Attah wurtini defte jowi. Deftere maako fuɗnde Harmattan Rain (2008) winndi bana sakkitol ngam jaɓugo ko Per Ankh Publishers - nder jaɓugo gaanaaniyanko'en Ayi Kwei Armah - e TrustAfrica, nden o wondi nder nder nder nder limgal mawɓe Commonwealth Writers' Prize (Africa Region) 2010. Fuuɗal maako ɗiɗaɓo "Saturday's Shadows", wurtinaama e World Editions nder 2015, o daraniiɗo for Kwani? Manuscript Project, nden haɓɓii nder holandinaajo (De Geus). "Wawre tati" maako woni "Wawɗe teemerre nder Salaga" (2019), ɗon hawta "laɓɓitol, yiɗde e haɓre nder nguurndam rewɓe nder Gana nder teemerre 19th nder wakkati ɓaawo Afrik". O winndi The Deep Blue Between, roman ngam mawɓe mawɓe. Fuuɗugo romanji maako jowitiiɗo, romansi romansi Zainab Takes New York, wurtini nder lewru abriil 2022.
Bana jaɓɗo AIR Award 2014 , Attah laati marɗo nder suudu sacatar nder Bahia, Brazil. heɓii kadi jaaynde nde Miles Morland Foundation Writing Scholarship nder hitaande 2016 ngam deftere non-fiction dow taariika kola nut.
Attah suɓi e Bernardine Evaristo ngam o laato hooreejo, ngam Rolex Mentor and Protégé Arts Initiative nder 2023-2024.
"Harmattan Rain" (2008).
"Harmattan Rain", wurtinaama nder 2008, ɗon tokki haala ɓaawo ɓaawo ɓiyɗe tati nder saare Ghana, hawti bee Lizzie-Achiaa, Akua Afriyie e Sugri.
Lizzie-Achiaa woni mawɗo wuro maɓɓe, mo ɗon ɗaɓɓita mo o yiɗi, nden e ɗon e ɗon o ɗon ɗaɓɓito kuuɗe mo'o. Ɓiɗɗo maako 'o, mawɗoɗo, Akua Afriye, ɗon maaro hoore maako nder lesdi mo'o ɗon maaro ngam kolliɗe, ɓikko maako tan Sugri, o ɓiyɗo boo, o ɓeydi boo, o ɗon maaro boo, o yaaki haa saare haa o yahda haa jaŋde nder New York, to o anndini booɗɗum.
Saturday's Shadows (2015).
"Saturday's Shadows" ɗon waɗi nder Afrik hirnaange nder duuɓi 1990's, haalanki "gooduɗo haɗi ngam haɓɓugo haɓɓuki maɓɓe nder nder nokkuure politik ɓurɗe laaɓde", haalanki dow maajum: "Attah holli haa jooni anndal maako bana mawɗo. O holli anndal maako bo mawɗo bee hakkilantaaku e laaɓɗum ɓamtaare ɓernde maako".
Nolde hoore.
Ayesha woni ɓiɗɗo Alhaji Abdul Rahman Harruna Attah e Nana Yaa Agyeman. O woodi boo debbo biyeteeɗo Rahma.

Santiago:
Santiago (/ˌsæntiˈɑːɡoʊ/, US maa /ˌsɑːn-/;[]Espaañol:: ), anndiraa jawdi Santiago de Chile, woni laamorgo e wuro ɓurɗo mawnude nder lesdi Ciile e nder go'o nder gure ɓurɗe mawnude nder Americas ɗon haandi nder lesdi lesdi lesdi ndin, nden woni ɓandu lesdi Santiago, ɗo yimɓe ɗuuɗani 7 miliyaar, ko ɗum waɗi 40% yimɓe Leysdi ndin.
Ɓurɗo nder wuro ɗon haadi hakkunde 500-650 m (1,640-2,133 ft) dow maayo.
Duule gariiri ɗon hawta bee gese inabooje, nden Santiago ɗon yaasi diga kooseeje e maayo Fuuta.
Ngendam.
Santiago ko wonde laamorgo Leysdi Cile gila wakkati koloniyaal.Dow wuro woodi gariiri nder gariiri nder karnijum 19th neoclassical (architecture e winding side-streets featuring a mix of art deco, neo-gothic, e style feere).
Luttugol Santiago ɗon haandi bee kooseeje feere feere e maayo Mapocho, je ɗon ɓuwa bee parki bana Parque Forestal e Balmaceda Park.Andes Mountains waawi yi'ugo diga ɓurna fuɗɗi gariiri nden e ɗon walli ngam nyau smog, musamman nder wakkati winter, ngam walaa ndiyam.Santiago woni nokkuure politik e jawdi lesdi Chile e nder nokkuure nde laamorde lesdi ɗuuɗal nder Leysdi.
Sheree.
Luttuɓe laamu Chile e laamu nguu ɗon haɗi Santiago, nden Congres ɓurna fuu ɗon hawta nder Valparaíso.

Muhammad Mustapha olaroungbe Akanbi:
Quick Facts
Finnannde Arannde e ilmu.
MustaphaAkanbi dañama hiitaande ɗumngu1971 e Ile Magaji kemberi,Awodi,kotaswal Gambari, Ilorin Fuuna, diiwal kwara. O heɓii ɗereewol sayda jannɗe Maako nde hirna Afrik (Waec) e lakolwal Hukumaa federaacion ta okingwe a ɗumngu 1989. O heɓii digiriiwal Maako aranndewal e fannuu sarii'a nde Janngirde Jaami'wal Obafemi owolowo e hiitaande ɗumngu 1993. O timminii jannɗe Maako diga Janngirde Nigerian law school e ɗumngu ngu 1995. Kadi nden O niddaama haa yahri (BAR) e nder hiitaande nden. O waɗii digiriiwal Maako ɗiɗaɓal e fannuu sarii'a e Janngirde Jaami'wal diiwal Lagos e ɗumngu 1998. E nder hiitaande ɗumngu 2006 o heeɓii digiriiwal Maako tataɓal haa leydi British(United kingdom).
Kuugal ilmu.
Mustapha Akanbi o fuɗɗi jannɗe Maako e jonnɗe modibbo e Janngirde ekkitoore kuugal sarii'a nde Janngirde Jaami'wal Ilorin Kadi ma O lattake farfeesaajo e ɗumngu 2012.
kuugal sarii'a.
Mustapha Akanbi O waɗanii Leydi hidiimaa e jonnɗe ballowo e fannuu sarii'a haa Bankiwal mawngal Naajeeriya gongal Lagos diga duuɓi 1995 yahri 1996 e goɗɗum fannu ndi ɗumngu hiitaande hidima Maako E nder kamfaniwal lawyaa'en Gafar &Ci, Ilorin e wole Bangbala&Co, Lagos,Olawoyin e Olawoyin Lagos e Ayodele, tokkiɗirɗum O huwii haa jonnɗe kuutoro famaroo hakkuɗe lewru machie 1996 e 1998.
Gollite-gollite kuuɗe.
Mustapha Akanbi o lattake kiiɗo hoorejo saciwal himari dookaaji luumo, Kadi hoorejo geɓɓal sarii'a e Janngirde Jaami'wal Ilorin.
Membaa'en e hawtuki koppi.
O lattake membaajo e jawleeru lawyaa'en Naajeeriya e ɗumngu ngu 1995 Kadi membaajo haa senior Advocate of Nigeria nder ndumngu 2018.
wallafeeji ndi ɗum subtii.
• Tooñaare e kalubaleeji Ardu'en wodɓe nder Naajeeriya
• Tsaaru dookaaji haa Naajeeriya; 
•Ko nooni Kawtal Hore:
•Gollite-gollite Neesuji haa Naajeeriya: tokkude ɗereeji defte juzu'uuji ndi sarii'a e ko yiɗii sanji (2015)

Samuel Ajayi Crowther:
Samuel Crowther (c. 1809 - 31 lewru Desemba 1891), o wonnooɗo Yoruba, limle, e ardiiɗo bishop Anglican Afrik hirnaange.O jibinaa e Osogun (ko jooni Ado-Awaye, Diiwal Oyo, Naajeeriya), o e saare mum ɓe njaɓɓi ɓeen maccuɓe nde o woodi duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi.
Ɗu'um waɗi wakkati konu lesdi Yoruba, ɓurna fuu konu Owu nder 1821-1829, nde wuro maako Osogun ɗon maɓɓa.
Ngendam.
Ajayi ɓaawo ɗon o feere to mawɓe maccuɓe Portugal, to ɓe mburtini mo dow ndiyam ngam ɓe njaɓɓa to Duniyaa kesum nder, Atalantik.Crowther heɓii yaltinki nder maccuɓe nder nder nder nder maayo maayo, ngam ɓe ɗon haɓɓii dow dow Leysdi Afrik, ngam ɓe ɗowtana ko Britaniya waɗi ngam ɓe mbaɗata maccuɓe haa Atalantika.
Diina.
Yimɓe ɓe ɓe rimɗini ɓe ɓe ɗon ɓe ɗon ɓe ɓe ɗon nder Sierra Leone.Nder Sierra Leone, Ajayi jaɓɓi innde Farayseere Samuel Crowther, o fuɗɗi janngude e Farayse.O jaɓii diina kiristaana nden kadi o anndini hoore maako bee yimɓe Krio ɓe ɗon ɓeyda nder Sierra Leone.
Janngirde.
O janngini ɗemɗe e o wondi ministaar nder Ingiltere, to o heɓii doktoor diga Oxford Janngirde.O haɓɓii ɗemngal Yoruba e baylitol defte (Anglican Book of Common Prayer to Yoruba), o golliima e defte Yoruba nder Bibel, e nder ɗemɗe goɗɗe.

Louis odumegwu Ojukwu:
Louis odumegwa ojukwu Sir Louis Phillip odumegwu Ojukwu one (1909) September 1966) own beydow leydi naajeeriya gaddowwo luumo tycoon has too leyyal Ojukwu too saree nwakanwa quarter obiumo umudin Nnewi

Edward asafu adsaye:
Edward asafu adsaye (1903_1976) unn taagu leydi ghana kuwtardow too hukumaare ashinti maude kautal hurre ummature Leydi ghana

Cyprian Michael awene tansi:
Cyprian Michael iwene tansi OCSO (Silto 1903_20 silo 1964) own leyyaal Igbo Naajeeriya own beeɗow eyyaalu kaatolik church kuwtardow too Archdiocese too Leysdi Onitsha baawo ownlataake Trappist Meeneatakow to Liyde England

Florida:

Joseph Ayo Babalola:
Joseph Ayo Babalola own dayyadow hiitande , Alif (25 settings 1904-26 morso 1959) ɓeddow leydi naajeeriya menistaakow nder deena Kiirestance ndow ardol christ apostolic church maarɗow nyidego too leydi naajeeriya beedow nnodeetirta cac nder Leydi Naajeeriya

Usman nagogo:
Usman nagogo ɓeddow Muhammad dikko (1905-18 leyru mboy (198) jaytuɗow lamurde Katsina too hiitande 19 leyru jowwii too Alif (1944) own fullankejow lamɗow too leyyal sullubakejow laatiɗo ɓee Muhammad dikko jeytuɗow lamurde leydi Katsina

Stella Thomas:
Stella Thomas (1906-1974) taagujow leydi Yoruba too naajeeriya kuwtardow lawyer haa too leydi Sierra Leone creole own jaangee degree maakow a jaangerde Oxford ahiitader Alif (1943) own fuudeeti kuwgaal arannaal too magisteera kowtuu rewbe nder leydi naajeeriya

Abbare Yelwa Ward:
Abbare Yelwa ko wonde nder hukuma pamarun Jalingo, laamorgo Taraba, Najeeriya.

Adunni Bankole:
Quick Facts Daygo, mayde ...
Margu Maako.
O ɗoon dañaa nder lewru Haaram sakitiiɗu 1959 eta dawlawal owu nɗum Abeokuta nder diiwal ogun, fombina-Hirna Naajeeriya. O ɗoon ɓanngii ɗiɗaaɓo neɗdo jamhuuriyawal siyaasaji, mawɗo Alani Bankole laatiiɗo nde Baaba nɗum mo sifiikaajo ndum mɓe majaliisu wakiili'en, honorable Dimeji Bankole.
Mayde.
O soytii sababuu feɗoo mbernde wakkati 3 Haaramru 2015 takkuɗe waɗaneeki tayaata mbernde. Ɗum haa hollinii ton O maayi haade awaaji seɗɗa koɗuuum haa ɓangal ɓingel Maako debbo.
Laaru kadi.
Dimeji Bankole

Hakima Abbas:
Hakima Abbas woni anndal siyasa, mo haani, mawɗo e ɗaɓɓoowo. O ɗon wondi hooreejo jaayndeejo Association for Women's Rights in Development. nyau COVID-19 o holli ngam warugo ko hawti e rewɓe. [2 , o woni ardiiɗo Fahamu.
O wonnoo kadi hawrinoowo ko'e ko'e lesdiyankooɓe Afrik ko'e queer (2013) Sokari Ekine nden heɓii huunde mawnde nder nder nder lesdi ndii, ko darnde mawnde nder kuuɗe feminist e LGBTQ nder lesdi Afrika.

Nasr ad-Din (Lamtuna):
Imam Nasr ad-Din ko Lamtuna Berber mawɗo diina e ardiiɗo konu, mo gila 1644 haa 1674 ardii alkawal be lenyol Sanhadja Berber dow Maqil Arabaaɓe nder hirnaange Sahara (ko ɓuri heewde Mauritania hannde, nder worgo Marok e hirnaange Sahra). Luttugol maako ɓeydi ɓeydi haa ko jooni Senegal, waɗi to dow laamiiɓe feere.
Nder duuɓi 1660, mo lamtuna mo waajotooɗo biyeteeɗo Ashfaga o hoo'i 'Nasr ad-Din', ma'ana 'ɓalli diina.' O fuɗɗi waajugo habaru, nden habaru maako ɓaawo ɗon o haajiri nder maayo Senegal. Nde laamuuɓe Futa Toro, Jolof, Waalo e Cayor njaɓi ko o wi'i, yimɓe maako e ardiiɓe diina ɓen ummii, ɓe ummi laamuuɓe Islaam'en nder nokkuure aristocracy ardiiɗo.
Nasr ad-Din maayi nder konu nder hitaande 1674 nden konu Char Bouba (ko konu duuɓi 30) maayi ngam lenyol Berber'en. Ɓe ɓooydi haa ɓe ɗowtana nder ɗemngal ɓurngal ɓurgal ɓurgal ngal ɓe ɓamtaama e yimɓe Arab-Berber Moorish ɓe ɓeydi e ɓeydi hakkunde yimɓe ɓeen e ɓeen. Fedde laamuji nder Wolof e Fula dow lesdi Senegal fuɗɗii hokki laamu maɓɓe, ɓe ɓeydi limtuɓe leydi ndii to yimɓe diina ɓeen.

Afonso III Kongo:
Afonso III Mvemba a Nimi (ko maa Affonso III) woni laamiiɗo lesdi Konngo nder wakkati konu lesdi.
Laamiiɗo Afonso III artii jaɓɓude e nder defte nde o laamiiɗo markisata Nkondo. O laamani nokkuure nden daga sakkugo 1669 haa caka 1673. Caggal ɗuum, o wi'i laamu Kongo feccitii. Ko woni Ko woni Laamu maako ɗon ɓuttu, ɗon ɓii-ɓii, o ɗon haa caka hitaande 1674.

Kwadwo Akyampon:
Kwadwo Akyampon (C. 1767 - 1832) o wonnoo wakiilu Osei Bonsu mo o golli hooreejo laamu Fante to Elmina e hooreejo leydi Holandiiɓe to nokkuure nden. Nder darnde nde o huutoraama no gomnaaru laamu Ashanti dow El Mina. Nder hitaande 1828 Akyampon waɗi hooreejo gardiiɓe nder haɓugo Elmina ngam haɓugo Fante, Denkyera e Wasa.
Ɗum holliti ɗum kanko woni Akyampon mo waɗi golle nder 1808 ngam nastina huccitaaku nder nder Accra ɓaawo duɗal hakkunde ɓaawoji feere feere. Nder 1811 o wurtini ɓaawo ummugo dow laamu Ashanti nder Akuapem nder nder nder ɗo Ashanti 100 maayi. Akyampon waɗi ha nder kuuɗe maako bana mo kollitii dow siyasa e jawdi to konu dow hooreejo Opoku Frefre, ngam o nastini laamu Ashanti nder nokkuure nde.

Álvaro X nder Kibangu:
Alvaro X Nimi a Mvemba Água Rosada wonnoo laamiiɗo Kibangu e wonnoo Água Rosad arandeejo arandeejo Laamu Konngo nder konu mum. O laamani laamu Kibangu diga 1688 haa 1695.
Fedde.
Nder laamiiɗo Kibangu, Álvaro e sakiraaɓe maako ardiiɓe partiiɓe ɓe ngalaa seyo dow laamu maako. Ɓe mbaɗi ngam ɓe mburtina Manuel I nder 1688 nden Álvaro waɗi laamu. Nder laamu maako, laamiiɗo ɗon mbaawka hokki yimɓe ɗiɗo ɓe ɗon yiɗi laamu Kongo. Laamiiɗo woni laamiiɗo konu arandeejo konu Kongo ngam o jeyaa e wuro Água Rosada, to woodi mawɗo nder wuro Kinlaza e Kimpanzu. Ɗo'o naa' ɗum wuro goonga wakkati laamu Álvaro, nden ko ɓaawo mayde maako nder 1695 nde mo ɓaawo maako, Pedro IV waɗi ɗum bana wuro ngam timmugo konu lesdi e haɓɓugo laamu Konngo.

Salah Ameidan:
Salah Ameidan (doduɗo 1982) ko jaŋde Saharawi. O mawni nder El Aiun. To duuɓi 12, o jeyaa e nder gardiiɓe marocko'en e ɓe neldi to Rabat ngam ɓe njanngina. Haa duuɓi sapp o jokki nder nder nder nderɗe caaɗeele nder lesdi Marok. hitaande 1999 o wonnoo jaagorɗo jaagorgal leydi Marok, o heɓi nokkuure ɗiɗmere nder jaagorɗe Afrik e o wonnoo joofnde jaagorɗum duuniyaaru Arab ɗiɗi. Nder hitaande 2004 nder nder nder nder Farayse to o hawti e dow fuɗnaare Marok, o ummorii fuɗnaari Saharawi dow hoore maako nder mitaji ujune ujuneeje ɓaawo nder fuɗnaaru. Ɗon e ɗon ɓaawo maajum o ɗaɓɓiti dilli siyasa nder Farayse, ngam kuuɗe ɗe'e footi waɗugo mo nder kaso nder Marok. Ameidan haɓɓani ngam wakkati seɗɗa nder 2009 ngam hawti e dow dow dow dow El Aiun. Gila 2004 o ɗon hawta bee kawtal Farayse nder gasaji ɗi feddeeji jaaynde Farayse hawta, amma bana mo hawta nder nder nder nder lesdi Sahrawi nder gasaji duniyaaru. Nder hitaande 2013, filim, biyeteeɗo The Runner, wurtini dow maako ngam jaayndiyanke film dowlaaku Misra/Palestina/Britaniya Saeed Taji Farouky.

Ana Joaquina dos Santos e Silva:
Ana Joaquina dos Santos e Silva (1788-1859), wonnoo jaayndeere garbaaji e nder Afrik e nder Afrika, jaayndeowo ceede e jaaynde nder Angola. O laati ko'e maccuɓe ɓurɓe mawnude nder Angola, ɓe ɓe mbaɗi e lesdi Brazil nder duuɓi 1830'en, ɓe ɓe mari ceede Joaquim Rodrigues Graça.
Biography.
Ana Joaquina dos Santos e Silva o wonnoo goomu nder darnde Afro-Portugal mawɗo, o jogii darnde mawɗo nder yimɓe jaaynooɓe Luanda, ɗo yimɓe Europeeji laatiiɓe e nder yimɓe ujune. 
O wonnoo gooto e mawɓe jaayndiyankooɓe maccuɓe nder jaayndi maccuɓe hakkunde Angola e laamu Brazil nder duuɓi 1830 e 40. Jaaynde maccuɓe ɗon haɓɓaa nder hitaande 1836, ammaa ɗon tokki nder Angola, to jawdi ɗon mari hakkiilo. Ko woni 
Ana dos Santos e Silva mari lamɓe feere ngam sukka e kawre, e suudu suudu maare tati nder Luanda, waato ɓaawo ɗon o laati suudu museum.
Nde Brazil haani jaaynde maccuɓe nder 1850 nden jaaynde nden fuɗɗii, o waɗi hoore maako bana banki mo heɓata, jaaynde e jaayndeejo jaayndeeji, mawɓe e jaayndije.

Abdou Baco:
Abdou Salam Baco (danyaamo; 1965) ko winndiyanke mawɗo Mahoraisan. O jibinaa nder Mzoizia nder Mayotte. O winndi defte tati, o waɗi bandel muusikal Mobissa.

Samuel Manuwa:
Sir Samuel Manuwa jibini nder saare Reverend Benjamin Manuwa, mo diina kiristaanu mo hoore maako ɓii Oba Kuheyin, laamiiɗo Itebu - Manuwa. Maama maako woni debbo Matilda Aderinsola Manuwa, mo o ƴiwoyi diga saare Thomas nder Ondo Town.
O yahi nder eklesiya missionary Janngirde, Lagos, e King's College, Lagos, ngam jaangooji ɗiɗaɓo, o timmini janngirde maako nder 1921. Nden o yahi janngude e University of Edinburgh, to o heɓii jaŋde bachelor nder Chemistry and Medicine e 1926. O jaɓi jaayndeeji feere feere, o heɓii jaayndeji fuu nder jaayndeere, hawti e jaaynde Robert Wilson nder jaayndi e jaayndi. O yahi janngude to Liverpool, o timmini darnde dow Tropical Medicine. O laati doktoor nder hitaande 1926.
==Ɓiɗɗo e janngirde=
O wartii Naajeeriya nder 1927 caggal nde o timmini janngude maako dow woote woote e o hawti nder kuugal woote nder lesdi boo bana gardiiɗo woote. Ɓaawo maajum o laati mo'o mo'o warugo mo'o marɗo e mo'o mawɗo nder kuugal, to o heɓii anndal bana mo'o walliɗo. Koo nde o heɓii feere feere ngam jaɓugo kuugal mawɗo haa ɓaawo, o tokki kuugal maako nder nder duuɓi 18. Nde o ɗon huutora bana dokkal, o heɓii kaɓirgal ɓanndu ngam huuwugo ɓannduji ɓannduɗi.
Kuugal.
Nder 1948, o ummi limgal maako dow kuugalji laamu nde o laati ardiiɗo darnde kuugal. Nder 1951, o waɗii ardiiɗo Leysdi Naajeeriya ardiiɗo kuugal kuugal kuungal e ɓaawo maajum o waɗii ko ardiiɗo kuuɓal kuugal kuutorɗe. Nder 1954, o fuɗɗii hawti bee kuugal ummaatoore lesdi Naajeeriya nde o laama hooreejo jaɓoowo ngam jaɓugo laamu lesdi Naajeeri. O ɓeydiima warugo ardiiɗo jaɓde hooreejo fedde feddeere Naajeeriya, hooreejo feddaaku cukalel e fannuɓe to Afrik hirnaange e hooreejo Leysdi Naajeeriya ardiiɗo feddeere ngam huutoraade ummaatoore.

Ira Aldridge:
Ira Frederick Aldridge (24 Colte 1807 - 7 Oggoos 1867) wonnooɗo Amerik,ɗo winndiinooɗo, e mawɗo suudu jaŋde, anndiraaɗo ngam darnde maako dow yimɓe Shakespearean.James Hewlett e Aldridge ina ɓeen eɓe ndaara e ɓeen ardiiɓe Amerikaaɓe ɓaleeɓe. Aldridge jibini nder New York, anndal maako arande nder kuuɗe nder nder nder duuɓi 1820's bee bandol African Grove Theatre.E lewru Mee 1825, e duuɓi 17, Aldridge artii e nder London nder fijirde lowre nder Othello. Nder lewru Oktoobar 10, 1825, Aldridge waɗi arandeeji ɓurɗi ɓurnde mawnde nder Royal Coburg Theatre London, o laati arandeejo afriknaajo-Amerikiyankoore je ɗon haɓɓii hoore mum nder lesdi feere.
Nde o hawti e feere feere nder Amerika, o dilli nder 1824 to Ingiltere nden o waɗi gollal maako nder Royal Coburg Theatre London. Nde golle maako ɓeydi, kuuɗe maako dow kuugal Shakespeare ɓaawo ɗon ɓe njaɓɓi mo ngam ɓe njaɓa mo, nden o laati mawɗo Coventry Theatre Royal. Daga 1852, Aldridge ɗon yaasi nder lesdi Europe e o heɓii tedduŋgal mawɗi diga hooreeɓe lesdi. O maayi bee ɓernde nde o ɗon nder nder Polonje, nden o haɓɓii bee mangu nder Łódź.Aldridge woni laamɗo tan nder lesdi Afrik-Amerika mo ɓe teddini e dowla bronze nder Shakespeare Memorial Theatre nder Stratford-upon-Avon. Ɓiɓɓe Aldridge ɗiɗo, Amanda e Luranah, laati mawɓe mawɓe mawɗo.
Fedde fuɗɗorɗe e golle.
Aldridge jibini nder New York City to Reverend Daniel e Luranah (so lurona) Aldridge nder 24 lewru Duujal 1807, ammaa feere biography fuɗɗii wi'a o jibini nder duuɓi 13, Aldridge yahi nder Afrik Free School nder New York, tawon nder New York Manumission Society ngam ɓiɓɓe yimɓe ɓe ɓe ɓe ɓe ɓaleeɓe e maccuɓe ɓe ɓe ɓe mari hakke. Ɓe keɓii janngirde classique, e janngirde ɗemngal Engele, winndaade, limngal, geography, e astronomi. Yimɓe 'o nder suudu duɗal hawti bee.Aldridge'en arandeeji golle golle nder duuɓi 1820'en fuɗɗii e nder Afrik Company, ko ɗum wonnoo ko jamma wonande William Henry Brown e James Hewlett. E hitaande 1821, bandiraaɗo waɗi suudu tawonngo African Grove, wonde suudu tawonnge Afrik-Amerikiyankoore arande nder leydi Amerik. Kampaaniji ɗi ɗon ɗon ɗon ɗon ɓeyda ɗon ɗon ɗon mari tagdiji diga ɓooyi, ɗon ɗon ɗon haɓa ngam ngam ngam ngam ɗum ɗon haɓa, ɗon ɗon hawtata ngam ngam ɗum hawtata yimɓe, ɗon hawtita ngam ɗum haɓa ngam yimɓe ɓe ɗon hawtana. Sheriff wakkati ɗ boo o laati marɗo bolle, o holli bana Aldridge'en nder nder lesdi America ɗon mari ɓernde. Aldridge waɗi gollal makko ngal fuɗɗam nder nder nder Rolla, laral Peruwiyanke nder Pizarro Richard Brinsley Sheridan. waawi kadi jogii ɓaawo ɓaawo nder Romeo e Juliet, bana ɗum annditi ɓaawo nder nder nder nder defte nder hitaande 1860 diga to'o maako, Dr. James McCune Smith's.
Jedde,on.
Aldridge'en arandeeji golle golle nder duuɓi 1820'en fuɗɗii e nder Afrik Company, ko ɗum wonnoo ko jamma wonande William Henry Brown e James Hewlett. E hitaande 1821, bandiraaɗo waɗi suudu tawonngo African Grove, wonde suudu tawonnge Afrik-Amerikiyankoore arande nder leydi Amerik. Kampaaniji ɗi ɗon ɗon ɗon ɗon ɓeyda ɗon ɗon ɗon mari tagdiji diga ɓooyi, ɗon ɗon ɗon haɓa ngam ngam ngam ngam ɗum ɗon haɓa, ɗon ɗon hawtata ngam ngam ɗum hawtata yimɓe, ɗon hawtita ngam ɗum haɓa ngam yimɓe ɓe ɗon hawtana. Sheriff wakkati ɗ boo o laati marɗo bolle, o holli bana Aldridge'en nder nder lesdi America ɗon mari ɓernde. Aldridge waɗi gollal makko ngal fuɗɗam nder nder nder Rolla, laral Peruwiyanke nder.
Taarihi.
Nde Aldridge hawti e hakkilantaaku ɓeydi-ɓeydiɗum ɗi laamiiɓe ɓaleeɓe ɓaleejo mari nder lesdi Amerika, o yahdi to Liverpool, Ingiltere, nder hitaande 1824 bee laamiiɗo James Wallack. Nder wakkati oon fuɗɗii fuɗɗam fuɗɗam juɓɓule faggudu, waɗii wayloore jawdi fuɗɗam, waawiri ɓeydaade ɓamtaare cuuɗi kin. Jaŋde Leysdi Britaniya ɗon ɗon haɓɓana jaaynde maccuɓe e ɗon ɓeyda ngam halki maccuɓe nder laamu Britaniya, ɗum ɓeydiima ɓeydaago yimɓe ɓe ɓe ɓeydaani ɓeydaaki ɓeydaari ɓeydaare ɓe ɗon ɗaɓɓita jaaynde.Nde woodi anndal dow dow dow dow nder nder nder nder suudu, o anndinaama yimɓe, o waɗi haala dow ɓaawo maako nder lesdi Afirka, o wi'i o ɓadi diga lesdi Fulani. 1831, Aldridge waɗi ko ɗum waɗi, o hoo'i innde Keene, ko ɗum woni ko ɗum waɗi ko o woni ko o woni e nder leydi Britaniya, Edmund Kean. Aldridge holli huutoraade innde nde no yimɓe anndiraani ɗum ngam ɓe mbaɗata no ɓe anndiraani. Haŋkadi innde F.W. Keene Aldridge, o nodditaama ɓaawo ɗun African Roscius, e innde Roman actor mawɗo nder karnijum arandeeji BCE.

Fedde Fedde Fuuta Fedde Fuuɗugo Fuuta, Dadin Kowa:
Fedde Fedde Fuuta Fedde Fuuɗnaango Fuuta (Federal College of Horticultural Technology) ko jaŋde jaŋde dowla nde wonnoo to Dadin Kowa, Yamaltu Deba, nder Leysdi Gombe, Naajeeriya.Jaŋde woni jaŋde wiɗtooje nder jaŋde kiɗtooje lesdi Nigeria e darnde ngam janngude e ɓeydaade yimɓe nder jaŋnde kiɗtooji e jaŋde jaŋde.
Ɓaawoore.
Jaŋde nde e jaɓɓorgo National Board for Technical Education, ko jaɓɓorgal jaɓɓorgol National Diploma e Higher National Diploma e ina jaɓɓorgi janngooɓe 1,354. Nder 19 abriil 2002, laamu hooreejo lesdi Olusegun Obasanjo haɓɓii ɗum ngam ɗum arande nder lesdi Afrika haŋki Sahara. Haa 2017, suudu ndu bee jawdi daga Ministri Fuuɗungol e Ɓamtaare Fuuɗungo ɗon janngina sukaaɓe 1500 diga leyɗe 36 nder fedde nder fannuuji fuɗungol be nyaamdu leɗɗe. hitaande 2016/2017, jaŋde ndee jaŋngini 603 janngooɓe.
Bill for Conversion.
Gooto nder suudu wakiilo, hono Abubakar Yunus Ahmad Ustaz, waɗi doolaaji to jamiroore 8 ngam tiggugo jaŋde jaŋde feddeere, Dadin Kowa. , jaaynde nde'e ɗon ɓilla nder Senate.Nder hitaande 2019, ɓaawo jamiroore 9th hawriti, jaaynde nde'e fuɗɗiti nder suudu bee laawol jaaynde suudu fuu, nden ɗum jaɓɓi nder lewru feebari 2020. E ɓaawo ɗun sendugol to Senate ngam waɗugo jamiroore dow sari'a on. Bill wartii nder nder nder nder senate nder nder nder lewru junngo, 2021 nden nder nder nder ɗiɗmere nder nder senat nder nder nder 15 lewru feebari 2021 nden nder tataɓre nder nder nder wakkati nder 9 feebari 2022. Ganndal Jaɓɓorgal Fedde Ɓamtaare, Dadin Kowa.
Ceeɗol.
Dadin Kowa Climate ɗon ha dow mita 0 (0 feet) dow maayo, ɗon woodi clima tropical humble e maɓɓo (Classification: Aw). Ɓuuru hitaande nder nokkuure nde ɗum wurtini haa 31.55oC (88.79oF), ko ɗum ɓeydi ɓeydiinde 2,09% ha tawii ɗum ɓeydii ha nder lesdi Naajeeriya.
Jaŋde.
Jaɓɓorgo F Ɓamtaare Fedde Ɓamɓe e Fedde Ɓamtuɓe e Fuuta Fedde Ɓamtotooɓe e FƁPM
Higher National Diploma HND (2 duuɓi).
Ɗuum ko ɗeen ɗeen ɗemɗe nder jaayndeere ɗe:

Maggie Aderin-Pocock:
Margaret Ebunoluwa Aderin-Pocock MBE (née Aderin;9 Maars 1968) woni anndudiyankeeru e jannginoowo anndal dow dow laabi.O wondi ardiiɗo anndal teddungal to jaango Fisiiki e Astronomiya to Jaangoore London,o woni jaangoore jaangoore Leicester gila feebariyee 2023. Gila febaraar 2014,o ɗon hawrita e nder teleejiyaji astronomy diga wakkati fu, The Sky at Night bee Chris Lintott.Nder hitaande 2020 o heɓii ko Institute of Physics William Thomson,Medal Lord Kelvin e Prize ngam hawtiinde mum e yimɓe nder physics. woni debbo arandeejo ɓaleejo to o heɓii medal gold nder Physics News Award o waɗi hooreejo British Science Association diga 2021 haa 2022.

Conny Aerts:
Conny Clara Aerts, jibinaaɗo 26 lewru janvier 1966,o woni jannginoowo (Flemish) Belji to astrofisika.O ɗon anndina nder anndal astroseismology. O ɗon hawta bee KU Leuven e Radboud University,to o ɗon arda hooreejo nder kuuwol Astroseismology. E hitaande 2012,o laati debbo arandeejo mo heɓii ko Frankqui Prize nder darnde Science & Technology. hitaande 2022,o laati debbo tataɓo mo heɓii koode Kavli nder Astrophysics ngam kuuɗe maako nder asteroozismology.

Aglaonice:
Aglaonice ko Agance of Thessaly (Greeci Ancient:,"Aglaoníkē", hawti e αγλαὸς ("aglaòs")" luminous"e νίκη (nikē)" nasaraaku") wonnoo jannginoowo anndal dowla e taumaturge Greek nder karni 2 ko 1 BC.  O ɗon anndina nder defte Plutarch e nder scholia to Apollonius of Rhodes bana anndal dow dow dow dow koode nden bana ɓiɗɗo debbo Hegetor (ko Hegemon) Tesali. ɗonno haani bana haani ngam (o ɗonno wi'a hoore maako) o "wurtina lewru ɗon maayi daga dow" (καθαιρεῖν τὴν σελήνην:kathaireĩn tìn selen) ɗum ɗum waɗi Plutarch e anndinooɓe dow dow dow dow koode ɗe'e-o waawi wi'ugo wakkati e nokkuure fuu nde lunar eclipse waɗata.

Leah Allen:
Leah Brown Allen (November 6,1884 e Providence,Rhode Island -Febraari 1973) wonnoo jannginoowo anndal dow dow dow dow leyɗe leyɗe ley leyɗe leynge leyɗe leyɗeeje e jannginooɗo anndal dow leyɗe nder Hood College.

Eva Ahnert-Rohlfs:
Eva Ahnert-Rohlfs (11 August 1912-9 Maars 1954) wonnoo jannginoowo anndal dow dow dowla dowle German. O waɗi baylaaku mawɗo dow koode je ɗon wayla.

María Luisa Aguilar:
 
María Luisa Aguilar Hurtado (20 Joyeu 1938-29 Oktoobar 2015), wonnoo ardiiɗo anndal dowlaaji nder leydi Peru.O janngini e Institute of Mathematics and Physics of National University of San Marcos e Lima,Peru.O jaɓi jaŋde dow anndal dowla dow National University of La Plata,Argentina. hitaande 1981,o waɗi ko o yiɗi ɓamtaade anndal dowla dowla dow laabi,o waɗi e o waɗi hooreejo "Astronomy and Astrophysics Seminar",ko hannde o nodda "Permanent Astronomy and Space Sciences Seminar" to National University of San Marcos.[1

Adelaide Ames:
Adelaide Ames (3 juune 1900-26 juune 1932) wonnooɗo dowlaaku Amerik e jannginoowo anndal dowlaaku e Harvard University.O waɗi darnde e jannguki galaxies e jaaynde makko nder A Survey of the External Galaxies Brighter Than the Thirteenth Magnitude,ɗum anndiraa ɓaawo ɗum Shapley-Ames catalog. Ames wonnoo goomu nder American Astronomical Society. ɗon wondi e Cecilia Payne-Gaposchkin e ɓurɗo mooftaago maako nder observatory.

Anja Cetti Andersen:
Anja Cetti Andersen (woowo 25 Septemba 1965)ko anndudi e anndudi e dow dow dow dow koode dow dow dow lesdi Hørsholm,Denmark.

Necia H. Apfel:
Necia H.Apfel (dugugo 31 Julaay 1930) ko jannginoowo e jannginooɗo e janngoowo Amerik. ["citation needed"]

Alice Archenhold:
Alice Archenhold (woowo Markus;27 August 1874-9 Febraari 1943) wonnooɗo anndudi dowlaaku Jarmal,gorko mum woni anndudi dowlaaɗo dowlaaji Friedrich Simon Archenhold.

Anne Archibald:
Anne Murray Archibald ko jannginoowo anndal dow dow dow dow ko'e maako dow pulsars e nder ɓe ɓe ɓe ɓe ɓamta SciPy,deftere anndal ngam ɗemngal programming Python. 
Jaŋde e golle.
Archibald waɗi janngude maako nder limgal dow dow dow dow nder Jaŋde Waterloo,hawti bee janngude dow dow dow computer graphics e jaŋde fotooji dow radar data.Caggal nde o waɗi jaango jaango nder limngal purgal e jaangirde McGill,o laati jannginoowo doktoor to Astrophysicist Victoria Kaspi e McGill,e o heɓi both Cecilia Payne-Gaposchkin Doctoral Dissertation Award in Astrophysics of the American Physical Society e J.S.Plaskett Medal of the Canadian Astronomical Society ngam doktoor maako e 2013,The End of Acretion:The X-ray Binary/Millisecond Pulsar Transition Object PSR J1023+0038.

Neta Bahcall:
Neta Bahcall (Hebrew:נטעאסף בקל; jibinaa 1942) ko astrophysicist e cosmologist Isra'iila mo anndini dow darnde,darnde duniyaaru,quasarji,e darnde galaxies.Bahcall woni mo Eugene Higgins mo jannginooɓe anndal dow dow dow dow nder nder nder Princeton.

Odette Bancilhon:
Odette Bancilhon (22 Septeembar 1908-1998) wonnooɗo anndudi e dow dowle Farayse.O anndiraa ɓurɗo anndude e golle mum nder duuɓi 1930 e 1940 to Aljeeri Observatory,nder Aljeeriya,Afrik woyla,to o heɓii 1333 Cevenola,asteroid Eunomian ngal ko kaaƴe e nder ɓernde mawɗo.

Amy Barger:
Amy J.Barger (dugumi 18 januru 1971) ko anndudi dow dow dow dow leyɗeele Amerik e Henrietta Leavitt,jannginoowo anndudi dow leyɗe leyɗeele dow leyɗeel dow leyɗeere Wisconsin-Madison.O ɗon haani ha haɓɓugo data diga teleskopuji ɗuuɗɗi ngam hakkilugo ɓolɗe ɓolɗe ɗuuɗɗe e haɓɓugo galaxies ɓooyɗe e ɓooyma ɓooymaaji ɓooyɗi,ɗi ɗon haɓɓugo nder ɓolde ɓooyɗum.Barger woni goomu gooduɗo nder International Astronomical Union.

Nadine G. Barlow:
Nadine G.Barlow (1958-2020) ko anndal dow dow dow dow leyɗeele Amerik. O ɗon mooluki nder suudu physics e astronomy ha Northern Arizona University (NAU).O laati ardiiɗo dow hooreejo NAU Department of Physics and Astronomy nder fall 2010.O ɗon boo o ɗon jeyaa hooreejo jaŋde Arizona'en fu/ NASA Space Grant Program e hooreejo ardiiɗo Arizona Space Grant Consortium.

Natalie Batalha:
Natalie M.Batalha (dugum 1966) woni jannginoowo anndal dow dow dow dow leyɗe e dow dow dow koode dow dow dow nder leyɗe dow leyɗe dow dow leyje dow leyɗe Santa Cruz.Hono o waɗi anndal dow dow dow dow koode dow dow dow to NASA Ames Research Center,o waɗi dow dow dow co-investigator e Kepler Mission Scientist dow Kepler Mission,misiyon arandeeji ɗi heɓata koode dow koode ɗe duniyaaru mawnata dow koode goɗɗe.

Stefi Baum:
Stefi Baum (dimaa 11 Desemba 1958,Chicago, Illinois)ko anndudi dow dow dow dow leyɗeele Amerik. American Astronomical Society hokki maako teddungal ngam kuuɗe maako bee hokki maako Annie J.Cannon Prize nder hitaande 1993. Baum wallitii ɓamtaaki Hubble Space Telescope nden,fuɗɗugo e hitaande 2004,o laati ardiiɗo Chester F.Carlson Center for Imaging Science to Rochester Institute of Technology.

Reta Beebe:
Reta F.Beebe (dugumi 10 Oktoobar 1936 e Baca County Colorado)ko anndudi e dow dow dow dow leyɗeele Amerik,winndiɗo e anndudi dow leyɗe.O woni mo anndinoowo dow duniyaaru Jupiter e Saturn,e mo winnda Jupiter The Giant Planet. O woni moolinoowo moolinooɗo e nder jaango Astronomi e New Mexico State University e 2010 mo heɓii ko NASA's Medal of Exceptional Public Service.

Emilia Pisani Belserene:
Emilia Pauline Pisani (Lee) Belserene (12 Desemba 1922-11 Desemba 2012)wonnooɗo anndal dowlaaji Amerik ngal anndiniinoo e ndaarugo koode jeewte e anndiraaɗo dow koode jeeyte jeewte RR Lyrae.[2 O annditi ngam kuuɗe maako bana mawɗo Maria Mitchell Observatory nder Nantucket e ngam binndi maako dow marya Mitchell. 
Jaŋde e golle.
laati jannginoowo nder New Rochelle High School,nden o heɓii jaŋde fuu haa Smith College.[4 laati jannginoowo anndal dowla tan ɗon,e jannginooɗo anndal dowlaaji Clinton B.Ford bana jannginoojo jannginooɓe.jaɓi summa cum laude nder hitaande 1943,o yahi to Columbia University ngam jaɓugo jaŋde jaŋde e nder wakkati go'o,o ɓeydi ɓeydi jonta e jaŋde bee wakkati go'to e Hunter College.[1

Erika Böhm-Vitense:
Erika Helga Ruth Böhm-Vitense (3 juune 1923-21 janngo 2017) wonnooɗo jannginoowo anndal dow dow dow dow koode cefeydi e konveksiya nder koode ɗe kuuje.

Tabetha S. Boyajian:
Tabetha "Tabby" Suzanne Boyajian ko tawaaɗo dowlaaji Amerik e arminiyanko'en e astrophysicist e nder darnde Louisiana State University.wonnoo jaaynde post-doctoral 2012-16 to Yale University,o huwtori e Debra Fischer. Boyajian ɗon ɗon ɗon ɗon kuuwa nder fannuuji astronomic of stellar interferometry,stellar spectroscopy,toexoplanet research,e high angular resolution astronomy,fuu ha musamman e optical e infrared wavelengths.laati mawɗo deftere "Where's the Flux?", nder lewru Septemba 2015 nde wi'i dow laabi cembiɗɗi ɗi KIC 8462852 waɗi.

Sophia Brahe:
Sophia (ko Sophie) Thott Lange (woowo Brahe;24 August 1559 ko 22 Septemba 1556 -1643), anndiraa e innde makko,wonnoo debbo Danish noblewoman e horticulturalist e anndal dow astronomi,chemistry, e medicine.O huwdi bee bandiraawo maako Tycho Brahe nder waɗugo kuuje astronomic.

Karen Aabye:
Karen Lydia Aabye (19 Septemba 1904 - 15 Septemba 1982) wonnooɗo winndaande leydi Denmark. Nder ɓaawo duuɓi 1930, o huuwi bana marɗo kubaruuji to Paris e Londondira, haa o heɓii anndal e nder defte taariika feere feere nder ɗe rewɓe mari niyma fuɗi ɓe laati yimɓe mawɓe. Kuugal maako hawti e defte jaayɗe e defte ɗe o waɗi.

Uma Aaltonen:
 
Ɓiɗɗo e jaŋde.
.Aaltonen mawnini nder lamnde nden o anndini yiɗugo dabbaaji haa o ɗon ɓadi. O janngini journalism, sociology e psychology e University of Tampere

Jane Aamund:

Masoumeh Abad:
Limanki.
Nder konu Iran-Iraq, Abad waɗi darnde mawnde nder maɓɓugo e jaɓɓugo suudu ndun e suudu ndun feere ngam ummaatoore Iran Red Crescent Society (IRCS). footi Balɗe tati e tati ɓaawo fuɗɗam konu, nde o woodi duuɓi 17, Masoumeh Abad, Fatemeh Nahidi, Maryam Bahrami e Halimeh Azmoudeh ɓe jeyi diga dow jawdi Iraaki ha Mahshahr haa laawol Abadan (15 Oktoobar 1980). Ɓe ɗon nder kuugal Red Crescent. Fuɗɗam, Abad, Nahidi, Bahrami e Azmoudeh ɓe neldi to suudu taƴo Tanoumeh nden ɓe neldi Estekhbarat (dental sirru Saddam) e kaso Al-Rashid. Caggal nde wakkati feere, Abad e bandiraaɓe maako ɓe ndilli haa toɓɓe Mosul e Al-Anbar. Limanji tati e lebbi je je'e, nder 21 abriil 1983, Abad rimɗini.

Mercedes Abad:
Fedde fuɗɗorɗe e golle.
She graduated in Journalism from the Universitat Autònoma de Barcelona after studying for her baccalaureate at the Liceu Francès. Following several incursions into the world of cinema and theatre, in 1986 she won the Premio "La sonrisa vertical", a prize for erotic narrative with her book of short stories "Ligeros libertinajes sabáticos". She has published other collections of short stories: "Felicidades conyugales" (1989), "Soplando al viento" (1995) and more recently "Amigos y fantasmas" (2004, winner of the Mario Vargas Llosa NH Short Story Award for the best book of short stories in 2004); the novel "Sangre" (2000), and the humorous essay "Sólo dime dónde lo hacemos" (1991). Furthermore, she is the author of several plays and of various adaptations, including "XXX", for the company La Fura dels Baus. She also works as a translator and currently collaborates with different media outlets.

Florencia Abbate:
Florencia Abbate (dimaa 24 Bowte 1976, Buenos Aires) ko winndiyanke Arjantin, mawɗo e joornaali. O gooto e mawɓe fuɗɗooɓe darnde feminist Ni una menos.

Ines Abassi:
Abassi (doduɗo 1982) ko mawɗo tonisiyanko'en e mawɗo bolle. O wurtini haade ɗiɗi nder poemji haa jooni, ɗi ɗi ɗi ɗiɗo fuu keɓii keeriji ɗemngal leydi. O waɗi boo lebbi joweego nder Seoul o winndi Tales of the Korean Scheherezade diga haala maajum. Kuugal maako ɗon haɓɓaa nder kuugal feere feere, hawti bee kuugal kuugal kugal kugal kuugal Banipal, nder kuugal maako ɗon hawta nder kuugal kuɗol kugal kuɗol habaru Tunisia.
