Eleanor Hallowell Abbott:
Ɓiɗɗo.
Abassi (doduɗo 1982) ko mawɗo tonisiyanko'en e mawɗo bolle. O wurtini haade ɗiɗi nder poemji haa jooni, ɗi ɗi ɗi ɗiɗo fuu keɓii keeriji ɗemngal leydi. O waɗi boo lebbi joweego nder Seoul o winndi Tales of the Korean Scheherezade diga haala maajum. Kuugal maako ɗon haɓɓaa nder kuugal feere feere, hawti bee kuugal kuugal kugal kugal kuugal Banipal, nder kuugal maako ɗon hawta nder kuugal kuɗol kugal kuɗol habaru Tunisia.

Shaila Abdullah:
Laamu.
Eleanor Hallowell Abbott lahé bak 22 September 1872, di Cambridge, Massachusetts. Abbott nakeuh peurumoh Edward Abbott ngon Clara (Davis), nyang peumeubeutô buku literary World; dan nakeuh aneuëk agam nyang paleng rayek nibak keuturonan Jacob Abbott. Eleanor Hallowell Abbott dipeubeudôh lam masyarakat nyang meupeugah keu bahasa dan agama keu ayah ngon ayah jih. Nyan jeut keu alasan jih untuk meuturi ngon tokoh-tokoh dalam buku, lagee Longfellow ngon Lowell. Lamkawan keuluwarga gobnyan na sidroe aneuëk agam nyang carông that lam hai iébadat dan lam peungajaran nyang gét.

Yassmin Abdel-Magied:
Yassmin Abdel-Magied nakeuh sidroe presenter media Sudan-Australia ngon ureueng tuléh, nyang na karir awai seubagoe insinyur mekanik. Jih geuboh nan Young Queenslander of the Year bak thon 2010 ngen Queensland Australian of the Year di thon 2015 keu keujam jih bak buet komunitas. Abdel-Magied ka tinggai di Britania Raya sejak 2017, lheuh komentar jih tentang Syariah bak TV dan saboh postingan media sosial bak uroe Anzac menyebabkan jih keunong serangan leubèh lam media Australia, petisi nyang jilakée dipeulheuh jih dari ABC TV, dan le that ancaman maté di media sosial.

Hafsat Abdulwaheed:
Ɓiɗɗo.
Hafsat Abdulwaheed jibinaa ko ñalnde 5 mee 1952. Oɗo wondiɗo Nigeria o winndi ko ɓuri heewde e Hausa. O'o mawɗo, e mo'o ɗon haɓɓa ngam hakkeeji rewɓe. O ɗon wari diga Kofar Mata nder Kano City, Nigeria. O waɗi jaango maako fuɗɗam nder Shahuci primary school e secondary school nder Provincial Girls School anndiraa jooni bana Shekara Girls Secondary School, ɗi ɗi ɗiɗo fuu nder Kano State. O fuɗɗi winnduki nder balɗe maako nder jaŋde. O ware Muhammed Ahmed Abdulwaheed e 25 lewru Janare 1966 Ha fuɗɗoode 1970 o wartii rewɓe rewɓe hausaɓe arandeeji ɓe mbiyi wonde roman mum. Nder duuɓi 2000, o footiima waɗugo nder jeewte mawɗo nder lesdi Zamfara nder lesdi Naajeeriya. O winndi defte 30 ɓurɗe, ɗe jowi tan nder ɗe footi. O woodi ɓiɓɓe ɗuuɗɗi, ɓurɓe fuu woni Kadaria Amed, marɗo bolle

Rreze Abdullahu:
Rreze Abdullahu Ferizaj, Kosovo ko winndiyanke Albania'en Kosovo. O anndiraa ɓurɗo anndugo Nuk du luftë (Mi yiɗaa konu), deftere konu nde o waɗi nde o ɓiynoo nder konu Kosovo e hitaande 1999. Deftere nde winndaa e ɗemngal mum ngal Gheg.

Louise Abeita:
"Mi debbo Indiyanke Pueblo".
To poems ɗi ɓiɗɗo maako debbo waɗi, Diego mooɓti mawɓe daga yimɓe Navajo Navajo, Apache e Pueblo ngam wurtina deftere dow maɓɓe. Goomu ndu waɗi National Gallery of the American Indian (NGAI), nden wurtini deftere Abeita. O woodi duuɓi 13 saa'i maajum. Mi woni debbo Indiyanke Pueblo (1939) ɗum anndini "kitol Indiyanke fuɗun" diga taariiha Gretchen Bataille e Laurie Lisa.

Victorina A. Abellanosa:
Ninoy Winndannde yeeso Marti King Solomon

Josette Abondio:
Ɓiɗɗo e jaŋde.
Josette Desclercs Abondio jibini nder 1949 nder Ivory Coast nden ɗemngal mum ngol ko Farayse. O heɓii defte nder ɓiyum maako o laati mo janngoowo. Abondio waɗi gollal jannginoowo nder suudu jaŋde e jannginooɗo nder anndal anndal.

Sara Aboobacker:
Ɓiɗɗo e jaŋde.
Sara jibinaa e Kasaragod, Kerala e 30 lewru Juun 1936, to Pudiyapuri Ahmad e Zainabi Ahmad. O woodi bandiraaɓe nayi. O wondi go'o nder sukaaɓe arandeeji nder ummaatoore mum nder ummaatooje Muslimji nder Kasaragod ngam heɓugo jaango, o jaangoo nder janngirde Kannada. O waree caggal nde o jaagornoo, o mari ɓiɓɓe nayi. Aboobacker wi'i wakkati gooto yiɗi jaajugo janngirde maako ɗon marki e sariyaaji ummaatooreeji ɗi ɗon sakkindi jaajugo debbo to janngirde mawnde, nden o heɓii jaajugo library tan nder 1963

Marguerite Abouet:
Biography.
Abouet jibinaa nder 1971 nder Abidjan, Côte d'Ivoire, nden e duuɓi 12 o e ɓiy maako ɓe ndilli to Faransa to baaba maɓɓe mawɗo. O jooɗii jooni e Romainville, ɗo nder wuro Pari, e gorko mum, clement Oubrerie (mo holli fotde maako), e ɓiɗɗo maɓɓe. O huwti bana jawdiyanke nder Pari wakkati o winndi roman maako arande, Aya. Abouet waɗi hujjaaji winndude romanji ngam sukaaɓe, ammaa o hokki mo ngam ko o anndi ɗum haɓɓiiji ɗi publishers'en waɗi dow genre. O acci golle maako bana jawdiyanke ngam o hawti e binndiyanke maako, hawti e ɗiɗo nder nder nder nder defte maako ɗi ɗi ɗiɗo (Aya of Yop City e Aya: The Secrets Come Out)..

Leila Aboulela:
Leila Fuad Aboulela FRSL (Arabic:ليلى فؤاد ابوالعلا; jibinaa 1964) ko winndaako fiction, essayist, e playwright sudanese tagdi nder Aberdeen, Scotland. O mawni nder Khartoum, Sudan, o maayi to Scotland nder hitaande 1990 to o fuɗɗi golle maako nder defte. Haa 2023, Aboulela wurtini romanji joweego e ko'e fewre, ɗe waylitii nder ɗemɗe sappo e jowi. Ɗe nder defte maako ɓurɗe anndude, Minaret (2005) e The Translator (1999) ɗi ɗi ɗi ɗiɗawɗi ɗi ɗi ɗi ɗon mari haala rewɓe Musulmanaaɓe nder UK e ɗi ɗi ɗon nder nder nder nder limti ɓurɗe jaɓugo nder nder nder defte ɗiɗawɗe ɗi Dublin International Literary Award e Orange Prize. Kuugal Aboulela hawti nder nder nder nder ɗemɗe bana Harper's Magazine, Granta, The Washington Post e The Guardian. BBC Radio waɗi kuuɗe maako ɗuuɗɗe e nder nder nder nderɗe, bana nder nder nderji, The Insider, The Mystic Life e nderji taariika The Lion of Chechnya. Ɗuum nder radioji jowi nder nder nder nder hitaande 1999 ko The Translator wonnoo nder nder nder raayse nder nder nder ko'e nder nder nder warugo (RIMA).

Leila Abouzeid:
Duuɗal e Farayse'en.
Fedde radioji Abouzeid nden ɗon feere ngam ɗum ɗon wolwi nder arab, ha tawaaɗum Farayse. Fewde nder radio fuu nder nder Farayse ngam radio nder nder nder nder kuuɗe, nden Farayse nder kuuɗe nder nder nder kuugal. Nder nder kuugal maako, o maɓɓini nder ɗemngal Arabe nder nder nder nder film e o waɗii ko o janngina. Gooto nder ɗi ɗon woni jaaynde maako dow Malkoom X. O maɓɓini deftere nden nder arab e o nanngi ɗum nder suudu.

Abiola Abrams:
Abiola Abrams woni mawɗo Amerik, mawɗo podcast, mawɗo haala ɓawto e jannginoowo nguurndam ruuhu. Abrams winndi defte tati, hawti e Goddess African Initiation: Sacred Rituals for Self-Love, Prosperity, and Joy, defte maako arande diga hay house publisher, wurtunde e lewru 20 lewru Yuli 2021. Deftere maako ɗiɗmere, The Sacred Bombshell Handbook of Self-Love, heɓii sariyaaku Afrik Amerik ngal wonande ko ɓuri nafugo hoore mum. Black Enterprise hawti e podcast maako nder "20 Gotta-Wollow to Black Women Podcasts for 2019" e nder 2020, podcast maako suɓi e Success.com bana go'oto nder "16 Podcasts Motivational by Black Hosts You Need to Listen To". Essence Magazine hawti e Goddess Retreat Abrams nder nder nder "Black Girl-Approved and Operated Wellness Escapes".

Liliana Abud:
.Liliana Abud (dimaa 5 Julaay 1948) ko actress nder telenovelas e cinema Meksik. O ɗon jeyaa kadi jaayndiɗo tele-novelas. Abud waɗi Raquel Rodríguez, mawɗo nder teleejiyaji dow dow dow dow nder nder dow dow dow fimji Destinos

Umayya Abu-Hanna:
Kuugal.
Nder duuɓi 1980s, Abu-Hanna laati ardiiɗo nder Jaŋde Helsinki (jo jaŋde Green Party) e ardiiɗo dow jaŋde jiilol jiilol Helsinki.   ["citation needed"]

Susan Abulhawa:
Susan Abulhawa (Arabic: سوزان أبو الهوى, jibinaa 3 lewru Juun 1970) ko winndaako lesdi Kuwait, jaayndiyanke lesdi Palestina e jaayndiyaajo hakkeeji aadama e jaayndeyanke hakkeeji dabbaaji. O woni jaayndiɗo defte feere, e mo fuɗɗiiɗo goomu ngenndi, Playgrounds for Palestine. O jooɗii nder Pennsylvania. Wuro maako arande, Mornings in Jenin, wurtini nder ɗemɗe 32 e jaaynde ɓurɗe miliyon. Jaaynde makko fuɗɗiiɗo e jaaynde makko waɗi Abulhawa mawɗo jaaynde Palestiniyanke ɓurɗo janngude. Wuro maako ɗiɗawre, The Blue Between Sky And Water, jaayndi nder ɗemɗe 19 haa nde o wurtini, nden o wurtina nder ɗemngal Farayse nder hitaande 2015. Kaŋko nder duniyaaru mo ɓe yiɗaa, ko ɗum woni roman mum tataɓo, ɗum wurtini nder lewru August 2020, kadi ɗum laatii ko heɓaama.

Lama Abu-Odeh:
Ɓiɗɗo e jaŋde.
Abu-Odeh jibini nder Amman, Jordan. O debbo Adnan Abu-Odeh, senatoowo arande nder wuro Jaarabe leydi Jordan e ambassadore. O heɓii ko o mari nder nder nder nder suudu. B. diga University of Jordan, maako LL. M. diga University of Bristol, Ingiltere, MA maako diga University of York, Ingilterra] e S.J.D. maako diga Harvard University. needed O ɗon ekkitina e Stanford Law School e o ɗon huuwa ngam ɓandu Banki Duniyaaru fuɗnaange fuɗnaare fuɗnaango/Norde Afrik.

Juliet Ace:
Ann Juliet Ace (dugumi 27 Juun 1938) ko mawɗo defte e jaayndiyankooɓe ɓe ɓe ɓe ɓeydooɓe e EastEnders e The District Nurse. O hokki boo defte ɗuuɗɗe e nder nder nder BBC Radio, hawti e The Archers. O winndi deftere ngam Cameleon, nde o heɓi Golden Spire Award for Best Dramatic Television Feature ha San Francisco International Film Festival 1998.￼￼San Francisco International Film Festival 1998 . 

Nora Aceval:
Biography.
Aceval jibini to baaba Faransi-Aljeriya e inna Arab to Tousnina, dow dow leddi mawɗi nder lardi Tiaret. Ɓiɗɗo maako nder Tousnina e Sougueur ɗon haani bee haalaji ɗi rewɓe ummaatoore Ouled Sidi Khaled ɗon wi'a. O heɓii jaŋde nder jaŋde e ɓaawo maajum o heɓii jaɓde jaŋde haa e nder defte jamanu. O ɗon mooɓta, o ɗon wi'a, o ɗon tuuba, o ɗon winnda, o ɗon winda, o ɗon jaabota haala diga Aljeriya, ɓurna diga lesdi Djebel Amour e diga rewɓe nder Maghreb. Haala maako ɗon ɓesda yimɓe fuu. Sukaaɓe ɗon yiɗi haalaji e yimɓe, nden yimɓe mawɓe ɗon yiɗi miijooji ɗi ɓe ɗon holla ngam ɓe ɗaɓɓita hawtuki hakkunde haala e nguurndam maɓɓe. O jooɗi nder Creil, nder Farayse.

Catherine Obianuju Acholonu:
Ɓiɗɗo, guur e janngirde.
Catherine jibinaa nder saare katolikiyanko'en Igbo mawɓe to Chief Lazarus Emejuru Olumba e Josephine Olumba, to Umuokwara Village, nder gariiri Orlu. O woni ɓurɗo ɓiɓɓe nayi. O timmini janngirde maako nder suudu do'aare nder suudu do Rosary, haa o ware nder duuɓi 17 to Brendan Douglas Acholonu, mo woɗnde woɗnde nder suudu do, mo ɗon jooɗortoo nder lesdi Germany. Catherine ɓaawo ɗon o jaati e jaŋde Düsseldorf bana jannginoowo ɗemngal Farayse, ɗemngal Amerik, e ɗemngal Germanic nder 1974, diga to o jaati nder hitaande 1977. Nder 1982, o heɓii PhD maako nder Igbo Studies, ngam maajum o laati debbo Afrikkeejo arandeeji ngam heɓugo maggal e PhD diga Dusseldorf. O yahi ha haalde kawtal mum arande nder kawtal Ibadan dow Pan Africanism, nder hitaande nde warata, o holli hujjaaji nayi

Kathy Acker:
Kathy Acker (April 18, 1947 - November 30, 1997) koɗo Amerikɗo, winndaɗo defte, mawɗo defte e winndoowo ɓaawo jamanu, anndiraaɗo e binndi mum ɗiin ɗiin ɗi ɗiin ɗiinoyi e ɗiin ɗi njokki dow ko'e maɓɓe bana ɓiyde ɓiyde suka, e nder njokki e nder ɓiyde. O ɗon semmbe haa mawɓe ɗi'e ɗi'e, ɗi'e wi'eteeɓe Black Mountain School, William S. Burroughs, David Antin, Carolee Schneeman, Eleanor Antin, e miijooji Farayse, e mistik, e dow ɗemngal pulaar..

Maximiliane Ackers:
Biography.
Ackers waɗi ko o laato nder suudu jaŋde e nder wuro Göttingen, Riga, e Berlin. Ha fuɗɗoode 1920s, Ackers fuɗɗi gollaade nder filimji, winndi e nder film mum burning country (Brennendes Land). Nder hitaande 1921, o ɗon nder nder fijirde nder Florentine Nights: the Adventures of the Count of Costa (Florentinische Nächte: Die Abenteuer der Gräfin da Costa), winndiinde e Heinrich Heine￼￼Heinrich Heine.

Bertilda Samper Acosta:
Sister María Ignacia, OSC, jibinaaɗo Bertilda Samper Acosta (31 lewru Yuli 1856 - 31 lewru Yuli 1910) o wonnoo moore Colombian Poor Clare, mawɗo e winndiyanke. O debbo José María Samper Agudelo e Soledad Acosta Kemble, ɗiɗo e rewɓe mawɓe e rewɓe jaayndiyankooɓe wakkati maɓɓe e Kolombiya.[./Bertilda_Samper_Acosta#cite_note-1 ]

Ofelia Uribe de Acosta:
Ofelia Uribe de Acosta (1900 - 1988) wonnoo ko kolombiyankoore sufragiista

Soledad Acosta:
Soledad Acosta Kemble (5 mee 1833 - 17 mars 1913) wonnooɗo winndaande e winndannde leydi Kolombi. Debbo mo ɓeydani, mo yahra e nder ummaatooje, o heɓii janngirde ɓurɗum e ɓurɗum ɓurnde nder ummaatoore ɓurɗe rewɓe wakkati maako e lesdi maako, o heɓiri darnde mawnde nder ummaateere, naa' ngam asal mum e saare maako tan, ammaa ngam kuuɗe maako boo. O golli nder bolle feere feere hawti e El Comercio, El Deber, e Revista Americana, ha nder bolle goɗɗe. Hino huutoroo e defte makko, o wonnoo feminist yeeso wakkati mum, o holli hakkilanaaki rewɓe, o winndi dow kuuje feere feere dow hawtuki rewɓe nder ummaatoore e saare, o waawiri yimɓe feere ɓe ɓe mbaɗata goɗɗum nder kuugal e nder warugo ummaatoore

Eliza Acton:
Eliza Acton (17 abriil 1799 - 13 feebariil 1859) wonnooɗo winndaande e mawɗo e mawɗo leydi Ingiltere mo waɗi go'o nder defte cuwɗe ɓurɗe waɗde e leydi Ingilterra, Modern Cookery for Private Families. Deftere nden holli laawol ngol yimɓe fuu mbaɗata ngam anndugo ko'e kuuje e hokkude wakkati coofugo ngam kala ko'e ko'e cuɗol. Nder nder maajum, ɗum hawti e ko'e maɓɓe ko'e kuutorɗe ɗen e nder ɗemngal Farayse ngam kuutorɗe Brussels e ngam spaghetti. Ɗum ɗon hawta e recette arandeeji ngam ko Acton noddi "Jolnde julde"; ko ɗum noddi e nder kareeji, ɗum noddi plum pudding, recette ngam ɗi ɓooyi, koo nde Acton woni arandeeji ɓe ɓe ɓeydani innde e recette.

Caggal ngal e nder suudu cuwugo ngam yimɓe:
Modern Cookery for Private Families ko deftere ko'e ko'e cooking nder leydi Ingliisi nde Eliza Acton waɗi. Ɗum fuɗɗii wurtinaama e Longmans nder hitaande 1845, nden woni best-seller, nder nder nder 13 jaaynde nder hitaande 1853, koo nde ɓaawo ɗun, Mrs Beeton ɓeydi jaaynde. Delia Smith noddi Acton "koɗo winnda ko ɓuri heewde nder ɗemngal Farayse", ngam e nder deftere nden, Elizabeth David ɗon wondude ngam ɗume "koɗo winndoowo mo walaa hakkiilo" ɗon ɓurugo "ko'e yimɓe ɓe ɗon tokka ko'e maɓɓe boo ɓe walaa anndal.

Avis Acres:
Thyra Avis Mary Acres (woowo McNeill, 26 mars 1910 - 15 oktoobar 1994) wonnooɗo New Zealandɗo, winndiɗo, hollitɗo e jaayndiyanke. : 1 O anndiraa ɓurɗo anndude ngam kuugal maako dow feyji pohutukawa ɗiɗo, Hutu e Kawa.

Angelina Acuña:
María Angelina Acuña Sagastume de Castañeda (31 lewru Janaayo 1905 - 14 lewru Juun 2006) wonnoo winndiinde Guatemala e winndannde poesirɗe. O wonnoo mawɗo mawɗo poemji nder leydi mum, o anndiraa ko ɓuri heewde ngam ɓeydaade maako nder jaŋde poemji classical nder sonnet. Mawɗo Margarita Carrera noddi Acuña "ko'o debbo nder ruuhu Gabriela Mistral".

Dora Acuña:
Dora Gómez Bueno de Acuña (1903 e Luque - 1987) wonnooɗo paraguaynaajo, jaayndiyanke e radio. O waɗi janngude maako nder Escuela Normal de Asunción, suudu mo o jaajiri bee darnde jannginoowo

Rosario de Acuña:
Rosario de Acuña y Villanueva de la Iglesia, anndiraa e innde ɓurɗe ɓurɗe innde Rosario de Acúña e innde fuɗɗorde ɓurɗe anndude e defte mum, Remigio Andrés Delafón (1850 - 5 mee 1923), wonnooɗoɗoɗoɗo Espaañ, winndaɗo ɗemɗe, teskooje, heewɓe e ko'e wi'e

Alma Flor Ada:
Alma Flor Ada jibini nder Camagüey, Cuba nder lewru 3 lewru 1ɓiiru 1938, to Modesto Ada Rey e Alma Lafuente. O mawni nder La Quinta Simoni, wuro wuro wuro wuro juulirde Cuban Ignacio Agramonte. O jibinaa nder saare moolotooɓe, mawɓe, e jannginooɓe, o mawni o nanngii haalaaji aada ɗi nana, baaba, e kawtal maako ɓe mbinndini. To o duuɓi 15, o jaɓɓi juulde fifteende ngam jaŋde etee nder United States, ngam non o fuɗɗi nguurndam maako bana neɗɗo mo ɗon ɗemɗe ɗiɗi..

Barbara Adair:

Varsha Adalja:
Ɓiɗɗo.
O jibinaa e 10 abriil 1940 e Bombay (ko jooni Mumbai) to Gunvantrai Acharya, mawɗo Gujarati, e Nilaben. Maama maako ɗon haa Jamnagar. O heɓii BA nder Gujarati e Sanskrit diga jaŋde Mumbai nder 1960. Ɓaawo ɗon o timmini M.A. nder Sociology nder 1962. O janngini darana nder National School of Drama, Delhi nder dow dow dow dow limce. O huuwani bana wolwiɗo Akashvani, Mumbai diga 1961 haa 1964. O waree Mahendra Adalja nder 1965. O fuɗɗi winndugo nder hitaande 1966. Walaa maako Ila Arab Mehta boo o winndiino.

Juliette Adam:
Nolde e golle.
Juliette Adam jibini nder Verberie (Oise). O hokki haala ɓiyum maako, mo hawti e ɓiyum ngam hawti e maɓɓe, nder Le roman de mon enfance et de ma jeunesse (Eng. trans., London e New York, 1902). Baaba maako ɗon holla nder Paradoxes d'un docteur allemand (ɗun haɓɓiri 1860), ɗum holli mo o ɗon yiɗi femminism.  ["citation needed"]

Pip Adam:
Ɓaawoore.
Adam jibinaa nder Christchurch, New Zealand. O yahi New Zealand Film and Television School ha Christchurch yeeso o jeyi Dunedin. Adam ina jogii MA nder janngirde defte e jaaynde e MA nder binndi jaaynde Victoria e Wellington. E hitaande 2012 o timmini doktoor makko, kadi e Victoria University, e dow Damien Wilkins￼￼Damien Wilkins.

Gabriela Adameșteanu:
Biography.
Gabriela Adameșteanu jibini nder Târgu Ocna e 2 abriil 1942. O debbo Mircea Adameșteanu, jannginoowo taariika nder jaŋde mawɗo, e Elena, janngoowo jaŋde saare, mo o majjini golle maako nde laamu Communist ƴettude janngooji maako nder janndeeji e o waɗi o huuwa nder suudu janngooje. Gooto nder deeriraaɓe Mircea Adameșteanu laati fursina politik laamu kominista; gooto, archaeologist mo anndiraa Dinu Adameșteanu, wari ɗo ɗowoldi nder Itali.

Draginja Adamović:
Biography.
O wurtini defte poemji tati e o hawti nder nder nder ko'e poemji tato: "Poetesses of Kragujevac" (1991), "Lyrical humming of Sumadija" (2004), e "Singers of sleeping capital" (2006, 2007).

Abigail Adams:
 
Abigail Adams (lahde Smith; 22 Nuwambar 1744 - 28 Oktoobar 1818) woni debbo e mo anndinoowo John Adams, e maa John Quincy Adams. O laatiɗo taginooɗo lesdi Amerika, o laatiima arandeejo debbo ɗiɗawɗo e arandeejoɗo debbo ɗiɗewɗo lesdi Amerika. O e Barbara Bush ngoni rewɓe ɗiɗo tan ɓe ɓe gaaci ardiiɓe lesdi Amerika e ɓe laati ɓiɓɓe ardiiɓe leydi Amerika feere..

Glenda Adams:
Glenda Emilie Adams (woowo Felton; 30 Desemba 1939 - 11 Julaay 2007) ko winndaako Australianɗo e winndaako heewde, ko ɓuri anndude e wonde ko heɓi Miles Franklin Award for Dancing on Coral e hitaande 1987. O ɗon janngina bolle mawɗe, o walli waɗugo bolle bolle mawɓe..

Lois Bryan Adams:
Lois Bryan Adams (née, Bryan; pen name, L.; October 14, 1817 - June 28, 1870) wonnooɗo winndaande Amerik, e hooreejo jaaynde e jaaynde. Nder duuɓi noogas, Adams waɗi darnde e nder defte nder nder nder lesdi Michigan, nden o windi haa wakkatiire nder nder nder nder defte New York. Ɗe defte ɗe o winndi wonnoo ko ɓuri heewde e nder nder nder nder defte Graham's Magazine e nder defte Ladies' Book. O winndi deftere go'o nder nguurndam maako, nden ndenno o winndi defte maako, ndenno o wurtini defte maako.

Mary Mathews Adams:
Mary Mathews Adams (ko ɓaawo ɗun, Mary Mathew Smith e Mary Mathewes Barnes; 23 Oktoobar 1840 - 11 Desemba 1902) wonnooɗo winndaande e jannginoowo e janngoowo Amerik jibinaaɗo e leydi Irlandiya. Mawɗo heewɓe tati e ko ɓuri heewɓe, ɗum woni janngude Shakespeare nde o heɓii anndal. O warti jawdi ɓaawo o ware Alfred Smith Barnes o hokki yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe kuugal.

Patricia J. Adams:
Ɓiɗɗo.
Patricia Juliette Christian jibini 3 Januuwar 1952 nder nokkuure Farrington nder Anguilla to Ann Juliette e Malcolm Lindbergh Christian. Mawɓe maako ɓe ɓe ɓooyɓe nder lesdi Afirka. Christian woni ɓurɗo ɓiyugo nder ɓikkoy njoweeɗiɗo e ɓiɗɗo debbo go'oto. Fuude mum njaaraama to St. Martin nder ɓiyum e Christian ɓiyum to nana mum. O yahi suudu jannginoowo ɓikkoy nder lesdi e suudu janngoowo nder lesdi, o timmini jannginooɓe nder lesdi e nder hitaande 1969. Nder hitaande nde o jaati nder leydi ndin, leydi ndin ɗon mari ɓaawo maako daga nder leydi Saint Christopher-Nevis-Anguilla e nder nder leydi Anguilla ngam ɓe ɓe ɓeydana laamu maɓɓe.

Patsy Adam-Smith:
Patricia Jean Adam-Smith, AO, OBE (31 May 1924 - 20 Septemba 2001) koɗo lesdi Australia. O wonnooɗo winndaade e dow ɗemɗe keewɗe ɗe hawri e taariika, folklore e hakkilantaaki aada leydi, o winndi e nder defte ɗiɗi. Ɗe kuuɗe maako ɗe ɓurɗe anndude hawtuki hawti e The Anzacs (1978), Australian Women at War (1984) e Prisoners of War (1992).

Gil Adamson:
Biography.
Adamson's golle arande nde wurtini ɗum ɗum Primitive, ko haɓɓii e nder hitaande 1991. O tokki ɗum e nder defte ɗe o wurtini dow dow dow dow ko'e maɓɓe, bana non o wurtinaama dow dow dow maako. Fedde poemji mum boo wurtini nder antology Surreal Estate: 13 Canadian Poets Under the Influence (The Mercury Press, 2004). The Outlander, wonde roman nder Canadien fuunaaŋge fuunaaŋgo fuunaaŋgi fuunaaŋgu 20th, wondi e nder suudu Anansi nder fuunaaŋgal 2007 nden o heɓii ko Hammett Prize nder hitaande nden. Wano no'o ɓaawo ɗun, no'o suɓii nder nder nder nder hitaande 2009 nder nder nder Kanada Reads, to o wondi nder nder nder ko'o nder nder nder nden nder nder nder dow nder nder nder karallaagal Nicholas Campbell.   ["citation needed"]

Alison Adburgham:
Alison Adburgham (28 Januuwar 1912 - 23 Mee 1997) wonnooɗo habaruɗo, mawɗo e taariikaaku ummatoore leydi Ingiltere, anndiraaɗo e golle mum nde o wonnoo jaayndiyanke mum nder defte fashion nder jardiindi The Guardian, ko o waɗi duuɓi 20. Nder kawtal Prudence Glynn nder The Times e Alison Settle nder The Observer, o waɗi jaayndiyanke British fashion nder jardiyanke leydi; bana kolonnaaɗo, o walli dow no yimɓe ɗon ɗaɓɓita ɓalndu nder ɓalndu, e nder nder nder nder suudu. O winndi defte feere dow taariha ummatoore.

Fleur Adcock:
Fleur Adcock CNZM OBE (dimaa 10 feebari 1934) ko mawɗo New Zealand, mawɗo e jaayndiyanke, ko o ƴiwoyi e Farayse e Northern Ireland, o jooɗii nder leydi Ingiltere. O ɗon wondi e nder nder nder nder ɗemɗe mawɗe New Zealand, o heɓii doktoor teddungal nder ɗemngal ɗemngal ngal e nder jaŋde Victoria e Wellington, o heɓi OBE nder hitaande 1996 ngam darnde maako nder ɗemnde New Zealand. E hitaande 2008 o waɗiiɗo Companion of the New Zealand Order of Merit, ngam kuugal e ɗemngal

Caroline Adderson:
Caroline Adderson (dugum 9 Septemba 1963) koɗoɗo ɗemngal Kanada e winndaaki ɗemngal. O wurtini noomi nayi, kooseeje goɗɗe ɗiɗi e defte ɗiɗi ngam janngooɓe sukaaɓe.

Yda Hillis Addis:
Ɓiɗɗo.
Addis jibinaa nder 1857 nder Leavenworth, Kansas, nden o yahdi bee saare maako to Chihuahua, Mexico, fuɗɗam konu lesdi Amerika. Ɓiɗɗo debbo fotoowo mo'o, Alfred Shea Addis, o ɗon yaasi nder hirnaange hirnaange e ladde lesdi Mexico, haa nder gure yimɓe, to cuuɗi ɗo yimɓe maɓɓooji nder lesdi, e nokkuuje feere feere, ɓurna fuu nder lesdi Mexico e California, o ɗon walli baaba maako. Nde o woodi duuɓi 15, Addis e saare maako ɓe njahi Los Angeles, to o jaɓi jaŋde arandeeji Los Angeles High School, jaŋde jaŋde 7 jaŋdeeji. O fuɗɗi ekkitingo ɓiɓɓe duuɓi jeeɗiɗi..

Lucia H. Faxon Additon:
Lucia H. Faxon Additon (woowo, Faxon; 28 Septemba 1847 - 4 Janaayo 1919) wonnooɗo winndaako Amerik, jannginoowo muusik, e mawɗo jaayndiyankooɓe rewɓe e nder juulde (WCTU). Bana no o ɗonno wa'ugo marɗo laawol nder kuugal WCTU nder Pacific Coast, o anndinaama bana arɗo nder kuugal kuugal limol, jannguki, e diina. Additon boo o wondi gooduɗo gooduɗo, o woni mo o mari tagdi e hooreejo gooduɗo jaŋde jaŋde debbo Oregon, e hooreejo jaŋde e jaŋde golle nder fedde jaŋnde worɓe Oregon.

Kim Addonizio:
Laamu.
Addonizio jibini nder Washington, D.C., United States. O debbo mo laamɗo tennis Pauline Betz e mawɗo jaayndiyankooɓe Bob Addie (ko jibinaa Addonizio).

Ayobami Adebayo:
Fedde fuɗɗam.
Ayobami Adébáyọ was born in Lagos, Nigeria, in 1988; ɓaawo nde, saare mum ƴetti Ilesa, nden to Ile-Ife, to o ɓooydi ɓaawo ɓaawo ɓiyum e nder karallaagal jaŋde Obafemi Awolowo.

Bisi Adeleye-Fayemi:
Bisi Adeleye-Fayemi (dugumi 11 lewru junngo 1963) ko debbo mo'oɗo lesdi Naajeeriya e leydi Biritaniya, mawɗo e jaɓɗo politik. O laati arandeejo lesdi Ekiti, Nigeria, bana debbo gomnaaku lesdi Ekiti Kayode Fayemi diga 2018 haa 2022. O waɗi ko o laamiiɗo arande diga 2010 haa 2014 nder sahaa arandeejo gorko maako. Nder hitaande 2001, o haɓɓiti doolaaji Afrik Fedde Ɓamtaare Haaru (AWDF), go'o haɓɓuki jaayndeji Afrik fuu. O ɗon huuwa bana jaɓoowo mawɗo ha UN Women Nigeria, nden o noddinaa bana jaɓaaɗo mawɗo wiɗtoowo to King's College, University of London nder 2017. O woni CEO Above Whispers Limited, e o ɗon jaɓɓa haandi dow internet biyeteeɗo Abovewhispers.com

Sade Adeniran:
Sade Adeniran (dunde 1960s) ko mawɗo defte nder lesdi Naijeriya, ko defte maako ɓurɗe, Imagine This, heɓii ko nder 2008 Commonwealth Writers' Prize for Best First Book in Africa. Fakkita ɗum ɗum ko hoore mawɗo. O ɗon jooɗi nder Londira, o ɗon waɗi fim

Anne-Marie Adiaffi:
Dodi e 1951 to Abengourou, Adiaffi janngini nder nder nderji'e Côte d'Ivoire, arande o janngini e Marseille e Dakar, to o heɓii diploma dow darnde mawɗo ɗemɗe ɗiɗi. Caggal nde o huwtunoo nder banki, o hawti e jaayndiwal Novelles Éditions Africaines nder hitaande 1983. Caggal nde o waɗi satiriik Un vie hypothéquée, o wurtini La ligne brisée (1989) dow neɗɗo mo o wurtinaama nder wuro maako caggal nde o heɓii sahaaji. O maayi nder Abidjan nder hitaande 1994..

Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie:
Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie (/ˌtʃɪməˈmɑːndə əŋˈɡoʊzi əˈdiːtʃi.eɪ/ i CHI-mə-MAHN-də əng-GOH-zee ə-DEE-chee-ay; jibinaa 15 Septemba 1977) ko winndaako Nigeria mo kuugal mum hawti e binndi, heewde e heewde. O hollitii nder The Times Literary Supplement "ko ɓuri mawnugo" nder "ko'o "ko'e "ko'i mawɓe mawɓe mawɗoɓe ɓe ɓe anndini e ɗemngal Anglo" nder defte ɗe Nigeria heɓi heewɓe ɓurɓe, ɓurna fuu nder wuro maako ɗiɗawre, Amerik..

Akachi Adimora-Ezeigbo:
Biography.
Akachi Adimora-Ezeigbo jibinaa e mawnina nder lesdi Naijeriya fuunaaŋgo, amma jooni o jooɗi Lagos. O woni ɓiɗɗo arande Joshua e Christiana Adimora e o woodi deerɗiraaɓe njowo. O ɓooydi e nder nokkuure nder ladde e nder wuro, o hawri e ɗiɗoji ɗi, bana dow dow e dow dow dow dow haala ɓiyum e dow dow yimɓe mawɓe. Koo nde o jibinaa nder lesdi Naijeriya fuunaaŋge, o jooɗii nder nokkuuje feere feere nder lesdi ndin - fuunaaŋgi, fuunaaŋgal e hirnaaŋge. O yahri haa lesdi Afrika, Europe e nder USA.

Opal Palmer Adisa:
Ɓiɗɗo.
Adisa ɓadi mile sappo nder firo Kingston, Jamaica, o yahi nder wuro man. Nder hitaande 1970 o yahi janngude e Hunter College, New York, nden nder hitaande 1979 o yahdi to San Francisco Bay Area ngam o heɓugo MA nder binndi. Bana David Katz wi'i, "Adisa'en golle ɗon nafama diga ɓaawo ɓiyum nder ɓiyum e nder suudu cukko nder lesdi Jamaika, to baaba maako ɗon huuwa bana kemist e inna maako bana marɗo defte. Nder haala nde'e, Opal sukaajo ɗon anndinaako tan ko anndal haala, ammaa boo, ɓaawo waalidi mum'en ɓe cujji, to hakkiilo walaa keerol haani ha haani haani ha rewɓe e hakkiiloji ɗi ɓe ɗon haani haaki dow talaka'en. Goongaaji ɗi'e, e ɓesda e ɓernde mum ngam ɓeyda nguurndam yimɓe haade maako, waɗi Adisa yiɗi "taƴugo wolde to ɓe ngalaa wolde" nder duuɓi mawngu.

Halide Edib Adıvar:
Halide Edib Adıvar (Turkiyanko'en: خالده اديب eˈdib, to bannge Farayse'en, ko Halidé Edib; 11 lewru Juun 1884 - 9 lewru Janaaru 1964) ko mawɗo dewtere Turki, jannginoowo, e jannginooɗo e janngoowo. O anndiraa ɓurɗo anndugo nder binndi maako dow darnde ummaatoore turkiyankooje e ko o yi'i diga no o yi'iri bana ɓurna rewɓe ɗon mari ɓernde ngam waylitugo haala maɓɓe. O wonnoo Pan-Turkist e nder defte makko feere feere o holli ko Turanism.

Zoe Adjonyoh:
Biography.
O jibinaa nder Essex, Ingilandi, nder ɓaawo duuɓi 1970 to baaba Ghana e inna Irish, ɓe hawri e Kilburn, North London. Adjonyoh janngini hoore mum ngam nyaamugo nyaamduji lesdi baaba mum, nden o fuɗɗii suudu nyaamdu biyeteeɗo Zoe's Ghana Kitchen nder saare maako nder fuunaaŋge London, ɓaawo anndal suudu nyaamndu o haɓɓii ngam huuwugo ɓanndu fuunaaŋgu fuunaaŋgi wakkati festival seniije je ɗon waɗa nder ɓaawo ɗon nder hitaande 2010. Ko o fuɗɗi waɗugo e jaaynde nyaamdu Ghana ngam o heɓugo maggal maako nder gollal jaayndewal e Goldsmiths, University of London, mo mo o janngina mo, o wi'i ngam o hakkilana dow kuuɗe maako, ɗum waawi wonugo laawol ɓurɗum nder winndaade kuugal maako. Gila nde o waɗi nder cuuɗi nyaamdu nder London feere feere e nder nokkuuje feere, hawti e Berlin e New York. O wi'i: "Keyɗol Ghana Kitchen woni yahugo yimɓe nder yahugo nyaamdu to ɓe mbaawata huutoreeji e njamdi ɗi ɓe meeɗaay. Won ko woni no'o haani e mi yiɗi yahugo yimɓe e ɗum..

Carine Adler:
Kuugal.
Adler'en ɓeydaama nde British Film Institute noddi mo ngam waɗugo film mum to'o Touch and Go nder film fulfulde. Ko waɗi ɗum wonde Under the Skin, ko waɗi duuɓi ɗiɗi o winndi. E wi'uki Richard Armstrong nder The Rough Guide to Film, "Ko holli golle mum ɗe ɗe ɗe ɗe ɓeydaani ɗum hawtaade ɓernde ɓurɓe yiɗde e ɓernde maɓɓe e ɓeydaade".

Emma Adler:
Biography Fuuɗugo.
O anndiraa ngam kuuɗe heedi, taariika, baylitol, bana no o wurtiri e Karl Kautsky. O wonnoo soosialis mo, e mawɓe Yahuudiyankooɓe feere wakkatiire nden, bana Hedwig Dohm, Bertha Pappenheim, e Hedwig Lachmann, "ngol hawtaade siyasa e kuuɗe mawɗe". Adler laati publisher worka Arbeiterinnen-Zeitung

Renata Adler:
Ɓiɗɗo.
Adler jibinaa Milan, Itali, to Frederick L. e Erna Adler wakkati ɓe ɗon njaha diga lesdi Germany haa lesdi Amerika. O woodi deerɗiraaɓe mawɓe ɗiɗo. Fedde maako ɗon ɗon mbaɗa diga lesdi Naazi Germany nder 1933 nden ɗon njahi nder lesdi Amerika nder 1939

Sophie Adlersparre:
Laamu.
Sophie Adlersparre, jibinaa nder saare Leijonhufvud, o debbo laftinal baron Erik Gabriel Knutsson Leijonhuffvud e Sofie Emerentia Hoppenstedt. O jaɓaaki jaŋde haa saare, nden o waɗi duuɓi ɗiɗi nder jaŋde jaŋde, jaŋde Bjurström Pension (Bjurströmska pensionen) nder Stockholm. Nder hitaande 1869, o waree ardiiɗo ardiiɗo Axel Adlersparre (1812-1879) o wartii debbo mo o mari ɓiɓɓe njoweeɗiɗo. Ardiiɗo maako ɗon holla ngam wallugo kuuɗe maako ngam wallugo ummaatoore 

Wilna Adriaanse:
Wilna Adrianse (born 1958) ko sud Afrikaans Afrikaniyankoore winndiɗo romansi. Deftere maako arandeere, "Jangirgal inabooje ina ɓooyta", wonnoo nder hitaande 2000 e nder innde Wilmine Burger. Deftere maako, "A Heild'n Drink on Love", heɓii 2003 Lapa Publishers' Prize for Romance nden nder hitaande 2009 o heɓii ATKV-Wordveertjie prize for her novel, The Book of Esther

Aesara:
"Aesara of Lucania (Greek: Αἰσάρα Aisara) koɗo anndal falsafaaji Pythagorean mo o winndi dow neɗɗo, ko Stobaeus ɗo ɗo ɗowtani, koo nde ɗuuɗal jannginooɓe holger Thesleff ɗowtani ɗum Aresas, winndaɗo gorko diga Lucania mo Iamblichus anndini nder "Life of Pythagoras"".

Gladys Afamado:
Biography.
Gladys Afamado woni ɗiɗaɓo nder ɓiɓɓe njooɗiɗun Isaac Isidoro Afamado, mo Yahuudiyankeejo mo jooɗii nder Montevideo, e debbo maako Julia, ɓiɗɗo ɗiɗmo Italiyankeeɓe, mo jibinaa nder Dolores, Soriano. O yahi jaŋde ummaatoore, e nder wuro maako o heɓii jaŋde feere e jaŋde, nder nder nder maajum ɓe ɗon sembiɗina seniijo, binndi, e muusik. Walaa maako Ethel Afamado woodi golle mawɗe nder muusik e poesi.

Ethel Afamado:
Biography.
Ethel Afamado's music background hawti e janngude violin, bassoon, werka, guitar, e composition. O waɗi darnde teeteer bee Juan Carlos Carrasco e Jorge Triador. Hono no o yiɗi e nder muusik Sephardic, o haɓɓii defte e hokki recitals feere ngam holla ɗi yimbe mawɗe. O waɗi muusik ngam ɓurɗe 100 poemji diga mawɓe Uruguay e Hispanoameriiki, o waɗii recitalji ɗuuɗɗi nder yimbe e jaaynde e guitar..

Anastasia Afanasieva:
Biography.
Anastasia Valerievna Afanasieva jibinaa nder 1982, nder Kharkiv. O jaɓi jaango nder Kharkiv National Medical University, o ɗon huuwa bana doktoor nder suudu ɓernde.

Janet Afary:
Kuugal.
O heɓii maggal maako diga jaangirde Tehran. Nder hitaande 1991, o heɓii PhD makko nder Tarihi e Fuuɗorde Fuɗunaaji Fuuta e Jaŋde Michigan, nder Ann Arbor. Afary ɗon te'a Kevin B. Anderson, mo o jannginoowo e UCSB.

Mahnaz Afkhami:
Mahnaz Afkhami (Persian: مهناز افخمي; jibinaa 14 janngo 1941) ko haaniyankeewo hakkiilo rewɓe Iraniyanko'en, o waɗi golle e nder laamu Iran gila 1976 haa 1978. O woni mo o haɓɓii e hooreejo wonde Women's Learning Partnership (WLP), mo o woni ardiiɗo jaaynde Foundation for Iranian Studies e mo o woni Minista'en Fedde rewɓe nder laamu Iran. O jooɗii e nder leydi Amerik gila 1979.

Ishrat Afreen:
Ishrat Afreen (ko haalantaama: Ishrat Aafreen; jibinaa 25 Desemba 1956) ko mawɗo mawɗo Urdu. kuuɗe maako ɗon maɓɓina nder ɗemɗe ɗuuɗɗe bana Farayse, Japon, Sanskrit e Hindi. Gajal mawɓe jagjit singh & Chitra Singh boo waɗii ko'e mum nder anthology maɓɓe, Beyond Time (1987). Zia Mohyeddin kadi ɗon wi'a nasms maako nder ɗereeji maako 17 e 20 e nder dokke maako ɗon ɗon ɗon.

Vittoria Aganoor:
Biography.
O jibinaa e Padova, ɓiɗɗo jeeɗiɗiɗo Edoardo Aganoor e Giuseppina Pacini. Duubaaji baaba maako ɓe ardiiɓe Armeniyanko'en. Ɓe njaaraani Farisa nder karnijum sappo e go'o, ɓe njooɗori nder Julfa. Ɓaawo, ngam ɓe ɗon tokka ko maama'en Mechitarist'en mbi'i, saare maɓɓe ɗon njahi Paris. Nder Farayse, ɓe mari jaangooji ɗiɗo ɗi ardiiɓe Armenyaaji: Kooleji Raphaël to Paris, ɓe tokki kooleji Moorat to Venice..

Smita Agarwal:
Biography.
Ko Smita Agarwal waɗi ko haalaaji ɗi o waɗi e nder nder nder nder defte e nder nder deftere. Nder hitaande 1999 o laati marɗo nder jaŋde Stirling nder Scotland, e jaŋde Kent nder Ingiltere. Agarwal'en janngude doctoral'en ɗon dow mawɗo Amerika, mawɗo defte e mawɗo deftere, Sylvia Plath. Agarwal woni mo hawritoowo e mo baylitol for Plath Profiles, nder Sylvia Plath online journal, Indiana University.. 

Sabiraago Agbabi:
Ɓiɗɗo e jaŋde.
Patience Agbabi jibinaa nder London to waalidi lesdi Naijeriya. Gila e duuɓi sappo, o jeyaa e saare Angalteer gooduɓe ɓaleere, o jeya diga e duuɓi 12 diga e Sussex haa e Wales woyla, to o ɓeydi ɓeydi e nder Colwyn Bay. O janngini ɗemngal Farayse e ɗemngal ɗemngal ngal e Pembroke College, Oxford

Berthe-Evelyne Agbo:
Nde o ɓeydi suka, Berthe-Evelyne Agbo jooɗii nder Saint-Louis, Senegal. O heɓii janngirde fuɗɗam e jaŋde ɗiɗaɓo nder Touraine, Farayse, ngam o yahdi jaŋde Dakar. O jooɗii nder Farayse

Charlotte Agell:
Charlotte Agell (duggo 7 Septemba 1959) ko winndaako Amerik mo jibinaa e Swidin ngam mawɓe mawɓe e sukaaɓe, hannde o jooɗii e Maine. Wano ɗiɗaɓo romanji maako, Shift, wondi nder koode ɓooyɗe nder Brunswick Times Record nder lewru Oktoobar 2008. Ha darnde e nder defte ɓiyɗe e defte ɓii-ɓiyɗe, Charlotte Agell ɗon ekkitina nder Maine.

Adalet Ağaoğlu:
Laamu.
Jazz ko ɗemngal muusikol ngal fuɗɗii e nder ummatooje Afriknaaɓe Amerik nder New Orleans, Louisiana, Amerik, nder duuɓi 19th e fuɗɗoode 20th, e ɓaleeɓe mum nder blues e ragtime. Gila 1920s Jazz Age, ɗum anndiraa ɗum bana laawol mawɗo nder muuɗal haandi e muuɗal yimɓe, hawti e jokkondiral hakkunde Afriknaaɓe e Europeeɓe. Jaas ina holla e nootaaji swing e blue, kootaaji ɓurɗi ɓeydaade, nodda e jaabol, polyrhythms e improvisation. Jazz ina jogii leɗɗe nder aada e muujiwol Afrik hirnaange, e nder aada muusikol Afrik-Amerika..

Süreyya Ağaoğlu:
Ɓiɗɗo e jaŋde.
Ağaoğlu o debbo Ahmet Ağaoğlu, mo Azerbaijan mo fuɗɗiiɗo e Turki mo fuɗɗaaɓi 20th. Caggal nde Azerbaijan Democratic Republic wara nder 1920, Ağaoğlus ɓe ndilli Turki, to Süreyya jaɓɓii nder Fedde Dentugol Istanbul.

Pinky Agnew:
Pinky Agnew, MNZM (woowo 1955 haa Port Chalmers) ko actor, mawɗo, ummotooɗo, e moftotooɗo dewgal e Wellington e New Zealand. O ɗon wondi ko'e maako e nder nder nder nder ɓaawo hitaande 1990. Nder hitaande 2004 o wari nder nder nder nder hitaande keso nder nder nder limgal, o warti ardiiɗo nder New Zealand Order of Merit (MNZM) ngam kuugal maako nder nder nder ɓooyɗe.

Kelli Russell Agodon:
Kelli Russell Agodon (duggi Seattle) ko mawɗo mawɗo Amerika, winndaɗo e jaayndiyanke. O woni mo daɓɓoɗo ɗiɗo Sylvias Press e o ɗon golla dow darnde poesi haa Rainier Writing Workshop, program MFA low-residency haa Pacific Lutheran University..

Marjorie Agosín:
Marjorie Agosín (dimaa 15 lewru junngo 1955) ko winndiyankeere Ameriknaajo. O heɓii anndal ngam haɓɓugo maako ngam hakkeeji rewɓe nder lesdi Chile. Luttuɓe Duuɓi Duuɓi haajiri mo ngam kuuɗe maako dow hakkeeji yimɓe. Dowla Chilene hokki mo ko Gabriela Mistral Medal of Honor for Life Achievement nder hitaande 2000. O jaɓaama ko Belpré Medal. Nder Amerik, o heɓii Letras de Oro, Ladinko'en Fedde Fedde Fuuta, e Peabody Award, hawti e United Nations Leadership Award in Human Rights

Gerty Agoston:
Ɓiɗɗo.
Agoston jibini nder Budapest, Hungary. Nde o woodi duuɓi 6, o yiɗi warugo Amerik caggal nde o yi'i fimji Amerik.

Marie d'Agoult:
Laamu.
Marie lahé di Frankfurt am Main, Jerman, ngon nan Catherine Sophie de Flavigny, aneuëk Alexandre Victor François, Vicomte de Flavignny (1770-1819), aristocrat Perancis ngon peurumoh jih Maria Elisabeth Bethmann (1772-1847), putroe bankir Jerman. Marie geupeulahé umu awai jih di Jerman, dan geupeureumeun di biara Prancis lheuh Restorasi Bourbon.

Agripina Samper Agudelo:
Agripina Casimira de los Dolores Samper Agudelo (4 Buleuen Lapan 1833 - 22 Buleuen Phon 1892) nakeuh sidroe penyair Kolombia. Meukeluarga nyang beutaleh, jih geuteume pendidikan nyang hana mudah diakses le ureung inong bak masa jih dan nanggroe jih. Jih geutuléh prosa ngen puisi di bawah pseudonim "Pía-Rigán", anagram nan jih. Karya jih hana di peutrang seulama udep jih dan hanya di antologisasi dan di peublish posthumously.

Brígida Agüero:
Bibliography.
Brígida jibini to mawɗo Francisco Agüero y Estrada e Ana Maria Agüero e Varona, yimɓe mo ɓe teddina e ɓe ɓe teddina. Baaba maako ɗon mawnina ngam maral maako nder ɗemngal, e ngam o go'oto nder mawɓe mawɓe mawɗo Puerto-Principe, gariiri ɗo anndiraa hannde CamagüeyCamagüey￼￼.

Silvia Agüero:
Biography.
Silvia Agüero Fernández jibini nder Vallecas (gooduɗo nder Madrid) nder saare gadjo mo ɗon jaɓɓa ideoloji mo ɗon haɓɓa e gypsy. Silvia anndini ko ɗum firti ngam yahugo ummaatoore e aada Romani e waɗi jamma do ummaatoore hawrata diga yimɓe Roma: Pretendemos Gitanizar el Mundo (Min ɗon yiɗi Romaizing Duniyaaru). O ɗon arda Revolución de las Rosas Romaní (Rewolusiyon Roses Roma), goomu mo ɗon haɓɓa bee huwugo ɓikkoy nder danygol. O ɗon jokkondira Plataforma Rosa Cortés. O ɗon golla bee radio radio radio Radio Vallekas, bee Pikara Magazine, e bee AraInfo

Josefa Toledo de Aguerri:
piyonaaruuji

Grace Aguilar:
Grace Aguilar (2 Jowre 1816 - 16 Septemba 1847) wonnooɗoɗo koode, mawɗo e winndaande dow taariika Yahuudiyankooɓe e diina. Ko o winndi gila e ɓikkoy mum, ko ɓuri heewde nder kuuɗe maako ɗum wurtini ɓaawo mayde maako. Nder ɗe ɗon hawta kuuɗe maako ɓurɗe anndugo, romanji maako "Ham influence" e "A mother's reward"

Sardauna, Taraba State:
Sardauna (ko'o Mambilla) wuro mai ɗon ha woyla fuuna fuuna fuun Taraba State nder lesdi Naijeriya. Ɗum woni ko nodditaaki e Mambilla Plateau, ɗo ɗo ɗo wurooji e gure ɗuuɗɗe. LGA laamorgo woni Gembu, nokkuure Mambilla nden nden nden nden, innde nden ɗon "Gelmvu", innde laamiiɗo nden nden nden. Yimɓe feere daga lesdi Naijeriya e lesdi Kamerun bana Hausa, Kanuri, Banso, Kambu, Fulani, ton be yita be a lumu.
Ceeɗol.
Jonta Ha tawii no haani ha nder nokkuuje feere ha nder worgo fuunaaŋgo lesdi Nigeria, ha nder nokkuure ɗo (ji sabaabu maare maako) haandi haandi haaki; nder balɗe ɓurɗe ɗuuɗɗe nder sahaa fuunaaŋge, temperatuure ɗon ɓuwa 20-23 C e ɗon maaki haa 16-18 C nder jemma, nder sahaa haɗi ɗi ɗon maaki.
Ɗemɗe.
Ndir Sardauna ina woodi ɗemɗe feere-feere, ina woodi ɗimmɗe goɗɗe ɗiɗi (ji Ɗemɗe Fulani, Ɗemɗe Jukunoida, ɗemngal Bantoid, e Ɗemɗe Mambiloid) demde mai ja don ton.

Kona Ward:
Kona ko wonde wonde wonande wuro Jalingo nder leydi Taraba, Nigeria.

Mila D. Aguilar:
Bana mawɗo, o winndi ko 400 poemji e Farayse, Filipines, e Ilonggo, ko 125 nder maɓɓe nder Journey: An Autobiography in Verse (1964-1995), ko ɗum wurtini e University of the Philippines Press e hitaande 1996. Ko'e poems nder nder nder nder deftere nde'e ɗon nder defte joweego nder Manila, San Francisco, e New York City hakkunde duuɓi 1974 e 1987 (ha nder maɓɓe A Comrade is as Precious as a Rice Seedling), bana boo nder defte ɗe o winndi haa duuɓi ɓaawo ɗon haa e 1995. Chronicle of a Life Foretold: 101 Poems (1995-2005) wondi nder hitaande 2012 e nder Popular Bookstore, e nder goɗɗe goɗɗe ɗiɗi poemry as Prophecy (2005-2013), e deftere nde walaa ko wi'etee, ɗe ɗon haaje

Anna Aguilar-Amat:
Anna Aguilar-Amat (hanjum fuu: Anna Aguilars-Amat i Castillo; jibinaa 31 lewru janngo 1962 e Barcelona) ko mawɗo jaaynde Catal, tawritoowo, ɗaɓɓinoowo e jannginoowo jaŋde e Terminology e Linguistics. O winndi ko ɓuri heewde e Catalan (ko o pootere, o winndi ko e Catalan, ɗemngal ngal o huutoroo e nder yoga e defte e janngude makko) kono o jogii golle e nder ɗemngal Espaañ (ko ɓuri heewda e janngirde). O woodi PHD diga Universitat Autònoma de Barcelona to o ɗon janngina Terminology ha nder Fedde Fedde Fanduki. O holliti ko'e poemji jowi e o heɓi heewɓe heewɓe ngam poemji Catal. Kuugal maako boo ɗon nder nder nder nder ɗemɗe mawɗe Catalanji e o haaldiraa to Farayse, Farayse e Farayse haa ɗemɗe ɗe'e: Spanish, English, Italian, Sardinian, Macedonian, Finnish, Arabic, Turkish, Greek, German e Slovenian. O hawti nder Anthology New European Poets by Wayne Miller & Kevin Prufer, Minnesota 2008.

Francisca Aguirre:
Francisca Aguirre Benito (27 oktoobar 1930 - 13 abriil 2019) ko tawaaɗo koɗo e winndaako Espaañ. Ko o waɗi ko e nder nder nder deftere makko nden, Ithaca, wonande nder hitaande 1972, o heɓi ko o heɓi nder deftere nden ko Leopoldo Panero Poetry Award. Nder hitaande 2011, o heɓii jaajol poemji leydi ngam ko o waɗi habaru habaru haalude Historia de una anatomía. Aguirre heɓii kadi ko'e maɓɓe ko'e nder nder nder nder ko'e hitaande 2018 nder nder nder defte ɗe ɓe anndina.

Mirta Aguirre:
Laamu.
Aguirre wari nder Cuban Communist Party nder 1932. O ɗon golla nder anndi ko Juan Ramón Jiménez waɗi nder hitaande 1936 dow ko'e cubanke. Ha fuɗɗoode duuɓi 1950 o ɗon golla nder feewde feewde fuɗnde Mujeres cubana Women. Fedde maako ɗon semmbe nder criollismo Nicolás Guillen e García Lorca's miijo 'Romancerero gitano', Aguirre ɓeydi ha habaruji habaruji ɗi haani habaruji.

Milena Agus:
Milena Agus (doduɗo 1959) ko mawɗo Italiyanko'en diga Sardinia. O wondi go'o nder mawɓe binndiyankooɓe nder ko ɗum wi'etee ko Sardiyanko'en Fuuɗal Fuuɗugol, fuɗɗii e duuɓi 1980 e nder ɗun hawti e innde feere feere feere nder lesdi bana Michela Murgia.￼￼.

Ucu Agustin:
Fedde fuɗɗorɗe, janngirde e fuɗɗorgal golle.
Ucu jibinaa e Sukabumi, West Java, nder 19 August 1976 nder saare Muslim. Nde o wonnoo suka, o janngini nder Darunnajah Islamic boarding school nder Jakarta duuɓi joweego; o yaasi diga duuniyaaru, o nanngi o ɗon haani nde o anndini wonde rewɓe ɗuuɗɓe nder wuro maako ɗon kuuwa bana marɓe. Ɗuum heɓuki waɗi o ɓeydi haalude duniyaaru dow maako, o waɗi o yiɗi anndugo bolle. Ucu ɓaawo ɗon o yahdi jaŋde Islamic State University Jakarta. 

Delmira Agustini:
Fedde e maayde.
O waree Enrique Job Reyes e 14 August 1913. Ɓe cuɓii dow 5 lewru Juun 1914. Ɗiɗa caggal lewru, Reyes waɗi gollaaki Agustini nder hoore ɗiɗo, nden o waɗi hoore maako. O maayi nder wuro maako nder Montevideo, Uruguay. O haɓɓii nder Cemburu Central nder Montevideo..

Freda Ahenakew:
Biography.
Freda Ahenakew jibini nder Ahtahkakoop, Saskatchewan, ɗiɗaɓo nder ɓiɓɓe njoweeɗiɗo. Baaba maako ɓe Edward e Annie (woowo Bird) Ahenakew. O waɗi feere nder duuɓi maako nder ɓaawo duuɓi maako nder suudu duɗal St. Alban's nder Prince Albert, o yahdi nder suudu duɗeal Prince Albert

Rukhsana Ahmad:
Biography.
Rukhsana Ahmad jibini nder Karachi, Pakistan, nder 1948. O janngini nder janngirde nder nder nderji nder Pakistan. O waɗii janngirde maako nder jaŋde Punjab e nder Karachi o heɓii jaŋde Master of Arts nder jaŋnde Karachi nder ɗemngal Farayse e ɗemngal. O ɓeydi o jokki jaŋde Karachi o janngini ɗemngal English Literature, haa o ware. Caggal nde o ware o yahri Ingiltere, to o heɓii digiriiji diga jaŋde Reading e jaŋde arti.

Zeynep Ahunbay:
Biography.
Rukhsana Ahmad jibini nder Karachi, Pakistan, nder 1948. O janngini nder janngirde nder nder nderji nder Pakistan. O waɗii janngirde maako nder jaŋde Punjab e nder Karachi o heɓii jaŋde Master of Arts nder jaŋnde Karachi nder ɗemngal Farayse e ɗemngal. O ɓeydi o jokki jaŋde Karachi o janngini ɗemngal English Literature, haa o ware. Caggal nde o ware o yahri Ingiltere, to o heɓii digiriiji diga jaŋde Reading e jaŋde arti

Merete Ahnfeldt-Mollerup:
Rukhsana Ahmad jibini nder Karachi, Pakistan, nder 1948. O janngini nder janngirde nder nder nderji nder Pakistan. O waɗii janngirde maako nder jaŋde Punjab e nder Karachi o heɓii jaŋde Master of Arts nder jaŋnde Karachi nder ɗemngal Farayse e ɗemngal. O ɓeydi o jokki jaŋde Karachi o janngini ɗemngal English Literature, haa o ware. Caggal nde o ware o yahri Ingiltere, to o heɓii digiriiji diga jaŋde Reading e jaŋde arti

Astrid Ahnfelt:
Biography.
O jibinaa e 31 mars 1876 nder Stockholm, Astrid Ahnfelt o debbo ardiiɗo jaral Arvid Ahnfelt (1846-1890) e Hilda Runnerström (1844-1927), debbo jaaynoowo. Maaman maako, mawɗo diina Paul Gabriel Ahnfelt (1803-1863), boo o ɗon golla bana mawɗo. Ahnfelt ɓeydi nder nder nder nder defte taariiɗe, o hawti e mawɗo taariiɗe Ellen Key mo o waɗi mo warugo mo bana darnde ngam saare Suwede nder Tuscany nder 1897. Ɓaawo hitaande, o dilli haa Roma, to o waɗi golle ngam o huuwto gollude e nder kubaruuji e nder suwitiiɗe e nder nder nder nder ɗemɗe, o haalanki dow mawɓe Itali, hawti e mawɗo Nobel Giosue Carduccii￼￼.

Pegah Ahmadi:
Biography.
Pegah Ahmadi jibini nder Tehran, nder hitaande 1974. O fuɗɗi winndugo poem e duuɓi jeeɗiɗi. To duuɓi sappo e joweeɗiɗi, o waɗi ko o mari dow o laati mawɗo mawɗo, o wurtini ko o waɗi nder nder takapu, nder nder nder nder deftere takapu, nde Mansur Kushān waɗi. Gila nden wakkati, o ɗon hokkata bolle nder nder nder nder Iran. O janngini defte Farsa nder jaŋde Tehran.

Ilse Aichinger:
Ilse Aichinger (1 lewru Noofambar 1921 - 11 lewru Noovambar 2016) wonnooɗo winndaande Austriyankoore anndiraaɗo ngam haala makko dow torra maako e Naazis ngam ɓaawo mum Yahuudiyankoore. O winndi poems, faalaaji gaɗa e radio plays, o heɓi keewɗe keewɗe nder Europe

Renate Aichinger:
Renate Aichinger (dodude 28 Noofambar 1976 e Salzburg) ko mawɗo defte e jaayndiyankooɓe Austriyanko'en. O janngini jaŋde teeteer, film e jaŋde habaru ha jaŋde Vienna, nder wakkati o huwti nder teeteeruuji cukalel feere-feere haa Vienna hawti e Junges Schauspielhaus Zürich, Stadttheater Gießen e Vorarlberger Landestheater. Gila 2009 o ɗon huuwa haa Jungen Burg Wien. Gila sa'i 2012/13 o ɗon jaɓɓa ko o jaɓɓa nder Burgertheater of the Landestheater Niederösterreich (State Theatre of Lower Austria). Ɗi ɗiɗo nder kuugal maako ɓe laɓɓini ngam Retzhofer Dramapreis: "WWW.COM" (2003) e "Rosa Rossi sucht das Morgen" (2011).

Victoria Aihar:
Victoria Aihar (Montevideo, 19 abriil 1978), ko wonɗo nder Uruguay, mo ɗon waɗa ɗemɗe e nder internet, o ɗon wondi e winndannde.

Ginny Aiken:
Ginny Aiken (dugumi 8 Juun 1955) woni mawɗo heewɓe heewɓe e heewɓe. Ginny jibinaa Havana, Cuba, nden mawnini nder Valencia e Caracas, Venezuela￼￼. 

Fernán Caballero:
Laamu.
Duuɓi e Morges nder Suwiis, Cecilia Francisca Josefa Böhl und Lütkens y Ruiz de Larrea woni ɓiɗɗo debbo Johann Nikolaus Böhl von Faber, jaaynoowo Jarmal mo Hamburg, o jooɗii duuɓi keewɗi nder Espaañ, o waree Frasquita Larrea, mo jeyaaɗo nder Cádiz, o anndiraa e janngooɓe ɗemngal Espaañ ngam o laati ardiiɗo Floresta de rimas antiguas castellanas (1821-1825), e Teatro español anterior a Lope de Vega (1832). O janngini ko ɓuri haa Hamburg, o yahi Espaañ nder 1815, nden nder 1816 o ware Antonio Planells y Bardaxi, hooreejo jaŋde fuɗɗam. Nder hitaande ɓaawo maajum Planells maayi nder konu, nder hitaande 1822 debbo debbo debbo maako debbo debbo debbo debbo o debbo debbo o gorko o ware Francisco Ruiz del Arco, Marqués de Arco Hermoso, gardiiɗo nder go'oto nder nder nder nder cuuɗi maɓɓe.

Meg Cabot:
Fedde fuɗɗorɗe e golle.
Meggin Patricia Cabot jibini nder 1 feebari 1967, nder Bloomington, Indiana. Caggal nde o jaagornoo Indiana University, Cabot waɗi to New York, ngam yiɗi o waɗugo golle nder kuugal illustrator. Ammaa, o acci golle maako bee saaki o fuɗɗi huuwugo bana go'o marɗo suudu jaŋde nder New York University.

Astrid Cabral:
Astrid Cabral Félix de Sousa (dugum 1936) ko mawɗo defte, moftal, moftol, e moftal e gooto e mawɓe mawɓe mawɗo e nder Brazil. O woni jaayndiɗo defte ɗuuɗɗe ɗe poem, hawti e Through Water (2003) e Anteroom (2007), e nder defte ɗuuɗal e defte gabbol. O jibinaa e Manaus, Amazonas, o jooɗii e huwdi bana diplomateer nder Beirut e Chicago, o janngini nder lesdi Amerika e nder lesdi Brazil. Mammadu ɓiɓɓe njowo, o ɗon jooɗi nder Rio de Janeiro, to o ɗon tokki kuuɗe maako nder ko'e aada Amazon e nder ɓaawo warugo. 

Cristina Rodríguez Cabral:
Cristina Rodríguez Cabral (dimaa 26 May 1959) ko mawɗo werlaaɗo, jaŋdewal e Afro-Uruguayan.￼￼.

Naja Marie Aidt:
Naja Marie Aidt (dugum 24 Desemba 1963) ko mawɗo jaayndiyanke e winndiyanke ɗemngal Danemark..

Sarona Aiono-Iosefa:
Biography.
Aiono-Iosefa jibini nder Christchurch, New Zealand to waalidiɓe ɓe njaaraama diga Samoa. O janngini journalism haa Wellington Polytechnic nden o dilli to University of Canterbury ngam janngina ɗemngal farayse, o jaɓaama nder 1984.

Akazome Emon:
Biography.
Akazome Emon hitaande danygol ma anndaa, ammaa o danygol hakkunde Tentoku 1 (957) e Kōhō 1 (964). O laati ɓiɗɗo debbo Akazome Tokimochi (赤染時用), ammaa karonsho (kitubbe kalfinaaji) Fukuro-zōshi (ja) ɗon holla baaba maako ɓernde maako woni gorko maako arande, Taira no Kanemori￼.

Miriam Akavia:
Laamu.
O jibinaa nder 1927 nder Kraków to wuro Weinfeld. Nder konu duuniyaaru ɗiɗaɓo o jeyaama nder Kraków Ghetto, nden o jeyaaki nder suudu jeyaago Kraków-Płaszów, suudu jeyaango Auschwitz, e nder suudu jeyeago Bergen-Belsen. Caggal nde British Army rimɗini suudu ɗo, o ɗon nder rewɓe rewɓe ɓe ɓe ɓe'e ɗon nyawɓe ɓe'e ɓe'e haɓɓaa ngam ɓe'e warugo nder Suwede. Nder hitaande 1946 o heɓii laawol haa Mandatory Palestine. O mari limgal nder suudu darnde, o janngini defte e taariika nder jaŋde Tel Aviv. O waɗi boo bana ardiiɗo aada nder cuuɗi diplomatiji Isra'iila ha Budapest e Stockholm. Miriam Akavia wondi go'oto nder janngooɓe tati ɓe ɓe njogii janngirde nder jaŋde ummaatoore ngam lesdi Jarmal; ammaa, ɓe ndilli mo to Gymnazjum Yahuudiyanko'en

Grace Akello:
Ɓiɗɗo e jaŋde.
O huwtunooɗo e nder nder Kenya e Tanzania haa o yahra to Ingiltere nder duuɓi 1980 ngam o warde taƴoɗo nder nder Commonwealth Secretariat. Akello waɗi kuugal diga 1983 haa 1990

Bella Akhmadulina:
Izabella Akhatovna Akhmadulina (Russian: Бе́лла (Изабе́лла) Аха́товна Ахмаду́лина, Tatar: Белла Әхәт кызы Әхмәдуллина; 10 April 1937 - 29 November 2010) ko mawɗo mawɗo mawɓe Soviet e Russia, mawɗo binndi e winndotooɗo, e winndinoowo, mo anndaa e ɗemngal mum. O wonnoo e nder ɓamtaare ɗemngal Pulaar e Pulaar. Joseph Brodsky noddi mo bo mawɗo mawɗo mawɓe nder ɗemngal Rusiya. O anndiraa e nder Rusiya "wol wakkatiire"

Anna Åkerhielm:
Anna Åkerhielm ko Åkerhjelm, jibinaaɗo Anna Agriconia (1642 - 11 feebariyee 1698), wonnooɗo winndaande Suwede, e ɗemɗe hawti e Latin, e jaayndiyanke. O woni debbo arande nder Swidya mo ɓe teddini ngam kuuɗe maako (1691).

Susanna Alakoski:
Biography.
Alakoski jibinaa nder 1962 e Vaasa, Finland e waɗi nguurndam maako fuɗɗam nder nokkuure Fridhem nder Ystad, Sweden. O janngini ngam o warde mo'oɗo e nder ummaatooje, o timmini jaŋde maako nder duuɓi 23. Nder hitaande 1988, o janngini binndi e Skurups folkhögskola. Hakkunde 1995 e 2003, o huwti o golli mawɗo bolle foroy Vänsterpartiet Gudrun Schyman 

Elena Akselrod:
Elena Meerovna Akselrod (Russian: Еле́на Ме́еровна Аксельро́д, IPA: ˈmjejɪrəvnə ɐksjɪljˈrot i; Belarusian: Алена Меераўна Аксельрод; jibinaaɗo 1932 e Minsk, Belarus) ko mawɗo mawɗo e moftorɗo Rus. O debbo mawɗo artist Meer Akselrod, o winndi defte dow baaba maako.

Seza Kutlar Aksoy:
Biography.
O wondi e nder ardiiɓe Turki e nder P.E.N. International, TYS (Turkish Writers' Union), e nder ardiɓe Turki e dow ardiiɓe Turkish Association of Children and Youth Publications. O wondi ko ardiiɗo to Turki 2011 ngam jaaynde Astrid Lindgren, jaaynde ɓurɗe mawnude e ɓurɗe heewde e nder winndere ndee.

Julia Carter Aldrich:
Ɓiɗɗo e jaŋde.
Julia Carter jibini nder Liverpool, Ohio, nder 28 Januuwarre 1834. O woni joɓo nder saare ɓiɓɓe joweeɗiɗi. Aadi mum e baaba mum ɓe New Englanders be English. Baaba maako'en, ɓe danyiraama Richmond, Virginia, ɓe ɓe'e ɓe'e Scottish e German. Carter fuɗɗi winndugo nder duuɓi sappo e nayi, o fuɗɗi wurtinki nder duuɓi sappoo e nayi.

Mirra Alfassa:
Mirra Alfassa (21 feebariyee 1878 - 17 Noofambar 1973), anndiraa e yimɓe makko no The Mother ko La Mère, o wonnoo guru ruuhu, mo anndinoowo yoga e mo anndinoo yoga, e gollanɗo e Sri Aurobindo, mo o yi'i o mari yoga e makko e o noddi mo "The Mother". O waɗi Ashram Sri Aurobindo e o waɗi wuro Auroville; o mari semmbe e dow yoga Integral.

Júlia Lopes de Almeida:
Júlia Valentina da Silveira Lopes de Almeida (Septemba 24, 1862 - May 30, 1934) wondi go'o nder rewɓe arandeeji Braziliyaɓe ɓe keɓii anndal e jaɓugo ummaatoore bana mawɗo. Nder golle ɗe waɗi duuɓi cappanɗe jowi, o winndi nder feere feere feere nder ɗemɗe adaaɗe; ko ɗum woni, ko o winndi, ko winndi e nder semmbe naturalist Émile Zola e Guy de Maupassant, ko heɓi hakkilantaaku yimɓe ɓennuɓe. Ɗe nder defte maako ɗe annditi dow dow dow dow nder lesdi lesdi lesdi lesdi Brazil, ɗe ɗe'e Memórias de Marta, ko'e nder nder lesdi lesdi Brazil arande nder wuro wuro, A Família Medeiros, e A Falência. Hono no woodi semmbe e mo ɓeen no Aluísio Azevedo, João do Rio e João Luso, ɓe tawata mo no o ɗon haalde e ɓesngu ɓesngu darnde rewɓe e ɓeydaade hakkeeji rewɓe, bana ko waɗi habaru rewɓe rewɓe bana Clarice Lispector, e ngam mo ɗon wallita bannuki. O dewti e mawɗo binndol Filinto de Almeida.

Abimbola Alao:
Biography.
Abimbola Gbemi Alao ko jannginoowo e winndaako. Abimbola jibini nder Ibadan, Nigeria. O janngini e jaŋde Ibadan, Nigeria, to o heɓii BA (Hon) nder classics nder 1988 e MA Classics nder 1991. O janngini PGCE e MA nder binndi jaŋde e Plymouth e hitaande 2001 e 2009. O heɓii PhD maako nder 2023 e Jaango Jaango Lapland, Lapin yliopisto nder Finland. Kuɗol maako ɗon haandi dow nyau nyauɓe ɓaawo ɓaawo ɓernde, e no ɓe ɓesdi anndal FTD ngam nyauɓe fuɗɗii.

Mathilde Alanic:
(surname, Miranda; 10 Noofambar 1864 - 20 Oktoobar 1948) wonnooɗo winndaande Farayse mawɗo noomiya e koftal. Kuugal maako wurtini nder Les Annales politiques et littéraires, L'Eventail, Le Magasin pittoresque, Musée des familles, Le National illustré, La Petite Illustration, Le Petit Journal, Le Petite Parisien, Revue de l'Anjou, e nder nder nder nder feere feere. Alanic waɗi jaɓɓiɗo jaɓɓi Montyon, jaɓɓi Jules-Favre, jaɓɓa sobrier-Arnould, e o waɗi jevalier, Legion of Honor. O maayi nder hitaande 1948

Alice Albinia:
Mathilde Alanic (surname, Miranda; 10 Noofambar 1864 - 20 Oktoobar 1948) wonnooɗo winndaande Farayse mawɗo noomiya e koftal. Kuugal maako wurtini nder Les Annales politiques et littéraires, L'Eventail, Le Magasin pittoresque, Musée des familles, Le National illustré, La Petite Illustration, Le Petit Journal, Le Petite Parisien, Revue de l'Anjou, e nder nder nder nder feere feere. Alanic waɗi jaɓɓiɗo jaɓɓi Montyon, jaɓɓi Jules-Favre, jaɓɓa sobrier-Arnould, e o waɗi jevalier, Legion of Honor. O maayi nder hitaande 1948.

Deborah Alcock:
Laamu.
O jibinaa e Kilkenny, to baaba maako, John Alcock, mo ardii ardiiɗo ardiiɗo Waterford, e debbo maako Jane. Nder nder nder nder nder Isle of Man 1851, Deborah duuɓi sappo e jowi ɗon wondi nder Isle Of Man bee baaba'en maako, aunty Sally McKenny, kawɓe Deborah Barllie duuɓi sappo go'o e sappo e tati e go'o Barbara Gose, e maccuɓe ɗiɗo.

Concepción Aleixandre:
María de la Concepcion Aleixandre Ballester, anndiraa kadi e Maria de la Conception Isidra Faustina Stephanie Vicenta (1862, Valencia - 1952) wonnoo jannginoowo, doktoor, ginekologu, foonduɗo, anndudi, e winndiyanke. O'o debbo arandeejo nder ummaatoore go'o nder lesdi Spain.

Ave Alavainu:
Ave Alavainu (4 oktoobar 1942 - 3 abriil 2022) wonnoo ko mawɗo e winndiyanke Estonia. O jibinaa e Tartu e 4 Oktoobar 1942 o maayi e 3 abriil 2022 e duuɓi 79. O yahi to Tallinn Pedagogical Institute (1962-64), o janngini anndal ɗemngal ngal Estoniya, e Tartu State University (1964-67).

Solvej Balle:
Solvej Balle (dimaa 16 August 1962 to Bovrup, Sønderjylland) ko winndiyanke Denmark.
O jibinaa e Bovrup, Sønderjylland e janngini ɗemngal e falsafa e jaŋde Copenhagen. E hitaande 1984, o wurtini deftere makko arande Lyrefugl (The Lyre Bird). Balle yahii nder Orop, Australia, United States e Canada. O yahi Forfatterskolen (koole mawɗo) hakkunde 1987 e 1989. Nder 1996, o laati marɗo nder deftere defte den blå port. O winndi &, deftere gabbol ngol wurtini nder 1990. Yimɓe ɓe o waɗi nder hitaande 1993 diga nder nder nder nder dow dow dow dow haala, fire beretninger om mennesket (Fuu e sariya: Kuwtooji nayi dow yimɓe) ɓe njaɓɓi mo anndal duniyaaru.

Margarita Bobba:
Margarita Bobba (fl. 1560), ko winndaako e debbo mawɗo Casale Monferrato, ko Gioseffantonio Morano holli mo o mari ɓernde mawnde e o anndina ɗemɗe Latin e Itali e nder ɗemɗe poesirɗe. O wurtini kuuɗe ɗuuɗɗe, nden o ɗon teddina diga Stefano Guazzo nder La conversazione civile maako e Fulgenzio Alghisi nder taariika maako nder Monferrato.

Ana Cecilia Blum:
O janngini Siyyaaku Politika e Fedde e Jaŋde Vicente Rocafuerte Lay e Guayaquil. O huuwani ngam haalde haalde e wiɗto dow ɗemngal ngal e Catholic University of Guayaquil, Andan University of Quito e FACSO University of Guayquil. O jooɗii jooni hakkunde Ekwater e Amerik.

Anni Blomqvist:
Biography.
Blomqvist jibini e Vårdö, Åland, Grand Duchy of Finland, Russia Empire, arande nder ɓiɓɓe sappo je mannguɗo Viktor Karlsson e debbo maako Anna. Wonande e saare woni nana Anni e inna, mo o laato dow dow hooreejo nder kitaabhe Anna Beata.

Antonina Bludova:
Kontee Antonina Dmitrievna Bludova (Антонина Дмитриевна Блудова; 25 abriil 1813 - 9 abriil 1891) wonnooɗo rusiyankoore moƴƴo, salonist, memoirist e debbo mo ɗon jaɓɓa.

Ilse Blumenthal-Weiss:
Ilse Blumenthal-Weiss (14 oktoobar 1899 - 10 août 1987) wonnoo mawɗo mawɗo Almaami. O heɓii baawɗe nder Westerbork e Theresienstadt, o winndi dow halki

Irena Bobowska:
Ɓiɗɗo.
Bobowska jibinaa e janngirde e Poznań, ɓiɗɗo Teodor Bobowski e Zofia Kraszewska. O anndi e bandiraaɓe maako e nder saare maako "Nenia". To o woodi duuɓi ɗiɗi o hawti e poliomyelitis, ngam maajum o waawi huutoree nder karallaagal ɓoggi ngam yonki maako fuu. Nder duuɓi 1930 o yahdi nder Dąbrówka High School ha Poznań. O fuɗɗii haɓɓugo deftere yimɓe arande nder wuro Warsaw nder Poznań. Nder lewru fuɗnaange 1939 o waɗi daande e Polish Navy ngam o warugo go'o nder "torpedoji ɗon ɗon ɗon ɗon woodi" - ko project ɓurɗo waɗugo ngam tiggol torpedoji ɗi yimɓe ɗon ɗon ɗon manngi ngam naftora ngam huutugo gardagol lesdi Nazi Germany. O waɗi ko o yiɗi nder sirri to saare maako.

Liliana Bodoc:
Laamu.
Liliana Bodoc jibinaa e Santa Fe nder 1958. Nde o woodi duuɓi jowi, saare maako njahi Mendoza ngam kuugal. Nder ɗon o janngini e Universidad Nacional de Cuyo, o heɓii jaŋde Bachelor of Arts nder ɗemngal ɗemngal. O ɓeydiima e dow Allah, o jeyaa to Islama nder hitaande 1994.

Liliana V. Blum:
Biography.
Liliana Blum jibini nder Durango, Mexico, nder hitaande 1974. Blum heɓii jaangirde maako nder barkiɗiniya nder barkiɗinki nder jaangirde Kansas e barkiɗiniiji maako nder Tec de Monterrey

Enid Blyton:
Enid Mary Blyton (11 August 1897 - 28 Noofambar 1968) wonnooɗo winndaako ɓiyɓe leydi Ingiltere, defte mum laati bestseller nder duuniyaaru gila duuɓi 1930's, jaaynde ɓuri miliyaaruuji 600. Deftere maako ɗonno ɓeyda ɓurugo anndugo, nden ɗonno haaldiraa nder ɗemɗe cappanɗe joweego. Ha nder lewru Juun 2019, Blyton waɗi nokku 4 ngam jaayndiyanke ɓurɗo tuubuki. O winndi dow kuuje ɗuuɗɗe, hawti e janngude, taariika, fantasy, mistik, e haalaji Bibel. O ɓurɗo haaduki hannde ngam defte maako noddy, Famous Five, Secret Seven, the Five Find-Outers, e Malory Towers, koo nde o winndi feere feere feere, hawti e St. Clare's, The Naughtiest Girl, e The Faraway Tree series.

Cecil Bødker:
Biography.
Nder hitaande 1955 o waɗi kuuje maako arande ɗe o wurtini nder ɓernde Cecil Skar. Nder 1961 o waɗi ko o waɗi ko e nder nder nder nder deftere no'o Øjet (The Eye), ko fuu e nder deftere nde yimɓe wonɓe e nder duniyaaru. Diistopian critics of civilization tokki nder Tilstanden Harley (The condition Harley) (1965) e Pap (Cardboard) (1967).

Christina Björk:
O jibinaa e Stockholm e janngii e nder galle Graphic Institute ɗon. O waɗi golle nder nder nder nder go'o nder nder nder defte nder nder nder teeteere, nden o anndini Lena Anderson, mo o golli bee Björk nder defte feere feere. O huuwani nder kuugal teleeji ɓiyum ngam Sveriges Television. Daga 1975 haa 1980, o laati marɗo nder deftere ɓikkoy nder jardi Dagens Nyheter. Nder hitaande 1985, o wurtini Linnea i målarens trädgård bee jaayndeeji Anderson; fassara Linnea in Monet's Garden nder Farayse wurtini duuɓi ɗiɗi ɓaawo. Woni deftere nden ɗon haani nder ɗemɗe 15. Ɓaawo ɗon, ɓe waɗi filmji cuttoɗi bee Björk nder kuugal darnde.

Isa Blagden:
Laamu.
Baaba Blagden innde maako ɗon anndina Thomas nder defte cembiɗal Protestanɓe Florentine e lenyol maako bana Suwiis, amma ɗum ɗon haani bana ɓiɗɗo maako ɓaawo baaba Angiliis e inna Indi. Ɗuum hollitii wonde ɗum hollitii e holligo fuɗɗorde fuɗnaange. Won daliila dow dow ko o jibinaa Calcutta, ɓiɗɗo debbo Thomas Bracken e Eurasian, ko wayi no Blagden. Won anndal goɗɗum dow maako haa o wari nder Florence nder hitaande 1850, to o ɓaawo ɗon o laati ɓandu yimɓe Ingliisi. O jaɓaani nder nder Luisa Agassiz's Ladies School ɓadi Regent's Park, London, ko waalidiɓe Angalteer nder leydi Indiya ɓeydi..

Adriana Bittel:
Yimɓe jeyaaɓe.
Nder hitaande 1970, o laati jaŋde jaŋde e nden wakkati o laati marja "România Literară", to o ɗon huuwa jooni. O woni jaayndeejo nder Universal Publishing House of Dalsi.

Emily Montague Mulkin Bishop:
Emily Montague Mulkin Bishop (woowo, Mulkin; 3 Nuwambar 1858 - 22 Nuwambar 1916) wonnoo jaajinoowo e jannginoowo Delsartean Amerik nder ɓorniiji, hollaago e aada ɓalli. O anndini o go'o nder mawɓe jaayndiyaaɓe e winndiiɓe dow haala ngol nder leydi Amerika, e nder nden wakkati o huutori innde Emily M. Bishop. Bishop boo o ɗon wondi mo'o wayloowo. Nder defte maako hawti e Amerikanized Delsarte Culture (1892), Self-expression and Health: Americanized Delarte Culture (1895), Interpretive Forms of Literature (1903), Seventy Years Young, or The Unusual Way (1907), Daily Ways to Health (1910), e The Road to "Seventy Years Youth": Or, The Unusual way (1916).

Sigrún Edda Björnsdóttir:
Ɓiɗɗo.
j Ragnar Kjartansson.
Nolde hoore.
Nder hitaande 2001, Sigrún wurtini deftere maako arande. Deftere nden ɗon haalaa dow ɓiɗɗo debbo mo'o boola e bandiraawo maako Hnútur nder nder nder nder ɓe ɗon yaha nder saare maɓɓe nder Þingvellir haa juulde 17 (Juule Islandiya'en) nder Reykjavík. Bóla ko neɗɗo Sigrún tagi e waɗi ngam teleeji ɓiyum nder 1990.

Marie Bjelke Petersen:
Laamu.
Marie Bjelke Petersen woni ɓiɗɗo debbo tan e ɓiɗɗo ɗiɗaɓo Georg Peter Bjelke-Petersen, mo jarnaaɗo, nden boo mawɗo maakin, e debbo maako Caroline Vilhelmine, mo jibinaa Hansen. (Jamma "Petersen" Georg waɗi innde maako ngam daliila anndaaɗum nder duuɓi 1860s.) Marie yahdi jaŋde nder Denmark, Jarmalin e Ingiltere, ammaa o jooɗii nder Tasmania ɓurna fuɗnaaki maako caggal nde o yahdi bee baaba maako e deerɗi maako nayi nder hitaande 1891. O heɓii naturaal nder hitaande 1915.

Elizabeth Bishop:
Ɓiɗɗo.
Bishop, ɓiɗɗo gooto, jibini Worcester, Massachusetts, to William Thomas e Gertrude May (Bulmer) Bishop. Caggal baaba maako, mo mo mo mahata mahol, maayi nde o woodi lebbi joweetati, inna Bishop warti nyawɗo hakkillo e o hoɗori nder hitaande 1916. (Bishop ɓaawo ɗon o winndi dow wakkati nde maama maako ɗon haɓɓa nder nder haala maako "Haa nder gariiri".) O laati marɗo nder ɓikkoy maako, o jooɗii bee maama maako e baaba maako nder gariiri mawɗi, Nova Scotia, wakkati o wi'i nder binndi maako. Maama Bishop ɗon jooɗi nder suudu duɗal haa o maayi nder 1934, nden ɗiɗo'en ɗiɗo'e ɓe meeɗaay wonde ɓe hawti. 

Anne Bishop:
Biography.
Anne Bishop jibinaa nder 1955, o fuɗɗi gollal maako nder binndi bee jarugo kaalaaje. O anndiraa e nder defte makko ɗe heɓi ko'e heɓi koode, The Black Jewels Trilogy, Daughter of the Blood, Heir to the Shadows, e Queen of the Darkness. Bishop waɗi kadi Tir Alainn Trilogy, e The Landscapes of Ephemera Series. O ɗon jooɗi nder lesdi New York haa jooni o ɗon huuwa dow The Others, series maako ɓurɗum ɓuwaaɗum. Ɗe ɗuuɗɗe nder binndi maako ɗon haɓa nder lesdi feere.

Poldy Bird:
Fedde e golle.
O jibinaa e Paraná, nder leydi Entre Ríos, Argentina, amma nde o wonnoo debbo o jooɗii e Buenos Aires. Nder 10 Agust 1949, nde o woodi duuɓi joweetati, baaba maako, Leopoldina Lichtschein, boo mawɗo e mawɗo, maayi nder kaɓirɗe nder gariiri. Ɗu'um nyau nyauɗum marki nguurndam Bird, ammaa boo marki maako bana mawɗo

Clementina Black:
Ɓiɗɗo.
Clementina Black jibini nder Brighton, gooto e ɓiɓɓe njoweego go'o, laamiiɗo, mawɗo wuro e laamiiɗo Brighton, David Black (1817-1892), ɓiɗɗo arkitekto maayo to Czar Nicholas I nder Russia, e debbo maako, Clara Maria Patten (1825-1875), ɓiɗɗo debbo mo laamiiɗo portrait. Black jaɓi jaango nder saare maako, to 58 Ship Street, Brighton, ɓurna fuu to baaba maako, o mari anndal Farayse e Jamani

Ángeles López de Ayala:
Ángeles López de Ayala y Molero jibini nder Seville, 21 Septemba 1858. Hakkilantaaku maako ɗon ɗon dow Republicanism Spain, feminism e ideology Freemasonry. Nder kawtal e anarkist Teresa Claramunt e ruuhu Amalia Domingo Soler, o haɓɓiiɗo Sociedad Autónoma de Mujeres de Barcelona (1892), ko ɗum laatii arandeejo feminist ha Spain; e Sociedad Progresiva Femenina e 1898. O ɗon haɓɓa ngam hakkilo'en rewɓe, o ɗon wi'a rewɓe ɗon mari hakkiilo hoore maɓɓe daga coci e daga hakkiilo worɓe. O maayi Barcelona, 29 lewru 1er 1926

Ángela Figuera Aymerich:
Fedde fuɗɗam.
Angela jibini haa Bilbao, Espaañ nder wuro wuro wuro, amma ngam nyawdi maama mum, Figuera waɗi ɓurna ɓiyum ɓiyum nder ɓiyum ɓe ɓe ɓe ɓiyum. O yahi janngirde fuɗɗam nden o yahi janngirɗe fuɗɗam nder nder sukaaɓe teemedde go'o. Koo nde baaba maako haɓɓi, o janngini defte nder jaŋde Valladolid

Güzide Sabri Aygün:
Nolde hoore.
Gusife Sabri jibini to Salih reşat, laamɗo leydi to Ministeer Adunaaji Ottoman, e gorko mum Nigar e Fındıklı nder Istanbul, to Ottoman Empire nder hitaande 1886. O woodi deeriraaɓe ɗiɗo, Fatma Aliye e Emine Semiye. O mawni nder gariiri Çamlica nder Istanbul. Nder duuɓi ɓaawo, o yahri Istanbul o yahri Anatoliya bee saare maako ngam baaba maako ɗon ɗon wurtina, ngam haɓugo maako bee laamu Ottoman Sultan Abdul Hamid II (mo laamiiɗo 1876-1909).

Suzanne Axell:
Kuugal.
E hitaande 1980, o fuɗɗi golle mum nder habaru. Nder duuɓi sappo o huuwani bana marɗo kubaruuji kubaruuji ngam Expressen e marɗo kubaru kubaruuji nder Arbetet. Nder 1990, o jaɓaaki golle haa Aftonbladet ngam o fuɗɗita gollaago ngam radioji ha nokku. O holliti Parasollet to Radio Uppland, o tokki huwugo nder nder nder nder suudu ngol duuɓi jowi.

Félicie d'Ayzac:
Biography.
D'Ayzac jibinaa nder Paris nder hitaande 1801, o ɓiyɗo ɓiyɗo baawɗe e golle. Nde o woodi duuɓi 16, o jokki nder nder nder nder suudu nder nder nder Saint-Denis, ɓaawo maajum o laati dame professeur (ko jannginoowo debbo). O jooɗii ton duuɓi 35, fuɗɗam o yiɗi anndugo defte e poesi, ɓaawo o jeyaa e taariika art, ɓurɗum e archaeology. Caggal nde o heɓii anndal ngam ko o waɗi e nder duuɓi 1823 e 1824, Soupirs maako heɓii ceede e Académie française nder hitaande 1843.

Susanne Ayoub:
Susanne Ayoub (duggi e hitaande 1956 e Baghdad) ko winndiiɗo, jaayndiyanke e filmmaker. O anndiraa ko ɓuri heewde ngam defte mum ɗen, bana Engelsgift (2004), ko Hoffmann und Campe ha Hamburg, wonande ko heewde e nder leyɗe goɗɗe. Ko'e kuuɗe maako ɗon ɓeyda dow kuugal goɗɗum ko'e rewɓe waɗi, nden ɓe ɗon ɗaɓɓita ɗum bana dow ko'e maɓɓe.

Diane Awerbuck:
Diane Awerbuck (dimaa 1 abriil 1974) ko winndaako nder Afrik worgo. Wolof maako, Gardening at Night, heɓii 2004 Commonwealth Writers' Prize, Best First Book (Africa e Caribbean), nden o wondi nder nder nder nder darnde darnde daranaaku Dublin International Literary Award. Nder hitaande 2011, ko'e maako nder kuutorɗe, Cabin Fever, wurtini nder Random House Struik. Roman maako, Home Remedies, wurtini nder Random House Struik nder lewru August 2012. O wonnoo nder nder nder nder jaajol Caine Prize nder 2014, o heɓii jaajol Short Story Day Africa nder hitaande nden.

Majgull Axelsson:
Nolde e golle.
Deftere maako arande nden ko non-fiction, e ɗon ɗon haɗi dow caɗeele ɓikkoy nder ɓiyum ɓiyum e ɓikkoy haa nder nder duniyaaru tati, e yidde nder Swidya. April Witch woni roman maako ɗiɗaɓo, nden won ɗon jaɓɓa nder Swidya. E nder 400,000 koode je je je je jaɓaama nder nder nder nder, nden nder nder nder dow nder nder nder boɗeeje ɓurɗe jaɓaade nder nder nder lebbi, nden o heɓii boɗeeji mawɗi nder ɗemngal Suwede hawti e nder boɗeyam Moa Martinsson e boɗeyama Jörgen Eriksson. O ɗon haɓɓii temme haɓɓuki daada e suka debbo, gasa hakkunde rewɓe, e ɓooɗugo laamu ɓaawo konu Suwede

Avvaiyar (poyeta karnijum 8):
Avvaiyar (Tamil: ⁇ வையார்) ko mawɗo mawɗo mawɓe Tamil o jooɗii e nder karnuwol jeeɗiɗawel walla joweetati e o jeyaa e mawɗo mawjo-saint Sundarar. O laatiɗo Vinayagar Agaval, ko habaruji poetic habbugo Allah Hindu Ganesha. Innde Avvaiyar ina firti 'ko debbo mo ɓe teddina' nden, ngam maajum ko innde ma'a; innde maako anndinaay. 

Shokoofeh Azar:
Laamu.
Azar jibinaa e Iran e hitaande 1972. Baaba maako o mawɗo e mawɗo, o janngini ɗemngal janngude e jaŋde, o ardiiɗo e mawnoowo. O fuɗɗi golle mum nde o wondi ardiiɗo e winndannde e nder nder nder nder Iran. O waɗi golle e nder nder nder nder wardi, ko o waɗi ko o winndi e nder nder

Hind Azouz:
Azouz jibinaa nder Tunis, o ɗon moodi. O wurtini bolle e defte nder kuuje feere feere nder nder nder golle mum, hawti e al-Hayah al-thaqafiya, al-Fikr, Qisas, al-Idha'a, al-Mar'a, Al-Tarbiya al-shamila, al-'Amal, e al-Sabah; o wurtini bo bolle bolle bolles, Fi-l-darb-al-tawil (Horo laawol juuti), nder hitaande 1969. O heɓii medalje keewɗe diga laamu Tunisi nder nder golle mum, hawti e Medal Culture, Medal Employment, e Medal National Struggle; o heɓii kadi ceedeeji feere feere. needed O jeyaa e nder bandiraaɓe mawɓe Tunisi e nder bandido habaru ha Tunis, o jeyaa e hooreejo ɓoggi rewɓe nder jamma demokaraasi. O huutoraama ha haalde radio lesdi Tunisia bana haalde, o ɗon arda doofol ngam kuugal. Kuulaaji maako ɗon hawta dow kuuje ɗe rewɓe nder ummaatoore cakaaji mari ɓernde, e ɗon hawta kuuje ɗe ɗon mari habaru bana hakkillaaji ɓundu e abortion. O anndini o laatii majaango nder nder nder nder suudu haalu nder nder nder kuuɗe maako.

Pamela Andersson:
Pamela Kristina Alselind, (woowo Andersson, danygol 13 Maars 1965) ko haalanɗo Suwede mo winndi ngam Expressen e nder nder magazine Amelia. E hitaande 2006 o jokki nder show SVT På spåret e Tomas Bolme.

Sophia de Mello Breyner Andresen:
Nolde e golle.
Sophia de Mello Breyner Andresen jibini ha 6 Noofambar 1919 ha Porto, Portugal. O debbo Maria Amelia de Mello Breyner e João Henrique Andresen. O woodi ɓaawo danish dow baaba maako, ɓurna fuu o ɓaŋgi baaba maako, Jan Andresen, mo yahdi to Porto tan nder ɓiyum, o acci nokkuure nden. Nder hitaande 1895, mawɗo Sophia soodi Quinta do Campo Alegre, jooni anndiraaɗo Porto Botanical Garden, to o ɓeydi saare maako

Nadija Hordijenko Andrianova:
Nadia Hordijenko Andrianova (Надія Миколаївна Андріанова-Гордиєнко e ɗemngal Ukrainian; 1921-1998) wonnoo winndaako e winndoowo ɗemngal Esperanto. O janngini ɗemngal e journalism nder Kyiv e o wurtini artikooji e baylitol nder Paco e Hungara Vivo. E hitaande 1987, Fedde Esperanto Hungariyankoore wurtini deftere maako Vagante tra la mondo maltrankvila. O winndi kadi dow Vasili Eroshenko.

Isobel Andrews:
Isabella Smith Andrews (woowo Young; 2 Nuwambar 1905 - 19 Juun 1990), anndiraaɗo e Isobel Andrews, o wonnooɗo Scottish-born New Zealandɗo, mawɗo, winndaɗo, winndaaɗo e mawɗo. O winndi ɓurɗe cappanɗe jeewte, ɗuuɗal maɓɓe wurtini, o wondi e suudu New Zealand nder British Drama League. O heɓii nder nder nder nder dowla jaayndeere nder nder nder hitaande, nder nder nder duuɓi nayi. Yimɓe ɓeen, ɓurɓe yiɗde ko'e maɓɓe, ɓe ɗon ɓeyda waɗugo nder karnijum 21.

Neshani Andreas:
Neshani Andreas (1964 - May 2011) ko winndaako Namibiya, o huutornoo kadi e nder jamma Amerik. O anndiraa ɓurɗo anndude e nder deftere makko The Purple Violet of Oshaantu, ko waɗi o woni Namibian arandeere nder nder Heinemann's African Writers Series. maayi e duuɓi 46, o heɓii nyau nyau nyau ɓernde fuɗɗam e hitaande 2010.
Ɓiɗɗo.
jibinaa e Walvis Bay, Haŋgal-Yamma Afrika (ko jooni woni Namibia), nder 1964, ɗiɗaɓo nder ɓiɓɓe joweeɗiɗi, nden o ardii gollude nder suudu huutoraade limce. Mawɓe maako ɗiɗo fuu ɓe kuuwanooɓe nder suudu kuuwol kalluɗum. Andreas yiɗi warta marɗo diga o ɗon mawɗo. O janngini haa jaŋde jannginooɓe nder Ongwediva o janngini ɗon duuɓi jowi. Andreas yahi haa heɓugo jaŋde Bachelor of Arts e jaŋde jaŋde nder nder lesdi Namibia. O laati ardiiɗo darnde ngam jam do Amerik nder Namibia duuɓi nayi. Nder ɗon o hawti bee neɗɗo arande ngam semmbina mo o winnda, ko o wi'i ɓaawo ɗon "go'o nder wakkatiji ɓurɗi mawnugo nder yonki am"

Agustina Andrade:
Ɓeydi e golle.
Agustina Andrade jibini nder Gualeguaychú, Entre Ríos e 9 August 1858 (ko 1861) nder wuro Gualeguayechú, nder lardunaaji Entre Ríos. O debbo mawɗo Olegario Victor Andrade e Maria Eloisa Quiñones González. O yiɗi haa haaji diga duuɓi sappo, o fuɗɗi wurtinki kuuɗe maako diga duuɓi 16. E baaba mum e Leandro N. Alem, Andrade huwti e album poético argentino, ɗum wurtini nder hitaande 1877. E dow semmbe baaba mum, o fuɗɗi waɗugo kuuje mum nder La Tribuna, o waɗi ɗemngal poesikal ngal, ɗum waɗi Victor Hugo e Gustavo Adolfo Bécquer. Nder hitaande 1878, o wurtini deftere Lágrimas, nden nder hitaande ɓaawo ɗon o wurtina Flor de un día. "Ko'e maako ɗon teddina bana Benigno Tejeiro Martínez e Martín Coronado ngam "ko'e maɓɓe ɓe ɗon yiɗi". Nder poesías (1877), mawɗo mawɗo Gervasio Méndez hawti e poem, ¿Cuándo vuelves á tu patria? A mi simpática amiga Agustina Andrade (To nde on warata to lesdi mon? Andrade'en poem La Fé ɗum hollii "wolwolwol"

Ethel Anderson:
Laamu.
Ethel Anderson jibini nder Lillington, suburb Leamington, nder Warwickshire, Ingiltere, to waalidiyankooɓe Australia jibinaaɓe Cyrus Mason e Louise Campbell e 16 Maars 1883. Ɓaawo maajum saare maako ɗon maaro to Australiya, o mawni nder Sydney e nder wuro mawɗo maako, Rangamatty, ɓadi Picton, New South Wales. O janngini haa saare bee nder Sydney Church of England Girls' Grammar School (jo SCEGGS Darlinghurst jooni) SCEGGS Darlinghurst). 

Tunji Sowande:
Tunji sowande
Hankoni tunji sowande er
iminmo eii Leysdi lagos,eii Naajeeriya dubi makobo (1912) kadibo imoder bandirabe gimobe,inde maunirawo makobo fela sowande. Jomu wuro mabbebo Anglican priest, Emmanuel sowande andado mo inde eii wigere gimol dina mabbe(church) iton Leysdi lagos and a contemporary o janja classical composer and organist Ekundayo Phillips.

Efunsetan Aniwura:
Efunsetan Aniwura
Hankoni Efunsetan Aniwura orimama i (c.1820s-June 30,1874)nden hankoke didabo I iyalode mo ibadan kadimabo imonder pre-eminent Bewala gata I lesdi duniyaru saini sore sore I 19th century ibadan.owarti I maudo hokkuki shede I kolte waje sore sore wala bo makko I Dundonma kadi oburi waltinki hankali mako tonto political, military, joddiki economic I wigere dina yimbe iton lesdi ibadan.
O andado nden wiowo innana kadin iburki sembe fukowari dowmako,one of the wealthiest yoruba debbo mbido jododoto imako.

Ghali Umar Na'Abba:
Ghali Umar Na'Abba
Ghali umar na'abba CFR eriminmo eii duubi 1958nden kadi omainama eii 2023 emonder ngadobe siyasajju eii Leysdi Naajeeriya ojogake jodorgal 8th metowo i honduko ko moye i house of representatives of Naajeeriya 1999 toh yari 2003.
